item.text: sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo// byang chub sems
XXX
XXX
dang/ a ti muk+ta ko sna tshogs mang pos legs par brgyan pa na/ dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po
sa gzigs dbang phyug gi pho brang shing sA lo dang/ ta mal dang/ tsam pa ka dang/ mya ngan tshang
'tshal lo// 'di skad badrag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das ri bo po Ta la na spyan
dpa' sams dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la phyag
brgya stong dang/ byang chub sems dpa' sa ya bye ba brgya stong phrag dgu bcu rtsa dgu dang thabs cig tu bzhugs te/ gnas
gtsang ma'i ris kyi lha'i bu brgya stong phrag du mas yongs su bskong cing mdun gyis bltas pan/ dbang phyug dang/ dbang
phyug chen po dang/ tshangs pa dang/ lha'i bu rnams kyi dbang phyug mdzad nas chos ston par mdzad do// de nas byang chub
soms dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug stan las langs te/ bla gos phrag pa
gcig tu gzar nas/ pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te thal mo sbyar ba btud nas/ bcom ldan 'das
gal ba de logasasu 'dzum pa'i bzhin gyis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom
ldan 'das gang 'dri den yod pa'irgyal po'i snying po zhes bgyi ba mchis te/ bdag gas bskal pa dgu bcu rtsa gcig gi ston
legs su 'jig rten gyi khams rnam par lta ba de bzhin gshegs pa 'jig rten dbang phyug rgyal po las mnos nas/ 'di ltar
bdag gis dbang phyug dang/ dbang phyugachen po la sogs pa'i lha'i bu rnams dang/ gnas gtsang ma'i ris kyi lha'i bu brgyastong
phrag mang po bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub 'dzin dustsal nas/ bdag gis rmongs pam mchis pa'i yeshes
bkod pa la sogs te ting nge 'dzin brgya stong phrag bcu thob par bgyis lags so// bcom ldan 'das 'di ltar yangs phyogs
gang du sing po 'dispyod pas phyogs der yang dbang phyug dang/ dbang phyug chen po dang/ tshangs pa la sogs pa lha'i bu khri nyis stong gis bsrung ba dang/ bskyab pa dang/
sba ba'i slad du gnas par rig par bgyi lags so// bcom ldan 'das gang na don yod pa'i phun sum tshogs pa'i sing po 'di spyod pa'i sa phyogs de'ang mchod rtan du'ong bkur bar
'gyur lags so// bcom ldan 'das sems can de dag ni sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag du ma la dge ba'icu ba bskyod par 'gyur lags so// gapazhig don yod pa'i
zhugs pa'i snying po 'dimanyan par bgyidan/ bcom ldan 'das sdig pa spyod pa 'am/ sdig pa'i chos kun tu spyod pa 'am/ 'phags pa la skur pa 'dabs pa 'am/ dam pa'i
chos spong ba 'am/ mnar med par gzhol ba 'am/ sangs rgyas dang/ byang chub sems dpa' dang/ nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad slong ba de 'gyod par gyur cing//
ma 'ongs pa na sdom pa'i thob par 'gyur lags so// bcom ldan 'das ra zhig de nyid kyis zhag gcig sbyang bra bgyis te bzlas brjod bgyis na/ tshe 'di nyid la las de rnam par dag
pa dang/ gtugs pa dang/ bsal bar 'gyur ro// rims nyen gcig pa 'am/ nyin gnyis pa 'am/ nyin gsum pa 'am/ nyin bzhi pa 'am/ de bzhin du rims nyin bdun
pa 'am/ mig nad dum/ rna ba'i nad dam/ sna'i nad dam/ so'and dam/ mnu'i nad dam/ lce'i dang dkan gyind dam/ sIpand dam/ ltend dam/ ro
rgyab dang nad pa'i nad dam/ yan lag dang nying lag gi nad dam/ gzhang 'brum mam/ pho ba'i nadadam/ rtsod pa 'am/ lag pa dang rkang pa'i nad dam/ sna nad dam/ klad pa'i nad
dam/ shab chen po 'am/ sha gzi gu 'am/ mdza'am/ rkang shu 'am/ 'brum bu phra mo 'am/ lcog pa 'am/ mtshan mar rdol pa 'am/ 'brum bu 'am/ brjod byed dam/ byed
ngam/ gzhan gyis bgyis pa'i gsod pa 'am/ 'ching ba 'am/ rdog pa 'am/ sgod pa 'am/ bden pa ma lags pas skur pa 'debs pa 'am/ bcom ldan 'das mdor na lus
kyi gdung ba 'am/ sems kyi gdung ba 'am/ rmilam ngan pa'i las de yongs su gtugs par 'gyur na/ sams cad dag pa lhag par dad pa rnams kyi yongasu byung bar 'gyur
ba lta smos kyang ci 'tshal/ bcom ldan 'das gal te 'khor bzhi 'am/ rigs bzhi las gang dag skya dang g.yos bdag gis don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po 'di nyan par bgyid//
'dzin par bgyid/ 'chang bar bgyid/ klog par bgyid/ 'dri bar bgyid 'drir 'jug par bgyid/ kun chub bar bgyid/ sems can gzhan la'ang sgrog par bgyid cing/
tha na dud 'gro'i skye gnas su gtogs pa rnams kyi rna khung du gtad de rna bar bzlas brjod bgyid la/ rdo rje'i tshig 'di rnams sems par bgyid do/ skur ba ma mchis pa dang/ gzug
ma mchis pa dang/ rnam par mi rtog pa dang/ kun tu 'byung ba ma mchis pa dang/ ring du 'gro ba ma mchis pa dang/ bgyid pa ma mchis pa dang/ gos pa mamachis pa dang/
somasamanyam pa nyid dang ma bral ba dang/ phung bo lta dang bral ba ste/ rnal 'byor 'dis sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa sgom par bgyid na/ dol phyogs bcu nas sangs rgyas stong zhal ston
par mdzad par 'gyur zhing nongs pa 'chags par 'gyur ba la sogs pa rgyas par sbyar ro// glegs bam du bgyis takhyim du 'tshang bar bgyid dum/ rdzodapon gyis skrag pas sam/
gzhan gyi ngor ram/ bzhad gad tsam gyi rgyus mnyan par bgyidan/ bcom ldan 'das mkhas pas 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi mthus de dag gi rna khung du sgra de grag pa
lags par 'tshal bar bgyi'o// bcom ldan 'das de par n skyes bu 'ga' zhig gis tsan dananam/ ga bur ram/ bla rtsis zhig la khros sam/ yongs su smad de rdo la btagasanas
bdag nyid la byugan tsan dananam/ ga pur ram/ gla rtsi de 'disnyam du/ 'dis bdag la khros sam/ yongs su smad pas dri mnam par mi bgyi'o snyam du mi sems kyi/ gzhan dun
de nyid la dri gda' bar bgyid lags so// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin du bdag gi don yodapa'i zhags pa'i snying po 'di'ang gang su'ang rung bas bzhad gdatsam
gyis zhes bya ba rgyusalar sbyar ro// bcom ldan 'das g.yo dang sgyus mchod par bgyidana'ang da nyidasems can dmu rgod de dag gi dge ba'i rgyur 'gyur lags so// gang dang gang du skye bar/
'gyur bar tshul khrims dang/ ting nge 'dzin dang/ shes rab dang/ bsod nams kyi tshog sakyi srid du khral bar mi 'gyur to/ tshul khrims M kyi drigada'i bar bgyid pa lags so/
bcom ldan 'das gang yang rigs kyi bu pho 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo 'am/ dag slong pha 'am/ dag slong ma 'am/ dge bsnyen pha 'am/ dge bsnyan ma 'am/ de las gzhan pa'i
sems can su'ang rung bas don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying bo'i ched du yar gyi ngo'i tshes brgyad la sbyang ba bgyis te/ gzhan mi sna bar don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po lan bdun bzlas brjod
bgyid na/ bcom ldan 'das des tshe 'di nyid la phan yon nyi shu rtsa gcig thob par 'gyur te/ nyi shu rtsa gcig gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ de'i lus la nad rnams 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro//
de'i lus la las kyi dbang gisand rnams byung na rang myur du zhi bar 'gyur zhing/ lus mdangs dang ldan pa dang yid du mchi bar 'gyur ro// skya bo mang po'i snying du sdug pa dang dbang po sbas par
ba'agyur ro// de'i don rnamu 'grub par 'gyur ro/de'i don grub pa'i ng chom rkun gyis mi 'phrogs te/ zhugs kyis mi 'tshig/ chab kyis mi 'tshal/ rgyal po'i mthus dbrog par rtsom thogs
par 'gyur ro// de'i las kyi mtha'i rnams rgyas par 'gyur te/ sarab sam lags so// chab kyi 'jigs pa 'byung bar mi 'gyur te/ rlung dang char gyi 'jigs pa ma lags so// don
yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po thal bdang chu la lan bdun bzlas brjod bgyis nas/ zhing gis phyogs mtshams dang stang 'og tu bcing ba bgyis na gnod pa thams cad nye bar zhi bar 'gyur ro//
gzi brjid dang mdangs dbrog par rdo ma thebs par 'gyur zhing/ sems can thams cad kyi snying du sdug pa dang yid du 'thad par 'gyur ro/ de la dgra'i 'jigs ba 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro/ de
la dgra'i 'jigs pa byung yang myur du zhi bar 'gyur ro// de lami ma lags pa'i 'jigs pa 'byung bar mi 'gyur te/ byad kyi 'jigs pa ma lags/ mkha' 'gro ma'i 'jigs pa ma lags/ de la nyon
mos pa dang nye ba'i nyon mongs pa drag po 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro// ma dang/ mtshon dang/ dugagis 'gum par mi 'gyur ro// de la'ang lha rnams kyis rtag tu rgyun mi 'chad par bsrung ba dang/
skyob pa dang/ sbod pa'i phyir gnas par 'gyur ro// gang dang gang du skye bar 'gyur bar byams pa dang/ snyingadzad ng/ dga' ba dang/ btangasnyoms dang 'bral bar mi 'gyur to/ dal phan yon
nyi shu rtsa gcig po 'di dag 'thob par 'gyur lags so/ gzhan yang chos brgyad thob par 'gyur ta/ brgyad gang zhe na/ 'gum pa'i dus su 'phags pa spyan ras gzi
dbang phyug dag slong gi gzugs su mngon sum du zhal ston par 'gyur ro// bde bar 'chi ba'i dus bgyid par 'gyur ro// lta ba 'khrul par mi 'gyur ro// lag pa mi g.yob pa dang/ rkang pa
mi g.yo ba pa dang/ bshang gci ma mchis pa dang/ khri'i stang du'achi ba'i dus bgyid par mi 'gyur ro// dran pa shin tu'u bar gnas par 'gyur ro// kha sbub tu 'chi ba'i dus bgyid par mi
'gyur ro// 'gum pa'i dusana'ang spobs pa mi bas par 'gyur ro// de'ang sas rgyas kyi zhing gang dusmon ba der skye bar 'gyur zhing/ dag ba'i bshes gnyen dang yang 'bral bar mi 'gyur

zhi gcig bzhin du dus gsum du lan gsum du bzlas brjod bgyi'o// chang dang/ sha dang/ dus gsum chu lan gsum du bzlas brjod brgyal/rkun dong dang/ chang dang/ gdang/ kun dang/ ka'adang khyad par du don du gnyer bas sbyang bar bgyi'o/

u dang/ sgog skya dang 'dres pa dang/ lhag rol dang/ 'di rnams/don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po'i chos kyi rnam grangs la di'ang sems can rnams la mthu mchis pa dang ma yamachis par 'tshal bar bgyis nas bas sa
par bgyi'o slob dpon gyi depa mkhyud mi bgyi'o// 'di ltar drim dang bral zhing phrag dog dngasar sna spangs pani byang nub sems dpa' rnams lags te/ sems can rnams kyi don bgyi ba'i sa
dusangs rgyas kyi byang chub 'thob par 'gyur sa/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi tshogs kyi nang du gtogs so// byang chub ces bgyi ba ni shes rab lags/ soms dpa 'azhes
bgyi ba ni thabs lags te/ chos 'di gnyis sems can rnams kyi don gyi slad kho nas thob pa lags go/ gal te bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag la rjes su gnang na/ 'di ltar bdag
gis snying bo 'di de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyan sngar 'khor bzhi rnams dang gzhan sdig pa spyod pa rnams kyi don dang/ snyan pa dang bad ba'i sad du bskrag par bgyi'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das
kyis/ byang chub sems dpa' 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// sems can dag pa de de'i dus la bab par shes na khyod myos shig/ de bzhin
gshogs pas rjes su yi rang bar mdzod zin to/ phyima'i ma phyi ma'i dusan byang chub sas dpa'i theg pa can rnams la pa'i bya ba byed par 'gyur ro// de nas byang chub sems dpa' 'phags pa
spyan ras gzigs dbang phyugs mig mi 'dzum par/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das byang chub sams dpa' thams cad kyis phyag bgyis pa rnam par grol
ba'i dkyil 'khor skye bo mang bo la sman pa dang/ rgya khomang bo la bde ba dang/ 'jig rten la thugs brtse ba dang/ skya bo'i tshogs chen po 'i don du bdag la gsan du gsol/ dus gsum du
[>ku// gshegs shing bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas dang byang chub sams dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo// rangasangs rgyas dang 'phags pa nyan thos kyi dge 'dun 'das pa dang/
ma byon pa dang/ da ltar bzhugs pa thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo// yang dag par song ba rnams dang// yang dag par zhugs pa rnams la phyag 'tshal lo// shA ra dwa ti'i bu la phyag 'tshal lo/
byams pa la sogs te byang chub samasadapa' sems dpa' chen po thams cad la phyag 'tshal go/ 'phags pa de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od dpag
mad la phyag 'tshal lo// dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sa chen po dang ldan pa 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la phyag 'tshal//
lo// tad+ya thA/ otsa ra tsa ra/ tsi ri tsi'i/ tsu ru tsu ru/ ar+yahi ma hA kA ru Nika tsi ri tsir/ mi rimiri/ tsu ru tsu ru/ mahA kA ru Ni kA ya/ si ri si ri/ ri tsi ri/ pi ri yi ri/ bi rib ri//
mahApad+ma nyasta/ ka la ka la/ ki li ki li/ ku lu ku lu/ mahAshud d+ha satwA/ bu ts+tsha bu rgyu/ d+hA ba d+hA ba/ ka Na ka Na/ ki Ni kiNi/ ku chu cubar ma shud d+ha satwA/ ka ra ka ra/ kA ri ki ri/

ku ru ku ru/ ma hAsna ma prapA/ tsa la tsal/ sany+tsal sany+tsal/ bitsal bi tsa la/ o Ta Ta e Ti Ta/ b+har b+ha ra/ b+hiri b+hir/ b+hu ru b+hu ru/ o rgya hi/ mahA ka ru Ni ka/ ma hA pa shu pa ti ba Sha d+har//

'a d+ha ra d+ha ra/ sa ra sa ra/ tsa ra tsa ra/ ha ra ha ra/ hahA hA/ hi sid+hihi/ hu h+phu hu hU/ a kAr bras+sabe d+har/ rgyu ra d+ha ra/ b+hiri d+hi ri/ tu ru d+hu ru/ ta ra ta ra/ sa ra sa ra/ pa ra pa ra/ tsa ra kyi
ra/ rasmi sha ta sa ha sra pra ti maN+Di tu/ shar rA ya/ dzA la dzA la/ tA pa tA pa/ b+ha ga wAn so ma/ A di tu/ yam/ ba ru Na/ ku bo ra/ brah+manA ri Ni de ba ga na/ a b+ha rtsi ta tsa ra Na/

su ru su ru/ tsu ru tsu ru/ mu ru mu ru/ pu ru pu ru/ samed ku mA ra/ ru dra/ bA sa ba/ ba ShA d+ha na da/ de ba/ ri Tinaya ka/ ba su bi bi d+ha/ ba Sha d+ha ra/ d+ha ra d+ha ra/ d+hi ri d+hi ri/ d+hu ru chu
ru/ tha ra thar/ grwa ra g+ha ra/ ya ra ya ra/ la ra la ra/ ha ra ha ra/ ma ra ma ra/ pa ra pa ra/ ba ra ba ra/ ba ra dwa ya ka/ sa man+ta a ba lo ki ta/ bi lo ki ta/ lo ki shwa ra/ ma ha shar//
mu du mu shu/ mu ru mu'u/ mu ya mu ya/ muny+tsa muny+tsa/ bcom ldan 'das 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis dpal sa gsum gyi lha rnams dang/ bdag dang/ sems can thamA
cad 'jigs pa thams cad dang/ gnod pa thams cad dang/ 'tsho ba thams cad dang/ don thams cad las srungs shig srungs shig/ bsad pa dang/ bcing ba dung/ brdag pa dang//
bsdigs pa dang/ rgyal po dang/ chom po dang/ rkun po dang/ ma dang/ chu dang/ dug dang/ mtshonalas yongs su thar bar mdzad pa/ ka Na ka Na/ ki Ni ki Ni/ kuN ku cu/ tsa ra tsa ra/
in+d+ri ya/ ba la ba dz+hog/ tsa tur Ar+yas t+ya saM prakAshaka/ tA pa tA pa/ da la dmasamasam/ma sam sa/ma hAta mo/ oM d+ha ka ra/ bi d+hamanaN Ta pA ra mi tA pa ri pu ra ka/
mi li mi li/ Ta Ta Ta Ta/ ta kha kha khA/ Ti Ti Ti/ 'u'u 'u/ a ne ya tsarma kri ta pa ri ka ra/ a hi/ I shAr ma hashwar/ ma hA pU ta thag NasaM b+halcaka/ ku ru ku ru/ pa ra pa ra/ kar
ka ra/ ka Ta ka Ta/ ma Ta ma Ta/ bi shut+ta/ bi ya/ bA sin/ ma hA ka ru Ni ka b+he ta ya lho pa yi ta/ ra mu ku Ta/ mA lA d+har/ sam+b+hadz+hasha ri si kri ta ma ku Ta/ mA lA d+hur/ mahAd b+hu ta

ka ma la a laM kri pa ka ra d+ha rA ya/ rgyun sa mA d+hi/ bi mokA A pra kaM pya/ ba hu sa tAsan ti pa ri pA tsa ka/ mahAkA ru Ni ka/ sarba karma A wa ra Na bi sho d+hA ka sa byad+hi pa ri mo tsa ka sam+b+haAshA
pa ri pU ra ka/ sa satwAs mAshAsaM na ka ra na mo sU ra sAhA/ bklags pas las thams cad 'grub par 'gyur ro// dus gsum du bzlas brjod bgyid na mtshams mad pa lnga 'byang
bar 'gyur zhing/ las kyi sgrib pa thams cad kyang yongs su dag par 'gyur ro// mtshams gcad pa la ni a ka ru'i bdug pa 'am/ spal ba 'am/ chab bam/ yungs kar dang/
song stong gi phur bu lasogs pas so// rims [”]'ams cad la ni skud pas so// nad thams car lani mar ma/ 'bru mar ram/rgyal bzlas brjod bgyis te gtor bar bgyi'o//
byad grol ba lani mtshon gyis so/ lo na ba lan srung ba'i skud pas so// dug gsad pa la ni sa 'amatshab kyis so// migand la ni skud pa dkar bos rna ba la gdags par bgyi'o/
so na ba lani shing ka ra wI ra'i so shing gas so// mtshams gcad pa la ni tshon sna lnga'i skud pa la lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas brjod bgyis te/ sang ldepagi phur bu bzhi la bci nas phyogs
bzhir gzugs par bgyis na mtshamasachen po bcings par 'gyur ro// thams cad srung ba la ni skud pa 'am/ chab bam/ thal bsabya'o// gdon thams cad la ni tshon sna lnga'i skud pas
so// rims thams cad la ni skud pa dkar pos so// g.yan pa dang/ khyi rjod r/ ldog pa dang/ mgrin pa 'gags pa thamasacad ladi sbrang rtsi dang pi pi ling bsras pas so// mig nad la
ni dri chu dang/ shing pa la sha'i chu 'ame/ shing mngar gyi chusaso// na ba'i nad lani 'bru mar gyis so// 'thab pa dang/ 'thab mo dang/ rtsod pa 'gyed pa dang/ skur pa 'debs pa thams cad la ni
chab l bzlas brjod bgyis pa kha bshal bar bgyi'o// dpung dang/ yul dang/ rgyal srid dang// yul 'khor rnams srung ba la ni bum pa gang ba bzhag la gos gtsang ma bgos pas mchod pa rgya
chen po bgyisanas bklag par bgyis na zhib chen por 'gyur ro// de yang chab kyis gtor bar bgyis te/ samasacan thamasacad la srung ba bgyis par 'gyur ro// yams kyi nad dang/ gnod
pa dang/ 'tsho ba thams cad zhi bar bgyid pa dang/ glogs lta ba rnams la ni tsan dan lalan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas brjod bgyis te snying khar byug par bgyi'o// mtshams ma
mchis pa'i las thams cad bas par bgyi ba ni rtag tu bzlas brjod kyis so// khyim srung ba la ni pad+ma'i sbyin sreg gis so// sems can thams cad bskyang ba dang/ 'byung po'i 'jigs pa dang/
gdon thams cad las srung ba la [”]nitsan dan gyisbyin sragagis so// dzayA dang/ bi dza yAdang/ nAku lI dang/ gan d+han guli dang/ ba ru ni dang/ 'i drab ru Ni dang/ a b+ha ya ba ni dang/ in drab

ni dang/ gan d+hakhri yang ku dang/ rgya spos dang/ tsakra dang/ mahAtsakra dang/ biShA kAn+tadang/ so ma rA dzi dang/ sunan da rnams la lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod bgyis te nor bur khagyisanas/
spyi bo 'am dpung palagadags pas bsrol bar bgyi'o// khye'u rnams la mgul par ro// bu mo rnams la ni sta zuranas te/ dpal dang ldan par bgyid pa dang/ bkra mi shis ba rab tu zhi bar
sa bgyid pa'i nor bu 'dibasal nathams cad las srung ba bgyis par 'gyur ro// dug dang mas mi tshugs lags so// dug gis gnod pa skye bar mi 'gyur ro// skyes ma'i nga gnod pa skyod pa rami bgyid
cing myur du zhi ba ra 'gyur ro// gdon rnams zhi bar 'gyur ro// rlung dang/ 'brug dang/ sor thagacad pa dang/ chab kyi rgyun dang/ sar ba bzlog pa la ni shing ka ra wI ra'i lcag mas te/ las
thams cad bgyid ba 'phags baspyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la snying bo gru ba pa dam pa ma bsgrubs par las 'di rnams bgyid par 'gyur lags so// de nas sgrub par 'tshalan thang sku'i cho ga ni ras
la lhag ma ma yin pa'i tshon rtsis sangs rgyas dang/ 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi gzugs brnyan ral pa'i thor tshugs dang/ sa t+yA ya'i pags pa dang/ phyugs bdag gi cha
lugs 'char ba rgyun thams cad kyis brgyan par bri bar bgyi ste/ ri mo mkhan gso sbyong can 'drir stsal bar bgyi'o// de nas sgrub pa pos sku gzugs de'i spyan sngar ba'i lci ba'i dkyil 'khor
bgyis te/ ma tog dkar po'i sil ma bkram la stos kyis bkang ba'i rtsod brgyud gzhug par bgyi'o// sna brgyud pa 'am/ drug cu rtsa bzhi ba 'am/ gzhan yang lha bshos sha dang khrag dang
ma 'dres pa bshamasungashing drangs la/ a ka ru'i bdug pas bdugs te/ lan stong rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod bgyi'o/ nyin zhag gcig gam/ nyin zhag gsum du sbyar ba bgyis nas zas dkar
gsum 'tshal te/ dus gsum du khrus bgyis nas gos gtsang ma bgos nas/ 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug bdag nyidamachis nas bsams pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs par
bgyid do// ldong ros samamag sman la bzlas brjod bgyis ta mig la bskus na/ da nas mi gda' bar gyur nas nam mkha' la mchi bar 'gyur zhing/ don yod pa'i ye shes bkod pa zhes bgyi
ba'i ting nge 'dzin 'thob par 'gyur te/ ci 'tshal ba de bgyid par 'gyur ro// de ni 'grub pa'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsalanas/ byang chub
sems dpa' 'phags pa naras gzigs dbang phyug dang/ gnas gtsang ma'i ris kyi lha'i bu da dag dang/ mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pa dang/ dbang phyug dang/ dbang phyug chen po'i lha'i
bu rnams yi rang sta/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do// don yod pa'i zhags pa rdzogs so//'/de bzhin gshegs pa rgya mtshor ba
'byamA thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan rasagazigs dbang phyugastan las langs te bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas/
pus mo g.yasapa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te/ nyi ma'i 'od ltar 'od zer stong 'phro zhing 'od zer sna tshogs 'gyod pa'i lus kyis/ bcom ldan 'das gang na ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud de/
zhal gyi dkyil 'khor rgyas shing rdzogs la zhi ba/ bzhin 'dzum pa'i bzhin gyis byams pa dang sAng rje chen po'i mthu yid la byed bas/ rigs bzhi'i 'jig rten la phan pa dang snying brtse bas don
thams cad grub par rig sngags 'chang rnams kyis bla namad pa'i de kho na nyid grub pa mchog sbyin pa thob par bya ba'i phyir/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'ad+ma
bdag la don yod pa'i rgyal po'i cho ga zhib mo'i rgyal bo chen po'i snying po 'di mchis te/ 'di par rgya chen po'i dkyil 'khor de kho na nyidachen po snying por 'phags pa/ snying por gyur la/
de kho na nyid grub pa/ pad+ma dam pa// dkyil 'khor chen po 'di phyag rgya dang/ gsang sngags dang/ snying po rim par phye ba gsang ba dam pa rnam par grol ba'i dkyil 'khor dmatshig dang sgrug pa
gsang ba 'dri bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar bsgragapar bgyi'o// lha dang/ klu dang/ gnod sbyin dang/ dri za dang/ lha ma yin dang/ nam mkha' lding dang/ mi'am ci dang/ lto 'phye chon
bo dang/ mi mang po'i 'khor chen po'i mdun dang/ rig sngags grub pa'i lha'i dkyil 'khor gyi mdun 'dir yang bsgrag par bgyi'o// gang yang dbang phyug dang/ dbang phyug chon po dang/
tshang pa dang/ lha dang/ gshin rje dang/ chu lha dang/ lus ngan dang/ drang srong gi tshogs dang/ zla ba dang/ nyi ma dang/ skarama'i tshogs dang/ rgyu skar dang/ rig sngags 'chang grub
pa'i lha mo rnams kyi mdun du de kho na nyid kyi snying po yang dag pa 'a jig rten las 'das pa/ dngos grub sgrub pa bklags pas sgrub pa dang bsgoms pas sgrub pa/ bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan
sAr rig sngags chen po 'chang ba'i tshogs kyis yongs su bskor ba'i mdun du de khon nyid kyi snying bo gas ngob dam pa bsgrugasasheng brjod par bgyi'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin
gshegs pa shA kya thub pa'i bsod nams stong gis brgyan pa/ mtshan dang dpa byad rnams kyis rnam par sbas pa/ phyag dpung pa'i mdog gser gyi kha dog lta bu
'od zer 'phro ba du ma'i 'phreng ba dang/ sngos kyi glang bo che'i sna lta bu'i phyag brkyang sku/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chan pa 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi spyi bor
bzhag nas klad pa la byugs te 'dis da ces bka' stsal to// sems can dag pa dam pa snying rje chen po dang ldan pa khyod sos shig/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis byin gyis brjibs to/
ngas kyang da ltar byin gyis rlobakyis/ khyod gsang ba dam pa'i dmatshagasos shig/ phyogs btu'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis rjes su yi rang bzhin byin gyis brlabs pa/ gda'i klung

'bum phrag bye ba brgya stong gi bya ba'i rdul phra rab snyad kyi de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis kyang byin gyis brlabs shing rjes su yi rang bar mdzad do// de nas byang chub semA dpa' sams dpa' chen po 'phags pa
spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis phyogs bcur bltas te/ bcom ldan 'dasakyi s+yAnasar rang gi snying po de khon nyid gsang ba'i gsang sngags 'di dag gsol to// oM pad+mahasta mahA a mo g+ha pA sha
sA d+ha ya sa ma ya hrid yaM/ tsa ra tsa ra hU~M/ don yod pa'i zhags ba'i rang bzhin gyi gzugs kyi snying po yin no/ byang chub sems dpa' 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis gsang ba'i snying ]

po 'di brjod ma thag tu ri'i rgyal po po Ta la 'di khrag dang/ nags tshal dang/ rtswa shing du bcas pa dang/ ri rab khor yug dang/ khor yug chen po dang bcas pa rnam pa drug tu rab tu g.yos shing lha'i
gnas rnams kyang ldeg par gyur te/ thams cad 'dar 'dar por gyur to// klu'i gnas dang/ gnod sbyin dang/ srin po'i gnas rnams kyang 'khrugs bar gyur to// rgya mtsho chen po'i rlabs
kyang 'khrugs par gyur to// chu gter rnams kyang 'khrugs par gyur to// de ma thag tu phyogs bcu na sangs rgyas kyi sku gzugs brnyan bzhugs pa rnams kyis legs so zhes bya ba byin te/ 'di skad ces
kyang bka' stsal to// rgyal ba'i bdag nyid du skyes pa don yod pa// gsang ba'i snying po bklags pas 'grub pa blanamed pa sbas pa legs so lags s// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa
shAkya thub pas 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug don yod pa'i gsang ba bklags ba de khon nyid kyi sgrub pa ni legs so legs so// sams dpa' dag pa khyod kyis
gsab bklag pa'i cho gde khon nyid sgrub pa rgyas pa dang bcas par smosashig/ spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das gsang ba'i snying po'i gzungs 'di lan cig brjod pa

tsam gyis de'i mod la phyogs bcu tha dad pa nas gang+gA'i klungs ya bye ba brgya stongagi bya ma nyid kyi da ba zhin sa gshegs pa'i phyag brkyang sta spyi bo la bzhag nas legs so zhes bgyi ba'i sgra gsungs te/ gsus
patsam gyi mod la sngon bskal pa brgya stong du bsags pa'i sgrib pa rnams nyams par bgyid/ tshig bar bgyid do// sdig pa thams cad dang/ nad thams cad dang/ de bzhin du
gnod pa zhi bar bgyid do// sdig pa dang/ sems can gdug pa rnams dang/ phas kyi rgol ba dang/ mi mdza' ba rnams 'jig par bgyid de/ 'dil the tshom mi bgyi'o// rtag tu 'phags pa spyan
ras gzigs dbang phyuga mchog sbyin lta 'tshal bar 'gyur lags so// rig sngags 'di'i cho ga sgrub pani 'di yin te/ rigasngags 'chang gtsang mar gyur pas shin tu khrus bgyis do gos gtsang ma bgo
pabar bgyi'o// byams pa dang snying rje yid la bgyis pas 'byung po thams cad la mchog tu snying ba rtsa bar bgyi'o// 'phags pa sngan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi ri mo'i gzugs la mchod par bgyi'o//
ma tog dang/ bdug pa dang/ sridang/ 'phreng pa dang/ byug pa dang/ mar me dbul bar bgyi'o// tshos brgyud dam/ tshes bcowo lasgrub pa'i bzlas brjod kyi cho ga bgyi'o// ri mo'i gzugs kyi

mdun du thog mar skyil mo krung bcas te 'dug nas don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod bgyi'o// tshig gzhan mo sa phar khro bo'i rgyal po brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod bgyis te/
chab dang yungs kar gyi dbang bskur bar bgyi'o// phyag rgya bcing bar bgyistsalan nyi shu rtsa gcig tu gdon par bgyi'o// gsang sngags kyis ni dbang bskur bar bgyi'o// phyagargyas kyang dbang bskur
bar bgyig/ de'i 'og tu don yod pa'i gsang ba'i dmachig gi snying po stong rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod bgyi'o/ bzlas brjod bton pa tsam gyis pa'i mod la don yod pa'i yas pa'i sAng po khro pa'i
rgyal po dang bcas pa 'buma'agyur du bzlas brjod bgyis par 'gyur ro// bzlas brjod rdzogs nas ri mo'i gzugs 'bar zhing sa'ang g.yo bar 'gyur ro// 'phags pa sman ras gzigs dbang phyug
gi lus las 'od zer sna tshogs 'byung bar 'gyur ro// don yod pa'i zhags pa'i lag na thogs pa'i zhags pa 'bar bar 'gyur zhing/ rig sngags 'chang sIng dga' ba dong spyi bo'i gtsug 'bar
bar 'gyur ro// 'di ni grub pa'i rtags yin no zhes grub pa'i rtags dang legs so zhes bya pa'i sgra 'byin te// don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po'acho ga zhib mo'i phyag rgya grub par 'gyur ro//
de nas dgos pa thams cad dang las thams cad brjod pa tsam gyis ri'i mo dal 'grub par 'gyur lags so// de bzhin gshegs pas ya bye ba brgya stong gang+gA'i klung gi bya ma snyad dang mnyam pa'i
phyag gsar gyi kha dog 'dra ba spyi bo'i gtsug tu 'jog par rmi lam du mthong bar 'gyur ro// 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi rang bzhin gyi lus shin tudrim dang bral zhing yongs su dag
pas/ gsang ba'i snying por gyur pa so so gnas par 'gyur ro// dri ma dpa'i bdag nyid kyi lus kyi rang bzhin mdun na mchis par 'gyur ro// mchog thams cad sol bar 'gyur ro/
rnam pa thams cad du grub pa stsol bar 'gyur ro// don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po cho ga zhib mo'i phyag rgya grub pa stsol bar gyur ro// ji ltar snying las skyes pa'i bu bzhin
du sangs rgyas kyi byang chub thob kyi bar yongs su skyong bar bgyid do// de lta bas na 'jig rten gyi khams bde btsan gyi dkyil 'khor mtha'adag yongs su rdzogs pa sangs rgyas kyi zhing legs par
brgyunab/ byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs kyis yongs su bskor ba dang bcas pa na khang pa brtsigs na legs par brgyanapa'isang ba'i khri mchog la/ 'phags pa rgyal ba 'od dpag mad 'od zer
ga brgya stong phrag 'bum 'phro ba'i skus bzhugs shing chos ston pa lta bar 'cholan/ rig sngags 'chang res legs par bkrus te lagatsang mar gyur pas gos gtsang ma bgos te/ cho 'phrul gyi zla ba
yar gyi ngol byams pa'i sems dang snying rje'i lhag pa'i bsam pas gus pa dang/ dang ba dang/ zhe sa dang/ bla mar bgyi'o// 'phags paspyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi ri mo'i gzugs la
khyad/ ci 'byor pa ma tog dang/ bdug pa dang/ dri dang/ 'phrang ba dang/ byug pa dang/ phyem dang/ gos dang/ lhab lhub dang/ ba dan gyis mchod par bgyi'o// tshos brgyad nas tshes bcu gsum gyi
bar du zas dkar gsum 'tshal bar bgyi'o// ri mo'i gzugs kyi mdun du nyin gcig bzhin dus gsum dudon yod pa'i zhagapa'i snying bo lan nyi shu rtsa gcig dang/ tshig gzhan mi sla bar khro ba'i rgyal po'i
snyingapo dang/ lta ba'i snying bo lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod bgyisanas ri mo'i gzugs de nyid kyi mdun du mchis nas nyal bar bgyi'o// mchod yon dang yon chab dus gsum du dbul babagyi'o// a/
ka ru dang/ tsan dan dang/ duruka dang/ gu gul gyi ma tog khu ba dang bcas ba gla rtsi dang lhan tsas bsres nas bsang bar bgyi'o// dgug pa'i sngags lan stong rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod bgyis te/
don yod khams gsum rnam par grags/ bdug ba'i rgyal po bla na med/ gang phyir bdugs pa tsam gyis ni/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing
rnams su bdug pa'i sprin chen po 'khrigs pas rgyas par 'gyur ro// dri 'khrigs pa de dag gis sangs rgyas dang/ byang chub sems dpa' thams cad dang/ lha dang/ klu dang/ gnod sbyin dang/ dri za
dang/ lha ma yin dang/ nam mkha' lding dang/ mi 'am ci dang/ lto 'phye chen po dang/ mi dang/ mi ma yin pa rnams la drichen po'i mchod pa dang/ bdug pa chen po'i mchod ba bgyis bar 'gyur
zhing/ nad thams cad 'jig par 'gyur zhing/ rmi lam ngan pa thams cad zhi bar 'gyur ro// dadag thams cad dga' bar 'gyur ro// gang yang dud 'gro'i skye gnas su gtogs pa'i sems can gang
dag gis bdug pa'i dritshor ba de dag thams cad n gnas ong du skye bar 'gyur ba'i las kyi sgrib pa rnams yongs su gtugs par 'gyur ro// 'thab pa dag 'thab mo dang/ mu ge dang/ rtsod pa dang/
'gyed pa dang/ nang 'khrugs pa dang/ 'khrugs pa dang/ rmi lam ngan pa dang/ yams kyi nad dang/ gnod pa dang/ 'tsho ba dang/ gdung ba dang/ mi bde ba thams cad dang/ nad
thams cad zhi bar 'gyur ro// rlung dang/ sur ba dang/ grang ba dang/ tsho ba'i sbyin thams cad zhi bar 'gyur ro// sdig pa thams cad 'jig par 'gyur ro// khyad dang/ g.yangs byed dang/ sngags kyi sbyor
ba thams cad dang/ dug dang/ dbyig dug dang/ dug sbyar ma thams cad zhibar 'gyur ro// gdon thams cad dang/ brjod byed thams cad dang/ rims dang/ bza'anyis dang/ sgom rtas dang/ gnod
sgrib dang/ gnod ltas thams cad bdug pa'i dris 'bros par 'gyur ro// 'jigs par 'gyur/ 'gyas par 'gyur te/ byang chub kyi snying po la thug gi bar du lana'aga' yang tshugs par mi 'gyur ro//

bdug pa'i rgyal po 'di rtag tu sbyar bar bgyi'o// 'ad ltar tshes bcu bzhi'i nub mo mchis la don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po brgya rtsa brgyad dang/ khro lo'i rgyal po brgyartsa brgyad bzlas brjod bgyi'o// zas dkar

gsum gyi bgator ma ci 'byor pa dbul bar bgyi'o// snying po dang nye ba'i snying bo stong rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod bgyisal dri dang 'bru mar gyi mar ma dbul bar bgyi'o// ri mo'i gzugs de nyid mdun du nam langs kyi bar

du mchis nyal bar bgyis te/ rmi lam du dbyig gi mdzod mthong ngam/ bde ba can gyi 'jig rten gyi khams gzhalam khang dang bcas/ rin po tsho'i shing dang bcas/ rin po che'i ri dang bcas/ rdzong dang bcas//
gnas dang bcas/ khang pa brtsag ma dang bcas gzhal med lo ngo dang bcas/ rdzu 'phrul dang/ cho 'phrul dang/ ma bar 'aphrul ba dang bcas pa mthong ngam// de bzhin gshegs pa tshe dpag mar byung chub
sems dpa'i tshogs kyisayongasasu bskor cing khang pa brtsegs pa na bzhugs ba/ lha dang/ klu dang/ gnod sbyin dang/ dri za dang/ lha ma yin dang/ nam mkha' lding dang/ mi'am ci dang/ lto 'phye chen po
'khor dang bcas ba mthong ngam/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das tshe dpag med de'arigasngags 'chang nged la dbugs 'byin par

mdzad cibalegs so zhes bgyi ba'ang stsol bar mdzad de/ kye skyes bu dam pa khyod kyis rig sngags 'changag sabu'i byed pa mang du byas pa dang/ khyod kyis dag pa'i rtsa ba mang du bskrun pa dang/ khyod kyis lhag

par mang du byas ba dang/ khyod kyis bya ba gang yin pa byas pa dang/ khyod kyis don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po rnam par grol ba'i dkyil 'khor phyag rgya chen po dang/ gsang sngagasaM rnam par phyoba'i snying po

sgrub ba ni grub thin tu legs so legs so// khyod rig sngags 'changagi sangs rgyas nyid du gyur cig/ khyod 'di nasam 'ongs ba'i mngal gyi skye ba blangs te tsho bsanas pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing du skye bar
'gyur ro// byang chub kyi snying bo la thug gi bar du sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing du 'gro bar 'gyur ro zhes phyag g.yas ba dpa'i spyi bor 'jog par 'gyur ro// 'jig rten pa'i dngos
@#// grub thams cad stsol cing/ 'jig rten las 'das pa'i dngos grub sgrub pa lta/ 'din dam pa sgrub pa yin no zhes bdag nyid sad nas dga' bar mthong sta/ sgrib pa thams cad
dang bral zhing yongs su dag par 'gyur ro// 'phags pa sman ras gzigs dbang phyag bram tso'i gzugs kyis mdunanamachis par 'gyur zhing 'dod pa thams cad kyi mchog stsol bar 'gyur ro//
gzugs kyi ri mo da'ang 'bar zhing 'od zer 'byung bar 'gyur ro// yon tan brgya somabapo gzhan yang 'thob par 'gyur 'o// 'jig rten pa'i phun sum tshogs pa rang 'thob par 'gyur ro// skya kho
dang/ rgyal po dang/ blon po dang/ bram ze dang/ khyim bdag thams cad dbang du 'gyur zhing cha'amachod par 'gyur ro dag sbyong dang bram ze rnams la don yod pa'i grub pa chen kho 'thob par 'gyur
ro// grub pachen po bla na med pa'i ng 'thob par 'gyur ro// nyin gcig bzhin dus gsum du phyag rgya bcing par bgyi'o// de nas tshes bcu bzhi la thog mar dge sbyong dang bram ze rnams la ci 'byor ba'i
yon dang bcas pa'i mchod ston stsal bar bgyi'o// de nas bdag nyid longs spyod par 'gyur// gang gisatsho'ang sangs rgyas la lta ba dang/ byang chub sems dba' la lta ba dang/ lha rnams la
lta bar 'tshalan/ de'i tshabadug pa'i rgyal po la dgug pa'i gsang sngags lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas brjod bgyis/ sas rgyas bcom ldan 'das la bdug par bgyi'o// bdug pas bdugasapa
ma gyi mod la zhal ston bar 'gyur zhing/ dgab 'am mi dge ba thams cad dam/ nyams pa'i m bri ba de dag thams cad gsung bar 'gyur ro jitsamatsha'i mthur thug gi bar du gsung ba'am/ 'gro
ba 'am// 'ong ba gsung bar 'gyur ro// de nas gsang sngags kyi tshog dang/ sgrub pa'i don dang/ las kyi cho ga'angaji lta ba bzhin du bshad par bgyi'o o paNatur/ a mo g+ha dza ya de tsu ru tsu ru/
gnA/ don yod pa'i rgyal po'i sI bo'i nye ba'i snying po'i gsang sngags go/ o bat+tha pAg d+harAya/ a mo g+ha pa ra sod ya hU~M/ de bzhin gshegs pa dang/ byang chub sems dba'athoms
cad dang/ lha dang/ klu dang/ gnod sbyin dang/ dri za dang/ lha ma yin dang/ nam mkha' lding dang/ mi 'amaci dang/ lto 'phye chen po dang/ mi dang/ mi ma yin pa la sogs pa bskul ba'i
gsang sngags te/ bdug pa'i rgyal bos bdugs nas chab dang yus ka ra bsres la lanatigatsagacig bzlas brjod bgyis nas phyogs bcur gtor na thams cad bskul bar bgyis par 'gyur
ro/ o snga lokya acu gAn/ amog+ha pA sha/ pad+ma bi la ka ta A yan+tu/ b+hU bani su 'a/ su ru su ru/ bi ma le hU~M/ dgug pa'i gsang sngags te/ gu gul gyi bdug ba la lan brgya rtsa brgyad/
bzlas brjod bgyis nas chu dang me togo bsrosanas phyog nu rogator bar bgyi// thams cad nas dgag pa dam pa grub pa lags so lo bar b+hu dzam AbAg b+ha ra Niman ya mi/ a mo g+ha pAsha
yan tu b+hub sra/ mu ru mu ru hUM/ de bzhin gshegs pa dang/ byang chub sems dpa' thams cad dang/ nyan thos dang/ rang sangs rgyas thamasacad dang/ dkyil
'khor thams cad na gnas pa'i lha'i tshogs la sogs pa spyan drang pa'i gsang sngagasate/ ril ba spyi blugs dang/ chab dang/ me tog dang/ tshoms shing la bdug pa'i rgyal pos bdugs te//
thams cad la lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod bgyis te/ thams cad spyan drang ba'i rig sngags so// oM pad+ma a mo g+ha badzra a d+hi naku ru ku ru swAhA/ sa'i dkyil 'khor bcing ba ste/ chab
dang yungs dkar la lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod bgyis nas sa la gtor na dpag tshad sum brgyas kun nas 'khor ba'i sa'i dikyil 'khor rdo rjer byin kyis brlabs par 'gyur ro// de thamasu
cad bsrungs pas ni rdo rje sru ba'i sams su 'gyur ro// dgra rnams kyis mi mthong ba dang/ bgegs dang/ log 'dren dang/ gnod sbyin dang/ srin po dang/ 'byung po dang/ sha za dang/
brjod byed dang/ ro langs dang/ mkha' 'gro ma dang/ 'dod dgur bsgyur ba'i gzugs can thams cad kyis mi mthong// rnam pa thams cad du mi li mtho dang sa rdo rjes bar 'agyur ro// o a

mo g+ha pA sha khadamot+ta ra saM tA/ sat+tA Ti si si rihUM/ gdan gyigasang sngagos ta yungs kar la stong rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod bgyis te sa la gto na/ pad+ma chen po'i gzhal yas khang gi gdan du byin
brlabs nas legs par phul bar 'gyur ro// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la rin po che sna bdun las byas pa'i sa ge'i gdan du byin gyisabarlabs nas legs par phul bar 'gyur ro// ga
sngags 'chang gis rang gi stan la chab la pu sa kar la lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas brjod bgyis nas gtor te/ rig sngags grub pa'i pad+ma'i stan gsang ba'i gsang sngags so// oM ma hA kA ru Ni ka/

pany+tsa a mo g+ha pA sha dri d+ha badzra a d+hiSh+Thita b+hu ru b+hu ru b+han d+ha re swAhA/ dkyil 'khor mtha' dag na khyim dang/ nags tshal drang/ kun dga' ra ba dang/ gtsug lag khang dang/ bsti gnas dang/ 'chags
dang/ phug dang/ dgon pa dang/ gnas gsang ba'i phyir dri chab dang yungs dkar la lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod bgyis nas gtor bar bgyis te/ gnas su ga nyogs pa thams cad gsang ba chen po
bgyis par 'gyur ro// nyes par bgyid pa dang/ bgegs dang/ log 'dren dang/ gnod sbyin dang/ srin po dang/ 'byung po thams cad 'bros par 'gyur te/ gnas gsang ba'i gsang sngags so//

o pad+maa mo g+ha pA gnas man+tA da sha su di zhu si mA ban d+hAya/ tu ru tu ru hU~M/ lcags kyi phur bu sor brgyad pa'i tshad lnga latshon sna lnga'i skud pas dkris te lan stong rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod bgyis nas phyogs
bzhiragazugs par bgyi'o/ lnga pa ni dbus kyi gzhir gzugs par bgyi ste/ rgyang grags bdun 'khor bar mtshams bcing ba bgyis par 'gyur ro// ji srid du phur bu ma byung ba de srid du mtshams chen po
@#// bcing ba bgyis par 'gyur ro// oM a mo g+ha maNA laban cu yas mtshon/ partsamasnapartse d+hu'u tur snyakA dkyil 'khor bcibasta/ dri chab dang yungs kar la lanabargya rtsa
rgyadabazlas brjod bgyis nas dkyil 'khor mtha' dag dang/ de bzhin du 'og dang nga du'ang gtor/ dkyil 'khor chen po bcing ba bgyis par 'gyur ro// bgegs dang/ log 'dren dang/
gnod sbyin dang/ srin po dang/ 'byung po dang/ zamachis par 'os pa thams cad kyis mchi bar mi 'gyur ro// sems can gdug pa dang/ lha 'am/ klu gdug pagang su'ang rung ba de dag thams
can zil gyis kha bar la khas mnan bar 'gyur ro/ 'jig rten pa'i bgyi ba dan pa dang/ sags ngan pa dang/ sems can ngan pa dang/ bgyid pa ngan pa thams cad gos su sbyangs par 'gyur ro// so

ga mo gru pa ri shud d+hago d+ha ya sa man+tan/ b+hir d+hiri shud rtasatAm hApad+mahU~M/ 'dis ba'i rnam lnga la lan stong rtsa brgyud bzlas brjod bgyis te/ dkyil 'khor gyisa'i cha mtha' dag na gtsug lag khang
A ngam/ dgon pa 'am/ bya skyibs sam/ tshang tshig ngam/ 'chag sa 'am/ gnasasam/ tshul lam/ nagasatshal lam/ skyed mos tshal lam/ kun dga' ra ba 'am/ brangs 'am/ skyabs
sam/ khar po la gtor na stong ba 'am/ mi stong ba 'am/ 'dab rdza ba dang/ mi gtsang ba dang/ phyag dar gyis gang ba dang/ 'byung po dang/ sha za dang/ yi dgas la sogs te rigs ngan pa
thams cad yongs su sbas par 'gyur ro// gtsang ma dag par 'gyur ro// gnas gtsang mar 'gyur ro// bdag nyid la dbang bskur na/ bza' nyes dang/ sgom nyes dang/ gnod ltas dang/ gnod
sgrib kyi gnas ngan pa thams cad yongs su dag par 'gyur ro// gtsang ma dag par 'gyur ro// mi gtsang ba gtsang bar 'gyur ro// tshangs par spyod pa ma lags pa tshangs pa spyod par 'gyur ro/ khasnyan

gnas ma bgyis pa ni bstan gnas bgyis par 'gyur ro//de la lha tham cad myungab dang/ skyab pa dang/ sba ba bgyid par 'gyur ro// dbang phyug dang/ dbang phyugachen po dang/ tshar ba dang/ khyab 'jug dang/ khyab 'jug chen mo/

dang/ gshin rje dang/ chu lha dang/ lus ngan la sogs pa srung ba dang/ skyob pa dang/ sba ba'i slad du rtag turjes su 'brang bar 'gyur ro// 'jig rten thams cad kyi snying dusdug pa dang mchod pa'i 'os
par 'gyur ro// tshig brtson par 'gyur ro// nad thams cad dang bral bar 'gyur ro// sdig pa dang/ sgrib pa dang/ gnod pa la sogs pa thams cad las yongs su thar bar 'gyur ro// phyogs bzhir kun/
tugator n 'thab pa dang/ 'thab mo dang/ rtsod pa dang/ 'gyed pa dang/ mu ge dang/ mi ngas dang/ yams dang/ gnod pa dang/ 'tsho ba dang/ 'khrug pa thams cad zhi bar 'gyur ro// nyin gcig
bzhin du bdag nyid la dbang bskur ram reg par bgyis na rig sngags dang/ phyag rgya dang/ dkyil 'khor gyi rim par dbye ba dang/ las chen po 'grub par 'gyur ro// don yod pa'i grub pa chen po 'grub
bar 'gyur ro// gang dang gang du mchis pa de dang der cher mchod par 'gyur ro// khas thams cad kyis mi bzlog par 'gyur ro// nyin gcig bzhin gzhal med khang rgyan
po bkra zhing rnam par bkra ba chen po rmalam du mthong ba dang/ rnam pa thams cad du mchog rgya chen po 'thob par 'gyur ro// dge sbyong dang/ bram ze dang/ rgyal rigs dang/ khyim bdag dang/ rgyal
po dang/ blon po dang/ btsun mo'i 'khor dang bcas pa thams cad dbang du 'gyur zhing mchod par 'os par 'gyur ro// rtag tu gtsang mar spyod par gtsang zhing dag par 'gyur ro// rtag par dus kun
tu 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug lta 'tshal bar 'gyur ro// 'dod pa thams cad kyi mchog stsol bar 'gyur ro// de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs
rgyas 'od dpag med rmi lam du rtag tu mthong zhing/ shi 'phos nas kyang 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba can du skye bar 'gyur ro// oM pad+ma sa ra sa ra/ tiSh+Tha ti ma hA a mo g+ha sa ma yAsAhA/ gsang
ba chen po'i dam tshig gi gsang sngags so// o ba pu la pad+maa mo g+ha bra sa ra pra bi sha tu/ ku ru ku ru swAhA/ 'jug pa'i gsang sngags so// oM a mo g+ha a nu sha ya ma hApad+ma bane cur hU~M/
slob ma'i gsang sngags so// oM a mo g+ha pad+mashi go tu ru tu ru/ tiSh+Tha badzra ban d+he swAhA/ spyi gtsug gi bcing ba'i gsang sags te lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas so// oM a mo g+ha pad+ma dza led

pa/ b+hir b+hi rigaM/ chab btog pa'i gsang sngags de lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas so// oM a mo g+ha bi ka Ta saM b+ha ra pad+ma a sa Ne dza la ba ti/ ku ru ku ru hU~M/ bum pa'i gsang sngags te lan brgya

rtsa brgyad bzlas so// o pad+mo pra sa ra amo g+ha bi ma le b+har b+ha ra swAhA/ chab kyi rgyun gyi gsang sngags te lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas so// oM a mo g+ha pad+masu pany+tsa/ pAn+ta ka ra d+hiri b+hi'i ba ma le
sAt+tA/ lag pa'i gsang sngags te lag pa gnyis la lan stong rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod bgyis nas/ dkyil 'khor dang/ gsang sngags dang/ phyag rgya dang/ chog zhib mo dang/ sgrub pa'i
gas pa thams cad bgyisaste/ sgrub ba thams cad la bsgrub par bgyi zhing las thams cad la dus thams cad bgyi'o// oM a mog bi ma le dzihA grasaMshecu na par ka ma la dza hA/saM sho d+hiyartsar sgyur

su bi ma le sAhA/lcesbyang pa'i gsang sngags te/ dri chab la lan stong rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod bgyis te/ kha bshal la rtse'i dri ma yongs su dag par 'gyur ro// pad+madang ku mu da'i 'dab ma dang 'dra bar rtse mnyan par
'gyur ro// so dang/ dkanadang mgul pa yongs su dag par 'gyur ro// oM a mo g+ha gan d+ha bti su ru su ru/ pra b+hu ru di bya gnad+he pad+mapra b+ha sAhA/ gsang sngags 'dis khar stsal ba'i ril
khu tsan dan dang/ na la dadang/ sika dang/ ut+pal dang/ gur gum dang/ brtsi lhan cig bslang ba bgyis la// phyi ma zhibamor btags nas ril bu zho gnyis tsam pa'i tshod du sprang rtsi dang lhan
cig sbyar la/ gsang sngags stong rtsa brgyad tshang bar bzlas brjod bgyis te/ zangs kyi stod du sul nas/ bzlas brjod bgyis pa'i khar stsal nas skad cigatsam zhig
bsdad pa bgyis na rtag tu khams ut+pa la'i phre'abyung bar 'gyur te/ rgyang grags tsam du thatsom med/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang/ de bzhin byang chub sems dpa' yang dbyas/
phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug mchog sbyin mgon po mchog tu dga' bar 'gyur ro///'phags pa don yod pa'i zhagasapa'i cho ga zhib mo'i rgyal
bo bam po gnyis pa/ bzlas pas bad ba 'grub 'gyur ba// don yod rigs ni bla mar// rig sngags 'chang dang gtam bgyidapas// dus kun rul dri slang bar bgyi//
mkhris pa bad kan snubs dag dang// de bzhin kun 'jigs myur dun// kha nas lha yi dri dag 'byung// su latshig dag smras pa ni// de ni myur dudabang du 'gyur// lha rnams dbang dumachis pa
dang// bde sogs bdag po dang nga po dang// gshin rje chu lha lus ngan dang// tshangs pa khyab 'jug dbang phyugache// 'jig rten skyong ba bzhi dag dang// zla ba khyim nyid dag dang// thams
cad dbang du 'gyur nas mchis// 'din khan mur bgyid na// tshig ldan lce yi rtse mo la// mchis pas tshig ni gsal bar 'gyur// rtag tumimin dbyangs 'gyur te// dri ma'i skyon ni rnam par
sngas// tshigs bcad stongani klog pa dang// sngon bklags pa ni nyams ma 'gyur// hU~M zhes bgyis pas lha kun dang// lha gang dkyil 'khor gnas pa'i ng mchi// phaT ces bgyis pas/
gdug pa dang// bgegs dang log 'dren rnam par 'jig/ gnod sbyin srin po sha za dang// brjod byed 'byung po gsang ba pa// thams cad mod la 'byar 'gyur zhing// kha sub tu yang 'gyal
bar 'gyur// ril bu khan thogasanani// dus kun tu nimakhas par 'gyur// grub pa myur du thob 'gyur te// thams cad du yang tshe ring 'gyur// tshig mnyen 'jam zhing snyan par 'gyur// ral

bu 'din bcang bgyisan// don yod nga d+ma dri ma med// ril bu zhes bgyis 'grub par 'gyur// oM ma la bi ga te pad+ma'i bar/ sany+tsar babatsa re swAhA/ a mo g+ha sed b+he/ sho d+ha ya hU~M/ nag pus pa'i
kun pa dang/ upa'i ra dang/ tsan dan dang/ pad+mag sar dang/ lishi dang/ ka ko la dang/ spang sos dang/ rgya spos dang/ gur kum dang/ sra pun da ri ka dang/ e la dang/ sa ma ka dang/ u grwa

dang/ sugan d+hi ka 'di rnams cha mnyam par bgyis te zhib tu btags nas/ gsang sngags lan stong rtsa brgyad bzlas nas mar pa'i chab dang bsres pa khrusabagyis shing 'tshalab bam/mthu dron pos khrus bgyi ba ma 'tshalagA
shin tu khrus bgyis pa gtsang ma dag pas bag tsha ba ma mchis pagator ba tsam gyis/ sngon gyi drag po'i las rnams dang/ gdon kun 'joms par 'grub pa dang/ nad kun rnam par nyams pa dang/ 'dod ]
chags zhesdang gti mug gi/ mun pami bzad skoras bar gsungs// bkrus 'tshalatsam gyi mod lani/ drim kun zhi som nyimad// dpal gyis lha yi bzhin du 'bar//
bsod nams phung po rnam par 'phel// gzi brjid phung po rtag tu 'bar// zla ba nyi ma bzhin du mdzes// gtsang ma'i lus su gyur pan// lus ni lha yi bzhin du 'gyur// mi gtsang ba ni
gtsang bar 'gyur// ma dag pa ni dag par 'gyur// tshangs pa'i rtsod min tshas spyod 'gyur// thub min thub pa kho nar 'gyur// tshangs par mi spyod tshangs sbyong 'gyur// mgo skyeganyer ma sus
pa dang// rtag tu bro nad mamachis 'gyur/ lus la lha mo'i dri rnams 'byung// pad+machud mnyan pa'i lus// ston gyi drin rab sas te/ lha yi tsan dan dri dag ni// mda' rgyang gang du
som nyi med// rtag tu bde bar nyal ba dang// bde bar yang nisad par 'gyur// gnod sbyin srin po 'byupo dang// lha min gdug pa khog 'dren dang// gdug pa'i bgegs kun mthong mi 'gyur//
mi bzad dgra rnams kyis kyang min// lus nyid sbyangs pa bgyis nas su// bzlas brjod brtson pa'i bsgrub pa bgyis// legs par sgrub pa'i las bgyisan// de nyid bde bar 'grub par 'gyur/
rgyal ba byang chub sems dpa' kun// de bzhin mod la gzigs par 'gyur// lha rnams kun dang gang dpog gzhan// dkyil 'khor gnas pa myur dumachi// ci 'dod yid la bzlas pa yi// rtag tungon
bod 'grub par 'gyur// thog mar lus sbyangs cho ga bgyi// de nas gsang sngags legs par spyad// o acho ga paN+Nalo tsani dbya/ dri pa ri shudad+he/ su ru su ru pad+maa Tisha b+hu ru b+hu rusaman+ta
bya ba lokani sAhA/ ldong ros gi'u wang rgya mtsho lbu ba has ngo// ut+pal sbrang rtsi lhan cigareng bu 'di bgyis la// gsang sngags sum stong rtsa brgyad bzlas pa'i mig sman 'di// de bzhin gshegs pa
rnams kyis mchog tu bzangs zhes gsungs// 'din 'jig rten dbang phyug mchogasbyin gyis// kun pas bkra shis shes 'di mig nad kun// 'joms par bgyid de g.yar lam bzang po rma//
yid du mi mtshib nyid mthong mi 'gyur/ ngan par snang dang nganapar lta// nam yang mthong bar mi 'gyur ro// gtum mo 'joms pa gtum po dang// lhag ma sbags pa sgom nyes dang// bza'
nyes gnod sgrib gnod sbyin dang// srin po dang ni sdug sbrul dug/ thams cad nyin dang mtshan dgatu// ma snang bar ni thitsom mad// mig gisabazang po mthong ba dang// rmi lam bzang bo mthong bar
'gyur// zla ba srid du rab sbyar bas// lha rdzas dag ni mthong bar 'gyur// mig yongs su sbyong ba'o// kho bud d+ha budad+ha/ bi bud du pad+maa mo ga mu li/ ba ra ba rab ra de sAhA/ rig sngags

'dis gi'u wang la lan stong rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod bgyi'o// don yod pa'i rgyal po lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas brjod bgyi'o// khro ba'i rgyal po lanamadun bzlas brjod bgyi'o// snying po dang nye ba'i snying
po lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod bgyi'o// bzlas brjod bgyid pa 'tshabang 'di bla sa te dpral ba'i dbus su thig le bgyis te/ thig le lan cig bgyis pas dpral ba'i
stongan skar ma'i dbyibs lta bur gnas par 'gyur ro// gdug pa thams cad dbang 'gyur mchis// gnod sbyin 'byung po gang dag dang// srin mo ba gags dang log 'dren nyid// thams cad 'jig
'gyur the tshom med// sems can ga dugapas gdug bsams kyang// phyir zhing bzodapar mi nus pas// de dag thams cad 'jig 'gyur te/ mo la phye ma leb bzhinano// rtag tu rgyal po skya
bor bcas// 'khor bcas blon por bcas pa dang// blon po che dang mdun na 'don/ khatsunamo tshogs bcas dbang du 'gyur// dag sbyong da nga ni bram ze dag/ thams cad dbang du mchis par
'gyur// rgyal rigs dam sa rigs nyid dag ste// thams cad dbang du mchis par 'gyur// mchod pa chen po'i 'os su 'gyur// rigs gas lha ni thams cad dang// gang dag dkyil
'khor gnas pa ste// de dag thams cad dam tshig gi/ rjes su sgrub cir skyong bar 'gyur// phyogs bcur srung ba bgyid 'gyur zhing// rtag tu grub pa bla mad stsolag/ thig le 'di bgyis
grogs mod rgyu ba dag/ chom rkun dang ni chom po g.yo can dang/ g.yul 'gyed nyid kyi 'jigs pa gang yin pa// kun nas bsal bar 'gyur te som nyi mar// sa ngage stag dang dom dag dang//
glang chen khro bo mi bzad dang// wa dang gdug bcas srog chags dang// so gdug sprul kun magonas za// gang dag srog chags gdug par bcas// de dag thams cad nub 'gyur te// nam
yang 'byung bar mi 'gyur// sor ba mar dang tshig pa dang// mar pa mi bzad mtshonachu byad// mkhas pa thig le 'chang ba'i lus// khyim jib bas kyang nonami 'gyur// mkhas pa rig sngags
'chang ba'i don/ thamasacad 'di yis bgyid par 'gyur// shin dum grub gsal bar yang// 'grub par 'gyur te the tshom med// bcom ldan 'das rig sngags 'chang gis bdag dran par
bgyid cing// don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po dran bar bgyid na/ bcom ldan 'das de ma thag tu rig sngags 'chang da'i mdun du bdag mchis naas yid la bsams pa yongs su rdzogs bar bgyi'o//
thams cad kyi mchog thams cad ji skad gsus pa bzhin stsal bar bgyi'o/ dgos pa thams cad bsgrub par bgyi'o// don yod pa grub pa rjes su stsal bar bgyi'o// bden par dam bcas
pas dam tshig rjes su bskyang bar bgyi'o// bcom ldan 'das gal te rig sngags 'chang gis rjes gsungs pa'i chos zhib bo sgrub par bgyidan/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i byin gyi rlabs dang/
de bzhin gshegs pa'i bkas rjes su gnang ba de dag thams cad bdag gis bstsal bar bgyi'o// bcom ldan 'das gal te rogi sngags 'chang sgrub pa dang bral bar gyur na/ bcom ldan 'das
pa de dag thams cad thetshom mamachis par 'grub bar 'gyur ro// de nas gsang sngags bzlas te/ oM a mo g+ha pApa ltar sa pra sa ra hU~M/ mchod phyir thogs pa'i skud pa'i gsang sngags te//
danabadag gas mnangs so// de lta bsanarig sngags 'chang gis ji skad gsungs pa'i tshog dang chog zhibamo sgrub pas/ gsang sug
gzhon nums bkal ba'i sku dpal lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod bgyisanas mdud pa gsum de'i bar bgyi'o// oM a mo g+ha pra bar Na/ mu ru mu ri di bya ka ni kaM/ saM b+ha ba tu ta ra tu ra sAhA/
gos kyi gsang sngags te lan stongashu rtsa gcig bzlasaso// oM a mo g+ha bas khyod kyi b.li bo d+hani pad+mosAhA/ gosabag pa'i gsang sngags te lan shurtsa gcig bzlas so// o do da ka saM b+ha ta a

mo gru ba ru Na tsa'i b+hi Tin tsahUM// khrus kyi sngags te lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas/ oM a mri ta a mo g+ha pad+ma a sa ne/ bar ni/ tsu tsu'u sAhA/ nye reg gi sdugs te lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas so//
oM a mo g+ha ra Ni/ ku ru ku ru AhA/ bdag bsrung ba lta/ yungs kar dang chab la lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlasanas rang gi lus la dbang bskur// oM a mo g+has ma ya/ ma hApadam tiT+Tha tiSh+Tha hU~M//
dmatshog gi gsang sngags te lan bdun bzlas so/ oM samAtra a mo g+ha ba ba ti tipar tuk+ti/ slob ma dang grogs bgyid pa srung ba ste/ thol ba la lan bdun bzlasanas dpral bar thig le bgyi'o/

o trilo kya pad ma a mo g+ha kra man mi li mi li sAhA/ gom pa 'dor ba'i sngags te lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas so// oM pad+me mahA paNe sa ras ra/ sa man+ta na pa ri bi ya/ a mo g+ha pA na su ru su ru sAyA/

tshon skud sna lnga la lan bdun bzlas te dkri bar bgyi'o/ o btsi tra a mo g+ha bstan nar ga bi shur rta ya/ kiNi ki mi sAhA/ ba dan gyi gsang sngags te lan bdun bzlos so// oM a mo g+ha ra badzra tuN+NaM
thar tharasAhA/ mapa'i gsang sngags ta lan bdun po zlas so// oM babu la a mo g+ha mahA t+tar bi gde/ si'isi'i sAhA/ rta babs kyi gsang sngags te lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas so// su dag der zhug
na mtho ris kyi sgor zhugs par 'gyur ro// sdig pa dang sgrib pa thams cad yongs su byang bar 'gyur ro// onanA btsiTaM/ a chog tut+taM/ pha la tA kIts+tsha pUr ya/ bar pa'i hU~M/ bum pa gang ba'i
gsang sngags te lan bdun bzlasago o amo g+ha ra bi ma Na/ ka Tatsa/ a khring bi bya gnad+hedzo la sa ra Na/ saman+tan dz+wa la dz+wa la swAhA/ bog por gyi gsang sngags te lan bdun bzlas so ko

dzul ba ti/ ratag ta/ si ri Ni tu Ti tu Ti sAhA/ gtor ma'i snod kyi gsang sngags te lan bdun bzlas go/ o dbyah+phadzanaa mo g+hatsanaAgo g+ha bats+tsha ba re pu ra yahU~M/kham phor gyi gas ngesag sate lan bdun bzlas so
oM a mo g+hasaM bur gyi dri Na lan ba tigAhA/ thig le'i gsang sngags te lan bdun bzlasaso// oM sarasAr ga/ a mo g+ha b+hanamAdan/ ril bamagrin ris kyi gsang sngags te lan bdun bzlas
so oM ratu dpyarat+ta kum b+ha ba tisA ga ra/ saM pAr Ni swAhA/ bum pa'i gsang sngags te lan bdun bzlasaso// oM btsad khrodzA la nAr raM ga ba lha lA ya saMshA d+ha ya tu Ti sAhA/
tshon rtsi gsang sngags te lan bdun bzlas so// o de bye a wa lo ka ni bi b+ha dza ya tu saman+tan sam ra des hA/ lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas brjod bgyis te so sor dbye bar bgyi'o// oM nAnA pra hu re

Naa mo g+hamu dwadzaladzal sAhA/ phyagakhatshan bri ba ste lan bdun bzlasaso// oM a mo g+ha rat+na sU tra d+ha re/ ki Ni ki NisAhA/ thigaskud kyi gsang sngags te lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod bgyis te
dkyil 'khor ram/ ri mo bri ba'i las sam/ gzhan gazhi ci'ang rung ba la'ang gdab par bgyi'o// o ba bu la brtse phra bar sha ya/ a mo g+hapadrag+haM/ sgo'i cha dbya bo'i gsang sngags te sgo re rer yang
lanawishu rtsa gcig bzlas so// oM su b+hi d+ha ki sumaM ga la rwar bA ban ti/ o da khyabAdzAn/ a mo g+ha pAshan pa na ba re/ gi ri gi rihUM/ oM saM pur+Na/ rU pya di bya ba dzani/ a mo ga pad+ma

sAhA/ lan bdun bzlas par bgyi'o// o ba bi d+ha rU pa hA ro pakA ra Na ]tsal tsal/ amo g+ha ba tisAhA/ lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas so// o da bya gan d+hanu sa ra Ni a mo g+ha b.le d+ha ra d+ha ra swAhA/
mchod yon gyi gsang sngags te lan bdun bzlas so// o gan d+has ra Nis man+ta/ a mo g+ha pra sbyarahU~M/ dri'i gsang sngags te lan bdun bzlas so// oM nir ma la kA yasho pAni dibya gan d+ha pra pU ra
NipA ra yahU~M/ byug pa'i gsang sngags te lan bdun bzlas so// mo gan d+ma tshu lcapra pAr Ni/ tsu'u tshu ru suny+tsa/ dri'i phye ma'i gsang sngags te lan bdun bzlas so// oMsam saman+ten/ bi ma le gan

b+ho ta tare sAhA/ bskul ba'i gsang sngags te lan bdunabazlas so/ dao ra khu gnad+hapra pU ra Ni sAgar dza la dib bya a d+hi ta ka la sho rtar/ pArtsalAr ya dza ya sidatsesAhA/ bum pa'i dri chab kyi gsang

sngags te lan brgya tsho brgyad bzlas so// o ras sAgra pa ti/ sarlabi d+ha a b+hin ad+hiT+Thi ta saM pU ra ya hU~M/ gtor maro sna tshogs can gyi gsang sngags te lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas so// o dab bya
b+ho dzan/ saM pU ra ya/ pi pU la prab+hasahA/ kha zas kyi gsang sngags te lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas so// oM tIshuka b+ho dzan/ b.li bi pu la ra sA gra pa te sur pra su ra hU~M/ zasadakar gsum gyi
gtor ma 'am/ gtor ma gzhan la'ang lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas so// o pha la ba ti sA ra ba ti dib bya ba nis ti/ tar tur tuni sAhA/ 'bras bu'i gsang sngags talan bdun bzlas so//
o dab bya ku su mod pa lan nA pu pra bar Ni b+ha ba b+ha ba sAhA/ ma tog gi gsang sngags talanabadun bzlas so// o ba bi rU la ta pu pa kuN Di ta ba nas ti Ahar saM pAN/ kaM b+he swAhA/ ma tog
gtor ba'i gsang sngags te len bdun bzlas so// o mahA d+hAb ma g+ha pa Ta la sany+tsapAya/ sa man+tan hUM swAhA/ bdug pa'i gsang sngags te lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas so// oM a tha ra pa NidzA
la dz+wa la de bamu khe swAhA/ ma'i gsang sngags te lan bdun bzlas so// oM bab rnyam Ni ka na ka rato dzAl pA ra Nam Ni ma Nia mo g+ha ma NisAhA chu zhing brgyan pa'i gsang/
sngags de lan bdun bzlas so// o pad+maka re bi ma la na/ ang gu li/ sa ma sa ma saN+Ta ta tha ga ta/ a d+hisatwA thal mo sbyar ba'i gsang sngags te lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas so//

oM sarbagu Na pra Nata/ shi ro b+han d+ha nA ya na mo ska ro ma/ ma la mi li tur NisAhA/ phyag bgyi ba'i gsang sngags lan bdun bzlas so// oM da shadisha a b+hi ban d+ha d+ha pras ra tuhU~M/ bskor ba'i
gsang sngags te lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas so// oM ba li yapAdzA li tu pan/ pra dz+wa la pra sa ra hU~M/ thal mo'i gsang sngags te lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas so// o deb bya a mo g+ha bi pu lasAhA/

rem skyu ra nir g+ho kha ru te na ra NahU~M/ dril bu'i gsang sngags ti lan nyishu rtsa gcig bzlas so// yang na brgya rtsa brgyad do// o rad+d+hi dzul sa mnan a ba b+hA sa ya ma h+pham Ni ragi khe sat+tA/ mar
ma ma'i gsang sngags te lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas so/ oM cu'u cu'u sa pa hA ya shikA dza ba hU~M/ dgug pa'i gsang sngags te/ gu gul gyi bdug ba la lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas so/ 2 dus
do ba bo mAn/ sam sa ma ya ba'i sAhA/ dam tshig gi gsang sngags te lan nyi shu rtse gcig bzlas so// o ba tsi tram Ni bi pu labra bar tanihU~M/ bgrapa'i phreng gi gsang sngags te lan brgya rtsa brgyad
ba/ ba zlos so// oM ba tsi trar phyogs dzul dbi pya/ kusu ma ba'e dut+par ti sAhA/ ma tog 'phreng ba'i gsang ba'i sags te lanabadun bzlas so// oM gi bya lo tsan a mo g+ha bri ba re/ sarba dib/
bya a d+hiT+Thi ta sid d+ho shud d+ha bi lo ka ti sAhA/ dgug pa'i gsang sngags te lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas so// oM a mo g+ha pas man+teshu b+hane ta ra tar/ gtsA sA b+hA ba nam sAt+tA/ slar gshegA
su gsol ba'i gsang sngags te lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas so// o dbamya saM pU ra Ni/ nA ga bi lokinahU~M/ 'khar gsil gyi gsang sngags kyi lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas so// o pad
Da su ra Ni spur ya/ a mo g+ha bitas man pra b+ha sAhA/ lhung bzed kyi gsang sngags te lan nyi shu rtse gcig bzlas so// o dur b+hasaMsgyur bsgyu a tiT+Thihasrasar/ su rasu ra/ 'a pU dzi ti sAhA/
rtswa gding ba'i gsang sngags te lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas so// o dz+wa la dum tshwa la shi khir gar b+he swAhA/ sbyin sreg gi gsang sngags te lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas so// o pan pad+mas
na ba re dra bar nA ga b+hu ba na sAd+hA/ 'bab chu dang mtsho'i gsang sngags ta lan bdun bzlas so// oM kha gtsaN/ gam ga ma ya pa dpratsa'i Ni hU~M/ len pa'i gsang sngags te lan brgyu
rtsa brgyad bzlas so// oM sarba tra a mo g+ha b+hi'i ma ma sA d+hu'e bi ma le/ a b+hi TIny+tsa tumAn/ pra ba ra pA Nadzapad+ma tshesAhA/ dbang bskur ba'i gsang sngags te lananyi shurtsa gcig/
bzlas so// rig sngags 'chang gis gsang sngags 'di dag thams cad so sor cho ga zhib mo'i sgrub pa ji lta ba bzhin du thams cad so sor sbyar nas cho ga bsgrubs na
dgos pa rgya chen po'i 'byor pa'i mthu 'di dag dang/ ma tog dang/ bdug pa dang/ dri dang/ 'phreng ba dang/ byug ba dong/ rin kho tsho'i snod sna tshogs dang/ nor bu sna tshogs kyi gzhal
mad khang rgya chen po 'byung bar 'gyur ro// lha'i ma tog dang/ gdugs dang/ ba dan sna tshogs 'byung bar 'gyur ro// ro brgya dang ldan pa'i kha zas kyi mchog dang/ ro sna tshogs kyi
mchog rnams 'byung bar 'gyur ro// gtor ma bzang po rnam pa sna tshogs 'byung bar 'gyur ro// jitsam de bzhin gshegs pa la 'os pa'i gzhal med khang dag 'byung bar 'gyur ro//
byang chub sems dpa'i gzhalamad khang ji lta ba de lta bu dag 'byung bar 'gyur ro// lha rnams kyi gzhal mad khang ji lta ba de lta bu dag 'byung bar 'gyur ro// klu rnams M dang/ gnod sbyin/
rnams dang/ lha ma yin rnams dang/ nam mkha' ltang rnams dang/ mi 'am ci rnams dang/ lto 'phye chen po rnams la so so'i gzhal med khang ji lta ba de lta bu dag 'byung bar 'gyur ro// mi
rnaras kyi khang pa ji lta ba dang/ kha zas kyi mchog ji lta bu dag 'byung bar 'gyur ro// de lta bas na dgos pa'i rnam pa thams cad bgyi ba dang/ de kho na nyid sgrub pa'i ji skad gsungs pa'i cho ga
[j]zhib mo dang/ cho ga dang/ gsang sngags bsgrub pa rnams bgyi'o// de nas rig sngags 'chang gis grub pa bla na med pa thams cad 'thob par 'gyur ro// gal te ri sngags 'chang gis las
yongs su rdzogs par bgyi ste/ don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po 'di brjod pa tsam gyis rig sngags 'chang gis mdun du bdag rang gi gzugs kyis nye bar mchis nas bsam pa dang re ba thams cad
yongs su rdzogs pa rab gyi'o// sdig pa dang/ sgeg pa dang/ gnod pa thams cad 'jigs par 'gyur ro// yongs su dag pa'i lha chen po ltar lus dag par bgyi'o// cho ga zhib mo dang/
phyag rgya dang/ gsang sngags dang/ snying po dang/ dkyil 'khor dang/ don yod pa'i zhags pa'i rgyal po'i rnam par thar pa'i dkyil 'khor grub pa'i mchog thams cad stsal bar bgyi'o// rig
sngags 'chapa 'khor los sgyur ba chen po'i dbang bskur bas dbang bskur bar bgyi'o// de khon nyid yang dag par sgrub pa'i grub pa stsal bar bgyi'o// don yod pa'i zhags pa 'jig rten pa dang 'jig
rten las 'das pa sgrub po 'i grub pa chen po stsal bar bgyi'o// shin tu rgya che zhing bag tsha ba ma mchis pa dang/ mchod pa dang/ bkur sti chen po 'a jig rten thams cad kyi mchog khyad par du 'phag
shang nor 'du ba'i bkra shis dang dpal stsal bar bgyi'o// 'di la yid gnyis dang som nyi baspyod par mi bgyi zhing/ dngos po gzhan du'ang yid la mi bgyi'o// sems can thams cad la byams pa
dang snying rje dang/ dga' ba dang/ btang snyoms kyis brtse ba la mchog tu brtson par bgyi'o// dugacig pu bzhin du sems can du gyur pa thams cad la mchog tu
brtse bar bgyi'o// bden par smra ba dang/ bden par dga' ba dang/ snyan par sla ba dang/ snying rje'i lhag pa'i bsam bas dmigs nas don yod pa'i zhags po'i sIr po bzla bar bgyi//
bzlas brjod kyi cho ga bgyi zhing/ phyag rgya dang gsang sngags kyang bzla bar bgyi'o// phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad du gtogs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams yid la bgyis nas
sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa bsgom par bgyi'o// sas rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag bgyi'o// 'phags pa mgon po spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la phyag bgyis nas
mngon gsum du bsgom par bgyi'o// bcom ldan 'das 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi ri mo'i gzugs la phyag bgyis te/ mdun du rtswa'i gding ba bting nas skyil mo krung bcas

lta ta mchi nas gzhan mi smra ba'i bzlas pa bgyi ste/ 'di ni gsang ba'i de kho na nyid sgrub pa'o// danasaM phyag rgyu dang gsang sngags brjod par bgyi'o// bdag la don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po'i de kho
na nyid grub par gyur cig/ 'jig rten dbang phyug mgon po thugs rjecan sems can la byams pa dang/ sems can dag pa lagan pad+macan/ sems can thams cad la byams pa'i bdag nyid
can gyi byin gyi rlabs kyis byin gyis brlabs dang/ phyogs bcu'i de bzhin gshegs pa kun dang/ lha dang klu dang gnod sbyin dang// srin po lha min gsang ba pa// 'jig rten skyong dang tshangs pa
dang// drag po khyab 'jug gzhonanu sogs// gshin rje chu lha lus ngan dang// drang srong tshogs dang de bzhin du// zla nyi kun 'gyod gzhon nu dang// de bzhin dbang phyug dbang chen dang// phyag
rgya bcings pa tsam gyis ni// de dag myur du'adubar 'gyur// sgrol ma bdunani 'du bar 'gyur// de bzhin pha rol phyin bcu dang// mgrin sngon de bzhin gos dkar can// de bzhin ba
garagyi dbang// rgyal dang rnam rgyalakod dang ni// lcags sgrog rdo rje lcags sgrog dang// lha mo khro gnyer mA ma ki// dpa mad po nyamo dang ni// 'jigs med dpal dang dbyangs can dang//
pad+ma ko ti ut+pa la// pad+ma'i so can de bzhin du// ti sa yi ni rtsa mo na// 'phrog ma 'byung po ma dag dang// de bzhin lag na rdo rje bcu// mthu chen ji bzhin rig 'dzin dbang// rdo rje
'chang chen de bzhin du// bcu gsum lha dbang lhan cig dang// sum cu gnyis nas lha dag na// gsang sngags phyag rgyabacings tsam gyis// de dag thams cad 'du bar 'gyur// phyogrwa
bcu'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis rnam par gzigs shing ston par mdzad do// de'i mod la byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis rnam par gzigs shing rtag tu mchog stsol bar 'gyur
ro rtag tu mgon po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug phyag stong spyan stong pa dang/ phyag rgya sna tshogs 'dzan pa lta 'tshal bar 'gyur ro// phyag rgya bcings pa
tsam gyis ni// bram ze'i cha lugs don yod zhags// mthong bar 'gyur te som nyimad mgron ston dang ni mgrin dang// de bzhin rgya mtsho'i glo ba dang ni// mgon po'i zhal ni bcu
gcig dang// de bzhin zhal ni bzhi dag dang// mgon po 'jigs pa brgyud 'phrog dang// de bzhin gzigs pa bsam mi khyab// rnam pa sna tshogs gzugs dang ni// sgyu ma lta bu'i
ting nge 'dzin// phyag rgyabacings pa tsam gyisani// mgon pos thams cad ston par mdzad// bde btsan gyi 'jig rten khams// rgyal ba 'dren pa 'od dpag mad// byang chub sams/
dpa'i tshogs bskor ba// mgon po yod la mthong bar 'gyur// gzhan yang sangs rgyas zhing ni stong dag gi/ chu bo gang+ga'i bye ma dang mnyam pa'i// de bzhin gshags 'bum bye ba brgya phrag
stong// byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs bcas yongs bskor mgon// phyag spyabcu sa pa tsam gyis mthong bar 'gyur// mthong bachen po'i rnam par gzhan mthong ste// nyin gcig
bzhin du byang chub snying po dang// chos kyi 'khor lo de bzhin rdo rje'i gdan// de dag rmi lam snang ba mthong 'gyur bas// de la yid ganyis somanyi thatsom med// sangs rgyas rnams kyis
gshur ba'am mtshams med lnga// mgon po ri la gdug sems nyid dang ni// byang chub sems dpa'i bar chad 'phags pa la// kha che nyid dang dam chos su ba dang// rgyal bas gsung
stong mnar mdagazhol ba dang// mi bzad dmyal ba bcu drug gnas pa dang// bsal pa 'bum po thams cad skad cig grol// phyag rgya gsang sngags bzlos tsam gyis sam//
thos sam mthong ngam ming ni gzung bas kyang// sdig pa de kun 'jig 'gyur som nyimad// don yod zhags snying phyag rgya mthong ba yang// 'jig rten mgon dang mtshungs te khyad par
'apags// sangs rgyas 'bum phrag stong dang gapAyi// bya ma brgya stong dag ni mthong bar 'gyur// byang chub snying por gtogs pa thams cad dang// chos kyi 'khor lo rab tu bskor bar
mtshungs// don yod rgyal po'i snying po phyag rgya dang 'o/ gsang sngagasa mthong na bsod nams bu chen gyis// bsod nams phung po 'di dag 'phel bar 'gyur// de yi tshe yang rnam par
'phel bar 'gyur// de ni dang bag tu mad par som nyi med// de nas rig sngags 'chang ba gtsar gyur nas// gtsang ma'i gos bgos nas nii thog mar yang// yo byad sgrub pa gtsang zhing
spyod pa gtsang// rtag tu yan lag sngos ni sna tshogs dang// sna tshogs bdug pas rab tu bdug bgyis shing// dpur pa lag pa lha yi spos kyis byug/ gtsang ma'i sa phyogs gtsang ma'i
stan bshams par// skyil mo krung bcas nas ni byams sems dang// snying rje'i lhag bsam de nyid mnyam bzhag nas// phyogs bcu dus gsum gshegs pa'i
sangs rgyas dang// rtagatu 'jig rten dbang la phyag bgyi zhing// rtag tu bla ma mchod nas chos la brtson// shin tu rig pas tshig gzhan mi smabar// shin tu rig pas srung ba'i cho ga
bgyi// shin tu bkra shis bla ma de nyid gus// bdan par sa zhing snyan par snang dang// sems can kun la snying rje'i bdag nyid can// lhan cig rjes mthun gyur nas de nas ni// phyag
rgya 'di bcing bar bgyi ste// lag pa pad+ma'i tshul du gzhag la sor mo rnams mnyam ba'abucingasata mtho'u chung rlu ba'i tshul du snying khar bzhag go/ phyag rgya 'di ni don yod pa'i rgyal po'asnying

tshapo'i rtsa ba'i phyag rgya ste/ byang chub kyi sIng po'i bar du stsol bar 'gyur ro// mgonapo 'jig rten dbang phyug dgug pa'i gsang sngags 'di brjod do// oM a mo g+ha bi kur bi ta/ sa man+ta a wa lika

yanam sa ya d+hu/ a b+hi ta a mo g+ha paro tsar sany+tsar hU~MhU~M/ de ma thag tu dus gsum la rnam par lta ba don yod pa'i rgyal po'i pad+ma 'bar ba gsal ba'i cho 'phrul dang bcas pa'i phyag rgya'i rgyal ngos
shin tu phra ba'i rdul dang mnyam pa'i dus gsum du gshegs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing mang po mtha' dag cher g.yos par 'gyur ro// dus gsum du gshegs shing bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan
'das de dag gi sku las 'od zer sna tshogs 'bum phrag brgya stong dum dag byung nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa de dag thams cad rab tu dgyes shing sangs rgyas kyi nang la mdzad pa'i thugs rje chen pos
phyag gsar gyi kha dog lta bu brkyang nas rig sngags 'chang gi spyi bor 'jog par 'gyur ro// grub pa dam pa don yod pa'i rnam par 'phrul pa'i byin gyi rlabs kyis byin gyis brlabs pa stsol bar 'gyur
ro// dbang phyug dang/ dbang phyug chen po dang/ tshangs pa dang/ lha'i bu dang/gshin rje dang/ chu lha dang/ lus ngan dang/ khyab bdag dang/ kun 'gyod gzhon nu la sogs pa lha rnams srung ba dang/
skyob pa dang/ srid pa bgyid por 'gyur ro// phyag rgyabacings pa tsam gyi mod la sdig pa dang/ sgrib pa thams cad dang/ 'jigs pa brgyad rnams dang/ chad pa thams cad las yongs su
thar par 'gyur ro// de'i grub pa yid du mchis par 'gyur ro// las thams cad bgyid pa'i phyag rgya thams cad du mchog lags par grags pa lags so// don yod dam tshig mchog grags pa//
pad+margyas pa'i phyag rgya bcing// mdzub mo bu mo rnams par lcags kyu'i tshul du bgyis la/ san mo mnyam par gzhag pa'i phyag rgya 'di bstan te/ rnam par grol ba'i dkyil 'khor brtsi ba'i
phyag rgya 'dzin pa'i gsang sngags 'di brjod do// oM a mo g+ha padaM ku sha sa ma yAn/ grin+ta griny+tsa/ d+har d+har/ ma hA satwa hU~M/ phyag rgya bcings te bcings ma thag tu 'am/ gzung btsam
gyis dus gsum du gshegs pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das thams cad kyis legs so zhes bgyi brtsol bar 'gyur ro// de bzhin gshegs pa de dag thamA
cad dgyes pa dang/ mnyes pa dang/ rab tu dgyes pa dang/ tsham pa dang/ thugs dgyes pa skye bar 'gyur zhing/ rig sngags 'chang la thugs rje chen po rgyas pa'i snying bo grub pa dam
pa stsol bar 'gyur zhing/ yang nas yang du mthong bar stsol bar 'gyur ro// mchog thams cad stsol ba'i 'gyur ro// don yod pa'i dam tshig grub pa sol bar 'gyur ro// de bzhin/
gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga zhib mo phyag rgya dang/ gsang sngags 'dzin pa rnam par grol ba'i dkyil 'khor gzung ba tsam gyis dam tshig gi rjes su 'jug
ba par 'gyur ro// thams cad du 'phags pa snyan ras gzig dbang phyug gigs ba'i dkyil 'khor phyag rgya dang dam tshig 'tshal bar 'gyur ro// thams cad du dgos pa'i gsang sngags grub pa'i
'gyur ro// 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug mchog sbyin pa rtag tu lta 'tshal bar 'gyur ro// lag mthil pad+ma ltar bgyis la/ mdzub mo gung mo rje rdzaltar bgyi zhing//
mtho'u chung brkyang ba'i phyag rgyun/ pad+ma'achang la bdug pa dang// ma tog la sogs dri rnams dang// 'phrang ba byug pa phyi ma dang// ba dan gos dang brgyan dang ni// gtor mamachod
yon rab tu dbul// bum pa gang ba'i drisogs dang// mtshon skud sna lnga tshon phye'o// gzhan yang zas ni sna tshogs la// phyagargya 'di ni kun l mchog/ 'di ni dbul ba'i phyag
rgyur gsungs// thams cad dun don yod mchog/ go bar bgyid po'i phyag rgya ni// pad+ma'i phyag gis byin gyis brlabs// gung mor nor bu dkris pa lta bu'i phyag rgya 'di ni bag
tsha ba mad pa'i pad+mad+marin po che'i phyag rgya lags te/ 'di ni grub pa dam pa lags so// spyan drang ba'i gsang sngagasani/ oM a mo g+ha partsam hA satwa a ya tu mi nyamats+tshale/ ba ribi
ri pad+ma b+hu dze sAhA/ dus gsum gshegs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams// gsol ba gdab pa'i gsang sngags te// byang chub sems dpa' thams cad dang// phyag na pad+ma gsol gdab
dgug/ lha rnams kun dang de bzhin du// dkyil 'khor gyi ni lha rnams dgug/ phyag rgya 'din bcings pa yis// phyogs bcu kun gyisangs rgyas dang// de bzhin byang chub sems
dpa' yang 'du/ lha dang klu dang gnod sbyin dang// dri za lha min de bzhin du// nam mkha' lding dang mi 'amaci// lto 'phye chen po nyid dgas// de kun skad cig 'du 'gyur zhing//
srung ba'i phyir ni som nyi med// lag pa rdo rje'i tshul du gzhag la// lag pa'i mthe'u chung rnams pad+ma'i mtshams su bya ste// gung mo rnams yid tsam bskum pa'i phyag rgya bcings
pa ni/ grub ldan 'don phyogs bcing dang// dkyil 'khor bcing bar bgyi ba yi// srung ba'i las la bag tsha med// phyag rgyu 'di ni bcings tsam dang// gsang
sngags stongan bzlos tsam gyis// dpag tshad bdun ni khor yug tu// mtshams bcing dkyil 'khor bcing ba dang// srung ba'i las ni bgyis par 'gyur// oM a mo g+ha badzra dIn+da pany+tsa
ban d+hu sa ra ste nam rgyus man+ta rakAnA laM/ tsu ru tsu ru snyopa de nas don yod phyag rgya ste// grub ldan sems can kun smyan// don yod pa ni phyag ni// khyad par 'phags pa gzhan
yang bstan// rdo rje thal mo sbyar nasaM sor mo rnams mnyam par gzhag ste/ srin lag kha pa gdengs la sor mo rnams yi de tsam bskums pa ni/ don yod sna tshogs rgyal po yi// pad+ma'i
phyag rgya chen po bsgrags// phyag rgya 'din las kun dang// 'jug pa'i las kun sbyar ba dang// dkyil 'khor phyag rgya mchog kuro gsungs// phyag rgya 'danagazung tsam dang// gas pa
sngags dam pas bsro bgyis na// rig sngags 'chang ba 'jug par 'gyur// dus gsum gshegs pa rnam thar nga ni/ dkyil 'khor dam pa grub par 'gyur// oM badzrab dzra// sa

da pad+ma sha rU pa b+ha re/ d+har t+ta ra hU~M/ pra ba sha tusdu ya d+hA nu ga ta na d+hi'i tu Ti sAhA/ phyag rgya 'di ni bcings tsam gyis// de nyid grub pas phyogs bcu yi// sangs rgyas zhing ni rnam drug tu
0 g.yos bar 'gyur ba som nyi med// phyag na pad+ma'i lus 'baranas/ mgu ba chen po 'byung bar 'gyur// rig sngags 'chang la 'dzum bzhin gyis// rtag tu lta zhing mdunan mchis//
sangs rgyas kyi ni zhing kun dang// mtho ris sgo rnams 'byed par 'gyur// sum cu rtsa gnyis gnas rnams na// gnas pa'i lha rnams sgo 'byed cing// sum cu rtsa gsum gnas skon//
gnas pa thams cad sgo 'byed do// bde can 'jig rten khams dag ni// sgo na gnas pa sgo 'byed do// phyag rgya 'di nibacangs tsam gyis// gnas kun tu ni 'jug par 'gyur// phyag rgya
sdig pa thams cad 'phrog/ nye ba'i nyon mongs thams cad 'joms// sdug bsngal kun las rnam par grol// gnod pa thams cad 'jig par bgyid// dmyal ba bcu drug rnam las
thar// phyag rgya bcings pa tsam gyisani/ mi bzad 'jigs pa brgyad rnams dang// nyes byas thams cad 'jig par bgyid// ramyal ba'i sgo na gcad par 'gyur// mi bzad 'jig
las bsgral bar 'gyur/ phyag 'di nyid mthong tsam gyis// mtshams med lnga ni bgyis pa dang// sdig pa kun las rnam par thar// sems can kun la rtag tu sdug/ de bzhin
gshegs kun byin gyis rlob// phyag rgya 'di nyid mthe bo'i rtsa mo cung zad bkugal bzung sta/ gung mo pad+ma'i ral pa'i tshul du bgyis te/ spyi bo'i ral pa sa la gzhag pani/ pad+ma'i ral
pa'i phyag rgyalags te/ 'di ni don yod pa'i zhags pa zhes bsgrags te/ sems can thams cad la snyan pa'i sAd du gsang sngags 'di brjod par bgyi'o// o amo g+ha
pasmyo dza la bi sho d+ha ya hU~M/ bi ri bi ri bi ma le sAhA/ phyag spyi bor bzhag nas chab dag gis// bkrus nas gtsang mas gsang sngags ni// brgya rtsa brgyad du bzlas nas su// phyag gsang
sngags dogs med pas// rtag tu bkrus pa'i modatsam gyis// mi gtsang pa ni gtsang bar 'gyur// mi gtsang spyod pa gtsang ba dang// tshangs spyod pa yin tshangs spyod 'gyur// mi thub pas
ni thub par 'gyur// bsod nams phung pos lha bzhin 'bar// zla ba nyi ma bzhin du mdzes// 'jig rten kur stong rtag tu sdug/ gsang sngags bla na mar pa 'grub// grub pa don yod
zhags pa yi// don yod de nyid 'grub par 'gyur// lha rnams kun na 'du 'gyur to// srung ba'i phyir ni som nyi med// mgon po 'phags pa sngan ras gzigs// sems dpa' mchog
ka sbyin dag pa po// mchog sbyin rgyun du thams cad du// nyi ma re re mthong 'gyur zhing// tshe 'phel rtag tu nad mad 'gyur// de bzhin mgu dang rgyas par 'gyur// thams cad duni las 'grub
ste// gnod pa kun las rnam par grol// sdig pa kun las rnam par thar// thams cad du ni bkra shis mchog/ khrus kyi rnam par 'di dag ni// don yod khrus kyi mchog yin no// lag
ga'is bsdams 'a log tu bstan// srinakag ga/a pad tsam bskum pa ni pad+ma'i nor bu phyag rgyalags[' ]/kun nas kyang ni mnyam par gzhag/ phyag rgya ting 'dzin lta bu 'di// sgyel yo
krung bcas mchis nas su// phyag rgya 'di yag paching bgyisang// mnyam par bzhag nas gsang sags bzlas// bcis pa tsam gyis mong nas ni// skyil krung rdo rje lhun mnyam 'gyur/
na sa la lo rgyu saa rti/ bgegs la 'dog up+pe wa shums chung dang// gnod sbyin srin po 'byung po ra bcas// lha min mkha' lding gis mi mthong// phyogs dang phyogs mtshams rnams
172nas pa 5 sAN/ kha ga la/ skyes 'gal la/u0f8bbak+kha/ tsheg/ kha som nye mad///oM a mo g+ha shAdzA/ parme shwa ra hU~M/ thal mo mnyam par sbyar la/
tsit+ta yaN tA ra b+ha phye la yabagyi lha/ yol pa'i dbang phyugargyad phyag rgya'o// 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi mdun du gsang sngags dang
pazlawa king ba' pal de'o// lo pa shA ra a mo glu yulu ja/ pa ye pa lis/ las shom bzlas brjod nyi shu rtsa gcig bgyi'o// de'i 'og tu phyag rgyabacings nas don yod pa 'i zhags
[r]'asing ri wa 3sems pa'i masam pa rtse gcig pas bkug la ba'o/ na gigs pa ma gyi dod la dus gsum du rgyun du ba/ shogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'bum phrag brgya stong gang+ga'i
klung gi bya ma dang mnyam pa g.yo bar 'gyur zhing/ de bzhinagshegs bdagra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyis rig sngags 'chang de la
legs so zhes bgyi ba sel bar 'gyur ro// dbugs 'byin par mdzad do// rigasngags 'chang de la 'od zer sna tshogs gtong bar mdzad do// mgon po 'phags pa sbyan ras gzigs
dbang phyug dran par bgyis pa tsam gyi mod la mdun du bka' ga[”] mchis par 'gyur ro// 'di ltar bcings pa tsam gyis pha rol tu phyin pa drug yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// pha rol tu
phyin pa bcu dang ldan par 'gyur ro// sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad dang ldan par 'gyur ro// de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang ldan par 'gyur ro// mi 'jigs pa/
bzhi 'thob par 'gyur ro// 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa yongs su dag pa 'thob par 'gyur ro// phyag rgyu 'di bcings la don yod pa'i rgyal po'i snying po dran par bgyis pa tsam gyi
mod la yon tan dang phan yon rnams 'thob par 'gyur ro// bzlas brjod brgya rtsa brgyad bgyis la phyag rgya ba rtsa brgyud bcings nas zhag gcig sbyang ba bgyis te bzlas brjod bgyisan/ 'phag
pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug bdag nyid kyi rang bzhin du mdun du mchis nas rig sngags 'chang la legs so zhes bgyi bstsol te/ rig sngags 'chang la legs so legs so// 'di ni bzlas
brjod kyi dam pa yin no zhes dpung pa g.yas pa brkyang ba'i lag pas rig sngags 'chang gi spyi bor bzhag nas dbugs 'byin par 'gyur te/ tshur shog bu gang 'dod pa'i mchog slongs shig
dang sbyin no// khyod rjes su bzung zhing byin gyis babs pas pa'i bu rig sngags 'chang gi thu bor gyur cig/ rig sngags 'chang khyod kyis don yod pa'i zhags pa'i sIng po grub pas rnam par
grol ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi phyag rgyarim par dbye ba dang/ cho ga zhib mo'i rgyal po la brtan par bgyis shig/ snying rje chen po' sams kyis sems can thams cad la gom par gyis shig/
khyod 'di nas ma 'ongs pa'i mngal du gnas nas shi 'phos te 'jigarten gyi khams bde ba can du 'gro bar 'gyur zhing/ khyod pad+ma'i nang du sdus tas nas rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan cing mtshan
dang dpe byad kyis rab tu brgyan pa/ byang chub kyi snying po'i mthar thug gi bar du tshe dpag tu mad par 'gyuga'o// 'di ltar tshag gzhan mi smra bar lan stong rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod bgyis te//
phyag rgya brgya rtsa brgyad bcings pas lan stong rtsa brgyad tshang nas nam mkha' la mchi bar 'gyur ro// don yod pa'i rnam par 'phrul pa rnam par dag pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi 'khor los sgyur bar
'gyur ro// rig sngags 'chang 'bum phrag bye ba brgya stong phrag bco brgyad kyis yongs su bskor bar 'gyur ro// tshe dpag tum mchis par 'gyur ro// don yod rgya cher snang ba zhes bgyi ba'i
rdzu 'phrul 'thob par 'gyur ro// rdzu 'phrul gang gi mthus stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams su dpung pa bskum pa las brkyang ba tsam gyis mchi zhing slar
ldog par 'gyur ro// bzlas brjod brgyastong bgyis la phyag rgya brgya stong bcis na/ tsha'adi nyid la 'phags pa sman ras gzigs dbang phyug dang 'drab r 'gyur ro// sgyu ma lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin
gyis rnam par rol pa'i don yod pa'i mig yongs su dag pa 'thob par 'gyur ro// dbang phyug dang/ dbang phyug chen po dang/ tshangs pa dang/ lha'i bu dang/ drag po dang/ dbang po dang/
nyi ma dang/ zla ba dang/ gzhon nu dang/ gshin rje dang/ chu lha dang/ lus ngan la sogs pa'i gozugs sna tshogs mthong bar 'gyur ro// klu'i rgyal po'i gzugs rnam pa sna tshogs kyi bar du
mthong bar 'gyur ro// ji lta ji ltar sems can rnams 'dul bar gyur pa de lta de lta bu'i gzugs mthong bar 'gyur te/ 'di ni 'jig rten pa'i bzlas brjod sgrub pa 'bum lags so// 'bum
bzlas pas 'a jig rten las 'das pa phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad na de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mngon sum du snang ba'ang mthong bar 'gyur ro// de bzhin gshegs pa thams
cad las lung bstan pa 'thob par 'gyur ro// byang chub kyi snying po la thug gi bar du phyir mi ldeg par byin gyi rlabs kyis byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur ro// phyag rgya bcings te skyil mo krung bcas
nas sems can thams cad la brtse ba dang/ 'byung po thams cad la byams pa dang/ snying rje ba'i sems kyi rang bzhin gyis don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po lan cig bzlas brjod bgyi'o//
bzlas brjod bgyis ma thag khonar lan drug brgya bzhi bcur bzlasabarjod bgyis par 'gyur ro// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dbugs 'byin par mdzad cing dran pa dang/ blo gros dang/
gzi brjid lus la 'jug par bgyid do// bzlas brjod bgyis ba tsam gyi mod la pha rol tu phyin pa drug yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// ri mo'i sku gzugs de la'ang 'od zer 'byung bar 'gyur
ro// 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug yongs su dag pa'i bdag nyid rmi lam du mthong ba re 'gyur ro// mchog thams cad stsol bar 'gyur ro// de'i las kyi sgrib pa thams cad yod+ma
su dag par 'gyur ro// sdig pa dang sgrib pa thams cad yongs su bsal ba dang btugs par 'gyur ro// nad thams cad sangs par 'gyur ro// 'jig rten pa'i dgos pa sgrub pa rnams kyi dam
pa thams cad 'grub par 'gyur bas sas rgyas rjes su dran pa bsgom par bgyi'o/ 'phags pa don yod pa'i zhags pa'i cho ga zhib mo'i rgyal po bam po gsum pa/
