thal mo lhan cig bsdams te sbyar la rtse mo yid tsam bkug ste khar gtad la/ srin lag gnyis phyir 'gyed cing gung mo pad+ma lta bur bgyis te sngags 'di brjod do// o tu ru tu ru pad+me a
ug/ mo g+ha sid d+hi hU~M/ phyag rgya 'din don yod grub// las rnams grub dang ldan pa yi// 'di ni bcing ba bgyis pa yis// kun rig myur du 'grub par 'gyur// myur du ston pa
stsol 'gyur te// rnyed dka' don yod grub pa mchog/ mchog kun rab tu stobs par 'gyur// 'jig rten 'das pa de bzhin 'jig rten pa// sgrib pa thams cad las ni rnam par grolo// bsod
nams phung bo dag ni rtag tu 'phel// bkra shis sbra ni 'byung bar 'gyur ba'o// lha rnams rtag tu srung bar 'gyur// rdo rje bcing ba shin tu bcing'// rtag tu sems ni brtan por bgyi// mthu

sgyu mo dag ni yid bskums nas// snying kha dag tu rab tu brkyang// don yod pa'i paNas pa'i dkyil 'khor phyag rgya dang// snying po gsungs pa dang/ pad+ma'i dbang phyug gi phyag rgya las dang don thams

cad grub pa'i gsang sngags de dag gsungs nas/ de nas don yod pa'i rgyal po gsungs pa/ oM a mo g+ha hri da ya/ pad+ma d+ha ra d+har pad+ma d+ha ra ma hA maN+Da la hrid yahU~M/ snying po phyag rgya 'di'i bcings
tsha ba yis// pad+ma 'chang ba'i don yod snying po yi// grub pa de nyid yang dag som nyi med// thams cad du ni las rnams thams cad dag/ de ni grub par 'gyur te som nyi mad// shin tu gsang ba'i
phyagargya gzung// shin tu gsang ba'i gsang sngags bzlas// shin tu bkrus pas gos gtsang bgo/ gtsang ma'i sems kyis 'chang bgyid cing// sems can kun la brtser gyur nas// rtag
du bla ma gus par sgom// rtag tu shin tu dang bgyi zhing// pad+ma'i phyag la dga' bar bgyi// myur du las 'grub myur du ni// pad+ma 'chang dang sangs rgyas 'thob// myur du 'jig rten dbang phyug
'thob// myur dusems can kun phan ldan// lag pa g.yon pa brkyang btsam gyi khar pad+ma'i tshul du bzhag la/ lag pa bsgyur nas mdzub mo gyen du sbyong/ mthe bong yid tsam ba bkug la lag
bgayas pa brkyang sta/ sor mo rnams pad+ma'i tshul du bzhag la mthe bong yid tsam bkug ste/ gung mo don yod pa'i zhags par bgyi ba ni don yod pa'i zhi ba'i cho ga chen po'i mig sems can thams cad
la byams pa'i soms dang/ snying rje'i bdag nyid can lags te/ gsang sngags 'di brjod do// o pa shu pa tipAsha d+ha ra sa ha sra ri bra ti maN Di ta ka ya/ A ka riTani/ sats+tshe da ni//

b+hu ru b+hu ru/ a mo g+ha pA sha sid d+hihU~M/ phyag rgya'adis gsang sngags lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas so// de nas don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po bzlas nas lag ba g.yas pa zhogs pa'i phyag rgya'i
tshul dugadegacing/ slar yang rang gi gnas bzung zhing gsang sngags lan bdun bzlas te lan bdun du'ang gdag go/ don yod rgyal bo bzlas pa ni// bsam pa mchog tu dag par bgyi// bzlas pa
tsam gyi mod la ni// don yod zhags pa'i phyag rgya yis// byang nub thams cad dgug pa dang// mod la sangs rgyas nyid du 'gyur// gzhan yang dgos ba sna tshogs dag/ ji ltar yid la bsamA
pa bzhin// mod la grub pa bla med dang// mod la thams cad dgug par 'gyur// lha dang klu dang gnod sbyin dang// dri za lha min nam mkha' lding// mi 'am ci dang lto 'a bya
cha/ rig sngags 'chang la blta ba'i phyir// thams cad de yi mod la 'du// phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas thams cad dag/ de nyid gzigs pas gzigs par 'gyur// rig sngags 'chang la blta
bgyi'i phyir// byang chub sems dpa' 'du bar 'gyur// mgon po 'phags pas na ras gzigs// mchog sbyin spyi bor phyag 'jog 'gyur// yongs su dag pa'i bdag nyid kyi// rang bzhin
bod la ston par mdzad// gang dag mnar med song ba dang// sems can mtshams mang lnga bgyid dang// gang dag 'phags la skur 'debs dang// gang dag dam chos spong ba dang// phyag
rgya 'di mthong 'dzin bcug dang// bcings pas mod la sdig pa kun// 'jig 'gyur mod la 'dren pa mthong// phyag rgya btsongs pa tsam gyis ni// ngagos pa thams cad 'grub par 'gyur//
phyag rgyu 'di ni mthong tsam dang// gsang sngags zlos par bgyid pa dang// rig sngags 'chang ba mthong ba de// 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbangan// mngon du mthong bar blta bar bya//
tshe rabs brgyud par bskal pa ni// brgya dang stong du bsags pa yi// sdig pa las kyi sgrib pa rnams// phyagargya bcings som mthong tsam gyis// de kun 'byang 'gyur som nyi med/
thal mo lhan cig dam du sbyar te/ mkhas pas pad+ma'i tshul du bgyis la mdzub mo nor bur bgyis te/ gung mo yid tsam zhig bkug pa ni yid bzhin gyi nor bu chen po'i rgyal mtshan gyi rtse mo ste/
lag paspyi bor brkyang nas spyi bor dbang bskur ba sol ba'i gsang sngags 'di brjod do// oM sa d+ha nu ga ta/ a b+hi piny+tsa tu sarba sa rgyu/ a b+hi leg # pad+mam Ni su paNaM/ a mo g+he sarba ta thA
ga ta/ a d+hipita hU~M/ 'dis dbang bskur ba tsam gyis rig sngags 'chang la de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis dbang bskur bar 'gyur ro// 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug
gi phyag gis dbang bskur bar 'gyur ro// rig sngags 'chang gi rgyal po chen por 'gyur ro// rig sngags 'chang thams cad 'grub par 'gyur ro// nyon mongs pa'i sgrib pa thams cad rnam par
dag par l gyur ro// 'jig rton thams cad kyi gtso bo gcig pu'i gnas su 'gyur ro// spyi gtsug rdo rje pad+ma bcing// rtag tu sor mo'i rtse mo brkyang// mdzubamo lcags kyu'i tshul du bgyi//
rang gi gdong gi khro gnyer bzhin// khro bo'i rgyal po'i phyag rgya che// las kun sgrub par bgyid pa yi// thams cad sgrub bgyid phyag rgya ste// kun sgrub dam pas gsang sngags pas// 'di dran grub
pa kun gyi mchog/ o kro d+ha rA dzA ma mahAa mo g+ha han ha na/ sarba duSh+Tha na hU~M/ phyagargya 'di dran tsam gyis kyang// mthu chen po yi gsang sngags kyis// gdug pa kun ni rnam 'jig ste// ri rab
kyang ni snyil bar bgyid// phyag rgya bcing bar bgyis pa yis// sdig pa thams cad 'jigapar bgyid// sems can gdug dang gdug pa'i klu// bgegs dang log 'dren
gdug pa ste// de dag thams cad zhi bar 'gyur// phyag rgya bcings pa tsam gyis ni// thams cad dbang du gyur nas mchis// lha dang mi dang dge sbyong dang// bram ze rgyal rigs dmags gang
lags// thams cad dbang du gyur nas ni// ma chis par 'gyur bas som nyi med// rgyud ni rtag tu ma nyag bzhag la// mthe bong mnyam du bte gnas ni// gungamo yis ni gung mo nyid// yid
sgyu tsam bkug nas bsgong bar bgyi// 'dan pad+ma chen po yi// lha mo sgrol ma'i phyag rgya ste/ grub pa bla na med pa yi// thams cad kyi ni dam pa lags// thal mo pad+ma'i tshul du sbyar// mthe bong
nyid ni brkyang bgyis le// mthe'u chung yid tsam bkug pan// dkar sham chen mo'i phyag rgya ste// 'di ni kun grub bla na med// rdo rje'i tshul du thal sbyar dam bcings shing// shes rab can gyis

g.yas pa'i lag bsgyur la// khro gnyer bzhir ni de bzhin khro ba dang// phyag rgya chen po kun 'dod rab tu sbyin// lag pa gnyis kyi thal sbyar brkyang nas ni// gsang ba de brkyang gung mo bskum nas su/
mthe'u chung brkyang nasaMlcags sgrog pad+ma yi// tshul du snying kha'i gnas su gzhag par bgyi// phyag rgya 'di ni phyag rgya che// phyag rgya 'di ni bcings pa yis// dkyil 'khor kun nas lha dag dang/
dkyil 'khor lha kun dga' bar 'gyur// thams cad tshogs shing 'du ba dang// kun gyis srung bgyid som nyid med// phyag rgya 'di nyid sshig nas lag pa ni// zla / smra'i tshul bzhin du
byas te// snying khar bzhag pa gnod sbyin pho nya mo// 'di ni phyag rgya lags par legs par bsgrags// dang po rdo rje khu tshur legs bcings la// gung mo lhag ma bskum zhingamathe bong gzhag/
pad+ma'i tshul gyi bzhin dramasgrolamadun gyis// grub pa kun gyi bla med phyag rgya 'di// sdig pa thams cad 'jig cing nyon mongs kun// nad kun 'u bar zhi bar som nyi med// don yod pa'i grub pa bla
med kyis// cho ga zhib mo thams cad rab tu 'grub// lag pa gnyis ni mnyam bzhag ste// rdo rje'i tshul du pad+ma bcing// mdzub mo bskum pa bgyis nas ni/ mthe bong yang ni dgug par bgyi//
'di ni rta mgrin phyag rgyas// cho ga zhib mo'i dam pa lags// pad+ma'i tshul du thal mo sbyar// mdzub mos 'khyud la gung mo ni// lcags kyu'i tshul du bsgreng bar bgyi// don [«]da zhags pa'i
phyag rgya 'di// rgya mtsho'i gling gi kha lta bur// rdo rje za ba nyid kyis gsungs// 'di na las kun bgyid pa po// grub pa kun gyi bla na med// phyag rgya 'di ni mdzub mo'i mthe bong nyid//
lcags sgrog lhag ma bskum nas pad+ma'i tshul// snying kha'i gnas su bzhag pa mgrin sngon gyi// 'di'i dogs med las kun phyag rgya lags// lag gnyis pad+ma'i khu tshur te// g.yas
g.yon du ni bzhag nas su// kun nas zhi ba'i bzhin du gzhag/ byams pa'i mig gnyis bgyis pa ni// zhal ni bcu gcig phyag rgya se// de bzhin kun gyis mi thub/
pa'o// mthe bong mnyam par mnyam bgyis la// sor mo'i rtsi mo bskums pa dang// mdzub mo gnyis ni pad+ma'i tshul// rig pa'i dbang phyug phyag rgya las// phyag rgya 'di nyid dbus suni/
'khor lo'i tshul du mdzub mo bskum// g.yon pa bskyang ba dbang chen gyi/ /phyag rgya 'byung po thams cad 'joms// lcags sgrog dam du bgyis nas ni// lag pa gnyis po brkyang nas kyang// snying
khar bzhag pa'i phyag rgya ste// 'din rgyun du gshin rje lags// lag pa g.yon pa bskyang nas su// sor mo bsgrang ba'i thon te dgug/ g.yas pa snying khar bzha gnas su// mthe bong dang ni mthe'u chung/
dgug lhag ma rnams ni brkyang bgyis te// 'di ni chu lha'i phyag rgya ste// klu kun dgug pa'i mchog lags so// lag pa gnyis n bsdams bgyis la// sor mo phyingag log tu sbrel// g.yA pa
dang ni g.yon pa dag/ snying kha'i gnas su bzhag bgyi ste// phyag rgya 'di ni lus ngan gyi// gnod sbyin thams cad skrag par bgyid// lag pa g.yas pa spyi bor yang// mthe bong mdzub mo dgug bgyis
la// lag pa g.yon pa brkyang nas su// mdzub mo rgyan du bsgreng ba ni// 'di ni tshangs pa'i phyag rgya ste// thams cad du ni las sgrub pa'o// phyag rgya 'di nyid g.yas pa yi// mthe'u chung sor
mo dgug bgyis te// drang srong tshogs kyi phyag rgya 'di// lha rnams kun gyis phyag bgyis pa'o// lag pa gnyis na dam bcings la// blta sdug 'khor lo'i phyag rgya so/ lha min thams cad
'gugs pa yi// khyag 'jug phyag rgya 'di zhes gsungs// g.yas pa ba dza purar bgyi// g.yon pa rtse gsum tshul du bgyi// mtha bong mthe'u chung bsam pa ni/ 'byung po thams cad skrag bgyi da
pa 'di ni drag po'i phyag rgyur gsungs// g.yas pa khu tshur bcings nas su// mjub mo brkyang nas g.yon pa ni// dkur brten khu tshur bcangs nas bzhag/ sor mo rnams ni brgya nga bar
bgyi// drag po rgyun tu lta bgyid pa// de bzhin lce yi ste dpon gyi// gzhon nu phyag rgya'od zhes gsungs// gyen du lag pa gnyis bsgrengs nas// sor mo gsum ni nga rkyang bgyi ti// mtha bod
mdzub mo bkug pa ni// 'od zer stong dag 'phro bgyid pa// 'di ni nyi ma'i phyag rgya la gas// phyag rgya 'di nyid sor mo gsum// bkug nas sor mo gnyis gnyis brkyang// skar ma'i tshogs kyi
mdzes gyur pa// 'di ni zla ba'i phyag rgyar gsungs// gsang sngags chen po phyag rgya 'di dag ni// las dang don kun grub pa sgrub par bgyid// sdig pa thams cad stong zhing nyon mongs kun//
nyams par bgyid cing sgrib pa thams cad 'byang// las kun zad par bgyid cing don yod pa'i// las grub don yod grub pa 'grub par 'gyur// o pad+matA ra tA ra ya pad+mab+hu dze hUM/ oM ma hApa=

@#// shI taM ge hu ru hu ru swAhA/ o bI ku Ti pad+me tu ra ta ra hU~M/ oM partsed+mapAtsA ra dwa si ni kuN+Da kuN+Da swAhA/ oM a mo g+ha pad+ma ba ra de sid d+hi sidats+tsaM tu hU~M/ oM sarba tAgA mi ni A

ma/ ro drani hU~M/ oM a mo g+ha ni tA re tAr ya pad+meb+hu dze hU~M/ oM daru ta ru la partse amo g+ha hUM/ oM baN ba mu khe na krin ta ya dut+tAn hU~M/ oM pad+monI la kaN+Di shwa ra/ b+hu ru b+hu ru hU~M/ oM somya

ba dane pra si da shAs ma ya hU~M/ o pad+mangashAri sA d+ha yahU~M/ oM a mo g+ha shA re hU~M/ oM sam ri ta re ta re hU~M/ o nAg panihU~M/ oM yakA d+hi pa ti mu ru mu ru hU~M/ oM a mo g+ho brah+ma ra ta hU~M/

o'i ra ba ra de a mo g+ha b+hu dzAhU~M/ o amo gru bat+tarA dza pad+manA b+he/ sa ras ra sa man b+hu dzaM swahA/ o ru dra ru Ti mi li mi la sAhA/ o shaka ti d+ha re a mo g+ha ba ti sAhA/ oM sa ha sra ki ra Na hUM
ru ti pAnA/ o so ma pra b+ho hU~M/ de bzhin phyag rgyagasang sngags gsungs pa yang// phyag rgya tha dad gsang sngags tha dad sbyab// gsang sngags 'chang gis ji skad gsungs pa'i las//
chu rtag tu kun gyis mdor na thams cad bgyid// gtsang ma spyod ma gtsang ma dag/ legasabakrus gtsang ma'i gos bgos nas// phrizhim dri yis dpung pa dang// lag pa yan lag byugs nas su//
phyag rgya lan re bcings pa na// gsangasags lan re bzlasaM par bgyi// phyag rgya dag ni bcangs pa dang// gsang sngags bzlas pa'i mod la ni// brgya stong phrag ni 'bum phrag 'bum//
phyag rgya dag ni bcings par 'gyur// phyag rgya bcings pa bgyis pa na bsod nams kyi phung po dang ldan par 'gyur ro// sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyis lung bstan
pa dang byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur ro/ lha thams cad kyis legs par bsus par 'gyur ro// 'jig rten thams cad kyi mchod gnas gcig pur 'gyur ro// 'jigarten thams cad kyi bla
ma gcig pur 'gyur ro// dkyilo 'khor gyi phyag rgya'i cho ga'i rim par phye ba dang dam tshig thamos cad la zhugs par 'gyur ro// tshe dpag tum mchis par 'gyur ro// don yod pa'i rig sngag/
grub par 'gyur ro// tshig btsan par 'gyur ro// dran pa dang blo gros bag tsha ba ma mchis par 'gyur ro// blo gros thogs pa ma mchis par 'gyur ro// 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang
phyug mchog sbyin rtag tu lta 'tshal bar 'gyur ro// rtag tu dam pa stsol bar 'gyur ro// rtag tu dgra dang/ pas kyi rgol ba dang/ mi mdza' ba dang/ gdug pa dang/ rab tu gdug pa
thams cad pham par bgyis par 'gyur ro// rtag tu thams cad du rgyal bar 'gyur ro// gnod sbyin dang/ srin po dang/ 'byung po dang/ sha za dang/ bgegs dang/ log 'dren dang/
lha ma yin dang/ klu thams cad mthong bar 'gyur ro// 'phags pa chen po thams cad 'bag tsha bo mamachis par 'gyur ro// rgyal po dang/ blon po dang/ btsun mo'i 'khor dang bcas
pa thams cad dbang du gyur nas mchis par 'gyur ro// thamasacad du gtso bo gcig pur 'gyur ro// thams cad du bla ma'i gnas gcig pur 'gyur ro// tshe ring bar 'gyur
ro// nad thams cad las thar bar 'gyur ro// skyon gyi dri ma dang/ sar sna dang/ phrag dog thams cad dang bral bar 'gyur ro// legs par dran zhing lus shin tu yo ris su dag par 'gyur ro//
'chi ba'i dus kyi mod la de bzhin gshegs pa mthong bar 'gyur ro// 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug mthong bar 'gyur zhing/ de dag thams cad kyis dbugs 'byin par 'gyur to/
rigs kyi bu khyod 'jig rten gyi khams bde bcan du song zhig cesangashin tu dran pa nye bar bzha gnas dus bgyid par 'gyur ro// dmyal ba'i sgo thams cad bcad par 'gyur ro// ngan song gi
'gro ba thams cad las yongs su grol bar 'gyur ro/ 'di nas ma'i mngal du skye bar mi 'gyur ro// skye ban rtag tu skye ba dran par 'gyur ro// thams cad du pad+ma la rdzus te skya bar 'gyur

ro// byang chub kyi snying po la thug gi bar du sangs rgyas kyi zhin gnas sangs rgyas kyi zhing du mchi bar 'gyur ro// de nas 'jig rten dbang phyug sprul pa yi// phyag rgya'i rtag ni rjod par bgyid// khru
gang kho na'i tshad dag gi/ dkyil 'khor lham gyis bri bar bgyi// gang zhig mthong ba'i mod tsam gyis// dga' ba dang ni mgu bar 'gyur// sdig pa kun las grol ba dang// de nyidadag
ni 'grub 'gyur ro// rgyun du gang gi go cha yis// rtag tu go cha bgos par 'gyur// goma'i go ni 'bar ba dang// mdzes pa rtag tu snyol bar 'gyur// cho ga zhib mo legs grub ste///
gsang sngags bla med thams cad 'grub// phyag rgya'i dkyil 'khor bris tsam gyis// gnod sbyin srin po 'khyer bar 'gyur// mthong ba tsam gyis don kun kyang// 'jig par 'gyur ti som
nyi mad// gnod pa kun las grol 'gyur te// nad kun las kyang de bzhinano// pha rol dpung ngam rang dpung ngam// mi thub pa yi dad+ma kun las// rtag tu legs par rgyal bar 'gyur//
rtag tu gdon las srung ba dang// dus kun tu yang 'grub par 'gyur// rig sngags 'chang yang bde ba'i phyir// de nyid dam pa 'grub 'gyur zhing// 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang
gis// phyag rgya'i mtshan ma mtshon ma dag/ dgos ba kun gyi rjes mthun par// gang dang gang du bkod pa dag/ de dang der ni phyag rgyar 'gyur// pad+makha bye zhes bgyi ba// pad+ma 'dab
mas mdzes pa dang// kun nas 'khor bar 'bur ba'i 'phrang// rnam par rtog pa med par bgyi// phyag rgya 'di kun srog las byung// 'di nas thams cad 'bras bu stsol// rdo rje rtse
gsum rdo rje'i mda'// dkyil 'khor pad+ma rdo rje dang// pad+ma'i 'phrang ba rdo lnga'i mtshan// pad+ma rab gnas pad+maganyis// rtag tu pa legs par bgyid// pad+ma'i khu tshur da bzhin du//
[z/ ]@#// pad+ma'i mdzub mo pad+ma bgyis// pad+ma'i lcags kyu'i thal mo sbyar// pad+ma'i lcags sgrog pad+ma'i gzab// rtag tu pad+ma sams pa dang// nor bu pad+ma rdo rjer gsus/
don yod pad+ma de bzhin du// pad+ma'i ral gri pats+tsha'i dril// rtsa gsum zhes bgyi gtun shing 'chang// nor bu dbyug pa me tog dbyug/ de bzhin zhags pa gtun shing dang// chu srin 'dzin dung
'khor lo phyid/ bi dzapA ra rtag tu sa'u 'bru/ zla 'dzin nyi ma 'dzin pa dang// thob 'dzan dang tshoms shing dang// me tog phur ma bgrang 'phrang dang// rdo rje rtse lnga don yon zhugs//
don yon grub pa de dag lta// thams cad pad+ma'i stang du dgod// lag pa'i phyag rgyu'adi bri ba// gang dang gang du dgod pa ni// lag pa'i phyag rgya bzhi bcu tham// 'di dag kyang ni bri
bar bgyi// kun nas kyang ni 'bar bar bgyi// nor bu'i rgyan gyis grub par bgyi// dkyil 'khor ldan pa'i ras sam ni// ra ba'am rtsig par bgyis pa 'am// ci yang rung ba de dag ste//
de dag mthong ba tsam gyis sam// mthong ba tsam gyi mod la ni// rtag tu sdig pa thams cad stong// mnar mang gnas su gtogs pa dang// mtshams med pa ni lnga nyid de// thams cad skad cig
tsam gyis 'byang// sems can dag pa dran bgyid na// phyir mi ldog pa nyid du 'gyur// sems dpa'i sa bcu rob tu gnas// 'di ni phyir mi ldog pa'i gnas// gangalags dkyil 'khor mthong
ba ni// spyan ras gzigs dbanga mchog sbyin ni// rgyun du spyi bo lag na thogs// gang gis phyag rgya 'di mthong ba// rgyun du mchog sprin 'jig rten dbang// rtag tu mngon sum mthong ba yi// de/
dang mtshungs te khyad par 'phags// gsang sngags sum cu rtsa lnga'i tshig/ rtag tudran bgyid thams cad 'grub// deni dus rnams kun tu yang// ngan 'gror mchi bar mi 'gyur ro// rnam grol
dkyil 'khor rab myur bar// myur du sangs rgyas nyid thob 'gyur/ 'od dpag med kyi sras po yi// thu bor gyur bar som nyimad// 'jig rten mgon gyi thugs zhal nas// skyes sras rtag tu
thu bor 'gyur// 'dren pas 'di ni chos nyid dang// chos las skyes par lung ston 'gyur// gang+gA'i klungs ya bye ba brgya stong dang mnyam pa'i byamasnyad kyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang
dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams la dag ba'i rtsa ba bskyed par 'gyur ro// tshad med grangs med dpag tu med pa'i bsod nams kyi phung po 'thob par 'gyur ro// gang gi sug par phyag rgya dang
gsang sngags kyi tshig 'di mchos par gyur na/ phyag rgya 'di las 'di lta bu'i phan yon mang zhingache ba mchis par bsgrags so// de la gsang sngags ni/ oM a mo g+hamaM dza li mi li mi li tsi li hUM/

o ang+gashAs yaDa Nabi ga te hU~M/ oM a b+ha ya bar de Ni hU~M/ oM sarba ta thA ga ta/ a d+hiT+ThitaM/ d+hi'i d+hi ri hU~M/ oM pad+mahrid pa mut+tihU~M/ o b+hi sar b+has ra sarAmA lAn ta rA dza ya/ tsho
badzral+la hu ru hu ru hU~M/ oM aM ku sha A mo g+ha A kar yahU~M/ oM ka ba tsa ya tu ru tu ru hU~M/ oM a mo g+ha shI ka li mi li hU~M/ oM a mo g+hatsin tAm Ni tu ti tu ri hU~M/ oM

a mo g+ham Nitsal tsi li hUM/ oM badzra tu Tatsal hU~M/ o a mo g+ha hrad yatsa ra tsa ra shud+d+hA satAhU~M/ o gru ba ba ti tsi tsiTish+tsa/ oM bdu khad gtsin tu yasha tun hU~M/ o tri ma la parishud+d+hab+hi Ti b+hi

TihU~M/ o su ru su ru hU~M/ oM ma Nim Ni hUM/ oM pul+lab ti dza yahU~M/ oM bo d+hi tsit+ta pAsho d+ha ra d+hi ra hU~M/ oM pad+mapAsha bi shud d+hihU~M/ oM badzra pAhe b+ha ba tu mu ru mu ru hU~M o tsa ma Ni pusha bar de

hUM/ oM tsakra pA sha sAnor g+ha ta ka d+hu ru d+hu ra hU~M/ o ti[–]shu lI pA sha ba lo ka tA ra ya hU~M/ onA ga pAsha b+han ng+ha ya kan+d+ra ya duT+Tan gan pA sho pA ta ya hUM/ o dza khrod b+ha bo d+ha rA ya hU~M/ o tsan bi ma le/

bo sho d+ha ya an d+ha kAr ra ba re hU~M/ o shi bo d+ha ya hU~M/ o bi dza ya pU cha ba rehUM/ oM pa lod b+ha ba tu ri hU~M/ o pANim u0f97le dza yahU~M/ oM sa ha sra ri ki ra Na hU~M/ oM sarba duShAn pra

ra shAsA ya hU~M/ oM ma Na bi sho d+ha ya mA lA bi ma le hU~M/ oM pu ba tisu g+ha d+ha ba re hU~M/ oM pAsha sa ha sra gu Ni te klu Na Da Na hU~M/ oM brjod kyi pa su tsa mu latsiTi tsi Tish+tsa/ oM a mo g+ha a pra ti ha

ta pA sha ha stahU~M/ oM sarba tra a mo g+ha sid+ma sid+d+hasA d+ha yo hU~M/ lag pa'i phyag rgya 'di dag dang// de bzhin gsang sngags phyag rgya dag/ lan gcig bzlas pa tsam dang ni// phyag rgya mthong ba kho nas
kyang// sdig pa thams cad mod la 'joms// myur du sangs rgyas nyid thob 'gyur// cho ga zhib mo myur du 'grub// don yod zhags pa rnam grol ba'i// dkyil 'khor dam pa 'grub par
'gyur// de la mtshon cha'i phyag rgya ni nor bu rin po che dang/ ma tog dang/ pad+madang/ ril ba spyi blugs dang/ nor bu'i 'phreng ba dang/ bgrang 'phreng dang/ dung dang/ 'khor lo dang/ dbyug
to dpa// mdung thung dang/ rdo rje dang/ rtse gsum dang/ rtse gsum kha gdengs dang/ mtshon shag ti dang/ rdo rje dang/ dgra sta dang/ rtsa gsum pa gnyis dang/ nor bu dang/ rdo rje dang/
mtshonashuli dang/ las kyi rdo rje dang/ yid bzhin nor bu dang/ mtshon cha dang/ ba rtson dang/ dbyug pa dang/ dbang phyug chen po' rtsa gsum dang/ ral gri dang/ zhagos pa dang//
lcags kyu dang/ sbrul dang/ ljon shing dang/ byu ru dang/ dgra sta dang/ 'khor lo dang/ ragra sta yu ba sbom po can dang/ lag pa dang/ gtsug phud dang/ nor bu sgronam dang/ 'od dang
'od zer dang/ gtun shing dang/ 'phyang mo nyug pa dang/ dgra sta dang/ snod zlum po dang/ bum pa dang/ brag dang/ ri dang/ lhun po dang/ sbrul 'khyil ba dang/ gdugs dang/
rgyal mtshan dang/ chu srin dang/ nya dang/ rus sbal dang/ g.yung drung 'khyilaM ba dang/ rig sngags kyi dkyil 'khor dang/ rig sngags dang/ phyag rgya dang/ rtse gsum dang/
dkyil 'khor dang/ ral gri dang/ gri dang/ pad+ma'i 'phreng ba dang/ rtse gsum dang/ mu sund dang/ mtshon rtsa gcig pa dang/ phyag rgya bzhi dang/ mche ba
bzhi dang/ zlum po dang/ dung dang/ 'khor lo dang/ rdo rje dang/ rtsa gsum dang/ dung dang/ nor bu'i dung dang/ pad+ma'i dung dang/ urda dang/ gos dang/ sangaga'i gdong dang//
shang shang te'u dang/ ka la ping ka dang/ ngang pa dang/ bzhad dang/ khrung khrung dang/ rma bya dang/ gshin rje'i dbyug pa dang/ gdong bzhi pa dang/ dkyil 'khor bzhi dang/ rtso
gsum dang/ bum pa gang ba dang/ zla ba phyed dang/ nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor dang/ zla ba'i 'od dang/ pad+mabazhi dang/ pad+ma gsum dang/ rgya mtsho dang/ me tog dang/ phur ma dang/
glegs bam dang/ ri dgas kyi g.yang gzhi dang/ rdo rje dang/ lcags sgrog dang/ rdo rje lcags sgrog dang/ rta babs dang/ lhung bzed dang/ chos gos dang/ 'khar gsil dang//
mchu so mangs dang/ kha khyer dang/ ska rags dang/ gtsug phud dang/ mchod phyir thogs dang/ 'phreng ba chen po dang/ gru gsum dang/ kun nas rdo rje sde dang/ phyagargya mtshonacha 'di dag ni//
'jig rten 'dren pas bdasungs pa bzhin// rnam grol dkyil 'khor gsangab 'di// don yod zhags pa'i tshe gar dran// ras sam gos sam rtsig pa 'am/ ci yang rung bar 'dri bgyid pa//
dogs mad legs gsal legs 'byor pas// mtshon gas kacha ma yal ga'/phyug klu kun nas 'bar bar bgyi// thams cad srog las byung bas// don dang las rnams kun
stsol cing// phyag rgya mod la sdig pa 'phrog/ de ni mod la 'bras bu ster// 'dren pa 'jig rten dbang phyug kun// phyag rgya 'di ni byin gyi brlabs// sangs rgyas kun dang shAkya yi//
rgyal po de bzhin gshegs pas brlabs// de lta bas na mkhas pa su// rtag tu kun nas mtshon bcangosan// sas rgyas rnams ni dgyes 'gyur te// sras kyi thu bor som nyi med//
phyag rgya rim phyid dam pa dmar ba dang/ 2jig[we wi' ''g]/ [']gyur/ don yod zhags pa'i snying po gsang ba yi// rnam par grol pa'i snying po bla na med// phyag rgyudang
na gsang sngags dam pa dag// 'di na nga la la skyur/ pa 'gyur// de nas don yodapa las thams cad pa dang rjes su mthun pa'i zhags pa bdun bshad par bgyi ste/ de nyid 'grub
pas ji lta bu'i// cho ga'i cho ga sgrub pa bzhin/ so so so sor 'tsham pa yi// de dag kun n rtogs par bgyi// de nyid grub pa'i ji lta bu'i// mtshan nyid gzugasani dzibazhin pa// de
argakha che
u// dar dag gis/ skud pa shun pa'i skud pa ste// skud pa 'di dag bkal nas de na nyid kyi cho ga dang/ rtog zhib mo sgrub pas zhags pas ras skud kyi rgyu las langs te/ tshad
bzhin pakalenas rtag tu sbyang ba bgyis lo legs par bkrus pa gos gtsang ma can tshangs pa' sprod pas zas dkar gsum 'tshal nas/ gnas gtsang ma'i phyogs su don yod pa'i zhags
pa'i snying bomador na byams pa'i sems dang ldan pas dran par bgyi'o// de nas shin tu mnyam par bzhags pas brgyud sgril du bkal te/ don yod rgyal po thal mo sbyar bas par kha phye
ba thogs pa/ ral pa'i thor tshugs kyis bzhugs pa/ rgyan thams cad kyis klubs pa'i lus phyed pa sor bzhi pa'i tshad du bgyi'o// bgyis nas gzugs rnam pa gsum du bgyis
te/ das pa'i gzugs dang/ khro gnyer gyi bzhin dang/ khro bo'i rgyal po'agazugs te/ dal lam gsar las bgyi'o// de nas zhags pa srid kyi tshod khru bcu drug pa zhags pa'i thon
to gcig rdo rje rtse gsum pa dang/ skya ru ra lhan cig sbrel ba gdags par bgyi'o// de nas rig sngags 'chang gis yar gyi ngo'i tshes bco lnga 'am/ tshes brgyadal legs par bkrus
te/ gos gtsang ma bgos nas zhago gcig mchis paskyil mo krung bcas nas/ sangs rgyas la mchod pa rnam pa sna tshogs bgyis te/ tshig gzhan mi sna bar zhags pa la lan stong
rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod bgyi'o// de nas stong rtsa brgyad tshang ba dang/ stan bzang po bshams nas de'i steng du zhags pa gzhag par bgyi'o// don yod pa'i zhags pa'i phyag rgyas dbang
bskur bar bgyi'o// ma tog dang/ bdug pa dang/ dri dang/ 'phreng ba dang/ byug pa dang/ phyam dang/ ba dan bzang po la sogs pas mchod par bgyi'o// a ka ru dang/ tsan
dan dang/ du ru ka'i bdug pa dbul bar bgyi'o// mar me'ang dbul bar bgyi'o// de nas rig sngags 'chang gis yungs kar la lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas brjod bgyis te zhags pa'i
steng du gtor bar bgyi'o// 'phangs pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi ri mo'i gzugs la'ang ci 'byor pas mchod par bgyi'o// de nas rig sngags 'chang gis zhags pa
de'i mdun du skyil mo krung bcas te/ ma u0f8bkhrug pas gdugs rtsa ba'i bar du mchod pa bgyis nas bzlas brjod bgyi'o// yus kar re re la bzlas brjod re re bgyis te zhags pa'i
steng du gtor zhing/ stong rtsa brgyad tshang gi bar du gdugs re re mchis par bgyi// rje cu klogs pas gdugs rtsa'i bar du bzlas brjod bgyi'o// mchod par bgyi'o// kha zas ngan pa
srang bar bgyi'o// lhag ma dang sbrags pa snang bar bgyi'o// gos gtsang ma bgo bar bgyi'o// stong rtsa brgyad tshang nas zhags pa 'bar bar 'gyur te/ gal te 'jig rten pa'i grub na ni ma'i
kha dog tu 'bar bar 'gyur ro// gal te 'jig rten las 'das pa'i grub na ni kha dog sna tshogs 'bar bar 'gyur ro// don yod pa'i lus de'ang 'bar bar 'gyur ro// sgra
'byung bar 'gyur te/ rig sngags 'chang legs so legs so// khyod kyis 'jig rten las 'das pa'i byang chub kyi sems kyi zhags pa 'di grub kyis/ khyod kyis byang chub kyi sems bla na med/
pa khug cig/ pha rol tu phyin pa drug dang pha rol tu phyin pa bcu'i khongs su gtogs pa yongs su rdzogs par bgyis shig/ 'on te 'jig rten pa'i sgrub na ni yid bzhin gyi nor bus bsams ji lta ba/
bzhin du yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// ji ltar yid la bsams shing ston pa bzhin lag pas 'phangs na gsang sngags kyis thams cad sgrub par bgyid do/ thams cad bkug par 'gyur
ro// phyogs gang dang gang du 'phangs pa de legs su don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po lan bdun bzlas par bgyis te/ mod la bsams pa thams cad 'grub par 'gyura'o// gal te mtshams med pa lnga
skabagyis pa 'am/ mnar med par mchib zhig na'ang de'i legs par 'grub par 'gyur te/ de la yid gnyis dang som nyi bskyod par mi bgyi'o// khro gnyer gyi bzhin gyis gang du 'phangs na lha dang//
klu dang/ gnod sbyin dang/ dri za dang/ lha ma yin dang/ nam mkha' lding dang/ mi 'amaci dang/ lto 'phye chen po dang/ mi dang/ mi ma yin pa rnams bku gnas rig sngags 'chang gi mdun du
mchi bar 'gyur zhing/ ji srid 'tsho'i bar du bran bzhin du mchis par 'gyur ro// rgyal po dang/ blon po dang/ btsun mo' 'khor thams cad mchis par 'gyur ro// 'jig rten thams cad kyis
cher mchod par 'gyur ro// gang gi don du zhags pa 'phangs pa'i don du 'grub par 'gyur ro// khro bo'i rgyal po'i zhags pa la khro bo 'a rgyal po lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas brjod bgyis nas la yang
bar bgyi'o// 'phangs pa tsam gyi mod la bgags dang/ log 'dren dang/ gdug pa'i sems can thams cad zhags pas bcings par 'gyur ro// gal te 'tshel na lo 'am/ lo brgya
'am/ stong ngam/ bskal pa brgya stong gi bar du zhags pas bcings par 'gyur ro// nam byam pa dang snying rje bskyed nas de'i tshe don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po lan gsum bzlas nas
phyir dkrol bar 'gyur ro// dpung gi nang du 'phangs na dpung rnams zhags pas bcings par 'gyur ro// g.yul 'gyod pa'i dbus su 'phangs na mtshon dang/ go mtshon dang/ gzhu dang//
mda' dang/ mdung dang/ ral gri dang/ gtun shing dang/ mu sun di dang/ 'khor lo dang/ thag mdung dang/ mtshon cha thams cad dang/ go cha dang/ ya lad thams cad zhags pas
bcings par 'gyur ro// chab dang yungs kar la lan bdun bzlas brjod bgyis te gtor na grol bar 'gyur ro// zhags pa la gdugs gcig bzhin ci 'byor pas mchod nga ra bgyi'o// gang
@#// gi don du bsams pa de thams cad [”]'grub par 'gyur ro// don yod pa'i zhags pa sgrub pa'i cho ga'o/ kA'on te mi snang ba sgrub par 'tshal na/ don yod
pa'i zhags pa'i phyag rgya lag pas bcings te/ g.yas pa dang g.yon pas gong du ji skad gsungs pa bzhin zhags pa bzung nas don yod pa'i zhags pa'i sing po lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod
bgyis na mi gda' bar 'gyur ro// brgyartsa brgyad lan gnyis bzlas brjod bgyis na nam mkha' lamachis bar 'gyur ro// don yod pa'i rig sngags 'chang gi 'khor los sgyur bar 'gyur ro//
rig sngags 'chang brgya stong phrag 'bum gyis yongs su bskor bar 'gyur ro// lo bya ba bcur 'tsho bar 'gyur ro// skya cung zad 'khyil bar 'gyur ro// stobs dang brtson 'grus pha rol gyis
zil gyis mi non par thogs pa med par 'gyur ro// mar pa 'tshal bsamachod pa bgyisan jatsam gsol ba btab pa bzhin 'bab par 'gyur ro// ha car chab ces pa dgag pa'i slad du mchod pa
bgyisan charapa bkag par 'gyur ro// yams kyi nad dang/ gnod pa dang/ 'tsho ba dang/ 'khrugs pa thams cad dang/ ma sa thams cad rab tu zhi bar 'tshalags// rig sngags 'chang legs
bar khrus bgyis pa gtsang mas gos gtsang ma bgos la/ lag pas zhags pa blangs te gnas mthon por 'dzegs nas/ don yod pa'i zhags pa'i phyag rgya dang zhags pa bcings te/ don yod/
0 ba'i zhags pa'i snying po phyogs bzhi lan bdun bzlas nas zhags pa 'phangasan de dag thams cad dran ba tsam gyis 'thab pa dang/ rtsod pa dang/ 'gyed pa dang/ rang gi dpung dang/ gzhan gyi
dpung thams cad dang/ phas kyi rgol ba dang/ mi mdza' ba thams cad rab tu zhi bar 'gyur ro// 'jigs pa dang/ yams kyi nad dang/ gnod pa thams cad dang/ mi sa chen po dang/ mu ge'i
dgon pa'i 'jigs pa thams cad rab tu zhi bar 'gyur ro// ha cang char cho pa dang/ dus ma lags pa'i char dang/ grang ba dang/ rlung dang/ tshe ba mi bzad pa'i 'jigs pa thams cad rab tu zhi
bar 'gyur ro// dpag tshad brgya stong khor yug tu mtshams chen po bcings ba bgyis par 'gyur ro// ji lta ji ltar yid la bsams pa de lta de ltar thams cad 'grub par 'gyur bas/
don yod rgyal po mchod par bgyi zhing bzlas brjod bgyi/ gsol bar yang bgyi'o// mchod pa dang gsol ba bgyis patsam gyi mod la thams cad phun sum tshogs par 'gyur to/ de la yid
gnyis dang som nyi bskyod par mi bgyi'o// cho ga zhib mo las ji skad gsungs pa bzhin las bgyid pa rnams kyi cho ga de bzhin du bsgrub par bgyi'o// de nas skad cig de'i mod la thams cad 'grub
par 'gyur ro// byams pa dang/ snying rje dang/ dga' ba dang/ btang snyoms bsgom par bgyi'o// sems can thams cad la mchog tu partse bar bgyi'o// 'phags pa spyan ras
gzigs dbang thug la mchod par bgyi'o// dkon mchog gsum la gus par bgyi'o// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la gus pa dang/ bla mar yid la bsgom
par bgyi'o// mi gtsang ba spyod pa gtsang bar bgyi zhing yongs su dag pa'i ngang tshul can du bsgom par bgyi'o// don yod pa'i zhags pa de kho na nyid kyi cho ga sgrub pa yid bzhin gyi nor bu
byang chub dgug bar bgyi'o// donas zhags pa'i 'khor lo'i rtog sgrub pa bshad par bgya ste/ rigasngags 'chang de kho na nyid sgrub pas phug tu'ajug pa'i sgrub pa thams cad kyi mchog phug
tu 'jug ba dang/ lha ma yin gyi gnas su 'jug pa dang/ mi 'am ci'i gnas su 'jug pa dang/ dri za'i gnas su 'jug pa dang/ lha'i gnas su 'jugos pa dang/ nam mkha'al
rgyub dang/ sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i gnas su 'jug pa dang/ 'og min gyi gnas kyi bar du 'jug pa dang/ klu'i rgyal bo'i gnas su 'jug pa dang/ thang la rgyu ba dang/ nyi ma'i gnas su
'jug pa dang/ zla ba'i gnas su 'jug pa dang/ skar ma'i gnas su 'jug pa dang/ rgyu skar gyi gnas su 'jug pa dang/ nags su 'jug pa dang/ ri la rgyu ba dang/ 'bab chu chon po
'jug pa ste/ jilta ji ltar yid la bsams pa de lta de ltar 'jig rten pa dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i zhags pa'i cho ga sgrub pa tshogs chung ngu dang/ brtsol ba chung ngus 'grub par 'gyur te/
de la yid gnyis dang som nyi bskyod par mi bya'o// rig sngags 'chang gtsang mar gyur pa legs par khrus bgyis te/ gos gtsang ma bgos nas zas dkar gsum 'tshal la/ gtsang
ma de khon nyid la gus pas sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa bsgom par bgyi'o// byams pa'i sems la mnyam par bzhag nas snying rje'i bsam pa dag pa'i yid kyis tshes bcu gsum nas
brtsams te/ zla ba nya ba'i bar du gsal ba shin tubakra shis pa la dus gsum du ci 'byor pa'i rnam pa rnams kyis mchod par bgyis la/ rtag tu brgya rtsa brgyad pa yi// dus gsum
rgyun du bzlas brjod bgyi// nyin par dus gsum lan gsum ste// mtshan mo'i dus su lan gsum bgyi// 'khor lo zhags pa bla med 'di// rgyud pa gsum las bsgrub bgyi ste//
ris skud pad+ma'i skud pa dang// ang+ga'i skud pa sum 'gyur du// de ni legs par tshad bzhin du/ khruni sumacu rtsa drug bgyi// 'khor lo rnam pa las ni bgyi// rgyar ni sor bzhi'i tshod lags
te/ snying por bcas shing mu khyud bcas// kun nas rtsibs dang ldan pa dang/ gser dang dngul dang zangs las bgyi// chos bstan legs par brgyan pa yi// bzang po'i stan la gzhag
par bgyi// sos kyi dkyil 'khor ma tog gi/ sil ma bkram nas bum pa dgod// de bzhin mchod yon snod kyang bsham// ri mo'i gzugs kyi mngon du phyogs par bzhag ste chos kyi
stan bsham par bgyis pa'i steng du 'khor lo'i zhags pa bzhag ste mchod pa bgyis la/ bsams pa ji lta ba bzhin du dus gsum du lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod
bgyi'o// de nas tshes bco lnga'i zla ba lta la nyin zhag gcig machis par gyur pas tshig gzhan mi sla bar 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi ri mo'i gzugs la mchod par bgyi zhing
gdug pa rnam pa gsum po a ka ru dang/ tsan dan dang/ gu gul rnams dbul bar bgyi'o// rimo'i gzugs kyimadunan chos kyi stan mchis pa la mngon du phyogs te mchis nas don
yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po stong rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod bgyis/ yungs kar ra ra la bzlas brjod bgyis pas na
'bar zhing 'khor lo nam mkha' la mchis nas 'bar zhing lding bar 'gyur ro// rig sngags 'chang gi lus kyi stong dang spyi bo nas 'od zer 'byung bar 'gyur ro// ri mo'i gzugs las legrwa

kan lta cang rgyu bzlas brjod bgyis to/ yungs kar ro ro la bzlas brjod bgyis pas zhags pa'i stong du gtor bar bgyi'o/so zhes bya ba'i sgra 'byin par 'gyur ro// de nas rigasngags 'chang gis don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po 'khor 'a zhags pa'i cho ga rgya chen po 'di 'grub par 'tshal bar bgyi'o// de nas rig
sngags 'chang gis mchod pa chen po bgyis la/ don yod khro ba'i rgyal po lan stong rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod bgyi ste/ de'i 'og tu rig sngags 'chang gis zhags pa blang bar bgyi'o// lag pa
bas g.yon pa 'khor lo'i phyag rgya'i tshul du bcang bar bgyi zhing/ g.yas pa zhags pa'i phyag rgya dang 'khor lo'i tshul la brten nas blangs te/ don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po brjod nas phyogs
bzhir 'phang bar bgyi'o// de nas phyogs bcur khro bo'i rgyal po lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas brjod bgyi'o// de nas bdag nyid kyi lus la dbang bskur ba'i tshul du lan bdun phubaskur bar bgyi'o/
de nas phyag rgyu'i tshul du bskor ba tsam gyi mod la rig sngags 'chang 'khor 'khos sbyar ba'i dbang bskur bar 'gyur ro// dam pa chen po 'grub par 'gyur ro// 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po chen po
lags mthong rang gi gzugs kyisamadunan mchis nas/ rig sngags 'chang gi rkang pa spyi bos blangs nas 'di skad ces kyang skyabar 'gyur te/ rig sngags 'chang gis ci bka' sU la pa de bgyi'o zhes

cibasgo ba'i don de dang de thams cad bgyid par 'gyur ro/ bran gyi rang bzhin gyis thams cad du las bgyidapar 'gyur ro// de nas rig sngags 'chang gang gi tsha gnas su 'jug par 'tshal bas/ 'di ltar nub/
gsum du mchis par gyur pasazhags ba'i phyag rgya lag pas blang bar bgyi'o// phug gi sgo gang lags pa dar zhags pa lan gsum du bskor bar bgyi'o// don yod pa'i rgyal bo bzlas brjod bgyis te/
zhags pa gdab par bgyi'o// zhags ba btab pa tsam gyi mod la gnas kyi phug gi sgo thams cad bya bar 'gyur ro// 'khrul 'khor dang/ gtan pa dang/ phug dang/ 'bab chu chen po dang/ brtsegs ma dang
'bab chu dang/ gnod sbyin dang/ srin po dang/ lam mi bde ba thams cad bsal ba dang/ bcom pa dang/ bshig par 'gyur ro// gtan pa dang/ sgo glegs dang/ 'khrul
'khor dang/ lcag sgrog rnams dum bu dum bur mdacing rgyas par 'gyur/ nyams par 'gyur// 'jig par 'gyur ro// shin tu dag pa dang/ shin tu drim mad pa dang/ shin tu rgya che ba'i gzhal

mad khang 'byor pa rnam par 'phrul pa dag mthong bar 'gyur ro// rin pocha sna tshogs kyis bkra ba/ rin po che sna bdun gyis brgyan pa'i gnas/ rin po che sna tshogs kyi lcen shing gis brgyan pa'i gzhal

med khang mthong bar 'gyur ro// me tog sna tshogs kyi rab shin tu dri zhim pa'i gzhal med khang mthong bar 'gyur ro// de nas rig sngags 'chang gis lag pa'i zhags pa dang/ 'khor lo'i phyag rgya'i tshul
mngon sum du bgyis nas don yo da nga 'i zhags pa'i snying po bzlas te 'jug par bgyi'o// rig sngags 'chang gnas su zhugs pa tsam kho nas gnas mchog de'ang rnam pa drug du 'gul ba dang/ g.yo
bdang/ ldag pa dang/ 'ur 'ur chem chem ste/ lha'i 'od zer gyi snang ba chen pos snang bar 'gyur ro// de nas rig sngags 'chang 'jug par bgyi'o// de nas don yod pa rnam par dag pa dri ma med zhes
bgyi ba'i sman bud mad kyi gzugs lha'i rgyan gyis brgyan pa/ lha'i gos kyi rgyan gyis klubs pa// kha dog bzang po rgyas pa mchog dang ldan pa// lha'i gzugs chen po 'chang ba bi dza pur thogs pa mami
[/ ]bar 'gyur ro// snyan bud med kyi gzugs 'chang ba de mthong ba tsam kho nas dpagatshad gang tsam nas gzi brjid thams cad dang/ stobs thams cad nye bar sgrung bar bgyid do// de nas log 'gas/
'chang gis don yod pa'i 'khor le'i zhags pa mdun du bcing bar bgyi ste/ mthong ba tsam gyi mod la de'i stobs dang/ brtson 'grus dang/ gzi brjid nyams por 'gyur ro// mthu chung bar 'gyur
ro// de nas bud med de dgod pa dang/ oM zhes bgyi bas mnan par bgyi'o// khro bo'i rgyal po bzlas pa [“] bgyi// kha sbyab tu 'gyelanas chab 'byung bar 'gyur te/ chab de la reg par mi bgyi'o//
don yod rgyal po bzlas par bgyis/ de nas mig tshugs kyis lta bar bgyid na rig sngags 'chang gis zhags pas gzhu bar bgyi'o// de'i 'og tu bdud rtsi'i chab 'byung ste/ blang bar bgyi/
byug par bgyi'o// kun tu zug pa tsam gyis nam mkha' lamachi bar 'gyur te/ thog mar rlung gi phung po nas 'jog par 'gyur ro// mig la byugs nas phyogs bcu thams cad du gtogs pa'i da
bzhin gshegs pa byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs kyi 'khor dang bcas pa thams cad dang/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing de'i gzhal med khang dang/ gnas kyi rnam par 'phrul pa dang/ gang dag bzhugs shing
bzhes la 'tsho ba dag ji ltar lag mthil na mchis pa de bzhin du mthong bar 'gyur ro// gang dag yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa dang/ gang dag 'das pa dang/ gang dag ma byon pa dang/ gang dag da
ltar byung ba dang/ sangs rgyas pa rnams dang/ gang dag ring bsrel snying po'i mchod rtan chen po'i srog shing gi tshogs can dag dang/ de bzhin du ji ltar 'khor gyi dkyil
'khor gyi khang pa de dag thams cad mthong bar 'gyur ro// bdag nyid la kun nas byugs te/ des byugs pa tsam gyis pags pa'i mdog lha'i gsar dang 'dra bar 'gyur ro// sgra sogs la cung zad
'khyil bar 'gyur ro// mig lha'i ut+pal sngon po mchog 'dra bar 'gyur ro// tshelha'i bskal pa brgya stong du 'gyur ro// rig sngags 'chang gi 'khor los sgyur ba 'bum phrag brgya stong phrag bco/

brgyad kyis yongs su bskor par 'gyur ro// lha'i bu mo brgya bzhi bcu dang/ mi 'amapa'i bu mo dang/ rig sngags 'chang gi bu mo gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma brgya stong phrag 'obum snyad kyis yongasasu bskor bar
'gyur ro// ji ltar yid la bsams pa dang/ yid la brnags pa tsam gyis lha'i zas kyi mchog ro brgya dang ldan pa dag mdun du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// lha'i btung bachen bo bdud rtsi'i ro bro ba dag/
'byung bar 'gyur ro// byang chub kyi snying po la thug gi bar du 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po chen po legs mthong madunanas rgyug par bgyod do/ dgra thams cad dang/ bgegs dang/ log 'dren thams
cad bcom pa dang/ nyams ba dang/ gtugs pa dang/ gshags pa dang/ brtsal ba dang/ rgyas pa dang/ phyamar bgyis par 'gyur ro// yang na snyan gyi bud med de'i sku kun bton te ska rags su
bgyis nas bcad bar bgyi'o// gang du bcings pa de'ang rin po che sna bdun du 'gyur ro// gang du bzhugs pa thams cad mi snang bar 'gyur ro// de la lha thamasacad gnas 'cha' bar 'gyur
ra kru thams cad dang/ lha ma yin thams cad dang/ mi 'am ci thams cad dang/ rig sngags 'chang thams cad de'i dbang du mchis par 'gyur ro// 'khor de thams cad byang chub kyi snying po/
la thug gi bar du de'i phyi bzhin du rjes su 'brang bar 'gyura'o// de nas rigasngags 'chang gnas su 'jug par 'tshal zhing/ slar yang ldog par 'tshal nasman gyi bud med de dang gtam mi bgyi/
reg par mi bgyi bar lag pa zhags pa'i phyag rgyas gnas mchog tu 'jug par bgyi'o// de nas gnas thams cad na gnas pa'i bud mad dang/ skyes pa dang/ khye'u dang/ bu mo thams
cad phyir byung nas mdunan sdod par 'gyur to/ kha gcig gi 'dug na ni bum pa gang ba'o// kha cig gi lag na gdugs so// kha cig gi lag nani lha'i gos thogs so// kha cig niwAre
nor bu rin po che thogs so// kha cig ni dri dag go/ kha cig ni me tog dag go/ kha cig ni 'phrang ba dag go/ kha cig nirgyun dang lhab lhub sna tshogs thogs so// kha cig ni byug pa dag go/
kha cig ni dri'i phyi ma dag go/ kha cig ni sos nu'i rin po che sna bdun gyi snod bkang ba dag go/ kha cigani lha'i 'bras bu sna tshogs pa dag go/ kha cig ni lha'i ma tog sna tshogs thogs te/
pad+madung/ ku mu da dang/ pad+ma dkar bo dang/ man da ra ba dang/ man da ra ba chen po dang/ many+tsa sha kadar/ many+dzasha kachen po dang/ mdog mdzes dang/ mdog
mdzes chen bo dang/ a ti mug tu ka dang/ tsam pa ka dang/ bar shi ka dang/ mthon ka dang/ mthon ka chen po dang/ ka dam pa dang/ snum dang/ yu ti ka dang/ klu'i me tog dang/
kon ta dang/ g+han d+ha bar shaka'i ma tog dag thogs so// kha cig ni lha'i tsan danago shIrasha dang/ sbrul gyi snying po'i bdug pa dang/ a ka ru dang/ du ru ka dang/ ta ma la'i lo ma'i bdug
pa thogs so// kha cig gi lag pan ni rmabya'i bsil yab thogs so// kha cig gi lag pa na na ral gri'o// kha cig gi lag pa na ni mdung thung ngo/// kha cig ga lag pa nya ni rdo rje dang//
dgra sta dang/ mda' bo che dang/ mdung dang/ gtun shing dang/ mdung rtse gsum pa dang/ gzong kha gnyis pa dag go/ kha cig ni go ma dang ya ladabagos nas srung ba'i phyirakun nas 'du'i
mchi bar 'gyur ro// kha cig ni rin po che sna tshogs kyi stod dang/ gser gyi snod dang/ dngul gyi snod dag thogs pa rin bon sna tshogs kyi ma tog dang/ gsur gyi me togarang/ dngul gyi ma
tog dag gis bkang nas thogs te/ de dag thams cad rig sngags 'chang la dbul bar bgyid do// rig sngags 'chang gisakhyams pa dang snying rje chen bo yid la bgyid pa dang/ sangs rgyas
0 yid l bgyid pas 'thags pa snyan ras gzigs dbang phyug don yod pa'i zhags pa'i na lugs 'chang ba yid la bgyi// mchog tu brtsi ba yid la bgyid pas bag yod pas tshig gzhan mi
smra bar dbugs dbyung bar bgyi zhing lam drang po nas 'jug par bgyi ste/ song go'i khri la mngon du mchis nas don yod pa'i 'khor lo'azhags pa thogs mar seng ge 'i khri'i stang du
gzhag par bgyi'o////'phags pa don yod zhags pa'i cho ga zhib mo'i rgyal po bam po bzhi pa// de'i 'og du rig sngags 'chang rang nyid
mchis nas steng du gtogs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la phyag bgyi zhing/ 'phags pa san ras gzigs dbang phyug mchog sbyin pa'i ng phyag bgyi'o// des dgra thams cad
pham par bgyis par 'gyur ro// gal te 'og tu phyogs nas phyag bgyis nas/ de nas 'khor las rig sngags 'chang gi phyir rgol ba rnams mgo bcad par 'gyur ro// rig sngags 'char
mchis ma thag tu gnas rnam pa drug du g.yos nas sgra chen po 'byung bar 'gyur ro// ca co'i sgra chen po 'byung bar 'gyur ro// lha'i rol mo'i cha byad yan lag lnga dang ldan pa dag 'bud par 'gyur
ro// nam mkha'i lha rnams kyis kyang gzhal med khang chen ponas dbu rgyan dang cod pan gyis rig sngags 'chang gi mgo bo la dbang bskur bar bgyid do// dbang bskur ba tsam gyi mod la rin
bo chasna bdun gyi char 'bab par 'gyur ro// gser gyi char dang gos kyi char 'bab par 'gyur ro// gser gyi me tog dang/ dngul gyi ma tog dang/ lha'i me tog bkra
bsna tshogs kyi char dang/ lcabargyun gyi char 'bab par 'gyur ro// de nas lha'i bu mos rin po che sna bdun gyi stod du bdud rtsi'i bcud 'tshal te mchis nas dbul bar bgyid do// rig sngagA
'chang gis blangs nas don yod pa'i zhagasala'i snying bo bzlos par bgyi'o// de nas rig sngags 'chang gis rig par bgyi'o// rig sngags 'chang gis reg pa tsam gyi mod la lca'i lus
rnam par dag pa thob nas pags pa'i mdog gsar 'dra bar 'gyur ro// sa lhag par sdob dang/ mig up+pal sngon po ltar lha'i mig yongs su dag par 'gyur ro// tsho'i tshad lha'i bskal/
pa 'bum phrag brgya stod du 'gyur ro// gal te phyir mi ldog par 'tshalan pa'i bcud kyis len mchog las ji tsam 'tshal ba blangs te/ lha'i chab tsan dan gyi dri dang ldan pa'i nang du zhugs nas
khrus bgyi'o// khrus bgyis pa tsam gyi mod la phug gi sgo rang 'bye bar 'gyur zhing/ ji ltar dbang phyug chen po'i gzugs 'dra bar mthong nani 'jig rten thamasacad kyi mchod gnas kyi gtso pa
gcig pur 'gyura'o// ji ltar 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug bzhin du rig sngags 'chang 'di'ang mchod pa dang/ bkur sti dang/ bla mas bla mar bgyi ba de lta bur 'gyur ro// gang
[n}/]dungad kyisaina mchog 'dis gan 'dzam bu'i chu bo'i gsar yongs su dag par 'gyur ro// tshig ba 'am/ ri 'am/ ka ba'am/ ljon shing ngam/ snod dam/ bum pa 'am/ rdza bo 'am/ gos
sam/ bong ba la ragan de dag thams cad 'dzam bu'i chu bo'i gsar yongs su dag par 'gyur ba nas// dgos pa'i bar du 'gyur ro// de nas rig sngags 'chang klu mo 'am/ lha mo lem/ mi 'am ci
bo'atshalan// rig sngags 'chang de gos gtsang ma bgos nas legs par khrus bgyi'o// tshos brgyad dam/ bcubazhi 'am/bco lnga la 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi ri mo'i gzugs
la mchod pa bgyis nas nyin zhag gcig gnas par bgyi'o// 'khor lo'i zhags pa chen po 'di chos kyi stan legs par brgyan pa'i snyan bzang bo'i stong du gzhag par bagyi zhing mchod pa chen po bgyi ste/de

nyid kyi mdun du tshig gzhan mi sna bar lan stong rtsa brgyad bzlas te yusakar re re nas bzlas brjod bgyis pa zhags pa'i stang du gtor bar bgyi'o// lan stong rtsa brgyad tshang ba dang zhags pa de'ang sprul bzhin du
yongs su 'khyil 'khor lo'i ge dengs ka'i tshul du mchis par 'gyur ro// de nas rig sngags 'chang gis zhags pa blangs te klu gnas pa'i ma tsho'am/ mi 'am ci gnas pa'i mtsho'i/ lho
mo gnas pa'i mtsho 'gramadu mchis nas don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po bzlas te/ gnas kyi nang du zhags pa 'phang bar bgyi'o// 'phang ma thag khonor slar yang drang bar bgyi ste/ jilta bu'i don
yid la bsams pa'i don de zhags pas bcings nas ji ltar bsam pa de bzhin du bgyi bar 'gyur ro// gzhan yang ji ltar yid la bsams pa'i nor ram/ dbyig khagam/
gsar ram/ nor bu 'am/ mu tig gam/ bats+tshar 'am/ shang kangashi la'am/ byu ru 'am/ sa le sbamamam/ dngul lam/ gos sam/ chas sam/ rgyananam/ gzhan yang
gzhal med khang ji lta bur 'byor pa can dag don du gnyoran zhags pa 'pha bar bgyi ste/ de thams cad 'dren par bgyid do// gang dang gang du 'phabyus de dang der ji ltar yid la bsams pa de nyid
shin tu gsal ba yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// dngos po gzhan du mi 'gyur ro// rgyal po'i rigs sam/ bram ze'i rigs sam/ rgyal rigs sam/ khyim bdag gi rigs sam/
rje'u rigs kyi ci dang ci bsams pa 'grub par bgyid do// skyes pa 'am/ bud med dam/ khye'u 'am/ bu mo'i ming nas brjod de zhags pa 'phangs ba tsam gyi mod la zhags pas bcings
tshanas 'dren par 'gyur ro// than ri dgas dang/ bya dang/ seng ge dang/ stag dang/ glang po che dang/ ma he'ang 'dren par bgyid do// gang gisaming nas brjod de g.yul 'gyed pa'i nang du
'phangs na/ de'ang zhags pas bcings nas mdun du mchis te/ ji ltar yid la bsams pa de bzhin du thamasacad 'grub par bgyid do// zla ba dang nyi ma dbab par 'tshal na zla ba dang nyi ma'i
05 mdun du mchis nas don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po lan bdun bzlas te/ zla ba dang nyi ma'i mngon sum du zhags pa 'phangs nas slar yang drang bar bgyi ste/ zla ba dang nyi ma zhags pas bcis
nas drangs par 'gyur ro// nam mkha' las bab nas rig sngags 'chang gi mdun du mchis te/ ji ltar yid la bsams pa bzhin dgos pa thamasacad sgrub par bgyid do// 'on te zla ba
dang nyi ma'i gnas su mchi bar 'tshalan zhags pa'i phyag rgya bcings pa lag pas byas te don yod pa'i rgyal bo'i snying po bzlas pa dang/ rigasngags 'chang nam mkha' la 'phur nas nyi ma dang zla
ba'i stan la ji srid du 'tshalabar longs spyod par 'gyur zhing/ slar bde ba dang/ ma smad pa dang/ ma sbas pa dang/ legs par 'grub par 'gyur ro// nags khung du 'jug par 'tshalan/
gtsang ma legs par khrus bgyis pas gos gtsang ma bgo bar bgyi zhing/ nags khung gi sgor lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas brjod bgyis te zhags pa 'phang bar bgyi'o// lag pas zhags
pa 'phangs pa tsam gyisanags khung gi gnas kyi gzhal med khang gi klu thams cad bcings nas thams cad rigasngags 'chang gimadunan mchis par 'gyur zhing/ rig sngags 'chang la phyag
bgyis nas/ rig sngags 'chang khyod gnas chen po mchog tu zhugs shig ces smra bar 'gyur ro// de nas rig sngags 'chang gis don yod pa'i rgyal bo'i snying pobazlas te/ lag pa zhags
dpa'i phyag rgyas nags khung du 'jug par bgyi'o// zhugs pa tsam kho nas niags kyi gnas rnam pa drug tu g.yo bar 'gyur zhing/ dbus kyi nags kyi mtha'an rin po che sna/

bdunagyi rdzing lha'i chab dngas shing rtog pa ma mchis pa/ shin tu gsal ba/ lha'i tsan dan gyi dri dang ldan pa/ ha cang mi grang ba/ ha cang mi drab/ reg na bde ba/ ro dang ldan pa/ bdud rtsi'i bcud
can mchis te 'di ltar don yod pa'i rgyal po snying po yungs kar la lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas brjod bgyis nas rdzong gi dbus su zhags pa 'phang bar bgyi'o// 'phangs pa tsam gyi mod la bud med
rin po che'i gzugs 'dra ba'i lha'i bu mo'i lus phyed byung nas/ lha'i me tog rnam pa sna tshogs kyi legs par brgyan cing/ rin po che sna bdun gyi bum pa gang ba thogs te rig sngags 'chang la
dbul zhing spyi bo snyad de 'dzem pa dang bcas pas rig sngags 'chang la sbas pa/ rje btsun rig sngags 'chang khyodam bzhengs par gnas su zhugs shig/ rig sngags 'chang gis grub pa'i tshig
gsum brjod par bgyi ste/ 'jig rten pha rol gyi don dang/ rig sngags 'chang nyid dang/ 'jig rten pa'i dngos grub grub ste/ bdag nyid kyi ma dang/ sring mo dang/ marag gzhum zhes gar
bde bar brjod la/ de'i 'og tu rig sngags 'chang gis smra bar bgyi ste/ sring mo kho bo la 'jigarten pha rol gyi don byin cig ces 'jug par bgyi'o// de yang rig sngags 'chang khyod rang gi gnas
su snyoms te zhugs shig ces sla bar 'gyur ro// de nas rig sngags 'chang gis lag pa zhags pa'i phyag rgyas 'jug par bgyi zhing/ don yod rgyal po'i snying po bzlas so// de nas gnas
chen po mchog rin po cha sna bdun gyi gzhal med khang lta'i dril bu g.yer kha'i drab dang/ gsar dung/ gos sbyas pa/ dar gyi chun 'phyang rab tu sbyangs pa gda' ba nas bu mo de yang nor bu
rin po che chen po thogs te/ rig sngags 'chang 'jig rten pha rol gyidon du rin po chachen po bzhes shig ces dbul bar bgyid do// de nas rig sngags 'chang gis stan bshams pa'i steng
du zhugs pa legs par yongs su skyil te/ stan du bting la nor bu rin po min tho dazhags pa'i steng du bzhag cing me tog dang bdug pa dbul bar bgyi'o// don yod rgyal po'i snying po bzlas bar bgyi'o//
bzlas pa tsam gyi mod la zhags pa nor bu rin po che dang bcas te 'bar bor 'gyur ro// nor bu rin po che chen po de las yang 'o ma'i chab 'byung bar 'gyur ro// rig sngags 'chang gis 'o ma'i chab
de las blangs laskyor chu lan bdun du reg par bgyi'o// 'o ma'i chab kyis reg pa tsam gyi mod la lus thams cad drin dang bral zhing yongs su dag par 'gyur ro// don yod snang banor bu
gzhal med kyirakyil 'khor gyi 'od thor gyi dra ba 'od zer zhes bgyi ba thob nas sa bcu la gnas te phyir mi ldog par 'gyur ro// bla na med pa'i byang chub kyi lam thob par 'gyur ro// 'phags pa
[7 ]@#// spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi ting nge 'dzin sgyu ma lta bu s rnam par 'phrul pa thob par 'gyur zhing/ shin tu yongs su dag pa'i bdag nyid kyi rang bzhin gyis don yod
pa'i zhags pa'i cha lugs 'chang ba rig sngags 'chang gi mdun du mchis nas lag pa g.yas pa spyi bor bzhag ste/ nga'i rig sngags 'chang gi bu thu bo khyod kyis grol bachen po'i dkyil 'khor
sangs rgyas kyi sku yongs su dag pa 'thob bo zhes dbugs 'byon par 'gyur ro// phyogs bcu'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams mthong nas thams cad kyis legs so zhes bya ba'i sgra 'byin
par 'gyur te/ saMms dpa' chen po legs so lags// khyod na byang chub lam du zhugs// khyod kyis sas rgyas nyid 'thob ste/ grol ba'i lam zhes bya ba bsgrubs// 'on tarog
sngags 'chang nyid don du gnyeran/ de'i tshog sar gyi ma tog sol bar 'gyur taM/ blangs la bu mo de nyid kyi spyi bor bzhag nas/ o zhes bgyi bas mnan par bgyi'i/ o zhes bgyi ba'i sgra
brjod nas spyi bor bzhag patsam gyi mod la bumo de'i mig mchog gnyis nas mchi ma 'dzag par 'gyur ro// de nas rig sngags 'chang gis blangs te nye reg bgyi'o// nyerag bgyis pa tsam gyi
mod la rig sngags 'chang gi 'khor los sgyur bar 'gyur ro// sa bcung zad 'khyilacing lag pan 'khor le'i zhags pa thogs te nam mkha' la mchibar 'gyur ro// rig sngags 'chad bya ba
'bum phrag bco brgyad kyis yongs su bskor bar 'gyur ro// tshe lo drug khri nyis stong du 'gyur zhing skye ba bdun song rjes surngan par 'gyur ro// 'on te gsang sngags rgyu na jig stong pa'i dngos
kyichog slongan/ de'i tshe 'di lta bur 'gyur te/ rig sngags 'chang gis bdag gi sku 'di sdoms shig ces de'i tshe bud med des rang gi skya'i ral pa bton nas rig sngags 'chang la 'bul ba na//
sku thams cad blangs te dum bu gsum du bkum nas srad bu la mdud pa nyi shu rtsa gcig bgyi ste/ mgo la btags pas ni/ ji ltar yid la bsams pa de bzhin du mig 'phrul
ston par 'gyur ro// 'bras bu dang me tog 'tshal ba thams cad ston par 'gyur ro// bden pa ji ltar 'tshal ba bzhin ston par 'gyur ro// mgul du btags pas nai mi gda' bar 'gyur nas/
gnod sbyin dang/ srin po dang/ 'byung po dang/ sha za dang/ grul bum dang/ lto 'phyecan bo dang/ mi ma yin pa rnams dbang du gyur nas mchis par 'gyur ro// dpral ba la btags thabs
ni lha dang klu thams cad dbang du gyur nas mchis par 'gyur ro// dpung pa g.yas pa la btags pas nai glang po che bcu'i stobs dang ldan par 'gyur te/ phas kyi dgra bo dang/ mi 'dza' ba dang/
gdug thams cad kyis mi tshugs pas stobs kyis 'khor los sgyur bar 'gyur ro// dpung pa g.yon pa la btags pas ni rigs bzhi'i 'jig rten dbang du gyur nas mchis par 'gyur ro//
lag pa g.yon pa la btags pas ni gang la reg pa de dbang du 'gyur zhing bdag gi nor du 'gyur ro/ lag pa g.yas pa la btags pas ni grong khyer gyi shar phyogs kyi/
sgo nas rgyal po'i sgo la thal mo lan gsum brdabs na/ rgyal po'i btsun mo lakhor dang bcas pa dang/ grong khyer dang/ yul 'khor dang/ rgyal po'i pho brang dang/ bud med dang/ skyes pa dang/
bye'u dang/ bu mo dang bcas pa bdag nyid dam nor dbang du gyur nas mchis par 'gyur ro// than dud 'gro'i skye gnas su gtogs pa bya dang/ gcan gzan dang/ ri dgas dang/ gdug pa dang/
gzhan yang gdug pa dang bcas pa'i srog chags rnams dbang du gyur nas mchis par 'gyur ro// bar g.yas pa la btags pas ni 'tshal lam/ sor ga 'am/ ri 'or ram phug
gam/ dgon pa 'am/ bsti gnas gang du zhugs te/ zhugs pa tsam gyi mod la nor thams cad dang/ snyan thams cad dang/ lha thams cad rang gi gzugs su mngon nas mchis par 'gyur

spya ro// byin pa g.yas pa dang rkang pa g.yas pa la btags pas ni rgya mtsho chen po'i pha mthar yang rgal bar 'gyur na/ chu klung chen po'i chab kyis byin pa nub tsam du 'gyur ba lta smos kyang ci 'tshal/
byin pa g.yon pa la btags pas ni ma re re zhing dpagatshad brgyar phyin nas dub pa ma mchis par slar yang ldogo bar 'gyur ro// brla g.yon pa la btags nas dur khrod chen po'i zhugs na dur khrod
thams cad na gnas pa'i gcer bu pa thamasacad dbang du gyur nas mchis par 'gyur ro// de nas rig sngags 'chang gnas de nyid na spyod na rig sngags 'chang des lag pa g.yon pas bum pa
gang ba bzung zhing/ lag pa g.yas pas bud mad de bzung nas gnas chen po'i mchog tu 'jug par bgyi'o// gnas mchog de'i dbusan rjeng ma togags tshal par bkram pa bgyi ste//
rdzong der gzhis ka khrus bgyi zhing chab kyis nye reg bgyi'o// bkrus shing reg pa tsam kho nas 'khor lo 'gi sngags 'chang zhags pa dang/ 'khor los sgyur ba'i rig sngags 'chang du 'gyur ro//
rig sngags 'chang 'bum phrag bdunastongagis yongs su bskor cing tshe bskal pa khrir 'gyur ro// sgra cung zade 'khyil par yang 'gyur ro// nags kyi gnas kyi gzhal med khang bdun cu rtsa
gnyis kyi dpon po rgyal por 'gyur ro// gal te ma zhes bgyi bas don du gnyer ba ni bu gcig pa bzhin du yongs su skyong bar 'gyur ro// 'bras dang/ 'bru dang/ gos dang/ chas dang//
nor bu dang/ mu tig dang/ byu ru dang/ gsar dang/ rangul yongs su grub par bgyid do// sring mo zhes bgyi bas ni dgos pa'i yo byad thams cad tshang bar stobs par 'gyur zhing ya na
lag stong bar bgyid do// nyi ma re re zhing rgyan thams cad kyis klubs pa'i lha'i bu mo khrid de mchi bar 'gyur lha'i gzhal med khang 'byor pa stobs par bgyid/ lha'i khyim dang gzhal me nga khang
stobs par bgyid do// mngag gzhug ma zhes bgyi bas ni gang dang gang du mngags pa de dang der ma chi bar 'gyur te/ lha'i gnas sam/ klu'i gnas sam/ gnod sbyin
gyi gnas sam/ srin po'i gnas sam/ 'byung po'i gnas sam/ gzhan yang mag gzhug pa'i sgrubab rnam pa sna tshogs yid la bsams pa bzhin du bgyid do// nags sgrub pa'i
cho ga'o// de nas rig sngags 'chang thang la rgyu bar 'tshalan gtsang ma khrus bgyis pas gis btsang ma bgo bar bgyi/ gnas dben pa gtsang ma'i sa phyogs su dkyil 'khor
gru bzhir bgyis la dri sna tshogs kyis byug/ ro sna tshogs dang ldan pa'i gtor ma bshams la/ a ka ru'i bdug pas bsrags te/ nub gsum du mchis nas 'khor lo zhags pa'i
lag pa'i phyag rgyas don yod rgyal po'isnying po'i bzlas brjod stong rtsa brgyad bgyis te/ lan stong rtsa brgyad tshang ba dang/ dkyil 'khor gyi dbus nas du ba 'byung bar 'gyur te/ khro bo'i rgyal po
lan bdun bzla bar bgyi'o// de nas dkyil 'khor gyi dbus nas skyes pa nag po chen po'i tshulami smug pa/ mche ba gtsigs pa/ skra gyen du 'greng ba/ mgo 'bar ba/ mig dmar ba/
mchu dang lce dmar ba/ sen mo dmar ba/ skra sngo ba/ dpung pa mkhrang zhing brtan pa/ gsus pa 'phyaphos po/ mchod phyir thogs pa dang ldan pa/ mgo lnga pa/ sbrul ltar lce bsgyur ba/ stag
gi sham thabs bgos pa/ lag pa na dgra sta dpa dril bu thogs pa zhig lus phyed tsam byung nas phyogs bcur lta bar bgyid do// de nas rig sngags 'chang gis skrag par mi bgyi sta brnyan
par bgyi la/ khro bo'i rgyal po bzlas dus 'khor lo'i zhags pa 'phangs pa mgo gcar la khrag mang du byung ba dang/ rig sngags 'chang gis khrag des lus thams cad byug par bgyi'o//
byug pa tsam gyi mod la bdag nyid kyi lus mi chod pa dang mi shigs pas rdo rjer byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur ro// mig gnyis byung la rang gi mig phyis nas mig la bskusaM na lha'i mig tu
'gyur ro// rkang brus te byu gnas tshe bskal pa stong phrag bcur 'gyur zhing thos pa gsal ba'i rgya mtsho'i 'gyur ro// bskal pa brgya stong gi skyo ba'i skya ba dang tshe rabs dran par 'gyur ro//
sIng phyung sta 'tshal na nam mkha' la mchi'o// khrag gis snying khar thig le bgyis na mi gda' bar 'gyur ro// lce gcad na ral grir gyur nas dgra thams cad rlag par bgyid do// gal
te thang la rgyabar 'tshalan/ de'i tshe khro bo' rgyal po lan brgya rtsa brgyad zhags pa dang 'khor lo la bzlas brjod bgyi'o// 'khor lo zhags pa gsang ba'i phyag rgya'i tshul gyis thal mos la
brdab par bgyi ste/ lan gsum du thal mo brdabu ba dang/ de'i 'og tu thang gi sgo dbye bar 'gyur ro// ji ltar rang gi khyim bzhin du 'jug par bgyi ste/ zhugs nas slar yang mchi zhing dgos pa
[7 ]@#// gzhan thams cad bgyid pa dang/ thang thams cad la gnas pa thams cad dbang du gyur nas gnas par 'gyur ro// 'on te nam mkha' la ma 'tshalan gyen du bltas nas//

don yod rgyal po'i snying po yungs mar la stong rtsa brgyad bzlas te/ lan stong rtsa brgyad bzlas nas bdag nyid la byugs te/ lag pa'i zhags ba'i phyag rgyas nam mkha' lamachi bar 'gyur zhing nam mkha'
go 'byed par 'gyur ro// lha'i gnas su mchibar 'tshalan lha'i khyim dumasanas zhags pas lha'i mgulanas bcing bar bgyi zhing/ don yod rgyal po'i snying po lan stong rtsa brgyad bzlasanas/ lhathacepA/
pa gang lags pa de'i ming nas brjod na/ lha de babs nas rig sngags 'chang gi mdun dmachis par 'gyur ro// tshangs pa dang/ khyab 'jug dang/ dbang phyug chen po rig sngags 'chang la/ rig sngags
'chang ci zhig don du gnyer ba snyoms shigaces sna bar 'gyur ro// rig sngags 'chang gisalha'i gnas su 'gro'o zhes brjod par bgyi// gal te gzhan bsams pa zhig mchis na mchog thams cad stsol
a/ bar bgyid do// de nas lha'i gnas nasamachi ban lha'i gnas lha'i rdzu 'phrul gyis lag pan thogs te nam mkha' lamachibar 'gyur ro// ji srid 'tshol bar lha'i gzhal med khang chen po longs spyod par
'gyur zhing// 'on te mi 'tshal na lha'i gnas nas slar yang 'bebs par 'gyur ro// gzhan yang ji ltar rang gi blo gros dang yid la bsams pa'i dgos pa thams cad bgyid par 'gyur zhing thams cad grub
par 'gyur te/ dol som nyi dang yid gnyis bskyed par mi bgyi'o// 'khor lo'izhags pa sgrub pa'i cho ga'o/// de nas rig sngags 'chang pad+ma'i zhags pa sgrub par 'tshal bas/
rig sngags 'chang dgatsang ma legs par bkrus te gos gtsang ma bgo bar bgyi'o/nub gsum machis sam/nub lta mchis sam/nubagacig mchis nas rig sngags 'chang gis zhags pa'i skud po bsgrub par bgyi ste//

ras kyi skud pa 'am pad+ma'i skud pa bo zlumya'i kha dog lta bur mtshon gyis kha bsgyur bar bgyi zhing/ khru nyi shu rtsa gcig par bkal te/ de la'ang par+yabagyi ste/ rin po che sna bdun gyi 'dab mo kha phye ba sor bzhi
pa'i tshad kyis pagaser gyi 'dab ma dang/ dngul gyi 'dab ma dang/ btsusladang/ inAnI la dang/ rin po che ka ti ka las bgyi zhing mu tig gis bskor ba bgyi sa/ de nas zhags pa la gdags
par bgyi'o// zhags pa'i thor to gcig la ni pad+ma'i phyag rgyu gdags par bgyi'o// de nas legs par brgyan pa'i chos kyi stan bzang po bsham par bgyi'o// ba'i lci bas dkyil 'khor bgyis la/
dkyil 'khor gyi steng du dri'i pad+ma bsam par bgyi zhing/ dkyil 'khor gyi steng du chos kyi gdan bshams la bum pa gang bas brgyan par bgyi'o// me tog gi sil ma bkram zhing a ka ru dang/
btsan dan dang/ du ru ka'i bdug pa dbul bar bgyi'o// mchod yon dang zhabs bsil gyi snod kyang gzhag par bgyi'o// pad+ma'i zhags pa de'ang chos kyi stan gyi steng du gzhag par bgyi'o// 'phags
gapa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi mdun du rig sngags 'chang gis skyil mo krung bcas te mchis nas don yod zhags pa'i snying po lan khri bzlas te/ bzlas pa'i yungs
kar re re nas de'i stang du gtor bar bgyi'o// lan khri rdzogs nas de nas tshes bco lnga'i zla ba nya'i nub mo mchis nas 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la mchod par bgyi'o// zhags pa de'ang

mchod par bgyi'o// don yod pa'i zhags pa'i phyag rgya bcings nas don yod pa'i rgyal po'i snying po lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas so// de nas khro bo'i rgyal po lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas te/ nyin mtshan
gsum dus gsum du bzlas brjod dang mchod pa bgyi'o// de nas partsa'i zhags pa 'bar zhing kha dog sna tshogs kyi 'od zer 'byung bar 'gyur ro// legs so legs so zhes bgyi ba'i tshig 'byin par
'gyur ro// 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi lus la kha dog sna tshogs kyi 'od zer 'byung bar 'gyur ro// de nas rig sngags 'chang phyag rgya'i skyil mo krung gis mchis nas mig mi
'dzum zhing bzhin 'dzam pas sAng rje chen po yid la bsgom par bgyi'o// 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi gdong du bltas te/ don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po lan sum stong bzlas par
bgyi'o// de'i 'og tu 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug bdag nyid kyi lha'i rang bzhin mdun du mchis nas lag pa g.yas pa brkyang ste/ rig sngags 'chang gi spyi bor bzhag nas legs so zhes

bgyi bstsol bar 'gyur zhing/ 'di skad ces kyang dbugs 'byin par 'gyid do// rigasngags 'chang ba'i bu snying nas skyes pa'i thu tho bzlas brjod kyi cho ga chen bo dang/ mchod pa'i cho ga chen po 'dis nga la

mchod pa'i mchog byas pa dang/ bzlas brjod kyi mchog dang grub pa'i mchog ste/ khyod kyis don yod rgyal po'i snying po grubacing/ khyod kyis bats+tsha'i zhags pa chen po grub kyis/ ji ltar yid la bsams pa
bzhin du mchog khyer cig/ khyod kyi yid kyi brnag pa thams da ni yongs su rdzogs par byas/ khyod 'khor ba'i 'jigs pa rgyu ba lasani grol/ khyod skye ba dang/ rgab dang/ na ba dang/ 'chiba'i mya ngan
mi bzad pa'i 'jigs pa las thar na/ khyod dmyal ba chen bo mi bzad pa bcu drug las ni yongs su grol/ 'jigs pa chen po ma bzad pa'i sdug bsal gyi tshor ba brgyad lasani yongs su thar/ 'di nas

phyi ma'i skye ba'i mngal du gnas nas stag bsngal mi bzad pa las shi 'phos te/ rig sngags 'chang khyod byang chub kyi snying po la thug gi bar du 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba can du pad+ma las rdzus te skya bar

'gyur ro// khyod kyis ga'i klung 'bum phrag stong brgyad cu rtsa bzhi snyad kyi bya ma dang mnyam pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams la dgo pa'i rtsa bachor bskyod pa'i bsod nams kyi tshogs chen po dang ni ldan/
rig sngags 'chang khyod kyis lhag par bya ba mang po na byas/ khyod rig sngags 'chang chen por ni lung bstan/ dmyal ba dang sngon gyi las kyi sgrib pa mi bzad pa thams cad las ni grol gyis/ ji ltar/
[rg]// yid la bsams pa bzhina mchog khyer cig/ de nas rig sngags 'chang gis ji ltar yid la bsams pa bzhin de'i tshe mchog thob par 'gyur ro// de nas rigasngags
'changags pad+ma'i zhags pa de blangs te/ gnas gtsang mar gus pas mchod pa rgya cher bgyi'o// nam dgos ba de ri tsho zhags pa blang bar bgyi ste// las thams cad bgyid pa la 'gyur ro//
pad+ma ni' phags pa spyamaras gzigs dbang phyug gi lag pa g.yon par bzhag la/ lag pa g.yas pas zhags pa bzung ste/ don yod rgyal po'i snying palan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas nas/ soms can

nam lha gang gi ming nas brjod bzlas brjod brgya rtsa brgyad tshang bdang/ byang chub sems dang 'amadun du mchis naas 'dod pa'i mchog thams cad stsol bar 'gyur ro// de nas rig sngags 'chang byang chub tu
lung bstan pa don du gnyer bar 'tshalan 1 rigasAgs 'chang gtsang mas legs par khrus bgyis te/ gos gtsang ma bgos pas nyin zhag ga cig mchis par gyur pas/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das
shAkya thub pa la mchod pa rgya chen po bgyis nas/ pad+ma'i zhags pa de'ang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi phyag tu dbul bar bgyi'o// zhags pa'i thor to ya gcig gis ni rang gi mgul du btags la/

don yod rgyal po'i snying po lan stong rtsa brgyad tshang bar ba zlas brjod bgyi'o// stong rtsa brgyadatsang ba dang/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das sku gser gyi mdog can rig sngags 'chang gi mdun du bzhugs/
nas/ rig sngags 'chang gi spyi bor phyag bzhag lta dbugs 'byin par mdzad/ lung ston par mdzad/ yid kyi brnag pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs par mdzad par 'gyur ro// sgrib pa dang sdig
pa tshe rangs brgya stong du bsags pa thams cad gtugs par 'gyur/ lhag ma ma lus par gtugs par gyur nas/ lus yongs su dag par 'gyur ro// phrim dang bral zhing phrag dog dang ser
sngangs par 'gyur ro// 'di nas ma 'ongs pa'i skyaba'i mngal du gnas nas/ lha dang mi'i dpal nyams su myong bar bgyis nas sems can thams cad kyi bla ma gcig pur 'gyur ro// mchod par 'os
pa dang bla ma'i gnas su'ang 'gyur ro// nad rnams dang bral bar 'gyur ro// skye bo thams cad dga' bar 'gyur ro// 'gums pa'i dus su phyogs bcu'i de bzhin gshegs pa la thams cad kyis
dgongs par 'gyur ro// dbugs 'byin par mdzod/ legs pa'i lam ston par mdzad par yang 'gyur ro// 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug mdunan mchis naas dbug 'byin par bgyid/
cing lag pa g.yas pa spyi bor 'jog par bgyid do// de bde bas shin tu dran pa nye bar bzha gnas lus 'dor bar 'gyur ro// bor ba tsam gyi mod laskol ba mnyam pa bde ba can gyi 'jig rten gyi khams

! su skye bar 'gyur te/ rgyan thamasacad kyis brgyan pa/ mtshan dang dpe byad kyis smras pa'i lus pad+malas rdzus te skyo bar 'gyur ro// cho rabs dran bar 'gyur te/ bskal pa brgya stong gi sbyo ba'i tshor
dran par 'gyur ro// don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po rnam par grol ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi phyag rgyaram par phye ba'i cho ga zhib mo 'di mtha' dag rdzogs par g.yar thon du bgyis/
nas/ sa bcu la gnas shing phyin ci log tu ma gyur pas phyir mi ldog par 'gyur ro// rdzu 'phrul gyi rnam par 'phrul pa chen po dang/ cho 'phrul chen pos lha'i khang pa brtsegs pa dang/ gzhal med
khang dang/ gnas mchog dang/ phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing du byang chub kyi sId po la thug gi bar du mchibar 'gyur ro// de nas rig sngags 'chang bde ba
can gyi 'jig rten gyi khams mthong ba'i chos kho na la lta bar 'tshalan/ rig sngags 'chang gi gnas gtsang ma'i phyogs sam/ gnas sam/ khang pa 'am/ dgon pa'i gnas sam// 'khor gyi
khyams sam/ 'chag sa 'am// khang pa brtsegs ma 'am/ s+yal po gtsang ma phyi bdar legs par bgyis pa'is phyogs su dkyila 'khor gru bzhi dbyas pa khru gang ba tsam/ khru do pa'i dkyil 'khor
grwa kun nas cha'abyos pa/ sa dang sbyar ba'i lci bas shin tu legs par phyi bdar bgyis la rtswa sngon po mnyen po lta bu la mkhas pas dkyil 'khor mtha'adagagicha dbye ba'i thig

gdab par bgyi'o// dkyil 'khor gyi dbus kyi snying po la bad+margya chen ngos dbyas pa/ 'dabam brgya patshon sna brgyad kyi tshon rtsis bkra bar bgyi zhing 'byes par bgyis la/ snying po ni rin po che ka ti ka/
las bgyi'o// pad+ma'i mtha' nor bu rin po che sna tshogs kyis bskor la/ gru bzhi nas kha khyer sor bzhi pa'i tshad du bgyi'o// pad+ma'i bar gyi zur thur du ut+pal sngon po legs par bris la/ kha khyer
gyi phyi rol nor bus 'khor ba'i mtha' de mtshos bskor bar bgyi'o// lha'i chab rin po che sna tshog sakyi gzhal med khang gis mdzes par bgyis la/ chab la me tog sna tshog sakyi sil ma bkod
pa bya sna tshogs gnas 'chalab/ dang pa dang/ bzhad dang/ khrung khrung dang/ dur pa dang/ shang shang te'u dang/ ka lab dang/ bya'i tshogs kyis mdzes par bgyis la/ nya dang/ chu srin

dang chu srin byis pa gsod kun nas rten 'ama'i bar bgyid do// mtsho'i 'graman rin po che'i ljon shing dang/ ma tog gi ljon shing dang/ 'bras bu'i ljon shing sna tshogs kha khyer dang bcas par bgyi'o//

dkyil 'khor gyi kha khyer gyi phyi rolan lag pa dang thal mo'i phyag rgya bris sgo bzhi rnams su rgyal po chen po bzhi bgyi'o// de nas dbus kyi dkyil 'khor la pad+ma'i gdan bzangapo bshams te/ de'i steng du
bcom ldan 'das 'od dpagamed dang/ 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug dang/ mthu chen thobagazhag bar bgyi'o// dkyil 'khor bum pa gang bas brgyan par bgyi'o// me tog silam dang/
dri dang/ byug pa'i ng dbul bar bgyi'o// ba danabazang po sna tshogs kyis brgyan par bgyi'o// gtor m dkar po dbul bar bgyi'o// yon chab dang zhabs bsil gyi snodadang mar me'i 'phrengab dbul
bar bgyi'o// pad+ma'i zhags pa 'od dpag med kyi phyag tu dbul bar bgyi'o// rigasngags 'chad gtsangams gos btsangam bgo bar bgyi'o// legs par khrus bgyis nas ba'i
rnam lngas nye reg bgyis la/ zla ba nya la nyin zhag gcig mchis par gyur pas kha shar phyogs su bltas la skyil mo krung bcas te mchis naas lagapas zhags pa'i phyagargyabacings te bzlas brjod bgyi'o//
khyams po dang brtse ba'i sems kyis lhag par brtson par bgyi'o// snying rje mchogatu brtse bar gyur pas sems can thams cad la brtse bar bgyisan don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po bzlas brjod bgyi ste/
jitsamanathun thu ma la 'od dpag med 'bar ba'agyur nas dkyil 'khor chen po dela'ang 'od zer 'byung bar 'gyur ro// rig sngags 'chang g.yo bar gyur nas lus 'ba' bar 'gyur ro// de nas rig sngagaM
'chang gis skya rengs shar tsaman de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'isangs rgyas 'phags pa 'od dpagamed gsar spungs pa lta bu/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gser gyi kha
tsha dogagis rig sngags 'chang gimadun du bzhugs nas/ phyag g.yas pa rig sngags 'chang gi spyi bor bzhag ste dbugs 'byin par mdzad cing/ yid kyi brnag pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs par
mdzod nas mi gda' bar gyur pa dang/ shin tu rnam par dag padrimamadapa'i snang ba zhes bya ba'iganyid thob nas/ ji ltar nyal ba tsam mam mig btsum pa tsam gyis 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba
can gzhal med khang dang/ gnas dang/ 'jig rten dang/ yul ljongs dang/ byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor mtha' dag dang bcas pa'i dkyil 'khor yongs su rdzogs par mthong bar 'gyur
lags so// de bzhin gshegs pa de chos ston par mdzad pa'i ng mthong bar 'gyur lags so// 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor de dag thams cad dbugs 'byin par bgyid pa dang/ gzhal mod/
khang dang/ rnam par 'phrul pa dang/ rdzu 'phrul dang/ cho 'phrul thams cad mthong bar 'gyur lags so// 'di nas ma 'o sa pa'i spyi banas shi 'phos te 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba can du skal
ba mnyam par skye bar 'gyur ro// skyo ba'i skyo ba dran par 'gyur te/ skye ba bdun song rjes su dran par 'gyur ro// de sad nas zhags pa la lan stong rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod bgyisanas lag pa g.yas
pas bzung na nam mkha' la 'phur bar 'gyur ro// lo khrir 'tsho bar 'gyur ro// zhags pa grub pa rnams dang rigasngags 'chang thams cad kyi 'khor los sgyur bar 'gyur ro// 'khor khri brgyud/
stong dang ldan par 'gyur ro// pad+ma'i zhags pa sgrub pa'i cho ga'o// de nas rig sngags 'chang rdo rje'i zhags pa sgrub par 'tshal na shing ngashun dang/ sa skud dang/ 'chad

gyi skud pa mnyam du lhan cig bkal to/ khru nyi shu rtsa gcig gi tshad tsam du bgyis la/ tsan dan dkar po las rdo rje sor bzhi ba'i tshad du bgyis te/ rtse lnga pa 'byung po la sogs pa'i mgo dang sbrul gyi ska ]
rags bcings la/ klu'i rgyal po dga' bo dang nye dga' bo'i dra ba'i 'phreng bas dkri ba bgyis nas zhags pa la gdags par bgyi'o// de nas rig sngags 'chang gtsang mas
gos gtsang ma bgo bar bgyi'o// legs par khrus bgyi'o// ba'i rnam lngas nye reg bgyi'o// rna'i stan bting nasari mo'i gzugs kyi mdun du lag pa g.yas pa zhags pas mnan nas don yod pa'i/
zhags pa'i snying bo khri bzlas so// khro bo'i rgyal bo'i snyingapo stong bzlas so// de nas zhags pa de 'bar bar 'gyur te/ de bzung nas nam mkha' la 'phur bar 'gyur ro// rdo rje'i rigs dang/ de bzhin
gshegs pa'i rigs dang/ nor bu'i rigs dang/ pad+ma'i rigs gang dag lag pa de dag thams cad mdun na bzhugs par 'gyur ro// lag na rdo rje dang 'dra bar gzugs dang/ mthu dang/ brtson

'grus pha rol gyi zil gyis mi non par 'gyur ro// lagan rdo rjadang 'dra bar rig sngags 'chang gi dbang por 'gyur ro// lha'i le khri nyis stong du 'tsho bar 'gyur ro// las thams cad bgyid pa rdo rje'i zhag
tshak+ka pa dgra thams cad 'joms par bgyid pa'i zhags pa steng ngam/ 'og gar 'phangs par yid la bsams pa bzhin thams cad bcings nas dgug par bgyid do// phyogs bcur 'phangs te khro bo'i rgyal
bo bzlasanas skyas ba 'am/ budamad dam/ gzhan gang ci'ang rung ba thams cad zhags pas bcings nas myur du 'gugs par bgyi sta som nyim bgyi'o// gal te lha 'am/ klu 'am/ gnod sbyin nam/
srin po 'am/ dri za'am/ lham yin nam/ nam mkha' lding ngam/ mi 'am 'am/ 'byung po 'am/ lto 'phye chen po thams cad zhags pas bcing nas myur du 'gugs par bgyid de som nyi mi bgyi'o// zhag
pa la khro bo'i rgyal po 'ganyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas brjod bgyis te mar gyi ngo'i tshes bcu bzhi'i mtshan mo nam phyadan zhags pa phyogs bzhir 'phang bar bgyi// 'phangs pa tsam gyi mod la bgegs dang//
log 'dren dang/ gnod sbyin dang/ srin po dang/ gdug pa thams cad zhags pas bcings nas/ rigasngags 'chang gis mdun na mchis shing/ ji srid 'tsho'i bar du dbang du gyur nas mchis te
bran bzhin sa thams cad bgyid par 'gyur/ bltas pa tsam gyis gdon thams cad las thar par 'gyur ro// zhags pa la khro bo'i rgyal po lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod bgyis te/ lag
pas zhags pa blangs te dur khrod du zhugs na mi snang bar 'gyur zhing gnas thaman kyi sgo phye bar 'gyur ro// phug gi sgor mchis nas rdo rje zhags pas brdabs na phug thams cad kyi sgo 'byed par
'gyur zhing/ 'khrul 'khor dang gtan pa thams cad dum bur chag par 'gyur ro// lam ngan pa dang/ mi ngan pa dang/ mi ma yin pa dang/ 'bab chu ngan pa dang/ sprul dang/ dbugs gdug
pa dang/ srog chags go na sa dang/ gdug pa dang bcas pa'i srog chags su gtogs pa thams cad mi gda' bar 'gyur ro// mi drang po dang lam drang por ji ltar rang gi gnas sam//
gtsug lag khapadam/ khang pa bzhin du zhugs nas dgos pa thams cad bsgrubs te/ slar yang gnas nas phyir ldog par 'gyura'o// rdo rje zhags pa las thams[h]
cad bgyid pa sgrub pa'i cho ga'o/// de nas rig sngags 'chang nor bu'i zhags pa sgrub pare'atshal na/ rig sngags 'chang des nor bu stsal bar bgyi sta/ rdo rje 'am/ bakhru 'am/
shel rang byung ngom/ mar gad dam/ in+danI la sor mo'i tshigs pa bas lhag tsam shin tu phyisape/ shin tu yongs su dag par bgyis pa/ gsar gyi me tog gi tshuladubagyis pa/ mu tig gis
dkris ba/ ge sar kha bye ba/ tsam pa ka'i me tog ji lta ba de bzhin du bgyis la/ ras bzang po'i skudapa tshon rtsis dgyes pas kha sbyar ba// shin tu tshad la bab par bkal ba/ khru nyi shu rtsa
gcig pa/ sor mo gung mo'i tshad tsam gyi nor bus brgyanal/ thor to cig shos sun nor bu 'am gsar las bgyis pa'i lcags kyu gdags par bgyi'o// de nas rig sngags 'chang gtsangayu
gos gtsang ma bgo bar bgyi'o// legs par bkrus nas ba'i ma lasanye reg bgyi'o// de'i 'og tu ri mo'i gzugs kyi mdun du sos thams cad kyi dkyil 'khor tshad dang ldan pa bgyis la/
grwa bzhir bum pa gang ba bzhag cing pog por gyi snodabashams nas aka ru'i bdug pa dang/ tsan dan dang/ du ru ka'i bdug pa dbul bar bgyi// dkyil 'khor gyi dbus su chos kyi stan bzang po
tshad dang ldan pa bshams la/ ba dan stsatshog sakyis dkyil 'khor bskor bar bgyi'o// me tog sil ma dang/ dri dang/ rol mo'i cha byad dag dgod par bgyi'o// rig sngags 'chang gis sa
dkar gsum 'tshal bar bgyi'o// btung ba zhanapa dang/ kha zas napa dang/ gnas napa dang/ lhagamadwang sbags pa rnams yongs su spang bar bgyi'o// don yod pa'i rgyal po'i snying po nyi khri

tshigastong bzlas nas lag pa g.yas pas chos kyi stan gyi stong du bzhag nga 'i zhags pa la mnan no// lanyi khri chig stong tshang ba dang/ de nas rig sngags 'chang gis khro bo'i rgyal po lan stong rtsa
brgyad tshang bar bzlas te/ yungs kar re re nas dbang bskur ba' bgyi'o// lan stong rtsa brgyad tshang ba dang/ rig sngags 'chang gis 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gir mo'i gzugs
la mchod pa rgya cher bgyi'o// bcom ldan 'das 'od dpag med dang/ de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa la'angamachod pa rgya cher bgyi'o// de nas rigasngags 'chang gis tshes bco lnga'i nyal
nyin zhag gcig skya ba bgyisanas mchod pa rgya cher bgyisas/ mchod pa'i yo byad gang ci'ang rung ba de dag thams cad la re re nas don yod pa'i zhags pa'i sAng po lan nyi shu rtsa re re bzlas
brjod bgyis nas dobul bar bgyi'o// de nas skyilamo krung bcas te mchis nas nyin mtshan kun tu don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po lan stong rtsa brgyad bzlas te/ yungs kar ra rinas brdeg par
bgyi'o/ lan stong rtsa brgyad tshang ba dang/ sacher g.yo bar 'gyur ro// 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi ri mo'i gzugs las kyang 'od zer kha dog sna tshogs
dag 'byung bar 'gyur ro// nor bu'i zhags pa de'ang 'bar bar 'gyur ro// rig sngags 'chang gi mgo bo 'ang 'bar bar 'gyur ro// 'barapa tsam gyi mod larig sngags 'chang gis lag pa g.yas pas
nor bu'i zhags pa blangs pa na sgra chen po 'byung bar 'gyur// de nas 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug lta'i bdag nyid kyi rang bzhin gyis rig sngags 'chang gi mdun na mchis par 'gyur ro//
de bzhin gshegs pa 'od dpag medadang/ de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa dang/ de bzhin gshegs pa 'phags pa spyanaras gzigs 'od kyi rgyal po'i sku gser gyi kha dog gis nam mkha' la
rdzu 'phrul gyisabazhugs gs rig sngags 'changal legs so zhes bgyi bstsol bar 'gyur/ phyag dpung pa gser gyi kha dog 'dra ba brkyang ba'i phyag gis rig sngags 'chang gi mgo bor bzha gnas
rigasags 'chang la dbugs 'byin par mdzad de/ rig sngags 'chang legs so legs so// khyod kyis yid bzhin gyi nor bu chen po don yod pa'i zhags pa rnam par dag pa grub po// khyod kyis
'jigarten pa dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i las sgrub pa'i chog bla na med pa grub ste/ rigasngags 'chang gis 'dod dgur sgyur ba thams cad de/ 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi don
yod grub pa yid bzhin gyi nor buchen po'i gas pa thogs nas/ rig sngags 'chang gis 'bad mi dgos par yid bzhin gyi nor bu chen po don yod pa'i zhags pa'i grub pa'i rang bzhin 'dis 'jig/
rten dang 'jig rten las 'dus pa'i dgos pa rnam pa snatshogs sgrub par byed pa la ltos shig/ yid la ji ltar bsams pa bzhin rdzu 'phrul dang cho'aphrul rnam pa sna tshogs la ltos shig/ rig
sngags 'chang khyod sha 'phos nas 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba can du song zhig/ 'on te bde ba can pa lta bar 'tshal lam/ ji ltar de bzhin gshegs pa la 'os pa'i lha rdzas kyis mchod par 'tshal/
lam/ rebazhin gshegs pa la mchod pa'i srin gyis mchod bar 'tshal lam/ lha'i ma tog dang/ lha'i sridang/ 'phrang ba dang/ byug pa dang/ phyi ma dang/ chos gos dang/ gdugs dang/
rgyal mtshan dang/ dril bu dang/ ba dan dang/ lhab lhub dang/ rgyan dang/ gos kyis de bzhin gshegs pa la mchod par bgyi bar 'tshalan/ rig sngags 'chang des spyi bo'i gtsug tu dri'i
dkyil 'khor bgyi lame tog dang bdugs pa 'dadabul bar bya/ yid bzhin gyi nor bu chen po don yod zhags pa'i mchog 'di lag pa g.yon pas mnan la/ lag pa g.yas pas don yod yid
bzhin nor bu'i mchog bzung nas pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te/ 'di lta bu'i yid labagyis pachen po ji lta bu'i bsam pa yid la bgyidapa de lta bu 'ang bsams nas don yod rgyal
