po'i snying po lan bdun bzlas te phyagabagyi'o// yid bzhin gyi nor bu chen po rgya chen don yod pa 'di bzlasanas 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi snying po 'di lan/
rgya rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod bgyi'o// byams pa chen po dang snying rje chen pos yongs sugadus pa'i snying gis sems can thams cad la mchog tu brtse bar bgyis nas gsang sngags bzlas brjod bgyi'o//
'phags pa don yod pa'i zhags pa'i cho ga zhib mo'i rgyal bo bam po lnga nga/// dus gsum du gshegs shing bazhugs pa'i sangs rgyas dang
byang chub sems dpa' rgya mtsho mtha' yas pa thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo// rang sangs rgyas dpa' phags pa nyan thos kyi dge 'dun 'dus pa dang/ ma byon pa dang/ da ltar 'byung ba thamo/
cad la phyag 'tshal lo// yang dag par song ba dang yang dag par zhugs pa thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo// blo grosachen po shA ra dwa ti'i bu la phyag 'tshal lo// gnas kyi mchog dga' ldan n
ska gnas pa 'phags pa byams pa la sogs pa tshogs dang bcas pa'i mchog la phyag 'tshal la// bde ba can gyi dkyil 'khor na bzhugs pa de bzhin gshegs pa 'gas pa 'od dpag tu med
pa la phyag 'tshal lo// dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo// byang chub sams dpa' sams dpa' chen po snying rje chen po dang ldan pa 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la phyag 'tshal
xxx

tsanam Ni ma Ni/ amo g+ha ma Ni sum Ni/ ma hAm Ni/ sarba ta thA ga ta a laM kAr/ ma hA a mo g+hamaNi/ tsa ra tsa rasany+tsar/ nisha tsatsaroshA ra ma hA/ pad+ma b+hu dza ba rad/ mahA kA ru Nika/ ma hAbishArUpa

d+har/ pra ba ra ma hA bo d+hisatwa pad+ma tshan pad+maA an pad+mam ku Ta/ mA lA lhar/ pad+ma go'i/ ba al kri ta ta nu sahasub+hu dzas ha sra ne tra/ nand d+hu ta/ pra bar Na/ mu dra ba/ litAs ha sra b+hu dza/ dzaya dzayo/

sha ta sa ha srarabI pra temaN+Di tasharir/ b+ha ra b+ha ra/ bi tsi tra/ A b+har Na d+ha ra/ ma Ni ka na ka badzrab i cha/ maraM ka ta/ in dra nI la pad+mar ga b+hu Ti ta sharIr/ tsi ritso ni/ btsitA/ tsaNA//

mahA bo d+hi satA bar du brash+tsa/ bit+ta ma he shwa ra/ 'u pA b+har/ pany+tse h+pha ra lo ki kUr/ a nan+te spur/ yam b.ru cha/ ku be ra ra ji ga Na ku mAr/ sa nApo ti be 'ad+ha ra/ b+ha ra d+ha ra/ b+hi'i d+hi ri/ d+hu ru d+hu ru//

ma hAd bru ta ba 'a d+har/ sarba ta thA ga ta a b+hik+Shis ma ya ma nu sma ra b+ha ga ban/ pU ra ya ma A tAAn+tar ya par na/ A ya ya sa twaM/ tu ra dzaya duny+tsan pA ta ya g+hAn/ mA ra ya tri doshamA laM/ sar

sa ra/ pA paM/ hUM hUM hUM/ phaT phaT phaT/ sa rUsi d+hu/ ma hAtsan tAm Ni/ a mo g+ha pA she d+har/ sAd+ha ya sA d+ha ya/ bi pu la sid d+hi/ ma me tri b+hu ba nad bya bra yats+tsham hA ka ru Ni ka/ nga rlu bu myu
kho b+hayas bo d+ha ya/ ma hA pa shu pa ti pAshAn+tar/ a nan+tib kur bAn/ rits+tshisan+nArAya/ tu ru tu ru/ ta ra tar/ ga ga ne ba pu la bimAn/ san d+harI ka/

na mostu te gi bu la pu rgyu ko b+har/ mahA amo glu sid d+hehU~MhU~M/ a b+hi riny+tsa tu maM/ dri brub na de khyu/ pa pu la kIrti ka re swAhA/ byu bsAhA/ b+hur b+hu bswAhA/ a mo g+ha pi pu le sAhU/ mahAtsun tu
ma Ni sid d+he swAhA/ mahAtsan tAm Nisidamyu bar de swAhA/ sarba sid d+hi ba ra de sAhA/ oM bi pu le shA ra/ lo ke shAr/ mahA tsin ma Ni/ mahA amo g+ha sid d+ha hU~M phaT swA hA/ don yod nor bu'i
zhags pa chen po 'di lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas ma thag tu rig sngags 'chang gi lus thams cad 'bar bar 'gyur ro// don yod pa'i zhags pa lag pas mnan na nam mkha'i ngos la rdzu 'phrul
gyis mchibar 'gyur ro// sgyu ma lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin dang 'dra ba'i rdzu 'phrul gyi cho 'phrul chen po ston par 'gyur ro// 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba can mthong bar 'gyur ro// de bzhin gshegs
lasku pa 'od dpag med kyang tshogs dang bcas/ 'khor dang bcas/ byang chub sems dpa' chen po'i dkyil 'khor dpagazhal med khang mchog dang bas rdzu 'phrul gyi rnam par 'phrul pa mthong bar 'gyur
ro/ bde ba can gyi gnas mtha' dag tu mchod pa'i chab kyi sprin chen po 'byung bar 'gyur zhing/ de bzhin gshegs pa tshe dpag med kyi mthus mchod pa'i ni chan por gnas par 'gyur ro/
bde ba can n gnas pa de dag thams cad de bzhin gshegs pa tshe dpagamed des rig sngags 'chapal legs so zhes bgyi ba stsol bar 'gyur ro// rig sngags 'chang des kyang sgra de dag thams
cad thos par 'gyur zhing mchod pa'i char chen po'ang mthong bar 'gyur ro// gal te rig sngags 'chang nam mkha' la 'bebs par 'tshal na/ de'i tshobasams pa tsam gyis 'debs par 'gyur
ro// 'on te mi 'tshalan nam mkha' de nyid nanam mkha' la grub pa dang/ rig sngags 'chang thams cad kyi mchog don yod rgya chen grub pa yid bzhin nor bu lag pa zhes bya ba'i 'khor los sgyur
ba mchog tu 'gyur ro// dpag tum mchis pa'i 'khor los sgyur ba'i rig sngags 'chang gis yongs su bskor bar 'gyur ro// tshe bskal pa chen po brgyastong phrag brgyad cu rtsa gnyis su 'gyur
ro// 'on te babs na lo khri'i 'tsho bar 'gyur ro// 'jig rten dbang phyug dang 'dra bar mchod pa dang gus ba cher bgyid par 'gyur ro// 'jig rtan thams cad kyi gtso bor gcig pur 'gyur ro//
lha rnams kyang babasanas rig sngags 'chang de la mchod pa'i mchog rgya chen po dag bgyid par 'gyur ro// sems can thams cad la bu gcig pa bzhin du mngon par dga' bar 'gyur ro// mchod/
pa'i 'os su'ang 'gyur ro// lha thams cad kyis kyang kun tu srung zhing phyag bgyi ba'i 'os su 'gyur ro// thos pa bsags pa'i rgya mtsho chen por 'gyur ro// gal te rig sngags 'chang phyogs
bcu dus gsum thams cad kyi de bzhin gshegs pa byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs kyis yongs su bskor ba dang bcas pa/ rangs ngas rgyas dang/ 'phags pa nyan
thos kyi dge 'dun thams cad dang/ lha dang/ klu dang/ gnod sbyin dang/ dri za dang/ lha ma yin dang/ nam mkha' lding dang/ mi 'am ci dang/ lto 'phye chen po sangs rgyas kyi
bstan pa la mngon par dad pa dang bcas pa la mchod pa bgyid par 'tshal ba 'am/ phyogs bcu dus gsum du gtogs pa thams cad kyi de bzhin gshegs pa rnams la bsod nams
kyi phung po chen po yongs su rdzogs par 'tshal ba 'am/ dge ba'i rtsa ba chen po bskyod par 'tshal ba 'am/ lha'i zas kyi mchog ro bro ba'i mchog dang ldan pa'i bza' ba dang/ lha'i bcud
kyis len gyi mchog gis de bzhin gshegs pa byang chub sems dpa' dang/ rang sangs rgyas dang/ 'phags pa nyan thos kyi dge 'dun thams cad la bstabs par 'tshal ba 'am/
sbyin pa mang po dang chen po gtong bar 'tshal ba 'am/ nyin re zhing mchod pa'i sIn bgyid par 'tsho na rig sngags 'chang des legs par bkrus te/ gtsang mas gos gtsang ma bgos nas
ci 'byor pas dkyil 'khor grub bgyi pa bzhi pa bgyis pa bcom ldan 'das 'phags pa spyan ras gzig/sa dbang phyug gi mdun du me tog dang bdug pa 'ang dbul bar bgyi'o// pus mo/
btsugs te thal mo sbyar nas zhags pa bzung ste/ de gzhan ga 20 smad nyan nad yod 2 bgyi'o// bzhin nor bu che nango rgya rje don yod 'di rang mtsho u ro/ 'phags
pa spyan rngas gzigs dbang phyug ga snying po 'a na bdun nang ba/ mig 'phrad paN sa pa rgya chen po mcho ga pa'i nanganang dang/ sbyin gtong chen po dang/ pasu dang/ btang/
dang/ dri dang/ 'phreng ba dang/ byug pa dang/ dri ma dang/ chos gos dang/ gdugs dang rgyal mtshan dang/ go dan dang/ gos dang/ brgyan dang/ lhab lhub dang/ rgyun 'phyang
dang/ rol mo dang// sil snyan dang/ phag rdzob dang/ 'ani ngo re'i ljon shing dang/ 'bras bu'i ljon shing dang/ me tog gi ljon shing dang/ mar ma'i ljon shing dang/ dpagabasam
gyi ljon shing yid la bgyi ste/ gsang sngags kyi gzungs ngu zlas nas/ ltar yid la bsams shing don du gnyer ba ngazhin rgyugs bcur 'phasan/ de'i tshe phyogs bcur rus gsum du gsheg/
pa dkyil 'khor mtha' dag du gtogs pa 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor du ma shog gung thams cad ma myong ba ma paNatis bar/ cibasams pa bzhin de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi 'khor gyi dkyil
'khor gyi snyan sngar mchod pa'i char gyi sunasnyen po 'byung 91 dang Atano/ sin dar to[']'a thams cad kyir med pa dam po ma tshang ba ma mchis pa 'byung bar 'gyur lo 74 pa thu chen po'i don
bu rgya chen don yod la mchod pa'i gzungs bzlas shing/ 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi snying ngo 'i gzungs 'di'ang nyin gcig bzhin du thun gsum du lan gsum
du bzla bar bgyi'o// des na rig sngags 'chang gis dus gsum du gshegs pa 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor dang bcas pa de dag mnyes par bgyis pa dang/ mchod pa bgyis pa dang/ rim gro bgyis par

'gyur ro// bsod nams kyi phung po'i tshogs chen po dang dge ba'i rtsa ba chen po bskyed par 'gyur ro// dus gsum dugatogs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor dang bcas pa de dag thams cad kyis
a rig sngags 'chang la dran pa dang/ blo gros dang/ stobs dang/ brtson 'grus dang/ gzi brjid stsol bar mdzad do// nyin gcig bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mthong bar 'gyur ro// rtag tude
bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis dgongs bar 'gyur ro// 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyag rtag tu rjes su 'brang bar 'gyur ro// rtag tu mchog sbyin pa mthong bar 'gyur ro// mthong ba'i chos la
mik+ka 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal 'jigs la 'jigs su rung ba dang/ skrag pa dang/ snang ba rnams rnam par zhi bar 'gyur ro// nad kyi kyang gnodabar mi 'gyur ro// rims kyis ma lags/ dug gsam lags/
dug sbyar mas ma lags/ sbyor bas ma lags/ mchon gyis ma lags/ mes ma lags/ chus ma lags te/ lus lags r ba 'bab par mi 'gyur ro// dgras 'jigs par mi 'gyur te/ pha rol gyi
dpung gi 'jigs pa ma lags/ pha rol gyi sde'i 'jigs pas ma lags/ sa kyi rgol ba dang mi mdza' ba'i 'gis ngasam lags/ lha'i 'jigs pas ma lags/ klu'i 'jigs pas ma lags/

te/ gnod sbyin dang/ dri za dang/ lha ma yin dang/ nam mkha' lding dang/ mi 'am ci dang/ lto 'phye chen po dang/ srin po dang/ mkha' 'gro ba dang/ 'dod dgur sgyur ba dang/ sbyor ba rtsub mo'i 'jigs pa
'byung par ma 'gyur ro// dpag tshad gcig gi nang tshun tshad gzung bar minus shing rgyang ring por 'bros par 'gyur te/ de la bgags bgyid par mi 'gyur ro// gang dgamanar mad par gnas par 'gyur ba'i
sems can nam/ mtshams med pa lnga bgyid pa 'am/ 'phags pa la skal pa 'dabs pa 'am// dam pa'i chos sdong bu 'am/ bskal pa bye bar bsags pa'i las kyi sgrib pas lus yongs su dkris ba
gang lags pa de'ang mthong ba'i chos la thams cad lhag ma ma lus par yongs su gtugs par 'gyur/ yongs su grol bar 'gyur ro// gal te tshig gzhan mi sna bar lan stong rtsa brgyud brgyus brjod bgyid

cing sbyang ba lan cig bgyis te bzlas brjod byas na/ de bskal pa bye ba bamyastong du 'khor bar skyo ba 'osaphyir ldog par 'gyur/ gzungs kyi bzlas brjod kyis las kyi sgrib pa snga ma rnams kyang 'byang bar
'gyurazhing/ bsal pa stong bsags pa'i snyig pa rnams nyams par 'gyur 'o// 'gorag na pa sa par rdzas mi 'gul sbyig pa dang sgrib pa thams cad kyis pad+ma bzhin du gos par mi
'gyur ro// mthong ba'i chos la sa lnga pa thob par 'gyur ro// bstan pa tsam mam// mo ga'i bzlas brjod la nges par gnas na phyir mi ldog pa'i gnas 'thob par 'gyur ro//

dran pa tsam gyis pha rol tu phyin pa drug yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// pha rol tu phyin pa bcu'i rjes sumachi bar 'gyur ro// nyin gcig bzhin du lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod bgyis na mthong ba'i chos
la kun tu bzang po nyid 'thob par 'gyur ro// gsang sngags dang/ chog zhib mo dang/ dkyil 'khor dang/ phyag rgya thams cad kyi rjes su zhugs pa dang/ dam tshig thams cad la zhugs par 'gyur ro//
yang dag par bskyod pa thams cad kyi rjes su 'brang bar 'gyur ro// rigasngags 'chang mthong ba tsam gyis mnar med par gnas pa rnams kyi sdig pa rnam par 'jig par 'gyur ro// chung ngun rig sngags
'chang dur khrod du zhugs zhas gumapa'i sa pa 'om/ gum pa'i sha 'am/ gum pa'i ro rul pa 'am/ gum pa'i zhun nam/ chung dun gum pa'i gos bor ba 'am/ rtsig pa'i ri mo la rigasngags 'chang
de'i grib mas phog par 'gyur na/ sems can gang dang gang gi dmyal bar gzhol bar gyur pa dedang de nas mod la thar nas 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba can du skye bar 'gyur te/ de la yid gnyis sam sdom
nyi bskyod par mi bgyid na/ gang dag che mang du lhag par bgyid par 'gyur ba lta smos kyang ci 'tshal/ gang rigs kyi bu pho 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo 'am/ dgoslong ba'am/ dge slong ma 'am/ dge/
bsan pa 'am/ dge bsnyen ma dad pa'i rjes su 'brang ba 'ga' zhig bzung 'di 'chad par bde/ rjod byar bgyid/ klog par bgyid/ gdon par bgyid/ sems par gyed/ sgom par bgyid/
mchod bar bgyid/ 'dribar bgyid/ 'drir 'jug par bgyid na/ de nges par dran med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par 'gyur ro// mthong ba'i ngos la yon tan chen po brgya

stong mang po 'thob par 'gyur ro// 'di nyid bcangs na mthong ba'i rtog la dge ba'i rtsa ba'i tshogs thams cad dang/ pha rol tu phyin pa drug dang rjes su mthun pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba yongs su rdzogs par
'gyur ro// gzung 'di nyid re zhig kun chub par bgyisanas mkhola'i yo byad thams cad yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur na/ dgos pa mang pos grims par bgyid pa lta smos kyang ci 'tshal/ de nas
rig sngags 'chang don yod yid bzhin nor bu zhags pa bsgrubs nas yid la bsams te bsams pa'i las thams cad bgyis na thams cad 'grub par 'gyur/ dgos pa dang bgyi ba thamA
cad grub par 'gyur ro// ji ltar 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug mchog sbyin mngon sum du mthong nas lung bstan pa bzhin du don yod pa'i yid bzhin nor bu'i zhags pa 'di de bzhin
du bltabar bgyiste/ 'di la yid gnyis mi bgyi'o// de nas rig sngags 'od gis zhags pa mgrin nga 'a btags lag pa g.yas pas nor bu blangs te/ lag pa g.yon pas lcags kyu blangs
na mi gda'abar gyur nas gar dga' bder 'jug par 'gyur te/ mtshan mo'ang nor bu'i 'od kyi snang bas nyin par ji lta ba bzhin du 'gyur ro// thams cad du lha'i gnas su 'jug/
pa dang/ klu dang/ gnod sbyin dang/ srin po dang/ lha ma yin dang/ namamakha lding dang/ mi 'am ci'i gnas dang/ lto 'phye chen po'i gnas dang/ ri sul gyi phug dang/ ri dang/ nags tshal dang/
thang gi sgo rnams 'bye bar 'gyur zhing/ thams cad du mi mngon par zhugs nas slar yang ldog par 'gyur ro// zhing ci 'tshal ba de bgyid par 'gyur ro// mi rnams kyi nang du lha'i tshe le brgyar
T+Tha 'tsho bar 'gyur ro// nyon mongs pa dang nyes pa'i skyon thams cad spangs par 'gyur/ 'on te rig sngags 'chang gis grub pa'i don la brtag par 'tshol na/ zla ba yar gyi ngo'i tshos brgyud dam
bcu bzhi la legs par khrus bgyi'o// gtsang mas gos gtsang ma bgo bar bgyi'o// gtsang ma'i gnas sam phyogs su ba'i lci blta ba'i rnam lngas yongs su sbyang bar bgyi'o// gnas de'i
nang 'khogs kyi dbus su dri'i dkyil 'khor bgyi'o// me tog sil ma dgram zhing bum pa gang bas brgyan cing sos sna tshogs kyis bsgos pa'i bdug pagazhag par bgyi'o// de nas 'phags po/
spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi mdun du snyan bzang po bshams te/ shin tumanyam par bzhag pas zhags pa sbrul 'khyil ba'i tshul du zlum po bskyil nas bzhag par bgyi'o// dbus su
0 nor bu gzhag par bgyi'o// de nas rig sngags 'chang gisamachod par bgyi'o// don yod rgyal po'i snying po lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas brjod bgyis nas khro bo'i rgyu'atsa lan 'u ku tsu kag
bzlas brjod bgyi'o// de nas don yod yid bzhin nor bu'i sIng ngo 2nargya rtsa brgyad pa zlas lhan sde'i 'os43don dang/ a ka ru dang/ duru ka'i bdug pa dbul zhing nor nga la dag pa rab
sa/ zhags pa dang de thams cad nor bu'i nang nas gda' bar 'gyur ro// de bzhin gshegs pa gda' ba la// byang chub sems dpa' gda' ba 'am/ lhagadab ba 'am/ kloga' ba
'am/ gnod sbyin dang/ srin po dang/ dri za dang/ lha ma yin dang/ nam mkha' rdzong da nga/ mi 'am cib da' ba 'am/ 'byung po dang/ lto 'phye chen po gda' pa 'am// g.yul 'gyed pa pa
gda' ba 'am/ tshe ring ba gda'abam/ tshe nyams pa gda' ba 'am/ tshe 'phos pa gdarab 9/ rgyal srid gda' ba 'am/ grong 'thob pa 'am/ yul 'thob pa 'am/ grong khyer 'thob pa
'am/ dbyig dang/ gser dang/ nor bu dang/ mutig dang dben dang/ shang ka shi la dang/ byu ru dang 1le sbram dang/ dngul dang/ gos dang/ lhab lhub dang/ rgyan gda' ba 'am/ nor sbyar ba snya
ba 'am/ mig 'phrul smra ba 'am/ zhing smra ba 'am/ gter snyab 'am/ 'bru smra ba 'om/ kud mod 'phrog pa 'am/ lasasgrub pa'i m/ gsang sngags 'grub pa 'am/ dbang du bgyi bo 'as/
ngo mtshar ba de dag thams cad nor bu'i nang nagadab bar bgyur zhing// dge ba 'am mi dge ba de dag thams cad kyang gda' bar 'gyur ro// lo 'am/ la phyed dam/ gnod pa 'am/
'tsho ba 'am/ yams sam/ mi ngas sam/ mi sa chan po 'am/ phyugs ngasasam/ bor ram/ rta nar dam/ glang po che'i nad dam/ rang gi dpung ngam/ gzhan gyi dpung gi 'jigs pa dang skug
pachen ngo de dag thams cad me long gi ngakyil 'khor la ji lta ba de bzhin du gda' bar 'gyur lags so/ gang bsams shing gang gnyer par 'grub pa 'am/ mi 'grub pa 'am/ dge ba 'am/ mi
dag ba thams cad gda' bar 'gyur te/ de la the tshom dang/ yid gnyis dang/ som nyi me bgyi ste/ dngos po don yod gzhan du mi 'gyur ro// cha' mi 'bab pa'i dus su klu'i gnas su nor bu gzhag
na ci tsam 'tshal bar char gyi rgyun 'bab par 'gyur ro// ha cang char ches na nam mkha' la nor bu bstan na char chen po 'chad par 'gyur ro// nyi ma mar kar nyim la bstan na nyi ma babs nas mchog
tsha thams cad stsol bar 'gyura'o// zla ba tshos nga la bstan na zla ba babs nas 'dod dgu thams cad kyi mchog stsol bar bgyid do/ chu klung chen por bstan na rin po che rnams 'byung bar 'gyur ro//
nags khung du bstan na snyan gyi rdzas thams cad rang gi gzugs kyis mdunan mchis nas gang gnyer ba de len par 'gyur ro// ri phug tu bstan na sman thamasacad 'bab par 'gyur te/ ci'atshal
ba de blang bar bgyi'o// 'bru'i phung po lang stanan 'bru thams cad 'dubar 'gyur te/ gang du'atshal ba der 'byung bar 'gyu2no// man 'i gnas sam nag chen po lakar ga nga
bzhag na/ nag po chen po mamo'i tshogs kyi 'khor dang bcas pa rang gi gzugs kyis mdun na mchis nas dbang shu 'gyur zhing dgos pa dang las thams cad ngagyid par gyur [”]rgyu ra
mngon sum du bstan na yan lag bzhi'i dpung dang bcas pa/ blon po' tshes/sa dang bcas pa// btsun mo 'khor dang bcas pa/ dbyig dang/ gser dang/ nor bu dang/ mu tig dang// ba spyi dang/
shang ka shal dang/ byu ru dang/ sa le sbram dang/ dngul dang/ gos dang rgyan dang/ lhab lhub dang/ rgyan 'phyang dang/ khang pa dang/ ngo mtshar dubatsas pa dbang du gyur nas/ ri srid 'tsho ba'i
bar du bstan bkur bgyid par 'gyur ro// skya bo'i tshogs chen po 'anang du zhags pa 'a pas ti don yod pa'i yid bzhin gyi nor bu'i gzungs bzlas na ji ltar btsal ba yid la bsams pa bzhin
ma tog dang/ 'bras bu dang/ gzhal med khang gi char 'bab par 'gyur ro// rgyalamtshan bsgreng ba'i rtse mor bzhag ste/ rgyal rigs spyi bor dbang bskur ba khyim gyi stong ngam khyams su bzhag la//
'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad kyi bsnyen gnas kyis sems can thams cad la mchog tubartse bar bgyi'o// don yod rgyal po'i sing po lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas brjod bgyis nas khro bo'i rgyal
po lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas par bgyi'o// de nas don yod yid bzhin nor bu'i gzungs lanabargya rtsa brgyad gsar bstod de bzlas brjod bgyi'o// u0f8bna brgya rtsa brgyad tshangasanas
ji ltar yid la bsam pa bzhin du char 'bab par 'gyur ro// nor bu dang/ 'bru dang/ gos dang/ lhab lhub la sogs pa ma tog dang 'bras bu'i char 'bab par 'gyur ro// 'thab pa dang/ 'thab
mo dang/ rtsod pa dang/ 'gyang ba dang/ mu ge'i dgon pa'i 'jigs pa dang/ yams dang/ gnod pa de dag thams cad 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi mthus bas par 'gyur/ thamasacad
rab tu zhi bar 'gyur ro// sems can thacad l ma 'jigs pa stsol bar 'gyur ro// 'jigs pa dang sha khon thams cad las thar par 'gyur ro// gdug pa nas/ gcan gzan khro ba thams cad
kyi bar du'ang byams pa la gnas par 'gyur ro// sems can thams cad mthun par bgyid par 'gyur ro// yid kyi brnag pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// don yod yid bzhin gyi nor bu'i
as zhags pa chen po sgrub pa'i cho ga'o/// de nas rigasngags 'chang ral gri dang zhags pa sgrub pa 'a 'tshalan/ rig sngags 'chang gis lcags chen po las ral gri sor bcu drug gi tshad du
bgyis la/ lag zungs kyi ngos dngul las bgyis te gsar gyis 'bar bar bri'o// shing shun gyi skud pa dang/ arka'i skud pa dang// kham dar gyi skud pa lhan cig du khru bcu drug byung ba shin tuu0f38 'a/
bab par bkum pa// sgrub la kos la yongs su rdzogs pa sul spel du bka' bar bgyi'o// de nas rig sngags 'chang gis legs par khrus bgyis te gtsang mas gos gtsang ma bgos te/
zhag pa dang ral gri mnaraM lag pa ga[/ '' ]ni zung ga gal gyi'o/ klobang 'e klu gter gyi bzhit+tagyis skyil mo krung bcas te mchis nas/ 2 gas pa sad ras
gags dang nga phyug gi ri mo' gzuT tu man du khro bo'i ngos lasung chu ngargyud g+hAl ['/]rab gyi'o// bzlas brjod na stong rtsa brgyad tshang nas ral gri 'bar bar gyur nas/ rig sngags
'chang nam mkha' la 'phur thal 'gyur zhi// ral gyi grub pa la rigs tsha 'arang sha ShA kyi/ chu ka ko[0f7a ]sa rgya ra ba'i gyur ro// gzhan gyi mthus gzil gyis non par mi 'gyur ro//
lo khri ba stong du 'tsho bar 'gyur ro// 'on te lag pa g.yon pas zhags pa bzung 'a g.yas pas ral gri bzung sta/ khros pas hU~M zhes bgyi bas mnan na mi gda' bar gyur nas mi gda' ba dang/
zhags pa dang ral gri grub pa'i rig sngags 'chang thams cad kyi gtsobo rgyal po 'khor los sgyur bar 'gyur ro// tshe khri thub par 'gyur ro// 'on te rig sngags 'chang khros pas ral gri
bskor na bgags dang/ log 'dren dang/ gnod spyin dang/ sunango ba/ dug pa can thams cad dor/ 'byopa 'o mas cad kyi 'ag sngags bcad par 'gyur ro// g.yul gyi dbus su lan cig
@#// bskor na g.yul 'gyed pa'i mtshon cha thams cad gtubs par 'gyur/ rengs par bgyis par 'gyur te/ thams cad phyogs bcur 'byor bar 'gyur ro// dur khrod kyi
ba/ nang du bskor na dur khrod na gnas pa'i gdug pa sgrub thams cad kyi rig sngags gtubs par 'gyur zhing gnas thams cad sos par 'gyur ro// phug gi sgor bskor na 'khrul 'khor dang sgo glegs/
thams cad gtub par 'gyur ro// sgo dang gtan pa thams cad gtubs par 'gyur ro// gdug pa'i mi ma yin pa bar chad bgyid pa thams cad bcom par 'gyur ro// thabar brlag bar 'gyur
naro gzhan yang dgos po thams cad du ji ltar 'tshol ba bzhin du bgyid par 'gyur ro// ra lagro sgrub pa'i choga'o/// de nas rig sngags 'chang sprul gyi zhags pa sgrub par 'tshal
narigasngags 'changapa des skud pa lnga las sgrub ste/ tshon rtsi lngas kha bsgyur ba'i skud pa chad bzhin du getubs la/ sgrub par shin tu 'os pa las bsgrub bar bgyi'o// de nas zas bzong po'i phyem
dang/ ma d+hu'i me tog dang/ ra sa'i me tog dang/ ldong ros dang/ pad+moge sar dang/ nag pus pa dang/ shing marje'i 'o ma lhan cig tu sbyar ba der btsag bsal te/ dus gcig du lhan cigamanyam
du btags shing/ spyi bor legs par sbrus te/ de la don yod rgyal po lan stong rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod bgyis nas sbrul 'khyil ba mgo gsum gyi gdengs ka can yongs su 'khyil ba gser gyis
0g.yogs pa/ legs par spel ba ni zhags pa'i mchog lags so// rig sngags 'chang gis legs par khrus bgyis la/ gtsang mas gos gtsang ma bgos nas ba'i lci ba'i dkyil 'khor grwa
bzhi tshad bzhin bgyis te dris mchod par bgyi'o// me tog gi sil ma dang bum pa gang bas brgyan par bgyi'o// ba dan gyis kun nas brgyan par bgyi'o// dkyil 'khor gyi dbus kyi gnas su
stan bzang po bshams te/ de'i steng du klu'i zhags pa bskyil nas gzhag par bgyi'o// sbrul gyi mgo'i gdengs ka dbus ma ni kha shar phyogs su ston no// dkar gsum gyi gtor ma gzhug par/
bgyi'o// mchod yo nazhabs bsal dkar po'asnod dang/ bdug pa rnam pa gsum po tsan dan dang/ a ka ru dang/ tu ru ka rnams srogago/ 'bras yos dar yungs kar bkram pa'i dkyil 'khor
bgyis la/ 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug mngon sum du bzhag la mchod pa rgya chen po bgyis te/ rig sngags 'chang gis skyil mo krungasacas tem ches nas bzlas brjod mang du bgyi'o//

thog mar don yod zhags pa'i snying po lan stong rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod bgyis nas tshang ba dang/ khro bo'i rgyal po lan stong rtsa brgyad bzlas pa'i yungs kar re re nas sbrul gyi mgo la gtor bar bgyi'o//
sgrub pa thams cad tshang nas ni// rgyun du sprul na 'bar bar 'gyur// stan las zhags pa g.yo banaM// sor bzhi tsam gyi tshad tsam du// stan las gyen du 'pharabor 'gyur// de nas rig sngags/
'chang gis gzung na mi gda' bar gyur nas klu'i gnas su mchis te/ klu'i mtshor mchis na klu'i gnas kyi sgo rnams 'bye bar 'gyur ro// rig sngags 'chang gis zhugs
zate don yod rgyal po bzlas nas sbrul gyi zhags pa lan gsum du bskor bar bgyi'o// de nas klu'i rgyal po btsun mo'i 'khor dang bcas pa mchis nas rig sngags 'chang la mngon sum du skyabs
rigasngags 'chang zhugs shig ces sla bar 'gyur ro// de nas rig sngags 'chang gis sprul gyi zhags pa bzung ste bskoras 'jug par bgyi'o// des na rig sngags 'chang gis klu'i skyon de
ma mthong azhing nub par 'gyur ro// 'khrul 'khor dang/ sgo glags dang/ gtan pa thams cad gtubs shing bcag par 'gyur ro// zhugapa tsamagyi mod la ku'i bu mo gzug bzamo medzesam/ rgyan thams cad kyis
klubasam mdzasam mchis nas rin po che'i 'phrang ba thogs te/ rig sngags 'chang la dbul ba'abgyid do// rig sngags 'chang gis byas nas spyi bo la gzhig ste/ bzhag pa tsam gyi mod la klu'i bu me
bka nam mkha' la 'phur nas num gnyis nas 'o ma zags pa dang/ rig sngags 'chang gis bzed nas btung bar bgyis te/ tshe khri nyis stong thub par 'gyur ro// skra nyung zad 'khyil bar yang 'gyur ro/klu'i
rgyal po zhes bgyi ba thams cad kyi bdag po 'khor los sgyur bar 'gyula'o// mthu dang brtson 'grus chen pos pha rol gnon par 'gyur ro// de nas rig sngags 'chang gis sbrul gyi zhags pa bzhagal
don yod rgyal bo'i sAng bopashing ka ra wI'i lcag mal bzlas nas khyab par bgyi ste/ gang dang gang gi ming nas drangs shing yid la bsams samad du thamasacad 'grub par 'gyur ro// char mi
'thab pa'i dus su sbrul gyi zhags pa gnasamathon por bskor bar bgyi ste/ lan cig bskor ba tsam gyis char gyi rgyun chen po 'bab bo// char ha cang che ba'i dus su sbrul gyi zhags pa gnas mthon por

bzhagasan mar ha cang che ba las 'chad par 'gyur 'o// grang ba'i rlung ngam ser ba 'bab pa'i dus sunang bar sngar klu'i zhogs pa phyogs bzhir bskor na dpag tshad brgya kho ra khor yug tu ser ba 'bab bar mi

'gyur te/ grang ba'i rlung dang sar drag thamasacad bacings par 'gyur ro// lo 'khyud 'khor tshang bar mtshams chen po bcings par 'gyur ro// nyin gcig bzhin don yod rgyal po'i snying po lana'i shu rtsa
gcig bazlas brjod bgyisanasazhags pa lag pa g.yas pas bsdogs la/ lag pa g.yon pas bskrad pa bgyis na nyin gcig bazhinalha'i zhal zas dang btung ba 'dod dgu thams cad klu'i gnas nas byung
nas skye bo stong stong 'tshalam stsol bar 'gyur ro// de'i dug thams cad mthong ba tsam gyis dug ma legs par 'gyur ro// sprul gyi zhags pa lag pa g.yas pas bzung la lag pa g.yon pas klubazung
nas/ dpyid dam/ ston ka 'am/ sprin chags pa'i dus su zhags pa bskor la khro bo'i rgyal po bzlas brjod bgyis te/ nam mkha' la 'phangs nam tog dang/ 'bras bu dang/ lo tog gang yang rung ba
bzang po shin tu smin pa dang/ kha zasashin tu bzang bo thams cad nam mkha'i ngos las sa la 'bab par 'gyur ro// gal te lan li shu rtsa gcig bskor la khro bo'i rgyal po/
bzlasabarjod bgyis na/ ku'i gzhal med khang dang/ gos dang/ lhab lhub dang/ rgyan 'phyang dang/ rgyan thams cad sa la 'bab par 'gyur ro// galasde rig sngags 'chang gis lan nyi shu rtsa gcig
las lhag par bskor cing khro bo'i rgyal po bzlas brjod bgyis na/ de'i tshe klu 'khor dang bcas pa gzhal med khang dang bcas par sa'i stong du ltung bar 'gyur ro// gal te rig sngags 'chang gi rgyal po
btsun mo'i 'khor dang bcas pa dbang du bgyi bar 'tshalan/ zhags pa gzhag la yungs kar la don yon rgyal po lan stong rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod bgyis nas bstan la/ de nas sbrul gyi 'gas pa blangs te
rgyal po'i khyim gyi phyogs gang lags pa der lhag par zhags pa bskor na/ rgyal po'i btsun mo'i 'khor dang bcas ba dbang du gyur nas ji srid 'tsho'i bar du mchis par 'gyur ro/ g.yul 'gyed pa na khrobs
ska rgyal po bzlas brjod bgyis nas zhags pa g.yul gyi dbus su 'phangs na sbrul gdug pa mig bgrad pa/ lcesgyur ba/ mig mamadag ltar dmar ba 'byung bar 'gyur te/ mthong ba tsam gyi mod la dpung gi
tshogs yan lag bzhi pa phyogs bcur 'byor bar 'gyur ro// gzhan yang ji lta ji ltar yid la bsams pa'i don de lta de lta bu 'athams cad sgrub par byed par 'gyur ro// sbrul gyi zhags pa sgrub pa'i
choge'o//// de nas 'byung bo'i dbang phyug gi zhags pa sgrub par 'tshal na 'bri'i rtsid pa dang/ rtsid pa chen po lhan cig tu bkal ba dang/ lcags las mdung rtse gsum pa sor bzhi'i tshad

tsam du bgyis la/ de nas don yod rgyal bo'asnying po lan stong rtsa brgyad bzlos brjod bgyis nas khro bo'i rgyalapo lan stong rtsa brgyad bzlas te/ nyin zhagagacig mchis la legs par khrus bgyi sta gtsang
mas gos gtsang ma bgo bar bgyi'o// zla ba mar gyi ngo'i tshes bcu bzhi'i nyin zhag gcig gis bsgrub par bgyi'o// de nas mdung rtse gsum pa'i zhags pa blangs na 'byung po'i dbang phyug gi gzugs 'dra
bar 'gyur ro// 'byung po thams cad kyi bdag po lo brgya stong du 'tsho bar 'gyur ro// 'byung po'i gnas kyi gzhal med khang thams cad kyi bdag por 'gyur ro// zhags pa lag par thigasanas dur khrod
du zhugs na dur khrod na gnas pa thams cad mdun du mchis te/ gnas kyi sgo thams cad 'byel bar 'gyur zhing khyod ci dgar zhugs shig ces 'tshal ba de bgyid par 'gyur ro// ro'i mgul du btags sa

khro bo'i rgyal po bzlas na/ de nas ro langs nas ci dris pa de skyabar 'gyur zhing ci sgo ba de bgyid par 'gyur ro// bkrol na mchibar 'gyur ro// gnod sbyin gyi mguladubatags te/ khro bo'i rgyal po bzlas

la khros pas drangs nas gnod sbyin de'ang mdun dumachis nas/ rig sngags 'chang la rje btsun bka'astsol cig dang thams cad bgyi'o zhes smra bar 'gyur ro// rig sngags 'chang gis khyod ji srid 'tsho'i bar du
khro bo'i rgyal po mngag gzhug pa'i las gyis shig cesasabar bgyi ste/ bka' bzhin 'tshalazhes de nas nyin gcig bzhin bsgo ba bgyis na las thams cad bgyid par 'gyur ro//
gnod sbyin mo'i mgul du btags te khro bo'i rgyal po bzlasan/ gnod sbyin mo mchis nas rig sngags 'chang gi mdun du mchis te/ rig sngags 'cha b.lamig mi 'dzums par lta zhing/ rig sngags/
'cha cazhig don du gnyerazhes sa bar 'gyur ro// rig sngags 'chang gis kho bo ma dang/ chung ma dang/ sring mos bsgrub par bya ba'i dgos pa gsum byos shig ces bsgo bar bgyi'o// gal te ma
tshan ]]zhig tu bgyid na bu gcig pa bzhin du bza' ba dang/ btung ba dang/ mal cha dang/ gos dang/ nor dang/ 'bras yo[W]su skyong bar bgyid do// chung ma zhig tu bgyid na mkho ba'i yo byad thams cad
kyi dbang phyug dang bdag por bgyid cing/ de dpalhag par dga' bar rtse bas phyi bzhin 'brang bar 'gyur ro// gal te sridamo zhig tu bgyid na yid la brnag pa'i 'dod pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs
par bgyid do// dgos pa thams cad bgyid par 'gyur ro// thams cad du rgyugacing slar yang ldog par 'gyur ro// nyin gcig bzhin lhab lhub dang/ gos dang/ rgyan rnams stsol bar bgyid do//
nyin gcig bzhin gzhan yang lha'i bumo dag rtsodacho'i don dudagug par bgyid do// rnam thos kyi mgul tu btags te khros pas drangs nas khro bo'i rgyal po'i bzlas brjod bgyis na/ de nas rnam thos
mchis nas nyin gacig bzhin dong rtse stong stsol bar 'gyur/ gser stong stsol bar 'gyur te/ des nyin gcig bzhin sbyin pa'i ng sul/ bsod nams kyang bgyi'o// nag po chen po'i mgul du btab
la khro bo'i rgyal po lan bdun bzlas brjod bgyis te/ khros pas lag pa g.yas pa'i thal lcag gis brdeg par bgyi'o// nag po chen pos sgra phyung ba na rig sngags 'chad skrag par mi bgyid par
slar yang khros pas brtag par bgyi'o// de nas mchim thags pa dang/ rig sngags 'chang gis mchi ma bzed de thig le bgyis na mi gda' bar gyur nas gter thams cad mthong bar 'gyur ro///
da nas rig sngags 'chad pa las gis yar thal mos brdeg par bgyi ste// de nas nag po chen po khrag tu skyag pa rig sngags 'chang gis byugs nanam mkha'al mchis nas gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon
chen por 'gyur ro// gu gul gyi bdug pas bdugs nas khro bo'i rgyal po bzlas na nag po chen po rang gi gzugasakyis mdunan mchis nasaMci 'tshal ba'i mchog thams cad stsol bar bgyid cing//
ma mo'i tshogs dang bcas pa thams cad dbang du mchis bar 'gyur ro// gzhan yang ci 'tshal babgyid pas dgos pa thams cad bgyid par 'gyur// mdung rtse gsum pa'i zhags pa sgrub pa'i ro
de nas zhags pa dang rjes su mthun pa'i ri mo'i tshog de kho nyid sgrub pa'i tshog bla na med pa brjod par bgyi ste/ 'jig rten mgon pos sna tshogs ba'i// rnam pa'i
kha dog gzugs bstan pa// sgyu ma lta bu'i ting 'dzin gyi// tsho 'phrul sna tshogs gzugs bstan te// lag pa stong dang mig stong dang// mtha' yas pa yi phyag rgya bstan/
rnam pa sna tshogs pa yi gzugs/ khams gsum dag tubastanang ni// gdul bya gdul phyi'i gzugs bstan to// gsang ba 'di yi gzugs bstan pa// sems can kun la phan pa'i phyir// rig

sngagasagrub pa bla med pa// de nyid zhags pa sgrub phyir ro// de bas rig 'dzin shes rab can// 'jig rten pha rol rjes 'thun pa// sangs rgyas nyid don gnyer ba dang// de bzhinagshegs kun lta ba dang/ bde/
can lta bar 'tshal ba dang// de nyid 'jig rten 'das pa yis// 'jig dbang mgon po mthong 'tshal la// mchog tu gus pas bgyi ba yi// cho ga'i rgyal po 'di brjod kyis// de nyid gus par dad pa dang// shin

tu dang ba nyid du bgyi// grol ba sna tshogs 'tshal ba la// sna tshogs pa yi gzugs bstate// sna tshogs thabs kyis grol bar 'gyur// don yod rgyalapocho ga'i mchog/ don yod grub pa'i 'jig rten 'das//don
yong 'bras bu dam pa po// don yod kun tu grub pa'i thob// sangs rgyas kun gyis byin gyis brlabs// don yod 'jig rten 'jig rten mgon// 'jig rten dbang phyug mchog sbyin pa// don yod 'jig rten 'tshal

ba mchog 'tshal ba ni grub par 'gyur// don yod rgya chen rdzu 'phrul gyi// cho 'phrul rnam 'phrul rgyun mi 'chad// de lta bas na kun basgrims te// bdag nyid yongs su dag bgyisanas// ji ltar chog bkod pa bzhin/
rjes su 'phrul par ri mo'i gzugs// rtag tu ri mo'i gzugs lta zhing// zhags pa'i gzugs sna tshogs dang// de bzhin khro bo'i rgyal po dang// rig sngags rgyal po de bzhin du// dkyil 'khor lha dang mo

lha dang/ sbyin srog rlung lha nu lha dang// khro bo'i gzugs dang zhi ba dang// lha dang klu yang ston pa dang// gnod sbyin srin po'i gzugs dang ni// 'byung po lha min dri ba dang// nam mkha' lding dang mi 'am// lto
'phye chen po'i gzugs kun tu // 'jig rten mgon pos mchog sbyin bstan// gshin rje dang ni lus nganadang// tshangs pa khyab 'jug dbang phyug che// gzhon nu dbang phyug lha dang ni// dbang phyugachen po
ma dang// zla gzugs rgyu sar tshes grangs dang// 'di dag rnam pa sna tshogs pa'i// gzugs su 'jig rten mgon pos bstan// sems can rnams la phan 'tshal bas// gdul ba'i don du 'gro ba'i
lam// sems can rnamaMs la bstan pas na// de bas som li ra ma bgyi// mchog tu dad par bgyi ba lags// ji ltar mthunapa'i dgos pa rnams// riltar mthun sngazhin du sgrub// ji ltar mthun
pa'i ri mo'i gzugs// ji ltar mthun pa'i zhags pa sgrub// gnas ni gang du 'os pa dang// gang dusems ni dga' 'gyur ba// goms pa gang gis phyag rgya dang// gang gi dkyil 'khor mor dbye ba'aphag
pa spyan ras gzigs dbang mgon// kun tu sgrol 'dren pa'i gtso// don yon 'bras bu rtsol ba ngo// don yod pa yi grub pa 'thob// don yod dgos pa thams cad dang// thub pa'i chos kyi 'khor
klu// lo ni// mchog nyid la yang reg par 'gyur// zhags pa dang ri mo sgrub pa'i cho ga'o/// de nas don yod pa'i las dang dgos pa sgrub pa thams cad kyi sbyin sreg gi
cho ga bshad par bgyis/ sdig pa thams cad mod la 'phrog pa/ sgrib pa thams cad 'jig par bgyid pa/ dgra thams cad 'joms pa/ bgegs thams cad rnam par 'joms pa/ gdug pa thams cad
bzlog pa'i mchog sdig pa thams cad 'jig par bgyid pa/ dmyal ba'i sdug bsngal bcu drug las grol bar bgyidar/ 'jigs pa mi bzad pa brgyad rtag tu 'phrog pa/ mi mdza' ba rnams rab tu 'joms pa/

pha rol gyi dpung bzlog pa'i mchog nad thams cad 'joms pa/ mod la 'thab pa dang/ 'thab mo dang/ rtsod pa dang/ 'gyod pa zhi bar bgyid pa/ muge'i dgon pa 'jig par bgyid pa/ yams kyi nad dang gnod pa 'jom

pa/lha'i bde ba 'dren par bgyid pa'i chogade khon nyid kyi sangs rgyas sgrub pa/ sangs rgyas kyi byang chub bla na med pa'i mchog thams cad sgrub par bgyid pa/ sems can thams cad kyi mthun mong mchog sbyin shin tu
las red par dka' ba/ lha rnams rtag tu mgu bar 'gyur ba/ klu thams cad dga' ba 'thob par 'gyur ba/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams rtag tu nyin mtshan du gzigs par som nyi ma mchis pa/ byang chub sems
dpa' rnams dga' bar 'gyur ba/ dus kun tu shin tumanyam par bzhag pas 'jig rten dbang phyug mchog sbyin rtag tumachis par som zhim mchis pa/ rgyal po chen po bzhi 'khor dang bcas blon po dang bcas
0 pa srung ba'i don du thams cad du rtag tu rjes su 'brang bar 'gyur lags so// de nas rig sngags 'chang shes rab dang ldan pas gtsang ma'i gnas su mchis nas sbyin sreg pe[']te/ gtsapa yi ni khyos

sam// ca co ma mchis dben bar ni// zhi ba dang ni rgyas pa dang// drag shul spyod pa rnams bgyi'o// zhi ba sems can thams cad kyi// don du sdig pa thams cad 'joms// rgyas pas rgyas pa 'thob 'gyur te//
thams cad phun sum tshogs par 'gyur// dgra dpalog 'dren gdug pa dang// gnod sbyin srin po gsang ba pa// gdug sems can rnams bred pa dang// skrag par bsdigs pa drag shul spyod// gsang

sngags sgrub pa'i sbyin sreg ste// gsang sngags sgrub pa'i bla med// 'jig rten 'jig rten pha rol gyi// sbyin srog gi ni las bgyi'o// mo lha'i lha dang klu dag dang// de bzhin rig pa'i dzinapa'i ng dgug/

khung brkos de la pad+ma'i tshul// pad+ma rtag tu bya bar bgyi// cho ga ji bzhin khung nang gi/ pad+malani ge sar bgyi// gru bzhi 'amani zlum po ste// de lta bur ni brko bar bgyi// legs par byugs shing shiN tu brtag/

shin tu sbas shing tshad la dbab// tshes grangs rgyu skar nyid dag dang// shin tu bkrashis dag la bgyi// bkra shis phyag rgya chen po dang// bzang po'agator ma'i las bgyi'o// bdug pa me tog la sogs pa/
bzang po dgam 'khor bar dgod// thog mar mi lha bkug nas ni// de nas sbyin sreg las rnams bgyi// rig sngags chang ba gtsang gyur pa// legs bkrus gtsang ma'i gos bgos nas// gsang sngags
bzlas pa'i chog bgyi// de la mtshams kyang bcing bar bgyi// bdag srung gtsug tor bcing ba dang// gzhan srung dkyil 'khor bcing ba dang// de bzhin grogs bgyid srung ba dang//

rgyun du a ka'i shing sngar te// dri yi shing rnams nyid dag dang// mar dang yungs kar 'bras yos dag/ nyi shu gcig dbul ma tog bgyi// de nas me yi lha dgug go/ oM na mo an+ni dzA la ma hA dz+wa la/ rtsod/

sna pra b+ha maN+Da la/ sam+babid A b+hU ti/ pra tA ti raki ni rad tut+tadzA la/ d+ha ma shAs/ a tsi'u su kha tiSh+Tha/ rid pa ag+harab tu dku shu ta sha na mu khan te/ sarba de bA nAM/ sarba yak+Sha ma hAbI ma hAdza ye/ mahA

bA la nor ma ri shan/ sa u0f97da han pra pu la A ka rangasha sa mu gad kan+d+ha A ba pra saM kAshan/ maN+Da la pA dza to// man ti sam+badra di bya ru pa ba ba ra da A bAhAnas/ tre gAn/ re ba stuta/ shan su tra/ shan ta ma sibi

ba rta ma kan/ an d+ha ka ran/ muk+tar shi ma pri yo ku gan d+ha pa lA ha ra/ sa ra sa ra/ a gradza/ su su ti kAmI ti samaji bin/ pra ye bak+kha pul+labasmra bas tsa basma bstani/ so ba kam/ bas sany+tsad+han can rlum

[– ]mA ku la/ dzayaso/ ba kasid d+ha ra sa d+ha ra sa grwa tsa ra sam+ba tra pra d+ha ba ri/ suwaDi nir ma ri sha Ni/ ni kyi spyiwad+hanamun tsa sa/ drwa tshigs sha/ b+ha ba no d+hib agi/ mu khe dbA ta/ a ru tsa ru dzub la ba da ka ma t+tA/

na ta/ a tha par No/ de ba de pan/ bishAr da/ e yAn tusA d+ha ya tad tA te/ o dz+wa la dz+wa la/ tiSh+Thas ma yan/ hu ru hu lu hU~M phaT swAhA/ gsang sngags 'dis ni lan bdun du// bzlas nas me ni dgug par bgyi//
gu gul yungs kar mar sbyar ba// sbar bdun sar bas me la dbul// mchod yon snod rnams dbul ba yang// de bzhin sbyar ba'i sngar bas so// dri rnams dang ni byug pa dang// bdug pa rgya chen dbul ba'
bgyi// de bzhin 'bras bu sngar bar dbul// de nas chab kyis gsang ba bgyi// ji ltar lha rnams rim bzhin du// nye reg dag kyang dbul bar bgyi// de nas rig sngags 'chang gis su// sbyin sreg las

niyang dag brtsams/ dri zhim shin tu dag pa dang// blag sha u dum ba ra dang// sna ma'i me togatsam ba dang// ka' ni ka ra nyid dag dang// pany+tsa ut+pal thang shing dang// de bzhin dri bda'i tsan dan dang//

byang chub ljon shing shing dag dang// de bzhin gzhan yang dri ga'i shing// 'on te 'bras bu'i shing mang dang// ki mngashi ba'i las lags pas// mchod yon de bzhin rtswa dag ste// de dag gis ni ma sbyar nas//
sbyin srog ga na las bgyi'o// 'bras yos tsan dan phyam dang/ a ka ru dang du ru ka/ kun tu ru la sogs pa dang// du ru kar bcas spyi ka dang// sngang sros pri yang ku blangs te// de dag lhan cig sbyar
bsras shang// mar ram mar gsar lhan cig brji// don yod rgyal po'i gsang sngags ni// brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas me la dbul// 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi mdun du lan stong rtsa

brgyad kyi sbyin sreg bgyi'o// lan stong rtsa brgyad tshang ba dang/ nam phyed na mi lha rang gi gzugs 'bar bar shin tu gnas pa langs nas phyogs bcur lta zhing kun tu brtag nas rigs sngags 'chang la legs
so zhes bgyi ba stsol bar 'gyur ro// rig sngags 'chang legs so legs so// bdag tshim par byas pas rig sngags 'chang khyod kyis sbyin sreg gi chog grub kyi/ mchog slos
shig dang thams cad sbyin no// de nas rig sngags 'chang gis ji lta bu'i 'dod pa'i mchog rnams blangs bar bgyi ste/ ji ltar byas pa bzhin thams cad stsol bar bgyid do// de nas rig sngags 'chang gis
mchod yon gyi snod dang zhabs bsal gyi snod dag dbul zhing gtor ma dbul ba'i las bgyi'o// de nas rig sngags 'chang gis mar dang bsras pa'i gong bu chen po dag gis sbyin sreg bgyi zhing/ 'bras

bu'i shang la me spar nas don yod zhags pa'i snying po lan stong rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod bgyi'o// stong rtsa brgyad tshang ba dang/ thab kyi dbus nas skyes ba zhig lus phyed tsam phyung nas dngul gyi gzhong pa kha
zas kyis bkangaste/ pusamo nub tsam du dbul bar bgyid do// rig sngags 'chang gis blang bar bgyi ste/ blangs pa tsam gyis nam mkha' la 'phur bar 'gyur zhing/ rig sngags 'chang gis lus la
me 'bar ba'i 'od zer 'byung bar 'gyur 'o// de 'tshalan tshe lo khrir 'gyur ro// nam mkha'i rig sngags 'chang gi 'khor los sgyur bar 'gyur ro// bskal pa bcu tshun chad kyi sngon gyi skye ba dran par

'gyur ro// don yod rgyal po'i cho ga zhib mo rnam par grol ba'i dkyil 'khor kha gton tu gnas par 'gyur ro// gal te snod mi len na de'i tshe yang lan nyi shu rtsa gcig sbyin sreg bgyis na chor g.yo bar
[4/]'gyur ro// 'phags pa spyanaras gzigs dbang phyug gisazugs kyi mdun du mchis na rig sngags 'chang la dbugs 'byin bar bgyid de/ rig sngags 'chang legs so legs so// rig sngags
'char khyod kyis sbyin sreg gi cho ga de bsgrub zin gyis/ mchog slongs shig dang sbyin no zhes/ de'i tshe rig sngags 'chang gis ci bsams pa'i mchog sbas pa de'i tsho thams cad stsol bar bgyid do//
'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyag gis skyes pa de las snod blangs te/ rang gila gnas rig sngags 'chang la sol bar bgyid do// rig sngags 'chang gis blangs nas zas kyi gong bu de bza'
bar 'gyi'o// 'tshal ba tsam gyi mod la nam mkha' la rdzu 'phrul gyis mchis bar 'gyur ro// lus las mo'i snying po 'bar ba'i kha dog sna tshogs 'byung bar 'gyur ro// don yod rgyal po'i rig
dzin 'khor los sgyur bar 'gyur ro/// 'phags pa don yod pa'i zhags pa'i cho ga zhib mo'i rgyal po bam po drug pa//gang+ga'i klung bye ba phrag

khrig brgya stong dgu bcu rtsa gnyis kyi bye ma dang mnyam pa'i rig sngags 'chang ba'i 'khor los sgyur ba rnams kyi rig sngags 'chang gis yongs su bskor bar 'gyur ro// gats+tsha'i klung gi bya mo bye ba khrag

khrig phrag brgya stong dgu bcu rtsa gnyis kyi bye ma dang mnyam pa'i gnas kyi gzhal med khang don yodirab tu gnas pa'i gnas rnams 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ rin po che sna bdun gyi gzhal med khang ra dang/ la
dang / nags tshal dang bcas bu/ ma tog dang 'bras bu'i shing rnam pa sna tshogs yal ga dang/ sngal mig dang/ lo ma dang/ rtsa ba dang/ myu gur bcas pa kha cigani gsarakyi ma

za tog dang/ kha cigan dngul gyi ma tog//kha cig ni rin po che sna bdun las byung ba'i me tog dag go/ gzhan yang lha'i me tog rnam pa sna tshogs dag dang/ ta ma la dang/ tsam pa ka dang/ lcag ma'i me tog dang/

ta la dang/ gan dbar shi ka dang/ snam dang/ yu ka dang/ tar na dang/ kub pya ka'i me tog dag dang/ tshal dang/ nagasatshal dang/ skyed mos tshal dga' bar 'gyur ba'i gnas kyi gzhalo med khang gisamadzes

par bgyis pa'i gzhal med khang thams cad 'byung bar 'gyur zhing dga' ba dang yid du mchibar 'gyur ro// lha'i chu klung dang/ 'bab chu dang/ lteng ka dang/ rdzing lha'i tsan dan gyi drecha pa kyis yongs su gang ba de
za' rin po che sna bdun las byung ba'i gzhal med khang dang/ lha'i pad+ma dang/ ut+pal dang/ ku mu da dang/ pad+ma dkar pos legs par brgyan pa'i chab gsar gyi bye ma legs par bdal ba'i gzhal med
khang dag 'byung bar 'gyur ro// lha'i bu mo dang/ mi 'am ci'i tshogs dang/ dri za mo'i tshog sakyis dga' bar bgyis ba/ lha dang/ lha ma yin dang/ dri za dang/ klu dang/ rig 'dzin dang/ mi 'am ci'i
tshogs kyis yongs su bskor cing/ lha'i 'byor pa'i gzhal med khang legs par bstabs pa'i gnas ni/ thams cad du rtse bar bgyid/ dga' bar bgyid/ dga' mgur spyod par 'gyur ro// byang chub kyi

snying po la thug pa nas/ byang chub la mchis kyi bar dang// chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba nas/ yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa'i bar du tsha'i tshad gcig tsam du skyong bar bgyid do// de bzhin du grub pa blo na med

pachen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug nyid byang chub kyi snying po la thug gi bar du rtag tu rjes su 'brang bar 'gyur to/ deltar zas kyi gong bu sgrub pa'i tshog shin tu rnyed par dka' lags so//
phyogs bcu mtha' dag gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing thamasacad kyi de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang lhan cig 'grogs nas mchi bar 'gyur ro// de bzhin gshegaso ba thams cad la mngon sum du chos nyan
pa thos par 'gyur ro// de'i 'od zer 'bar ba'i snying pos stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams snang bar 'gyur ro// don yod pa'i zhags pa 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi

snying po byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyis phyag bgyis pa/ rnam par grol ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi gsang sngags dang phyag rgya rim par phye ba'i cho ga zhib mo mtha' dag rdzogs par sgrub pa'i chog thams cad

dang/ cho ga zhib mo' chen po mtha' dag gi dkyil 'khor 'di kho na nyid du gnas par 'gyur lags so// klu'i rgyal po bye ba phrag brgya stong rnams de'i dbang du gyur nas rtag par rgyun dumachis par 'gyur ro//
lha dang/ klu dang/ gnod sbyin dang/ dri za dang/ lha ma yin dang/ nam mkha' lding dang/ mi 'am ci dang/ lto 'phye chen po thams cad dbang du gyur nas mchis par 'gyur ro// 'og min gyi gnas kyilha/
rnams kyibar du rig sngags 'chang de'i phyi bzhin rtag tu 'brang zhing rtag par rgyun du yongs su bskor bar 'gyur ro// lha'i ro bro ba'i mchog dang ldan pa'i bza' ba dang/ btung ba dang//
galamad khang rnam pa snatshogs dag lhun gyis grub par 'byung bar 'gyur ro// de bzhin du gos dang/ lhab lcab dang/ rgyan sna tshogs dang ldan pa'i gzhal med khang dag 'byung bar 'gyur te/ de la sogs

pasbyin sreg gi tshog don yod pa sgrub pa dag 'byung bar 'gyur ba'i grub pa 'thob par 'gyur ro// 'on te skal ba chung ba sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa'i sabonamamachis pa zhig mchis la/ des snod de/

blangs pa tsamagyi mod la rgyal srid kyi dbang phyug 'thob par 'gyur te/ lha dang mi'i dpal nyams su myong bar 'gyur ro// reg pa tsam gyi mod latshe lha'i lo brgyad khri bzhi stong thub par 'gyur ro// del
phyis kyang nad 'byung bar mi 'gyur te/ sdig pa dang sgrib pa thams cad kyis nyon mongs par mi 'gyur ro// sras kyi rgolab dang/ mimadza' ba dang/ gdug pa dang/ rab tu gdug pa thams cad nub par
'gyur ro// sems can dmyal ba dang/ dud gro'i skye gnas dang/ gshin rje'i 'jig rten dang/ yi dgas kyi yul thams cad las yongs su grol bar 'gyur ro// sems can thams cad kyi mchod gnas
gcig pur 'gyur ro// bud med dang/ skyes pa dang/ khye'u dang/ bu mo dang/ sems can thams cad lta 'tsha bar ba gyur ro// thams cad du rgyal ba sbyin par 'gyur ro// tshig btsan zhing don yod pa 'thob
par 'gyur ro// 'bum pa'i dus su de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad gzigs bzhed par 'gyur ro// 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug mngon sum du mthong bar 'gyur ro// dran pa shAne tu'u

bar bzha gnas dus bgyid par 'gyur ro// dusabagyisanas skal ba mnyam pa 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba can du skye bar 'gyur te/ pad+ma las rdzasaM te skye bar 'gyur zhing sleba'i skye ba dran par 'gyur ro//
lan 'ga' yang phyir nasong du mchis par mi 'gyur te/ phyis ma'i mngal du skye bar mi 'gyur ro// de bzhin gshegs pa thamasaM cad blta ba dang/ byang chub sems dpa' thams cad blta ba'i phyir/sas

rgyas kyi zhing nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing du rtag tu ma'i bar 'gyur ro// dpral bar thig le bgyis na thams cad du mi gda' bar 'gyur ro// me lha rtag pa 'a rgyun du dran par bagyis pa tsam gyis rang gi gzugs
kyis mdun na mchis nas mchog thams cad stsol bar bgyid do// dgos pa thams cad bgyid par 'gyur ro// de nas don yod bsgongs pa sgrub par 'tsholan rig sngags 'chang des 'brasadar sanam shar bsus

te bsgral la bsgrongasanas mar dang/ bu ram dang/ sha kha ra dang/ sbrang rtsi lhan cig brdzis nas bilaba'i tshad tsam du bgyis te/ de'i 'og tu shing ka ra wIra' ma sngar nas bsgongs pa re re la lan bdun

bzlas brjod bgyis nas mo'i nang du sbyin sreg bgyi ste/ nyin lan gsum mtshan lan gsum du brgyartsa brgyad brgyad sbyin sreg bgyi'o// de nas rig sngags 'chang gis yungs kar dang me tog ji snyad pa dang bsras
te lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas brjod bgyis nas ma'i dbus su sul bar bgyi'o// 'bras yos dang/ yungs kar dang/ khro bo'i rgyal po lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas nas gtor bar bgyi'o//
de nas me'i dbus nas me lha lus phyed tsam phyung nas rin po che sna bdun las bgyis pa'i snod zas bsgos pas bkangs nas/ rig sngags 'chang larig sngags 'chang khyod kyis zas bsgongs pa sgrub
pa'i cho ga grub zin gyis/ lha'i zas bsgongasaM pa chen po long zhig ces stobs bar bgyid do// de nas rig sngags 'chang gis zas bsgongs pa'i snod de blang bar bgyi'o// blangs pa tsam kho nas btsud/
kyis len du gyur nas nam mkha' la 'phur bar 'gyur ro// sku bcung zad 'khyil bar yapa'i gyur ro// pags pa yongs su dag par yang 'gyur ro// rig sngags 'chang 'khor les sgyur bar 'gyur ro// rig

sngags 'chang gi 'khor los sgyur ba drug khri brgyad stong gis yongs su bskor bar 'gyur ro// ma lha gnas dang gzhalamed khang dang bcas/ 'khor dang bcas pa dbang du mchis nas lasaM thams cad bgyid par

glu 'gyur ro// gang dang gang gis 'os bsgongs pa la'ogapa de'ang thos pa bsags pa'i rgya mtsho chen por 'gyur ro// don yod pa[“]zhags pa'i snying po byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyis phyag bgyis pa//

rnam par grol ba'i dkyil 'khor phyag rgya dang gsang sngags rim par phye ba dang bcas pa mog zhibamo mtha' dag rdzogs par kha ton du gnas pa 'di nyin gcig bzhin du sho lo ka stong klog gam 'char bar bgyid/

na tshe brjes nas 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba can du skye bar 'gyur te/ pad+ma las rdzus te skyes nas skye ba'i skye ba dran par 'gyur ro// lan 'ga' yang phyis dran pa brjed bar mi 'gyur ro// tshig btsun par 'gyur
te sems can thams cad kyi snying du sdug par 'gyur ro// mchod pa chen po'i 'os su'ang 'gyur ro// dpral ba la thig le bgyisan mi gda' bar gyur nas 'byung po dang/ gnod sbyin dang/ srin po thams/
cad dbang du gyur nas gnasakyi sgo thams cad 'byed par 'gyur ro// bud med gang zhig bu'i ched du zas bsgodwapa de 'tshal na bu gzugs bzang ba/ mdzes pa/ bawan sdug pa/ kha dog bzang po rgyas pa
mchog dang ldan pa red nas yun ring du 'tsho zhing yid gzhungs pa dang/ mkhas pa dang/ bstan bcos thams cad la bag tsha ba ma mchis par 'gyur ro// de nas skye bo 'bum la zas stsal par 'tshalan 'o
ma'i thug pa bsgrub par bgyi ste/ gnas gtsang ma gcom bskyangs par shing ka ra wI ra'i lcag mas dkrug cing don yod zhags pa'i snying po'i gsang sngags bzlas brjod bgyis te/ de nas khro bo'i rgyal po
chab dang yungs kar la bzlas brjod bgyis nas gtor bar bgyi'o// de nas zas bsgongs pa gcig snod kyi nang nas phyung nas 'o thug gi nang du stsal lo// de nas mar bgos te thog mar dkon mchog gsum
la bsod snyoms dbul bar bgyi'o// de'i 'og tu byang chub sems dpa' 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la dbul bar bgyi'o// de'i 'og tu 'phags pa 'jam dpal la dbul bar bgyi'o/de'i
'og tu dge sbyong dang/ bram ze dang/ rgyal rigs dang/ rje'u rigs dang/ dmangs rigs dang/ skyes pa dang/ bud med dang/ khye'u dang/ bu mo rnams dang/ bkren pa dang/

sdug 'phos pa dang/ lam gyis dub pa dang/ slong mo ba rnams la ba tustsal bar bgyi'o// ji tsam du skye bo 'bum 'tshol bar kha zas 'tshal dusal kyang snod de gang ba'am khri bar mi mngon zhing de bas par

mi 'gyur ro// gang dag zas de 'tshal bdedag sngon gyi sdig pa dang/ sgrib pa dang/ bar dugacodapa thams cad dang 'bral bar 'gyur ro// nad thams cad dang bral bar 'gyur ro// dgra thams cad dang/ phas kyi rgol ba dang/

na mi mdza' ba'i 'jigs pa thams cad kyis tshugs par mi 'gyur ro// 'byung po dang/ gnod sbyin dang/ srin po'i 'jigs pa thams cad kyis mi tshugs par 'gyur ro// lus manyenacing 'jam par 'gyur ro// nga'o/

ltar manyen zhing snyan la dga' bar bgyid ngami'am ci'i dbyang sasu 'gyur ro// rtag tu dub pa'i sdug bsngal thams cad yongs su sbas par 'gyur ro// rtag tu ji srid 'tsho ba'i bar dubadeb yang dag par stobs bar 'gyur ro// tshe

brjes nas bde 'gro thams cad du 'gro bar 'gyur ro// 'oma'i thug pas lhung bzed bkang nas de gnas mthon po bla gab med par dkyil 'khor bgyis te/ dkyil 'khor gyi sta du bzhag nas phyogs bcu'i de bzhin gshegs pa

thams cad la lhung bzed de dbul bar bgyi'o// phul ba tsamagyi mod 'chubo gdabye ba 'bum phrag ba stong gi bye ma snyed kyi phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi de bzhinagashogs pa thamasacad kyi de bzhin gshegs pa re re'i

b+ha spyan sngar lha'i zhal zas ro brgyadang ldan pa'i lha'i zas bsgongs pa dang/ lha'i 'o thug gis lhung bzed bkang ba dang/ lha'itsan dan gyi dkyil 'khor lha'i ma tog sil ma bkram pa 'byung bar 'gyur ro// de bzhin du

phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing du gtogs pa'i de bzhinagshegs pa'i 'khor gyi rakyil 'khor dang bcas pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs dang/ nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa la lha'i zhal zas robargya
dang ldan pa'i mchog gisabastangs par 'gyur ro// de bzhin gshags pa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor dang bcas ba/ byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs dang/ nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa de dag thams cad kyis

rig sngags 'chang yon bdag de'i yon sbyong bar mdzad do// gang gi phyir yon sbyangs nas skal bdang mthunapa'i tshe 'di nyid dang gzhan du dbang phyug chen po 'thob par 'gyur ro// grub pa chen po'i gse'agyis 'byor par
'gyur ro// mdzod dang/ bang mdzod mang bos rgyas par 'gyur ro// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis dgos par 'gyur ro// byang chub sems dpa' thams cad blta 'tshal bar 'gyur ro// lha thams cad

de l^as srung ba dang/ skyab pa dang/ sba ba bgyid par 'gyur ro// de nas rgyal po btsun mo'i 'khor dang dpung gi tshogs yan lag bzhi dang ngo cas pa dbang du bgyi bar 'tshalan// rig sngags 'chang des legs par

khrus bgyis te/ gtsang mas gos gtsang ma bgos nas 'o thug mar dang bsres pa 'dis lan brgya rtsa brgyad sbyin sreg bgyi'o// sngon shing dang an lishang gi am srog shing gi me sbyar bar bgyi'o// sbyin srog lan
[49 ]@#// stong rtsa brgyad tshang ba dang/ rgyal po btsunamo'i 'khor dang dpung gi tshogs yan lag zha dang bcas pa bdag nyid dmanor dbang du gyur nas mchis par 'gyur ro// nub gsum du bgyis nas klu'i

rgyal po thams cad gnas dang 'khor du bcas pa dbang du gyur nas mchis par 'gyur ro// nub lngar bgyisan 'byung po dang/ gnod sbyin dang/ srin po dang/ dri za dang/ lha ma yin dang/ nam mkha' lding dang/
mi 'am ci dang/ lto 'phye chen po dang/ mi ma lags pa thams cad dang/ mi thams cad 'khor dang bcas par dbang du gyur nas mchi bar 'gyur ro// nub bdun du bgyis na rig 'dzin thams cad dbang du
gyur nas mchis par 'gyur ro// nub thams cad du bgyis na brgya byin la sogs te sum cu rtsa gsum ris kyi lha rnams dang/ lha'i bu mo'i tshogs thams cad dang/ gtsang ma'i lha'i bu mo rnams babasanas

dbang du gyur te/ rjesrid 'tshob ribar dubasAn bkur bgyid cing mchis par 'gyur ro// zla ba nas brtsams te mar gyi ngo'i tshes nyi shu gsum mam gnam stong gi bar du dus gsum du lan nyishu rtsa gcig sbyin
sreg bgyis la/ ang+ga'i shing gi yam sregashing gis ma sbyar nas gnam stong gis rdzogs pa dang/ 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug rang gi gzugs kyis mdun du mchis nas rig sngags 'changal lig
so zhes bgyi ba stsol bar bgyid de/ rigasngags 'chang legs so legs so// nga mnyes bar byas kyis/ rig lcag 'chang smos shig dang mchog sbyin te gang mnyer ba de thams cad sbyin no// gter sla ba 'am/
nor bsgyur ba smra ba 'am/ zhing skya ba'am/ nam mkha' la 'gro ba 'am/ mi snang bar bya ba 'am/ gsang sngags stsa ba 'am/ chog zhib mo sgrub pa de dag thams cad sbyin no// rgyal po nyid dam/ blon po
nyid dam/ yul bdag nyid dam/ phyug pa nyid dam/ grong rdal 'thob pa 'am/ gos 'thob pa 'am/ ba lang dang/ rta dang/ ma he dang/ rngamo dang/ lug 'thob pa 'am/ nor 'thob pa 'am/ 'bru 'thob
pa de dag thams cad sbyin no// nam mkha' la 'gro ba'am/ mi snang bar bya ba 'am/ rdzu 'phrula' thob pa 'am/ ting nge 'dzin 'thob pa 'am/ gzungs 'thob pa 'am/ phyag rgya dang dkyil 'khor gyi chog
zhib mo sgrub pa 'am/ rolas bsal ba 'am/ rig 'dzin grub pa nyid dam/ ral gri'i rig 'dzin nyid dam/ nam mkha'i rig 'dzin nyid dam/ phug tu 'jug pa 'am/ dur khrod du 'jug pa'i m//
nags su 'jug pa 'am/ ril sgrub de dag thams cad sbyin no// de nas rig sngags 'chang gis jiltar yid la bsams shing smos pa de dag thams cad stsol bar bgyid do// rig sngags 'chang la bstanang tsam

gyi mod la drimad don yod lta ba zhes bgyi ba lus yongs su dag pa 'thob par 'gyur ro// tshobs nas 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba can skya bar 'gyur te/ pad+ma'i ze ba'i dbus nas rdzas te par las skyes nas

skya ba'i skye ba dran par 'gyur ro// don yod zhags pa'i snying po byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyis phyag bgyis pa/ rnam par grol ba'i dkyil 'khor phyag rgya dang/ dkyil 'khor rim par phye ba dang bcas
@#// pacho ga zhib mo mtha' dag dang bcas pa 'di rdzogs te/ byang chub kyi snying po la thug gi bar du kha ton du gnas par bgyi'o// des la du'i sbyin sreg gi cho ga sgrub par 'tshalan/ rig sngags

'chang des kha zas las la du stong rtsa brgyad bgyis la/ de nas rig sngags 'chang gis don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po lan stong rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod bgyi'o// da nas legs par khrus bgyis te gtsang mas gos

gtsang ma bgo bar bgyi'o// donas la dumar dang bsres te sbyin sreg bgyi'o// shin tu dri zhim po'i shing gi yam srog shing gi ma sar bar bgyi'o// stong rtsa brgyad tshang ba dang/ mo'i dbusanas khye'u zhig byung nas

ba stod lha'i la dus bkang nas dbul bar bgyidado// de nas rig sngags 'chang gis pad+ma kar la lan bdun bzlas te khye'u de'i la du la gtor ro// khya'u des rig sngags 'chang la smras pa/ rigasags 'chang
ci zhig don du gnyer/ rig sngags 'chang gis 'dod pa thamasacad byin cig ces brjod par bgyi'o// des smras pa/ rig sngags 'chang snod kyi la du khyer cig dang/ 'dis khyod kyi dgos pa dpag tu med pa
grub par 'gyur ro// 'di ni khyod kyi bcud kyi mchog yin no// rig sngags 'chang long zhig/ 'di ni khyod kyi grub pa'i mchog tu 'gyur ro// de nas rig sngags 'chang gis snodagang ba de blangs te khye'u
la'ang khyod kyis kho bo'i grogs gyisashigaces brjod par bgyi'o// khye'us smras pa/ dgos pa thams cad 'grub pa'i grogs bgyi'o// rig sngags 'chang gang gi tshe dgos pa byung ba de'i tshigu gul dang
tsanadan lhan cig bsres lamar dang yungs kar sbyar nas don yod lcags kyus lan bdun bzlas te sbyin sreg bgyi'o// arga'i shing gi me sbara'o// sbyin srag bgyis pa tsam gyi yod la bdag bkug
pas mod la mas nas dgos pa thams cad bsgrub par bgyi'o// las thams cad bgyi'o// ji srid 'tsho ba'i bar dubasnyen bkur bgyis shing bkur stir spyad par bgyi'o// bgegs dang/ log 'dren dang//
'byung po dang/ gnod sbyin dang/ srin po thamasatsed bzlog par bgyi'o// de nas rig sngags 'chang gis la du de la reg par bgyis na nam mkha' la 'phur nas rig sngags 'chang gi rigs thams cad zil
gyis gnon par 'gyur ro// rig sngags 'chang thams cad kyi 'khor los sgyur bar 'gyur ro//rig sngags 'chang gi 'khor los sgyur ba sa ya phrag gnyis dang/ bye ba phrag bdun gyis yongs su bskor bar
'gyur ro// tshe'i tshod lha'i bskal pa drug khri'i 'gyur ro// sgra cung zad 'khyil bar yang 'gyur ro// la du lhung bzed kyin ng du stsal te/ 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi mdun du bzhi g
nas don yod rgyal po'i gro bos dbang bskur te/ de nas dge sbyong dang/ bram ze dang/ rgyalarigs dang/ rje'u rigs dang/ dmangs rigs dang/ skyes pa dang/ bud med dang/ khyo'u dang/ bu mo thams cad

stsol bar bgyi ste/ longs spyod du stsale kyang bas par mi 'gyur gyi/ slar zhing slar zhing 'phel bar 'gyur ro// ji srid du lhung bzed nang na la du mchis pa de srid du 'phel bar 'gyur ro// ji srid du skye
bo 'bum 'bum mang zhing pha'am tshe bar stsal kyang gtugs par mi 'gyur ro// la du 'don yod zhags pa'i snying po lan bdun bzlas brjod bgyis na/de'i 'og du gang du reg pa de'ang
gser bzang por 'gyur ro// la du la lan bdun bzlasabarjod bgyis te klu'i gnas su 'phangasan/ de'i tshe rgya mtsho chen po mthar gtugs pa'i klu'i rgyal po 'khor dang bcas pa thams cad dbang du gyur nas
mchis par 'gyur te/ bsgo nachar mi 'bab pa bsgo ba bzhi char 'bebs par bgyid do// cibasgo ba bzhin bgyid par 'gyur ro// ha cang cha'achos na bsgo ba bzhin ha cang char chen po 'gum par bgyid/
do// rlung dang/ grong ba dang/ tsha ba dang/ ser ba thams cad bsgo ba tsam gyis gcod par bgyid do// phug gi sgoral du la la nabadun bzlas brjod bgyis nas phug gi sgor bsnunan phug gi sgo thams
tsa cad 'bye bar 'gyur ro// 'khrul 'khor dang/ gtan pa dang/ sgo glegs thams car dum bur bcag par 'gyur ro// gnas na gnas pa thams cad phyir byung nas rig sngags 'chang gi mdun du mchis/

te bsgo ba bzhin bgyid par 'gyur ro// nags tshang tshing gi dbus su 'bangasananags tshang tshing gi gnas kyi sgo thams cad phyo nas sman gyi rdzas thams cad rang gi gzugs kyis mdunan mchis par 'gyur ro//
la dul lan bdun bzlas brjod bgyis te dur khrod chen po'i dbus su 'phangs na 'byung po dang/ gnod sbyin dang/ srin po dang bcas pa'i gnas kyi sgo thams cad 'bye bar 'gyur ro// gnod sbyin dang//

srin po dang/ 'byung po thams cad sgronamor gyur nas thams cad dbang du mchis par 'gyur zhing/ ji srid 'tsho yi bar du bsgo ba bzhin mchis par 'gyur ro// rmam byung ba'i mi ro dra chab kyis khrus bgyis
la la du la lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas brjod bgyisate/ lag pa gnyis su la du stsal la gos dkar posaro g.yogs nas/ khro bo'i rgyal po yungs kar dang chub la lan bdun bzlasanas dbang bskuranaci
dris pa de dag thams cad skya bar 'gyur te/ bde ba dang/ lalegs pa dang/ lenangs pa dang/ nad dang/ gnod pa dang/ 'tsho ba dang/ pha rol gyi dpung dang/ phas kyi dgra bo dang/ mi mdza' ba'i 'jigs

pa dang/ mi ngas dang/ yams kyi nad de dag thamasacad smra bar 'gyur ro// lha'i 'jig rten du skye ba'am/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing du skye ba sla bar 'gyur zhing/ dmyal bar skye ba sla bar 'gyur ro// tshe ring ba 'am tshe/
thung ba smra bar 'gyur ro// dusam lags pa'i 'chib skye bar 'gyur ro// gter gyi gtams bar 'gyur ta/ nor bsgyur ba'i gtam mam/ zhing gi gtam mam/ mig 'phrul gyigatam smra bar 'gyur ro//
tshog zhib mo 'grub pa dang/ gsang sngags 'grub pa dang/ phyag rgya'i dkyil 'khor 'grub par smra bar 'gyur ro// mig sman 'grub pa dang/ ril bu 'grub par smra bar 'gyur ro// nam mkha' la mchib
dang/ mi gda' bar bgyi ba dang/ ro langs bsang ba dang/ risamangag pa dang/ dgrachad pas bcad cing ma dbang du bgyi ba de dag thams cad smra bar 'gyur ro// sgyu thabs sla bar 'gyur ro// nyams pa
slabar 'gyur ro// 'phal ba skya par 'gyur ba nas/ bskal pa las 'das pa'i 'das pa dang/ ma 'ongs pa dang/ da ltar byung ba'i bar du rlabar 'gyur ro// de nas rig sngags
'chang gi chab kyis khar sulal la du blasan ro 'gyel bar 'gyur ro// 'du la lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas brjod bgyis nas rgyal po'i sgor bsnun na/ rgyal po'i btsunamo'i 'khor dang bcas pa bdag
nyid dmanor dbang du gyur nas mchis par 'gyur ro// grong khyer gyi sgor bstan na grong khyer na gnas pa'i skyes pa dang/ bud med dang/ khyu'u dang/ bu mo thams cad dbang du gyur nas mchis par 'gyur
zhing nor chen po 'du bar 'grub pa 'thob par 'gyur ro// mchod pa'i gnas chen por 'gyur ro// la dul phan bdun bzlas brjod bgyis te// dpal lha mo chen mo'i lag pa sAlan dpal lha mo chen po
dbang du gyur nas nor chen po stsol cing/ ji srid 'tsho'i bar du mchis par 'gyur ro// la dul lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod bgyis nas khug ma'i nang du stsal te mchan khung du bsul bar bgyis ste/

jitsam du bsral ba de srid dum gda' bar gyur nas gang du stsal ba der 'jug par 'gyur ro// gang na shing gacig gam 'babachugacig par la du la khro bo'i rgyal po lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod bgyisdu/

dbang bskur nas shing gi drung du brdegasan 'dod dgur sgyur ba dbang du gyur nas mchis par 'gyur ro// ji ltar bsams pa'i 'dod pa thams cad nye bar mchis nas yongs su spyod pa dang/ ji srid mtsho'i bar/

[re/ ]dumachis par 'gyur ro// la du la lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas brjod bgyis te/ ma mo'i gnas su nag po chen po'i spyi gtsug tu bzhag la/ khro bo'i rgyal po lan bdun bzlas te chab dang yungs karagyis/
dbang bskur bar bgyis na/ de nas sbyor ba mo thams cad dang/ mkha' 'gro ma tham cad dbang du gyur nas mngag gzhug pa las thams cad bgyid par 'gyur ro// la du la lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas te/
nag po chen po'i lte ba'i phyogs su bzhagan/ ma mo'i tshogs thams cad rang gi gzugs kyis mdun du mchis nas mchog thams cad stsol bar 'gyur ro// las thams cad bgyid par 'gyur ro//
la dul lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod bgyis nas 'phags pa 'jam dpal gyi lhung bzed kyi nang du sul te/ khro bo'i rgyal pos dbang bskur bgyisan ji srid du lhung bzed na la du mchis pa de srid
du phyogs bcu'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi spyan sngar lha'i zhal zas ro sna tshogs kyi ro'i mchog dang ldan pa dag 'byung bar 'gyur zhing/ nyan thos dang byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs kyi 'khor
gyi dkyil 'khor chen po dang bcas pa tshim par bgyis par 'gyur ro// de bzhin gshegs pa de dag thams cad dang/ byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs dang/ nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa de dag/
gis rig sngags 'chang de'i yonasbyong ba mdzod par 'gyur ro// la du la lan brgyad rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod bgyis te/ khro bo'i rgyal po'i dbang bskur la lcags kyu'irgyal pos chab la bzlas brjod bgyis
na me thab kyi mtshams bcing bar bgyi'o/ de nas acha'i yam srog shing gis ma slar la la du rim thab kyi dbus su bzhag ste/ mar dang/ yungs karadang/ zho dang/ sbrang rtsi/

bsras pas lan brgya rtsa brgyad sbyin sreg bgyi'o// lan brgya rtsa brgyad tshang ba dang/ me lha me'i rang bzhin gyi gzugs kyis byung nas/ rig sngags 'chang la sbas pa/ rig sngags 'changalegs so legrwa
so[：]bdag tshim par byas so// bdag dga' bar 'gyur ho// rig sngags 'chang bdag gis mchog tu dga' ba thob kyis/rig sngags 'chang ji ltar yid la bsams shing 'dod pa smos shigarang
mchog sbyin no// rig sngags 'chang gis ji ltar yid la bsams pa bzhin mchog brjod par bagyi'o// mo lha des kyang thams cad stsol cing dbang du gyur nas mchis par 'gyur ro// las thams cad grub

pa stsol bar 'gyur ro// me'i phung po'i dbus su zhugs na 'od zer stong 'phro ba rnams gangs bzhin dubasil bar 'gyur te chab nas byung ba bzhin no// lag pas ma rnams tshugs par bgyid do// 'bar ba bzhin

du klad pa'i spyi bor bzhagan skra nyag ma gcig kyang 'tshig par mi bgyid de/me'i dbang dumachibar mi 'gyur ro// 'bar bzhin du g.yar gyi nang du bsrolan cungathad drobatsam du'ang mi 'gyur ro// lus la bab na
ji ltar tsan dan bzhin du bsil zhing bde bar 'gyur ro// gzhan yang dgos pa sna tshogs bgyidapar 'gyur ro// gos kyi mtha'amar thum po bgyis na tshig par ma 'gyur ro// chab kyi nang du stsalan 'bumapar
mi 'gyur ro// sbyin srog thams cad kyi tsho ga so so'i gzugs sumachis par 'gyur ro// thams cad du dgos pa 'di yan grub pa stsol bar 'gyur ro// dgos pa gang dang gang du bskos pa de dang der
dgos pa thams cad grub pa stsol bar 'gyur ro// thams cad du gsang sngags dang/ dkyil 'khor dang/ cho ga sgrub pa thams cad lung 'bogs par 'gyur ro// du ba dang/ rlung dang/ me 'bar ba'i
shugs kyis dpagatshad stong du mchis shing slar yang ldog par 'gyur ro// dgos pa thams cad nye bar ston par 'gyur ro// dgos pa thams cad bgyid par 'gyur ro// thams cad du grub pa stsol bar
'gyur ro// de nas don yod ma 'barab//bla med 'bar bzang sgrub 'tshol ba// yid bzhin nor bu lta bu dang// gzi brjid nyi ma dang mnyam pas// phyogs bcu kho ra khor yug gi/ kun nas sun
gsal bar bgyi// sgrub pa rnam pa sna tshogs dang// 'khod pa bla na med pa 'grub// bcud kyi mchog ste dam pa lags// nor sgyur smra ba bla na med// gzhan yang 'tshad pa sna tshogs pa// sgrub pa bla na
mad ba lags// ji ltar nyin mtshan gda' bas na// nyin par gyi ni gdugs dang mtshungs// lan cig dgos pa sgrub pan// legs pare las bgyis nor bu dang// rdzas bsres legapar bgyis pa la//
gtsang mas bzlas pa'i las rnams dang// gtsang mas smad pas sgrub pa dang// don yod chu dang ma dang ni// mo yoshing rnams brjod par bgyi// me 'bar 'od dang mtshungs pa ste// de dag thams cad
bya@#// gcig sbyangs pa'i// yam srag cho ga bla na med// tsan dan dang ni sang ldeng dang// pa tang ka ra wAr dang// arma sha mi skyag ma dang// shir sha kar nA'i ka dang// 'o ma'i shing

dang byang chub shing// phyag sha dang nistsam dang/ gan d+habara'i pad+mayi// rtsa ba dang ni lo mar bcas// pad+ma dkar po ku mu de// ut+pal me tog lo maM rtsa// bi dza pu ra b.lab shing// sin du ba ra tsam pa
ka/ dre ka ba tsu marje tsa// sa hab la tsi dra ka/ shing de kun ka bsdus pa yi// yam sragasheng gi las bgyis te// yungs kar mar dang zho dang ni// sbrang rtsi 'bras yos sbyin sreg bgyi// bzang po'
zangs lasasrang gsum dang// mtshal las nyis 'gyur gang bskus kyang// srang gcig tsan dan dkar po nyid// srang bcu ldong ros srang gcig ste// de dag bsres pa'i rdzas rnams dang// de bzhin
yung ni nyis 'gyur dag/ zhi ga dag ni bkang nas su// ma thab dbus su gzhug par bgyi// sbyin sreg stong ni rtsa brgyad du// shin tu mnyam bzhag legs gsal ba// gtsang ma gtsang mar sbyod pa yi//
gos gtsang legs par khrus bgyis pa// dri zhim dri yis bsgos par bgyi// ro sna tshogs pa'i gtor ma dang// mo tog 'bras bu nyid kyang dgod// bzlas brjod kyi ni sbyin srog nyid// stong rtsa brgyad
ni tshang ba dang// de nas lha bshos gtor ma dang// me tog bdug pa mchod yon snod// dbul te 'oms mdag ma dgum/ 'o mas zhig zhi bar bgyi// de nas rig sngags 'chang gi bzlas brjod stong/
rtsa brgyad bgyis nas yungs kar gyis bstan par bgyi'o// khro bo'i rgyal po lan nyi shu rtsa gcig tu dbang bskur bar bgyi'o// de nas zhig 'bar bar 'gyur ro// de nas rig sngags 'chang gis zhi ga
de la mchod par bgyi'o// de nas zangs kyi sgrom bu 'am dngul gyi sgrom bur zhi gnas nor bu blangs te/ sgrom bu der gzhag par bgyi ste/ yid bzhin gyi nor bu ji lta ba bzhin du 'di'ang don yod pa 'bar

ba mthu chen po'i mthu dang ldan par 'gyur ro// mtshan mo na zla ba'i 'od bazhin dugada' bar 'gyur ro// nyi mni nyi ma'i 'od bzhin du gda' bar 'gyur ro// nam 'tshid pa'i dus kyi tshanor bu de bzhagan 'tshob dang
sreg pa dang/ 'tshad pa thams cad grub par 'gyur ro// nam hom bgyid pa de ri mi thub kyi dbus su bzhag ste/ srog blugs kyi sbyin sreg bgyis nam chen po 'bar bar 'gyur ro// thams cad kyi thams cad
du dgos pa rnams sgrol mas gsal bar bgyis pa bzhin du 'gyur ro// g.yul ngo man por g.yul 'gyed pa'i dbus su skyes pa dpa' bo legs par khrus bgyis pa/ gos gtsang ma bgos pa/ ya lad dang
gro nar bsdams pa yid bzhin gyi nor bu chen po de'i spyi bo'i gtsug tu bzha gnas gcig pu g.yul gyi dbus su zhugs na de nas skyes ba de ma 'bar ba gcig pur 'gyur ro// de nas g.yul 'gyed pa'i pha rol

gyi dpung rnams pham par gyur nas phyogs bcur 'khrugs nas 'byor bar 'gyur ro// phyi nas lan 'ga' yang pha rol gyi dpung dang dgra'i 'jigs pa 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro// pha rol gyi dgra dang mi mdza'aba'i
[r/ ]ku@#// 'jigs pa 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro// lag pas nor bu bzung nas phug gi gnas su zhugs n gnas kyi sgo thams cad 'bye bar 'gyur ro// gnas na gnas pa thams cad mdun du mchis

bar 'gyur ro// klu'i gnas thams cad dumachisanas lag pas naor bu bzung ste gnas kyi nang du zhugs na chab thams cad kyi phyir mi tshugs bar 'gyur ro// de nas klu thams cad mdun du mchis nas bden pa'i dam

bca' bar 'gyur ro// dbang du gyur nas ji sridamatsho'i bar du las bgyid bar 'gyur ro// bsgo ba bzhin bgyid par 'gyur ro// lo tog dang/ rtsa dang/ shing gel ba dang/ nags tshal thams cad bde ba 'a phal par

sgyu 'gyur ro// sAn cing mdangs dang ldan pa dang menyin bar 'gyur ro// gzi brjid dang ldan pa dang/ dran b dang ldan pa dang/ mi bde ba chung bar yang 'gyur ro// rtsems can gang dag gis kyang lo tog dang/ mi
tog dang/ 'bras bu la longs spyod par 'gyur ba de dag thams cad dang/ gzhan ches mang po dag gis dgos pa mang bo bgyid par 'gyur ba ni nor bu chen po ren yod 'bar ba'i nor bu me 'bar ba'i chen po
skya lags so// de nas don yod snang ba rnam par lta bas 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug bkug ste rang gi gzugs su blta bar 'tshalan/ donas rig sngags 'chang gtsang mas gos gtsang ma bgo
bar bgyi'o// lus legs par bkrus te sos chab kyis byug par bgyi'o/ shi nga acha'i yam srog shing gis ma sar bar bgyi'o// yungs kar dang/ a ka ru dang/ tsan dan dang/ zho dang/ sbrang rtsi dang//

mar sbyar bas stong rtsa brgyad sbyin sreg bgyi'o// de nas don yod lcags kyu gu gul las lan nyi shu rtsa gcig gi srog blugs kyis sbyin sreg bgyisan/ 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug rang gi gzugA
kyis mdunan mas nas/ mchog thams cad bsams pa bzhin yongs su rdzogs par bgyid do// ji ltar yid la bgyid cing bsam pa'i mchog stsol bar bgyid do// de nas rig sngags 'chang gis ji ltar
yid la bgyis shing bsams pa'i mchog sbas pa dang/ de'i 'og tu 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis thams cad stsol bar bgyid do// de nas mig sman sgrubapar 'tshal na rig sngags 'chang des
legs par bkrus lagatsang mas gos gtsang ma bgo bar bgyi'o// nub gcig sbyang ba bgyis te/ des zangs kyi za ma tog bgyis la/ de nas mig sman so bi ra dang yung ba nIs 'gyur du sras pas dag pa bar

bgyi'o// de nas stong rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod bgyis nas thab kyi dbus su gzhag par bgyi'o// de'i stang du u shi ra dang/ yungs kar dang/ tsan dan dang/ zho dang/ sbrang rtsi dang/ mar dang bsres pas lan

stong rtsa brgyad sbyin sreg bgyi'o// shing argya'i ma sbyar bar bgyi'o// lan stong rtsa brgyad tshang ba dang/ de nas mig sman blas la gtun gyi stong du legs par zhib du btags la/ ldong ros dang/ ga bur dang

glar rtsi bsres nas slar yang don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod bgyis la/ don yod lcags kyu'i rig sngags rgyal bo lamanyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas brjod bgyis pa ni thams cad
du mgul pa legs par sbyar te/ de nas don yod rgyal pos dbang bskur bar bgyi'o// don yod zhags pa'i phyag rgyas lan bdun phyag rgya bcings so// de nas mig sman gyis byug/
nanam mkha' la 'phur nas rig sngags 'chang thams cad kyi dbon por 'gyur ro// sgra cung thod 'khyil bar yang 'gyur ro// bskal ba khrir 'tsho bar 'gyur ro// dpral bar thig le bgyis na mi gda'o
bar 'gyur ro// mig la bsus te tshig gzhan mi sla bar rgyal po'i pho brang du zhugs na rgyal po'i btsunamo' 'khor dang bcas pa dbang du gyur nas mchis par 'gyur ro// mchod pa phal po ches cher mchod
par 'gyur ro// nor 'du ba grub pa chen po 'thob par 'gyur ro// sgrub pa'i dus sam bzlas brjod kyi jus su mig la bskus na bgegs dang/ log 'dren dang/ bdud kyi rigs kyi lha thams cad kyi sa mi

tho mthong bar 'gyur ro// phyis kyang bgegs byed par mi nus te/ bar chad bgyid par mi 'gyur ro// bde ba sgrub pa'i cho ga dang bzlas brjod kyi chog grub par 'gyur ro// mig la byugs te skye bo mang po'i
nang du zhugs nade dag thams cad dbang du gyur te nor dang/ 'bru dang/ gos dang/ lhab lhub rgyan phal po ni 'grub par 'gyur ro// bud med kyang mig mi 'dzums par lta bzhin du bdag nyid dam nor dbang
du 'gyur ro// mig la byugs te dgon pa chen po zhugs na chom po dang/ g.yon can dong/ rkun po dang/ gcan gzan gdug pa dang/ sbrul dang/ dbyig dug dang/ sbrul gyi dug gi 'jigs pa
[thams cad 'byung bar mi 'gyur te/ bde legs su slar yang mchiba' 'gyur ro// 'thab mo dang/ rtsod pa dang/ 'gyed pa thams cad la mig sman bskus na sa ba rnams kyi bla na med par 'gyur te mA/
chad du rgyal bar 'gyur ro// g.yul ngor g.yul 'gyed pa'i nang du mchis nas mig lakhyugasan thams cad las rgyal bar 'gyur zhing/ 'jigs pa thams cad las bsgral bar 'gyur ro// gdug pas
zin pa thams cad la mig la bskus na gdug pa ma mchis par 'gyur ro// rims zhag gcig pa dang/ zhag gnyis po dang/ zhag gsum pa dang/ rims zhag bzhi pa thams cad la mig la
bskas na rams nad thams cad las grol bar 'gyur ro// dug mi bzad pa 'tshal lamig la bskus na dug ma mchis par 'gyur ro// gdon thams cad kyis zin pa lamig labaskus na gdonabargyad khri
bzhi stong las thar par 'gyur ro// migabro 'tshal ba la bstas pa tsam gyi mod la byang bar 'gyur ro// kad pa cher bro 'tshal ba la'ang mig la bstas pa tsam gyis byang bar 'gyur ro// tshangs pa'i srin
po'i gdon dang brjod byed kyis zin pa la mig la bsdus pa tsam gyis thar bar 'gyur ro// rgyal po khros pas gsad par 'os pa gang su'ang rung ba khrid pa mig la bskus pa tsam gyis 'jigs pa thams
cad spang ba'i thar por 'gyur ro// nor bu chen po'i mig la bskus na rang gi gzugs kyis dus su mdun na mchis nas mchog thams cad stsol cir dgos pa thams cad bgyid bar 'gyur ro// ma mo'i
tshogs thams cad dbang du gyur nas mchis par 'gyura'o// dpal lha mo'i mig la bskus te mig mi 'dzum par don yod rgyal po'i snying po lan gsum bzlas na/ dpal
lha mo chonamo mchis nas dgos pa thams cad dang 'bru rab tu mang bo stsol bar 'gyur ro// nyal ba'i mig labasus tanyalan rmilam bzang po mapazhing phal che ba mthong bar 'gyur ro// 'phags
pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug rang gi gzugs mthongo bar stsol bar 'gyur ro// mchog thams cad stsol bar 'gyur ro// dran ba dang blo gros rgya chen por 'gyur ro// mig la bskus te tshogs kyi
dbus su zhugs nAmachod patshonapo 'thob par 'gyur// 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi gzugs brnyan gyi mig la bskus na rtag tu mchogasil bar 'gyur ro// rtag tu blta 'tshal

bar 'gyur ro// gi'u wang dang lhan cig sbyar te mig la bskus nas rgyal po'i pho brang du zhugs na dbang phyug rgya chen po 'thob par 'gyur ro// longs sbyong chen po phun sum tshogs par yang 'gyur ro//
don chen po 'grub par yang 'gyur ro// rgyal po btsun mo dang/ blonabo'i tshogs dang/ 'khor thams cad dga' bar gyur nas thams cad dbang du gyur ti mchis par 'gyur ro// dpalalha mo chen
mo'i gzugs brnyan gyi mig la bskus na 'byung po thams cad kyi bdag por 'gyur zhing/ las bgyi btsimachis zhes thams cad dbang du gyur nas mchis par 'gyur ro// nag po chen po'i gzugs
0 brnyan gyi dpral ba dang mig la bskus na gnod sbyin thams cad dbang du 'gyur ro// mi ro'i mig la bskusan ltang bar 'gyur ro// gsang sngags dang/ dug sbyar ma dang/ byad kyis zin pa thams/
cad kyi mig la bskusan/ dug sbyoram dang/ byar dang/ gsang sngags thams cad bshig par 'gyur zhing lan 'ga' yang sar zil gyis gnon par mi 'gyur ro// bkres pa'i mig la bskus te
grong du zhugs na bza' ba dang btung ba'i ston mo lhan gyis 'grub cing 'thob par 'gyur ro// bsod snyoms pa'i mig la bsdus te bsod snyoms la mchis na kha zas sna tshogs mang po dang yon phal po
che 'thob par 'gyur ro// smra ba dang/ ling tog dang/ rab rib dang/ chu bur dang/ mtshan mo 'thob pa dang/ g.yal ba dang/ tshag po rang/ mig gi rdzi ma rdung ba dang/ migs bo de dag thams cad
nibar 'gyur ro// mig nad thams cad las sos par 'gyur// lha'i mig dag pa 'dab bzang dang mtshungs ba 'dab bzangs kyi mthong ba thob nas thams cad kyi snying du sdug pa dang/ dbang du gyur
nas nior red pa dang/ don grub pa'i ng thob nas dbang phyug bla na med par 'gyur ro// de nas nor dang/ 'bru dang/ gos dang/ lhab lhub dang/ rgyan dang/ rgyan 'phyang thamasacad dgug pa dang/ 'phal ba
bgyid pa dang/ don yod ma lha dgug pa'i sbyin srag rgya chen po brjod par bgyi'o// grub pa kun gyi bla named// don kun grub pasamodi lan// mkhas rnams mchog tu dga' bar bgyid// dbang phyug skal
ba phun sum tshogs// mod nyid khonar 'thob 'gyur bar// the tshom du yang mi bgyi zhing// yid gnyis nyes kyang ma lags so// gtsang mas gtsang ma'i gos dag dang// legs par
bkrus pa'i las sgrub bo// sbyin srog blanamed 'phal ba// 'di'i rgya chen bsam mi khyab// kar na rtsa ba sdong bur bcas// 'dab mame tog 'bras bur bcas// arga shing ra smugashing ga/ ya ma sreg

dag gis ma sbyaralo// sa bon bdun po 'bras dang bcas// 'bras yos til dang yungs skar dang// zho dang sbrang rtsi mar dang ni// yungs mar dag dang bsres pa yi// sbyin sreg stong rtsa ngargyapatshang bgyi//

khro bo'i rgyal po lan stong rtsa brgyad kyis dbang bskur pa tsha ba dang/ de nas don yod lcags kyu'i rig sngags kyi rgyal po lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas nas gu gul dang/ sa tsho'i 'bras bu dang/ mar du sbyar bas sbyin
srog bgyi'o// dgos pa thams cad rdzogs pa dang/ de'i tsho bza' ba dang/ btung ba dang/ gnas mal dang/ stan dang/ nad kyi rkyen sman dang/ yo byad dang/ nor dang/ 'bru dang/ mdzod dang/ bong ba 'phul
bar yang 'gyur ro// gos snatshogs dang/ lhab lhub dang/ rgyun dang/ rgyan 'phyang dang/ ma tog dang/ bridang/ 'brang ba dang/ byug pa rnams lhun gyis grub par 'byung bar 'gyur ro// dbang phyug gi

byor pa chen po 'thobalar 'gyur zhing/ ji srid 'tsho'i bar du mchis pa ra 'gyur ro// de nas zla ba yar gyi bo'i tshes brgyad la nyin zhag gcig mchis nas mig la bsdus te/ don yod zhags pa'i snying po lan
dgu bcu bzlas brjod bgyis la/ khro bo'i rgyal bos dbang bskur nas don yod zhags pa'i phyag rgya bcings te/ de nas mig la mig sman gyis bskus nanam mkha' la rdzu 'phrul gyis mchis par 'gyur
ro mig sman grub pa'i rig sngags 'chang thams cad kyi gtso bo rgyal bo 'khor los sgyur bar 'gyur ro// sgra cung zad 'khyil bar yang 'gyur ro// bskal pa khrir 'tsho bar 'gyur ro// mig sman 'dis
mig la byugasan nyin par ji lta ba bzhin du mtshan mo mthong bar 'gyur zhing mi gda' bar yong 'gyur ro// 'byung po dang/ gnod sbyin dang/ srin po'i gnas thams cad du zhugs nathams cad kyi dbon
por 'gyur ro/'phags pa don yod pa'i zhags pa'i cho ga zhib mo'i rgyal po bam po bdun pa// mig sman 'dis mig la byugs nas ma mo'a gnas

su zhugs na/ lhagatso bo de dag mig mi 'dzums par lta bar bgyid pa la khro bo'i rgyal po lan gcig bazlas par bgyi'o// de nas ma mo dang lha'i gtso bo thams cad mdun du mchis nas mgo thams cad stsol bar
