'gyur ro// ji srid 'tsho'i bar du las thams cad sgrub par bgyid pas mchis par 'gyur ro// ma mo'i tshogs thams cad kyis yongs su bkur cing snying du sdug par 'gyur ro// rtag par rgyur du srung ba dang/

skyab ba dang/ sra ba'i phyir gnas shing rjes su 'brang bor 'gyur ro// de nas ga'u wang sgrub pa'i sbyin sreg gi cho ga brjod par bgyi ste/ don yod rgyal po grub pa yis// rig sngags 'chang ba bde myong zhing/ lha
[p/ ]@#// dang lha min mchod pa dang// sgrub pa'i don kun 'grub pa dang// dbang du 'gyur dam ba dang// mkha' la mchiba'i dam pa dang// mi lcang shin tu rnyed dka' dang// mod la phug tu

'jug pa dang// nags kyi nang du 'jug pa dang// ri sul dag tu 'jug ba dang// thang dag la ni rgyu ba dang// klu gnas amatshorasi'ajug pa dang// de bzhin muklung che bsgral dang// rdzu 'phrul grub dang bskyed pa
dang// de bzhin 'jigs dang sgrib kun dang// nad kun zhi bar bgyid pa nyid// sdig pa thams cad nyams par bgyid// g.yul ngor g.yul las rgyal bgyid de// rtag tu reg kun rlag par bgyid// gdon rigs
kun dag tshar gcod cing// rims tshwasathams cad zlog par bgyid// sngon gyi sgrib pa 'jig bgyid cing// sdig pa thams cad nyams par bgyid// dbang phyug stsol cing skal ba stsol// nor dang 'bru rnams
'phel bar bgyid// 'thab pa 'thab mo rtsod pa dang// 'gyed pa rab tu zhi bar bgyid// bcing bdang ni shing sgrog dang// khong sgril lcags sgrog phye mar roge/ rgyal po gdug pa khros pa yis// gsad par
'os pasal bar bgyid// da ltar 'di la brten panas// mi bdag bu stag bzhin smra zhing// mi bde kun las grol bar 'gyur// 'di na kun lusdug pa dang// gnas kumamachis par mchos par 'os//
lus can snying du rtag tu sdug/ rgyal po btsun mo 'khor bcas pa'i// rtag tu gnang chen dag tu 'gyur// dge sbyong bram ze nyid dang ni// rgyal rigs rje'u rigs dmangs rigs dang// bud med kun dang de

tsazhabazhin du// skyes pa khye 'u bu mo yi// rtag tu gnang chen dag tu 'gyur// gi'u wang bla ma med pa'o// 'di la gang dag rtag brtenan// 'phags pa 'jig rten dbang phyug sa// mchog sbyin rtag tu mchod par

bgyid// tshangs pa khyab 'jug dbang phyug che// nyin dang mtshan du srung ba dang// rtag tu mchog stsol phyir mchis so// gzhan yang lha ni mang po dang// klu yi rgyal po mthu chen dang// 'byung po gnod

sbyin srin po dang// grul bumami min lto 'phye che// driza lha min nyid dag dang// nam mkha' lding dbang mthu chen te// de dag thams cad srung ba yi// ched du nyin dang mtshan dag tu// rang dbang nyid
kyis gnas par 'gyur// gi'u wang grub pa dam pa po// de ltar stobs dang ldan pa lags// de nas rig sngags 'chang ba yis// gtsang gyur legs par khrus bgyis nas// gtsang ma yi ni gos
bgo ste// gi'u wang lags par bsgrub nas su// dmar po chen po nyid dag dang// gur kur dag dang mnyam sbyar la// zangs kyi snod du bkang nas su// don yod zhags pa'i gzugs mdun du// stong
rtsa brgyad ni tshang bzlas nas// rgya dar gyi ni kha dgum mo// de nas seng lde gi shing dang/ a rishing gi yam srog shing gi me sar la 'bras yos dang/ yungs kar dang/ gu gul dang/ 'bras dang/

til dang bsres la/ zho dang sbrang rtsi mar du bsres te lan stong rtsa brgyad sbyin sreg bgyi'o// lan stong rtsa brgyad tshang ba dang/ de nas me zhi zhing me mdag phra mo'ang zhi ba dang thal ba blangasate snod kyi nang du stsal
nas/ de nas slar yang lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas la/ khro bo'i rgyal pos dbang bskur te/ phyag rgya'i phyag rgyus kyang dbang bskur ro// de nas dpral ba'i dbus su thig le bgyis/
nas nam mkha' la 'phur nas rig sngags 'ang chen po'i rgyal po 'khor los sgyur bar 'gyur ro// rig sngags 'chang thams cad kyi dpon por 'gyur zhing sgra cung zad 'khyil bar yang 'gyur ro//
lo dgu khri dgu stong du 'tsho bar 'gyur zhing gnas kyi sgo thams cad rtag tu 'byed por 'gyur ro// dpral ba la thig le bgyisan mi gda' bar gyur nas gnas thams cad du zhugs na gnas thamasacad
kyi bdag por 'gyur zhing 'byung po dang/ gnod sbyin dang/ srin po'i gnas kyi sgo thams cad 'byed par 'gyur ro// 'byung po dang/ gnod sbyin dang/ srin po mthu dang ldan pa thams cad kyis yongs
su bskor nas mtshas par 'gyur ro// ji srid 'tsho'i bar du bsgo ba bzhin bgyid par 'gyur ro// mig la bskus na ji ltar nyin pa' bzhin du mtshan mo snapazhing thams cad du gter mthong bar 'gyur

ro sa'i phug dang thang gi sgo phye ba mthong bar 'gyur ro// thang gi gnas su zhugs na thang gi dgos pa thams cad bgyi sta/ slar yang mchibar 'gyur ro// chu klung chen po'i nang du zhugs na khyim dang
gzhalamad khang ji lta ba bzhin du mthong bar 'gyur ro// rin po che thams cad kyis brgyan pa'i gzhal med khang mthong bar 'gyur ro// chab la gnas pa gang lags pa de dag thams cad dbang du gyur
nas mchis par 'gyur ro// klu'i mtsho dar gnas su ji ltar rang gi khyim bzhin du 'jug cing 'byung bar 'gyur ro// lus mtha' dag byugs te g.yul ngor g.yul 'gyed pa'i nang du nubs na/ ya/
lad dang go cha bgos pa bzhin du mthong nas thams cad las rgyal bar 'gyur ro// khar bsral te rgyal po'i pho brang duzhugs na btsun mo 'khor dang bcas pa dbang du gyur nas mchis par 'gyur ro//
gang la tshig smras pa de dag thams cad bgyid par 'gyur ro// gang la blangs pa de dag thams cad ster bar 'gyur ro// gang la bsgo ba de thams cad bsgo ba bzhin bgyid par 'gyur ro// khar 'chos
nas gang dang gang du mchis pa de dang der skyes pa dang/ bud med dang/ khye'u dang/ bu mo thams cad bdag nyid dam nor dbang du gyur nas mchis par 'gyur ro// lag pa g.yas pa la byugasanas su
la reg pa de dbang du 'gyur ro// nor dang/ 'bru dang/ dbyig dang/ bran pho dang/ bran mo dang/ las bgyid pa dang/ zho shas 'tsho ba dang/ mngag gzhug pa rnams dbang du gyur nas bsgo ba bzhin/
mchis par 'gyur ro// mdzub mo g.yas pa la bsus nas ser ba dang/ sbyin dang/ 'brug gi dus su sbyin la mngon sum du bstan te bsdigasan/ grang ba dang/ rlung dang/ sa [“]thams ca ni
bar 'gyur ro// dpag tshad gcig kho ra khor yug tu zil gyis mnan par 'gyur ro// cha ha cang chesanalag pa g.yas pa sprin la mngon sum du bstan pas ha cang char che ba gcod par 'gyur ro// cha mi 'ab
pa'i dus su lag pa g.yas pa'i lag mthil la byugs nas klu gnas pa'i mtsho'i tshul thal mo lan gsum brdabs na/ de'i mod la klu'i rgyal pos char gyi rgyun chen po gtong bar
'gyur ro// gal te mod la char pa mi 'babs na de'i tshilan lnga brdegs pa dang/ klu de dag thams cad kyis char gyi rgyun gtong bar 'gyur ro// gang gi mar pa mi 'babs pa de'i tsho klu thams cad

la klad pa'i nad 'byung bar 'gyur ro// gal te lan bdun brnyanan klu'i rgyal po thams cad la tshul ma yin pa'i sdug bsngal 'byung bar 'gyur ro// klu'i rgyal po thams cad kyi rig sngags phung bar bgyis par
'gyur ro// gdon gyis zin pa thams cad kyi mig la bskusan/ bskrus pa tsam gyi mod la gdon brgyad khri bzhi stong rab tu zhi bar 'gyur ro/ rams kyis thebs pa rnams kyi dpral bar la thig le
bgyis na rims zhag gcig pa 'am/ nyin gnyis pa 'am/ nyin gsum pa 'am/ nyin bzhi pa'i rims thams cad zhi bar 'gyur ro// nad kyis zin ba rnams la khrus bgyis na mod la nad thams cad las
thar par 'gyur ro// sha bkra dang/ mdzo dang/ rkang shu dang/ g.yan pa dang/ shu ba dang/ 'brum bu rnams las thar par 'gyur ro// g.ya' ba dang/ lhag pa dang// mtshan bar rdol ba dang/ shu ba mched
pa dang/ 'brum bu phra mo mched pa la byugs pa tsam gyis thar par 'gyur ro// gdug pas zin pa thams cad la byugs pa tsam gyis ma gdug par 'gyur ro// dug gis myos par bgyis pa thams cad

la 'tshol ba tsam gyis thar par gyur ro// lton ba dang/ skran dang/ dmu chu dang/ mchin pa na ba dang/ rtsib logs na ba dang/ sAng na ba dang/ chu son ba dang/ gzhung nad dang/ tshad pa dang/ gcin srib/
dang/ gsud pa dang/ ma gzhub dang/ rtugaskams la bsrosanas 'tshal ba tsam gyi mod la zhibar 'gyur zhing/ phyis lan 'ga' yang gnod par bgyid par ma 'gyur ro// 'tshogs mar gi'u wang gi ril bu
bgyis te/ phug gi sgo dang nye bar mchis nas lag pa g.yas pa la'ang byugs te/ mgo la thal mo brdabasan phug gi sgo thams cad 'bya bar 'gyur ro// bag tsha ba ma mchis par 'jug// slar cung zad kyang
bgags bgyid par mi 'gyur ro// gnas don gnas pa gang lags pa de dag thams cad dbang du gyur nasamadun na mchis par 'gyur ro// dgos pa sgrub ba chen po thams cad 'grub par 'gyur ro// rkang pa
gnyis la byugs te me 'bar ba'i nang du zhugs na mi lha rang gi gzugs kyisamadun dumachis nas lag pa nas bzung ste/ rig sngags 'chang larig snyigs 'chang bdag gi gzhal med khang gi gnas su/
zhugs shigaM/ rig sngags 'chang gis bsgo ba thams cad bsgrub par bgyi'o zhes smra ba na/ de'i tshe rig sngags 'changags bgyi bci mchis pa de bsgo bar bgyi ste/ thams cad bgyidapar 'gyur ro//
dpung pa gnyis la byugs na glang po che bdun gyi stobs dang ldan par 'gyur ro// brla gnyis la byugasan tshugs pa ma mchis pa'i khyad du 'gyur ro// byin pa gnyis la byugasan 'bab chu chen po'i ba rol
tu rgyal bar 'gyur ro// mgrin pa la byugs nas nags khung duzhugs na nags khurakyi gnas kyi sgo thams cad dbye nas sman gyi rdzas thams cad rang gi gzugs kyis mdun na/
mchis par 'gyur teci 'tshal ba de blang ba'i 'gyur ro// gi'u wang gi ril bu bgyis te khar bsrel nasa'i sul dang snyan gshong du zhugs nas skad drag po lan gsum gdon par bgyi ste/ ri sul dang snyan
gshong gi gnas gsang ba'i sgo gang dag lags pa 'bye bar 'gyur zhing/ de na gnas pa gang lags pa de dag thams cad rang rang gis gzugs kyis mdun namachis par 'gyur zhing las thams cad bgyid
par 'gyur ro// de nas rtswa dang shing gel ba dang/ nags tshang tshing gi snyan gyi rdzas gang lags pa dag rang gi gzugs kyis mdun na mchis par 'gyur zhing/ gang dag gi bcud kyi mchog de dag la 'dzag
la bcud srung ba de dag kyang rang gi gzugs kyisamadunan mchis nas thams cad dbang du 'gyur ro// ji ltar 'tshal ba bag tsha ba mamachis par dgos pa thams cad bgyid par 'gyur ro// snying khar thig
le bgyis nas snying la cung zad ci bsams pa dang/ yid la bsams shing brnag pa'i dgos pa de dag thams cad mod la sgrub par 'gyur ro// ltol thig le bgyis na kha zas dang btung ba'i ston mo 'dod
dgu thams cad thob par 'gyur te/ phumasum tshogs pa thams cad lhun gyis 'grub par 'gyur ro// rtsibs logs gnyis la byugasanaji ltar bsams shing don du gnyer ba'i gos rnams 'thob par 'gyur
ro[：]sgal tshigs la byugs na ji ltar yid la bsams pa'i mal dang stan 'thob par 'gyur ro// rna ba la byugs sam gnad dang gnad thams cad kyi gnas su byugan ji ltar bsams pa'i rgyan dang sgrub/

lcab thob par 'gyur ro// mjug do la byugasan rta'i bzhon pa 'thob par 'gyur ro// nyin gcig bzhin nang par tshig gzhan mi sa bar gi'u wang gi ril bu re re la don yod rgyal po'i snying po bzlas nas 'tshal
to nyim dang po lo tshigs su bcad pasong bklags na 'dzin par 'gyur ro// nyin gcig bzhin nyis 'gyur du bgyisanas bkags 'dzin par 'gyur ro// zhag bdun gyis thogs pa mang por 'gyur ro//

zhag bcu bzhirab gyis na mi 'am ci mo lta bu'i sgra dbyangs su 'gyur ro// zhag nyi shu rtsa gcig bgyis na thos pa bsags pa'i rgya mtsho chen por 'gyur ro// ka la bang ka'i dbyangs ltar mnyen cing sAn la rnaba'isgra
dbyas su 'gyur ro// bu'i ched du mar dang lhan cig stsalan byag lta bu dang mo gsham rnams kyis kyang bkod par 'gyur ro// btson rar stsal ba dang shing sgrog dang/ lcags sgrog dang/ gtan pa dang/
khong sgril la byugs na byugs pa tsam gyi mod la dum bur dum bur 'chag par 'gyur ro// 'thor bar 'gyur ro// tshes brgyad dam/ bcu bzhi 'am/ tshes bco lnga la donayon rgyul po'i sAng po lan bdun bzlas
la khro po'i rlol pos rang la bskur nas gi'u wang gi ril bu dang spos chab bsres pas khrus bgyi'o// khrus bgyis pa tsam gyi mod la sdig pa thams cad dang/ sngon gyi sgrib pa thams cad rnam par 'jig/
ba 'gyural// chub gsum du khrus bgyisan gsang sngags dang/ phyagargya dang/ sgrub pa dang/ grub pa'i mchog thams cad thob par 'gyur ro// phas kyi rgol ba dang mi mdza'
bdang gdug pa dang/ sdig pa thams cad kyis mi tshugs par 'gyur ro// lan 'ga' yang thams cad kyis thams cad du 'jigs pa mi 'byung zhing yongs su thar par 'gyur ro// phyis lan 'ga'

yang sdig pas dri mas gos pa ra mi 'gyur ro// gi'u wa nga gi zil bu til mar dar bsres te kha gdong la byugs nas rgyal po'i mdun du mchis na bu bzhin du phang du 'khyud nas dga' ba chen po 'thob pa dang/
rgyal po khro bo'i 'jigs pa thams cad zhi bar 'gyur ro// lus thog thag tu khyugan gsad par 'os pa'i lus la'ang mtshon gyis phog par mi 'gyur te/ dum bur dum bu pa'i chag par 'gyur ro// 'da'
'phangs na lus la 'bab par mi 'gyur zhing gzhu 'chag par 'gyur ro// gi'u wang garal bu mgul du btags nas 'brog dgon pa dang/ ri dang/ nags tshang tshig gi bgrod dka' bar zhugs na chom po dpa
g.yo can dang/ rkun po dang/ gnod sbyin dang/ srin po dang/ mi dang/ mi ma lags pa dang/ gcan gzamagadug pa dang/ sbrul gdug pa dang/ dug gi 'jigs pa thams cad 'byung bar mi 'gyur tami
gda' bar 'gyur ro// dpung pa g.yas pa la btags nathams car du pha rol las rgyal bar 'gyur ro// thams cad du mchod gnas chen por yang 'gyur ro// thams cad du mthu dang brtson 'grus chen po
brdzi ba med pas ngas rol zil gyis gnon par 'gyur ro// dpung pa g.yon pa la btags na skyes pa dang/ bud med dang/ khye'u dang/ bu mo thams cad kyi gnang chen du 'gyur te/ thams cad lta 'tshal
bar 'gyur ro// mchod pa'i 'os chen por 'gyur ro// dgos pa mang po 'grub par 'gyur ro// byon pa g.yas pa la gtagasan dub pa ma mchis pa'i dpag tshad stong du mchis par 'gyur ro// gi'u wang gi
la bu khar bsral la lag pa g.yas pas yungs kar gyi don yod lcags kyu bzlas nas drangs te tshig gzhan mi sna bar gnas mthon por 'gyur te/ phyogs gang dubasams pa'i skyes pa dang/ bu'am/
dang/ khye'u dang/ bu mo mchis pa'i phyogs der yungs kar gyis gtor na mod la bkug par 'gyur te mchis par 'gyur ro// gal te dpag tshad brgya tsam na gnas pa zhig na'ang gdon mi 'tshal bas de
zhag gsum gyis mchis bar 'gyur yid gnyis ma bgyi'o// lag pa g.yas pa 'am/ lag pa g.yon pa la ga'u wang gi ril bu btagasan gang du reg pa'i nor dang/ 'bru dang/ dbyig dang/ nor bu dang
mu tigadang/ shang ka shi la dang/ byu ru dang/ sa le sbrum dang/ dngul dang/ gos dang/ lhab lhub de dag thams cad bkug nas mchis bar 'gyur te/ rtsa 'tshal ba de mchi bar 'gyur ro// byan tshar du

zhugs nas tshang mang gi sgor thal mo brdabasan/ 'tshed pa dang 'tshed pa'i kha zas de dag thams tsed bkug nas mchi bar 'gyur te/ gang du 'tshal ba der mchi bar 'gyur ro// sngos 'tshong gi tshong khang
sa// mang du mchis na tshong khang gi yo byad thams cad machi bar 'gyur ro// chang 'tshong gi sbyor thal mo brdabs nachadagi bum pa thams cad mchi bar 'gyur ro// bang ba'i skor/
thal mo brdabs na 'bru thams cad bkug par 'gyur ro// bcud 'byin pa'i khyim du zhugs nas 'khrul 'khor la reg par bgyis na/ bu ram gyi khu ba dang sha khara'i glegs bu thams cad mchi bar
'gyur ro// gang du 'tshal ba der mngags par 'gyur ro// grong khyer gyi sgor mun tshab tshub na thal mo brdabs na grong khyer na gnas pa thams cad gnyid slog par 'gyur ro// dgra bo'i sgor btab na
bsad par 'gyur ro// mtshon mkhan gyi khyim du 'badas na mtshon cha dang go cha rnams rengs pa dang rgyags par bgyis par 'gyur ro// rgyal po'i sbyor btaban phas kyi rgol ba dang/ mi mdza' ba dang
sems can gdug pa thams cad bcings pa dang/ rengs pa dang/ rmugs par bgyis par 'gyur ro// dung la byugs nas gnas mthon por busan sgra gang du grags pa de dag tu 'thab pa dang//
'thab mo dang/ gnod pa dang/ 'gyod pa dang/ byed dang/ dug sbyar ma dang/ dug dang/ nad las yongs su thor par 'gyur ro// grong khyer gyi sgor bus na yams kyi nad dang/ gnod pa dang/
mi dus thams cad rab tu zhi bar 'gyur ro// phyugs lhas su bus na 'o ma thams cad phrogs par 'gyur ro// gang du 'tshal ba der mchi bar 'gyur ro// ra lug gi lhas su bus na ra lug gi 'o ma
rdzogs par 'gyur te/ gar 'tshal bde mamibar 'gyur ro// skye bo'i tshogs chen po'i dbus su bus na thams cad smanamor gyur nas gro thamA cad bkug par 'gyur ro// rdza rdzal byugs te 'khyams

ma thon pa'i stang du brdungs na grang ba dang/ rlung dang/ sor ba thams cad bcings pa dang bshig par 'gyur tu tshugs par ma 'gyur ro// dpag tshad brgyakho ra khor yug tu ser ba bkage ra ra 'gyur ro//
grong khyer ram yul 'khor mtha' dag tu busan nad dang/ yams kyi nad dang/ gnod pa dang/ 'tshob thams cad zhi bar 'gyur ro// 'thab pa dang/ 'thab mo dang/ rtsod pa dang/ 'gyed pa thams cad
rab tu zhi bar 'gyur ro// mi ngas dang mu ge'i 'jigs pa thams cad rab tu zhi bar 'gyur ro// gzhan yang dgos pa rnam pa sna tshogs brgya stong dag bgyid par 'gyur te/ thams cad la sbyar bar bgyi'o//
de nas sems can thams cad dang thun mong ba zhi ba dang rgyas pa nad thams cad zhi bar bgyid cing/ sdig pa thams cad 'jig par bgyid pa/ yams kyi nad dang gnod pa thams cad rab tu zhi bar bgyid pa/
mu ge'i dgon pa thams cad rab tu zhi bar bgyid pa// 'byung po dang/ gnod sbyin dang/ srin po dang/ gdon dang/ brjod byed thams cad rlag par bgyid pa brjod par bgyi'o// rig sngags 'chang gtsang mar
gyur pas legs par khrus bgyis te/ spos dri zhim posaM lus byugs la/ gos gtsang ma bgos la sos dri zhim pos bsgos nas byams pa'i sems la mnyam par gzhag cing/ sems can thams
cad la lhag par brtse ba dang/ snying rje chen pos sAng gdung pas sbyin sreg gi las 'di bgyi sta/ argya'i shing dang/ shama'i shing dang/ shing 'o ma can nam/ ji ltar yang byang chub
kyi shing ste/ de dag gi yam srog shing gi ma saral/ 'bras yos dang/ yungs kar dang/ pad+madang/ pad+ma'i ldum bu dang/ 'dabam dang/ zho dang/ sbrang rtsi dang/ mar du bsres par sbyin sreg bgyi'o/

don yod zhags pa'i snying po stong rtsa brgyad bzlas nas/ de nas don yod zhagasab khro bo'i rgyal pos dbang bskur to/ don yod zhags pa'i phyugargyus phyag rgyalan brgya rtsa brgyad bcing ro// de nas sbyin sreg
gi dgos pa rnams mthar phyin pa'i mod kho nar dpag tshad gcig khor yug tuyams kyi nad dang/ gnod pa dang/ 'tsho ba dang/ nad dang/ mu ge'i dgon pa mi bzad pa dang/ rang gi dpung dang gzhan gyi
dpung gi 'jigs pa dang/ phas kyi rgol ba dang/ mi mdza' ba'i 'jigs pa thams cad dang/ tshem po dang/ g.yon tanadang/ rkun po dang/ gcan gzan gdug pa can dang/ sbrul dang/ dug mi bzod pa
dang/ gdug pa dang bcas ba'i srog chags kyi 'jigs pa thams cad rab tu zhi bar 'gyur ro// mi tshugs par 'gyur ro// dpag tshad brgyad khor yug tu rims mi 'byung ste/ gnod pas ma lags//
nad kyisam lags te/ gnod sbyin dang/ srin po dang/ 'byung po dang/ gdona rnams kyisami tshugs te rab tu zhi bar 'gyur ro// 'thab pa dang/ 'thab mo dang/ rtsod pa dang/ 'gyed pa dang/ napa'i khrug
pa dang/ 'khrug pa dang/ sgod pa dang/ mdongs gcod pa dang/ 'ching ba dang/ bsdigs pa rnams kyis mi tshugs te rab tu zhi bar 'gyur ro// sems can thams cad bad bar 'gyur ro// shin tu lo/
legasashing mdangs dga' la skya bo dang mi mang pos rab tugangazhing/ me tog dang/ 'bras bu phun sum tshogs par 'gyur ro// nor dang/ 'bru dang/ lo tog rab tu mang po 'grub par 'gyur ro// shin

tu ro dang ldan pa dang/ shin tu smin pa dang yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// rtswa dang/ shing gel ba dang/ sman dang/ nags tshang ching dang/ myu gu dung/ rtsa ba dang/ 'bras bu bzang po yongs su rdzogs

par 'gyur ro// phyir zhing ji srid 'tsho'i bar du yul de na yid du mi mchiba'i rig pa myong bar mi 'gyur ro// yul de narage sbyong dang/ bram ze dang/ rgyal rigs dang/ rje'u rigs dang/ dmangs rigs dang/
skyas pa dang/ bud med dang/ khye'u dang/ bu so rnams rtag tu nad ma mchis par 'gyur ro// bde bar 'tshob dang yid la dga' zhing mgu bar 'gyur ro// byams pa dang snying rje'i sems kyis gnas par

'gyur ro// lha dang/ klu dang/ gnod sbyin dang/ dri za dang/ lham yin dang/ nam mkha' lding dang/ mi 'amaci dang/ lto 'phye chen po de dag thams cad kyang ' gas par srung ba'i phyir rtag tu bsrung ba dang/

skyab pa dang/ sba ba'i phyir dang ga tshad brgya khor khor yug tu bsrung ba dang/ yongs su bskyang ba dang/ zhi ba dang/ bde legs su bgyid par 'gyur ro// rgyal po bzhi'ang dpung dang bcas te yongs su sbyong ba
dang/ srung ba dang/ skyob pa dang/ sbed pa bgyid par 'gyur ro// gdug pa thams cad bzlog pa dang/ srung ba dang/ yongs su skyong bar 'gyur ro// dbang phyug dang dbang phyug

chen po'i lha'i bu rnams rtag par rgyun du srung ba dang/ skyob pa dang/ sbrad par bgyid par 'gyur ro// lha'i dbang po brgya byin sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha'i bu 'khor dang/ tshangs pa dang/ khyab 'jug dang//
dbang phyug chen po dang/ lha'i tshogs kyi 'khor thams cad kyis yul de legs par bsrung bar 'gyur ro// gzi byin stsol bar 'gyur ro// dpag tshad gcig kho ra khor yug tu sems can thams cad yongs

su srung ba dang/ yongs su skyong bar 'gyur ro// dge sbyong dang/ bram ze dang/ rgyal rigs dang/ rje'u rigs dang/ dmangs rig dang/ skyes pa dang/ bud med dang/ khye'u dang/ bu mo thams cad la srung ba
dang skyabs dang/ sbrad par bgyid par 'gyur ro// zhi ba'i las 'di'i mthus sems can thams cad sdig pa dang sgrigs thamasacad las rnam par grol bar 'gyur ro// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi
yul de la dgongs par 'gyur ro// phyogs bcu'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thams cad dang/ byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs thams cad yang dag par dgongs par 'gyur ro// sems can
thams cad la dbugs 'byin par ston par 'tshal bar 'gyur ro// sems can thams cad yongs su srung ba'i don du nyi ma dang zla ba rgyu skar gyi tshogs dang bcas pa legs par 'byor pa'i 'gyur ro// 'phags

05 pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug rtag par rgyun du skyes pa dang/ bud med dang/ khye'u dang/ bu mo thams cad la bu gcig pa bzhin du dbugs 'byin par 'gyur ro// yongs su bsrung ba dang yid kyiparnag pa thams

cad yongs su rdzogs par bgyid par 'gyur to/ yang nas yang du lta bar 'gyur ro// de nas des sbyin sreg gi thal ba dang dri mu skyo ma bgyis te phyogs bzhi kun tu dbang bskur nA mtshams chen po bcad pa bgyis par
'gyur ro// nad kyi zin pa thams cad kyi nad thams cad nye bar zhi bar 'gyur ro// rims thams cad la thig le bgyis na rims thams cad las thar par 'gyur ro// dri chab dang thal bas khrus bgyisan
thams cad kyi sgrib pa dang sdig pa thams cad rnam par dag par 'gyur ro// btson ra na mchis pa 'am phyag sbal namachis pa'i gos la bskus pa na 'al bar 'gyur ro// gdug pas zin pa dang dug gis myos pa/
thams cad la bsusan gdug par mi 'gyur ro// ma dgug pa'i sbyin sreg gi cho ga rdzogs so////de nas pad+ma rgya chen po'i dekyil 'khor 'dir pad+ma'i rigs 'phags pa spyan rasag zigs

dbang phyug gi don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po rnam par grol ba'i dkyil 'khor chog/zhib mo'i rgyal po chen po brjod par bgyi ste/ 'di ni ma bsgrubs par las brgya stong bgyid par 'gyur ro// so sargyu skar
bzang po dang// shin tu bkra shis mchog dge la// legs par khrus bgyis gos gtsang bgo/ byams pa'i sems la mnyam par gzhag/ sems can kun la brtse ba dang// snying rje dam pas brgya pa dang//
don yod zhags pa rig sngags che// grub pa bla med cho ga'i rgyal// bklags pas lasa rnams thams car dag/ 'grub par bgyid de som nyi med/ 'jig rten bla ma'i snyid po dag de

bzhin gang dgartag brjod na// lus can rtag du mchog sbyin gyis// phyag na pad+majag tu 'gyur// ji ltar gapa'i bya snyad kyi// sangs rgyas byo baphrag stong la// bsod nams phung po gi khrag bskyod// gaba'i

rtsa ba sogs pa dang// sangs rgyas bya ba bgyid bar 'gyur// sbyang ba bgyisanas bzlas brjod gcig/ mkhas pa'i mis ni brjod bgyis pa// dge slong pa dang dge slong ma// dge bsnyen pho mos de bzhin du// bde ba
can du myur du mchi// sdug bsngal mi bzad myong 'gyur ba'i// nyon mongs pa las thar bar 'gyur// rtag tusas rgyas byang sems dag/ mthong bar 'gyur te som nyisod// de nas don yod zhags pa'ising bo'i
tshig ji lta ba bzhin du bzlas brjod kyi tsho ga brjod par bgyi ste/ bzlas brjod kyi ni las bgyisan// rig sngags 'chang de nye bar 'grub// don yod zhags pa'igazugs brnyan gyi// mdun du brtsi'i dkyil
'khor bgyi/ gru bzhi kho ra khor yug tu// tshor rtsi dkar po zhib mo yis// gru bzhi lhag par thig gdab bo// ngos bzhi rnams su sgo bzhi dag/ dbus nas so bzhir gshis su dbab// tsan dan dkarab+bo
bri bani// dkyil 'khor mchog la pad+ma dag/ 'dab brgya gur kum gyis gtong tsang// pad+ma'i ze ba'i dkyil dag tu// ma zhom pa yi bum pa ni// spos chab kyis ni bkang ba yi// yus kar ldan pa
[t]/ gzhag par bgyi// a ka ru yi bdug pa dbul// bum pa gang ba'ang dgod par bgyi// me tog snachogs brgyan par bgyi// mchod yon snod kyang bzhigazhag go/ rig sngags 'chang ba gtsang gyur par/
gtsang ma'i gosan bgo bar bgyi// ligs bkrus rnam par dag pa dang// gso sbyong dag ni blangs pa dang// dkar gsum zas ni'atshal nas su// dusagasum du khrus bgyi'o// dus gsum bzla
brjod bgyi ban// don yod zhags pa'i snying po dag/ dus gsum du yang brgya rtsa brgyad// 'phags pa 'jig rten dbang phyug gi/ mngon sum skyil mo krung bcasato// bzlas brjod phyag rgyabacings
nas su// bgrang 'phrang dag ni blang bar bgyi// mdzub mo dang ni mthe bong dag/ bskyang nas zhi zhing dul ba yi// yid kyis byams sems mnyam par gzhag/ taMri 'dzin brtan pas lus snyoms par//
legs par bzhagaso zhib lta// tshig gzhan mi sna bzlasabarjod bgyi// bzlos brjod bgying tsam gyis mod la sa chen po g.yo bar 'gyur/ don yod pa'i zhags pa'i phyag rgya bcings taphyag bgyisan
sa chen po'ang g.yo bar 'gyur// brtan pa'isams kyis skrag par mi bgyi'o// sems can thams cad la mchog tubartse bas 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug don yod zhags pa mthong ba tsam du
brosal/ jitsaman khro bo'i rgyal po lan bdun bzlas so// lan bdun bzlas pa tsam gyi mod la sa chen po g.yo zhing sgra 'byung ba'agyur ro// 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi dpralang
@#// nas 'od zer byung nas kun tu snang bar 'gyur ro// rig sngags 'chang de' nga cherasIng dga' ba dang/ bzhin 'dzum pa dang/ shin tu ma tshu dga' bas sa gzing zhes bgyid
par 'gyur ro// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyigadong du blta bar bgyi ste/ gdong du bltas pa tsam gyi mod la bcom ldan 'das 'phags pasbyan sa gzigs dbang phyug gi phyag g.yas pa nas legs so

zhes bgyi ba'i sgra 'byung bar 'gyur ro// mig bsgyur bar bgyid cing kun tu legs so zhes bgyi ba'i sgra byung na/rig sngags 'chang gi sgrib pa thams cad rnam par dag ba thob nas lus yongs su dag pa chen
po dang ldan par 'gyur ro// de bzhin gshegs po bye bas ya phrag brgya stong la dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed par 'gyur ro// byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyis blta ba'i 'os su 'gyur ro// lus 'jam pa
dang/ shin tu gzhon sha chags pa dang/ mnyan par 'gyur ro// sku cung zad 'khyil ba dang/ mnyen pa dang/ snyan pa'i tshig smra bar 'gyur ro// mig yongs su dag par 'gyur te/ lus yongs su dag pa
dang/ yid yongs su dag pa dang/ gnyen ma dang/ sa skya bo sngangs par 'gyur ro// sems can thams cad la lta ba dag pa zhes bgyi ba'i ting nge 'dzin 'thob par 'gyur ro// jitsam du 'dug ce na/'phag
paspyan ras gzigs dbang phyug rang gi gzugs ston cing dbugs 'byin par bgyid de/ lag pa g.yas ba spyi bor bzha gnas mchog thams cad stsol bar 'gyur ro// nam mkha 'al mtshib 'am/ mi gda'
bar bgyi ba'am/ lha'i mig 'thob ba 'am/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing lta ba 'am/ ting nge 'dzin rab tu 'thob pa 'am/ gzungs rab tu 'thob pa 'am/ don yod pa'i zhags pa'isIng po'acho ga zhing mo 'grub pa/
'am/ gtsug lag smra ba 'am/ gsang sngags smra ba 'am/ thos pa 'dzin pa nyid dam/ gtar sa ba 'am/ nor bsgyur ba sma ba 'am/ mig 'phrul smra ba 'am/ 'jig rten du 'gro ba 'am/ phug tu 'jug pa 'am/
klu'i gnas su 'jug pa 'am/ zhing sna ba 'am/ gnod sbyin dgu pa 'am/ srin po dgug pa 'am/ ro la ngas srang ba'am/ nags khrod du 'jug pa 'am/ ri la rgyu ba 'am/ grong khyer du 'jug pa 'am
smanalta ba'i phyir 'jug pa 'am/ ral gri'i rig sngags 'chapa nyid dam/ grub pa'i rig sngags 'chang nyid dam/ 'khor los sgyur ba nyid dam/ rgyal po 'thob pa 'am/ yul 'thob pa 'am/ yul gyi
bdag po nyid dam/ dpung chen po rab tu gzhom pa 'am/ bskyar pa 'am rgya mtshor 'jug pa de dag thams cad stsol bar 'gyur ro// dgos pa grub pa thams cad stsol bar 'gyur ro// ji ltar gang du
'tshal bar yongs su skyong bar 'gyur// mtshams ma mchis pa lnga rnams byang bar 'gyur ro// rtag tu bzlas brjod bgyis na sems can thams cad la lta ba sgrib pa dang bral ba dag pa zhes bgyi ba'i

ting nge 'dzin 'thob par 'gyur ro// smig sman sgrub par 'tshal bas des zla ba yar gyi ngo'i tshes brgyad la ldong ros kyi mig sman zangs kyi snod kyi nang du stsal te/ tsan dan gyi dkyil 'khor bgyis 'phags
pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi mdun du bzhag nas/ legs par khrus bgyis te gos gtsang ma bgos nas/ 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi mdun du skyil mo krung
bcas te mchis nas bzlas brjod bgyi'o// don yod zhags pa'i phyag rgya'i mtshams bcing bas mtshams bcang bar bgyi'o// khro bo'i rgyal polanabadun du bzlas par bgyi'o// thasaM dkar gsum 'tshal bar
bgyi'o// rig kyi bu pho 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang yang rung bas 'thags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad kyi bsAna gnas la goms par bgyis nas bzlas brjod bgyi'o// bzlas brjod bgyis pa tsam gyi mod la/
zangs kyi stod 'bar ba dang/ rlangs pa dang/ dbu ba 'byung bar 'gyur to/ de blangs nas mig la byugs nanam mkha' la rdzu 'phrul gyisamachis nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad kyi de bzhin gshegs pa/
thams cad mthong bar 'gyur ro// phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas rnams mthong ba dang/ rig sngags 'chang gi 'khor los sgyur ba chen por 'gyur ro// phug gi gnas phye ba thams cad mthong bar 'gyur ro//

gter gyur ba thams cad mthong bar 'gyur ro// lta'i gnas thams cad kyi sgo phye ba mthong bar 'gyur ro// gang du 'tshalo ba rer mchi bar 'gyur ro// gnod sbyin dang/ srinapo dang/ 'byung po dang/ sha za[E.]
dang / gden dang/ mi dang/ mi ma yin dod 3/ phas kyi rgol ba dang/ mi mdza' ba thams cad mi gda' bar 'gyur ro// tshos brgyad dam/ bcu bzhi 'am/ bco lnga la tshig gzhan mi smra bar 'jigs pa spyan ras

[4/ ]gzigs dbang phyag gi mdun du skyel mo krung bcas te mchis nas lan stong rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod bgyi'o// bzlas brjod bgyis pa tsam gyi mod la 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug lha'i bdag nyid kyi/
rang bzhin gyi gzugs kyisamadunan mchis nas lag pa g.yas pa snga bor bzhag pa dang/ dri med 'phags kyi lta ba'i cho 'phrul zhes bgyi ba'i ting nge 'dzin 'thob cing/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis

gzigs pa'i byin gyi rlabs bkod pa yaradag par lta ba snang ba zhes bya ba'i rdzu 'phrul thob nas tshe ri tshod lha'i bskal pa stong du 'gyur ro// bdag nyid lha'i rang bzhin thob pa dang/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang/
de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcomapa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od dpag med kyis dam pa'i chos kyi gtam gleng ba'i mdzad pa thos par 'gyur ro// bdebatsanan gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems/

dpa' chen po thams cad bsu ba'i slad du'i gtsug kim dunan mchis par 'gyur ro// skyanyung zad 'khyil bar yang 'gyur ro// pad+masnang ba'i gzhal med khang zhes bgyi ba'i khang pa brtsegs ma'i gzhal med khang mthong ba

'gyur ro// de nas rangagi lus rdo rje sra ba bdag nyid kyi snying po'i rang bzhin thob par 'tshalan/ rig sngags 'chang dos spos chab des bum pa bkang nas lan drug khri nyis stong bzlas brjod bgyis te/ byang chub sems
dpa' 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi mdun du nyin zhag gcig mchis par 'gyur bas khrus bgyi'o// khrus bgyis patsam gyi mod la las rdo rje las byung ba'i rang bzhin du 'gyur ro// de bzhin
gshegs pa thams cad de la gzigs par 'gyur ro// tshalha'i lo khrir 'gyur ro// gnod sbyin dang/ srin po dang/ 'byung po'i gdon thams cad dbang du 'gyur ro// lha dang klu/
thams cad kyi dpon por 'gyur ro// 'jig rten pa'i dgos ba sbyab pa thams cad bgyid par 'gyur ro// dran pa tsam mam sems bskyed patsam gyi mod la gdon thams cad dang brjod byed thams cad babasanas
thams cad snabar 'gyur te/ bden pa 'am/ mi bden pa 'am/ yang dag pa 'am/ yang dag pa ma lags pa 'am/ skal ba dang ldan pa bam/ skal ba dang mi ldan pa 'am/ byung ba 'am ma byung ba 'am//
'byor pa dang/ rgyas pa dang/ bad ba dang/ lo legs pa de dag thams cad skya bar 'gyur ro// de la sogs talas bgyi ba thams cad bgyid par 'gyur ro// bran bzhin du las thams cad rtag tu bgyid
par 'gyur ro// yang na 'jig rten thams cad so sor bsgral bar 'tshal ba 'am/ thams cad dbang du gyur nas gzhag par 'tshal lam/ thams cad sems can dmyal ba 'am/ dud 'gro'i gnas/
tsha sam gshin rje'i 'jigarten las thar bar bgyid par 'tshal lam/ don yod ye shes bkod pa zhes bgyi ba'i ting nge 'dzin thob par 'tshal lam/ rnam par grol ba'i dkyil 'khor sgrub par 'tshalalam/
don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po'i cho ga zhib mo sgrub par 'tshalan/ rig sngags 'chang des gzugs bar naso so ba bzhin du 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug don yodapa'i gzugs su bgyis te//
ral pa'i thor tshugs dang/ ri dgas a r+ya ya'i pags pas brgyan pa/ phyugs bdagagi cha lugs 'chang ba/ rgyun thams cad kyis brgyan pa/ skyilamo krung ngam 'greng ba/ drung na nor bzang pus mo g.ya
pa phab pa/ g.yonan khro bo'i rgyal bo gdong gyen du lta ba khro bo'i gzugs log pa drug pa/ 'od dpag med kyi dbu rgyan thogs pa/ rgyan thamasacad kyis klubs pa/ thams cad ring bsrel dang bcas bal
bgyi lta/ ri'i stang ge pad+ma'i stan la mchis par bgyi'o// gtsang mas gos gtsang ma bgos te/ dus gsum du khrus bgyis nas nyin zhu ga gcig mchis te/ rig sngags 'chang gis ba'i rnam lngas
te reg bgyi'o// chab dang yungs kar gyis dbang bskur bas dbang bskur bar bgyi'o// snying chen pos gdungs pa'i snying gis blta bar bgyi'o// gal te 'di lta bu'i cho gas mi bgyid na bklags pa

tsam gyi mod la'ang 'grub par 'gyuran/ bzlas brjod kyi las kyi tshogs lta mos kyang ci 'tshal/ yang rig sngags 'chang gang zhig gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma phrag brgyad bcu rtsa brgyad kyi bye ma dang mnyam pa'i
de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sas rgyas la mchod par 'tshal lam/ lta bar 'tshel lam/ dge ba'i rtsa ba rgya chen po bskyad par 'tshal lam/ sems can thams cad
dge ba'i rtsa bal rab tu gzhag par 'tshal lam/ thams cad kyi sgrib pa rnam par dag par bgyi bar 'tshalan/ rig sngags 'chang des dag slong pha 'am/ dge slong ma 'am/ dge bstan pa 'am/ dge
bsnyen ma 'am/ rgyal po 'am/ btsunamo 'am/ gzhan su'ang nubs thams car cho ga 'di bzhin bgyis te/ des ci 'byor pa'i gsar las 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs
dbang phyug don yod pa'i zhags pa'i gzugs brnyan bgyi'o// de nas khashar phyogs su bstan te bzhag la/ gur kum gyi dkyil 'khor bgyis te/ gru bzhi ma 'bus par li khris thig gdab par
bgyi'o// dkyil 'khor dbus su pad+ma'i 'phreng ba bgyi'o// pad+ma'i 'phrang ba'i dbus su rilab spyi blugs dang bgrang 'phreng gzhag par bgyi 'o// ma tog sna tshogs kyis mdzes par bgyi'o// sos
chab kyis bkang ba'i bum pa me tog ci 'byor pas legs par brgyan pa bzhugazhag par bgyi'o// mchod yon gyi snod lnga gzhag par bgyi'o// pog por lta las a ka ru'i bdug pas bdug par
bgyi'o// dris bsgos pa'i maram bcu drug sngar bar bgyi'o// 'phags pa sngan ras gzigs dbang phyug la mchod par bgyi'o// me tog dang/ bdug pa dang/ dri dang/ 'phreng ba dbul bar bgyi'o//
tshan/ 'jig rten dbang phyug gimadun duskyil mo krung bcas te mchis nas don yod zhags pa'i phyag rgyabacings taM/ bdag nyid la dbang bskur bar bgyi'o// khro ba'i rgyal po lan cig bzlas par bgyi'o///
de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la dmigs pa yid la bgyis nas phyogs bcur yid kyis mchod cing phyag bgyi'o// bzlas brjod kyi phyag rgya bcings te bzlas brjod bgyi'o// bzlas brjod brgyartsa mi
brgyad bgyis pa dang sa chen po g.yos par 'gyur ro// bdag nyid dga' bar gyur nas 'bar bar mthong ngo// de bzhin gshegs pa de dag thams cad kyang zhal mngon sum du ston pa nye bar ston par
'gyur ro// 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi ral pa'i gsab 'tha' bar gyur nas legs so zhes bgyi ba'i sgra 'byung bar 'gyur ro// lan brgya rtsa brgyad lan gnyis bzlas brjod/
bgyis na grub pachen po'i rtogasaston par 'gyur ro// 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis phyag brkyang nas rig sngags 'chang gi spyi bor 'jog par 'gyur ro// de bzhin gshegs pa/
thams cad gzigs pa zhes bgyi ba'i ting nge 'dzin 'thob par 'gyur ro// don yod zhags pa grub pa'i rig sngags 'chang bar 'gyur ro// nyi ma'i rtse na de bzhin gshegs pa de dag kyang mthong bar
gyur nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad ston par 'gyur ro// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dgeba'i rtsa ba dang ldan par 'gyur ro// brgya rtsa brgyad pa lan gsum bzlasan 'phags pa spyan ras gzig
dbang phyug gi gzugs skya rengs 'char ka'i dus su mdun du mchis nas pad+ma drim med pa zhes bgyi ba'i zhagasapa stsol bar 'gyur ro// grub pa thams cad stsol bar 'gyur ro// rgyal ba 'od dpag med

kyang legos so zhes bgyi ba stsalabar 'gyur ro// gangasu'ang rung bas 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi gzugs mthong na de ni de bzhin gshegs pa drug khri bzhi stong la dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed par[E]
'gyur ro// de la lha thams cad dang tshangs pa la sogs te/ dbang phyug dang dbang phyugachen po'i lha'i bu rnams rtag tu lta 'tshal bar 'gyur ro// nad thams cad dang bral/
bar 'gyur ro// mchogathams cad yongs su rdzogs nas rtag turjes su 'brang zhing srung ba dang/ skyob pa dang/ spyod pa bgyid par 'gyur ro// sdig pa thams cad dang bral bar 'gyur ro//
'phags pa don yod pa'i zhags pa'i tshog zhib mo'i rgyal po bam po brgyud pa//[>da nges ci 'byor pa'i gsar la 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug don yod pa'i zhags pa/

byas la/ de nas zhal shar phyogs su bstan te bzhag la gur kum gyi dkyil 'khor gru bzhi pa legs par 'byas pa byas te da 'a khris thig btab la dkyil 'khor gyi dbus su par bri/ pad+ma'i dbus su ril ba bring
ka ra dang/ bgrang 'phranga'i/ me tog sna tshogs bkram la bum pa sos chus bkang la/ ma togaci 'byor pas legs par brgyan pa bzhi gzhag/ mchod yon gyi snod lnga gzhag par bya zhing/ pog poraldan s a
sku karu'i bdug pas bdug par bya'o// sosatsAbcu drug dang lcan pa'i til mar gyi maram bltam ste/ 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug lamachod pa bya zhing/ me tog dang/ bdug pa dang/ dri dang//

'phreng ba ngag kyang dbul bar bya'o// 'jig rten dbang phyug la mngon du phyogs te/ sbyil mo krung bcas la don yod pa'i zhags pa'i phyag skyabatsonges la bdag nyid la dbang bskur ro// khro bo'i rgyal po lan gcig
bzlas la phyogs bcu'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad yid la byas te/ yid kyis phyag byas la lus kyis kyang phyag byas te/ bzlas brjod kyi phyag rgya bcas la bzlas brjod bya'o// brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas

pas sa chen po g.yo bar gyur zhing bdag nyid snying dga' la 'bar bar snang ngo// de bzhin gshegs pa de dag thams cad zhal nye bar ston par mdzad do// 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyugagi dbu ralapa'i/

gsab 'bar zhing legs so zhes bya ba'i sgra 'byung ngo// brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas pa gnyis pas ni dngos grub chen po'i mtshan ma ston to// 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis phyag brkyang ste/ rig sngags

'chang gi mgo bo'i spyi bor 'jog par 'gyur ro// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la rnam bar lta ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin 'thob par 'gyur ro// rig sngags 'chang la don yod pa'i zhags pa 'grub par 'gyur ro//

tho rangs de bzhin gshegs pa de dag zhal ston par 'gyur ro// sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad ston par 'gyur ro// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba dang ldan par 'gyur ro// bzlas brjod brgya

rtsa brgyad gsum pas ni skya rengs shar ba'i dus kyi tsha 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyugarang gi gzugs kyis mdun na bzhugs te/ paN+Na'i dri ma med pa zhes bya ba'i zhags pa sbyin par mdzad cing/ dngos
grub thams cad sbyin par mdzad do// rgyal ba 'od dpagamed legs so zhes bya ba sbyimapara mdzad do// gang la 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi skur bstan pa ste/ re bzhinagshegs pa stong phrag
drug cu rtsa bzhi la dge ba'i rtsa ba bskrunapar 'gyur ro// lha thams cad dang/ tshangs pa la sogs pa dbang phyug dang/ dbang phyug chen po dang/ lha'abu rnams rtag tu lus ston 'dod par

'gyur ro// nad thams cad dang bral bar 'gyur ba dang/ mchog thams cad yongs su rdzogs ba dang/ rtag tu phyi bzhin 'brang zhing srung ba dang/ skyang pa dang/ smra bar byed par 'gyur ro// sdig pa thams

cad dang bral bar 'gyur ro//denas dngul las 'phags pa spyan ras gzig dbang phyug donayod pa'i zhags pa'i gzugs snga ma bzhin du byas pa la/tsan dan dkar po'i dkyil 'khor du tsan dan dkarapo'i dri chab kyis
bkang ba gzhag par bya zhing mchod yon gyi snod lnga gzhug par bgyi'o// ma tog sna tshogs bkram zhing tsan dan dkar po'i bdug spos kyis bdugs te/ 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la mchod

par bgyi'o// dri sna bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis dang ldan pa'i tilamar gyi mar ma bltam par bya zhing/ bdug spos kyi snod bzhi b.ru gzhag par bgyi'o// khro ba'i rgyal po lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bazlas brjod byas

a la rig sngags 'chang gtsang mas gos gtsang ma bgos te/ don yod pa'i zhags pa'i phyag rgya lan bdun bcing ngo// bzlas brjod kyi phyag rgya byas te/ skyil mo krung du 'dug la lag pa g.yon pa'i 'dzub mo

brkyang ba pad+ma'i tshul du byas la bzlas brjod lan brgya rtsa brgyad bya'o// lan brgya rtsa brgyad tshong ba dang/ shar phyogasanas legs so zhes bya ba'i sgra grag par 'gyur zhing bdag nyid dga' bar snang ngo// rgyal po dang
blon po dang/ btsun mo'i 'khor dang bcas pa dbang du 'gyur te/ mi nga brjod pas dpag tshad stong nas 'ong bar 'gyur ro// thams cad bgyi ba ci mchis zhes bran bzhin du 'gyur ro// gang bsgo ba de byed/

par 'gyur ro// de nyid bla mar 'gyur zhing nyer mchod par 'gyur ro// brgya rtsa brgyad lan gnyis bzlas pas brgya byin dang/ tshangs pa dang/ khyab 'jug dang/ dbang phyug chen po dang/ gshin rje dang//

chu lha dang/ rlung lha la sogs pa dbang du 'gyur zhing bsgong bzhin byed par 'gyur ro// gang bsgo ba byed par 'gyur ro// rgyal po bzhi 'khor gnod sbyin dang srin po'i tshogs dang bcas pa rnams dbang du
'gyur ro// brgya rtsa brgyad lan gsum bzlas pas nyim dang zla ba nam mkha' lasaM 'bab cing mdun na 'dug par 'gyur ro// mtshan mo'i lha dang nam mkha'i lha 'ongs nas mdun na 'dug par 'gyur zhing

dbang du 'gyur ro// thams cad ci bgyi zhes pa'i bya ba byed cing 'dug par 'gyur ro// brgya rtsa brgyad lan bzhi bzlas pas klu thams cad dbang du byas par 'gyur te/ rgya mtsho'i klu'i rgyal po dga' bo dang
nye dga' bo la sogs pa'i bar thams cad dbang du byas par 'gyur ro// zangs las byas pa'i 'phags pa sngan ras gzigs dbang phug ronayod pa'i zhags pa latshanadan dmar po'i dkyil 'khor byas
te me tog dmar po bkram la bdug spos kyi snod bzhinas bdug par bya zhing mar gyi mar ma lnga bcu rtsa gnyis bltam par bya'o// mchod yon gyi snod bzhi bzhag la 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang
phyug la mchod pa bya'o// khro bo'i rgyal po lan nyi shu rtsa gcig rjes su dran par bya'o// don yod pa'i zhags pa'i phyag rgya lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bcing bar bgyi'o// ras la bris/
pa'i sku gzugs kyi spyanasar sgyel mo krung du 'dug ste/ sems can thams cad la dmigs pas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad yid la bya'o// phyogs bzhir byams pa'i lta bas blta bar bya'o
sems can dmyal ba dang/ gshen rje'i 'jig rten dang/ lha ma yin dang/ yi dgA kyi yul thams cad yid la bya'o// sems can dmyal ba chen po brgyad yid la bya zhing snying rje'isoms kyis blta bar

la bya'o// bzlas brjod kyi phyag rgyabats+tsha'i tshul du bcings te bzlas brjod bya'o// brgya rtsa brgyad tshang ba dang phyogs bzhir g.yo zhing sgra grag par 'gyur la/ dmyal ba'isamasaranade dag thams cad yongs su
grol bar 'gyur ro// dmyal ba'i sgo thams cad bcad par 'gyur zhing bcom pa dang thal bar brlag par 'gyur ro// dmyal ba'i sems can de dag bde 'gror 'gro bar 'gyur ro// bdag nyid kyang byang chub
kyi mthar thug gi bar du dmyal ba'i sdug bsngal gyi tshor ba thams cad las yongs su grol bar 'gyur ro// lus kyang mtshan bzang pos brgyan par 'gyur zhing/ sems can gang dag gis mthong ba de dag
thams cad phyir mi ldog par 'gyur ro// brgya rtsa brgyad lan gnyis bzlas brjod byas pas nisa'i 'og gi sems can mun ganag pa snang ba dang bral ba de dag don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po'i
[j]mthus mun ganag dang bral bar 'gyur zhing 'od zer 'byung bar 'gyur ro// yongs su grol ba'isems can de dag 'phags pa spyanaras gzigs dbang phyug gi gnas su rdzus te skyo bar 'gyur zhing/
dga' ba dang 'chi ba spang bar 'gyur ro// byang chub kyi mthor thug gi bar du kun nas mthu 'phags pa dri mam pa zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin 'thob par 'gyur zhing tshe bskal pa thub par 'gyur ro// shi

nas bde ba can gyi 'jig rten gyi khams su skye bar 'gyur ro// byang chub kyi mthar thug gi bar du de nyid kyi zhab kyi drung na gnas par 'gyur zhing mya ngan thams cad dang bral bar 'gyur ro// tsan dan dkar po
dang/ gla rtsi dang/ ga bur dang/ spos kyi rigs sna tshogs gzhan dag phye ma zhib mor byas te/ yang legs par btags la kun du ru ka dang/ sra rtsi pog dang/ gan d+ha ra sa dang/ chu dang lhan cig
sbyar te/ sha kha ra btab la legs par btags pa las 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug donayod pa'i zhags pa sor bzhi pa'i tshad du byas te rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan par l pa'i
thor tshugs dang/ ar+ya ya'i pags pas bzhag pa/ phyugs bdag gi lugs 'dzin pa/ phyag bzhi gcig na pad+mathogs/ gnyis pa zhags pa thogs/ gsum pa gsal shing thogs/ bzhi
pa dbugs 'byin pa/ gdan pad+ma/ 'od kyi dkyil 'khor 'dom gang gis brgyan par bya ste/ g.yas su 'phags ma sgrol ma/ g.yon du drimad 'gro bya'o// 'jig rten dbang phyug gi 'og tu ni khro/
[} ]/bo'i rgyal po'o// gong dun 'od dpag med do// de nas rig sngags 'chang gtsang bas gos gtsang ma bgos te/ dus gsum du khrus bya zhing gos sumaphyugasabagos latshesabargyad

nas/ tshes bco lnga'i bar du dus gsum du bzlas brjod brgya tsa brgyad bya'o// spos sna tshogs kyi dkyil 'khor byug par bya zhing tshon sna lngas bri bar bya ste/ dkyil 'khor gyi dbus su don yod pa'i zhags pa dang/

rig sngags kyi lha pus mo gtsugs te gyen du lta ba bri bar bya'o// gru bzhir dbang phyug dang/ dbang phyug chen po dang/ gshin rjedang/ chu lha bri bar bya'o// sgo bzhi'i cha 'byos par bya'o// dkyil 'khor khor yug

tupad+ma bri bar bya'o// grwa bzhir spos kyis bkang ba gzhag go/ sgo bzhir dri dang/ gtor ma dang/ bum pa gangang bzhag go/ dkar gsum gyi gtor ma dang mchod yon gyi snod brgyad bzhag go/ me tog sna tshogs

dgram par bya zhing a ka ru dang tsan dan gyi bdug pa dbul bar bya'o// spos sna brgya nyi shu rtsa brgyad dang ldan pa'i til mar gyi mar me bltam par bya/ 'phan gdugs bzang po snatshogs kyis legs par brgyan par

sgyu bya ste/ byang chub sems dpa' 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug dkyil 'khor du zhal shar phyogs su bstan pa bzhag la mchod pa bya'o// ras kyi tshomasud sna lnga pa/ srid du khru bcu drug pa/ thor
to gcig tu gser gyi yang mig/ thor to gcig tumu tig gi chun kor[”] btags te/ sbrul 'khyil ba bzhin du bskyil la dkyil 'khor gyi dbus su bzhag ste/ gtsang mas gos gtsang ma g.yog bar bya'o

[k]/rig sngags 'chang dkyil 'khor la mngon du phyogs te/ skyilamo krung du 'dug la don yod pa'i zhags pa'i phyag rgya lan sum cu rtsa gnyis bcing ba byas la bdag srung ngo// khro bo'i rgyal po lan brgya rtsa
brgyad bzlas par byas la/ dkyil 'khor bcing ba dang phyogs bcing ba'ang bya'o// de nas rig sngags 'chang gis bzhin 'dzum gyis rgyas par byas la bzlas brjod kyi phyag rgya bcings te/ mi smra bar yus

kar 'bru re re nas bzlas brjod stong rtsa brgyad brjod nas ras kyi srad bu'i steng du gtor bar bya ste/ stong rtsa brgyad tshang ba dang/ ras kyi srad bu de 'bar bar 'gyur zhing/ 'od zer sna tshogs 'byung bar 'gyur ro//
legasaso zhes bya ba'i sgra 'byung bar 'gyur te/ rig sngags 'chang legs so legs so// khyod kyis don yod pa'i zhags pa grub kyis long la dgos pa thams cad byos shig/ khyod kyis yid bzhin gyi
nor bu chen po gnyis don yod pa'i zhags pa pad+ma grub pas/ 'jig rten pa dang 'jigarten las 'das pa'i dgos pa thams cad sgrub par 'gyur ro// 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug de'ang 'bar

bar 'gyur ro// 'jig rten dbang phyug gi sku las spos kyi sprinachen 'byung bar 'gyur te/ sos des dpag tshad drug tsam du khyab par byed do// gangal dri mnam pa tsam gyis nad thams cad dang bral bar 'gyur/
sdig pa thams cad dang bral bar 'gyur/ sdug bsngal gyi sgrib pa thams cad dang/ byad dang/ dug dang/ dbyig dug dang/ phyi ma'i sbyor ba rnams 'jig par 'gyur ro// lus thams cad drim med par 'gyur
ro[：]sems can thams cad kyang rje/ dngas shathams cad kyang rjes su 'brang bar 'gyur ro// donas rig sngags 'chang gis yong bzhin gi tshoma'i 'cham
du bcug ste/ 'phags pa spyanaras gzigs dbang phyug gi zhabs drung du gzhag par bya'o// nam dgos pa byung ba'i tshog tsang mas khrus legs par byas te blang bar bya zhing dgos par bya'o// nyin re
bzhin dus gsum du mchod por bya'o/ rig sngags 'chang de'ang nam mkha' la 'gro bar 'gyur zhing lus yongs su dag par sngon gyi rig sngags 'chang rnams dang lhan cig rtse zhing thams cad dbang du

zla 'gyur ro// tshe lo stong thub par 'gyur te/ shin s bde ba can gyi 'jig rten gyi khams su skal ba mnyam pa rnams kyi nang dupad+ma'i snying bo la rdzus te skyo bar 'gyur ro// rig sngags 'chang thams cad kyi
'khor los sgyur bar 'gyur ro// byang chub kyi snying po la mthar thug gi bar du tshobaskal pa brgya phrag stong thub par 'gyur ro// 'phags pa spyan ros gzigs dbang phyug de'ang gang gis mthong ba
tsam gyis mtshamaMs mod pa lta la sogs pa zad par 'gyur ro// sna ma'i me tog la lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas la/ 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug lar ro nas dbul bar bya ste/ brgya
rtsa brgyad tshang ba dang/ rgyal po dang/ blon po dang/ btsun mo'i 'khor dang bcas pa dbang du 'gyur te/ rang nying nor dang bcas/ dbyig dang bcas/ 'bru daMng bcas/ bran pho dang bcas/ bran
mo dang bcas te las byed par 'gyur ro// sna ma'i me togaring ba de bsdus la/ gla rtsi dang/ pri yang ku dang/ rgya spos dang/ ru rta dang/ gur kum dang/ sngar sros dang/ sA ma ka dang/ sgrig ]
ka dang/ na la nga dang/ bo la dang/ yungs kar rnams zhib tu btags pa'i phyi ma mar pa'i chu dang sbyar ba'i ril bu ni dug med par byed pa'i mchog pad+ma zhes bya ste/ thog mar grags pa dang dpal
du byed/ nad thams cad sel ba dang rims nad thams cad nye bar sel bar byed do// brtsog shu dang/ 'bras dang/ mdabal dang/ rkang shudang/ thol thig dang/ lceg pa dang/ de thams cad la
rab sas na bde bar zhi bar 'gyur ro zhes gsung ngo// nad de dag thams cad la khrus byas nasdig pa sel to zhes thub pa ma gsung ngo// tshe sbyin par byed/ rgyal po dag yul sbyin par byed do//
thig la byas te g.yul ngor songan thams cad las rtag turgyal ba dang/ bur mang rnams dga' ba dang/ dbang du 'gyur bar byed pa'i mchog yin no// byad 'joms shing dug dang/ dbyig dang/
phyi ma'i dug dang/ gsang sngags kyi sbyor ba byas pa dag kyang de bzhin no// zas za ba dang khrus byed pa na thig le'i byug ba rtag tu byas de thams cad las 'gro ba rnams bde bar thar par 'gyur
ro// zhes 'jig rten dbang phyugagasung ngo// klad pa'i nang mi bzang pa la ni byug par bya'o// mig na ba la ni mig sman gyi thur masaso// so na ba la ni khar mur ro// lten pa 'di chu dron dang po
rtsib logs na ba la ni mar dang byug go/ yan lag dang nyin lag na ba la ni bsku bar bya'o// dbang du bya ba la ni lag mthil la bsku bas so// nad tshabs po che la ni bsku mnye//
dang khrus bya'o// gnod sbyin gyi gdon bsal ba la ni snyan s gtang ba'i las bya'o// bdug pas ni gdon thams cad las rnam par grol bar 'gyur ro// rgyas thebs pa rnams la ni 'tshog saMmar

thig le bya'o// sIng na ba la ni chu dron dang lan tshwa bsras pa'o// khyim zhi bar bya ba lani 'bras sa dngagasum sbyar bas zhi ba chen por 'gyur ro// thamasacad du lamatishu rtsa gcig bzlas nas so//
'thab pa dang/ 'thab mo dang/ rtsod pa dang/ 'gyed pa rnams la ni ba lang gi lci bas dkyil 'khor byas la ma tog bkram ste/ dri chus bkang ba bzhigazhag cing 'o mas bkang ba bzhi dang/ mchod
yon gyi snod bzhi dang/ pog por bzhigazhagaste/ a ka ru dang du ru kas bdug go/ gu gul la lananyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas te bdug par bya'o// 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la
dri chab kyis mchod par bya'o// khro ba'i rgyal po yungs kar la lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas te phyogs bzhir gtor bar bya'o// don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po lan dgu bcu rtsa gcig bzlas na 'thab
pa dang/ 'thab mo dang/ rtsod pa dang/ 'gyod pa rnams la stsa ba'i mchog tu 'gyur ro// g.yul 'gyed pa las rgyal bar 'gyur ro// rang gi dpung dang gzhan gyi dpung yan lag bzhi pa thams cad

las rgyal par 'gyura'o// gal te brgya byin rang dang lha ma yin lhan cig pas kyang ma yin na/ mi rnams kyis lta ci smos/ brgya byin dgug par 'dod n pa la lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas te brgya byin gyi ming
nas brjod la/ 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la re re nas dbul bar bya zhing dri chab kyang dbul lo// gu gul dang/ mar dang/ yungs kar la lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas te/ shing aga'i ma/

sngar la tshes bcu bzhi la sbyin sreg bya'o// bzlas brjod kyi chog rdzogs pa dang/ brgya byin lha'i dbang po dpung dang bzhon par bcas pa 'ongs nas mdun du 'dug ste/ bsgo ba bzhin byed cing thams cad dbang

du 'gyur ro// brgya byin gyi go 'phang ma gtogs pa gang bslangs pa de sbyin par byed de/ de ni sams mi zad do// tshangs pa rdog pas mnan te lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas na/ brgya rtsa brgyad tshang ba dang tshangs pa rang gi
gzugs kyis mdun du 'dug snya mchog thams cad sbyin par byed do// yid la ci 'dod pa sgrub par byed do// gu gul la lan dgu bcu bzlas te khyab 'jug la bdug cing chu dang yungs kar la lan wishurtsa gcig

brdzus te spyi boragator na/ khyab 'jug rang gi gzugs kyis mdun na 'dug cing las thams cad byed par 'gyur ro// gzugs sna tshogs kyi bar du ston to// hi'an N+ya ka shi pu la'ang sbyin par byed cing khyab 'jug chen

bo'i stobs kyi shugs dang ldan par 'gyur ro// dbang phyug chen po'i zhal mthong bar 'dod na rna ba g.yas par lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas te/ yungs kar la lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlasanas spyi bor gtor ro// gu gul gyi
bdug pas bdug cing arga'i chu la lan bdun bzlas te dbul bar bya'o/ de nas dbang phyug chen po'i gzugs 'gul bar 'gyurazhing legs so zhes bya ba'i sgra 'byung ngo// de nas dbang

phyugachen po rang gi gzugs kyis mdun na 'dug par 'gyur zhing/ rang gi tshogs kyi 'khor dang bcas pa thams cad dabang du 'gyur ro// 'dod pa'i mchog thams cad sbyin par byed do// mchog gang 'dod pa thams

tsad sbyin par byed do// nag po chen po dgug par 'dod pagagulal lan brgya rtsa brgyud bzlasate/ khrag dang chang dbul bar bya zhing yus kar la lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlasanas nag po chen po'i stang ngugator n khug
par 'gyur te/ bran bzhin du las thams cad byed par 'gyur zhinge gar mngags pa der 'gro bar 'gyur ro// 'khor gyi tshogs dang bcas pa dbang du 'gyur ro// gnod sbyin gyi gnas thams cad kyi sgo bya bar/

'gyur zhingagang 'dod pa byed do// thams cad byams par 'gyulazhing las thams cad byed par 'gyur ro// mis bar mtshan mo'i dus 'tshams gsum du lan nyi shu rtsa rer bzlas na mtshan mo'i lha 'khor gyi tshogs

dang bcas ba dang/ mtshan mo rgyu ba dang/ nyin par sgruba'i lha dang/ klu dang/ gnod sbyin dang/ dri za dang/ lha ma yin dang/ nam mkha' lding dang/ mi 'am ci dang/ lto 'phye chen po dang/ mi dang/ mi ma
yin pa thams cad dang nga du 'gyur te/ las thamasaM cad byed par 'gyur ro// thams cad rang gi gzugs kyis rtag tu mdunan nye bar gnas so// mtshan mo longs spyad par gzhal med khang thams cad sbyin par
[j]byar do// gtsang mas gos gtsang ma dgos te/ khrus legs par byas nas bden par sa zhing byams pa'i sems na bar bzha gnas / sems can thams cad la rtag chub rtse ba dang snying rje chen pos lhag par/
dmigs te bzlas brjod rtag tu bya'o// bzlas brjod kyi cho ga rim par phye ba'o// de nas rtag tu las thams cad byed pa// dag ba/ zhib/ rgyas pa/ drag shul spyod pa/ srung ba/ nad/
thams cad sal ba/ byed 'dzag pa/ dbang du byed pa/ sbyin sreg gi cho ga bshad par bya'o// khyim srung bar 'dod pas maNa'i yam srog shing dang/ pad+ma dang/ yungs mar bsres pa las spyir slog brgyartsa

brgyad byas te/ don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod byas la/ khro bo'i rgyal po lon bdun bzlas brjod byas na khyim chen po bsrungs par 'gyur ro/ 'thab pa dang/ rtsod pa dang/ khrag
khrug thams cad dang/ phyir rgol ba dang/ mi mdza' ba thams cad dang/ rims thams cad dang/ yams kyi nad dang/ nad 'gor thams cad dang/ gdon thams cad dang/ mu ge'i dgon pa dang mi ngas dang/

mi ngas chen po dang/ skyes pa dang/ bud med dang/ khye'u dang/ bumo'i mi sa thams cad zhi bar 'gyur ro// lha thams cad kyang srung ba dang/ skyab pa dang/ sba ba byed par 'gyur ro// dbang phyug dang dbang

phyug chen po'ang rtag tu phyi bzhin 'brang bar 'gyur ro// 'phag pa spyan rnam gzig dbang phyug kyang rtag tu rgyun mi 'chad par sku ston bzhed par 'gyur ro// sbyin sreg gi mar dang/ yungs kar dang/ gu gul gyi sbyin
srog stong rtsa brgyad byas na yul dang/ yul 'khor dang/ grong khyer dang/ yul gru dang/ ri khrod dang/ ljongs rnams zhi ba chen por 'gyur ro// 'phags pa spyan ras gathigs dbang/

phyag gi spyan sngar zla ba nya la me tog dkar po dang/ gan d+ha pri yang ku dang/ rgya spos rnams yungs mar dang bsres te sbyin sreg stong rtsa brgyad byas na/ rgyal po dang/ blon po dang/ btsun mo'i 'khor dang bcas pa

dang/ yul gru dang/ grong khyer dang/ grong rdal dang/ ljongs dang/ rta dang/ glang po che dang/ ba lang dang/ ma ha rnams dbang du 'gyur ro// shing pa marga'i yamasrogashing zho dang/ sbrang rtsi dang/ mar

bsres pa dang/ me tog dkar po rnams la lan brgya rtsa brgyad sbyin srog byas n yul gru stong thob par 'gyur ro// 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi spyan sngar 'o dang/ sbrang rtsi dang/ marab sras

pa dang/ pad+ma'i sdong po'i yam srag gang rnams las brgya rtsa brgyad sbyin sreg byas r mtshan mo zad pa dang de na ra brgyad brgya 'thob par 'gyur ro// ma tog ku mu da dang/ pad+masdong bu dang/ rtsa ba dang/

'dab mar bcas pa dang/ yungs kar bsres ta shing seng ldeng gi me saral sbyin sreg brgya rtsa brgyud byas na log 'dren thams cad las yongs su grol bar 'gyur ro// zla ba yar gyi ngo tshes brgyad la sbyang ba
byas te/ gtsang mas khrus legs par byas la/ gos dkar po bgos te tsan dan dang/ pri yang ku'i shing dang/ 'bras yos dang/ mar dang/ yungs kar bsres pa'i sbyin sreg stong rtsa brgyad byas na namaM ]

phyed kyi dus su gnod sbyin mo 'ongs nas zopalnga stong sbyin par 'gyur ro// zla ba mar gyi ngo tshes bcu bzhi la nyin zhag gcig sbyang ba byas te/ rgya mtshor 'gro ba'i chu klung gi 'gram duso la shing bil ba'i me sbyar ]

te bil ba'i ma tog dang/ mar dang/ sbrang rtsi bsras pa stong rtsa brgyad sbyin sreg byas na de'i 'og tu gnod sbyin mo rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa 'ong bar 'gyur ro// nam phyedan rin po che'i za ma tog

thogs nas 'ong bar 'gyur te/ rig sngags 'chang des blang bar bya'o// gdong du mig blta bar mi bya'o/ de yang brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod byas ba dang/ rkang pa'i drung du snod bor nas btung de rigasngags/

'chang 'gum mo zhes zer ro// de nas rig sngags 'chang gis khro bo'i rgyal po lamanyashu rtsa gcig bzlas brjod bya'o// de nas gang gi tshe dgos pa byung ba de'i tshe nam phyed na lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod

byas na gnod sbyin mo 'ong bar 'gyur te/ dgos pa thams cad byed cing bran bzhan du las thams cad byed par 'gyur ro// zla ba mar gyi ngo'i tshes bcu bzhi la gang na gter yod pa der song ste/ stong rtsa brgyad
bzlas brjod byas la gtor ma'i cho ga yang gzhag par bya zhing/ 'phags pa don yod pa'i zhags pa la mchod pa byas la sna ma'i me tog dang/ pad+ma'i 'dab ma dang/ yungs kar dang/ mar bsros pa
rnams las sbyin srog stong rtsa brgyad byas te/ chu dang yungs kar lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas brjod byas nas sa la brdabs na de'i 'og tu gter thams cad 'byung bar 'gyur te blangs la/ dkon mchog/
gsum gyi sku bskal dbul bar bya zhing lhag ma rang gis blang bar bya'o// ba ru ra'i shing gi me sbyar la til dang/ 'bras so ba dang/ mar bsres pa la sbyin sreg stong rtsa brgyad byas/
na rgyal po btsun mo'i 'khor dang bcas pa dang/ dbung gi tshogs yan lag bzhi dang bcas pa dang/ nor dang 'bru dang bcas pa dang/ dbyig dang gser dang bcas pa dbang du 'gyur te/ ji srid 'tsho'i
bar du gnas par 'gyur ro// yungs kar dkar po dang/ tsam pa ka'i ma tog dang/ pad+ma'i yam srog shing dang/ sbrang rtsi dang/ mar bsras pa'i sbyin sreg stong rtsa brgyad byas na yul thams cad
dbang du 'gyur zhing/ bud med dang/ skyes pa dang/ khye'u dang/ bu mo dbang du 'gyur ro// 'bras phung lan tshwa dang ldan pa las lan dgu bcu rtsa gcig sbyin sreg byas na rigs bzhi'i 'jig rten dbang
du 'gyur ro// u ga ti'i shing gis mo spar la sbrang rtsi dang mar bsres pa dang/ aka'i me tog las sbyin sreg brgya rtsa brgyad byas la/ 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la mchod pa byas n
nyin zhing de na ra brgya 'thob par 'gyur ro// de la sha'i yam srog shing dang 'bras yos las sbyin srog stong rtsa brgyad byas nagasar brgya phrag stong 'thob par 'gyur te/ dkon mchog gsum la

mchod pa bya zhing bgo bsha' byas na yang 'byung bar 'gyur ro// tshes bco lnga zla ba nyal sbyang ba byas te/ rgya mtshor 'bab pa'i chu klung ngam/ chu klung chen po'i nang rkor pa nub tsam du zhugs te/ lan brgyartsa

brgyad bzlas brjod byas la/ yungs kar la lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas nas khros pas chu klung de la brdab par bya'o// de nas mu'i nang nas bu mo zhig byung nas rin po che mang po dag sbyin par byed de blangs la/
phyed kyis dkon mchog gsum mchod par bya zhing/ 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la yang mchod par bya'o// tshes bco lnga zla ba nya la sbyang ba byas te/ nam phyed na bcom ldan 'das 'phags
pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la mchod pa byas nas a pa mna'o yam srog shing dang/ spang rtsi dang/ mar dang/ srartsa pog bsres pa la lan bskyortsa brgyad bzlas brjod byos la/ rang gi ming gis sbyin
sreg stong byas na sdig pa'i sgrib pa thams cad las grol bar 'gyur zhing/ nad thams cad dang gnod pa thams cad las grol bar 'gyur ro// phyir rgol ba thams cad dang mi mdza' ba thams cad 'jigos
par 'gyur ro// shang arga dang/ til dang/ yungs kar dang/ gu gul dang/ mar bsras pa las sbyin sreg byas na zhi ba chen por 'gyur ro// 'bras yos dpa/ 'o ma dang/ mar dang/ yungs
kar dang/ tsan dan dkar po bsres pa las sbyin srag brgya rtsa brgyad byas na rgyas pa dang mchog tu dge bar 'gyur ro// tshes bcu bzhi la ka ra wA ra'i me tog dang/ lan tshwa sna bdunabasres pa dang/
shing tsher ma can gyi yam srog shing yungs mar la bsres pas drag shul spyod pa bya'o// char ma 'bab pa'i tsho pad+madang/ tsan dan dang/ yungs kar dang/ mar bsras pa la lan nyi shu rtsa gcig
bzus te/ sbyin srag brgya rtsa brgyad byas na khro bo'i gsang sngags lan bdun bzlas na ji srid 'dod pa de srid du char gyi rgyun chen po 'bab par 'gyur ro// thal ba de blangs la
lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas te nam mkha' la gtor na ha cang cha che ba zhi bar 'gyur ro// phyogs bzhir gtor na mtshams chen po bcad par 'gyur ro// sprin la mngon du phyogs te gtor na
rlung dang/ sprin dang/ sol ba rnams 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro// gzhan gyi snye mnan pa na til dang 'bras so ba'i sbyin sreg gis so// pha rol gyi dpung zlogapanas bon bdun gyi sbyin sreg gas so//
phug sgrub pa'i shing arka'i sbyin srag gis so// arga'i lam dang mar bsres pa'i sbyin sreg byas n bug gi sgo thams cad 'byed par 'gyur ro// nags su 'gro ban tshiku mud dang/ rgya spos dang/
yungs kar dang/ mar bsus pas nags kyi phug gi sgo thams cad 'byed par 'gyur zhing/ sman gyi dngos po thams cad 'bazhin du gnas par 'gyur ro// shing bal sha'o mesbyar te na le sham brgya
stong sbyin sreg byas n brgya byin dang/ tshangs pa dang/ khyab 'jug dang/ dbang phyugachen bo dang/ nyi ma 'ongs nas mdun na 'dug par 'gyur ro// nama'i me tog dang/ kar ni kAri ka'i ma tog
dang/ ut+pal rnams mar dang bsres pas sbyin sreg brgyad skyong byas na zla ba dang nyi ma 'ongs nas mchog sbyin zhing lus la'od zer btang nas niamamakha' la 'gro bar 'gyur ro// ashung thas yam sreg
shing byas lang shu ti dang/ nye'u shing dang/ an dang/ tsan dan dang/ yus kar dang/ nas dang/ mar bsres pa lasazhim bdun gyi dus 'tshams gsum du sbyin sreg shu rtsa gcig byas na rgyal/
bo btsun mo'i 'khor dang bcas pa dbang du 'gyur ro// gdon dang/ gnod sbyin dang/ srin po thams cad chad pas btsadan 'bras so ba dang/ yungs kar dang/ lan tsha'i sbyin sreg bgyis te thams
cad la don yod pa'i zhags pa bcing bar bya zhing khro bo'i phyag rgya dang gsang sngags lhan cig rjes su dran bar bya'o// sbyin sreg gi cho ga'o/// de nas don yod pa'i zhags pa' nga po'i

cho ga'i rgyal po chen poras kyi sku gzugs mthong ba tsam gyi mod la mnaramed pa'i mthar thug pa dang/ mtshams med pa lnga byed pa byang bar 'gyur ba'i cho ga bshad par bya ste/ ras khru do gru ban lham ba/
kha tshar mchad pa/ sgra med pa/ thags dan bzang ba/ shin tu dkar ba/ shin tu sbyangs pa la rin mo mkhan mi sama'i dka' thub can/ bsAn gnas la gnas po gtsang mas gos gtsang ma bgos pa//
zas dkar gsum za ba/ dus gsum du khrus byas pa/ lhag ma ma yin ba'i tshon rtsa snod gsarapar bzhugaste/ par gsar pas 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug don yod zhags pa bzhengs pa
'am/ bzhugs pa 'am/ skyil mo krung du bzhugs pa bri bar bya ste/ ral pa'i thor tshugasakyis brgyan pa/ a rgya ya'i bgasapa bsnams pa/ phyugs bdag gacha lugs 'tshang ba rgyun thams cad kyis rgyan
pa phyag bcu drug pa/ zhal zhi ba/ spyan phye ba/ dbu rgyan la rgyal ba 'od dpag med bzhugs ba/ gzhal g.yas pa'i thor tshugs la zla tshes kyis brgyan pa/ phyag gnyis rdo rje'i thal

mo sbyar ba las gyen du pad+ma'i tshul dubya'o// phyag gnyis thur du kun tu zhal gyi phyag rgya bya'o// phyag gnyis bzlas brjod kyi phyag rgya byas la/ mdzubamo g.yas pa brkyang ste pad+ma'i tshul du byas la bar na bgrang
'phreng 'dzin par bya'o// phyag gnyis don yod pa'izhigs pa'i phyag rgya bya'o// phyag gcig na rtse gsum/ gnyis pa na pad+ma/ gsum pa na don yod pa'i zhags pa'i glog bam/ bzhi pan don yod pa zhags

pa zhags pa tha mal pa 'dra ba/ lnga ba na dbugs 'byin pa/ drug pan ril ba spyi blugs/ bdun pa na rin po che snatshog sakyis bkang ba'i snod/ brgya dpanam tog sna tshogs kyi snod thogs par bya zhing/ bod

'dom gang gis brgyan pa/ skume tog sna tshogs kyis bkra bas mdzes par bya'o// ri po Ta la'i khang pa brtsegs pa shin tu mdzesapa/ gru bzhi lham pa/ ka ba bzhi zug pa/ khri 'phang stags bu mdzes ba dang

ldanupa/ rin po che sna tshogs kyisamadzes par brgyan pa/ pad+ma'i 'phreng bas mdzes par byas pa/ rdo rje'i 'phreng bas brgyan pa/ me tog sna tshogs dang chu shing gi yal gas mdzes par byas pa/ g.yas legs/

kyi sta ngan nyi ma/ g.yon legs na zla ba/ gnas gtsang ma'i ris kyi lha'i bu dag lag name tog sna tshogs pa mang po thogs te/ bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa byed pa bya'o// ri pad+ma 'dra ba zhig snying b+ho

mdzes par byas shing sdong po dang ldan pa/ mtshos mdzes par byas pa/ mtsho ltas gang zhing chu srin ma ka ra dang/ bzhad dang/ shang shang te'u dang/ ngur pas brgyan pa// nor bu rin po che sna tshogs kyis

legs par brgyan pa'i ri de'i steng du pad+ma'i gdan rang seng ge 'i khri bya'o// g.yas phyogs kyi phyi rol khang pa'i gnas su dbang phyug bya'o// g.yon du dbang phyug chen po rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan par
bya'o// nang gi gnas su 'phags pa sngan ras gzigs dabang phyug go/ g.yas su 'phags ma sgrolam lus btud de 'dzam bag dang bcas pa bya'o// g.yon du dri med 'gro lag pa dbugs 'byin
pa dang/ nor bzang pus mobatsugs pa bya'i// pad+ma'i snying po'i dbus kyi gnas su khro ba'argyal po khros pa'i gzugs can/ lag pa bzhi pa lag na mtshon cha thogs pa ste/ zhags pa dang/ dbyug
to dang/ rtse gsum dang/ pad+ma'o// pad+ma'i stan la skyil mo krung phyed bcas la/ lus cung zad btud pa mgo'i stong g.yas g.yon du drang srong bstod rabs byed pa bya'o// de nas 'og gi g.yas

g.yon du rdo dza'i zom chen po lag na rdo rje'i tshogs mang po 'dug pa dang/ gshin rje dang/ chu lha dang/ rlung lha dang/ dbang po dang/ lha'i tshogs dag bya'o// g.yas phyogs kyi mtshodang ri'i bar du

[l]ba byin dang tshangs pa bya'o// g.yon phyogs su rgyal po chen po bzhi go cha bgos pa bya'o// de'i 'og tu pho nya mo pad+ma'i rigs mdzes ma lag pa bral ba bya'o// lha mo chen mo dpal dang/ dbyangs ]
/// ldan m dang/ 'jigs byed ma dang/ mtshan mo'i lha dang/ sa'i lha mo dang/ lo tog gi lha mo bya'o// dbang phyug gi drung du khro gnyer can bya'o// dbang phyug chen po'i drung du gos/

ka dkar mo'o// radang pho nya mo'i bar du srin mo ral pa gcig ma'o// di'i khor yug gru bzhi rin po che sna bdun gyis spras pa bya zhing/ ljonashing dang/ lcagam sna tshogs dang/ me tog gis brgyan cing

mtsha'u mdzes ba me tog sna tshogs kyis brgyanapa dang/ seng ge dang stag gis gang ba dang/ klu'i phrug gu dang grul bum reg bya'o//g.yon dugs chen po lnga bya'o// 'og klu'i rgyal bo chen po la bya'o thamacad brag gi stand lag
narin po che'i me tog phor pa thogs te/ bcom ldan 'das la blta bar bya'o// 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi zhabs drung du rig sngags 'chang bus mo btsugs te/ lag na ma tog dang phog

por thogs pa/ bcom ldan 'das la blta bar bya'o// steng gi bang rim du thub pa chen po rgyalab 'od dpag mong dang/ shAkya'i rgyalapo dang/ 'jig rten dbang po'i rgyal po bya'o// ras kyi skugazugs 'di mthong
btsam gyi mod latshe rabs bats+tshastong du mnar med pa bsags pa dang/ mnaMms med pa lnga'i las byed pa de dag thams cad 'jig par 'gyur/ rnam par 'jig par 'gyur zhing/ sems can de dag
thams cad kyang yongs su grol bar 'gyur na/ sems can dag pa rnams lta ci smos/ dad pas mos pa rnams dang/ dkon mchog gsum machod ba don du gnyer ba de dag/tshe 'di nyid la 'bras bu che

0 ba dang/ phan yon mang bo dag tu shes par bya'o// de bzhin gshags pa gang+ga'i klung gi bye ma bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag drug cu rtsa bzhi'i drung du dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed par 'gyur zhing// de dag gi dgo
ba'i rtsa ba dang ldan par 'gyur ro// ras kyi sku gzugs 'di mthong ba na 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po dngos su mthong ba yin no// las kyi sku gzugs
'di mthong ba tsam gyis 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug dgongs par 'gyur zhing sku'ang ston par 'gyur ro// nyam thag pa tsam gyi mod la sku ston par 'gyur zhing mchog thams cad sbyin
par 'gyur ro// don yod pa'i zhags pa'i gzugs kyi snying po 'grub par 'gyur ro// nad kyis thebs pa dang/ nad tshabs chen pos gzer ba dang/ nad sna tshogs dang/ sdug bsngal brgya stong gis
dkrugs pa de dag thams cad kyis mthong ba tsam gyi mong la nad thams cad dang/ sdug bsngal thams cad dang// gnod pa thams cad las yongs su grol bar 'gyur zhing sgrib pa dang nang dang brol bar
'gyur ro// than dud 'gro'i skye gnas su gtogs pa dag kyang mthong ba tsam gyi mod la yodas su grol bar 'gyur ro// mas kyi sku gzugs 'di 'khor mang pos mchod pa dang/ bkur sti chen po dang/
sil san dkrol ba mang po dang/ gdugs dang/ rgyal mtshan dang/ ba dan gyis legs par brgyan par byas te/ grong khyer chen po 'am/ rgyal po'i pho brang ngam/ gtsug lag khang ngas/ ljongs
sam khyim mam/ grong du zhugs n ras kyi sku gzugs gzhugapa tsam gyi mod la 'thab pa dang/ rtsod pa dang/ 'thab mo dang/ khrag khrug dang/ mu ge'i dgon pa dang/
mi ngas dang/ rang gi dpung dang/ gzhan gyi dpung gis 'jigs pa zhi bar 'gyur ro// gnod sbyin dang/ srin po dang/ 'byung po dang/ sha zad ng/ sul bo dang/ lus srul po dang/ skam byed/
dang brjed byed dang/ grib gnon zhi bar 'gyur zhing/ bde ba dang/ le legos pa dang/ dga' ba dang/ ma mang po bdo ba mang por 'gyur ro// dga' ba dang/ yid bde bamang bar 'gyur ro//

pha rol tu phyin pa drug gi rjes su 'grobar 'gyur ro// 'di mthong ba tsam gyis sha 'phos nas 'jig rten gyi khams su skyabar 'gyur ro// bskal pa bats+tsha stong phrag bdur nur tshe rabs su tshe rabs dran/
par 'gyu'o// pad+ma'i 'od dri ma med cing rnam par dag pa'i rgyal po zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos ma thob pa thob par 'gyur ro// pad+ma rab tu gnas pa
zhes bya ba'i rig sngags 'chang gi 'khor los sgyur banyid 'thob par 'gyur ro// ri mo'i sku gzugs sgrub pa'i cho ga dang cho ga zhib mo'o/// do nas don yod pa 'i zhags pa'i
snying po'i cho ga zhib mo chen po'i dkyil 'khor bshad par bya ste/ chu klung gi 'gram mam pa'i mtsho'u 'om/ ut+pala'i mtsho'u 'am/ me tog gi skyed mos tshal la 'bras bu'i kun dga' ra ba

'am khang bzangasagazhi dag cing sa gzhi yongs su sbyangs pa tshu dang/ shing bal dang/ skra dang/ phung ma dang/ thal ba dang/ sol ba dang/ phyag dar gyi phung po dang/ gyo mo dang/ shing dang/ bong ba/
dang/ gsag ma dang/ thod pa'i rus pas gang ba dang/ shi ba'i ro rnams slas pa'i sa gzhi'i phyogs mtshor dang/ 'bab chu dang/ 'bab chu byang phyogs nas 'bab pa dang nye ba na chu yod cing shin tu
mdzes pa/ lho phyogs dang/ byang phyogs dang/ nub phyogs dang/ shar phyogs gangan ljon shing gisamadzes par byas pa/ gang nyams dga' ba/ kha dog dang gzi byin du ldan pa'i gnas de lta

bu rnyed nas chu dang yungs kar labazlas te kun tu gtor ro// sagazhi de lta bu sbyang ba ni mchog yin no// khroba'i rgyal pos yungs kar la lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas te phyogs bzhir gtor n kun nas dpag
tshad brgya tshunachad phyogasabacing ba dang/ dkyil 'khor bcing ba dang/ mtshams bcang ba byas par 'gyur ro// snang ba thams cad dang/ bgegs dang/ log 'dren thams cad kyang sad cig kyang mi gnas

par phyogs bzhir byer te dong ngo// srog chags sdang ba dang/ sdang ba'i sems can dang/ sngangaba'i gnas ogazan khro bo gang yin pa de dag thams cad rab tu zhi bar 'gyur zhing/ lha thams cad srung bar 'gyur ro//

gnas kyi phyogs der mkhas pas dkyil 'khor bya ste/ gru bzhi lham pa/ ngos re re zhing khru sum cu rtsa gnyis gzhal bar bya ste/ cha 'byes pa/ gru bzhi mamanyam zhing mdzesal sgo bzhi dang rta babs bzhi ldan pa/
'brasakyi phye ma'i tshon sna bzhir sbyar la/ de nas dakyil 'khor bri bar bya ste/ nas lnga'i thig skud kyis thig btab nas tsan dan dkar po'i phur bu btab ste/ sgrub yar gyi ngo'i tshes
ka brgyad dam/ tshes bco lngalatshosagras dang rgyu skar bzang po gdams te/ dkyil 'khor gyi mchog bri bar bya'o// dang po ni dkar po'i blo'o//gnyis pa ni dmar pos so// gsum pa ni ser posaso// bzhi
tsha pa ninam mkha'i kha dog gis so// ltapani mig sman gyi kha dog gis te/ dkyil 'khor gyi dbus kyi snying po 'jigs pa med par ma rnam par 'byes shing gsal bar pir gsar pa dang/ tshon dang/ snod gsar

bas brab r bya ste/ dkyil 'khor gyi snying por par 'dab ma stong pa kho ra khor yug stegs bu dang bcas pa bri zhing/ pad+ma'i 'phrang ba tshon gyisamadzes pa bris la/ de'i dbus su sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'dra
thub pa chen po shAkya'i rgyal bo dang/ 'od dpag med dang/ 'jig rten dbang po'i rgyal po gzhag go/ g.yas su mgon po 'jig rten dbang phyug don yod pa'i zhags pa'i mkhyad 'chang ba gsang sngags kyi

rjes su 'brang bar bya'o// g.yon du phyag na rdo rje rnga yab dang rdo rje thogs pa/ bzhin khro gnyeracan 'od 'bar bas bskor ba'o// 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi drung du lha mo sgrol ma dang dri med
'gro bya'o// 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi 'og tudakar shamachen po dang/ gos dkar mo dang/ dkar mo chen mo lagan dbyug pa dang ril ba spyi blugs thogs pa'o// de'i 'og tu srin mo
ral pa gcig pa pacheb gtsags pa/ thod pa'i 'phreng ba thogs pa/ sbrul gyi mchod phyir thogs pa// lag pa bzhi pa/ lag pa g.yas g.yon gnyis na rdo rje dang/ dgra sta dang/ g.yas pa'i gung mo lha//
dang log 'dren la sdigapa bya'o// g.yon du 'phags pa sngan ras gzigs dbang phyug bram ze'i chalugs 'chad ba ral pa'i thor tshugs kyis bzhugs pa// 'od dpag med kyis thor tshugs brgyan pa bya'o//

g.yas g.yon du dbang phyug dang dbang phyug chen po bya'o// de'i 'og tu dpal lha mo dang/ lha mo dbyangs can ma dang/ mtshan mo'i lha mo dang/ sa'i lha mo dang/ lo tog gi lha mo dang/ 'bras bu dang me tog gi

lha mo bya'o// de'i 'og khor yug lugashin rje dang/ chu lha dang/ rlung lha la sogs pa bya'o// ral pa'i thor tshugs kyis brgyan pa'i drang srong gzhag par bya'o// grwar rgyal po chen po bzhi go cha bgos pa/
gzhag par bya'o// dkyil 'khor gyi snying po'i dbus dar bar bar du lcags kyu dang/ dgra sta dang/ rdo rjedang/ dbyug ba dang/ zhags pa dang/ lcags sgrog dag bya'o// phyirol tu tshangs pa dang/ drug
po dang lha mo u ma dang/ tshangs pa'i drung du lha mo dbyangs ldan ma khros pa'i gzugs can no// de gnyis kyi bar du dbyug pa dang ril spyi blugs bri bar bya'o// grwa gcig tu don yod pa'i zhags pa'i
snying po rnam par grol ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi chos kyi rnam grangs gzhag go/ grwa gcig tu shi bAb ba gzhag go/ de nas shar phyogs kyi sgor khro bo rta mgrin 'jigs su rung ba'i mig can gazhag go/ lho
phyogs kyi sgor rdo rje chen po ka ka li zhes ba ba rdo rje rnam par 'dren pa lag na rdo rjedang/ dgra sta dang/ zhags pa thogs pa bya'o// nub phyogs kyi sgor pho nya mo pad+ma'i rigs/

mdzes ma lag pa pad+ma'i rtsa monas 'dzin pakhya'o// byang phyogs kyi sgor rdo rje chen po zom zhes bya ba'i tshogs lagan rdo rje dang zhags pa thogs pa bya'o// de nas 'jug pa'i slonas gser gyi bum pa spos
chus bkang ste/ dar las bcings la rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa dar las g.yogs te me tog gi 'phreng bas brgyan nas bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin du dkyil 'khor gyi dbus su gzhag ste/ steng du snama'i
me tog gi gdu bu gzhag par bya'o// tsan dan dang/ gur kum dang/ gla rtsi dang/ ga bur gyi chu dang/ pog por bzhi gzhag cing/ a ka ru'i bdug pas bdug go/ tshonas lnga'i ras kyi srad bumachod
phyir gyi srad bu tshad du byas la/ gsar gyi yang mig rtse gsum can gdags par bya zhing/ thor to gcig tume tog pad+ma'i gdubakor dang/ mu tig dang/ rin po ches smras pa zlum por bskyil ba bum pa'i

lta/ steng du bzhi g la mchod pa dang bsnyen bkur byas te/ yungs kar la don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po lan stong rtsa brgyad bzlas te de la gdab par bya'o// tsan dan dang/ ga bur dang/ glar rtsi'i phyi mas gos la
bgo bar bya'o// sgo bzhi'i gnas su dri chab kyis bkang ba'i bum pa dang zas dkar gsum gyi gtor ma gzhag par bya zhing/ gser dngul gyi mchod yon gyi snod sum cu rtsa gnyis dang/ sbos chus bkang ba
mam brgyad dang/ spos chu dkar pos bkang ba brgyad gzhag par bya'o// ro dpadri sna tshogs kyis bkang ba brgyud dang/ zho dang/ 'om dang/ sos chus bkang ba brgyud dang/ gtor ma la sogs pa dbul

bsna brgyud dang/ dbul ba sna drug cu rtsa bzhi pa rnams sha dang/ khrag dang/ kun dor dang/ ke'u dang/ kha zas ngan pa dang/ btung ba ngan pa sangs tagatsang mas gtsang ma sbyar bar bya'o// me tog sna
tshogs kyi gcal dgam par bya zhing/ gdugs dang/ rgyal mtshan dang/ lda ldi dang/ ba dan gyis brgyan par bya/ pog por sumacu rtsa gnyis gzhag par bya zhing/ bdug spos sna tshogs mang pos bdug

par bya/ spos sna brgyad rtsa brgyud dang ldan pa'i til mar gyis mar ma bltam par bya/ dkyil 'khor gyi khor yug tu pad+ma'i 'phreng ba bri bar bya'o// rig sngags 'chang gtsang mas gis gtsang ma bgo bar bya
zhing dusagasum du khrus byas la/ gos gsum bgo bar bya/ grogs gtsang ma sgrub par bya'o// 'jug pa'i tshog byas pa nas/ don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying pos dbang bskur bas dbang bskur ba'i
bar tsam gyis sangs rgyas thams cad kyis yongs su gzung zhing/ 'jig rten megon pos byin gyis brlabs pa dang/ pad+ma'i rigs pad+ma'achang ba'i dkyil 'khor chen po don yod pa'i zhags po'i snying
ngo 'i dngos grub la mngon du phyogs par 'gyur ro// gang bsams pa thams cad de kho na bzhin byed par 'gyur ro// dam tshig thams cad la don yod par 'gyur ro// chod nyid thams cad kyi rnam par grol
ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi chos la dam tshig grub par 'gyur ro// las kyi sgrib pa thams cad laso rnam par grol ba dang bde ba thams cad kyi rjes su 'gro zhing/ lha dang mi'i dpal
thams cad myong bar 'gyur ro// lha dang/ lha ma yin dang/ gnod sbyin dang/ srin po'i tshogs kyi bsgo skal la dbang bar 'gyur ro// rnal 'byor gyi dkyil 'khor dang gsang sngags la rton par 'gyur
ro[：]brdag pa dang/ spyi ba dang/ phur bus gdab pa dang/ bsreg pa dang/ bsdigs pa dang/ g.yong ba dang/ gsadapa dang/ dbang du byas bas mi tshugs so// gang dag de lta bu byed pa de nyid kyi
lus sam mgo la brgya phrag stong gyur tu 'bab par 'gyur zhing/ gzhan gyis phyir bzlas shing dgrol bar mi nus te/ rig sngags 'chapa des dgrol bar bya'o// de nas rig sngags 'chang nges ri
mo'i gzugs de dkyil 'khor la mngon du phyogs par bzhag nas don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po stong rtsa brgyad bzlas la/ don yod pa'i zhags pa'i phyag rgya lan brgya rtsa brgyadabacing bar bya zhing/
khro bo'i rgyal po lan li shu rtsa gcig bzlas par bya'o// de'i 'og tu dkyil 'khor gyi lha rnams las 'od zer kha dog sna tshogs pa 'byung bar 'gyur ro// bum pa de'ang 'bar la/ ras kyi sku gzugs
de'ang kha dog sna bdun du 'bar zhingashas cher 'gul bar 'gyur to/ rig sngags 'chang snying dga' bar 'gyur zhing/ ras kyi sku gzugs las legs so zhes bya ba'i sgra 'byung bar 'gyur te/ rig
sngags 'chang legs so legs so// khyod kyis 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po grub cing/ khyod kyis zhags pa 'di'ang grub/ khyod kyis yid bzhin/
gyinor bu'i zhags pa'i mchog 'di'ang grub kyis/ khyod kyis las thams cad byos shig da dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga rgyas pa mtshoge grub nas bum pa spos chus bkang ba de blas la lan brgya rtsa brgyad

bzlas te rgyu skar rgyal la khrus bya ba 'am/ zla ba yar gyi ngo'i tshes grangs shis pa la khrus byas pa tsam gyi mod la lus thams cad dri ma med cing yongs su dag pa 'thob par 'gyur zhing/ dngos po lnga'i
bdag nyid yongs su dag pa 'thob par 'agyur te/ rnab lta yongs su dag pa dang/ mig lta yongs su dag pa dang/ sna lnga yongs su dag pa dang/ lce lnga yongs su dag pa dang/ rnam par shes pa lnga
yongs su dag pa dang dbang po lnga yongs su dag pa 'thob par 'gyur ro// 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug rtag tu mchog sbyin par 'gyur zhing/ rtag tu sku ston bzhed par yang 'gyur ro//
de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad zhal ston par 'gyur ro// rtag tu byang chubusems dpa' thams cad dgongs par 'gyur ro// lha thams cad kyang de la srung ba dang/ skyab pa dang/ sba ba byed par 'gyur

ro brgya byin dang tshangs pa la sogs pa dag kyang 'ong bar 'gyur ro// rgyal bo bzhi dang dung gi 'khor dang bcas te sa'i phyogasader 'ong bar 'gyur zhing/ rtag tu rgyun mched par srung ba dang/ skyab
pa dang sba ba byed par 'gyur ro// sred med kyi bu dang/ dbang phyug chen po dang/ nor bu bzang po dang/ gsang phra ba brgya stong phrag du ma srung ba dang/ skyab pa dang/ sbya ba
byed par 'gyur ro// zhi ba dang legasasu khyed bar 'gyur ro// shes pa don yod pa dang/ gso rab don yod pa dang/ thos pa dang/ tshul khrims dang/ brtson 'grus thob par 'gyur zhing/ sbyin pa don
