yod pa'i sbyin ba por 'gyur ro// bsod nams kyi phung po don yod pa dang ldan par 'gyur zhing/ 'di lta ste/ pha rol tu phyin pa drug yos su rdzogs pa par 'gyur ro// rdzu 'phrul dpag tshumed pa la
tsho mkhas par yang 'gyur ro// rig sngags 'chang gi cho ga zhib mo'ang 'grub par 'gyur ro//stobs dang/ brtson 'grus dang/ pha rol gnon par don yod par 'gyur ro// sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan

bkodapa phun sum tshogs pa 'thob par 'gyur ro// de bzhin gshegs pa gang+ga'i klung gi bye ma sa ya sAng sa ya brgya phrag stong drug cu rtsa bzhi'i dge ba'i rtsa ba yongs su rdzogs pa yang dag pa gzung bar

'gyur ro// sems can thams cad kyis kyang mchod pa dang/ bkur sti bya bar 'gyur zhing thams cad dbang du 'gyur ro// mchod rten gyi snying po dang 'dra bar phyag bya ba'i 'os su 'gyur ro// dkyil 'khor gyi
mo ga'i tshog zhib mo'o///'phags pa don yod pa'i zhags pa'i chogazhib mo'i rgyal po bam po dgu ba////de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems
dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug stan las langs nas/ bla gos phrag pa gcig khugazar nas/ pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de log
su thalamo sbyar ta btud nas/ bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag byas nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom

ldan 'das bdag la bad+ma'i rigs la rnam par grol ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga/ rig sngagasachen po'i rim par phye ba'i cho ga zhib mo don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po rig sngags kyi rgyal po chen po mchis
te/ bcom ldan 'das 'khor 'dus ba'i dbus dang/ bcom ldan 'das kyi smanasngar de bdag gis yongs su bsagapar bgyi'o// de nas byang chub sems dpa' 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbar

phyug bzhin 'dzum pas bcom ldan 'das la lta bzhin du don yodapa'i zhags pa'i snying bo 'disas so// na masA ya d+hAnu ga ta pra tiT+Thita b+hawasarba bud+d+ha bo d+hisatwA b+h+ya/ na ma/ pra kyi ka bud+d+ha ru gab ka saM

g+ho byA/ a tI tAnu ga ta pra khyud pananesgyu / nam/ samya ka ga tAnaM/ nam/ samyaka pra ti nganan nA/ nam/ shA ra dwa ti pu tA yam hAm ta ye/ nam Atsim rnga ya pra mu khe b+h+yA / ma hA bo d+his u0f7ctAAr+ya ga Na

ba re byA / nam Ar+ya a mitA b+hA ya/ ta thA ga tA ya/ arga te samyaka saM bud+d+hAya/ na mo rat+na tra yA ya/ na ma Ar+ya ba lo kiteshwa rAye/ bo rti satwA ya/ ma hA sa twA ya/ ma hA kA ru Ni kA ya/ ma hAr kAr+ya

0 @#/// ga Na ba re namasi tA a dan Ar+ya ba lokiteshwa ra mu khod+d+hi ts+tshA/ a mo g+ha rA dza na nA ma srid yan/ ta thAg ta saM mu khaM b+ha ri ho ma hAhaM par nA d+he/ a ham da nAmA ban+ta yi misiT+ThA

tum mnA pa tA/ sang+gA kA ru Ni/ sam+b+hab+ha ye smyo mam sam+b+hasatanAny+tsarak+Sha b+ha ba tu/ tad+yathA/ tsa ra tsa ra/ tsi ri tsi ri/ tsu ru tsu ru/ mahA kA ru Nika/ wor bar/ pi ri pi ri/ tsa ri tsi ri/ po ram ba hA ka ru Nika/

si ri sir/ pir pi ri/ tsa ri tsi ri/ ma hApad+mahaste/ ka la ka la/ ki li ki li/ ku lu ku lu/ ma hA shud d+hisatra/ o rgya hi/ bud+d+ha but+tA/ b+ha ba b+hA ba/ ka Na ka Na/ ki Ti ki Ti/ ku rtsacu/ par ma shud

sat+tha/ ka ra ka ra/ kir ka ra/ ku ru ku ra/ mahAyAm prapa/ tsa la tsa la/ sany+tsalasany+tsal/ bi tsa la btsa la/ e TaT e Na Ta/ b+ha ra b+hir/ b+hir b+hir/ b+hu ru b+hu/ e bye hi/ ma hA ka ru Ni ka/

ma hA pa shu pa ti be 'a myur/ rtsar rgyur/ sa ra sa ra/ tsa ri tsa ra/ ha ra ha ra/ hasAhahA/ hihIhi hi/ du hu du hU/ oM ka ra ma hA brah+mabe kha rgyur/ d+ha ra d+ha ra/ b+hi'i b+hiraM d+hu ru d+hu ru/ ta ra ta ra/ sa ra sa ra/

a ba ra pa ra/ tsa ra tsa ra/ ba rab ra/ ba ra da/ ral+lisha ta sa ha sra pra ti maN+Di ta sha rIr/ dzAl dz+wa la/ ta pa ta pa/ b+ha ga bAn/ so ma A ri N+ya/ ya ma ba ru Na/ ku be ra/ brasmon/ ri lig Na a h+phu rtsi ta/

tsa ra Na/ su ru su ru/ tsu ru tsu ru/ pu ru bu ru/ mu ru mu ru/ sa nad ku mA ra/ ru dra/ bA sa ba/ bat+te/ rnyan de de bar nA ya ka/ ba hub bo d+hape kha d+har/ b+ha ra d+har/ b+hiri d+hi ri/ d+hu ru d+hu ru/ tar

ta ra thar tha ra/ g+ha rag+har/ ya ra ya ra/ la ra la ra/ ha ra ha ra ma ra ma ra/ pa ra pa ra/ ba ra ba ra/ ba ra dwa ya ka sa man ta a ba lo ki ta/ lo ke shwa ra/ ma hashA ra/ mu mu chu/ mu ru mu ru/ mu ya

mu ya muny+dza muny+tsa/ b+ha ga bon/ Ar+ya ba lo ki teshwa ra/ rak+Sha rakA ma ma sa satwaM/ sam+b+hab+ha ya b+hu/ saN+Do pa sarma sgyu / sam+b+ha gra he byu / san+d+ra b+ha d+hi sat+tA dzA re e waM bad+ha/ ban+d+ha na/ rtaDa na//
tadz+dza na/ rAdzatso ra/ taska ra/ akI/ u da ka/ ba Sha sa/ pa rimo tsa ka/ kA Na ke Na/ ki Niki Ni/ ku tshu ku/ tsar tsar/ an dri ya/ bal bots+tsaM ga/ tsa tur Asat+ya/ saM pra kA sha ka/ ta ma
tam da ma dam/ sa mas ma/ mas mas/ ma hA ta mon d+ha kAr/ bi d+haman bi rnyam na/ laT pa ra mi tapa ri pA ra ka/ mi li mi li/ Ta Ta Ta Ta/ Sha Na Sha Sha/ Ta Ti Ta Ti/ tu Ta Tu Tu/ a Ne yatsam

ta pa ra ka ra/ e bye ha IshA ra/ ma he shwa ra/ ma hA b+hU ta ga Ne b+hany+dzaka/ ku ru ku ru/ pa ra pa ra/ ka Ta ka Ta/ ma Ta ma Ta/ bi shud+d+hA/ ba kha ya ni bA sin/ ma hA kA ru Nekashra/ ta yajo babA u0f7ada//

ran+namu ku Ta/ mA lA d+ha ra/ sam+badzashi ra si kri tamu ku Ta/ mahAd b+hu ta/ kam la kri ta ka ra ta la/ smyan samA d+hib mo a pra kamyu/ bshusatA san pa ri pAtsaka/ ma hA kA ru Ni ka/ san+d+ha karma a ba ra
J]Nabi sho d+ha ka/ sam+babyu d+hi pra mo tsaka/ san+d+ha AshA pa ri pUr ka/ san+d+rasatA sa mAs ka/ namo stu te sAhA/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang/
phyug gis don yod pa'i zhags pa'i sing po 'di bshad patsam gyis/ 'khor mang po ri dang nagasatshal du bcas pa 'di rnam pa drug tu g.yos so// 'jig rten du snang ba chen po
byung bar gyur to// lha'i mo tog ut+pal dang/ pad+ma dang/ kumud dang/ puN+Da ri ka dang/ man da ra ba'i me tog gi char chen pos dusamo nub pa tsam bab par gyur to/ silasAn dang phag rdzob pa'i sgra
dag kyang byung bar gyur to// mtho ris kyi lha dag gis kyang nam mkha' las bcom ldan 'dus la rgyanadang lhab lhub dag gi char phab po// 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor na gnas pa'i lha dang/ klu dang/ gnod
sbyin dang/ dri za dang/ lha ma yin dang// nam mkha' lding dang/ mi 'am ci dang/ lto 'phya chen po dang/ gtsangam de dag thams cad kyis legasaso zhes bya ba byin te/ sems can dag pa chen po la
so legs so// yid bzhin gyi nor bu chen po don yodapa'i zhags ba'i snying po mchog tu rang dka' ba 'di bshad cing/ dngos grub mchog gi rtog zhib mo'i rgyal bo 'di bshad pas rin po che'i char chen po
'bab bo zhes zer ro// de nas de'i phyir dus gsum du bzlas brjod bya zhing gtsang bas gos gtsang ma bgosati/ dus gsum du khrus bya zhing zas dkar gsum bas/ 'phags pa spyan ras
gzigs dbang phyug gi spyan sngar dpal lha mo bzhag ste mchod pa byas la/ yungs kar 'brur re la brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas nas dpal lhamo la bsnun pa byas na tshes bcu bzhinas/ bco lnga'i bar du dpal
lha mo 'ong bar 'gyur ro// mtshams med blta 'byang bar 'gyur ro// 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug sku ston par 'gyur ro// sdig pa thams cad 'byang bar 'gyur ro// mtshamagacad pa
dung zhi bar bya ba la/ a ka ru dang tsan dan gyi bdug spos bsregasal thal ba dang/ yungs kar dang/ seng ldeng gi phur bu gdab par bya'o// rims thams cad la bu mo gtsang mas bkal ba'i srid
bu lamadud pa nyi shu rtsa gcig bor la lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas te btags na rigs thams cad las thar par 'gyur ro// nad thams cad la mar dang til mar la bzlas te zangs kyi snod du sangs
rgyas la phul ba'i snyam 'i ma tog rnying pa dang pad+maze ba dang bcas pa btab ste btsos pa 'di ni grub pa yin te/ zas dang/ sgom dang/ bsku ba dang/ sna nas gtang ba'i las bya ste/ rishu rtsa
gcig bzlas pas nad thams cad las thar par 'gyur ro// byad gcad na mar dang sbrang rtsi la lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas te lus la bsku zhing tshegs mis dril la/ lus kyi dri ma phyin par bya ste/
gong du las gzugs brnyan byas lalan bdun bzlas te mtshon gyi btab na dug sbyar ma dang/ byed dang/ gsang sngags thams cad bcad par 'gyur zhing nad thams cad las thar rar 'gyur ro// byad
chen po 'jigs par 'gyur ro// srung ba'i skud pa la lan nyi shu rtsa ga cig bzlas te de bzhin du medudapa dor bar byas na srung ba chen po byas par 'gyur ro// 'jigs pa dang/ skrag pa dang//
dngang ba thams cad dang// 'byung po'i 'jigs pa thams cad kyis mi tshugs so// lta na ba la tshwa chu'ajam tsam la lan bdun bzlas te byin na lto ba'i nad 'jigs par/dang bathamasacad d/
'gyur ro// dug gsod na chu la lan bdun bzlas te byonan dug thams cad 'jig par 'gyur zhing mi gdug par 'gyur ro// mig nang la srad bu dkar po rna ba la btags na migand thams
cad 'jig par 'gyur ro// sdang ba'i dug mi bzad pa la 'jim ba la bzlas te byug pa byas n dug med par 'gyur ro// so na ba la ka ra wA ra'i so shing ngam/ sna ma'i so shing ngam/ shing pa gu'i
so shang la bzlas te rngosan sond zhi bar 'gyur ro// mtshams gcad pa thams cad la nitshon sna lnga'i srad bu byas la lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas te/ seng ldeng gi phur bu bzhi la btags te phyogs
blo bzhir btsugs na mtshams chen po bcad par 'gyur ro// gdon thams cad la tshon skud sna lnga'i srad bu la lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas na gdon thams cad las thar par 'gyur ro// srog chags kA Te dang/
lhog pa dang/ mgul pa 'gags pa la sbrang rtsi pi pi ling ldan par byas te byug go/ mgul 'gags pa la bldag pa byas na mgul 'gags pa thams cad las thar par 'gyur ro// mig nad la
la spos chu dang/ shing pa la sha'i chu dang/ pa la sha'i me tog gis bkru bar bya ba 'am/ shing mngar gyi tshul lan bdun bzlas te bkrus na mig nad thamasacad las thar par 'gyur ro// rna ban ba la
til mar dang shu ti zangs kyi snod du btsos pas rna ba bkang na na nad las thar par 'gyur ro// 'thab pa dang/ rtsod pa dang/ khrag khrug dang/ mi snyan pa thams cad la chu la lan bdun bzlas tagadong
bkru ba byas na thams cad las rgyal bar 'gyur ro// dpung dang/ stobs dang/ yul dang/ yul 'khor dang/ phyir rgol ba dang/ mi mdza' ba thams cad dang/ g.yul ngo thams cad du ba lang gi lci
bas dkyil 'khor byas la bum pa gang ba bzhi gzhags/ gtsang mas gos gtsang ma bgos pa a ku ru'i bdug pa dbul bar bya zhing/ 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug lamachod pa byas nas
don yod pa'i zhags pa'isnying po'i mdo 'dimachod de bklags pa byas n zhi ba chen por 'gyur to// thams cad byams pa'i sems dang byams pa'i yid du 'gyur zhing/ thamasacad du rgyal ba thob par

'gyur ro// zhi ba chen por 'gyur ro// chu des bdaganyid la kun tu gtor te tsan dan la lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas te sAng khor thig le byas te/ rtag tu dran par byas na mtshams med pa thams cad zad par/
'gyur ro// khyim thams cad bsrungan pad+ma dang/ naku le dang/ shing acha'am tog mar dang bsres pa las sbyin sreg byas khyim bsrung ba chen po byas par 'gyur ro// 'byung po'i gdon thamasatsad
lasaM bsrung ba byas par 'gyur ro// yang na las thams cad lanor bu bsgrub pa'i rdzas 'di dag bsogs la cha mnyam par byas te/ gtsang mas gos gtsang ma bgos la snying po brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas pas
las thams cad bya'o// dza ya dang/ bi dza ya dang/ nA gu lI dang/ gan d+han gu ldi dang/ ba ru Nidang/ in dra ba ru nA dang/ gnad+ha pra yaM gu dang/ ta ga ra dang/ tsakra dang/ mahA/

tsakra dang/ so ma rA dza dang/ su man da rnams phyam zhib mor byas te/ char pa'i nus spus la tsan dan dang gur kum sbyar ba'i chus brlan te brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas la/ 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang
phyug gi spyan sngaranor bur byas te/ yang lananyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas nas a ka ru'i bdug pas bdugs la de nyid bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs drung du bzhag ste/ ras kyis g.yogs la grib mar bsams te
blongs la yang don yod ba'i zhags pa'i snying po lan bdun bzlas par bya zhing/ khro bo'i rgyal po lan gsum bzlas brjod byas te mgo bor bzung na/ rgyal po btsun mo'i 'khor dang bcas pas mchod par
'gyur zhing thams cad dbang du 'gyur ro// rigs bzhi'i 'jig rten thams cad dbang du 'gyur ro// bla mar gcig pur 'gyur ro/ lha thams cad kyang gzi byin 'jug par 'gyur ro// 'dwags pa

spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug kyang rtag tu gzigs par 'gyur ro// tshangs pa dang/ khyab 'jug dang/ dbang phyug chen po'ang rtag tu phyibazhin 'brang bar 'gyur zhing dus thams cad du mchog sbyin bar 'gyur
phyir rgol ba dang mimadza' ba thamAd kyang rtag tu mthun par byed cing dbang du 'gyur ro// byad ma bzad pa dang/ dug sbyar ma dang/ phyi ma'i dug dang/ gsang sngags dang/ g.yengs byed kyis mi tshugs
shing thamasacad 'jigs par 'gyur ro// rtag tu dpal dang/ gzi byin dang/ bsod nams dang bkra shis dang/ dge ba'i tshogs dang ldan par 'gyur ro//de bzhin gshog pa thamA cad de la gzig par 'gyur
po rtag tu ston bzhidangar 'gyur ro//thams cad du dus thams cad n rgyal ba thob par 'gyur ro// skal ba bzang po thogs pa med pa' 'phalabar 'gyur ro// dpungapa la btagasan glang po che chen po'i stobs
dang ldan bar 'gyur ro// g.yul 'gyed pa dang dmag thams cad las rgyal ba chen por 'gyur ro// stobs dang/ brtson 'grus dang/ pha rol gnon pa chen por yapa'i gyur ro// rig sngags 'chang gi
chog zhib mo chen po grub par 'gyur ro// gnod sbyin dang/ srin bo dang/ 'byung po dang/ sha za'i gdon dang/ brjod byed kyis mi tshugs par 'gyur ro// nam yang de lalam ngan pa dang ltas ngan pa
'byung bar mi 'gyur ro// byis pa rnams la mgul du btags na gdon thamasaMcad dang/ rims nad thams cad dang/ nad thams cad dang/ btsas pa 'phrog pa thams cad kyis mi tshugs so// nag

po chon ngo mamo'i tshog sakyi 'khor dang bcas pa rtag tu rgyunami 'chad par phyi bzhin 'brang zhing/ srung ba dang/ skyab pa dang/ sba babyed par 'gyur/ yun ring du 'tsho bar 'gyur/ tshoring bar 'gyur ro// bud
mad rnams las rags gsar pa btags te khrus byas nas gos gtsang ma gsar pa bgos te/ 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la phyag dang mchod pa byas n skal ba bzang bo mchog dang ldan
par byed cing bkramangashis pa rab tu zhi bar byed/ khyim thab dang rtag tu rjes su mthun par 'gyur/ khye'u dang bu mo yod par 'gyur/ shes rang mchog tu 'gyur/ thams car
dga' bas lta bar 'gyur de la bud med kyi skyon yang 'byung bar mi 'gyur/ phyi ma la de lta bu'i bud med kyi lus m thob par shes par bya ste/ shi nas bde ba can gyi 'jig rten gyi khams su skye bar
'gyur ro// nor bu 'di btags na thams cad du bsrung ba byas par 'gyur zhing dug dang/ mtshon dang/ mas mi tshugs so// dus byas pa'i ngaskye bar mi 'gyur ro// nor bu 'di btags pas
dug med pa ra 'gyur zhing myur du zhi bar 'gyur ro// tshorab skye bar mi 'gyur zhi ba bad bar zhi ba'agyur ro// rlung dang/ sprin dang/ sor ba mnan na chu la lan bdun bzlas te nam mkha' la gtor na
rlung dang/ sprin dang/ saro ba thams cad mnan par 'gyur ro// bzlog par bya na bal po se'u'i lcag ma'am ka ra wI re'i lcagams bya'o// dran pa bskyang na 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang
phyug gi spyan sngar mi smra bar don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po lan bdun bzlas te/ nor bu chu dron laso btang ba byas na bklags pa tsam gyis tshigs su bcad pa stong 'dzin par 'gyur zhing thos pa
mang po rgya mtsho khasags par 'gyur ro// rgyal srid dang/ yul 'khor dang/ btsun mo 'khor dang bcas pa dbang du bya bar 'dod na lus bsku ba byas na gang du zhugs pa der thams cad dbang du 'gyur
ro pus mo gnyis la byugs na chu klung chen po pus mo nub tsam gyis pha rol tu rgol bar 'gyur ro// rgyal mtshan gyi rtse mo la btags te dmag gam/ g.yul ngo 'am/tshogs pa'i nang ngam//
ri khrod dang/ tshang tshangadang/ ri sul dang/ dgon par phyin pa na bsgreng ba byas na bad ba dang bde legs su rgal bar 'gyur zhing/ chom po dang/ g.yonacan dang/ rkun po dang/ gcan gzan
gtum po'i 'jigs pas ma tshugs par 'gyur zhing bltar med par 'gyur ro// btson ra thams cad du song ba na byug pa byas na shang sgrog dang/ khong sgrol dang lcags sgrog gis bcings pa
thams cad chags grugs su 'gyur ro// bdaganyid la bskus na mtshonaMchami snang bar 'gyur ro// mig gnyis lo bskus na gnyid log pa'i tshe rmi lam chen po rmibar 'gyur zhing/ ji ltar ba sam
shing ston pa snang bar 'gyur ro// 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug sa ston par mdzad cing thams cad bka' stsol bar 'gyur ro// de la mig nad thamasacad kyis mitshugs so// kha'i
nang dubazhugan gang bsangs pa sbyin par byed cing dbang du 'gyur ro// gdon gyis zam pa la dpral ba la byug pa byas na byugs pa tsam gyis 'bab par 'gyur te/ thams cad sla bar 'gyur ro//
lag mthil du bskus na glang po che la reg na dbang du 'gyur zhing gar btang ba der 'gro bar 'gyur ro// dpral ba'i dbus su thig le byas n 'jig rten thams cad kyisacher mchod mer 'gyur ro// med
pa la byugasan mgrin sngon bzhin du bram ze thamasacad da bar du 'gyur zhing bgyi ba ci mchis zhes bran bzhin du 'gyur ro// 'o ma dang sbyar te mig la bskus na mtshan mo'ang
nyin mo'i bzhin du snang bar 'gyur ro// gnod sbyin dang srin po'i kha nas thams cad kyi sgo phye bar 'gyur zhing gter thams cad 'byung bar 'gyur ro// thams cad bran bzhin byed par 'gyur ro// klu'i/

gnas kyi mtshor boran kru chen pos char gyi rgyun gtong bar 'gyur ro// char ha cang che ba'i tsho chu dang bsres te nam mkha' la gtor na zhi bar 'gyur ro// sngon la bltas te sor ba'i rgyun la gtor nasor ba
'bab par mi 'gyur ro// lag pa la btags na gang la reg pa de zad mishes par 'gyur ro// rkang pa'i rje ngar la btags te me'i nang du zhugs nams mtshugs de tsan dan shin dubasil bar gyur
ral gra la byugs te g.yul ngor song na lus thams cad gcig tu 'bar bar gyur nas/ pha rol gyi dpung thams cad 'byor bar 'gyur zhing thams cad du rgyal bar 'gyur ro// nang rten ngos thos
pa'i nad pa tshabs po che la phye ma byin na nad tshabs chen po las thar par 'gyur ro// tshad pa dang pho ba na ba la chu dron las btangan mod la yongs su thar par 'gyur ro// rtsib logs na ba la dar
ba las btang na zha bar 'gyur ro// nad thams cad la ni zhun mar dang til mar las sbyar te bskumanyes dang/ bza' ba dang/ btung ba'i nad dang/ snar blugs pa dang/ byug pa byas na nad thams
00 cad 'jig par 'gyur zhing nam yang 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro// phug gi sgor khor yug tu byugs la sing po lan bdun bzlas te/ don yo'ar 'i zhags pa'i phyag rgya byas la khro bo'i rgyal po'i
gsang sngags lan gcig bzlas brjod byas nas zhugs n phug gi sgo chag ste rang gi khyim ji lta ba bzhin du 'gyur zhing snang ba thams cad bzlog par 'gyur ro// bgegs dang log 'dren tha/
cad mi snang bar 'gyur ro// khar bcug stami sna bar snying po'i mdo brjod par byas na lan brgya phrag stong bzlas par 'gyur ro// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba dang ldan par
'gyur ro// shing rta'i srogaging la byugasan gso la ngo thams cad du rgyal ba thob par 'gyur ro// thongan [”]gtor narin chen pos nyo bar 'gyur ro// bu mo'i gdong bkrus na mgo yang bar
'gyur ro// snying kharathig le byas n thams cad du bltar med par 'gyur ro// thams cad du 'dod pa thams cad sbyin pa/ las thams cad byed pa/ bdag bsrung ba/ gzhan bsrung
ba'i nor bu gang dang gang la sbyar zhing bzlasan thams cad du bltar med par 'gyur ro// bgegs dang log 'drena rnams la til dang chu la lan bdun bzlas dbyan na bgegs dang log
'dren thams cad zhi bar 'gyur ro// byur ngan pa med par bya na ras la dkyil 'khor zlum po bris la/ 'phags pa spyan ras gzagis dbang phyug gi spyan sngar mi smra bar bzlas brjod
stong rtsa brgyad bzlas lamachod pa rgya chen po byas te gtsang mas gos gtsang ma bgos te/ a ka ru'i bdug pas bdug par bya zhing/ sbos dang ldan pa'i tilamar kyi bar
ma bltam pa byusan bzlas brjod byas ba tsam gyis mod la byur ngan pa thams cad med par 'gyur ro// dbul bskyoms pa'i don dang/ ma grub pa dang/ sdig pa dang/ rmi lam ngan pa dang/ ltas
ngan pa dang/ sgrib pa bsalan gsar ram dngul gyi bum pa spos chus bkang ba la lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas te blugasan/ de dag thams cad 'jig par 'gyurazhing 'jig rten pa'i dpal chen po nyamA
su myong bar 'gyur ro// gdon thamasacad tshar gcad na til dang 'bras so ba'i sbyin sreg gis so// nad dang gnod pa thams cad bsal namul bzlas pas so// dus ma yin par 'chi ba zhi bar spyan
dus gsum du lan gsum gsum du rtag tu bzlas pas dus ma yin par 'chi bzhi bar 'gyur ro// bcing ba dang/ lcags sgrog dang/ khong sgril gzhoman nyin zhing brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas pas so//

rgyal po dbang du byas na lam po cher brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas na rgyal po 'khor dang bcas pa dbang du 'gyur ro// chom po dang rkun po regs par byanorA dzA koshA ta ki'i sa bon gyi sbyin sreg gis so// ma

rings par byanasong ldeng gi shing la bzlas te mar bcug nas bzlas na ma rengs par byed par 'gyur re// churangs par bya na ka la gi'i sa bon chu'i nang nu btab na chu rengs par byas par 'gyur ro// dug/

gzhilan rma bya'i sgo yis so// mtshon rengs par bya na shing gnam lcags kyis tshig pa'i thal ba la bzlas te gtor na mtshon cha thams cad rengs par 'gyur ro// ting nge 'dzin sgruban ting nge 'dzin gyi phyag rgya
bcas te bzlas na ting nge 'dzan stong thob par 'gyur ro// pha rol tu phyin pa drug rdzogs par 'dod pa'i rig sngags 'chang dge slong ngam/ dge slong ma 'am/ dge bsAnanam/ dge bsnyen ma des ba lang gi/
lci bas dkyil 'khor gru bzhi pa cha shin tu 'byas pa byas te/ tsan dan gyis mchod par bya zhing gur kum dang/ gla rtsi dang/ ga pur gyis mchod nas me tog snatshogs bkram ste/ 'phags pa spyan
ras gzigs dbang phyuga mngon du phyogs par bzhag nas bum pa spos chus bkang ba bzhi bzhag la/ mchod yon gyi snod bzhi dang/ pog por bzhi sos chu'i bum pa'i dbus su gzhag par bya zhing/ a
ka ru'i bdug pa dbul bar bya'o// bum pa'i stong du bcom ldan 'das ma shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gzhag par bya/ rgyun thams cad kyis brgyan par bya zhing/ sngosakyi mar me bzhibaltams par

bya/ mchod pa rgya chen po bya/ ba dan gyis brgyan par bya zhing dkyil 'khor byas la/ dkyil 'khor gyi mdun du skyil mo krung du 'dug ste bzlas brjod stong rtsa brgyad bya/ khro bo'i rgyal po lanabargya rtsa brgyad
bzlas brjod byas n pha rol tu phyin pa drug yongs su rdzogs par 'gyurazhing/ 'phags pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sku ston par 'gyur ro// dge ba'i rtsa ba'i tshogs thams cad yongasasu rdzogs
par 'gyur ro// sems can brgya stong mang po gdulan ri'i rtse mor stong rtsa brgyad bzlas pas so// bdud la sogs pa snang ba thams cad gzhom par 'dod pas rdo rje 'am//

mdung rtsa gsum la lan stong rtsa brgyad bzlas te/ donayod pa'i zhags pa'i phyag rgyas tsham rngam bya zhang khro bo'i rgyal po'i bsngags pa 'i phyag rgya bcings ti/ khros pas lan brgyartsa brgyad bzlas nasakasor
da nam mkha' la 'phangs nabadud la sogs pa snang ba thams cad bcom par 'gyur ro// las thams cad grub pa dang/ gsang sngags thams cad 'grub pa dang/ bsam pa thams cad
lha'agrubacing yongs su rdzogs par 'dod pas don yod pa'i zhags pa'i phyag rgya bcings te/ stong nyi shu bzlas na grub pa chen po'agyur ro// de bzhinagshegs pa thams cad kyis dbang bskur ba'
'dod pas stong sumacu rtsa gnyis bzlas na/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dbang bskur bar 'gyur te/ de bzhin du spos chu'i bum pas dbang bskur bar bya'o// de bzhin gshegs pa'i gzug
bar n sku gdung dang bcas pa lamig gtad de khri bzlas na de bzhin gshegs pa nyid 'thob par 'gyur ro// 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi zhabs drung mnan te khri bzlas na spyan ras

gzigs dbang phyug dang 'dra bar 'gyur ro// phyag na rdo rje spyan drang khar 'dod pas/ phyag na rdo rje'i zhabasamanan to bzlasaMbarjod lan stong byas nasaM gu gul gyi bdug pa dbul ba byas na/ 'phags/

[4]pa phuganardo rje rang gi gzugs kyis mdun na 'dug par 'gyur ro// thams cad du khro bo'i rgyal po dran par bya zhing/ thams cad du don yod pa'i zhags pa'i phyag rgyu bcing ba byas na/ ma bsgrubasam/
bklags par 'grub cing/ chog zhib mo mtha' yas 'grub par 'gyur ro// snying rjod ng/ dga' ba dang/ btang snyoms dang/ ngo tsha shes pa dang/ brtse ba dang/ byams pa dang/ shes rabo dang
ldan pas 'di 'grub par bstan to// go cha bgos pa grub pa mchog thams cad grub pa thob cing bsod nams kyi phung pos 'phar bar 'gyur ro// thog mar khro bo'i rgyal po bzlas nga sa rtag tu mtshan
gcad pa dang/ phyogs bcing ba dang/ yul bcing ba bya ste/ srung ba mchog tudakon pa'o// de bzhin gshegs pa dang rgyal ba'i bdag nyid skyes pa thams cad kyis dbang bskur bar 'gyur zhing go
ma bgos par 'gyur ro// rtag tu dbang bskur ba dang/ cho ga zhib mo thams cad 'grub pa dang/ ram tshig shes par 'gyur ro// thams cad du don yod rgyal po myur du 'grub par 'gyur to/ phyag
na pad+mas 'jig rten du bde ba'i mchog sbyin pa dang/ dbugs 'byin par 'gyur ro// de bas na rtag tu khro bo bklag par bya'o// gal te dbang bskur bar 'dod na'ang rgyal ba thams cad kyis dbang bskur
bar 'gyur ro// de bzhin gshegs pas bden bston par 'gyur ro// don yod pa'i rgyal po'i cho ga zhib mo mchog las khro bo'i rgyal po bshad por bya ste/ gtsang mas gos gtsang ma bgos la/ ]
shes rab dang byang nub kyi thabs dang ldan pas 'di 'grub par de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis lung bstan to// nam/ saN+Ta ta thA ga ta/ Aru ba lo ki te shwa ra badzra b+ha/

re b+hA/ o tsa ra tsa ra/ tshu ru tsu ru/ ma hA kA ru Ni ka/ tsir tsir/ bi ri bo raM/ ma hA pany+tsa hasta/ ka la ka la/ ku ru ku ru/ ma hAspu ma pralta/ tsa ra tsa ra/ tsa tsa ra te/ tsa re shA ra/ a h+phe hi/ si rlu si h+phu/

bu rU ban+d+ha/ d+hAb b+hUb/ ki Ni ki Ni/ pa ra ma shud d+ha satA/ ka ra ka ra/ ki ri ki ri/ ku ru ku ru/ ma hA pa shu pa ti ba 'ad+d+har hahA/ hahI/ hu hU/ o kA ra ma h+pha brah+ma ba Thad+har tsa ra tsa ra/ bar

rgyu bar rab+hisha ta sa ha sa pra ti maN+Di ta shA rir/ dzA la dzA la/ tA pa ta pa/ b+ha ga bAn/ sa mA di t+ya/ ya ma b.ru Na/ ku be ra/ brag+hin dra/ ri rig Na/ debag Nah+pha rtsa ta tsa ra Na/ su ru su ru

mu ru mu ru/ sa nata ku mAr/ ru d+haM/ bilAbAs ba/ d+han da/ de ba ra yin yaM ka/ ba hu bi bi d+hu bo nga d+ha ra d+ha ra d+ha ra/ sa man b.loki/ bi lo ki te/ lokeshwa ra/ mu ya mu yamuny+dza muny+tsa/

ban+d+ha ban+d+ha na/ tA Nan/ tardzan/ rAdza tas ra age/ u da ka/ ba Sha/ shas pa ri mo tsa ka/ ka Na ka Na/ bal bo smyug tsa tu rA r+ya sa skya sam pra kAsha ka ta ma ta ma/ sa ma sa ma/ ma hA tsi can
kAraM pra sha mnam li mi li/ e Naya tsam kri ta pa ra ka ra/ e byehi/ ma Ta ma Ta/ bshud+d+ha bi ya ni bA sin/ ma hA kA ru Nika/ shwa ta ye tsho pa bI Sha/ rat+namu ku Ta mA la d+ha ra/ sam+badzA/

[4]/ shi ra si kri ta/ ka ra bu Ta/ smyan/ sa mA d+hi/ bi mok+Sha a pra kamyu/ ShaT pA ra mi tA pa ri pA ra ka/ bsusatAsan ta ti pa ri pA tsa ka sam+b+hamArA di pra duny+dzapra marda ka/ saN+Da sid ts+tsha shA pa ri pu ra ka/

a d+hiShiny+tsasan+d+hAta thA ga ta/ a b+hi Tikar/ b+ha ga bAn ta/ a mo g+ha rA dza hU~M phaT/ na mos te sanA/ gsang sngags kyi tshog snga ma de lta bu s las thams cad pa don yod pa'i 'gos pa khro bo zhes bya

ba grub pa mchog las thams cad pa'o// na mo rat+na tra yA ya/ na ma Ar+ya a mi tA b+hA yaM/ ta thA ga tA ya/ na ma Ar+ya a ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/bod+hisatwA ya/ma b+hA satwa ya/ ma hA kA ru Ni kA ya/ a mo g+ha bar dA/

pAsha has ya/ mahA shud+d+hA/ satA ya/ Agats+tsa/ b+ha ga bAn/ pad+maha// ba ra da ka rI gu le/ pad+ma b+hu dze ma hA pashu pa ti ba ta d+ha re/ pra sA da/ hUM hUM Agats+tsa/ ma hA ba ga/ bi bA sha par/

bas has/ a mo g+ha shud d+he/ ha sa ha sa/ tsa la tsa la/ A gats+tsha A gats+tsha/ b+ha ga bAn/ a ba lo ki tishAr/ ma ma gan d+ha puSh+Tha/ sa ma madz+dza ni yam pra tIts+tsaM/ tri ralcas t+ye na/ a mo g+ha sid
rnye swAhA/ 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi dkyil 'khor na gnas pa thams cad dgug pa la a ka ru'i bdug pa la lanali shu rtsa gcig bzlas pas so// na mo rat+na tra yA ya// na ma

Ar+ya a ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/ bo d+hi satwA ya/ mahAsaMtA ya/ ma hA kA ru NikA ya/ sam+b+hagan d+ha ba tisid ta/ a mo g+ha b+hu dza/ ba dA ya/ saN+Dagan d+hamA l+yA bi b+hA Shi ta pra yaM/ tsan+d+ra dz+nyA sha ra sa pri ye/
gan d+hu gnang+gA nu le pa na sA ma ma pratIts+tsaM/ bar bar ba ra d+ha ya swAhA/ lan bdun bzlas te dbul bar bya'o// na mo rat+na tra yA ya/ na ma Ar+ya a ba lo ki ta shA rA ya/ bo d+hisatwA

ya/ ma hA satwa ya/ mahAkA ru Ni kA yatad+ya thA/ hi li hi li/ mi li mi li/ ma hAphra lha/ su bi ma le/ brah+ma u0f8bd+hare/ su ma ti ba ra de/ tur du ru/ btsi tra pul+lamA l+yA bi b+ha litaM/ ha ra ha ra/ mar

ma ra/ tu ru tu ru/ a mo g+ha hrid ya pramo da na ku ru pra tIts+tsham ma pul+labare sAhA/ me tog la lan bdun bzlas te dbul bar bya'o// na mo rat+na tra yA ya/ na ma Ar+ya a ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/ bo d+hi

ltasatwa ya/ ma hA satwa ya/ ma h+phu ka ru Ni kA ya/ ma hAbo d+hisatA ba ra de/ snare sa ra/ b+ha ga bAn/ sam ya/ saN+Ta ta thA ga tAshA sid rme/ b+ha ga bAn/ a ba lo kA ya/ sang+gA satwA a ba lo ka ni/

a mo g+ha bti pA shoste/ sid d+ha sidan+te/ sid d+h+ya ba ra da sid d+hun tu to/ bud+d+had+harma/ saM g+ha sa t+ye na tur tu ru/ sa skya sam ya pA la ya sAhA/ 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug dran par bya ba'i

rig sngags so// na morat+na tra yA ya/ na ma Ar+ya a ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/ bo d+hisatwa ya/ ma yAsatwa ya/ ma hA kAruNikA ya/ tad+ya thA/ b+hur rUr/ badzrad+hi ra/ pad+ma rdza tha/ pig tAb ra de/ bgabag

tu ngu d+hu Tu/ sarba bi dza pra ye/ but+tAd+harma/ saM g+ha sa na/ mi li mi li swAhA/ gtor ma'i sngags talan bdun bzlas te sbyin no// na mo rat+natra yA yaM/ nam Ar+ya a ba lo kita shar ya/ bo d+hisatwA ya/

ma hAsatwA ya/ ma hA kA ru NikA ya/ apra ti ha ta/ ta thA ga ta dzA na kA ya/ b+ha ga bAn/ A ha ra A ha ra/ pad+masan/ pad+ma b+hu dze/ shu taM ga/ shwa ta su dze/ shrI ta mA l+yA bi b+hA wa ti/ rUm klu ma/ dzAl

bud+d+hat+tarma/ saM g+ha sat+yA na sAhA/ mar me'i rig sngags te lan bdun bzlas so// na mo rat+na tra yA ya/ na ma Ar+ya a ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/ bo d+hi sat+tA ya/ ma hA satwA ya/ ma hA kA ru Ni kA ya/ tad+ya thA/

o bi ri bir/ pad+ma pA Ni/ A gamAg mA/ a mo g+ha ta tA sedaD+ha/ sam+ba ta thA ga ta ga ga na rasany+tso di te/ sam+b+hab cu ts+tsha rabi sho d+han/ a mo g+ha sid d+hesAhA/ spos chu'i dri zhim po'i bum pa la lan bdun
bzlas te khrus bya'o// khrus kyi rig sngags so// na mo rat+titra yA ya/ nameAr+ya a ba lo kiteshwa rA ya/ bo d+hisatAya/ mahA satwa ya/ ma hA kA ru Ni kA ya/ tad+ya thA/ rUm chu mo/ d+hu d+hu ma//

pad+mapartse nir b+hA sa/ shud b+hashud d+ha/ kan tsan/ pra b+hA sa bi ma le/ shud d+har hUM/ shutsishutsi/ shu ci gotsa ra sa dehUM/ pad+d+haM ga ba ti/ pra bar NisAhU~M/ gos kyi rig sngags te lan bdun bzlas
pas so// ra mo rat+na tra yA ya/ na ma Ar+ya a ba lo ki tashA rA ya/ bod+d+hi satwA ya/ ma hA satwA ya/ ma hA kA ru NikA ya/ tad+ya thA/ shAmashAmi ya/ shan tim/ mam s+yA naM kuru/ shAn
pashan ta shud d+ha ka l+ya na bi ra dze/ shAn ti bi dza ya/ dza ya sid d+he/ b+ha ga bAn/ Ar+ya a ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/ sa ra sa ra swAhA/ mal cha la bsngags te nyal na rmi lam ngan ba
dang ltas ngan pa thams cad mi mthong ngo// na mo rat+na tra yA ya/ na ma Ar+ya a ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/ bo d+hi satwa ya/ ma hA satwa ya/ ma hA ka ru Ni kA ya/ tad+ya thA/nA ga pA ka

paNe dbyi dza le/ dza lA bahe/ dzalasaMkob yanA ga dzalasaM sho d+hani pad+masale/ pad+ma bi shud d+he/ pA Nidza lesaM shorta ya/ Ad man d+ha ra d+ha ra/ sale le sAhA/ chu'i sngags 'khrus dang dbang bskur ba'i chu bungs

la lan bdun bzlas te spyad do// namorat+na tra yA ya/ na ma Ar+ya a ba lo kiteshwarAya/ bo d+hi satwA ya ]ma yAsat+tAya/ ma hA kA ru Ni kA ya/ sang+g+hasatwAhe dkar ya/ a mo g+ha ba ra pra dAya/ sarba satwaMmanan pA/

na pra dAya/ de ban gA da ya b+ho dzra bi d+hing+gAr sA nu pra dAya/ sakal b+hu pa ni/ sgrub na bsho d+hani/ sanehAya pra ba ra bi shud d+he swAhA/ dbul ba'i gsang sngags so// na mo rat+na tra yA ya/ na ma Ar+ya a ba lo ka kArA

ya/ bo d+hi satwA ya mahAsatwA ya/ ma hA kAru Ni kA ya/ saN+Dade bAsur nam smi te/ sam saman prapU ra Ni/ sam gnat+tA ba bA site/ ga ga na bi shudan+te/ muk+ti pra b+he/ dza ya bi dza ye/ dzaya ni mA l+ya pan ya ti/

pul+lamAphywa gan d+ha bo d+han/ bi sho d+haya/ sang+gAtathAgata bi shud d+he/ pad+ma'isho d+hani swAhA/ ma tog rnying pa dor ba'i rig sngags so// na mo rat+ta tra yA ya/ nam Ar+ya a ba lokiteshwa rA ya/ bo d+hi sa twA ya/ ma hA satwA

pa ma hA kAru Ni kA ya/ tad+yathA d+har Ninad+hare/ rnyar Ni banat+te/ ban d+ha bas D+ha/ shukra bi sho d+ha ni/ shu kra mA li ling gi ti/ shu ka bi sho d+hani/ shud d+ha bi ma le sAhA/ rtswa ku sha 'am/ bsakyi srid bu 'am

[z]/ bumo gtsang mas bkal ba'i srad bu la lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas te mdud pa nyi shu rtsa gcig thor ba byas na khu chu 'gags par 'gyur ro// namo rat+na tra yA ya/ na ma Ar+ya a ba lo ki te shwa rA ya//

bod+hisatwA ya/ ma hA satwA ya/ ma hA kA ru Ni kA yatad+ya thA/ dzA le tshig le/ bi ma le dzA li/ pra b+hA sa bi ra dza/ sAr+ya ba ti/ dza ya pad+ma mA la d+ha re swAhA/ ma'i sbyin srag gi thal ba la lan bdunubazos te kun tu

gtor na bgegs dang log 'dren thams cad kyis nam yang mi tshugs so// na mo rat+na tra yA ya/ nam Ar+ya a ba lo[']teshA rA ya/ bo d+hi satwA ya/ ma hA satwa ya/ ma hA kA ru NikA ya/ tad+ya thA/ dza la dza le/

dzal ba ti/ dza la pra b+ha ban/ nA ga sra ba Ni/ di bya bA ri Ni/ mi li mi li swAhA/ ltareg gi rig sngags so// na mo rat+na tra yA ya/ na ma Ar+ya a ba lokiteshwarA ye/ bo d+hi satwA ya/ ma hA sAt+tA ya/ ma hA kA ru Ni kA

ya/ tad+ya thA/ riNi har Ni/ pa ga la po ga la/ hi ri hir b+ha ga bAn ne tsal pra tsa la/ pra ti ti mAn rak+Sha rakam ma buN+Dat+tamasaM g+ha sa t+ye na sAnA/ stogs bu 'am rtswa ku sha bting ba la lan bdun bzlas pas

stan gyi rig sngags so// namo rat+na tra yA ya/ na ma/ sam+b+ho maN+Dalani bA sin de ba tAnaM/ na mo bcu de ba tAnaM/ sam+b+ha kal pa sid d+hAnaM/ na ma Ar+ya a ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/ bo d+hi satwA ya/ ma hA satwa ya/ ma hUM

kA ru Ni kA ya/ a skye hi b+ha gal/ pad+masun d+har/ ma hAbir+ya de ba ti/ tsa la tsa la/ pad+ma sun d+hari/ be gab te/ su ru su ru swAhA/ nyin re zhing ma tog dang/ bdug pa dang/ gtor ma dang/ spos chus pho nyamo
pats+tsha'i rigs mdzes pa dang/ gnod sbyin mo rtsal pa gcig ma mchod nas bzlas brjod lan bdun byas nanam yang bgegs thams cad kyis mi tshugs so// na mo rat+na tra yA ya/

na ma/ khrod+ha rA dzA ya/ na ma Ar+ya a ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/ bo d+hi satwA ya/ ma satwA ya/ ma hA kA ru Ni kA ya/ nam sam+b+habatre ku la bi sha s+ya/ tad+ya thA/ oM a mo g+ha hri da ya pra b+hA bi ni/ sam+b+habig+hAn

khra sha ma ni/ a har/ saMhar/ parlab to ba bit+taM/ ma Ni ka Nabi b+hU ta/ ka ma la b+hu dze/ ta ra ta ra/ tArA ya pa ram/ amo g+ha hrid ya/ dza ye khri ne tre/ ba re da b+hu dze/ sma ra sma ra/ b+hagabAn/ sarba ta thAg
tas ma ya// b+har b+ha ra/ b+hu'u byu ru/ brah+ma be red+ha ra/ bib+hApeta tanaM/ ma hA pA ya haro/ alo ka ya/bi lo ka ya/ sam+b+hasatA ba lo ka ni/ bar bar de sAhA/ las thams cad pa'i rig sngags te/
sgrub pa'i dus su khyad par du ni rig sngags 'dis dkyil 'khor gyi gnas na 'khod pa'i las mi rnams bsrung bar bye'o// na mo rat+na tra yA ya/ na ma Ar+ya a ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/ bo d+hi

satwA ya/ ma hA satwa ya/ mahA kA ru Ni kA ya/ tad+ya thA/ par pa ra/ mar mar/ sa ra sa ra/ ban b+haban d+ha sa man+ten/ a mo g+ha pA shaha ste/ tiSh+Tha tiSh+Tha/ ban+d+ha d+harma saM g+ha sa t+ye na sAhA/ thal ba

la lan nyi shu rtsa gtsog bzlas te don yod zhags pa'i phyag rgyas yul bcang ngo// na mo rat+na tra yA ya/ na ma Ar+ya a ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/ bo d+hi satwA ya/ ma hAsaMtA ya/ ma hA kA ru Ni kA ya/ tad+ya thA/

dishAban d+hani/ a mo g+he/ a pra ti ha te/ mu ru mu ru/ su ru su ru/ tu ru tu ru/ sam+b+habig+hAn bi nAshaNi/ pad+ma sA ra bib+hU ti/ buT+Thad+harmusaM g+ha sa t+ye na ban d+ha/ a dzi ta bar re swAhA/ spyan drangs te phyi nas

phyogs bcing bar bya'o// na mo rat+na tra yA ya/ na ma Ar+ya a ba lo ki teshwa rA ya/ bo dz+hisatAya/ ma hA satwa ya/ ma hA kA ru NikAya/ tad+ya thA/ hi li hi li mi li mi li/ si ris ri/ pi ri pa ri/ ba ra

bar/ bra ba ra bi mA na d+har/ da ra da ra/ gats+tshagats+tshA b+ha ga bAn/ A ba lo ki te shwarAny+tsa/ b+ha ga bAn/ tu ru tu ru/ a mo g+ha paN+De swAhA/ ma togaci red pa la lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas te snyam pa
nas phul na slar gshegs su gsol bar 'gyur ro// rig sngags kyi chog zhib mo rim par phye ba'i cho ga'o/// de nas don yod pa'i zhags pa'i rgyal po khro bo chen po'i sAng po'i
mchog sgrub na sgrub sla ba'i ras kyi sku gzugs kyi cho ga bshad par bya'o// cho ga zhub grub grub pa che// khro bo'i rgyal grub grub pachog/ don yod pa ni grub pa'i mchog/ rig sngags 'di ni bshad
par bya'o// don yod rgyal po khro chen rgyu// snying po dam pa grub pa na// cho ga zhib grub grub pa che// khro bo'i rgyal po grub pa mchog/ grub pa'i mchog ste don yod pa// rig sngags 'di ni bshad
bar bya'o/ gang brjod pa tsam gyis cho ga zhib mo'i mchog thams cad 'grub pa/ sangs rgyas bye ba brgya phrag stong gis gzigs par 'gyur ba/ rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gang+gA'i klung gi byamasnyad brgya
stonga mthong bar 'gyur la/ de bzhin gshegs pa 'bum la dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyod par 'gyurab/ bsod nams kyi phung po bla na med pa/ sdig pa thams cad rab tu zhi bar 'gyur
ba stobs dang brtson 'grus bskyed pa/ rmog zhib mo thams cad don yod pa dakho na nyid sgrubapa 'grub pa/ dran pa tsam gyis mod la ni// sa gzhi yang ni g.yo 'gyur la// sum cu 'i lha rnams g.yo
'gyurazhing/ ltar bcas rgya mtsho lcan por bcas// klu rnams 'dar na yod yod cing// gnod sbyin srin po 'bros 'gyur ba// lha dang lha min g.yul 'gyod tshe// rig sngags rgyal po bla med kyis//
phyagon rdo rje gnod sbyin bcas// dpung dang bcasashing bzhon bcas pa'i// lus skyes 'bar ba'i 'phrang can kun// 'dar zhing kun tu 'dar yod med// rgyal po chen po bzhi po yi// gnas mchog
dgan g.yo 'gyur zhing// de dag thams cad 'dus gyur nas// 'jig rten dbang la skyabs 'dong zhing// bcom ldan mgon pos bskyab tu gsol// thugasarje'i bdag nyid bskyab tu gsol// de
a nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der song ste phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom
ldan 'das bdag la grub pa don yod pa'i snying po rig sngags rgyal po'i snying po 'di gang gis bklags pa tsam gyis don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po myur du rab tu 'grub cing/ dran pa tsam gyis
'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug lha'i lus kyis lus ston par 'gyur ba/ dngos grub dang mchog thams cad sbyin par 'gyur ba mchis te/ bcom ldan 'das de bdag gis bcom ldan
'dus kyi spyan sngar 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor 'di'inang dubasgrags par bgyi'o// na mo rasna tra yA ya/na mo ami tAb+hA ya/ ta thAg tA ya/ na ma Ar+ya a ba lo ki tashar ya/ bo d+hi satwA ya/ mnA/

sat+tA ya/ ma hA kA ru Ni kA ya/ tad+ya thAoM pad+me bad+d+haM/ partsed+har/ bi b+hA Shi ta b+hu dze/ tsar tsar/ brah+ma bo kha d+ha ra/ b+har b+ha ra/ bo tsi tre mo la d+ha ra/ ma Ni ka na ka badzra be chu laM kri ta shArIr/ ta ra tar/

tarAya/ b+ha ga ba ti ba ra Na/ d+hu ru d+hu ru/ a mo g+ha pA sha ha ste/ ba ra ba ra/ pho ra dwayaM ka/ saman+ta a ba lo ki ti/ mahA bo d+hisatA bor da pad+mas na pad+mago'u raM/ dzA la dzA la/ sa ta thA ga ta a b+hi Ti ka/

a b+hi pika te/ ma hA kA ru Ni ke/ ba la ba la/ ma hA be gat+tar/ bkri tAn yan/ daMShA ka rAl mahAte dza/ d+ha ra d+ha ra/ bi pu la dzanab ra da/ ma hA kA ru NikA ya/ ma hA pa shu pa ti bi Ta lhar/ sa ras ra/ pra ba ra pu

lcasaM b+ha ra/ su ga ta b+hu nas mA d+hi/ sa man+ta a ba lo ki te/ IshA rem he shAr/ rulngar ma ka/ ro dra pra la dam ka/ ko b+har dzam hAbe ga d+ha ra/ sam sam/ ma hA smra ma prab+ha/ tsan+d+ra sUr+ya a ti ri ka prab+ha

ma lam la/ sam+b+ham labi sho d+haka/ sam+b+haraM Nangeg nas ni ti/ ma hA ma he grwa ra ru pad+har/ a mi tAb+hadzinA laM kri tadza TA/ dkI Natsan dra laM kri ta shir/ ma tha ma tha/ saN+Dayok+Sha rAk+Sha sa b+hU ta sa na b+halcaka/
ta ra tar/ ta ra ga Nas ma laM kr-i ta/ nad+ma draA la sam+b+ha big+hAn bi nAngasha na ka ra/ pa ra ma tItsit+ta ma hA ka ru Ni ka/ pa ra pa ra/ pa'i purtsa maN+Dal/ so mya mu kha/ ShaT pA ra mi tA

ri pU ra ka/ mi li mi li a Naya tsam nibA sa na/ bya glu tsa rmod ta ri ya/ d+ha ra d+hir/ sam+ba ta thA ga ta a ba lo ki ta/ drin tra tIshA la d+ha ra/ badzra dzA la d+har/ amo g+hapA shahaso/ yam ba ru Na ku be 'a

rU pa d+har/ na gen dra rU pa d+har/ bi ma la bi shud d+ha de ha/ saN+DapA pa shAm kasawa bar Na bi sho d+hi ka/ sam+b+ha kil ba ShanAsha ka/ sA lo kya bkaM ka ra/ sam+basatwaMbakot+ta ka bo d+hisatA ba ra da sat+tha

ta thA ga ta a d+hiT+Thi te/o ba bi b+hu ta shud d+he/d+hir d+hi'i a b.loki ya mAn/samasems m+b+hakarma ma sad+d+ha ya/ a mo g+ha pAsha grid ya sid d+he/ gu rgyan pa si na bar da hU~M phaT/ na mo stu ta swAhA/ grub pa don yod
parig sngags kyi rgyal po 'di bshad ma thag tu 'byung po'i tshogs dang/ gnod sbyin dang/ srin po dang/ bgegs dang/ log 'dren de dag thams cad khas bub tu 'gyel te gcig tu 'bar bar

gyur cing/ gnas kyang 'bar bar gyur pa dang/ de nas gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po phyag na rdo rje dga' bas ba sngalangs te/ sgrag par gyur pa'i lha'i tshogs thams cad dang/ brgya byin dang/ tshangs pa

dang/ khyab 'jug dang/ dbang phyug chen po dang/ rgyal po chen po bzhi dang/ sbag par gyur pa'i lha dang/ lha ma yin dang/ drang srong spa bkong ba thams cad dang/ rgya mtsho na gnas pa'i klu'i rgyal po thams

cad dang/ chu phran thams cad dang/ lha dang klu gang dag chu na gnas pa thams cad dang/ rgya mtshochen po'i lha dang/ lha gangadag lang ka'i grong khyer na gnas pa thams cad dang/ rig sngags 'chang gis 'khor/
los sgyur ba thams cad dang/ gang dag gnas gtsang ma'i ris kyi lha rnams dang/ nam mkha'i lha thams cad 'khrugs par gyur nas nam mkha' las babs te/ bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa'i las
dang/ byang chub sems dpa' 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug de la'ang mchod pa'i phyir lha'i me tog rnam pa sna tshogs pad+ma dang/ ku mu da dang/ ut+pal dang/ puN+Da ri ka dang/ mnad ri ka dang

man dar bachon po'i char dang/ lha'i rgyan dang lhab lhub kyi char pus mo nub tsam ri bo po Ta lar phab ste/ lha'i sil snyan dang glu dbyangs len cing gaha zhes ca co dang ga zha'i sgra bton nas/ bcom ldan 'das

'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis soms can thams cad kyi don du rig sngags chen po 'di bshad do zhes ched du brjod pachen po ched du brjod do// de nas ganod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po phyag na
rdo rje byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gang na ba der song ste/ lan gsum bskor ba byas nas mchod pa'i phyir mu tig gi do shal brgya stong ri ba phul/
lta bcom ldan 'das kyis rig sngags chen po cho ga zhib mo thams cad kyi mchog bshad do// don yod pa'i rgyal po ragi sngags chen po'i snying bo 'jig rten mgon po thub pa chen pos bshad du gsol//
ba@#// bcom ldan 'das cho ga zhib mo mtha' dag den yod pa'i rgyal po 'grub pa'i mchog las thams cad grub pa bshad du gsol/ de nas de'i don du 'phags pa spyan ras

dbang phyug gis don yod pa'i zhags pa'isnying bo cho ga zhib mo grub pa don yod pa rig sngags kyi rgyal po ras kyi sku gzugs sgrub pa'i mchog chog dang yo byad du bcas pa bshad pa/ ras gru bzhi pa kun
nas cha legs par phye ba/ kha tshar ma bcad pa/ skramed pa/ rimo mkhanagatsang ma khrus byas pas gos gtsang ma bgos la gso sbyong dang ldan par byas pas tshon lhag ma ma yin pa snod gsar par bzhag
la bri bar bya ste/ dbus su 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug ral pa'i thor tshugs kyis bzhugs shing rgyal ba 'od dpag med kyis brgyan pa/ thoratsugs kyi g.yas su zla tshes kyis brgyan/
pa ri dag in ya'i pags pa gyon pa/ phyugs bdag gis chalugs 'chang ba/ rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa/ dbu gsum/ spyan gsum/ phyag bzhi pa/ ri'i stangan pa 'i gdan la bzhugs
pa zhal dbus ma zhi ba'i zhal bzhin 'dzum pa/ zhal g.yas pa 'jigs su rung ba/ khro gnyer can thor tshugs 'od dpag med kyis brgyan pa/ dbu zlatshes kyis brgyan pa/ zhal g.yon pa 'jigasasu
rung ba bzhin bsgyur cing mchab gtsags pa/ rgyal ba 'od dpag med dbu la bzhugs pa/ phyag gcig na pad+ma thogs pa/ gnyis partse gsum thogs pa/ gsum pa don yod pa u0f7azhags pa sku'i phyed
na 'dzin pa la bcom ldan 'das zhal khro gnyer can don yod zhags pa'i phyag rgya bcings pa'i phyag la spyanagatod par bya zhing/ bzhi pa dbugs 'byin pa'i phyag tu bya zhing 'od 'dom gang ba khor yug/
'bar ba dang ldan par bya'o// g.yas phyogs na lha mo sgrol ma 'gying bag dang bcas shing lus btud par mchog sbyin pa'i phyag lamig gtod par bya'o// g.yon du pad+ma'i rigs mdzes ma 'dzem
bag dang bcas pa gsang sngags kyi tshul dang rjes su mthun zhing don yod pa'i zhags pa'i phyag la migagatod pa bya'o// lhamo sgrol ma'i bar du gnod sbyin mo ral pa gcig ma bya'o// paNa'i rigs
mdzes ma'i bar du dri mad 'gro bya'o// lha mo sgrol ma'i steng du khro gnyer can bya'o// phyogs gnyis bar lha mo dkar mo lag na ba thogs pa bya'o// pad+ma'i rigs mdzes ma'i 'og tu pho' mogasang
sngags kyi rjes su 'brang ba bya'o// ralapa gcig ma'i 'og tu lha mo chen mo 'jigs byed m bya'o// gong du gnas gtsang ma'i ris kyi lha'i bu dang/ brgya byin dang/ tshangs pa dang/ khyab 'jug dang//
dbang phyugachen po me tog sna tshogs thogs te/ bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa byed pa bya'o// 'og tu rgyal bo chen po bzhi bya'o// 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyugagi 'og tu 'phags pa phyag
na rdo rje 'jigs su rung ba gad rgyangs can khro bo don yod ra khe rgyal po ngas ba bya'o// ras kyi sku gzugs 'di mthong ba tsam gyis 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug ri bo po Ta la nagazhal med
khar dang bcas pa mngon gsum du mthong bar rig par bya'o///'phags pa don yod pa'i zhags pa'i cho ga zhib mo'i rgyal po bam po
bcu pa/// mthong btsam gyis sems can dmyal bachen po brgyad las thar par 'gyur/ 'jigs pa chen po brgyad las yongs su grol bar 'gyur/ mtshams med pa lta byed pa
yongs su thar par 'gyur/ dam pa'i chos sbyong ba dang/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thamasacad spong bsa mthong ba tsam gyis mod la rnam par dag par 'gyur/ mnar med pa la gzhol
ba'i mthar thug pa'i ng yongs su grol bar 'gyur ro// tshangs pa chen po'i bsod nams brgya stong gi dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed par 'gyur/ 'jig rten pa thams cad kyi dag ba'i rtsa ba mchog thob par 'gyur/
'chi ba'i dus na 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug mngon sum du ston par 'gyur zhing dbugs 'byin par 'gyur/ shi nas bde ba can gyi 'jig rten gyi khams su skye bar 'gyur/ sgrib pa

thams cad dang bral nasatshe rabos brgya stong phrag lnga rjes su dran par 'gyur ro// byang chub kyi snying po'i mthar thug gi bar du skyong 'di tha ma yin te/ 'di mthong ba tsam gyis bsod nams kyi phung po/
dang ldan par 'gyuran/ lhag par mang du byed pa lta ci smos te/ de ni phyir mi ldog bar 'gyur/ bla na med pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgyabar 'gyur ro// gal te rigs kyi bu 'am/
rig kyi bu mo 'am/dge slong ngam/ dgeslong ma 'am/ dge bsAnanam/dag bsnyan ma 'am/ rgyal po 'am/ rgyal po'i blon po dang// btsun mo'i 'khor dang bcas pa 'am/ btsun mo dam pa gad la la/
zhig gis ras kyi sku gzugs bsgrub par bya ba de'i spyan sngar don yod pa'i zhags pa'i sing po dran par byadacing// 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs kyi dbar phyug de la'ang mchod pa byed na/ des na
khyod kyis 'di ltar rig par bya sta/ don yod pa'i zhags pa'i sing po stong phrag brgya'agyur du bzlas shing/ bzlas brjod kyi cho ga rtson po byas pa yin no// gang zhig khro bo don yod pa'i zhags pa
bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar ma sa bar lan gsum bzlas brjod byas te chus dbang bskur na/ des n khyod kyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang/ byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyis
bdag byang chub kyi snying po la thug gi bar du dbang bskur bar 'gyur ro snyam du de ltar shes par bya'o// gang gis don yod par grub pa'i cho ga zhib mo chen po'i gzungs 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs/
dbang phyug ras kyi sku gzugs kyispyan sngar mngon sum du thal mo sbyar te 'dug nas lan bdun du bzlas te bskor ba lan bdun byas la/ chu'i mchod yon dang/ lha bshos dang/ bdug spos dang/
ma tog phul nas phyag 'tshal lo zhes smras na/ des khyod kyis 'di ltar shes par bya ste/ gzus thams cad so sor lan stong phrag brgya bzlos par 'gyur zhing/ donayod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po rnam
bya// par grol ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi chos kyi rnam grangs chen po 'di lan stong phrag brgya bzlas par 'gyur ro// don yodapa'i zhags pa'i phyag rgya byas la 'phags pa spyan
sa gzigs dbang phyug gi zhal la mig gtad te/ lag pa g.yas g.yonaganyis sbyar la snying kharagazhag cing tshul 'dis phyag rgya re re la lan stong phrag brgya byas par 'gyur ro// bcom ldan
'das rigs kyi bu 'amaM/ rigs kyi bu mo 'am/ dge slong ngam/ dge slong ma 'am/ dge bsAnanam/ dge bsnyan ma 'am/ rgyal bo 'am/ rgyalamo 'am/ btsun mo dam pa 'am/ btsun mo'i
'khor ram rgyal po dang rgyal po chen po gang la la zhig 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po 'di bats+tsha stong phrag khri bzlas brjod bya bar 'dod pa dang/
de bzhin gshegs pa brgya stong phrag khris dbang bskur bar 'dod pa dang/ rnam pa' grol ba'i dkyil 'khor mtha' dag gi rmog zhib mo 'di rdzogs par lan brgyastong khri bzlas par 'dod pa
tsha dang/ don yod pa'i zhags pa'i phyag rgya 'di lan brgya stong phrag khri bya bar 'dod pa des ras kyi sku gzugs la brtson par bya ste/ ras kyi sku gzugs mngon du bzhag nas gnas gtsang
zhing dban pa= gnas sam/ 'chag sa 'am/ dgon pa'i gnas sam/ phug gam/ ri'i rtse mo'om/ gtsug lag khang ngam/ khang par gtsang sbra dang byi dor byas te/ ba sor mo'i lci
ba legs par mnyes la/ ba las byung ba lta dang bsres te bsdus la sos sna tshogs kyi byug pas byugs nas/ ras kyi sku gzugs kyi spyan sngar tsan dan dkar po'i dkyil 'khor/
byas gur kum gyis khru do'i tshad tsam bris la gla rtsi dang ga pur gyis mchod par bya'o// dri chab kyi bum pa dri rnam pa sna tshogs kyis bkang sa/ ros kyi mgul chings kyis bcings la
dkyil 'khor gyi dbus su gzhag par bya/ ma tog dang/ bdug spos drizhim po dang/ gtor ma dang/ ma tog ga'aphrong ba nyi shu rtsa gcig gzhag par bya/ drichab kyis bkang ba brgyad phyog
bzhir gzhag par bya'o// 'o mas bkang ba'i snod brgyad gzhag par bya/ stags bu'i drung du 'o mas bkang ba'i snod gzhag par bya/ 'o thug dang/ sbyar thug dang/ khaN+Da kha gya dang/ 'bras chan dang/
lagu pan dang/ bu ram dang/ sha kha ra dang/ zhinamar gyis bkang ba'i snod gzhag par bya/ a ka ru nag po dang/ tsan dan dkar po dang/ ga pur dang/ kun tu ru dang/ shi ra bI sa ka dang/
cung pong rnams snod du bzhag nas/ a ka ru'i yam srog shing gis sbyin sreg bya/ me tog sna tshogs kyis brgyan par bya zhing mar gyi mar ma sumacu rtsa gnyis kyis bltam par bya'o// de
nas rig sngags 'chang gtsang mas gos gtsang ma bgos shing khrus legs par byas pas tshes bcu bzhi nas/ bco lnga'i nya'i bar du 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang phyug gi ras kyi sku
gzugs lamachod par bya'o// de'i 'og tu rigasags 'chang gis khro bo'i rgyal po lan bdun bzlas te dri chab kyis dbang bskur bar bya/ don yod pa'i zhags pa'iphyag rgyu

lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bya/ de nas mi smra bar skyil mo krung du 'dug ste/ bzlas brjod kyi phyag rlabacings la/ don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po lan brgyartsa brgyad bzlas par bya/ de'i 'og tu don yod
par grub pa' rig sngags kyi rgyal po stong rtsa brgyad bzlas par byas na/ de nas ras kyi sku gzugs las 'od zer bdun byung nas kun tu snang bar byas te lan gsum bskor ba byas nas 'phags pa
spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi dpral ba'i spyan du zhugs por 'gyur ro// zhugs pa tsam gyis mod las chen po g.yo bar 'gyur zhing/ rig sngags 'chang yang snying dga' zhing ba spu ldang bar 'gyur
mdog mdangs yongs su dag par 'gyur/ 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyugagi mchog sbyin pa'i phyag gisor mo las lha'i chu 'jig par 'gyur/ zhabs gnyis las 'o ma 'dzag par 'gyur/
don yod pa'i zhags pa'i phyag 'bar bar 'gyur/ phyag na pa'i pad+ma lo ma g.yo bar 'gyur ro// rtse gsum g.yo bar 'gyur 'di legs so zhes bya ba'i sgra 'byung bar 'gyur te/ rigs kyi bu legs so

legs so// khyod kyis don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po grub kyis las thams cad byos shig/ khyod kyis don yod grub kyi chog zhib mo'i rgyal pochen po dam pa gruba'o zhes nas/ de nas 'phags pa spyan ras

gzigs dbang phyug rang gi gzugs ston par mdzad do// 'dod pa tham cad kyi mchog sbyin par mdzad do// 'di ni grub pa'i mchog bla na med pa ste/ ma bsgrub par las byed pa'o// de nas dbang du bya bar 'dod
panam tog pad+ma lo lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas la/ 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la phul te/ gang gi ming nas brjod pa de dbang du 'gyurar// sna ma'i me tog la lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas te
'phags pa spyanaras gzigs dbang phyug la phul la/ yang lan bdun bzlas nas me tog rnying pa blangs te gang la byin pa de dbang du 'gyur ro// gdon gyis zin pa la byin magadon thams cad la yongs su
grol bar 'gyur ro// nad kyis thebs pa la byin mand thams cad las yongs su grol bar 'gyur ro// rgyal po'i sgor gtor na rgyal po btsun mo'i 'khor dang bcas pa dbang du 'gyur ro// mi ro bsregs
pa' sa'i steng du gtor nasems can de sems can dmyal ba las yongs su grol bar 'gyur ro// mnar med pa na gnas pa'i sems can la gtor na skad cig de la yongs su grol bar 'gyur ro/ nyal
ba'aAsasu bzhag na rmi'am chen po mthong bar 'gyur ro// 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug skuston par mdzad cing yid du 'ong ba thams cad gsung bar 'gyur ro// skyed pa 'am bud med
gang gi steng du gtor ba de dbang du 'gyur zhing grib ma bzhin phyi bzhin 'brong bar 'gyur ro// rgyal po'i stong dugator na bran bzhin du 'gyur ro/ lha'i gzugs brnyan gyi steng du bzhag na 'gugs par
'gyur zhing las thams cad byed par 'gyur ro// mig sman sgrub par 'dod pas ras kyi sku gzugs kyi spyanasngar mig sman ldong ros la stong rtsa brgyad bzlas na grub pa'i rtags
gsum ston par 'gyur te/ 'bar ba dang/ dbu nga 'byungab dang/ dud pa 'byung bar 'gyur to/ des mig la bskus na mi snang bar 'gyur ro// gter thams cad mthong bar 'gyur ro// gnod sbyin gyi gnas
thams cad mthong bar 'gyur ro// dpral ba' thig le byas na thug thams cad du'ajug par 'gyur ro// sgo thams cad dang 'khrul 'khor thams cad 'bye bar 'gyur ro// yan lag dang nying lag la bsusam
nam mkha' la 'gro bar 'gyur ro// spyi bor thig le byas na 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis rtag tu mchog sbyin par 'gyur ro// mig labyugs na khyab 'jug dang dbang phyug chen po la sogs
pa lha rnams rtag tu phyi bzhin 'brang bar 'gyur zhing dgos pa thams cad 'grub par byed do// mtshan mo mig la bskus na nyin mo bzhin du mthong bar 'gyur zhing gter thams cad 'byung bar 'gyur te/ las
bub tu bzhag nas dor bar bya'o// rang gi lus la byugs na ji srid 'tsho'i bar du go ma bgos pa'i lus su 'gyur ro// gnod sbyin dang srin po lasogs pas mi mthong bar 'gyur zhing las thams cad
byed par 'gyur te/ tshe bskal pa stong thub par 'gyur lo/ yang na bza' ba dang snying khar bsku ba byas na nag po chen po'i gzugs su 'gyur zhing/ lha thams cad kyi gzugs ston par 'gyur ba nas/tshas

cha/ pa dang khyab 'jug dang/ dbang phyug chen po'i gzugs dang/ gzugs sna tshogs mang po ston par 'gyur ro// zla ba dang nyi ma ston par 'gyur ro// lteng 'os dang/ gi'u wang dang/ so'u bi rA ka dang//

gur kum dang/ kra ku lhal don yod par grub pa khri bzlas/ don yod pa'i zhags pa'i sing po stong rtsa brgyad bzlas/ khro bo'i rgyal po brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas par byas thams cad rumi smra bar bya zhing 'phags pa/
spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi spyan sngar btags la/ ras kyi sku gzugs la mngon du phyogs te/ gtsang mas gos gtsang ma bgos latshes bco lnga nyal nyin zhag gcig sang ba byas nas phye ma zhib/

du btags te/ yang don yod pa'i zhagasapa'i snying po dang/ khro bo'i rgyal po dang/ don yod pa'i grub pa'i rig sngags kyi rgyal po brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod byas la/ 'phags pa spyan ras gzig dbang phyug/

phyag tu bzhag ste/ mchod pachen po byas nas ras kyi sku gzugs la mchod pa byas la nyin zhag gcig sang ba byas taM/ ras kyi sku gzugs kyi spyan sngar skyil mo krung du 'dug la don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying

phyag rgya lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bya/ don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po lan lishu rtsa gcig bzlas pa byas te/ bzlas brjod kyi phyag rgya byas la/ khro bo'i gsang sngags lan bdun bzlas te/ de'i 'og tu mig
la bskus nas don yod pa'i grub pa'i gzungs bzlas par byas nas bsdus pa tsam gyis 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug ri po Ta la dang bcas/ gzhalamad khangadang bcas/ byang chub sem
dpa'i tshogs gzhal med dbang dang bcas pa ri bo po Ta la na gnas pa mthong bar 'gyur ro// bde bcan gyi 'jig rten gyi khams mthong bar 'gyur zhing/ de bzhin gshegs
pa 'od dpag med chos 'chad pa mthong bar 'gyur ro// chos bshad pa de'ang thos par 'gyur ro// phyogs bcu'i de bzhin gshegs pa byang chubusems dpa'i tshogs dang bcas/ nyan thos
kyi dge 'dun dang bcas/ sangs rgyas kyi zhingagazhal med khang dang bcas pa mthong bar 'gyur zhing chos 'chad pa'i gsung gi sgra de'ang thos par 'gyur ro// 'di ltar rig ngan gyi rigs su skyes
pa dang / mnar med pa la gzhol ba dang/ mtshams med pa la byed pa gang yin pa thams cad kyang de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi byin gyi rlabs dang/ 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dabang
phyag gis thugs rjes dgongs par 'gyur zhing mi lam du ston par mdzad do// sdig pa dang sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sbyong bar 'gyur/ mchogathams car sbyin par 'gyur/ don yod zhags
pa'i sAng po'i dngos grub sbyin par 'gyur/ lca'i lo stong du 'tsho bar 'gyur zhing lha'abadeb nyams su myong bar 'gyur/ nad kyis thobs pa thams cad lamigasman 'dis bskus na nad thams cad zhi bar
'gyur zhing rims nad thams cad sal bor 'gyur/ dug thams cad la bsdus pa tsam gyis dug med par 'gyur/ 'jigs pa thams cad la mig la bskusan mig thong bar 'gyur/ phyir rgol ba dang/ dgra bo
rar g.yo can dang/ tshor bo dang/ rkun po thams cad kyis mi mthong bar 'gyur/ mchon gdab pa'i 'jigs pa 'byung bar mi 'gyur/ 'thab pa dang/ rtsod pa dang/ khrag khrug la mig la bskus na thams
cad las rgyal zhing lan thebs par 'gyur ro// g.yul ngo thams cad du mig la bskus na g.yul 'gyed pa las rgyal bar 'gyur zhing dpung gi mchog rgyal bar 'gyuraso/ rgyal po'i pho brang du 'gro
ba'i tshomigal bskus na rgyal po btsun mo'i 'khor dang bcas pa dbang du 'gyur ro// mi sa bar grong khyer du song na skyes pa dang/ bud med dang/ khye'u dang/ bu mo grong khyer na gnas so cog thams
da la bskusan rigs bzhi'i 'jig rten gang mig gis mthong ba de thams cad dbang du 'gyur ro// mig g.yon pa la bskusan rigs ngan thamasacad dbang kha dbcu da ts+tshabyams bag/ dmag/ 'dang baakhan ga pas
du 'gyur go/ 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi phyag g.yas pa nas bzung ste/ don yod pa'i grub pa'i rig sngags kyi rgyal bo lan stong rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod byas te/ 'phags
pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug lamachod pa byas na/ las don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po dang/ khro bo 'argyal po dang/ gzungs thams cad so sor lan stong phrag brgya brgyabazlas par 'gyur

ro de bzhin gsheg pa dgra bcom yang dag par rdzogs pa'isangs rgyas bye ba stong phrag drug cu'i drung du dge ba'i rtsa ba baspyod par 'gyur/ thams cad kyi ming bzung ba byas par 'gyur/ de bzhin gshegrwa
pa stongamanyes par byas par 'gyur/ de bzhin gshegs pa stong phrag drug cu rtsa bzhi mngon sum du mthong ba thob par 'gyur/ 'jig rtan 'don thamasar 'khrul pa
'gyu'o/sngon gyi slob bsamanar med pa'i gnas su 'gro ba yongs su dag par 'gyur/ nams kyang ngan song du 'gro bar mi 'gyur/ tshe rabs tshe rabs su skyob dran par 'gyur/ lha thams cad

kyang mchog sbyin par 'gyur zhing/ rtag tu srung ba dang/ skyab pa dang/ sba bar byed par 'gyur ro// phyag g.yon pa mnan te lan stong rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod byas na bzlas patsam gyis mod la lha dang/

'kha klu dang/ gnod sbyin dang/ srin po la sogs pa bkug par 'gyur zhing thams cad dbang du 'gyur tu gnas so// gang gi tshe dgos pa byung ba de'i tshe don yod par grub pa'i rig sngags kyi rgyal po lan/
bdun bzlas pa byas na/ lha dang klu la sogs pa thams cad kyang las thams cad byed cing rtag tu rgyun mi 'chad par phyi bzhin 'brang bar 'gyur ro// lte ba'i gnas su mnan te bzlasan la sogs pa

ba thams cad char gyi rgyun 'babs pa'i 'gyur te/ 'dzam bu'i gling mtha'adagatshim par byed par 'gyur ro// snyan du lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas nagadang gang du song ba der skyes pa 'am/ bud med dam/ rgyal/
tho 'am rgyal mo 'am/ dge sbyong ngam/ bram ze'am/ dge bsnyen nam/ dge bsAnams gang bsams pa dang/ gang bcol ba dang/ gangasas pa'i las de thams cad sgrub par 'gyur ro// dbunas
bzung ste bzlas na tshangs pa'i 'jig rten gyi bar du dbang du byas par 'gyur te/ thams cad la dbang sgyur cing bsgo ba bzhin byed bar 'gyur ro// thog mar bzlas brjod stong rtsa brgyad byos nasabazlas
pa bya'o// zhabs gnyis mnan to stong phrag bcu bzlas pa byas na sa 'og yan chad dbang du byas par 'gyuraMzhing las thamasacad byed bar 'gyur te/ mngaga gzhug thams cad byed par 'gyur ro// pad+ma 'a

stong rtsa brgyad bzlas nas pad+ma'i mtshe'ur bor na pad+mazad mi shes pa 'byung zhing pad+ma dus thams cad par 'gyur ro// ut+pal la lan stong rtsa brgyad bzlas nas ut+pa la'i mtsho'ur bor na/ ut+pal sngon po thad

mi shes pa 'byung bar 'gyur zhinganamasakyang nyams par mi 'gyur te/ dus thams cad du me tog 'byung bar 'gyur ro// de bzhin du sna ma'i me tog dang/ gan d+hab nA ka dang/ yu tha ka dang/ nabam li ka'i
ma tog rnams kyang dus thams cad du me tog 'byung bar 'gyur zhing zad mi shes par 'gyur ro// 'bras bu dang ma tog la lan brgyad rtsa brgyad bzlas te/ skyed mos tshal lam nags tshal gyi nang du gtor
na/ ma tog dang 'bras bu zad mi shes shing dus thams cad par 'gyur ro// dpalachen mo dgug par 'dod pas sa tshil las lha mo dpalachen mo skyil mokrung phyad du 'dug pa/ rgyan thams cad kyis
brgyan pa/ lus btud pa/ lag pa na pad+ma rtogs pa/ brang rgyas pa byas la 'bras bu dang me tog dgram par bya zhing ga pur dang/ gla rtsi dang/ tsan dan dkar bos mchod pa byas la ras kyi sku gzugs kyi
[t ]@#// spyan sngar gzhag par bya zhing/ sngaratsan dan dkar po las byas pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga bzhin byas la/ 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyag gi sa kyis gzugs
la aka ru'i bdug pa dbul bar bya/ dpal lha mo chen mo latsan dan dkar po'i bdug pa dbul bar bya zhing gnyis ka la mchod pa dang bsnyen bkur bya/ gtor ma dkar bo dang dri chab dbul bar bgyi//
mchod yon gyi stod brgyad dbul bar bya ste/ rig sngags 'chang gtsang ma dus gsum du khrus byas shing gos gtsang ma bgos pas mngon du phyogs te skyil mo krung du 'dug nas/ don yod pa'i zhags

ba'i phyag rgyalan bdun byas latsirnyed pa'i dri dang/ 'phreng ba dang/ me tog la don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po lan brgyartsa brgyad bzlas te/ dpal lha mochen mo'i mgo la gdags par bya/ me tog gzhan/

gyisamachod pa bya zhing tsan dan dkar po la lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas pas bdug spos dbul bar bya'o// de nas rig sngags 'chang gis don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po lan stong rtsa brgyad bzlas par bya
zhing/ yungs kar re re bzlas la dpal lha mo chen mo la bstun par bya ste/ stong rtsa brgyad tshang ba dang dpal lha mo chen mo 'bar bar 'gyur zhing/ 'phags pa sman ras gzigs dbang phyag gi nguphral
ba nas 'od zer 'byung nga ra 'gyur ro// dkyil 'khor gyi yo byad gang yin pa thams cad gsar du snang bar 'gyur ro// dpal lha mochen mo bkug par 'gyur zhing/ ji srid 'tsho'i bar du 'da'
bar mi 'gyur ro// lha'i dpal rjes su spyod par 'dod na nyin re zhing 'phags pa sngan ras gzigs dbang phyug dang/ dpal lha mo chen mo la dus gsum du mchod pa bya zhing/ mchod yon gyi snod kyang
gzhag par bya/ dkon mchog gsum machod par bya/ sbyin par bya/ longs spyad par bya/ bsod nams kyang bya zhing dpal lha mo rganamo la dus gsum du mchod par bya'o// yang dpal lha mo chen mo

rang gi gzugs kyis gnas par 'dod pas don yod pa'i rgyal po'i khro bo'i snying po stong rtsa brgyad bzlas par bya zhing tsan dan gyi ril bu stong rtsa brgyad kyis bdug par bya/ yungs kar stong rtsa brgyad kyis bsnyen

par bya ste/ yungs kar stong rtsa brgyad tshang ba dang/ dpal lha mo chen mo rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa/ lha'i nor bu dang/ gser dang/ mu tig gi rgyan gyis brgyan pa'i lus snang la zhal pad+ma kha phye ba lta bu/
spyan ut+pa la sngon po ltar gsal ba/ pad+ma bsnams pa/ pad+ma'i 'od/ gdan pany+tsa/ nor bu dang/ rin po che dang/ gser mang po'i parma'i char 'bebs pa/ rin po che 'bar ba'i bumab stong phrag brgya
thogs pa/ lha'i bu mo dang gnod sbyin gyi bu mo brgya stong mang po thams cad lha'i rgyan gyis brgyan pas lus gasal zhing 'bar la mdzes pa mang pos yongs su bskor ba mdunan 'khod par 'gyur te 1rig
sngags 'chang gis 'jigs par mi bya zhingasams dga' bar byas la/ gsang sngags 'di lan bdun bzlas par bya'o// namo rat+na tra yA ya/ na ma Ar+ya a ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/ bo d+hi satwA ya/
ma hA satwa ya/ ma hA kA ru ni kA ya/ ma A amo g+ha bar dA ya/ tad+ya thA/ oM pad+moNi/ pad+ma ne tra ba ga/ par t+tare/ paN+Nab ti/ pad+ma pI ye/ bad+ma rI/ pad+ma prab+he/ pad+mas na pra

tate/ a ba lo ki ta pra ya pa ra de/ bar pA yi ni/ prasi ta/ pra sA d+ha ya/ ku ru ku ru/ Ar+ya a ba lo ki ta ba ra de/ phur bu ru/ bar M gi ni tsi latsa la/ pad+ma bi b+hA pa ta/ pad+ma pra ye/ bi tsi tra/ bi mAn d+ha re/

b+ha ra b+ha ra/ samAr smra ra sa ya/ Ar+ya a ba lo ki te shwa ma me/ sat+ta a b+hi ta de ba a mo g+ha pA sha ba ra dehUM/ namo sU te swAhA/ lan bdun bzlas pa tsatha gyis lhamo dpal chen mo phyag brkyangs//
rig sngags 'chang gi spyi bor 'jog par 'gyur zhing/ 'di skad ces kyang gsung bar 'gyur ro// rigs kyi khu tshur shog/ thugs las skyes pa/ gsung las skyes pa khyod kyis don yod pa'i zhags pa'i
sIng po khro bo dang bcas pa grub kyis/ don yod pa'i zhags pa pad+ma drimamadapa'i dpal zhes bya ba'i gzus la zhugs shig/ nga'i gnas la khyod rang gi khyim bzhin du las su bya ba thams cad byos
shag/ de nas rig sngags 'chang gis yang rig sngags dang/ gsang sngags dang/ gzungs sngags 'di lan gsum bzlas brjod bya'o// na mo rat+na tra yA ya/ na ma Ar+ya a ba lo ka ti shA rA ya/

bo d+hisatwA ya/ ma hA satwa ya/ mahA kA ru Ni kA ya/ tad+ya thA/ oM b+ha g+ha ba te/ mAtI dza na tri/ bab ra/ a ba lo ki ta ba ra de/ a kyA ri ni phra ba tu/ am ba/ am ba/ bi bu la kIrtikare/ pra b+ha ra b+hu dze/

a mo g+ha pA sha has sAhA/ de'i 'og tu lha mo dpalachen mo'i ru ma gnyis las 'o ma'i rgyun 'byung bar 'gyur te/ 'o ma'i rgyun de khas bzang de 'thungan/ 'thungs pa tsam gyis yod la lha'i me tog pad+ma

dang ku mu da ltar 'jam pa'i lha'i lus su 'gyur/skya cung zad 'khyil cing 'khyil la mig u sgril sngon po lta bu dang/ tshig gsal zhing ma 'am ci'i sgra dbyangs dang ldan ng ra 'gyur/ don yod pa'i rgya

mtsho'i nor bu chen po pad+ma la rnam par lta ba'i dpal dri ma med pa zhes bya ba'i cho ga zhib mo'i rgyal po mngon sum du 'gyur/ cho ga zhib mo mang po 'grub par 'gyur/ mi lo stong phrag bcu thub par 'gyur/
rgyal ba 'od dpag med byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs dang bcas pa thabs cig tu gzhal med khang mchog nachos bgro ba mthong bar 'gyur/ rdzu 'phrul gyis nam mkha' la 'gro bar 'gyur/ nor bu
chen po pad+ma la lta ba zhes bya ba don yod pa'i zhags pa chen po'i 'khor los sgyur bar 'gyur/ rig sngags 'chang thams cad kyi 'khor los sgyur ba'i gtso bo gcig bur 'gyur/ 'phags pa spyan
ras gzigs dbang phyug gi sras su 'gyur/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sras gcig pur 'gyur/ lha dang/ klu dang/ gnod sbyin dang/ dri za dang/ lham yin dang/ nam mkha' lding dang/
mi 'am ci dang/ lto 'phye chen po rnams kyi bu'i gtso bo gcig pur 'gyur/ rgyal po chen po bzhi'i bu gcig pur 'gyur/ thams cad du stobs dang/ pha rol gnon nga dang/ brtson 'grus thogs pa
pa med pa dang ldan par 'gyur/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi phyag rgya dang dkyil 'khor rim par phye ba rig sngags kyi rgyal po gsang ba'i gzungs kyi rgyal po chog/
zhibamo zab pa dag mngon sum du 'gyur/ lha thams cad kyi gnas dang/ klu thams cad kyi gnas dang/ mi 'am ci thams cad kyi gnas dang/ phug dang/ khung gi gnas thams cad sgo 'byed par
'gyur/ gnod sbyin dang srin po'i gnas thams cad sgo 'byed par 'gyur/ thams cad dang nga du 'gyur zhing bgyi ba ci mchis zhes bya ba byed cing 'dug par 'gyur/ 'jig rten thams cad kyi
ston pa bla ma gcig 'jig rten mgon po dang 'dra bar mchod pa'i gnas su 'gyur/ 'jig rten dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i gsang sngags dang dkyil 'khor thams cad grub pa chen por 'gyur
dbal lha mo chen mo 'khor dang bcas pa la sbyin sreg byas n rag sngags 'chang rdo la bu bzhin du byams pas rang nyid bsAn bkur yongs su spyad pas yongs su spyod do// 'dod pa thams cad dang yid/
du 'ong ba thams cad kyi dgos pabyed par 'gyur ro// nor dang/ 'bru dang/ dbyig dang/ gsaradang/ nor bu dang/ mu tig dang/ pho skrun dang/ shang kha sha lo dang/ byu ru dang/ sa le sbram dang/

dngul dang/ lha'i nor bu rin po che'i bar thams cad sbyin bar byed do// yul ka shi ka'i gos bzang pomang po sbyin par byed cing/ lha'i bza' ba dang/ btung ba'i bar dang/ bdud rtsi'i ro'i bar du sbyin pa 'byed

do// gnas thams cad du song na'ang rtag tu rgyunami 'chad par ma bu la byams pa'i tshul gyis rtag tu phyi bzhin 'brang zhing 'gro bar 'gyur ro// rig sngags 'chang gi rang gi khyim yang rgyal po'i pho brang
lcang lo can ji lta ba de bzhin du rig sngags 'chang gi gzhal mang khang mchog tu 'gyur ro// rnam thos kyi bu'i gnas ni 'byor pa ji lta ba bzhin rgyas par 'gyur ro// tshangs pa dang/ khyab 'jug dang/

dbang phyugachen po dus kun tu 'ong bar 'gyur ro// gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po rdo rje 'chang yang rig sngags 'chang gi tshogs thams cad dang/ gnod sbyin chen po gsang ba pa'i 'khor rnams dang rtag turgyun

mi 'chad par srung ba dang/ skyab pa dang/ sba ba byed par 'gyur ro// de bzhin du dpal lha mochen mo 'khor dang bcas pa dang/ rnam thos kyi buganod sbyin bya bas yongs su bskor ba nyin mtshan du srung ba dang//

skyab pa dang/ sba ba byed par 'gyur ro// de nas don yod pa'i rgya mtsho nor bu chen po pad+ma la lta ba'i dpal drim med pa'i zhes bya ba don yod pa'i zhags pa'i sIng po' cho ga zhib mo'i rgyal po bklags pas 'grub

par 'gyur zhing/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gapa'i klung gi bye ya bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong drug cu rtsa bzhi'i rdul phra mo snyad las dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed par 'gyur
ro bsod nams kyi phung po chen po dang ldan par 'gyur ro// rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo'am/ dge slong ngam/ dge slong ma 'am/ dge bsAnanam/ dge bsnyen ma gang la la zhig gis lha'i nor
bu rin po che chen bo dang/ nor bu rin po che chen po sna bdun dang/ lha'i gsar dang gsar gyi ma tog dang/ dngul gyi me tog mang po dang/ lha'i gos dang/ lha'i rgyan dang/ lha'i dri dang//

ma tog dang/ ma tog 'phreng dang/ byug pa rnams re re zhing 'phang du ri'i rgyal po rirab tsam gyi phung bo byas nas/de dag de bzhin gshegs pa gama'i klung gi bye ma snyad bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag drug cu rtsa bzhi'i rdul/
pha mosAd kyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams la/ de bzhinagshegs pa re re la tshul de lta bu s so sorado bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la nyin re zhing lo gcig

ge bar du dbul bar byed/ mchod pa dang bsnyen bkur byed cing/ de bzhin gshegs par re'i spyan sngar drizhim po dang ldan pa'itil mar rgya mtsho chen po tsam gyis bkang ba'i maram bltam bar byed pa'i bsod namA

kyi phung bo dang ldan par 'gyur/ dge ba'i rtsa bachen po yongs su bzung bar 'gyur ro// galaM ta don yod pa'i rgya mtsho'i nor bu chen po pad+ma la rnam par lta ba'i dpal dri ma med pa don yod pa'i zhagasala'isang

bo 'di klog pa dang/ bzlas brjod brgya rtsa brgyad byed pa 'di nibasod nams kyi phung po de dang ldan par 'gyur zhing dge ba'i rtsa ba chen po dang ldan par 'gyur/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis byin gyis
babs par 'gyur/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis yongs su bzung bar 'gyur/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad sku ston bar 'gyur/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis lung ston par 'gyur/

daral lha mo chen mo re'anga mchog thams cad sbyin par 'gyur/ dus kun tu de'i khyim du dpal gnas par 'gyur te/ gang na dpal lha mo chen mo gnas pa der de bzhin gshegs pa gang+ga'i klung gakhyi ma byo ba khrag/

khrig brgya stong phrag du rtsabazhi'i rdul phra mo dang mnyam pas phyogs de nyid du gnas par 'gyur te/ dpal lha mo chen mo ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi yum yin pa'i phyir ro// lha dang/ klu dang//
tshangs pa dang/ khyab 'jug dang/ dbang phyug chen po'i gsang sngags dang/ cho ga zhib mo dang/ phyag rgya dang/ dkyil 'khor dang/ zhi bdang/ rgyas pa dang/ drag shul la spyod pa dang/ las sna tshogs
gzhan dag pas dpal lha mo chen mo'i lasaM mchog tu bstan to// dpal lha mo chen mo ni byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi yum yin no// dpal lha mo chen mo ni don yod pa'i mchogasbyin pa'o//
donayod pa'i zhags pa sbyin pa'o// don yod pa'i grags pa rgya chen po sbyin pa'o// don yod pa'i nam mkha'i gzhal mad khang 'char ba'o// don yod pa'i yon tan bsgrags pa'i mchog sbyin pa'o// dpal

lha mo chen mo ni don yod pa zla ba dang nyi ma'i 'od byed pa gnas sum cu rtsa gnyis kyi nang na dpal lha mo chen mo mchog tu bstan to// de nas rig sngags 'chang gtsang ma khrus legs par byos lo/ drinus
bsangs shing ba las byung ba las byugs pa/ gos gtsang ma bgos pas kha zas gtsang ma bza' bar bya zhing/ chang dang/ sha dang/ beg btsong dang/ sgog skya dang/ ke'u rnams dang 'dres pa dang/ 'bags
thubya// pa rnams yongs su sang bar bya/ kha zas ngan pa dang/ btung ba ngan pa dang/ gos ngan pa dang/ drim can yongs su spang bar bya/ sems can nganapa snyan pa dang/ nganagayo can/

dang/ gsod skyon can dang/ skya bo ngan pa dang/ khrel med pa dang/ snying rje med pa dang/ byams pa dang bral ba dang/ thub chod can gyi skye bo ngan pa yongs su spang bar bya/ gnas ngan pa dang/ gnas rten/
ngan pa dang/ 'gom nyes dang/ bza' sa dang/ gribam ngan ba yongs su sang bar bya/ gcig gis gcig 'phags pa'i kha zas ngan pa yongs su spang bar bya zhing dri dang bdug spos kyis bsangs te//
mis bar bzlas brjod bya/ byams pa dang/ sIng rje dang/ dga' ba'i sems dang/ yid bde bar bya/ bkra shisatshang bar bya zhing/ snying dga' ba dang/ mgu ba dang/ rab tu dga' ba'i sams su byas
nas bzlas brjod bya'o// 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug laa ka ru 'i bdug pa dbul bar bya/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la du ru ka'i bdug pa dbul bar bya/ dpal lcamo chen mo/
latsan dan gyi bdug spos dbul bar bya zhing mchod yon snod kyang dbul bar bya'o// dus ji lta ba'am tog dbul bar bya ste/ gsang sngags 'di lan nyi shurtsa gnyis bzlas te thams cad la dbulabar

a/ bya'o// mo ratA tra yA ya/ na ma Ar+ya a ba lo ki te shwa ra ya/ bo d+hi satwA ya/ ma hAsatwA yaM/ ma hA kA ru Ni kA ya/ tad+ya thA/ o pul+labi lo ki te/ gan d+ha sa re/ a mo g+ha dza la saM b+ha ra chi/ pad+ma
0 sam gyur ta ra ta ramu di te hUM swAhA/ lamanyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas te ma tog dang/ bdug spos dang/ dri dang/ mchod yon dbul lo// 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi zhabs drung du//
stong rtsa brgyad bzlas/ don yod pa'i zhags pa'i sang bo lan bdun bzlas/ khro bo'i rgyal bo lan gsum bzlas la a karu'i bdug spos dbul bar bya zhing/ cired pa'i matog dbul bar bya/
sros dang ldan pa'i til mar gyimaram bltam par bya zhing/ de nyid kyi zhabs drung du skyel mo krung du 'dug la/ 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la bltas la snying po'i gzungs lan brgya rtsa
brgyad bzlas la bzlas brjod kyi phyag rgya byas te/ don yod pa'i zhags pa'i phyag rgya lan bdun bcing ba byas na bcings pa tsam gyis mod la sku gzugs g.yo bar 'gyur zhing/ sku thams cad 'bar
bar 'gyur/ rang gi lus spu zing zhes byed par 'gyur/ tho rangs 'phag pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug sku ston par 'gyur te/ yid la bsams pa thams cad thaka' stsol bar 'gyur/ mchog
thams cad smin par 'gyur/ 'dod pa'i mchog thams cad sbyin par 'gyur/ dbugs kyang 'byin par 'gyur/ yid du 'ong ba thams cad yongs su rdzogs par byed/ tshe 'di nyid la nad thams cad dang
bral bar 'gyur/ dge ba'i rtsa ba'i bsod nams kyi tshogs thams cad dang ldan par 'gyur/ sgrib pa dang sdig pa thams cad zad cing mthar thug par 'gyur/ nyon mongs pa thamasacad las yongs/
su grol bar 'gyur phas kyi rgol ba dang dgra bo thams cad 'jigs par 'gyur zhing mi tshugs par 'gyur/ g.yul dor 'jug pa'i tshe rig sngags kyi rgyal po 'di yur
kar la lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas nas dmag ginang du gtor bar byas na/ thams cad rengs par byas pa dang rmugs par byas par 'gyur ro// 'di'i sAng po dang gsang sngags ni 'di yin no// namo/

ratA tAyA ya/ na ma Ar+ya a ba lo ki te shwa rAya/ bo d+hi satwA ya/ ma thA satwA ya/ mahA kA ru Ni kA ya/ tacu b+haM/ o amo g+ha pA sha hri da ya/ partsen bar de/ dz+wa la dza la/ pra sa ri ta pad+ma b+hu dze swAhA/
sIr po'i rig sngags so// oM a ba lo ki te/ pad+hi// ba ro gi ni tu ru tu ru hU~MswAhA/ nye ba'i snying po'i gzus so// don yod pa'i rgyu mtsho'i nor bu pad+ma rnam par lteba'i dpaladri ma med pa/
don yod pa'i zhags pa'i sdong po'i tshog zhib mo'i gzungs 'di rtag tu bzlas brjod byas na mtshams mad pa lnga zad par 'gyur/ lha mo dpal chen mo rtag tu rgyun mi 'chad par mchog sbyin par
'gyur/ 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug dus kun tu sku ston par bzhed par 'gyur/ de'i lus la dug thams cad kyis ma tshugs par 'gyur ro// 'jigs pa chen ngo mi bzad pa
brgyad las yongs su grol bar 'gyur/ rims nor thams cad rang nad thams cad kyis mi tshugs par 'gyur ro// gdon thamAd la tshon sna snga'i srad bu la lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas te
0 mdud pa rti ku rtsa gcig bor la gu gul gyis bdugs te mgul tu btags na gdon thams cad las yongs su grol bar 'gyur ro// gal te nag po chen po dang ma mo 'ongs torgyas btab pa/
gang yin pa'i ng gdon thams cad las yongs su thar par 'gyur ro// skud pa nag pos rims nyin gcig pa las yongs su grol bar 'gyur ro// gzhan dag la ni thams cad du srad bu dkar
pos bsal bar bya'o// 'thab pa dang/ rtsod pa dang/ khrag khrug thams cad la gi'u wang la lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas ta thig le byas n thams cad du thogs pa mad par 'gyur ro// snying khar thig
le byas na gnod sbyin dang/ srin po dang/ 'byung po dang/ sha zo la sogs pa thams cad kyis mi mthong par 'gyur ro// lagamathil la thig le byas n skyes pa dang/ bud med dang/ khye'u dang/
bu mo gangalarag pa dbang du 'gyur ro// sminamaMtshams su thig le byas na rgyal bo btsunamo' 'khor dang bcas ba dbang du 'gyur ro// mgul par byugasanarje'u rigs thams cad dbang du 'gyur ro//
dpung pa gnyis la byugs na rgyal rigs thams cad dbang du 'gyur ro// dpral ba'i sla mtshams su thig le byas n bram zo thams cad dbang du 'gyur ro// lto ba'i gnas su thig le byas na dmas rigA

thams cad dbang du 'gyur ro// rkang pa'i rje ngar la byugs na dpag tshad brgyar pal ba med par 'gro zhing slar yang 'ong bar 'gyur ro// rkang mthil nabaskus na chu klung chen po'i pha rol tu phyin par 'gyur zhing
smyamatsho'i bar du brgyal bar 'gyur ro// dpung pa gnyis la byugan gyad kyisami thub par 'gyur ro// busamoganyis la byugs na ma'i phung po chen tho 'bar zhing rab tu'abar
bar zhugs n tsan dan dang pubashel tsa ji bzhin du bsil bar 'gyur ro// bser skya'i 'o mo dang sbyar te mig la bsus na mtshan mo'ang nyin mo bzhin du snang ba' 'gyur ro// gter thams cad 'bar bar

a 'gyur zhing gal te de bskal pa brgya stong du bzhag pa zhig na'ang 'byung bar 'gyur ro// de bzhin du lto ba la bskus na ji srid du lto chus ma bkrus pa de srid du kha zas dang btung ba mi 'dod par 'gyur ro// pho
mtshan la bskus na khu ba 'gags pa byas par 'gyur ro// ba las byung blta dang bsras te 'thungs na lus dag cing dri ma mdal gtsang zhing spyod pa gtsang ba dang ldan par 'gyur ro// sgomanyis pa dang/
bza' nyos ba dor/ grib ma ngan pa dang/ blta nyesasu mi 'gyur/ 'jigs pa thams cad las yongs su grol bar 'gyur/ sdig pa dang sgrib pa thams cad las yongs su grol bar 'gyur/ rmi lam ngan
pa dang/ ltas ngan pa dang/ bkra mi shis pa'i dngos po thams cad 'jigs par 'gyur/ dug dang/ dbyig dug dang/ byed thams cad 'jig par 'gyur/ gsang sngags dang/ sbyor ba dang/ gtor
ba rnams 'jigs par 'gyur/ 'thab pa dang/ rtsod pa dang/ khrag khrug rnams kyi lan thebs par 'gyur zhing thams cad du rgyal bar 'gyur/ phas kyi rgol ba dang/ mi mdza' ba dang/ pha rol gyi dpung gi

[p]'jigs pa thams cad 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro// zhun mar dang sbrang rtsi dang lhan cig sbyar te tho rangs kyi dus su mi sbyabar byas nas thos na bklags pas tshigs su bcad bstopa'i dzan par 'gyur ro// sbyor ba

zhag bdun du byas n bstan bcos thams cad mngon sum du 'gyur ro// zhag nyi shu rtsa gcig tu sbyor ba byas gsang sngags kyi chogazhib mo dang/ dkyil 'khor dang/ gsang sngags dang/ phyag rgya rim par phye
ba thams cad 'grub bar 'gyur ro// zla ba gcig tu sbyor ba byas Mn thos pa mang po rgya mtsho bsagos par 'gyur ro// sbyorab lo gcig bar du byas n tshe lo stong thub par 'gyur ro// 'jig rten thams cad

na bla ma gcig pur 'gyurazhing dga' ba dang tshigabatsunapar yang 'gyur ro// til mar dang lhan cig bskol te mgo la bskusanas cung zad 'khyilacing lcangalo can du 'gyur ro// bzhin gyi dkyil 'khor la bskus
naston ka'i zla ba nya dang mtshus par 'gyur zhing/ me tog pad+ma dang/ ku mu da ltar 'jam par 'gyur/ lus thams cad la byugasan mar dang 'dra bar 'jam por 'gyur zhing/ rkang lag shin tu gzhon she
can du 'gyur/ rnab la byugasan rna ba jitsam 'dod pa skyabar 'gyur/ snanas btang na klad pa'i nad do cog 'jig par 'gyur zhing stabs dang mchilam 'byung bar mi 'gyur/ lha'i spos kyi drimanam par 'gyur
zhing / nams kyang yid du mi 'ong ba'i dri mnam par mi 'gyur/ gnyer ma dang sku dkar spangs par 'gyur/ so brgal ba'ang gsar du skye bar 'gyur/ lce pad+ma'i lo ma ltar 'jam par 'gyur/ ming pa'i mdo
dang skye 'gags pa thams cad las yongs su grol bar 'gyur/ 'jam tsam du byas te rna ba bkang na sim par byed cing lha'i rna ba dang ldan par 'gyur/ sgra yid du 'ong ba dang/ bkra
shis pa'i sgra thos par 'gyur ro// de lta bas na gi'u wang gi chog chen po bsgrub bar bya'o// de nas legs par grub pa/ mchog tu dge ba/ thams cad du thogs pa mad pa grub par/

'gro ba/ dge bar 'gro pa mig rkang zhes bya ba bshad par bya ste/ don yodapa'i zhags pa'i snying po 'di lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas te/ khro bo'i rgyal po lan bdunabazlas nas/ don yod pa'i rgya mtsho'i
nor bu pad+ma la rnam par lta ba'i dpal dri ma med pa don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po 'di lan stong rtsa brgyud bzlas te/ gtsang mas gos gtsang ma bgos shing khrus legs par byas pas kha zas dkar
bo zos la/ mig rkang gi ril bu khar bcug nas mdor bstan pa bzung bar bya ste/ jisnyad bshad pa dang bklags pa 'dzin par 'gyur/ lce pad+madang ku mu da'i lo ma ltar 'jam par 'gyur/ mi 'am ci'i sgra
