ba bgos// gtsang mas dkyil 'khor bri bar bya// dkyil 'khor rnam pa snatshogs kyis// kun tu brgyan par bya ba ni// ba dan rnam pasna tshogs dang// rnam pa sna tshogs mda'o dang ni//
lha rdzas dar ni sbyang ba dang// ba dan yang ni sbyang bar bya// tshon skud snulta'israd bu yis// kun tu yongs su bskor bar bya// zangs las byas pa'i pad+ma'i tshad// sor bzhi 'dab ma kha bye ba//
mdzes pa grwa bzhir gzugs par bya// snying po'i dkyil 'khor grwa rnams su// pad+ma brgyad nigazhag pa dag/ gsar las byas pa bzhi gzhag cing// de bzhin dngul las byas pa bzhi// kun tu byu
ru'i 'brang ba dang// mu tig 'phreng ba de bzhin no// kun tu gsar gyi srad bu dang// rin chen sna tshogs bzhag par bya// snying po'i dkyil 'khor thig bar du// gsar gyi snod ni bzhi dag dang// dngul
gyi gnod ni bzhi gzhag go/ dngul gyi bum pa gong ba bzhi la dngul dang/ gsar dang/ zas lasabyas pa'i ma tog gis spras pa'i mgo lcogs kyis sbas pa gzhag par bya'o// gsar gyi bum pa gang
ba bzhi bzhag pa la mu tig dang/ byu ru dang/ pad+ma rAg dang/ mar gad dang/ in+danil dang/ dngul dang/ gsar dang/ me tog gis spras pa'i mgo lcogs gzhag par bya'o// gla rtsi dang/ ga pur dang/

gur kum dang/ lha rdzas kyi tsan dan gyi phyems gsar gyi snod bkang ba dang/ dngul gyi snod kyi nang du gsar gyi me tog dang/ dngul gyi me tog dang/ zas kyi me togamu tig gis brgyan cing rin po che sna
tshogs pas spras pa gzhag par bya// cod pan gyi rgyan mtshan bazhi gnas par bya/ rin po che'i rgyal mtshan bazhi gzhag par bya/ tshon sna tshogs can dang dar dmar po sbyang bar bya/ dngul gyi pog por
[z ]@#// bzhi bzhag sta/ tsan dan dang/ gla rtsi dang/ ga bur dang/ gur kum gyi bdug pas bdug par bya/ sa las byas pa'i bum pa gser gyis g.yogs pa'i nang du dri chab rnam pa sna
tshogs kyis bkang ste/ rin po che sna bdun dang ldan par bgyis la/ bkang ba la dar gtsangams bcings la rgyan rnam pa sna tshogs kyis brgyan pa'i stong du thongs las byas pa'im tog bzha gnas //

snying bo'i dkyil 'khor gyi stang du pad+ma'i snying du gzhag par bya'o// de nas phyi rol gyi dkyil 'khor thog thag tu dri dang/ phyam dang/ byug pa dang/ ma tigadang/ 'bras bu la sogs pa rnam ba sna tshogs

dang/ mchod yon gyi chab kyis dngul gyi snod dang zangs kyi snodabakang ba drug cu rtsa bzhi gzhag par bya'o// lcags kyi snod bum pa gang ba drug cu rtsa bzhi gzhag par bya'o// ma tog dang/ mgo lcogs dang/
bog por bkang ba drug cu rtsa bzhigazhag par bya'o// bdug bsna tshogs kyis bdug par bya'o// sgo bzhir zangs dang lcag kyi drichab kyi bum pa dar gyis brgyan cing sdud pa gzhag par bya'o// sna ma'i ma

tog gis gdu bu'i stong du mjal ba dan btags ba druganu rtsa bzhi btsugs te/ tshon snatshog sakyis bkra bar byas pa'i mda' dang nor bu'i 'phreng ba rnam pa sna tshogs kyis dkyil 'khor brgyan par bya'o//

denas phyi rol gyi dkyil 'khor thog thagatus dang bsres pa'i ba'i lci bas dkyil 'khor byas la/ dri chab kyis bskus te tshon sna lnga'i srad bus thig btabal sgo bzhi rnam par phye ste/ sang ldeng gi phur

bu tshad sor bcu gnyis pa drugacu rtsa bzhi gdab bo// tshon sna lnga'i srad bus dkyil 'khor kun tu bskor bar bya'o// bum bu dang/ bum pa dang/ bya ma bum drug cu rtsa bzhi gtor ma sna tshogs kyis bkang ba

gzhag go/ kham phor zlum po drug cu rtsa bzhi gtor ma sna tshogs kyis bkang ba gzhag go/ gtor ma tshul sna tshogs pa drug cu rtsa bzhi so sor gzhag go/ snod tshon sna lnga pa drug cu rtsa ba'i kha zas rnam pasna
tshogs kyis bkang ba dang/ bca'ab rnam pa sna tshogs blugs pa dang/ gtor ma dkar po rnam pa sna tshogs gzhag/ yo byad thams cad kyis yong su gang b.ro rnam pa sna tshogs kyi gtor m gzhag go/

'bras bu sna tshogs dang me tog sna tshogs dgram mo// 'phreng ba bamya'i shu rtsa gcig dkyil 'khor du sbyang bar bya ste/ byang phyogs kyi dkyil 'khor la drug cu rtsa bzhi/ snying bo'i dkyil 'khor la sum cu

rtsa gnyis gdags so// ma mar gyi sdong bu bzhi bud par bya'o// gtor mthargya drugachu rtsa bzhi dngar spyil 'khor thog thag tu mang ma bud par bya'o// chang dang/ ga dang/ bag tsong dang/ slog skya dang/ ke'u dang/
tshor sngon dang/ la phug sbas pa'i gtor mgazhan rnam pasna tshogs gzhag par bya'o// dkyil 'khor gyi phyi'i gru bzhir don yod pa'i zhags pa'i mdo snga bkag par bya ste/ sgo re rer bcom ldan 'das

ma shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bklag par bya'o// chos klog pa legs par khrus byas te/ lha rdzas kyi gos kyisar kris ha gtsangam la dri rnam pa sna tshog sakyis bsgos pa'i chos gtsang ma gsar pa bgos
te chos kyi stag shin tu brgyan pa lhardzasakyi stan la'adug nas tshig 'jam po 'jam po tshag mnyen pos bklag par bya'o// nub kyi phyogs ma la dkyil 'khor mgron po la
bde ba can ni bkod pa bris pa/'od dpag med dang/ 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang phyug dang/ mthu chen thob pa'i gzugs bris pa'i ras kyi sku gzugs dkyil 'khor la mngon du phyogs bar
bar gzhag par bya'o// shar gyi phyogs cha la dkyil 'khor gru bzhi mthon po byas la/ rnam par grol ba'i dkyil 'khor la nAkya thub pa dang/ 'phags pa rdo rje 'chang ba dang/ don yod pa'i zhags
ba'i khro bo'i gzugs bris pa ras kyi sku gzugs dkyil 'khor la mngon du phyogs par gzhag go/ lho'i phyogs cha lari 'dra ba'i gnas mthon po byas la/ de bzhin gshegs pa 'jig rten dbang phyug
rgyal bo dang/ 'jam dpal dang/ sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sal ba dang/ don yod pa'i zhags pa ras la bris pa'i dkyil 'khor la mngon du phyogs par gzhag go/ byang phyogs la khro bo'i
rgyal bo dang/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par snang mdzad dang/ byams pa dang/ sa'i snying bo bris pa'i ras kyi sku gzugs dkyil 'khor la mngon du phyogs par gzhag go/ stegs bu'i rnam pa mthon
por byas ba thams cad legs par brgyan par bya'o// dar gyi 'phrang bas brgyan par bya'o// rgyun thams cad kyis brgyan pa dang/ bum pa gang ba gzhag pa dang/ dris dkyil 'khor bya ba dang/ ro'i
00 mchog rnam pa sna tshogs bza' ba'i ngo bo rnam pa du ma'i kha zas kyi 'o dbul ba dang/ 'bras bu rnam pa sna tshogs dang ldan pa'i bsod snyoms gzhag pa dang/ tsan dan dang/ a ka ru dang/ du ru ka
dang/ ga bur dang/ glartsi dang/ gur kum dang bsres pa'i bdug pa ras kyi sku gzugs la dbul bar bya'o// de nas rogi sngags 'chang bas dus gsum du khrus bya zhing gos lan gsum brjes

te/ dus gsum du bzlas brjod dang sbyin sreg gi chog bya'o// tshes brgyad nas brtsams te tshes bco lnga tshang gi bar du don yod pa'i zhags pa lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas brjod bya'o// khro bo'i rgyal po/
lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas brjod bya'o// don yodapa'i zhags ba'i lcags kyu'i shu rtsa gcig dang/ don yod pa'i rnam par lta ba'i zhags pa'i snying po dang/ 'jig rten las 'das pa rnam par
'phrul pa lan nyi shu rtsa gcig dang/ rnam par grol ba'i dkyil 'khor byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyis phyag byas pa stong rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod bya ba dang/ rnam par grol ba'i dkyil 'khor
gyi zhogs pa'i snying po stong rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod bya'o// zla ba nyar thug gi bar du zas dkar gsum bza' bar bya'o// tshes bco lnga'i nyin mtshan thog thag tu don yod pa'i zhags pa'i sing po dpag
tumad par bazlas brjod bya'o// mtshan thog thag bzlas brjod byas kyang ngal ba mad pa dang/ lus snyoms pa dang bral bas bzlas brjod bya'o// byams pa dang snying rje'i lhag pa'i bsam pa'isamA
bya'o// bzlas brjod kyi cho ga zin nas dkyil 'khor gyi bya ba mtsham bcad pa dang/ phyogs bcang ba dang/ bdag bsrung ba dang/ gzhan bsrung ba dang/ dkyil 'khor
bsdum pa byas nas/ de nas 'khor rnams dkyil 'khor du dam tshig la gzhug par bya'o// dkyil 'khor du gzhug pa dang/ dkyil 'khor gyi las zin nas mchod pa brtsam mo// mchod pa'i cho//
ga zin pa dang/ de nas bzlas brjod brtsam par bya// don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po'i dkyil 'khor gyi spyan sngar 'dug nas/ don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po'i bzlas brjod byas la//
khro bo'i rgyal po brgya rtsa brgyad kyis dbang bskur ro// bzlas brjod lamanyi shu rtsa gcig dang/ dbang bskur ma thag tu ras kyi sku gzugs dang/ dkyil 'khor thams cad kun tu 'bar zhing 'od zer sna
[j]tshogs 'byin cing legs so zhes bya ba'i sgra 'byin par 'gyur ro// rig sngags 'chang ba'i snyinga dga' zhing lus 'bar bar 'gyur ro// 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug rang gi gzugs
shin tu 'bar zhing 'od 'phro ba/ nyi ma'i stong phrag brgya bas lhag pa'i 'od zer can/ don yod pa'i zhags pa tshangs pa'i cha byad 'chang ba dkyil 'khor gyi dbus kyi nang nasaman sum du gshegs
te phyogs bcu'i dkyil 'khor kun la rnam par gzigs shing rig sngags 'chang b.legs so zhes bya ba'i sgra phyung ste/ phyag g.yas pa brkyang ste rig sngags 'chang ba'i spyi bo la bzhag ste/
dkyil 'khor gyi mchog shin tu brgyan cing sa sa pa 'di ni shin tu bzang ba yin te legs so legs so// 'di ni rnam par grol ba'i dkyil 'khor don yod pa'i zhags pa rnam par 'phrul pa/
de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis byin gyis brlabs pa/ byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyis phyag byas pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa dang byang chub sems dang 'a thams cad kyi
gsang ba/ lha dang/ klu dang/ gnod sbyin dang/ dri za dang/ lha ma yin dang/ nam mkha' lding dang/ mi 'am ci dang/ lto 'phye chen po dang/ srin po rnams kyi dam tshig gi dkyil 'khor/
bdud thams cad pham par byed pa'i dkyil 'khor/ bgegs dang rnam par leg 'dren thams cad 'joms pa/ bud med dang/ skyes pa dang/ khye'u dang/ bu mo dang/ dge sbyong dang/ bram ze dang/
rje'u'i rigs dang/ dmangs rigs dang/ tha na byol song gi skye gnas su gtogs pa'i bya'ang rung ste/ sems can thams cad 'khor ba'i gcong rong las sgrol ba yin no// 'di ni sdig pa dang/
sgrib pa thams cad dang/ dmyal ba dang/ sdug bsngal dang/ nad dang/ skya ba dang/ rgyab dang/ 'tshab las yongs su thar par byed cing 'jigs ba med pa'i khyim du 'jug par byang pa yin no//
'dini rnam par thar bar byed pa dkyil 'khor chen po'i snying po dang gsang sngags su bcas pa rnam par grol ba'i dkyil 'khor/ byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyis phyag byas pa 'di rig sngagra
'chang ba de dang des mang brjod pa dang/ gang dran pa tsam la sogs pa dang/ lta ba dang/ nyan pa dang/ ming 'dzan pa'i ng 'khor ba'i pha rol tu rgal bar 'gyur ro// phyir mi ldog pa

nyid dus bcu bgrod nas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog pa 'thob par 'gyur ro// de gang zhe na/ gang zhig dkyil 'khor chen po 'di 'dra ba mngon du mthong ba dang/ rnam par
grol ba'i gzugs 'jig rten las 'das pa'i gsang sngags kyi tshig bzlos brjod byed pa dang/ klog pa dang/ dran pa dang/ 'chad pa dang/ lan 'ga'i sbyang bas mthong ba dang/ thang cig dang/ skad yig
dang/ yud tsam gyis mthong ba ni nga dang mnyam pa dang/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa yin no zhes smra'o// bdag ni sems can de la de bzhin gshegs pa yin par yang 'dzin te/ 'jig rten dang 'jig rten las
'das pa yin pas spyi bos dbang bskur bar bgyi'o// rig sngags chang bas zung zhig dang mchog ji ltar 'dod pa dang/ ji ltar yid la re ba dang/ bsam pa de thams cad rjesasu gzung zhing sbyin par
mdzad do// de'i rig sngags 'chang bas yid laji ltar ba sams pa'i mchog san/ de thams cad sbyin par mdzad cing don yod pa'i ye shes bkod pa rnam par grol ba drim mad pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin/

thob par 'gyur ro// gzhan yang apa'i klung gi bye ma byob dang mnyam pa khrag khrig stong phrag bcu'i ting nge 'dzin thob par 'gyur ro// rdzu 'phrul gyis nam mkha' la 'gro bar 'gyur ro// dkyil 'khor de'i

sa ngamatshig tu zhugs pa ni dam tshig shes pa'i rjesasu zhugs pa yin te/ de dag thams cad sa bcu la rab tu gnas pa yin no// 'di lta ste/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi
ldog pa thob par 'gyur ba yin/ lung bstan pa dang byen gyis brlabs par 'gyur ba yin/ de nim khag nas pa sa pa'i tha ma ste/ phyis mngal na gnas pa'i dri mas gos par mi 'gyur ro// shin s bde/

ba can gyi 'jig rten gyi khams suskye bar 'gyur ro// de patsho'i nang nas rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan par rdzus te skye bar 'gyur ro// tshe rabs kun tu tsho rabs dran par 'gyur ro// don yod pa'i rgyal po'i yun

sum tshogs pa cho ga zhib mo'i rgyal po rnam par grol ba'i dkyil 'khor/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis byang chub kyi snying po tshes kyi 'khor lo bskor ba/ dam tshig chen po 'di kha ton byed na phyogs
bcu'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad sangs rgyas kyi zhing na byang chub kyi snying po la bzhugs pa mthong bar 'gyur ro// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi snyan star legs so zhes bya ba thob par 'gyur
te/ rigs kyi bu skye ba blangs pa legs nga la skyo ba yin pas logs so legs so// phyir mi ldog par bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la rab tu gnas pa yin no// de bzhin gshegs pa de
dag thams cad dang/ phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams 'od zer 'bum phragabya bas mdzes par gyur cing/ bsod nams kyis brgyan pa'i phyag gser gyi mdog can brkyang nas spyi bor phyag
'jog cing dbugs 'byin par yang mdzad do// byang chub kyi snying po la thug gi bar du chos 'brel ba'i gtama mngon sum du sgrogs par mdzad do// than dkyil 'khor chen por rol

mo'isgra rnga bo che dang/ rnga phran dang/ rdung dang/ rdza rnga dang/ rol mo'i sgra gang dag grags pa la/ sems can gang dag gis sgra dethos nas rna ba'i bu ga tsam du song ba de thams cad phyir mi ldog par 'gyur zhing/ blun

med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la rab tu gnas par 'gyur ro// than byol song gi skye gnas su gtogs pa bya'i rna bar sgra thos pa de dag thams cad kyang phyir mi ldog par 'gyur ro// de lta na

rnam par 'phrul pa'i cho 'phrul chen po dang ldan pa rnam par thar pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga mthu chon po rnam par 'phrul pa yin no// rigs kyi bu pho 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo 'am/ dag slong ngam/ dge slong
ma 'am/ dge bsnyenanam/ dag bsnyan ma 'am/ sems can gzhan gang yang rung ba dge sbyong ngam/ bram ze 'am/ rgyal rigs sam/ rje'u'i rigs sam dmangs rigs sam/ 'ga' zhig gi rnam par grol

sku/ ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga 'di 'khoramang po'i nang du klog pa dang/ sems can gang gis sa de thosanas sgra dbyangs de dang ming thos parna ba'i bu gar song bar gyur pa de dag thams cad sgrib pa dang sdig pa mi
bzad pa las bral bar 'gyur ro// sngon gyi sgrib pa dang sdig pa las rnam par grol bar 'gyur ro// phyir mi ldog par 'gyur ro// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sras su rig par bya'o// 'phags pa
00 spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi sras kyi thu bo yin no// rtag par 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs gyi dbang phyug grogs mdzad cing rjes su 'brang bar 'gyur ro// rtag tu dbugs 'byin par mdzad par
'gyur ro// mthar byang chub kyi snying po la gnas kyi bar du rtag tu rjes su srung bar mdzad// sems can gang zhig dkyil 'khor de'i sa phyogs su song ste/ sa gzhi snang ba tsam mthong ba de dag thamA
cad kyang phyir mi ldog bar 'gyur ro// nyon mongs pa thams cad bsregs shing sgrib pa thams cad las yongs su grol bar 'gyur ro// de'i sa rdul rlung gis bdas te lus la phog pa gang yin pa de dang/
tha nasems can ngan pa'i ng rung ste/ de dag thams cad phyir mi ldog par 'gyur ba'i gnas la rab tu gnas par 'gyur ro// sdig pa thams cad las yongs su grol ba dang/ 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs
dbang phyug rtag tu mthong pa dang ldan par 'gyur ro// de bzhin gshegs pa thamasacad kyis dgongs par 'gyur ro// byang chub sems dpa ra thamasacad kyis dbugs phyung ba 'gyur ro// lha thams
cad kyis bsrungs bar 'gyur ro// bsod nams kyi phung po chen po yongs su bzung bar 'gyur ro// dge ba'i rtsa bachen po dang ldan par 'gyur ro// de ltar na sgra thos pa tsam dang/ ming 'dzin pa tsam
gyis 'bras bu chen po thob par 'gyur ro// de nas rnam par grol ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi sbyin sreg gi cho ga bshad par bya ste/ sdigapa dang sgrib pa thams cad sreg cing sdug bsngal drag po las rnam par
grol bar 'gyur ba dang/ nyon mongs pa drag po'i rgya mtsho dang 'khor ba las sgrol ba 'grub pa/ phyir mi ldog pa'i gnas blanamed pa dbugs 'byin par mdzad pa/
sangs rgyas thams cad dang byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi 'jig rten las 'das pa'i lam blace da pa ston pa/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' ston pa/ lha'i snyags sbyin sreg byas

blo ba tsam gyis mod la the tsomamad par ma lha dang/ dbang po dang/ khyab 'jug dang/ dbang phyug chen po dang/ dbang phyug dang/ dbang phyug chen po dang/ gshin rje dang/ chu lha dang/ lus ngan po dang/
gzhon nu rnams sbyin sreg byas pa 'ditsam gyis mod la thams cad 'ong bar 'gyur ro// thatsom mad par lha dang/ klu dang/ gnod sbyin dang/ dri za dang/ lha ma yin dang/ nam mkha' lding dang/ mi
zlo'am ci dang/ lto 'phye chen po dang/ srin po dang/ sha za dang/ grul bum thams cad 'ong bar 'gyur zhing/ de'i mod la rig sngags 'chang ba'i rkang pa gnyis la rtag tu 'dud par byed do// de bzhin du

nyin mtshan du kun tu srung bar 'gyur ro// rgyal po chen po bzhi dang/ phyag na rdo rje bdag nyid chen po dang/ gnod sbyin gyi dbang po chen po bcu'ang phyogs bcur srung bar byed de/ mi bsrun pa ma lus pa
sal cing dmyal ba dang/ 'jigs pa mi bzad pa dang/ dug drag po dang/ sems can ma rungs pa rnams sel bar byed do// re mag tu bsod nams chen po'i lhun po dang/ bsod nams chen po'i

phung po bla na med skye bar 'gyur ro// tsan danasranganyi shu dang a karu supalnga dang/ du ru ka srang bdun dang/ ga bur dang gru rtsi srang gcig gi bzhi cha re re dang/ gur kumasrang gcig dang/ lce pog kun tu

rasrang lnga dang/ gu gul srang bdun dang/ 'di rnams gcig tu bsres te phyamar byas la/ khar dkar po dang sbrang rtsi ril bu zhore'i tshad tsam du byas pa stong rtsa brgyad dang/ yungs kar dang 'bras yos

bsres te ril bu dang bsrasanas mar gyi nang du bskungs te sbyin sreg bya'o// shing su ra b+hi dang/ share an dang/ shing sha mya'i yamangashing gis ma sbyar te sbyin sreg gi cho ga bya'o// gang dang gang gi cha

stong rtsa brgyang sbyin sreg byas na de dang de'i tshe sdig pa dang sgrib pa drag po thams cad sreg par 'gyur ro// de dang de'i tshe de nad thams cad las yongs su grol bar 'gyur ro// de dang de'i tshe gcong
thams cad las yongs su grol bar 'gyur ro// de dang de'i tsho'adzam bu'i gling gsems can bud med dang/ skyes pa dang/ khye'u dang/ bu mo dang dge sbyong dang/ bram ze dang/ rgyal rigs
dang rje'u'i rigs dang/ dmangs rigs la sogs pa thams cad kyi sdug pa dang sgrib pa thams cad byang par 'gyur ro// sdig pa thams cad dang/ byur thams cad dang/ gnod pa thams
dar 'khrug pa thams cad dang/ 'thab pa dang/ rtsod pa dang/ g.yul 'gyed pa dang/ gshags 'gyod pa thams cad dang/ rang gi 'khor dang/ gzhan gyi 'khor gyi 'jigs pa thams ]
cad dang phyir rgol ba'i dgras 'jigs pa thams cad dang/ sems can ma rungasapa thams cad dang/ rkun po dang// zol pa dang/ mi rgod dang/ gcan gzan
gtum po'i 'jigs pa thams cad rab tu zhibar 'gyur ro// sems can de dag thams cad 'jigs pa med par 'gyur ro// bud med dung/ skyes pa dang/ khye'u dang/ bu mo dang/ dge sbyong dang/ bram
ze dang/ rgyal rigs dang/ rje'u rigs dang/ dmas rigs gang dag gis de'i dri tshor ba de dag thams cad kyang phyir mi ldog par 'gyur zhing/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la
rab tu gnas par 'gyur ro// tshobarjesanas thams cad bde ba can gyi 'jig rten gyi khams su 'gro bar 'gyur zhing/ pad+mo'inang nas rdzus te skye bar 'gyur ro// byol song gi skye gnas su gtogs pa/

rkang gnyis rang rkang bzhi pa rnams kyis de'i dri tshor ba tsam gyis thams cad nges par phyir mi ldog par 'gyur ro// ban med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas nyid las phyir mi ldog par 'gyur zhing

mngon par tshogs pa'i tshang rgya'o// rig sngags 'chang ba de ji lta ji ltar sbyin sreg byed pa de lta de ltar de'i lus drimamad cing yongs su dag par 'gyur ro// stong rtsa brgyad tshang narig sngags 'chang ba'i lus 'ba'
bar 'gyur ro// phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas mang po'i sku mthong bar 'gyur ro// de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku de dag gis rig sngags 'chang ba la legs so zhes bya ba'i sgra 'byin te rig sngags 'chang ba
btsalegs so legs so// 'di de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsang ba'i mchog/ rnam par grol ba'i dkyil 'khor 'jig rten las 'das pa'i sbyin sreg gi chog yin no// 'di ni bdud thams cad/
rab tu 'joms pa'i sbyin srugachen po'acho ga yin no// 'din gnod sbyin dang/ srin po dang/ 'byung po dang/ brjod byed dang/ bgegs dang/ log 'dren tshar gcod pa'i sbyin srog chen po'i chog yin

no 'di ni byang chub kyi snying por song sta chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba'i sbyin sroga chen po chog yin no// 'di na byang chub kyi lam bla na med pa'o// danas de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku de dag thams cad kyis
phyag g.yas pagaser gyi kha dog lta bu brkyang ste/ rig sngags 'chang ba'i mgo'i spyi bo la phyag 'jog par mdzad do// 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyugagi rang gi ngo bo nyid kyi rgyun thams cad
gyis brgyan pa/ don yod pa'i zhags pa dang tshangs pa'i cha byad 'chang ba/ dbu lcang lo tsad pan gyis brgyan pa/ pad+ma dang/ mdung rtse gsum pa dang/ zhags po thogs pa/ rig sngags 'chang ba'i
mdun du bzhugs te bka' stsal ba/rigasags 'chang ba khyod kyis don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po rnam par grol ba'i dkyil 'khor 'jigarten las 'das pa'i sbyin sreg gi chog chen po grub pa legs/
so legasaso// zung zhig dang/ mag ji ltar btang/ ji ltar 'dod pa de thams cad sbyin no// de nas rig sngags 'chang bas ji ltar 'dod pa'i mchog smras na/ de thams cad thob par 'gyur ro//
'phags pa spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang phyug gis phyag brkyang ste rig sngags 'chang ba'i mgo de'i spyi bo'ajug bzhag pa dang/ phyag bzhag ma thag tu rig sngags 'char ba nam mkha'/
la 'grobar 'gyur ro// phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad du 'gro bar 'gyur ro// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mngon sum du mthong thob par 'gyur ro// phyir mi ldog pa dang phyir
mi lcog pa'i gnas thob par 'gyur ro// sangs rgyas thams cad kyi zhing du de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis dbang bskur ba thob par 'gyur ro// sangs rgyas thams cad kyi zhing la bstan bkur byas
pa nas bde ba can gyi 'jig rten gyi khams su 'gro bar 'gyur ro// de bzhin gshegs pa 'od dpag med byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor dang bcas pa tshos 'chad pa/ byang chub kyi snying po la thug gi bar du/

mngon sum du thob par 'gyur ro// de nas ho khung bshad par bya ste/ 'jig rten las 'das pa'i sbyin sreg gi gnas bla na med pa ni pad+makha bye ba 'dra bar byas pa/ zlum po khru gsum pa sa dang ba'i lci ba

bsres pa dang ldan par byas te/ pad+ma'i snying po la ho khung thabs su brko ba dang/ thang ka kun tu khru gang ba bgo bar bya'o// nang du pad+mabcu drug pa 'bur du byas pa bzhag 7/ tshon sna tshogs kyis par de brgyan

bar bya'o// pad+ma'i phyi 'khor du dkyil 'khor gru bzhir byas la dri sna tshogs kyis gtor ba dang brgyan par bya'o// dkyil 'khor kun tu bum pa gang ba bzhi dang/ dngul gyi snod gang ba bzhi dang/ mchod
wa yon gyi chus bkang ba'i dngul gyi snod bzhi dang/ rol mo dang dri sna tshogs kyis bkang pa'i sar gyi snod bzhi dang/ ro sna tshogs kyi gtor ma bzhag pa ni gtor ma dkar gsum rnam pa snyatshogs dang
'khras bu rnam pa sna tshogs bzhag pa dang/ dri dang me tog sna tshogs kyis gtor te 'phreng ba rnam pa snatshogs spyas la/ dkyil 'khor kun tu tshonas lnga'i bdan gyis mda' la brgyan te gzugs la

dang / sgo bzhir dbye ba dang/ bum pa bzhag pa ni legs par brgyan cing dri chus yongs su bkang ba bya'o// sgo bzhing chos smra ba shin tu brgyan pa'i stan la 'dug ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
bklag par bya'o// gru bzhi'i chos smra ba chos kyi stan legs par brgyan pa la 'dug nas don yod pa'i zhags pa'i mde sta bklag par bya'o// gsar gyi me tog dang/ dngul gyi mi tog dang/ zangs
kyil tog dang/ rin po sna bdun gyi mchod par bya'o// de nas rig sngags 'chang bas khrus byas/ gos gtsang ma bgos/ dri zhim pos bsgos te gtsang mar byas la/ ril bu la don yod pa'i

zhags pa'i snying po brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod bya'o/ khro bo'i rgyal po brgya rtsa brgyad pa la mkhas kyis dbang bskur ro// don yod pa rnam par lta ba'i snying bo brgya rtsa brgyad bzlasabarjod bya'o//
denas don yod pa 'bar ba rnam par grol ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi zhags pa'i sang bo stong rtsa brgyad sbyin sreg bya ba ni mi sna bar byams pa'i soms dang/ snying thag pa nas brtse ba dang/ sIrje
shu// bar bya ba ni las blan mad pa yin no// dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang

phyug thugs rje chen po la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di lta ste/ oM pad+mam pAni/ tsa ra tsa ra pad+ma b+hu dze/ dz+wa la dz+wa la nU ta shanaM/ b+hu ru b+hu ru/ bi mok+Sha b+hu dze/ da ha da ha/ sam+b+ham lAno/ a mo g+ha pA Ni bar de/

b+hi tshudir da ha/ pA paM/ sha ma sham ni/ lo kot+tA ra Ni/ samanar glib rate/ tu ru tu ru/ pra ba ri/ a mo g+ha sid d+hi o b+han+d+ha ban+taM na mo stu te swAhA/ de ni rnam par grol ba'i dkyil 'khor 'bar ba zhags pa
chen po'i snying po dang gzus kyi sbyin sreg gi chog 'jig rten las 'das pa bla na med pa yin no// de nas rig sngags 'chang bas thal ba des rmad du byung ba chen po'i bya ba thams cad bya'o// thal ba
des gang gi lus la byugs pa de ni sgrib pa dang sdig pa thams cad las grol bar 'gyur ro// dpral bar thag le byas n de ma thag tu zhag bzhi pa'i rimasaM las thar par 'gyur ro// zhag gnyis pa dang/
zhag gsum pa dang/ mtshan mo pa dang/ nyin par pa dang/ nam phyed pa dang/ nyin phyed pa dang/ lo gcig pa dang/ zla ba gcig pa dang/ zhag bdun pa dang/ rtag pa'i rims dang/ grang ba'i mes lan 'ga'/
yang gnas gang phyir 'ong bar mi 'gyur ro// dpag tshad brgya 'das de 'bros par 'gyur ro// 'tshog mar thig le byas na gdon stong phrag brgyad cu rtsa bzhi las thar bar 'gyur ro// thams cad kyang phyog

'babcur dpag tshad stong du 'bros par 'gyur ro// thal ba'i rdul bya rog gi mchu la gos pa phyogasakyi gnas gang du lhung ba der gnod sbyin dang/ srin po dang/ 'byung bo dang/ sha za dang/ yi dgas dang/
grul bum dang/ brjod byed dang/ bgegs dang/ log 'dren phyir gnas par mi 'gyur ro// thams cad 'bros so// phyogs kyi gnas der lhung na slar 'ong bar mi 'gyur ro// snying khar thig le byas nan
thamasacad las thar bar 'gyur ro// lte ba'i gnas su thig le byas na lte ba'i nang gi nad thams cad yod la sos par 'gyur ro// gdug pas zin pa la bskus na dugamed par 'gyur ro// dug gis
myos pa la byin na dug med par 'gyur ro// thal bas khrus byas naM khyad dang/ g.yos byed dang/ sngags dang/ dug thams cad rnam par zhig par 'gyur ro// sha bkra dang/ mdzo dang/ 'bras dang
shu phran mchod pa dang/ 'brum bu dang/ lhag pa dang/ ma dbal dang/ 'brum phran rnams byung na chu dron mo dang sbyar te bskus la/maral lan bdun bzlas brjod byas pas bsdus na mod la nad
thams cad las yongs su thar bar 'gyur ro// srin legs su gtor na sad dang/ rlung dang/ ser ba thamasacad mi 'bab bo// rlung ldang ba'i legs su gtor na rlung bsdams par 'gyur ro//
phyogs bzhir gtor na mtshams chen po bcad par 'gyur ro// yul 'khor kun tu gtor na ma tog dang/ 'bras bu dang/ lo tog dang/ mi tog gi ljon shing dang/ shing gi yal ga dang/ ldum ra dang/
kun dga' ra ba dang/ ri dang/ rtswa dang/ shing gel ba dang/ sman dang/ nags tshal thams cad legs par bsrungs par 'gyur ro// yul 'khor la dpag tshad brgya
tshun chad kun tu mtshams chen po bcad pa byas par 'gyur ro// grong khyer gyi sgo bzhir gtor na der 'jug pa dang phyir 'byung ba'i soms can bud med dang/ rgyas pa dang/ khye'u dang/ bu mo dang//
ts+tso dge sbyong dang/ bram ze dang/ rgyal rigs dang/ rje'u rigs dang/ dmangs rigs dang/ byol song gi skye gnas su gtogs pa rkang gnyis pa dang/ rkang bzhi pa dang/ ri dgas dang/ bya de dag
thams cad sgrib pa dang sdig pa dang bral bar 'gyur ro// 'gongs pa tsam gyisand dang sdug bsngal thams cad las grol bar 'gyur ro// nad thams cad dang bral bar 'gyur ro// tshe yongs su brjes
rgyu nas bde ba can gyi 'jig rten gyi khams su 'gro zhing/ sangs rgyas nyid du gnas kyi bar du phyir mi ldog par 'gyur ba'i gnas thob par 'gyur ro// dur khrod dam 'o bsregs pa'i snang du thal bas
gtor na/ dmyal bar skyes pa'i sems can de dag thams cad mod la dmyal ba nas thar te/ mngon par dga' ba 'am bde ba can du skye bar 'gyur ro// grong khyer ram/ gtsug lag khang ngam/
lha'i gnas sam/ grong ngam/ khyim mam/ dgon pa'i gnas sam/ yul 'khor kun tu gtor na mtshams chen po bcad cing zhi ba chen por 'gyur ro// rgyal po'i pho brang gi sgor gtor nargyal po dang

thamawa/btsun mo'i 'khor dgra thams cad las legs par bsrungs par 'gyur ro// skya bo mang po'i nang du gtor ba tsam gyis mod la skye bo mang po de dag thams cad sgrib pa dang sdig pa dang bral bar 'gyur ro//
nad thams cad dang bral bar 'gyur ro// gzhan yadabye ba stong phrag brgya byed pas rang 'dod pa la rang gi blos thams cad du sgyur bar bya'o// de nas rnam par grol ba'i dkyil 'khor don yod pa'i zhags
pa'i snying po 'jig rten las 'das pa'i sku gzugs ras la bra ba bshad par bya'o// dar ram ras gtsang ma legs par btags pa tshad khru do 'am khru gsum mam/ khru bzhi pa de'i dbus su don yod

pa'i zhags pa 'jig rten dbang phyug tshangs pa'i cha byad 'chang ba// dbu lcang lo cod pan gyis brgyan pa/ cod pan rgyal ba 'od dpagamed dang g.yas su zla ba tshos pa can gyis brgyan pa/ phyag bzhi pa/ rgya na thamA

cad kyis brgyan pa/ skyil mo krung bcas te bzhugs pa bri ba ni ri bo po Tal lcag na me tog can sna tshogs kyis gang ba/ rin po tshe sna tshogs kyi lcagams gang ba bya'o// de'i stang du rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan

ba seng ge 'i khri bya'o// sang ge'i khri'i steng du pad+ma'i gdan bya'o// de'i stang du 'ophags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug bzhugs par bya ste/ pad+ma dang/ mdung rtse gsum pa dang/ zhags pa thogs shing

gzugs de phyag dbugs 'byin pa bya'o// dbu'i gong man chad gzhalamang khang chen po lha rdzas rin po chasnatshogs kyis spras pa/ dbus su mtho ba dang bcas pa bya'o// dbus mtho ba'i steng du de bzhin gshegs
pa bdun tshad dang 'thun par pad+ma'i gdan la bzhugs shing rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa'o// de bzhin gshegs pa de'i gong gi dbus su de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par snang mdzad dang/
'od dpag med dang/ spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug 'od dang/ de bzhin gshegs pa gsum rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa/ skyil mo krung bcas te gzhalamang/ khang gnang na bzhugs par bya'o// 'phags pa
spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi 'od 'dom gang ba la 'khor bar de bzhin gshegs pa sum cu rtsa gnyis kyis brgyan par bya/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i nyi 'khor kun tu 'od zer 'barab sna tshogs dang

mdung rtse gsum pa'i 'phreng ba bya'o// de nyid kyi nye 'khor du lta sumacu rtsa gnyis bya'o// gong gi dbus su rdo rje'achang ba khro gnyer can gtum po rdo rje gasor bar bya'o// de nas tshangs ba dang/ khyab 'jug dang/

dbang phyug dang/ dbang phyugachen po dang/ lha'i bu dbang phyug chen po dang/ sum cu rtsa gsum gyi dbang po dang/ 'og min gnas kyi lha'i bu dang/ dga' ldan gyi lha'i bu dang/ 'phrul dga' lha'i bu dang/

zla ba dang zhima'i lha'i bu dang/ rgyal bo chen po bzhi dang/ gshin rjadang/ chu lha dang/ lus ngan po dang/ gzhon nu dang/ me lha dang/ nag po chen po dang/ dga' ba'i dbang phyug dang/ dga' bo dang/ nye dga' bo

dang stobs lha dang/ gang ba bzang bo dang/ nor bu bzang bo dang/ gnas gtsang ma'i rigs kyi lhadang/ sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha dang/ gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha ri bu rnamAme tog sna tshogs dang//
wa0 nor na bo sna tshogs lag pa nas 'phrul pa dang/ mtshon cha sna tshogs thogs bar bya'o//'phags pa don yod pa'i zhags pa'i cho ga zhib mo'i rgyal po bam lo
bcu bzhi ba/// lha rnams kyi pha rol thog thag tu pa'i 'phrang ba rdo rje dang mdung rtsagasum pas smras pa'i pad+ma'i 'phreng bas kun tu 'khor bar bya'o// g.yas phyogs su 'phags ma
sgrol ma skyil mo krung phyed du bcas te bzhugs pa/ ut+pal dang nor bu rin po che phyag na thogs pa/ rgyan thamasacad kyis brgyan pa/ 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi zhal tu blta bar bya'o//

de'i rgyab tu khro gnyeram me tog sna tshog sa'achang ba rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan par bya'o// g.yon du dkar mo zhes bya brda skyel mo krung phyed du bcas te bzhugs pa/ ku mu da dung nor bu rin po che lag na thogs
bsna tshogs pa'i rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa/ spyanaras gzigs dbang phyug la blta bar bya'o// dkar mo de'i rgyab tu pad+mamadzes dga' ma me tog sna tshogs thogs pa rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa
bya'o lha mo sgrol ma dang dkar mo'i 'og tu pha rol tu phyin pa bcu'i lha mo thams cad kyi dbu yid tsam 'dud pa/ na bza' dkarapo gsol ba/ rgyun thams cad kyis brgyan pa bzhengs pa bya'o//g.yas
phyogs su srin mo ral pa gcig ma gtum mo skyil mo krung phyed du bcas te bzhugs pa/ phyag bzhi la zhugs pa dang/ dgra sta dang/ ral gri dang/ rdo rje lag na thogs pa/ 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs
dbang phyug la blta bar bya'o// g.yon du pho nya mo zhal mche ba gtsigs pa/ rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa/ phyag bzhi la zhags pa dang/ dgra sta dang/ rdo rje dang/ mdung rtse

gsum pa phyag na thogs pa/ skyil mo krung phyed du bcas te bzhugs pa/ 'bar ba'i nang na 'jig rten dbang phyug la blta bar bya'o// ri bo po Ta la'i ngos kyi gseb tu klu'i rgyal po dga' bo dang/ nye dga'
bo dang/ klu'i bu mo klu'i gnas dang bcas pa bya ste/ ma tog sna tshogs thogasashing/ gong du bcom ldan 'das 'jig rten dbang phyug la 'thor bar bya'o// mi'i sad du lha mo dpa med ma dang/ lha mob san

kho taM dang/ sa'i lha mo dang/ dpal lhamo dang/ lha mo 'jigs byed ma dang// sgra dbyangs ma dang/ lcags sgrogs ma dang/ dung can m byas/ rgyan thamasacad kyis brgyan ba/ me tog sna tshogs dang nor bu

rin po che thogs pa bya'o// gzhal med khang gi gong du mchod rten chen po brgyad 'phrang bar spros la/ mchod rten gyi rgyun ji ltar brgyanapa de ltar brgyan par bya'o// mchod rten gyi 'og g.yas rol du

bcom ldan 'das byang chub kyi snying por gshegs pa la 'jig rten phyug mngon du mchod pa mdzad pa bya'o// 'phags pa rdo rje 'chang btsugan rdza ya ba thogs pa bya'o// de'i 'og du drang srong dang lta'i
bume tog sna tshogs kyis bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa bya'o// g.yon phyogs su bcom ldan 'dus chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba bya ste/ kun dga' bo dang/ rdo rje 'chang ba lagan rnga yab kyis bcom
0ldan 'das mngon dug yod par bya'o// g.yas phyogs su 'phags pa spyanas gzigs dbang phyug don yod pa'i zhags pa bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa byed pa bya'o// g.yon phyogs su khro bo'i
rgyal bo bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa byed pa bya'o// de'i 'og tu drang srongadang lha'i tshogs bcom ldan 'das mchod pa byed pa bya'o// ras kyi sku gzugs kyi g.yon dang g.yas kyi phyi rol thog thag
tu de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gzugs brgya rtsa brgyad pad+mo'i gdan latshad ji lta ba bzhin du skyel mo krung bcas te bzhugs pa rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan par bya'o// 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs
dbang phyug gis da ge 'i gdan gyi zhabs drung du rig sngags 'chang ba pus mo btsugs te/ mo tog dang/ pog por dang/ bgrang 'phrang lag na thogs te/ 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug
la mngon dubalta bar bya'o// kho mkhan khrus byas shing gos gtsang ma bgos te gtsang bar byas la/ ro sna tshogs pa'i zas dkar gsum bza' bar bya'o// snod gsar pa gtsang ma'i nang nas tshon

lhag ma ma yin pas bri bar bya'o// 'di'ang kha zasami gtsang ba sna tshogs dang gos nganapamigatsang ba ngos su snang bar bya'o// tshig ngan ba dang sems ngan pa yongs su spang bar bya'o/chang dang/ sha

dang/ bag tsong dang/ sgog skya dang/ ke'u dang 'dres pa yongs su spang bar bya'o// nyi ma re re zhing ba'i rnam lnga la reg par bya'o// drim dang bral zhing sar sna phrag dog dang bral bar bya'o// byams pa
dang snying rje'i lhag pa'i bsam pa dang/ dkon mchog gsum la dad pa lhag par bya ste/ ras kyi sku gzugs bri bar bya'o// ga bur dang gla rtsis bsgos pa'i tshon sna tshogs
kyis bri bar bya'o// dben zhing 'du 'dzi yongs su slang bar bya'o// rmugs pa dang gnyid yongs su spang bar bya'o// de ltar ri mo bri ba ni las legs par byas pa yino/ zla ba yar gyi ngo la bri bar
bya'o// rgyuskar shin tubakra shis pa dang/ tshes grangs dang nyi ma shin tu bkra shis pa la brtsam par bya'o// rgyu skar rgyal ni bkra shis pa yin te/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis bsngags pa//
byang chub sems dpa' thamasacad kyis byin gyis brlabs pa/ lha thamasacad kyis rjes su bzung ba yin no/ rigs kyi bu dang/ rigs kyi bu mo dang/ dge slong dang/ dge slong ma dang/ dge bsnyen
dang dge bsan ma dang/ dag sbyong dang/ bram ze dang/ rgyal rigs dang/ rje'u rigs dang/ dmangs rigs dang/ bud med dang/ skyes pa dang/ khye'u dang/ bu mo gang la la zhig don yod pa'i zhags
pa'i snying po byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyis phyag byas pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad rnam par gzigs pa byang chub chen po'i dkyil 'khor gsang ba/ rnam par grol ba'i dkyil 'khor/
gsang bar s kyi sku gzugs mthong ba tsam gyis mod la sdig pa dang sgrib pa thams cad las rnam par grol bar 'gyur ro// mtshams med pa lnga byed pa dang/ mnar med pa la gzhol ba dang/ dam
pa'i chos yongs su spong ba dang/ 'phags pa la skur pa 'debs pa dang/ sangs rgyas dang/ byang chub sems dpa' dang/ nyan thos dang/ rang sangs rgyas thams cad slong bar byed pa rnams kyang/
mthong ba tsam la sogs pas sdig pa thams cad phyi mar rlog go/ rnam par grol bar 'gyu'o// sdom pa chen po yang dag par 'dzin par 'gyur ro// gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma bye ba khrag khrig 'bum
phrag dgu bcu rtsa dgu snyad kyi de bzhin gshegs pa byang chub kyi snying po la mngon du gshegs po dang/ chos kyi 'khor lo skor ba mthong ba dang 'dra bar rig par bya'o// ras kyi sku gzugs 'di mthong
bani gzhal med khang gnas dang bcas ba'i ri bo po Ta lan 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor dang bcas te mngon du bzhugs pa mngon du mthong ba dang 'dra ste/'di la
the tsom mi bya'o// yid gnyis bskyad par mi bya'o// sems kyi skad ge gtsag rab tu dngab byas na bsod nams kyi phung po chen po yongs su bzung bar 'gyur ro// dge ba'i rtsa ba chen po sogs pa dang
ldan par 'gyur ro// 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis dgongs te mchog sbyin par 'gyur ro// de bzhatshe gshegs pa thams cad kyis yongs su bzung bar 'gyur ro// lus dang semA
yid las byung ba yongs su dag par 'gyur ro// dbang po thams cad yongs su dag par 'gyur ro// dri ma dang bral zhing sar sna dang phrag dog dang bral bar 'gyur ro// 'jig rten pa thams cad dga'
bdang blamar skabar 'gyur ro// tshe ring por 'gyur ro// nad thams cad dang bral bar 'gyur ro// shi nas bde ba can gyi 'jig rten gyi khams su skal ba mnyam par skyo bar 'gyur
ro tshe rabs dran par 'gyur ro/ pad+ma'inang nas rdzus te skye bar 'gyur ro// mthong ba tsam gyisamod la phyir mi ldog par 'gyur ro// de bzhin gshegs pa 'od dpag tu med pa'i sku gzugs 'di
gang gis mchod ba de ni phyogs bcu'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad machod par 'gyur ro// 'di nimapal na gnas ba'i tha ma yin te/ phyis ma rig pa'i mun pa'i nang du lhung bar mi 'gyur ro/
de ltar na mi mnyam pa dang 'dra ba yin te/ ras sku gzugs kyi chog 'jig rtenalas 'das pa sgrub pa'i cho ga 'di ni dam pa yin no// de nas gsang sngags kyi tshog 'jig rten las 'das pa sgrub
ba brjod par bya'o// gang gis dran pa tsam gyis mo lo de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mngon suma mthong nas 'dug pa dang/ phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad sgo phye ste 'dug pa dang/
byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyis mngon du mthong ba sbyin par mdzad pa dang/ dkyil 'khor gyi lha thams cad kyis mngon du srung ba dang/ skyob pa dang/ sbed par mdzad pa dang/ dkyil 'khor
dang phyag rgya dang/ gsang sngags dang/ snying po dang/ cho ga'i mo thams cad mngon du 'gyur ro// 'jig rten las 'das pa'i lus su 'gro ba yongs su dag par 'gyur ro// dus gsum du gshekA
shing so so na bzhugs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa dang/ byang chub sems dpa' chen po'a'aphags pa'i tshogs mchog thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo// 'phags pa rdo lnga'achang ba dang// dkyil

'khor gyi lha thams cad dang/ rig pa'i rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo oM a mo g+ha a ba lo ki ti ma hAmal pas na+d+habo d+hisatA namasgo te/ b+ha ra b+ha ra/ saman+ta a ba lo ki te/ a mo g+hamahA brah+ma

be Na d+har b+har b+ha ra/ mahA kA ru Ni ka bo d+ha ya bo d+ha ya/ ma hAbo d+ha ni/ bo d+hi bod+hi/ pad+mabibo ni/ sad+mepA pa an d+ha ker/ dra ba ma ni/ sam+badurgate/ b+ha ra ka/ ma hA kA ru Ni ka/ ba hub bi// ba

d+har/ sam+ba ta thA ga tagan+d+he/ u ru su'u da a mo g+ha gat+thaM/ tu ru tu ru da a mo g+ha pA sha hasti mu'u mu ru/ bimo k+Sha klu dza/ 7NikA Ni/ sam+b+ha A ba ra Na bi ny+nyo/ b+ha ra b+ha ra/ sarba ta thA ga ta/ pa ri pU ra Ni//

rta ra ta ra/ tAr ya mAn/ a ba lo kA ya/ pad+ma b+hadza/ ma Nika na ka// bi b+hA pita/ bAhu/ da ma dam/ dur tAn tanAn/ ma hA bo d+hisatwa ba rad/ ma hA kA ru Ni ka/ sam+ba de ba ga Nan mas+sata/ ri Ti ga Ne/

stabi ta/ sha ta sa ha sra tsan sUr+ya/ a ti ri ka/ raM sh+tsa/ a ba b+ha si ta/ ma h+pham shu pa ti/ ba Sha d+ha ra/ pa ram/ shud+d+ha satra/ a ba lo ki te/ leki shwa ra/ pa ram kA ru Ni ka/ maN+Dalesha ra/ supra

buny+tsa/ ma sApany+tsa/ b+hu dze shwa ra/ ma hAbi b+hud+ha re shAr/ ri d+hi ri/ ma hA kAruNika/ ma hA bimo kA/ man+tA la d+har sam+ba tathA ga ta/gu rgya/ mu drasam ya d+har/ ma hA ba la bcu dA ra/ ma hAm Ni/ mo li d+ha ra/
a mi tA b+ha/maku Ta/ d+har/ d+hu ru d+hu ru/ sa man+ta/ a b.lokita/ lo ke shwar/ mahe shwa ra/ bAg d+ha re shAr/ pa ra pa ra/ par ma/ ma hAm tI/ a ba lo ki te/ sam+b+hasat+taMsan rA
ga sid+ma sid+d+hasha/ ba ri pUr ka/ ma hA bar/ pramo da nan mo sU te swAhA/ 'di'i thams cad rnam par grol ba'i dkyil 'khor byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyis phyag byas pa/ de bzhin gshags
pa thams cad kyi gsang ba/ 'phags ba spyanaras gzigs dbang phyug gi snying bo'a mchog gsang ba/ sdig pa dang sgrib pa thams cad yongs su sbyong ba/ 'jig rten las 'das pa'i lam rnam par sbyong
ba de bzhinagshegs pa thams cad kyi rigs su 'jug pa yin no// dkona mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo// dus gsum du gshegs pa'i sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag

tshal lo// o bAr bIr/ mahAmaN+Dal/ bad+d+hishArUb ShaT pA ra mi tA/ paripUr ka/ sam+b+habod+hisatA/ namakri ta/ pa ram bi pu la/ bi mok+ta ng+ha ra/ mahA pAsha/ ba ka ta/ amo g+ha pA sha dzA la ta/ ma

dz+wa la a ba lo ki te/ mahAm Ni/ bi d+har/ sa man+ta a ba b+hA si ta/ dzA la tshul/ ma hA gam b+hir/ bi moka pA sha rUr/ ba la bo rlung ga/ A kar ka/ o khram+marU pa/ mahA a mo g+ha pA sha dz+hihUM/ phaT phaT/
sam+b+hasatA/ b.lokita/ ba ra pra da/ namo sku te sAhA/ 'dini rnam par grol ba'i dkyil 'khor don yod pa'i zhags pa'i sing po 'jig rten las 'das pa'i rnam par 'phrul pa'o// dkon mchog gsum la
'a44 phyag 'tshal lo// byang chub sams dang 'a sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa sngan ras gzigs dbang phyug thugs rjechen po la phyag 'tshal lo// o ba bu rgyu/ bi bud+hu/ mahAkA ru Nika/ ta ra ta ra/
ta ra ya/ ma hA artsa ba par M/ ma hA b+hU dzab 'akA ya hUM phaT swahA/ nye ba'i snying po'o// de bzhin gshegs pa thamasacad la phyag 'tshal lo// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags

pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug thugs rje chen po la phyag 'tshal lo// oM a mo g+ha pA sha/ mahAdAn pA ra mi tA/ pa ra pA ra ya/ hUM da ra da ra/ ba bi d+hu/ bi tsa tra/ sam+b+hasatwA/ u pa b+ho ga/ san+d+ra

ta thA ga ta/ ma hAdAn/ pU dza ma hA/ pra brta ya/ ta ra ta ra/ tA ra ya/ ma hApad+ma pA Ni hUMphaT sAhA/ 'di ni sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i zhags pachen po'i snying po ste/ gang gis yungs 'bru tsam yang

sbyin pa byin te/ dran pa tsam gyis lan bdun bzlas brjod byas na mchod sbyin sbyin pa rnam par 'phrul pa chen po shin tu rgyas pa chen po'i sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// de bzhin
gshegs pa thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug thugs rje chen po la phyag 'tshal lo// oM a mo g+ha shI la/

saM b+ha ra saM b+ha ra/ b+har b+ha ra/ ma hA shud d+ha satA/ pad+ma bi b+hu Ti ta/ b+hu dzaM d+ha ra d+ha ra/ sa man+ta/ a ba lo ki te hUM phaT swahA/ gzungs 'di sbyang ba byas te gso sbyong gi yan lag brgyad bzung nas
mis bar lan nyi shu rtsa gcig dran par bya'o// de nas don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po bzlas brjod bya'o// bzlas brjod byas pa tsam gyis mod la tshul khrims yongs
su dag pa chen po dang ldan par 'gyur ro/// tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin ba yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// tshul khrims kyi dri zhim po'i drimang po lus las byupanang phyogs bcu'i 'jig rtenadu

sku grags par 'gyur ro// gang zhig nyi ma re re zhing gzungs 'di dran na de ni rtag tu tshul khrims yongs su dag par 'gyur ro// dge slong gang zhig tshul khrims nyamasaM nga sa sbyang ba byas te 'di bzlas
brjod byas na bzlas brjod byas pa tsam gyis mod la tshul khrims yongs su dag par 'gyur ro// tshul khrims mang po dang ldan par 'gyur ro// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo//
byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug thugs rje chen po la phyag 'tshal lo// oM ma hAbIr+ya/ daa mo g+ha bi lo ki ti/ ba ra ba ra/ dri D+ha/ bIr+ya ma hA
ba la/ ma hA bo dz+hog/ ba la bo d+hani hUM phaT swahA/ gzungs 'di dus rtag tu yongs su dag pa yid kyis dran par byas na/ dran pa tsam gyis modal brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs
par 'gyur ro// byang chub kyis sIng po la thug gi bar dunam yang brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang bral ba'ami 'gyur ro// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo// byang chub sems
dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa sn gnas gzigs dbang phyug thugasarje chen po la phyag 'tshal lo// oM a mo gru kun tu / sa bo kAmeN/ kAn klu Na/ mahAmi twaM/ kA ru Na/ sam+b+hasatwA/
bta sa la// ma hA kAru Nika/ san+d+ha satra klo mi Na hUM phaT banA/ gzungs 'di soms can du gyur pa thams cad la bzod pachen po dang/ sIperdzachen po dang/ bcu ba'i sams kyis myal ban
gnas pa dang byol song gi skyu gnas su gtogs pa'i dogs dang bya gang dag 'das pa gang yin pa dang/ gnas pa gang yin pa dang/ skye ba gang yin pa de rnams la sIpa rje ba'i phyir gang zhig gzung
kyis mchog dran par byad na/ dmyal ba'i sems can las thar par 'gyur zhing skya bo mang po gnas pa gang yin pa rnams grol bar 'gyur ro// nam sangs rgyas kyi zhing la gnas kyi bar du bkod pa/
pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang phyug

thugs rje chen po la phyag 'tshal lo// oM sad+d+hA tathA ga ta/ ma hA a mo g+ha/ ka ru Na/ smyan samAd+hi/ sam+b+hab mo k+Sha a pra kaM pya ka/ tsu ru tsu ru hUM phaT swAhA/ gzungs 'di 'phags pa spyan res
gzigs dbang phyug la dmigs nas yid rtse gcig tu byas te dran par byas na/ dran pa tsam gyis mod la des bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// gzhan yang ting nge
'dzan stong phrag brgya so sor thob par 'gyur ro// sangs rgyas kyi zhing du gtogs pa thams cad du zhugs pa 'gyur ro// bzlasabarjod byas pa tsam gyis ting nge 'dzani
thams cad la dbang sgyur bar 'gyur ro// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug thug/
rje chen po la phyag 'tshal lo// oM a mo g+ha/ mahup+padzA/ a ba b+hA sa/ sngar Na/ bud d+hi/ pra sa ra pra sa ra/ sa man+ta bud d+hi/ a ba lo ki te/ b+ha ga bAn pradza/ a ba le ka ta/ tsakyu ma/
padzA/ bar da/ pA Ni/ mahUMpradz+nyA/ pad+ma d+hA ra Ni/ b+hu dze hUM phaT swAhA/ gzungs 'di dran pa tsam gyis mod la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// thabs dang shes
rab sna tshogs kyi dag bachen po'i blo 'phel bar 'gyur ro// rtag tu rgyun mi 'chad par pha rol tu phyin pa bcu'i blo dang ldan par 'gyur ro// phyogs bcu'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang/
'das pa dang/ ma 'ongs pa dang/ da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa'i shes rab dang blor 'gyur ro// lan 'ga' yang pha rol tu phyin pa drug dang bral bar mi 'gyur ro// sbyin pa
dang/ tshul khrims dang/ bzod pa dang/ brtson 'grus dang/ bsam gtan dang/ shes rab kyi blo nyams par mi 'gyur ro// byang chub la thug gi bar du rab tu rmongs par mi 'gyur ro// don
yod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug gi gzungs chen po yin no// dkona mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo// byang chub sems dpasems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug

thugs rje chen po la phyag 'tshal lo// tad+ya thA/ oM a mo g+ha gi mo klu/ mad+d+hAl ma hAd b+hu ta bim le/ d+har d+har/ d+hiri d+hi/ mahAd b+hu ta/ ami tAb+hA/ ma ku Ta/ d+har hUM phaT swahA/ dkyil 'kherader
yungs kar dang dri chab dang ldan pa'i bum pa la sngags bzlas brjod byas nas chus kun tu char chag btab na/ chag chag btab pa tsam gyisamod la dkyil 'khor kun tu dpag tshad gcig gi nang dus sbyang
ta yongs su dag par 'gyur ro// ji ltar shel gong rin po che sna tshogs pa dag pa dri ma med pa mdzes pa de 'dra ba'i sa gzhir 'gyur ro// shin tu dag pa dang/ shin tu dri ma med pa dang/ shin tu nyams
dga' bdang/ shin tu yid du 'ong ba'os gzhir 'gyur ro// shani tus gzhi dpa' bar 'gyur ro// sa phyogs de'i bud med dang/ skyes pa dang/ khye'u dang/ bu mo dang/ dge sbyong dang/ bram ze dang/ rgyal
rigs dang/ rje'u rigs dang/ dmangs rigs gang dag 'khod pa de dag thams cad phyir mi ldog pa'i sa la rab tu gnas par 'gyur ro// de dag thams cad phyir mi ldeg par 'agyur ro// shA nas bde ba can

gyi 'jig rten gyi khams su skye bar 'gyur ro// tshe rabs dran par 'gyur ro// nam bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'atshang rgya ba'i bar du bsod nams kyi phung po chen po'i
dge ba'i rtsa ba chen po sogs par 'gyur ro// gang dag byol song gi skye gnas su gtogs pa'i ri dgas dang bya de dag phyogs der 'gro zhing ba tu 'jug pa de dag thams cad yongs
su grol bar 'gyur ro// bde 'gro'i lam la rab tu gnas par 'gyur ro// gang gsare'i sa lag par 'ongs ta reg pa de dag thams cad nad dang bral ba dang/ nyon mongs pa dang bral ba dang/ rimasu dang

bral ba dang/ sgrib pa mang ba dang/ sdig pa dang bral bar 'gyur ro// de dag phyis lus la tshor ba'i nad 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro// rtag tu bde bas tsham pa'i lus su 'gyur ro// sa yongs su sbyong ba'irig/
sngags so// dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo// byang chub sems dpa' sems dang 'chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug thugs rje chen po la phyag 'tshal lo// tad+ya thA/ oM a mo

g+ha dru ma/ la dadrik+Sha/ kaM kha pa tra/ phu thal/ bi Ta pa a re ha/ nahi ga/ puk+kari Na/ udus hrid/ sun+tar prasra pa Ni/ bi bi d+ha/ bitsi tra/ parishud+d+ha ya/ pad+ma b+hu dze/ sa ma sam/ saman+te na/ pa

rimaN+Da la/ pa ri sho d+ha ya/ ma la ma la/ bi ma la bi ma la ni rma la su pa ri shud d+ha/ pad+maud pa latsA/ dza lam lAn bi shud ng+ha/ shod+d+ha ya sho d+ha ya/ par ma mahA shud d+hA ya// satAhU~M phaT swAhA/ nam

pas/ khrib+hu bane hUM phaT swahA/ 'dis tsan dan dang/ pad+ma dang/ chu dang/ yungs kar la yongs su bzlas te/ ljon pa'i sdong po dang/ me togagashing dang/ 'bras bu'i shing dang/ sna tshogs pa'i lcagam dang/

ba rtswa dang/ shing gel ba dang/ sman dung/ chu klung dang/ mtsho phran dang/ lteng ka dang/ rdzing bu dang/ 'bab chu mdzes pa'i steng du gtor bar bya ste/ de rnams thams cad la bdud rtsi blug par 'gyur ro//
de rnams thams cad la lha rdzas kyi ma tog dang 'bras bur 'gyur ro// than lha'i rtswa dang/ shing gel ba dang/ sman dang/ nags kyi bdag por 'gyur ro// gang la reg pa tsam gyis reg pa de thams cad
ser sna'i drim dang bral zhing phrag dog spangs par 'gyur ro// mkhris pa dang/ bad kan dang/ mchil ma dang bral zhing/ lus kyi phyi dang nang gi dri mi zhim pa thams cad yongs su dag par 'gyur ro//
gang yang lus kyi nang gi nad dang gnod pa sna tshogs pa de rnams thams cad yongs su grol bar 'gyur zhing/ rnam par dag pa dang/ rnam par nyams pa dang/ legs par yongs su dag pa dang/
drim med par 'gyur ro zhes so// de la chus khrus byas pa gang yin pa de rnams kyang/ lha'i nu dang byang chub yan lag gi chus khrus byas pa'i 'agyur ro// sdig pa dang sgrib pa'i drim thams cad bkrus
par 'gyur ro// yan lag brgyad dang ldan pa'i chus bkrus par 'gyur ro/ des so shing zos pa de rnams re rnams kyang sangs rgyas kyi yaphebs rjes su dran pachen po 'phul bar 'gyur ro// mya na
thams cad dang bral par 'gyur zhing/ zhags pa thams cad yongs su sbas pa dang/ rtag tu kha nas ut+pala'i dri bro bar 'gyur ro// ngag 'jam zhing sAn par yang 'gyur zhing ngag mnyen par yang 'gyur ro//
dga' ba'i gtam byed par 'gyur zhing skye bo thams cad yid dga' bar yang 'gyur ro// mi 'am ci'i dbyangs su'ang 'gyur ro// bstan bcos dang/ cho ga zhib mo dang/ gsang/
sngags dang/ theg pa chen po thams cad thos pa tsam gyis kun tu 'dzin par byed cing kha ton du'ang gnas par byed do// ma tog de lamanams pa dang/ 'phreng ba mgul par 'ching bar byed pa gang yin pade
rnams kyang/ byang chub yan lag gam tog gi 'phrang ba bcings par 'gyur ro// de bzhin gshegs pa'i dbang gis mngon par dbang bskur bar yang 'gyur ro// sna tshogs su dag par yang 'gyur te//

lca'i sridang reg pa dang yang dag par ldan par 'gyur ro// lce pad+ma'i 'dab ma dang mtshungs par yongs su dag par 'gyur ro// lta'iso dang mtshungs pa'i kha dog tu 'gyur bud mang dang/ skyes bu dang/ khye'u

bu mo gang la gtam smras pa re rtag tu dbang du 'gyur ro// shi 'phos shing skye ba brjes nas bde ba can gyi 'jig rten gyi khams su skye bar 'gyur te/ pad+ma las rdzus te skye bar 'gyur ro// tshe rabs dran
par yang 'gyur ro zhes pa'o// 'bras bu dang/ me tog dang/ chu dang/ nags kyi bdag po dang/ rtswa dang/ shing gel ba dang/ snyan yongs su sbyong ba'i sngags so// dkon mchog gsum la phyag
'tshal lo// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug thugs rje chen po la phyag 'tshal lo// tad+ya thA/ oM a mo g+ha a ma le tri ma le/ bi ma le/ nirmale/

tha0 di bya pa ri shud+d+he sam+b+ham la pa karim ma hAbo d+has tA ba ra de pra ba ra pa ri shuSh+Tha/ mahAm Ni rat+na kA ya parishuSh+Tha/ ma Ni ma Nisho d+hanim hAa mo g+hatsanam Ni shud+d+he/ hri da ya shuT+Te/ kA yanirma la mahA Ni

pa ri shud+d+he/ hu'u hu ru pra ba rapA Ni mawA b+hu dza ba ra de/ tu ru tu ru/ mahAsatwa btas le/ pa ri sho d+ha yamA sarba pA su bishud+d+ham le swAhA/ rig sngags 'dis ragi sngags 'chang gis bdag nyid kyi sa

yongs su sbyang bar bya ste/ tsan dan gyi chu dang/ gur kum dang/ gla rtsi'i chu dang/ ga bur gyi chu dang/ yungs kar dang/ ba byung lnga bsres pas rdza gsar pa'i bum pa bkang ste/ rig sngags 'di stong

byas pa tsam dang/ dbang bskur ba tsam gyis bdag rang gi phyi nang yongs su dag cing drima med par 'gyur ro// sdig pa dang/ sgrib pa dang/ dug dang bral bar 'gyur ro// nyon mongs pa dang nad dang bral
kan da dgags pa byung 'bya nang lan bdun bdun btung bar bya'o// khrus byas pa tsam gyis mod la khro ba'i rgyal pos bdag 'di dbang bskur bar bya'o// khrus
bar 'gyur ro// ma ba la sogs pa dang bral bar 'gyur ro// bgegs dang/ log 'dren dang/ bdud la sogs pa thams cad las yongs su thar par 'gyur ro// gnod sbyin dang/ srin po dang/
'byung po dang/ sha za la sogs pa thams cad yongs susras por 'gyur zhing/ bar chad bya ba'i phyir rig sngags 'chang ba'i drung du sur 'ong nus par mi 'gyur ro// rig sngags 'chang bde ba'i sgrubapa
dang bde bar nyal ba dang/ bde bar sad pa dang/ nam 'tsho'i bar du bde bar gnas pa dang/ dri ma thams cad sus pa dang/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mthong ba dang//
byang chub sems dang ba mthong bar 'gyur ro// 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyuga mngon sum du mthong sa zhi ba'i dus byed par 'gyur ro// bde ba can gyi 'jig rten gyi khams su skal ba mnyam
par skyo bar 'gyur ro// pad+mo'i nang nas smras te skyas nas de bzhin gshags pa 'od dpag madra mngon sum du mthong bar 'gyur ro// rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa dang/ lus mtshan dang dpa byad
kyis brgyan pa dang tshar bas dran par 'gyur ro// mthar byang chub la thug gi bar dusangs rgyas kyi nang nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing du 'gro bar 'gyur ro// rnam par grol ba'i dkyil 'khor don yod pa'i
zhags pa'i snying po cho ga zhibamo 'dimatha' dag rdzogs par kha ton byed par 'gyur ro// gzhan yang de bzhin gshegs pas bka' stsal pa'i mdo sde gzhung sna tshog sa rnam pa du ma kha ton byed par
'gyur ro/ bskal pa stong phrag brgya tshun chad du skye ba dran par 'gyur ro// o amo g+ha pa/ bi ma le pra sa ra/ sa man+ta/ mu khe sahA/ dkyil 'khor char phyi sa thig gdab pa'i sngags so// oM/

a mo g+ha ba ba rta/ rU pa ba tsitra/ gamadz+ha/ ra san d+hu ra prab r b+hu dzeswAhA/tshon rtsa'i sdug dang/ sku gzugagazhag pa dang/ mtshon cha dang rtags bri ba'i sngags so// oM a mo gsan par many+dza la/ pAshaban
'a07/ yungs kar 'a lan bdun bzlas brjod byas pas dkyil 'khor bstam par bya'o// oM a mo g+has man+ta/ dasha dag ma hAsAman/ ban ng+ha ya/ d+hu ru d+hu ra dz+waphaT swahA/ yungs kar dang chu/
la lan bdun bzlas brjod byas pas mtshams gcad pa'o// oM a mo g+ha rakA Na/ pAsha has/ b+hu ru b+hu ru swAhA/ yungs kar dang dri chab la lan bdun bzlas brjod byas pas bdag bsrung ba'o//
o amog+ha/ tsu Ta ma Ni/ gu ru shu ru/ nA ga pAsha ban d+hashrI sAhA/ lamanyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas brjod byas pas spyi gtsugabacing ba'i sngags so// oM a mo g+harakAs man te na/ ma hA pA sha/ b+hu'u
byu ru swAhA/ slobam dang grogs rnams bsrung ba'i sngags te/ yus kar dang thal ba la lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas brjod byas te bsrung bar bya'o// oM a mo g+ha/ dza la bi ma le su ru su ru swAhA/

drinu la lan nyi shu la rtsa gcig bzlas brjod byas pas khrus bya ba'i sngagasaso// oM a mo g+ha a mr-i ta/ bats+tsatsa ra tsar sAhA/ nye reg bya ba'i sngags so// oM a mo g+ha di bya bsta tsu ru tsu ru swAhA/gos

kyi sngags so// oM a mo g+ha b+hu dzaka dka btsa/ ba ra de/ tsir tsir sAhA/ go cha'i sngags yin te yungs kar dang gur kumakyi nus bya'o// oM a mo g+ha brah+ma b+hAdzepAr+yan te pra sar swAhA/ mchod phyi'i

thogs kyi sngags so// oM a mo g+hatsu ra ma Ni partse/ a b+hi Shiny+tsaya/ mam sam+ba ta thA ga ta a b+hi kim Ni ma Ni sAhA/ dbang bskurab 'i sngags so// oM a mo g+ha pab sunad+ha ra/ d+ha ra d+ha ra/ lhar Ni/
tsaka// many+tsAhU~M/ stan gyi gsang sngags so// oM a mo g+ha saman par+yang ke/ blu ba sAhA/ lamo krung bca' ba'i sngags so// oM a mo g+ha su ra d+hi/ papa ra pa ra hU~M/ me tog

gi sngags so// oM a mo g+ha ba bo d+ha/ gnad+ma/ pra sa ri/ pUr b+hu dzesAhA/ dri'i sngags so// o amo g+ha bi bi d+ha le pa na phra bar pa ri pa'i sAhA/ byug pa'i sngags so// oM[']a mo g+ha ga na sngar
Na ma yo b+hu ru b+hu ra hU~M/ bdug pa'i sngags so// oM a mo g+ha shuklu ras ra sa/ a gra d+ma ra bi d+ha ra hUM/ gtor ma'i sngags te thams cad du bya'o// oM a mo g+ha/ pra ba ra/ nu pa lo kani/ki'i
ki ri hU~M zas dang gtor ma'i sngags so/ o bi bib+hU/ a mo g+ha/ pha la/ par pa rahU~M/ 'bras bu'i sngags so// oM a mo g+ha ang b+hu ta gan d+hab re hU~M/ mchod yon gyi sngags so//

a a mo g+ha/ bi bi d+ha/ ma ti/ bru kha Ne/ bar/ dzA la dzA la hU~M/ rgyun dang/ thod dang/ dar sbyang ba dang/ mda' dang/ tshon sna lnga dang/ thig skud kyi sngags so// o a mo g+ha/ bi bi b+haM/ b+ha dza ne/
dza ya dza ya swAhA/ snod kyi sngagos de thams cad du sbyar ro// oM a mo g+ha/ pra ba ra b+ha ban/ b+hu be thar thu ra sAhA/ gzhug pa'i sngags so// oM a mo g+hanams ra Na/ sam+bata thA ga ta/ o

le hU~M/ phyag 'tshal ba dang thal mo sbyor ba'i sngags so// oM a mo g+ha tsakre du ru du ru pra du ru swAhA/ bskor ba'i sngags so// oM a mo g+ha sa man+ta b+ha bane b+ha ba b+ha ba sAhA/ spyan drang ba'i sngags
so/ o amo ga tsin+ta ma Ni pa kar ya du ru du rusAhA/ gsol ba gdab pa'i sngags so// oM amo g+haniman+ta Nab mok+Sha maN+Dale mi li mi li sAhA/ snyan gsan dbab pa'i sngags so// o amo/
g+ham hAri dzA la dzA las man sAhA/ mar ma'i sngags so// o amo g+ha pAshahasta pra sar gats+tshaswa b+hA ba nan bi saN+Di ta sa sa las ra hUM phaT swAhA/ slar gshegs su gsol ba'i sngags so// oM a

mog+ha pA sha ban+tis monam As mi ya/ drits+tshe hUMphaT sAhA/ dmatshig gi sngags so// oM a mo g+ha soman+te/ pra bar/ sa ras ra/ pras ramahA b+hA teshwar/ d+hi'i b+hir/ pAhU~M phaT swAhA/ gsang sngags
'dis la du dang/ mod ka ra dang/ zon dang/ rtsa ba dang/ sdong bu dang/ gtor ma dkar po dang/ tshogs chen po'i bdag po'i gtor ma sbyin pa dang/ me tog dang/ bdug pa'i sbyin pa byas n phyis bgeg
byed nus par mi 'gyur ro// 'jig rten 'das pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi// phyag rgya de nas brjod bya ste// gang gis bzung ba tsam gyis ni// sdig pa thams cad zhi bar 'gyur// las dpanyon mos
sgrub pa dang/ dug rnams thams car rnam par bcom// rnam grol dkyil 'khor rigs kyi ni// dam tshig phyag rgya yang dag yin// lag gnyis pad+ma'adrar byas l// sor mo rnams ni mnyam
bzhugs// gung mo lcags kyu 'dra bar bya// lag gnyis mnyam par bzhag pa yi// phyag rgya rnam grol dmatshig 'di don yod zhags par byin gyis brlabs// 'jig rten 'das pa khyad par
@#// gyi lam gyi 'bras bu thob par byed// o pad+mab+hu dze/ pad+ma ka re/ pad+mabam lasAhA/ dam tshig rtse mo'i rtsa shes pas// rdo rje pad+ma rtag tu bya// gung monung zad bskums
nas ni// lag gnyis pad+mo 'dra bar bya// gang gis phyag rgya'adi mthong ba// 'jig rten rnams kyi dbang phyug dag/ mtshungs pa med par 'gyur ba yin// rnam grol phyag rgyas dogs med par// sangs/
rgyus mtshungs med 'gyur ba yin// byang chub sems dpa' kun gyisan// phyag byas pa yi phyag rgya 'di// rnam grol dkyil rmad du byung// oM pany+tse su paNe/ bi mok+ShamaN+Da la/ pad+ma b+hu dze/hA
rdo rjebacing ba mnyam bzhags// rdo rje pad+mo gung moni// bskums de bzhin gshegs kun gyi// rnam grol gsang ba'i phyag rgya 'di// yang dag grol ba rab tu bstan// phyag 'di na bstan pas ni//
ngan nga ra byas pa thams cad 'jig/ oM a mo g+ha badzra parmib+hu dze mi li mi li sAhA// lag gnyis thalamo khong stong las// mdor nanor bu 'dra bar bcing// nor bu'i phyag rgya rdo rje 'dra// yid
bzhin nor bur brjod pa yin// las ni don yod thams cad byed// don yod mchod pa'i char 'bebs shing// don yod pha rol phyin drug rdzogs// don yod sangs rgyas rnams dang ni// byang chub
sems dpa' mthong ba yin// don yod rnam grol dkyil 'khor gsang// mtshamasamed lnga po sbyong bar mdzad// oM a mo g+ha/ ma Ni ma Ni/ ma hAm Ni/ paNi swAhA/ rdo rjepad+ma'i thalamo sbyar//

[d ]pad+ma kha bye 'dra bar rgyas// gung mo lcags kyu 'dra ba yi// phyag rgya'adin mchog tu bzang// phyag rgya 'di ni mgrong tsam gyis// 'bras bu chen po rmad du byung// 'jig rten 'das pa khyad par 'phag/
dus gsum sangs rgyas mthong ba yin// oM a mo g+ha/ badzra ma hApartse dzA le su dzIl/ mahA dza le sAhA/ snying khar rdo rje pad+ma nyid// rdo rdzobacing ba phun sumatshogs// mdzub mo lcags kyu/
'dra ban// btsar bar bya ba'i phyag rgya 'di// gzi brjid chen po dag dang ni// stobs chen pha rol gnon pa dang// thams cad grub par byed pa'i gnas// thams cad grub par rab tu sbyin//'jig

rten 'das pa grub pa che// sangs rgyas nyid phyir banamad// sdig pa thams cad 'phrog pa grub// gsang sngags grub pa bla na med// oM a mo g+ha sid+d+he/ sats+tshata thA ga ta sid+d+ha/ a ba lo kA ya sid+d+hi/

mahA bi pu la sit+taM/ ku ru ku ru swAhA/ rdo rje thal mo mnyama bzhi g ste// gungamo gshibs tabasgrung ba dang// srin lag mthe bong so soradagyed// gungamo yid tsam dgug bya ba// paN+Na'i dbang phyug
sems dpa' che// 'jig rten dbang phyug bla ma ste// rtag tu rnam grol dkyil 'khor na// byang chub sams dang 'a thams cad kyis// phyag rgyu byas pa 'di yin no// phyag rgya 'di dang don yod pa'i

zhags pa'i snying po' phyag rgya dang/ phyag rgya de dag mthong ba ni 'jig rten dbang phyug mthong ba dang 'dra ba yin no// phyag rgya mchog 'di mthong ba ni rnam par grol ba'i dkyil 'khor mthong ba dang 'dra ba
sa @#// yon taM/ phyir mi ldog pa thob par 'gyur ro// phyag rgya 'di bcings pa tsam mthong bas mod la ram tshig thams cad shes par 'gyur ro// mthong ba dang bzung ba tsam/
gyis mod la 'bras bu chen po 'thob cing/ mod la sangs rgyas kyi byang chub bla na med pa yin no// dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phag/
pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug thugs rje chen po la phyag 'tshal lo// oM a ba lo ki ta/ ma hAshud+d+ha satAs ras ra/ sa man+ta a ba b+hA sa/ kuN+Da la/ rno la/ a mi tA b+hA/ ma ku Ta/ b+ha ra/

dzAT ma ku rgyu/ na ba badzran+d+ra/ moN+Dita/ tsar tsar/ saM b+ha ra/ b+hu pa Na shwa ra pad+mab+hu dze sAhA/ phyag rgya chen po bdun bo de dag ni 'jig rten las 'das pa'i byang chub snying po'i lam gyi 'bras bu ston

pa rtag tu 'jig rten dbang phyug bla ma'i 'jig rten mgon po'i chos kyi 'khor lo skor ba yin no// phyag rgya bdunani phyag rgya chen po bye ba phrag bdun gyis yongs su bskor ba yin te/ phyag rgya chen po
bdun po de gang du bcings shing phyag rgyu mchog bzung ba ni phyag rgya chen po bya ba phrag bdun brgya bcings par 'gyur ro// bzung bar 'gyura'o// de dag thams cad mchod pa dang bsAmabakur byas
par 'gyur ro// bstod par 'gyur ro// mi nga 'dzin pa byas par 'gyur ro// phyag rgya bdun po de dag ni gsang sngags sgrub pa thams cad dang/ kun tu las thams cad la sbyar bar bya'o//thams

sa[z///]cad byed pa'i phyag rgya'ajig rten las 'das pa'i lam bla na mad pa yin no// gang zhing phyag rgya de dag bcings mthong zhing khrus legs par byas te/ gtsang mas sgrub par byed pa 'di ni ngan 'gror
'gro bar mi 'gyur ro// ston gyi sgrib pas dmyal ba mthong bar mi 'gyur/ phyag rgyabatsanges pa tsam gyis mod la yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag bdun gyi drung du/
dgaba'i rtsa ba bsags par 'gyur ro// bsod nams kyi phung po chen po kun tu bzung bar 'gyur ro// pha rol tu phyin pa drug yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// sa bcu la rab tu gnas par 'gyur ro//
phyir mi ldog pa'i gnas rab tu thob par 'gyur ro// mtshamasumed pa lnga byed pa dang/ dam pa'i chos sbyong ba dang/ 'phags pa la skur pa 'debs pa dang/ mnar med pa la kazhol ba rnams kyis
tsas phug rgyabazung ba tsam dang/ bstan pa tsam gyis bod la sdig pa de dag thams cad rnam par zhig par 'gyur ro// sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyis yongs su bzung bar
'gyur ro// lha dang/ klu dang/ gnod sbyin dang/ srin po dang/ 'byung po dang/ sha za la sogs pa rnams las legs par bsrungs bar 'gyur ro// dbang phyug dang dbang phyug chen po dang//

rgyal po chen po bzhi dang/ gshin rje dang/ chu lha dang/ lus ngan dang/ gzhon nu rnams rtag tu rgyun mi 'chad par bsrung ba dang/ bskyab pa dang/ sba ba'i phyir rgyun du rjes su 'brang ba byed par 'gyur
ro/ sems can thams cad dga' ba mthong bar 'gyur ro// mchod rten du gyur pa yin par 'dod pa dang/ lus ring bsrel gyi snying po yin nga ra'agyur ro// rdo rje ltamakhreg
pa'i lus su 'gyur ro// dug gis mi tshugs/ mas ma yin/ mtshon gyis ma yin/ nus ma yin/ dbyig dug gi 'jigs pas ma yin/ seng ge s ma yin/ gcan gzan gtum posam yin/
ba dug mi bzad paso ma yin/ rkun po dang mi rgod kyis ma yin/ khyim rdzib pas ma yin/ gnod sbyin dang/ srin po'i gdon yapa'ong bar mi 'gyur/ nad thams cad 'jug par mi 'gyur/ lus
la dug sbyar ma dang/ byang dang/ spyod gtong gi 'jigs pa 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro// rtag tu sdig pa can gyi rmilam mthong bar mi 'gyur ro// rtag tude bzhin gshegs pa lta ba mthong bar 'gyur
ro byang chub sams dpa' lta ba mthong bar 'gyur ro// rtag tu 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyuga mthong sta/ rtag tu mchog sbyin pa mdzad par 'gyur ro// lta thams cad kyang rtag tu rgyun/
mi 'chad par 'disa mthong bar dgyes par 'gyur ro// rtagatu yon tan dang bsod nams 'bar ro// dpal gyis lus la shin tu 'bar ba'i lus su 'gyur ro// thams cad du 'di mchod par
'os pa chen por 'gyur te/ rgyal po dang/ blon po dang/ bram ze dang/ khyim bdag dang/ btsun mo'i 'khor gyis mchod par 'os pa chen por 'gyur ro// lha'i gnas sum cu rtsa gnyis kyi bar
ba[d ]du'ang dgyes par 'gyur te mchod par byed do// lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin lha'i bdag po dang/ tshangs pa dang/ khyab 'jug dang/ dbang phyug chen po dang/ gshin rje dang/ chu lha dang/
lus ngan po dang/ gzhon nu dang/ drang srong gi tshogs rnams kyis mchod par 'osapa chen por 'gyur ro// sems can thams cad kyang rtag tu de mthong bar 'dod par 'gyur ro// rtag tu
dgyos par ston par bzhed par 'gyur ro// rig sngags 'chang bas khrus byas gos gtsang ma bgos te gtsang mar byas la dri sna tshogs kyis lus bsku ba dang/ bdug po sna tshogs kyis
bdug pa byas la/tsanadan dkarapo dang gur kum gyis lag pa gnyis bskus ta/ ga pur dang gla rtsis bsgos pa'i sa phyogs gtsang mar rus ris kyi sku gzugs kyi snyan s 'am/ sangs
rgyas kyi sku gzugs kyi spyan snga 'am/ 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi sku gzugs kyi spyan sngar skyil mo krung bcas te 'dug nas phyag rgyu 'di btsong bar bya'o// mchod/
rten ring bsro la can gyi drung du phyag rgya bcing bar bya'o// sangs rgyas la mchod pa'i tshogs yon chab la sogs pa dbul bar bya'o// byams pa dang snying rje'i sems su bya'o// sems
can thams cad la lhag par brtse ba dang snying rje'i sems bsgom par bya'o// sems can thams cad la bu gcig pa dang 'dra bar shes par bya'o// 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug
yid la dran par bya'o// sangs rgyas yid la byed pa dran pa bsgom par bya ste/ phyag rgya chen po bdun po de dag ni bcing ba byas n phyag rgya bye ba phrag bdun bcanges par 'gyur ro//
de nas mthu brjod par bya'o// mthuni'ajig rten las 'das pa yang dag par mthong ba dang/ don yod pa'i zhags pa'i cho 'phrul dang/ rang bzhin gyi sku mngon du mthong ba yin no// rgyal po 'am/
btsun mo'i nang du 'am/ skya bo mang po'i nang du tshogs pa 'am/ dge slong gi tshogs kyi dge 'dun gyi nang du 'am/ 'khor du bcas pa'i nang du'am/ rig byed bzhi tshogs pa dang/ dag sbyong dang//
bram ze dang/ rgyal rigs dang/ bud med dang/ skyes pa dang/ khye'u dang/ bu mo dang/ rje'u rigs dang/ dmangs rigs dang bcas pa de dag gi nang du de dag gis don yod pa'i zhags pa'i cho 'phrul
'jigarten las 'das pa mod la mngon du mthong ba dang/ 'das pa dang/ ma 'ongs pa dang/ da ltar byung ba'i 'chib dang/ skya ba dang/ skyas nas yang dag par dge ba dang mi dge ba'i 'bras bu
dang/ dge ba dang mi dge bsag bdung/ skyes nas phyug po 'am/ dbul po 'am/ rgyal po thob pa 'am/ lha'i longs spyod dang/ lha gnas sumacu rtsa gnyis dang/ brgya byin dang/ tshangs pa dang/
khyab 'jugadang/ rtag tu dbang phyug por 'gyur ba dang/ klu'i skye gnas dang/ yi dgas dang/ gnod sbyin dang/ srin po gsang ba pa rnams kyis dmyal ba mi bzad par skyo ba dang/ mtshams
ba/ mad pa la thug gi bar du mthong ba dang/ bram ze'i rigs sam/ rgyal rigs sam/ gzhan yang rigs du ma sna tshogs par skye bar mthong ba dag 'jig rtenamagon po'i mthus mngon sum du mthong
bar 'gyur ro/ 'jig rten pa'i las bsgrub par bya ba de dag thams cad bstan par bya ste/ rgyal ba dang/ rnam par rgyal ba dang/ bde ba dang/ lo legs pa dang/ lo nyis pa dang/ mi ngas dang/
yams kyi nad dang/ pha rol gyi 'khor ram/rang gi 'khor la gnod pa dang/ dgra dang/ phyir rgol ba dang/ 'gyed pa dang/ g.yul sprod pa dang/ tshe ring ba dang/ tshe thung ba dang/ nad 'byung ba dang//
nad mad pa dang/ char 'bab ba dang/ shin tu char 'bab pa dang/ char mi 'bab pa dang/ dus ma yin pa 'bab pa dang/ dar ba dang/ rgyud pa dang/ 'byor pa dang/ mi 'byor pa dang/ 'o
ba dang/ 'gro ba dang/ nor dang/ 'bru rnyed pa dang/ 'phel ba dang/ bri ba dang/ le nyes pa mthong ba dang/ 'khor ban da ltar gyi las gang cung zado legs par byed pa dang/ nyes par byed pa dang//
bge ba 'am/ mi dge ba'am/ 'bri ba'am/ 'phel ba 'am/ skya ba legs par skye ba 'am/ nganapar s+ya ba 'am/ bu 'byung ba bu pho 'amaM/ bu mo 'am/ bu bzang po 'am/ bu ngan pa 'am/ bsod
nams can nam/ bsod nams med pa mngal na gnas pa de dag bden pa nyid du mthongs/ las kyi cho ga legs par byas bas thetsom mi bya'o// tshes grangs dang/ rgyu skar dang/ nyin mtshan
brjod par bya mi dgos kyi/ bzlas brjod dang/ gtor ma dang/ gtsang sbra dang/ bkrubashal dang/ shin tu khrus bya ba dang/ gos gtsang ma bcang ba dang/ bden par
bdang/ byams pa'i sams dang/ blam lA legs pa'i manyan pa de gzung ba kho nar bya'o// zas dang/ skom gtsam dang/ chang dang/ sha dang/ begatsong dang/ sgog skya dang/ ke'u dang/ 'dres
par byas pa'i 'dres pa'i zas yongs su spang ba dang/ shin tu 'thags pa dang/ de dag khyad par 'dod pas yongs su slang bar byas nas/ las 'di ni mod la thams cad mngon du mthong
bar 'gyur ro// dka' thub spyod pa la bsas sems mi bya/ ma gus pa mi bya'i/ lkog tu'ang mi bya'o// rjes su bstan pa de dgana mchog yin no// bsgrub par bya ba mchog de dag ni 'jig rten dbang/
phyug mgon pos bka' stsal pa yin no// dngul las ma lang chu zheng du sor bcu drug pa byas la/ zangs las pad+mo'i gdan khru gang gi tshadasdong bu dang bcas par bya'o// me long gi gong du dngul lam/
gosar las 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug don yod pa'i zhags pa bya ste/ tshad sor bzhi pa/ gdan pat+taM/ phyag bzhil mdung rtse gsum pa dang/ zhags pa dang/ pad+madung/ nor bu rin po che

a/ thogs par bya ba ni 'jog sbyong legs par byas pa/ 'jam po 'od phyin pa tsam du sbyang bar bya'o// de nas rig sngags 'chang bsam long gi gong gi 'jig rten dbang phyug gi sku la ring bsrel gzhug par ]
bya'o// ga bur dang rgya rtsis sku la mchod par bya'o// me long gi nye 'khor blog thag tu dngul gyi me tog dang/ gser gyi me tog rin po che sna tshogs kyis sbas pa'i 'phrang ba gdags par bya'o//

dbang bskur ba'i dar gdags par bya'o// de nas rig sngags 'chang bas me long de la nyi ma re re zhing dus gsum du don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod bya ste/ ji tsamabargyad
stong tshang gi bar du bya'o// khro bo'i rgyal pos dbang bskur bar bya'o// de nas ma long 'bar bar 'gyur ro// gcig kho nar kha dog sna tshogs pa 'bar bar 'gyur ro// 'jig rten dbang phyug gi
sku gzugs de las lha rdzas kyi chu 'dzag go/ 'od zer sna tshogs 'byung ngo// de nas rig sngags 'chang gi lus 'bar zhing dga' bar 'gyur ro// don yod par dga' ba dri ma med pa zhes bya ba
don yod pa'i zhags pa'i sing pa'i tshog zhibamo grub pa thob par 'gyur ro// lus shin tu dri ma med cing yongs su dag par 'gyur ro// de nas rig sngags 'chang bas 'jig rten thams cad kyi
mngon sum du don yod pa'i zhags pa rnam par 'phrul pa 'grub pa bstan par bya dgos pas/ de nas rig sngags 'chang bas sa dang ba'i lci ba bsras pa'i dkyil 'khor rgyur khru bzhi/ 'phang dukhru

dopa byas pa/ shin dumakhregs pa/ shin tu 'jam par bya'o// thig skud kyis rnam par phye zhing tshon sna tshogs rnam par dbye zhing sgo bzhi rnam par phye nas dkyil 'khor gyi dbus kyi snying po rnam par[h]
phya ste/ pad+ma 'dab ma brgya rtsa brgyar tshon gyis gsal bar bri zhing pad+ma'i dkyil du ge sar dang ze ba bya'o// stags bu gru bzhi la rin po che sna tshogs kyis brgyan pa dang/
stags bu'i gra bzhir rgyal po chen po bzhi go cha bgos pa/ gtum pa/ 'jigs pa byed pa'i gzugs bri bar bya'o// stegs bu'i dbus kyi gnas bar bar du lha dbang phyug dang/ dbang phyug chen
po dang/ gshin rjedang/ chu lha dang/ gzhon nu dang/ lus ngan po dang/ tshangs pa dang/ khyab 'jug dang/ dbang phyug chen po dang/ lha dbang phyug chen po dang/ phyagon rdo rje dang/ ral pa gtsag pa
dang sgrol ma dang/ dkar bo dang/ khro gnyer ma dang/ rdo rje pho nya po rnams chon sna tshogs kyis bri zhing rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa/ me tog sna tshogs thogs pa bya'o// stags bu'i phyi rol du

mdung rtse gsum pa'i 'phreng ba dang/ rdo rje'i 'phreng ba dang/ pad+ma'i 'phrang ba kun tu bya'o// 'phrung ba'i bar dbus dang grwa'i bar du lha mo brgyud bya ste/ 'jigs byed ma dang/ dpald pa dang/ ba
san ti dang/ dpal dang/ sgra dbyangs dang/ sa'i lha mo dang/ dung can ma dang/ pus pa dan ti rnams rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa/ me tog sna tshogs dang ni po che'i snod thogs par bya'o//

phyi rol thog thag tu 'phreng ba'i bar bar du dri sna tshogs kyis dkyil 'khor bsku zhing tsan dan dkar po dang gur kum gyis mchod pa sna tshogs bya'o// ga pur dang gla rtsis mchod cing dkyil 'khor kun
tu dar snatshon sna lnga'i rgyal mtshan dang/ mda' dang/ rna babs kyis brgyan par bya'o// dngul gyi snod bzhi chung bong gis bkang ste gzhag par bya'o/ dngul gyi snod bzhi gtor ma dkar gsum gyis/
dgang bar bya'o// dngul gyi snod bzhir mchod yon gyi chu gzhag par bya'o// snod brgyad ro sna tshogs kyi gtor mas dgang bar bya'o// 'bras bu rnam pa sna tshogs gzhag par bya'o// kha zas
bza' ba dang gtor ma rnam pa sna tshogs gzhag par bya'o// dri sna tshogs dang byugapas dngul gyi snod bkang ste gzhag par bya'o// dngul gyi pog por brgyad tsan dan dang/ a ka ru dang/ du
ru ka dang 1 ga pur dang/ gla rtsi dang/ gur kum dang/ sra rtsi pog dang/ pog gis gang bar bya zhing bdug spos sna tshogs pas bsrag go/ dngul dang/ zangs dang/ gsar gyi me tog gi snying
po'i dkyil 'khor du gcal du dgramamo// phyi'i dkyil 'khor du ji ltar red pa'i me tog gcal dudagram par bya ste/ 'phreng ba rnams khor yug lubaskor nas bzhag ste/ de la'ang me longaleg
par brgyan par byas nas/ dbus kyi dkyil 'khor gyi pad+ma' ge sar dang ze'u 'bralashar du phyogs par gzhag par bya'o// rig sngags 'chang gtsang mkhrus byas gos gtsang ma bgo bar bya ste/
dkyil 'khor gyi las dang bya ba thams cad byas nas/ ma long la mngon du phyogs te skyelamo krung du 'dug par gyur nas/ 'phags pa don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po'i bzlas brjod dbul
bar bya ste/bzlas brjod brgya rtsa brgyad rdzogs pa dang/ khro bo'i rgyal pos dbang bskur ro// dbang bskur ba tsam gyis mod la 'jig rten thams cad kyi mngon sum dang
[】 ]'khor chen po'i dbus su ma 'di ga dbus der/ 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug rang gi gzugs kyis mthong ste/ me long gi dbus de nas rig sngags 'chang de la legs so zhes bya ba
wa1 sbyin par mdzad do// rig sngags 'chang chen po legs so legs so// bdag la don yod pa'i mi long la 'bebs pa'i de khon nyid dam par gyur pa 'di thamasacad yang dag par mthong ste/ 'jig
rton dang 'jigarten las 'das pa'i las kyi 'bras bu bla na med pa zhes bya ba yongs su dag pa nyid do// rig sngags 'chang khyod kyis 'bras bu chen po 'jig rten las 'das pa'i lam mtshungs pa
med pa thob bo// khyod kyis don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po'i 'jig rten dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i sgrub pa'i cho ga dang/ chog zhib mo dang/ dkyil 'khor dang/ phyag rgya grub po// rig sngags
ma 'chang 'jig rten dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i mchog gang 'dod pa smos shig/ de thams cad sbyin bar bya'o zhes so// de nas rig sngags 'chang gis mchog gang don du gnyer ba de byas na thams
cad 'phral nyid du sbyin par byed do// 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor gang yin pa der kun nas 'ongs ba'i bud med dang/ skyes pa dang/ khye'u dang/ bu mo dang/ dge sbyong dang/ bram ze dang/ rgyal rigs
dang dmangs rigs dang/ rje'u rigs dang/ rgyal po dang/ blon po dang/ bkrabs pa dang/ mdun na 'don dang/ btsun mo'i 'khor du kun 'ongs pa dang/ bsod nams dang ldan pa 'am/
bsod nams dang mi ldan pa 'ab/ yongs su dag pa 'am/ lta ba ngan pa ma/ gzhan romyal ba pa'i sems can gti mug gi mun pa la lhung ba/ mnar med pa la gzhol ba/ mtshams med pa
lnga byed pa/ 'phags pa la skur pa 'debs pa/ dam pa'i chos song ba gang yin pa de rnams thams cad la'ang/ 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi lus de la ston par byed/ thams
cad du sba bar byed/ yang dag par dbugs 'byin par byed/ thams cad du rang gi las dge ba 'am mi dge ba'i 'bras bu rnam par smin pa de thams cad ston par byed do// rig sngags kyis chom rkun

dang/ gdol pa dang/ ga sngag spong zhing nyam par byed pa nga/ rig sug sun 'byin par byed pa dang/rig sdug lam dad cing gus pas mi nyan pa de'i mi mthong ba ni ma gtogs te/ gzhan du na rang gi las kyi 'bras bu sdug bsngal
rnam pa sna tshogs nges par 'byung bar mthong ngo// de nas sems can de rnams gang 'dod pa'i don yang la byed pa 'jug ste/ 'jig rten pa 'am 'jig rten las 'das pa de thams cad 'khor gyi dkyil
'khor chen por rang rang gi 'bras bu nges par 'byung ba/ bsod nams dang bsod nams ma yin pa'i 'bras bu mthong bar byed do// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sas rgyas kyi zhing mthong ngo/
de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku chen po dang/ khang pa brtsegs pa dang bcas pa'i gzhal yas khang mthong ngo// po Ta laka'i ri bo'i gzhal yas khang rnams bcom ldan 'das
kyi rnam par 'phrul pa dang bcas pa dang/ 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug 'khor dang bcas pa gzhal yas khangan lhadang klus yongs su bskor mthong ngo// gzhan ji ltar da ltar gyi
dge ba dang/ mi dge ba dang/ lo legs pa dang/ lo nyes pa dang/ nad dang/ 'chi ba dang/ tsho thung ba dang/ tshe ring ba dang/ rang gi dmag tshogs dang/ pha rol gyi dmag tshogs dang/ g.yul dang/
'khrug pa dang/ 'jigs pa dang/ rgyal ba 'am/ 'pham pa 'am/ brlag pa 'am/ ma brlag pa 'am/ yams sam/ char chas pa 'am/ dusam yin pa'i char ram/ char med pa 'am/ rlung
ngam sad dam/ tshad pa'i ng rung ste/ de dag thams cad mthong ngo// nor dang ldan pa 'am/ nyams pa 'am/ 'phel ba 'am/ lo tog gam/me tog gam/ 'bras bu 'phal ba'ang rung ste/ de dge
thams cad mthong ngo// chom rkun dang/ rkun po dang/ dug dang/ mtshonama'i 'jigs pa 'am/ rgyal bo'i 'jigs pa 'am/ gnod sbyin dang/ srin po dang/ 'byung po dang/ mkha' 'gro ma dang/

brjod byed kyi 'jigs pa de thams cad mthong ngo// nor chen po 'am nor med pa de thams cad mthong ngo// 'chi'apho ba dang skyo ba mthong ngo// bu thob pa dang/ gro dang/ grong khyer dang/ yul dang/ lces
0 thob kha dang/ bud med thob pa de thams cad mthong ste/ 'di la dogs pa dang/ yid gnyis dang/ the tsom bskyod par mi bya zhing/ mchog tu dang ba dang gus pas shin tu'abad de tsho ga 'di bsgrub par
bya'o// don yod zhags pa'i rnam par thar pa'i dkyil 'khor du 'jig rten las 'das pa'i sgrub thabs kyi cho ga rdzogs so///de nas yang gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po
lag na rdo rjes/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sams dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis/ don yod pa'i zhags
pa'i snying po gsungs pa cho ga zhib mo'i nye bar spyod pa dang bcas pa dang/ dkyil 'khor dang/ phyag rgya rim par phye ba dang ras ris shin tu zab pa/ shin tu gting dpag dka' zhing/ shin tu rgya che
la shin tu sgrub dka' ba dang/ dkyil 'khor mang po dang/ phyag rgya mang po dang/ gsang sngags mdabo dang/ ras ris mang po yongs su bsgrags pa rnams ni rab rib dang 'bral bar mthong ste//

bcom ldan 'das rgya mtsho chen po dug can pa zab ba lta bu/ lhunapo chen po dang mtshungs pa lta bu/ smig rgyu lta bu/ rdul phra rab lta bu/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes dang mtshungs pa lta bu/ bgrang
ba las yang dag par 'das pa/ mtshungs pa med pa/ gzhal du med pa/ tshad med pa/ bskal pa'i gras kyis bgrang bar bya ba med pa'i bskal pa'i tshad ma dang/ bskal pa bsam gyisami khyab
bya// pa'i tshad ma dang/ lha yul gyi tshad ma dang/ klu'i yul gyi tshad ma dang/ sems can gyi tshad ma dang/ de bzhin gshegs ba'i bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i tshad ma dang/ de bzhin/
