[】 ]gshegs pa'i spyan la snang ba'i tshad ma dang/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i ya shas la kun tu snangaba'i tshad ma dang/ byang chub sems dpa'i yashes kyi tshad ma dang/ bdud kyi yul gyi tshad ma rnams
kyis thogasamar dmigs pa ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das bar du'ang dmigs pa ma lags/ tha mar yang ma lags na/ bcom ldan 'das de ji ltar yongs su shes par bgyi/ sgrub pa
thabs kyi chos bsgrub par bya ba ni du zhig lags/ gsang sngags ni du zhig/ phyagargyan du ga/ dkyil 'khor ni du zhig bri bar bya ba'i phyag rgyan du zhig/ lag pa'i phyag rgya ni du zhig/
bdug pa'i sbyor bani du zhig/ mig smanan du zhig/ ril bun du zhig/ bdug pan du zhig/ ras risan du zhig/ rtsa ba'i gsang sngags ni du zhig/ snying po ni du zhig/ nyeba'i snying po ni du zhig/
khro bo'i gsangosAgs ni du zhag/ drag po ni du zhig/ zhiban du zhig/ yig gcig pa ni du zhig/ yi ga gnyis pa ni ru zhig/ yi ge gsum panaru zhig/ yi go bzhi ba ni du zhig/ yi ge lnga pani/
du zhig/ yi ge drug pa ni du zhig/ yi ge bdun pani du zhig/ yi ge brgyad pa ni du zhig/ yi ge dgu pan du ga/ yi ge bcu pani du zhig lags/ snyung bar gnas pa ji ltar lags/ nyin mo dang
'a mtshan mo ni ji ltar/ khrus kyi cho gan ji ltar/ gos bgos na ji ltar/ phyogs bcing ba na ji ltar/ dkyil 'khor bcing ba na ji ltar gtsug gtor bcing ban ji ltar/ bdag bsrung ban ji
ltar/ gzhan bsrung ba ni ji ltar/ grogs bsrung ban ji ltar/ slob ma bsrung ban ji ltar/ rab tu 'jug pa ni ji ltar/ phyag bya ba ni ji ltar/ bskor ba bya ba ni dza ltar/ mchod yon dang/
zhabs bsil dbul ba na ji ltar[） ]gtor ma 'bul ba ni dza ltar/ me tog 'bulaban ji ltar/ bdug pa na ji ltar/ dri ni ji ltar/ mar ma ni ji ltar/ nye regani ji ltar/ lha bshos ni ji ltar
thams cad du spyan drarab na ji ltar/ snyan gasan dpab pani dza ltar rmi lam bskul ba na rje ltar/ sbyin srog gi cho gni ji ltar lags/ zhibatsanan du zhig lags/ rgyas pa can ni duzhig/
mngon spyod can ni du zhig/ zhags pa ni du zhig/ rdo rjen du zhig/ pad+dan du zhig/ gshegs su gsol bani du zhage/ nye bar 'pho bar byed pa'i bya ba ni du zhag lags/ bcom ldan 'das
de dag gi mtshan nyid ci 'dra ba dang/ rgyu mtshan ci 'dra ba dang/ kun tu spyod par 'gyur ba ni mi shes so// bcom ldan 'das bdag las sgrub pa'i cho ga du zhig gis rjes su 'brang bar bgyi/
bcom ldan 'das ji ltar phyi ma'i dus phyi ma'i tshon sems can rnams kyi rjes su 'brang bar 'gyur/ dngos grub du zhig rjes su stsal bar bgyi/ ji ltar sems can bla na med par 'gyur bar/
bgyibcom ldan 'das 'di dag la bdag 'khrugs par gyur cing bdag la spobs pa mad do// bcom ldan 'das bdag gis shes par mi nusan/ bcom ldan
'das kyis cho ga'i mtshan nyid ji lta ba de dag bdag la gsungs gsol/ bcom ldan 'das bdag la thetsom mchis pas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag gi the tsom gcad du gsol/ de nas
bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pas zhu ba yongs su zhus par gyur pa gsan nas/ gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po lag
na rdo rje la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ lag na rdo rje mchog tu red par dka' ba 'di dri ba yongs su dris pa ni legs so legs so// lag na rdo rje khyod la yongs su 'dri bar byed pa'i spobs
pa rgyas pa ni/ lag na rdo rjesems can thams cad la phan pa'i phyir donagyi ched du yongs su zhus pa'i phyir dang/ rig sngags 'chang thams cad kyi mchog 'grub pa'i don du yongs su zhus pa'i

phyir dang/ lag na rdo rje 'di ni mchog tu rmad du byung bas te phyi bzhin du rjes su 'brang ngo// lag na rdo rje 'di ni sgyu ma lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin dang mtshungs pa'o// lag na rdo rjedon yod pa'izhugs
pa'i snying po'i chog zhib mo'i rgyal po chen po'i tsho ga/ rgya mtsho chen po dug can pa dang zab par mtshungs pa ste/ 'din gting dpag dka' ba'o// lag na rdo rje rgya mtsho chen po thigs pa'igrangs
ba0 gyis bgrang bar nus kyi/ lag na rdo rje don yodazhags pa'i snying po 'i tshadan gzung bar mi nusaso// lagan ji ri'i rgyal po ri rab ni rdul phra rab tu gtor ba'i grangs kyi mthar thug par bya
bar nus shing/ slar yang ri'i rgyal po'i rirab du gnas par 'dod pasarang gi gnas su rab tu gzhag par nus kyi don yod zhags pa'i snying po'i cho ga zhib mo'i tshad ni gzung bar mi nus so//
de ltar rgya chab/ de ltar gting dpag dka' ba/ de ltar zab pa ste/ lagan rdo rje 'das pa dang/ ma 'ongs pa dang/ da ltar byung ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs kyis mkhyen pa
dang/ gting dpag par ma nus so// don yod zhags pa'i snying po'i cho ga zhib mo'i tshad 'dzin par ni mi nus so// lagan rdo rje sbyam lta bu gangayin pa de dang/ snying po dang ting nge 'dzin gang yin
pa de dang/ zhags pa dang sgyu ma lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin gyi rnam par 'phrul pa 'di/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gisasems can rnamA
kyigazugs dang/ kha dog dang/ dbyibs sna tshogs pa dang/ tshul sna tshogs su mthong bar byed de/ sems can thams cad bsgral ba'isid dang/ rig sngags 'chang thams cad kyi dngos grub kyi
mchog sgrub par byed pa'o/ lag na rdo rje 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug thams cad du mnyam par 'gro ba ste/ gang du chu dang 'om
mnyam pas mnyam pa bzhinano// thams cad du mnyam pas byams pa dang snying rje chen po rgyas par byed do// don yod pa'i zhags pas 'gugs par byed la sgrol bar byed do//
[】 ]'chib mad pa'i thang rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor du 'jog par byed do// dman pa dang/ mchog dang/ bar ma dang/ rigs mthon po dang/ dma' ba dang/ ramyal ba dang/ byol song gi skyo gnas dang/ gshin
rje'i 'jig rten la sogs pa rnams thams cad du mnyam par dran par byed cing ming smos pa tsam gyis 'dzin par byed cing/ sems can thams cad bla na med par byed la/ dub pa dang/ ngal ba dang/ yid

mtsho la gcags par 'gyur ba med do// lha dang/ klu dang/ gnod sbyin dang/ dri tha dang/ lham yin rung/ nam mkha' lding dang/ mi 'am ci dang/ lto 'phye chen po dang/ srin po dang/ 'byung po dang/ brjed
[– ]byed dang/ yi dgas dang/ nags dang/ gshin rje'i gnas ji srid dus 'og gi nang du son pa rnams dang/ srid pa'i rtsomo nas mnaramed pa'i mthar thug pa dang/ ji sridapu'og min gyi srid pa'i bar du
gcig tu sems bskyar pas yongs su rgyug go/ lha dang klu dang bcas pa nas ji srid dud 'gro'i skyes gnas kyi bar thams cad dang/ bud med dang/ skyes pa dang/ khye'u dang/ bumo rnams bla na med par byed
do dper na nyi ma'i 'od zeran mun pas mdongs pa thams cad sel bar byed de/ 'dzam bu'i gling thams cad du mnyam par snang bar byed do// de bzhin nyid du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
ma 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug thams cad du snying rje chen pos kun tu snang bar byed cing/ thamicad la thams cad du mnyam par gnas te/ sdug bsngal gyi tshor ba dang/ 'jigs pa mi bzad
pa dang/ nad dang/ mya ngan dang/ sdug bsngal gyi 'ching ba rnams thams cad yongs su grol bar byed do// skya ba dang/ rgyu ba dang/ 'chi ba'i sdug bsngal yongs su grol bar byed do// mtho ris la gzhol
ba la sogs pa'i lam thams cad du 'god par byed do// de ltar snying rje chen po dang byams pa chen pos thamAcad du mnyam par rjes su 'gro ste/ thams cad du mnyam par mchog tu byed cing/ thams cad
dumanyam par byang chub kyi lam la rab tu dgod par byed do// thams cad du mnyam par skyabs dang dpung gnyen du 'gyur ro// lag na rdo rje de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras

gzigs dbang phyug ni brtan pa dang/ go cha dang/ spro ba chen posarig sngags 'chang thams cad dang/ sems can thams cad kyi don gyi ched du zhugs pa'o// lag na rdo rje 'di ni thabs cig tu 'jug pa chen po
ste/ sems can thams cad 'jigs pachen po'i lame las so sor ldog par byed pa'o// bdebasanas bde bar gshegs pa'i lam du 'god par byed pa'o// rtog pa mad cing rnam par rtog pa med la bsam
b rnam ba gzhan du 'gyur ba med do// sems kyis yid la gcags par 'gyur bamed do// de nas yang gnodasbyin gyi sde dpon chen po phyag na rdo rjes/ bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan snga nas byang chub sems
dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi yon tan sngags pa chen po 'di thos nas dga' ba dang/ mgu ba dang/ yarangs pa dang/ rab tu rangs
parang/ dga' ba dang/ yid bde ba skyes nas ched du brjod pa ni ched du brjod par gyur to// e mamagon po 'jig rten dbang phyug/ e ma 'jig rten dbang phyug bla ma/ khyod kyi ming gi yon tan bskyed
pas ngan 'gro thams cad grol bar byed do// phyagan rdo rjes/ byang chub sems dpa' la sa nga/ 'din 'jig rten gyi bla ma mgon po/ 'di ni 'jig rten gyi yab chen po/ 'di ni 'jig rten sgrol
ma bar byed pa'i mgon po// thub pa nyin mo'i nyima'o// bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// de ltabur lag na rdo rje ji ltar skya bar bgyid/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// lagan
rdo rje byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug can song la mngon par phyag 'tshal nas yongs su zhusashig/ mchog tu gyur pa'i dam tshig gi chog ji lta ba bzhin du

snying po dang/ de kho na nyid kyi rang bzhin de rnams ston par byed do// don yod zhags pa'i snying po'i cho ga zhib mo'i sgrub pa'i dngos grub ji lta ba bzhin du son par 'gyur zhing lung 'bogs par byed do//

de nas gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po lag na rdo rjes zab mo zab pa rtogs shing khong du chud deseng ge 'i rtsal gyis 'gro zhing/ rdo rje skor bar byed bazhin pas zla ba medzos pa drim med pa'i me tog bzung
nas/ byang nubasems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug ga la ba der dong ste lhags nas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras
gzigs dbang phyug gi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas lan gsum bskor ba byas te/ zla ba mdzes pa drim med pa'i me tog phul te/ pusamo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te//
byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdagashin tu rmongs pa dang ldan pa/ dran pa yongs su
mas pa/ blo'i dpal zhum pa ste/ don yod zhags pa'i snying po'i gsang sngags dang/ phyag mang po dang/ ras ris kyi slab pa'i chog shin tu rgyas pa 'di dang de dag ma shes so// sngonam ni
du zhig/ bar man du zhig/ thaman du zhig/ rtsa ba'i gsang sngags ni du zhug/ sIng pon du zhig/ nye ba'i snying pon du zhag/ ji srid du yi ge bcu pa'i bar gyi gsang sngags ni du zhag/ dkyil 'khor
dang/ tshog zhib mo dang/ ras ris ni du zhig lags/ bcom ldan 'das bdag la skabs dbye bar gsol zhes so// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras
gzigs dbang phyug gis/ phyag na rdo rjel brtsa ba'i don du zla ba mdzes pa drim med pa'i me tog blangs nas/ bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa'i don du nam mkha'i dbyis su gtor ro// gtor ma thag/
tu bcom ldan 'das kyi dbu'i stong gi mtshan s su 'khor lo' rnam par gnas so// dpag tshad lnga brgyar khyab cings gzhi las gyen du 'phags pa nyid kyi ji srid 'og min gyi
gnas kyi bar du gnas te/ bi zlum sngon po chen po'i sdong bu la// 'dzam bu'i chu bo'i gsar gyi dril bu dpyangs pa'i ba dan bcings pas mdzes shing 'bar bar yongs su gyur to// 'khor lo'i
ga rnam pa legs par yongs su 'khor bani ma bye ba brgya stong phrag bas lhag pa'i kun tu snang ba/ legs bar yongs su dag pa/ yongs su byang ba/ shin tu dri mamod pa'i gsar gyi mchod
song rnam par mdzes par shin tu gnas pa/ nor bu rin pa mi chen po sna tshogs pas smras pa/ dga' bar bya ba/ yid kyi shing rta rab tu tshim par byed pa dang/ dga' ba'i bya ba mthong ba//
lha dang lha ma yin gyis phyag bya bar 'os pa dang/ rjed par bya bar 'os pa dang/ drang srong rnams kyis bstod par 'os pa dang/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis lung bstan par 'os
pa ste/ thams cad du zla ba mdzes pa dri ma med pa'i ma tog gi ge sar la/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku bzhugs pa'i rin po che sna bdun gyi khang pa brtsegs par 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor gyis
yongs su bskor nas bzhugs pa la/ gdugs kun nas yongs su 'khor ba'i lha rdzas kyi gzhal med khang dang/ lha dang/ klu dang/ chus byung dang/ lha'i bu mo dang/ klu'i bu mo dang/ ma a
ci'i bu mo dang/ lha dang/ klu dang/ gnod sbyin dang/ dri za dang/ lham yin dang/ mi'am ci dang/ lto 'phye chen po dang/ rig sngags 'chang dang/ rig pa 'dzan pa brgya stong phrag gis lha rdzas
kyi ma tog snyatshogs pa'i gzholamad khang dang/ lha rdzas kyi rgyan dang/ gos dang/ lhab lhub kyisabargyan cing/ dar dpyas dang/ ba dan dang/ dri dang/ 'phreng ba dang/ byug pa dang/ phye ma dang/
chos gos dang/ gdugs dang/ rgyal mtshan dang/ ba dan rnams thogs te/ bcom ldan 'das dang 'khor gyi dkyil 'khoral mchod pa byed par gyur to// lha rdzasasna tshogs pa'i mchod pa'i sprin gyi
char 'bab par gyur cing/ lha'i dri za'i glu dbyangs yang dag par len cing/ rdzad ng pag rdob rnams kyis mchod pa'i don du rol mo byed par gyur to// po Ta la'i ri bor gzhalamad khang 'khor gyi dkyil
'khor dang bcas paru ca co'i sgra chen po sgrogs par 'gyur to// boT la kar gnas pa'i lha dang/ klu dang/ gnod sbyin dang/ dri za dang/ lham yin dang/ nam mkha' lding dang/ mi 'am ci dang/ lto 'phye/
chen bo gang yin pa rnams kyang samasatshams par thob cing rmad du byung bathob bo// de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs kyi dkyil 'khor ba'i lha gang yin pa rnams dang/ pad+marigasakyi dkyil 'khor gyi lha
gang yin pa rnams dang/ rdo rje'i rigs kyi dkyil 'khor ba'i lha gang yaMnib rnams dang/ nor bu'i rigs kyi dkyil 'khor gyi lha gang yin pa rnams dang/ glang po rigs kyi dkyil 'khor ba'i lha gang yin
pa rnams dang/ dkyil 'khor chen po'i lha gang yin pa de rnams thams cad mchog tu ya mtshan pa dang ldan zhing rmad du byung ba thob ste/sems tshems skyes la ngo mtshar ba thob nas/

bcom ldan 'das la lta bar byed bzhin du kun tu gnas par gyur to// zla ba dang/ nyi ma dang/ rgyuskar dang/ skar ma'i tshogs dang/ lha dang/ mtshan mo'i lha dang/ dbang po dang/ tshangs pa dang/ khyab 'jug

dang dbang phyug chen po dang/ gzhon nu dang/ dga' byed dbang phyug dang/ tshogs kyi dbang phyug dang/ nag po chen po dang/ dbang phyug dang/ dbang phyug chen po dang/ tshang ris kyi lha'i bu dang/ rgyal po chen po
bzhi dang/ nor bu bzang po dang/ gang ba bzang po dang/ stobs kyi lha dang/ gshin rje dang/ mu lha dang/ lus ngan gyi lha rnams dang/ gzhon nu'i lha rnams gdugs kyi yu ba nas bzung nas
bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa byed par gyur to// lha'i gzhal med khang chen po lha'i rnam par sprul pa'i mchod pa'i sprin gyi mchod pa byed do// gdugs kyi rnam pa'i khor yug ginang du dga' ldan
gyi lhadang/ 'og min gyi lha dang/ lha'i gnas thams cad du lha'i bus yongs su bskor ba gang yin pa de nam mkha' la mchod pa'i sprin chen pos bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa dang/ spyan ras
gzigs kyi dbang phyug gi 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor la mchod pa byed do// sa'i lha dang/ klu dang/ gnod sbyin dang/ srin po dang/ dri zo gang yin pa rnams dang/ sa gzhi'i lha dang/ chu'i lha dang//
nags kyi lha dang/ lo tog gi lha dang/ sman gyi lha gang yin pa de rnams thams cad sa'i mthil gyi gzhal yas khang de sbyong bar byed par gyur te/ dri sna tshogs pa'i chus chag chag 'dabs shing/
dristsatshogs pa'i bye mas byug par byed/ me tog sna tshogs gcal du 'grems shing/ bdug pa sna tshogs kyis bdugs nas sa'i dkyil 'khor yang dag par brgyan par gyur to// de ltar rnam par
'phrul pa'i sgo skabs rgyachen po ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i khyu mchog/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i dam tshig byin gyis rlob pa'o// de nas gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po lagan rdo rjes/ de lta bu'i
rdzu 'phrul gyi rnam par 'phrul pa chen po langs pa rgya chen po mthong nas/ shin tu ya mtshan pa thob cing rmad du byung ba thob ste/ 'di ltar sems par gyur to// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gas bstan ba ni shin tu ya mtshan no// de nas gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po lagan rdo rjes/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phag
pagazigs dbang phyug la slar yang gsol ba btab bo// bcom ldan 'das skabs dbye bar mdzod cig// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyanaras gzigs
dbang phyug gis/ kaMnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po lagan rdo rje la 'di skad ces smras so// lag na rdo rje dogs pa bsal ba dang thatsom gcod pa la rjes su gzung ngo// de nas byang chub sems dpa'
sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug stan las langs te/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas lan gsum bskor
ba byas te/ bcom ldan 'adas kyi sman star 'khod nas mig mi 'dzumazhibazhin rab tu 'dzum pa lus 'od zer 'bar bas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag

la don yod zhags pa'i dkyil 'khor dang/ pad+mayangs pa'i rnam par 'phrul pa dang/ pad+magatsugator gyi nor bu'i dkyil 'khor dang/ don yod zhags pa'i gsang ba spyam lta bu'i sIng po dang da phyagargyu dang/
kun tu spyan ras gzigs kyi dkyil 'khor chen po'i rim par phye ba mchis te/ bcom ldan 'das de dag bdag gis bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar yongs su bsgrags par bgyi'o// sgrub pa sla zhing bkag
pas 'grub pa dam tshig mchog tu gyur pa'i snying po nye bar bstan par bgyi'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thubo pas phyag gser gyi kha dog can/ 'od zer sAtshogs pa bye ba
khrag khrig brgyastong phrag gis yang dag par brgyan pa brkyang nas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyanaras gzigs dbang phyug gi spyi bo'i gtsug tu phyag 'jog par mdzad cingeng/ sems
can dag pa chen po legs so legs so// spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang phyug nga lta de'i dus la bab par shesanasmyos shig/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras
ma gzigs dbang phyug gis/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bskul bar rig nas phyogs bcur kun tu bltas te/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la phyag byas nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la
kun tu baltas ti/ rtsa ba'i gsang sngags don yod zhagaso ba'i pad+magatsug tor gyi nor bu don yod zhags pa'i snying po gsungs so// don yod pa'i snying po'i dkyil 'khor du pad+magatsug tor gyi gsang
ba'i rnam par 'phrul pa dris pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga dang po ni/ dus gsum du gshegs shing rab tu bzhugs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyigatsug tor don yod pa gsang ba'i dkyil
'khor gyi sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo// 'das pa dang/ ma byon pa dang/ da ltar byung ba'i rang sangs rgyas dang/ 'phags pa nyan thos kyi dge 'dun thams cad
la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsang ba'i rigs kyi snying po'i dam tshig rnams la phyag 'tshalaM 'a// yang dag par song ba rnams la phyag 'tshal lo// yang dag par
zhugs pa rnams la phyag 'tshal lo// blo gros chen po'aphags bshAri dwa ti'i bu la phyag 'tshal lo// 'phags pa byams pa la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags
pa'i tshogs kyi mchog rnams la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'phags pa 'od dpag tu med pa la phyag 'tshal lo// dkon mchog
gsum la phyag 'tshal lo// pad+mo'i gtsug tor gyi dkyil 'khor 'char ba la phyag 'tshal lo// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs
dbang phyug thugs rje chen po la phyag 'tshal lo// drang srong chen po 'phags pa'i tshogs kyi mchog rnams la phyag 'tshal lo// de rnams la phyag 'tshal lo// rnam par thar pa'i dkyil 'khor
'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi zhal nas gsungs pa/ don yod pa'i rgyal po'i pa gtsug tor gyi snying po de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyan sngar gsungs pa 'di bdag gis da ltar

'khor chen po la bshad par bgyi'o// dpya thA/ mo pad+mo ts+tshi kha ba ra da hU~M/ tsar tsa ra/ tsa ri tsir/ tshur tshu ru/ mahAkA ru Ni ka/ tsa ra tse ra/ pi ri pa'o/ tsir tsa ra/ par ma kA ru Ni ka/ si nas

[E]'i/ phyir tsa ri/ pa ri pi ri/ bi ri bar/ mahApahahaM/ ka la ka la/ ki li ki li/ ku lu ku lu/ mahA shud d+ha satwA/ abyahi/ bu d+hu bud+hu/ d+hA bsnyub/ ka Ta ka Ta/ ki Ti ki Ti/ ku T+Ta ku cu/ pa ra

ma shud rtasatwA/ kar kar/ ki ri ki ri/ ku ru ku ru/ mahA sbyam prapA/ tsa la tsa la/ sany+tsal/ bi tsa la/e Na Da a Ta Ta/ b+ha ra b+ha ra/ b+hi ro b+hir/ b+hu ru b+hu ru/ mahA bim la/ pad+mo b+heSha ba ra dza sAd+ha
ya hUM hUM/ e rgya hi/ mahA kA ru Ni ka/ mahA pa shu pa ti/ be Ti lhar/ b+ha ra d+ha ra/ mahApaNo b+hor/ sa ra sa ra/ sarba A ba ra Na har/ tsa ra tsar/ sarbabcud+ha ra ma ta/ ha ra ha ra sam+paki7

kha ha ra hA hA hAhA/ nIhIhUM hUM/ hu hu hu hU/ o kAr brah+ma ba kha dar/ lhar b+ha ra/ b+hir hi'i/ myur sgyur/ mahApad+ma dzA lA d+ha ra/ ta ra ta ra/ sa ra sa ra/ po ra par/ pats+tshapAshad+har/ tsa ra tsa ra/ bar
ba ra bar rasha ta sa ha sra/ pra timaNA tasha rI rA ya/ dz+wa la dz+wa la/ ta pa ta pa/ lha ga bAn so masAri skya yam/ ba run/ kube ra/ brany+tsa/ in/ ra rig Na/ de ba ga Na/ a h+phu rtsi ta/ tsa ra

Na su ru su ru/ tsu ru tsu ru 1 pu ru puru/ mu ru mu ru/ sa nata ku mAr/ ru tra/ bAs ba/ biSh+Tha/ b+han da/ de ba ro Ti/ nA yaka/ bshu/ bi bit+ta/ bo Sha d+har/ mahApad+ma doNA d+ha ra/ pAshad+har/ d+har

b+ha ra d+hi ri d+hi ri/ d+hu ru d+hu ru tha ra thar/ g+ha ra g+ha ra/ ya ra ya rad la ra lar/ har har/ pa ra par/ sa ra sa ra/ tsa ra tsa ra/ bar ba ra/ ma hAb ra pAr ya ka/ sa man ma la/ a ba lo ka u0f7ata/

lo ke shwa ra/ ma heshwa ra/ mu hu mu'u/ mu ru mu ru/ mu ya mu ya/ muny+tsa muny+tsa/ b+ha ga ban Ar+ya a ba lo ki te shwa ra/ rak+Sha rakA/ ma ma sarba b+ha ya sgyu / sarla u pa dra bye sbya/ sam+bagra he
sarbadzu re glu/ sarba byA d+hi/ b+han d+ha b+han d+han tu kha na tardzan/ rAdzatsor/ tas ra/ ag+haM/ u da ka ba la/ shasA/ pa ra mo tsa ka/ ka Ta ka Ta/ ki Tika Ni/ ku tsu ku cu/ tsa ra tsa ra/
in+d+rib la/ bo d+haM ga/ tsi turAr+ya sarkya/ saM prakAshAka/ tam tam/ dam dam/ sam sam/ sam sam/ mahA tamon+nAkAr/ bi d+hapan/ ShaT pA ra mi tA pa ri pu ra ka/ mi li mi la/ Ta Ta Ta Ta
[R]ba zhatsa/ Ti ki Ti Di/ Ni'i titaM bya khyu khu khu/a tsa zha/ a ne ya tsam kr-i ta ba ri kar e hi/ IshAr/ ma ha shA ra/ pad+mashA ra/ mahAb+hA ta ga Na/ sa b+hany+dzaka/ mahA

sit+tisA ra/ ku ru ku ru/ bar pa ra/ ka Ta ka Ta/ ma Ta ma Ta/ bishud+d+hab Sha ya/ nibA sin/ ma hA kA ru NikA/ shwa ta ya dz+wa pa bi ta rata na ma ku Ta/mA lA d+ha ra/ sarba dzA shi ro si kri ta ma ku Ta ma han+tu te

kamaM lAlaM kri ta/ ka' tul/ rgyunas mA d+hi/ bimo kA pramA/ b+ha hu satwa samAti/ pa ri pA tsaka/ mnAkA ru Ni ka/ sarba karma a ba ra Na bi sho d+ha ka/ sarbabu d+hi pramo tsa ka/sarba AshA pa ri pU ra ka acha
satA sa ma shAs ka/ o paron+ti'i pAshad yaman+dAlanamos te sAhA/ 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis don yod zhags pa'i pad+ma gtsug tor gyi gsang ba'i snying po'i dkyil 'khor 'di
gsung ma thag tu/ stongagasum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sa gzhir cher g.yos par gyur te/ ri dang/ nags dang/ dgon par bcas pa rnam par 'gyur ba drug tu g.yos par gyur to// kun

nas sa'i mthil 'di'ang rin po che sna bdun gyi rang bzhin gyi pad+ma'i gdan kun nas bting bur 'gyur to// bcom ldan 'das phyag na pad+mo'i lte ba'i gnas ni pad+mochen po gyen du 'phags pa 'dabam stong pa/

rin po'i sna bdun gyi rang bzhin/ bzla son po chen po'i sdong bu dang/ 'dzam bu chu bo'i gser gyisnying po dang/ mu tig dmar po'i ze'u 'bru dang/ lha'i mu tig chen po'i gsar dang gcig tu 'bar bar 'gyur
pa/ 'od zer sna tshogs pa 'byin par byed pa ste/ 'di lta ste/ sngon po dang/ ser bo dang/ dmar po dang/ dkar po dang/ btsod dang/ shel dang/ dngul gyi kha dog tu snang bzhin pas 'bar zhing rnam par
gsal la lhung ba'o// phyogs bcu kun tu sangs rgyas kyi 'di rnams su kun tu snang bar byed do// lha'i gnas dang/ klu'i gnas dang/ gnod sbyin gyi gnas dang/ srin po'i gnas dang/ dri za'i gnas dang/

lha ma yin gyi gnas dang/ nam mkha' lding gi gnas dang/ mi 'am ci'i gnas dang/ lto 'phye chen po'i gnas rnams kun tu snang bar byed do// rab tu tshim par byed do// yang dag par skul bar byed do// yang

dag par dbugs 'byin par byed do// dmyal ba chen po bcu drug po rnams kun tu snang zhing reg pas dmyal ba chen po de rnams kyang pad+ma can chen por skyes par gyur ro// sems can dmyal ba de rnams kyang kun
nas snang zhing lag pa tsam gyis de rnams thams cad yongs su grol te/ bsams pa tsam gyisamod la bde ba can gyi 'jig rten gyi khams su par las rdzus te skyes shing/ lha'i lus la rgyan dang/ lhab
lhub dang/ gos dang/ spyod pas rnam par brgyan cing/ skya banas skye bar skyo bar dran par skyes so// de bzhin du dud 'gro'i skye gnas su song banamasakun nas snang bas/ ri dgas dang bya de dag thams
cad kyang dud 'gro'i skyo gnasalas yongs su grol te/ mtho rigs su rna rgyan dri mamad cing g.yo pa 'dzin par skyes so// de bzhin du phyogs bcu kun tu sems can thams cad kun tu snapazhing reg
pa de rnams thams cad sa chen po brgyud pa la rab tu gnas par 'gyur to// des gyur 'khor chen po kun tu 'ongs pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs chen po de rnams thams
cad bla na mad pa yang dag par rdzogasapa'i byang chub tu phyir mi ldog pa nyid la rab tu bkod par gyur ro// rig sngags 'changag 'khor gang yin pa thams cad kyang don yod par pa'i gtsug tor chen po'i
snying po gsang ba don yod zhags pa'i dngos grub so sor thob par gyur to// kA'i rgyal po'i 'khor gang yin pa de rnams thamasacad kyang yid bzhin gyi nor bu'i rgyalamtshan so sor snang bar gyur ro//

lha'i 'khor gang yin pa de rnams thams cad kyang 'od 'bar ba'i ting ngo 'a tshan so sor thob bo// gnod sbyin dang srin po gang yin pa de rnams thams cad rin po che'i gzhal med khang du gnas par gyur to//

'byung po'i 'khor gang yin pa de rnams thamasacad gzi brjid ma mad pa'i ting nge 'dzin so sor thob par gyur ro// lha ma yin gyi 'khor gang yin pa de rnams thams cad rje rje'i go cha dang rdo rje rgyalamtshan
gyi yol bgos pa ra gyur to// nam mkha' lding gi 'khor gang yin pa thams cad kyang rje rjemachu rtse mo chen po'i stobs kyi shugs rjes su thob par gyur to// mi 'am ci dang lto 'phye chen por 'khor
gang yin thams cad kyang lus dang/ ngag dang/ yid yongs su dag par gyur to// dge bsnyen dang/ dge bsnyen ma dang/ bud med dang/ skyes pa dang/ khye'u dang/ bu mo gang yin pa de rnams
thams cad skye ba dang/ rgya ba dang/ 'chi ba'i sdug bsngal las yongs su grol bar gyur to// bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang sku las nyi ma'i tog ces bya ba'i 'od zer chen po snang bar sos te/
byang chub sems dang 'asam dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi thugasakar rjes su zhugs so// spyana'os gzigs dbang phyug gi thugs kar zhugs ma thag tu/ gnod
sbyin gyi sde dpon chen bo lag na rdo rje la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// laganardo rje don yod zhags pa'i pad+magatsug gtor gyi gsang ba'i rnam par 'phrulaM pa la ltos shig/ lag na rdo rjes gsol
pa/ bcom ldan 'das bdag gis mthong lags so// sems dpa' dag pa bdag gis mthong lags so// sems dpa' chen po dag pa 'di'i rnam par 'phrul pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa/
pad+ma'i dbang phyug don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po// pad+magatsug tor gyi gsang ba'i snying po'i dkyil 'khor shin tu zab pa/ shin tu rgya che ba/ rmad du byung ba chen po// dngos grub mchog
sgrub par byed pa ni/ bcom ldan 'dras mtha' dag rgyas par gsungs shig/ gsang sngags ma par phye ba dang/ rig sngags dang/ dkyil 'khor rmad du byung ba/ nye bar spyod pa'i tsho gad bcas
pa ni/ sems can thamasacad kyi sdig pa rnam par 'joms pa'i don dang/ rig sngags 'chang rnams kya mchog 'grub pa'i don du/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyan sngar gsungs shig/ de nas
[0a ]@#// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis/ gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po lag na rdo rjel 'di skad ces smras so//
lagan rdo rje don yod zhags pa'i snying po mchogatu gsang ba gtsug tor thams cad kyi dkyil 'khor/ sems can thamasacad kyi don gyi ched dusdig pa thams cad nyams par byed pa/ sgrib pa
da thamasacad rnam par sbyong bar byed pa/ drim dang rtog ma thams cad sel bar byed pa/ nad thams cad rab tu zhi bar byed pa/ bkra mishis pa thams cad zlog par byed pa/ sdig pa dang/ ma rungs
NaTaM pa'i sems can phyir rgol ba dang/ dgra'i 'jigs pa rab tu zhi bar byed pa/ bgogs dang log par 'dren pa thams cad tshar gcod par byed pa/ dud la sogs pa'i ma rungs pa thams cad
'joms par byed pa/ dug dang/ mtshon cha dang/ ma dang/ chu'i 'jigs pa dang/ mche ba'i dugadang/ seng ge dang/ rgyal po dang/ gnod sbyin rnams lcog par byed pa/ dug dang/ byad stams

dang/ g.yeng byed dang/ phye ma'i sbyor ba thams cad rnam par nyams par byed pa/ don yod zhags pa'i snying po de kho na nyid gtsos pa/ rmad du byung ba/ de kho na nyid kyi snying po'i sgrub pa bla na med pa bklag

pas grub pa 'di rjes su thung zhing/ de nas gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po lagan rdo rje bzhin 'dzum zhing/ gdong khro gnyer dang bral bas rdo rjesgo ra bar byed bzhin du/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
tshon po spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la 'di skad ces smras so// bcom ldan 'das don yod zhags pa'i snying po dam par gyur pa gsang ba pad+ma gtsug tor gyi dkyil 'khor de rnams ngu zhig lag/
de dag btsom ldan 'das kyis gsungs shig/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang gis/ gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen polag na rdo rjes gsol ba
btab par rig nas/ phyag g.yas pas lte ba'i pad+ma'i phyag rgya'i rnam par reg go/ jog ma thagatuphyag g.yas pa'i pats+tshal snying po'i rig sngags de'ang pad+ma'i stang du 'dug ste/ rang gi ngo bo
gzhal med khang tshangs pa'i cha byad 'chang ba/don yod pa'i gzugs spyan gsum pa/ phyag bzhi pa/ rgyan thams cad kyis rnam par brgyan pa/ nor bu gser gyi tsod pan can/ 'dod pag med kyi

cod pan gyis brgyan pa/ ral pa'i cid pan pad+ma'i gtsug tor gyis spyad pa/ zla ba phyed pas rnam par mdzes pa/ zhags pa 'chang ba dang/ pad+ma'i gtsug tor 'char ba dang/ nor bu'i dbyug pa 'chang ba dang/
rdo rje'i dbyug pa 'chang ba dang/ skyil mo krung gis bzhugs pa/ 'od zer 'bar bas yang dag par brgyan pa/ gos rnam par bkra ba sna tshogs pa dang/ spyan nyi ma dang zla ba bas lhag par 'bar bas rnam
par mdzes pa/ pad+ma rnams kyi stonganamadzes bzhin pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs mnyes par byed pa/ byang chub sems dpa' thamasacad kyis phyag bya ba'i 'os pa/ lha thamasacad
ka @#// kyis mchod par 'os pa/ klu thams cad kyis rjes su gzung bar 'os pa/ drang srong thams cad kyis dga' bar 'os pa/ lcam yin dang/ nam mkha' lding dang/ mi 'am ci dang/

lto 'phye chen po thamasacad kyis rjes su 'gro bar 'os pa/ sems can thams cad kyi bla mar 'os pa mthong ste/ de lta bu'i snang ba rgya chen po byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras

la gzigs dbang phyug gis/ de kho mnyid [~ ]ces pa'i snying por gyur pa snying po nye bar bstanano// de nas gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po lagan rdo rjes/ 'khor gyi dkyila 'khor chen po de mthong ba tsam gyis mong la

snying po gsang ba/ don yod pa'i pad+madrima med pa'i gtsug tor 'od zer 'bar ba'i ting nge 'dzin so sor thob par gyur to// ting nge 'dzin so sor thob pa gang gis sgyu ma lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin gyi nang du chud par gyur to//
de rnams thams cad rab tumagu ba'i yid kyis zhabs dag gi rjes la phyag 'tshal bar gyur to// de nas byung chub sems dpa' sams dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis don yod

zhags pa'i snying po'i gsang sngags 'di lcas so// oM a mo g+ha pAsha srid ya paNo'i ku mAr ba 'a b+ha ra pad+meshwar/ A be sha ya/ sarba a mo g+ha ku lasam ya srid ya/ sarbasid+d+hi a mo g+ha pra yats+tshapad+ma/ pad+ma
hUM hUM namos te swahA/ 'din don yod zhags pa'i snying po bklags pas grub pa'i sgrub thabs so// oM a mo g+ha pad+moT+Thiteshwa ra/ pad+me shAr/ saman ya sarba ta thA ga ta naMa mo gru parol sa ma yaM

A kar ya/ pra be sha ya/ sarba karma sid+d+hipra yats+tsham a ba lo ki te shwa ra hUM hUM/ mahAparo b+hu rdzosAhA/ rigs kyi rgyal po'i gsang sngags so// oM mahatsan+tA pad+me shA ra bi bi d+ha rU pa ka Ta/ pad+ma

dzam+bakarwa lab+hing Na/ pak+Sha sarbadusrid yaM/ khA da ya/ bik+ta/ pad+mad+hika/ tsiTaM/ dri Ta hU~MswAhA/ khro bo'i rgyal po'i rigs kyi snying po'o// nang gi dkyil 'khor gyi gsang ba'i las rnams so// oM a mo g+ha

pad+mo pad+mepAshA kro d+haka mA ya karmapra be sha yamahAshu pa ti yam/b.ru Na dgu be ra/khrargyu be d+har/ ma Atsan+d+habe ga a mo g+ha ku las ma ya/ partse hUM hUM/ khro bo'i rgyal po don yod zhags pa'i pad+ma gtsug tor gyi snying/
bo'o// de nas don yod pa'i snying po'i las rnams su 'gyur te/ dran pa tsam gyis mod la dus gsum gyi de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang mnyam pas gcig tu mtshungs par 'gyur ro// tshe dpagamed

dang mnyam pa'i lus su 'gyur ro// phyogs bcu sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad dang mnyam pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang mtshungs shing mnyam pa nyid du 'gyur ro// mtshungs shomanyam pa nyid kyi de bzhin

gshegapa tham cad manyam pa nyid du mthong ngo [“]pad+ma'i phyag gi ting nge 'dzin rnams dang/ pad+ma'i gtsug tor gyi phyag gis 'jig rten dbang phyug dang mnyam pa nyid du 'gyur ro// pad+ma'i gtsug tor ba cings pa nyid kyis pa po'i
gtsug tu mngon par dbang bskuran/ dus gsum gyi de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyisa mngon par dbang bskur ro// pad+ma'i gtsug tor gyis don yod par dbang bskur ba gang yin pa de pad+ma gtsug
zhi/ @#// tor gyi snying po rgyas par 'gyur ba thob ste/ ting nge 'dzin brgya stong phrag dang blanamed pa'i dpal thob bo// rigs kyi rgyal po'i gsang sngags rgyas par gyur pa par gtsug tor gyi
dkyil 'khor du rigs kyi rgyal po legs par grub par 'gyur te/ thams cad du rigs kyi rgyal po'i dngos grub bzang po rnams 'ongs par 'gyur ro// rigs kyi rgyal po'i gsang sngags kyi rgyal po dang
klu gasngagasakyi rgyal bo mchog gi dngos grub thams cad rab tu sbyin par byed do// pad+mo'i phyag gis rjes su 'jug cing/ don yod pa'i rigs kyi dngos grub ji lta ba bzhin du 'grub ste// bklags pas
'tshogrub ba 'di la the tshom med do// pad+magatsug tor gyi rigs kyi dngos grub dang/ pad+ma yangs pa'i dkyil 'khor ram/ don yod zhags pa'i dkyil 'khor du bklags nas bzlas pa tsam gyis 'grub ste/
rigs kyi rgyal po dang rig sngags kyi rgyal po gang yin pa de thams cad du dbang phyug tu 'gyur ro// rakyil 'khor rnams kyi chog zhib mo dang phyag rgyas byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi rigs thun

mong ba thams cad du rgyal po'i bya babyed par 'gyur ro// sangs rgyas kyi zhing sto phrag rnams dang/ sas rgyas kyi zhing brgya phrag rnams dang/ gang+ga'i klung gi bye ma dang mnyam ba'i zhing du rgyal por 'gyur
ro[：]rigs kyi rig pa lha'i dbang phyug dang/ lha'i tshogs rnams kyi dbang phyug tu 'gyur ro// rtag tu'ang gnod sbyin rnams dang/ srin po rnams su gyur pa dang/ dri za rnams su gyur pa dang/

[0《]gnod sbyin rnams dang/ srin po rnams kyi de bzhin nyid du thams cad du rgyal po dang dbang phyug tu rtag tu 'gyur te the tshoma med do// nam mkha' lding rnams dang/ mi 'am ci rnams dang/ lto 'phye chen
bo rnams dang/ thams cad du ji srid byang chub la yang dag par gnas kyi bar du rigs kyi rgyal por 'gyur ro// de nas khro bo'i rgyal po dran pa tsam dang/ drag po de yid lasams pa tsam gyis mod la

'phral du'i rab ltung bar byed cing/ khor yug gi ri rnam par 'thor bar byed do// rgya mtsho chen po kun nas dkrug cing/ myamatsho chen po zhe bar skye bar byed do/ kun tu gasal bar byed do// klu'i gnas thams
cad du klu'i gnas 'obar bar lang byed do// bgegs dang log par 'dren pa thams cad kyi skad cig tsam gyis stong du bdug par byed do// gnod sbyin dang/ srin po dang/ 'byung po dang/ gza' dang/ brjed
byed dang/ mi bzad pa de rnams thams cad khro bo'i rgyal po dran pa tsam gyis 'jigs par 'gyur ro// khro bo'i rgyal po'i gsang ba pa thams cad kyi rigs kyi dam tshig la gonas pa dang/ dkyil 'khor du/

phyag rgyu gnas pa dang/ gsang sngags kyi lha gzhan gang yin pa rnams kyis khro bo'i rgyal po dran pa tsam gyis de rnams thams cad rig sngags 'chang la skyabs su 'gro bar byed do// de rnams thams cad rjes

su 'brang bar 'gyur zhing gnas ba'abyed do// 'ga' zhig gang du 'grob 'am 'dug pa de la dbang po dang/ skabs gsum pa'i lha dang/ tshangs pa dang/ khyab 'jug dang/ dbang phyug chen po dang/ gshin rje dang//
chu lha dang/ klu'i rgyal po rgya mtsho dang/ dga' bo dang/ nye dga' bo dang/ gzhonanu dang/ sde dbon dang/ de bzhin du rgyal po chen po bzhi dus rtag tu rig sngags 'chang gi rjes su 'brang

bar byed do// thetshomamang do// khros pa'i las rnams sam/ de bzhin du drag po'ilas rnams thams cad kyang hUM yig tsam gyis de la dngos gruba mthong ngo// phyir rgol ba dang/ dgu dang/ sems can ma rus
bzhin tu mi bzad pa rnams dang/ pha rol gyi dmag tshog sadang/ 'jigs pa dang/ rnam par 'gras pa'i skya bo dang/ sdig pa de rnams thams cad hU~M yig gis mchog tu gzer ba tsam gyis thal bar 'jig
par 'gyur ro// sdang ba dang/ n gnas ems pa'i sems can dang/ byas pamigazo ba dang/ byas pa la 'khonab thams cad drag po'i hUM yig bzlas pa tsam gyis skad cig la srog ste/ dper na me yis phyom
leb bzhin no//las gzhan stong phrag rnams dang/ las brgya stong phrag nyid bzlas pa tsam gyis 'grub ste/ dran pa tsam gyis mod la las thams cad 'grub bo// de nas don yod pa bar 'i gtsug
tor dran pa tsam gyis bya ba thams cad ni gnyis su 'gyur te/ ji ltar gang cung zadu yid la byed pas las byed do// dgyil 'khor ram gnas rnam pa gzhan thams can du ji ltar yid la byed pa'i bya ba thams
cad du byed do zhes so//'phags pa don yod pa'i zhags pa'icho ga zhibamo'i rgyal bo bam po bco lnga pa// de nas gsang sngags la 'jugapa rnams

[2//]kyi dgos pa thamasacad so sor 'grub bar 'gyur ba ni/mo zhes bya ba don yod pa'i zhags pa pad+ma gtsug tor gyi dkyil 'khor thams cad du gsang sngags yi ge gcig pa'o// 'jig rten mgon po'i spyan sngar/
'bum dran par byas nas dang po la gnas par 'gyur ro// sngon gyi sdig pa bsags pa sems can dmyal ba mi bzad pa gang ci'ang rung ba dedag thams cad ji ltar rlung gis phyag dar gtor babazhin 'jig par
'gyur ro// dngos grub thamasacad thob par 'gyur ro// don thams cad rjes su 'jug par 'gyur ro// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang/ gang dkyil 'khor gyi lha gzhan dag kyang dgyes par 'gyur ro//
'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug rtag tu mchog sbyin pa mdzad do// gsangasngags mo zhes byab dran nasatshe 'gos ba ni 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba can du 'gro bar 'gyur ro// gsang sngags kyi yi
go gcig pa'o// o d+hu yig gnyis pa 'bum bzlas brjod byas nas sa gnyis pa thob par 'gyur ro// de bzhin gshegs pa snang ba mtha' yas kyi spyan sngar 'dubar 'gyurazhing mchog thams cad rjes
su spyin par mdzad/ sdig pa thams cad kyang rnam par dag par mdzad/ sngon gyi nad kyis btab pasos par 'gyur/ nor gyi dbang phyuganor bu bzang po'i bu dbang du 'gyur zhing bar gnas par 'gyur ro//

migang gis kyang phyir zhing bar chad byed nus par mi 'gyur/ tshe 'phos nas ri gru 'an du skye bar 'gyur/ don yod pa'i zhags pa'i dngos grub kyang thob par 'gyur ro// oM pany+tse/ gsang sngags kyi yi ge
gsum pa 'bum bzlas brjod byas nas gsum pa la yang dag bar 'jug par 'gyur ro// par yangs pa'idakyil 'khor gyi phyag rgya dang gsang sngags gang yin pa
thams cad la zhugs par 'gyur/ 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gzhonanu'i cha byadacan madunan bzhugs par 'gyur zhing 'dod pa thams cad kyi mchog rjes su sbyin par mdzad/ don yod
yaba'i zhags pa'i bar gtsug tor gyi dkyil 'khor ston par mdzad/ de bzhin gshegs pa thamasacad kyi gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor rnams ston par mdzad pa/thams cad du dngos grub rjes su sbyin par mdzad/
'tsha do[：]oM pad+ma hU~M/ gsang sngags yi ge bzhi pa 'bum bzlas brjod byas nas bzhi ba 'jug ba 'a gyur/ 'phags pa de bzhin gshegs pa mi 'khrugs pa'i sumadog gsar gyi kha dog camamadunan bzhugru

shigadapung pa brkyang nas phyag spyi bor 'jog par mdzad la/ rig sngagasa'achang ba legs so zhes bya ba rjes su sbyin par mdzad de/ rig sngags 'chang tshur shog/ khyod kyi sdig pa dang sgrib pa thams cad yongs

su dag ste/ rang gi ngo bo thams cad shin tu dri ma med par yongs su dag go/ mi'i 'jig rten 'di nas tshe 'phosanasapa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing du 'ong zhing tshe rabs dran pa 'gyur zhing/ phyir zhing nam yang
mal na gnas pas gos par mi 'gyur/ 'jig rten pa'i dgos pa thams cad 'grub par 'gyur ro// oM pad+mab+hu dze gsang sngags yi ge lnga pa 'bum bzlas brjod byas nas lnga pa la gnas par
'gyur ro// de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas patsA'i bla ma rab tu ston par mdzad/ sgrib pa thams cad yongs su zad par 'gyur/ rig sngags 'changal legs/
sozhes bya ba'i sgra 'byin par 'gyurato/ rig sngags 'chang legs so legs so// khyod la bsod nams kyi phung po chen po skyas te/ rig sngags 'chang khyod dgo ba'i rtsa ba chen po bskyad bas/

rig sngags 'chang khyod tshe brjes na de bzhin gshigs pa bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag dgu bcu rtsa gnyis kyi drung du dge ba'i rtsa ba mtshungs par bskyod par 'gyur zhing/ pa'isangs rgyas kyi zhing du skyo

bar 'gyur/ khyod kyis don yod pa'i zhags pa pad+ma gtsug tor gyi snying po dang/ gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor dang/ phyag rgya chen po rim par bya ba grubatsang rig sngags 'chang khyod sgrib pa dang sdig pa thamA
cad sbyangs kyis/ bya ba thams cad gyis shig/ yidi la bya ba'i sgrub pa thams cad ji ltar 'dod pa bzhin de dag thams cad shin tu 'grub par 'gyur ro// oM pad+ma lo kite/ gzungs sngags yi ge
drug pa 'bum bzlas brjod byas nas drug pa 'thob ste 'jug pa'i 'gyur/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad snang ba mdzad par 'gyur/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rdul phra
mosnyad kyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams gzigs shing mngon gsum du ston bar mdzad/ dbugs 'byin par mdzad do// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa
dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas brlagazigasapa'i rgyal mtshan rig sngags 'chang de la yang dag bar dbugs 'byin par mdzad do// rig sngags 'chang pa'i

sangs rgyas kyi zhing du byang chub sIng po'i mthar thug gi bar du tshur shog/ las byas pa shin tu yongs su zad cing khyod kyis sems can dmyal ba'i sgo rnams n bcad/ khyod kyis sangs rgyas zhing thams
can mAn/ khyod kyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis thon dang rigs kyi spyin khong du chud/ khyod kyis don yod pa'i zhags pa pad+magatsug tor gyi snying po dang gsang pa'i dkyil 'khor ni grub//
khyod kyis thams cad du gnas kyi sgo rnams n phyi bas/ 'jig rten dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i las sgrub pa rnams ji ltar yid la byas pa bzhin las thams cad byos shig/ oM pad+ma tshwa 'a h+phad+hika/

yi ge bdun pa 'khum bzlas brjod byas ma thag tu ting nge 'dzin pad+ma dri mamad pa sgrib pa dang bral ba dag pa zhes bya ba thob par 'gyur la/ ting nge 'dzin gang thob pas lus shin tu 'bar bar 'gyurizhing/
'od zer kha dog sna tshogs sugyur/ sa bdun pa la gnas par 'gyur/ lus kyi snang ba gang gis stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyisas rgyas kyi zhing thamasacad kyi gnas rnams snyad
bar byed cing/ gang dang gang du 'od zer rin po che'abar ba sna tshogs dag 'bab ba lasam tog gi char snatshogs pa rnams 'byung bar 'gyur la/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la mchod par 'gyur ro//
de nas de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas drim med pa'i pad+ma 'od zer 'bar ba gsar gyi mdog can dpung pa brkyang ste/ phyag g.yas pas rig sngags 'chang gi spyi
bor 'jog cing legs so zhes bya ba'ang sbyin la dbugs 'byin par mdzad do/ rig sngags 'chang legs so legs so// 'di nasas rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi snying po gsang thathazlas brjod/
kyi chog mchod pa'i mchog yin no// 'di ni 'phags pas naaras gzigs dbang phyag gi sIr po gsang ba zhes pa'i dkyil 'khor don yod pa'i zhags pa par gtsug tor gyi sdong po yang dag pa'o//
rig sngags 'chang khyod kyis dkyil 'khor mtha' dag rdzogs pa dang/ pad+ma gtsug tor gyi snying po'i cho ga zhib mo dang/ donayod pa'i zhags pa rnam par sprul pa grub kyis/ rig sngags 'changapa'i sas
rgyus kyi zhing du song la sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa gyis shig/ oM amo g+ha ma Nipad+me/ gzungs sngags kyi snying po yi ge brgyad pa 'bum bzlas brjod byason lus shin tu yongs su dag cing dri ma med
par 'gyur/ bzlas brjod byas pa tsam gyisanor bu rin po mchan po shel ltar phyi nang shin tu yongs su dag ste/ de ltar rig sngags 'chang gi lus yongs su dag par 'gyur/ sa brgyad pa la gnas par/
'gyur/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug rang gi lus yongasasu dag pa rang gi gzugs kyi ngo bo ston cing/ rig sngags 'chang gi mdunana gnas
'bya/ dal3 rig sngags 'chang yang dag par dbugs 'byin par mdzad de/ phyag g.yas pamago'i spyi bor 'jog par mdzad/ legs so zhes bya ba'ang sbyin par mdzad de/ rig sugs
'chang legs so legasaso// rig sngags 'chang khyod lhag pa'i bsam pa dam pa dga' ba la zhugs so// rig sngags 'chang sangs rgyas kyi zhing mnyam par 'brel ba'i 'jig rten rnam par blta bar

tshur shog de khyod kyis sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa byed par 'gyur ro// khyod kyis don yod pa'i zhags pa pad+magatsug tor gyi snying po dkyil 'khor gsang ba grub kyis 'jig rten dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i

@# sgrub pa pad+ma dam pa bya bathams cad gyis shig/ oM pad+ma latsa na dur hU~M/ gsang sngags kyi snying po yi ge dgu pa 'bum bzlas brjod byas nas dgu pa la gnas par 'gyur ro// 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang

phyag gims kyi gtso bor 'gyur/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bya ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag dgu bcu rtsa dgu dag rig sngags 'chang la mngon sum du ston cing/ sangs rgyas

kyi yul rnam par sngal pa sna tshogs ston par mdzad/ rig sngags 'chang gi spyi bor thams cad kyi phyag 'jog par mdzad/ legs so zhes bya ba'ang sbyin par mdzad de/ rig sngags 'chang chen po legs so legs

ma so khyod kyis ngal zhing sbyang ba'i las legs par bsgrub par byas so// khyod kyis 'jig rten pa dang 'jig rten las 'das pa sangs rgyas nyid du bsgrub pa ste/ don yod pa'i zhags pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga zhib

ca phamo sgrub pa dang/ mdo sde lung dang bcas pa sgrub pa 'jig rten gyi 'dren pas brten pa gang yin pa de dag thams cad grub pa yin no// oM pad+mob ba ba ma le hUM phaT/ gsang sngags kyi snying po yi ge bcu pa 'bum

bzlas brjod byas n phyir ma ldog pa nyid du gyur nosas bcu ba la gnas par 'gyur zhing/ lhadang mi'i skye dgu dag 'don de bzhin gshegs pa'o zhes brjod la/ blan mad pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las

phyir mi ldog par 'gyur/ don yod pa'i pad gtsug tor gyi 'khor los sgyur bar 'gyur te tho tsom mi bya'o// gsang sngags bcu pa'i sgrub pa de kho na nyar kyi dngos grub bla na med pa 'di ni don yod pa'i zhags pa'i
snying po rnam par sprul pa'i bzlas brjod tsam gyis 'grub pa yin te/ bdag gis sngar bstan pa thams cad la lhag par zhen pa/ gtsarim gtsang sbaspyod pa/ gos gtsang ma bgos pa/ byams pa'i sams dang

snying rje skyos pa/ bden pa smra ba/ bla ma la gus pa/ dkon mchog gsum la dadapache ba/ blam dang slob dpon la rtag tumachod pa byed pa 'don bzlas brjod gyi chog yin te/ sangs rgyas[©]byung thub med par bstan
to// donas gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen polaganardo rje byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen tho 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la rab tu 'dzum lalag na rdo rje gsor bzhin du mgo btud nas

smras pa/ soms dpa' chen po gzungs kyi gsang sngags kyi gzhi don yod pa'i zhags pa pad+magatsug tor gyi dkyil 'khor gyi snying po gsang ba chen po rgyas pa 'di ni shin tu rnyed par dka' ste/ gzungs sngags kyi
snying po'i ro bo 'di dgan bzus brjod byas pa tsam gyis sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa byed par 'gyuran/ sbyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gang ches ngal zhing dub par bzlas brjod sgrub pa/
dang/ cho ga rgyus par sgrub pa lta smos kyang ci dgos/nyin zhag gcig bsnyen gnas la gnas shing zas bslangs pa dang/ 'bras bu dang/ lcam bu dang/ rtseb bza'abazosan mar sngags 'di bsgrubasan sngon
ras gzigs dbang phyug de'i dngos grub ji lta bu zhig 'byung bar 'gyur/ spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis smras pa/ lag na rdo rje nyin zhag gcig sbyar ba la gnas shapanyin zhag gcig tsam bzlas brjod
byas pa tsam gyis 'brasaM bu 'grub par 'gyur ba lani/ lag na rdo rje rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo 'am/ dge slong ngam/ dge slong ma 'am/ dge bsAtsanam/ dge bsnyan ma 'am/gzhan yang dag sbyong mgo
bregs pa/ rigs kyi gtso bo bram ze 'am/ rgyal rigs sam/ skyes pa'i m/bud mad dam/ khye'u 'am bu mo 'am/ rje'arigs sam/ dmas rigs gang la lasud cig thang cig yud tsam mam/ dus tshigs
gcig gam/ rus tshigs gnyis sam/ dusatshigs gsum yongs su rdzogs par gzhan mi skya bar/ don yod pa'i zhags pa pa gtsug tor gyi snying po khro bo'i rigs kyi gsang sngags rim par phye ba gzungs

sngags chen po'i snying po bcu bo 'di lan cig dran nam/ klog gam/ ming gzungaba'ang dran nam/ lag na rdo rje dus tshigs gcig tu dran pa tsam gyis kyang de'i mtshams med pa byed pa mnar med par gzhol ba/
bskal par gnas pa'i ng des thams cad rnam par dag par 'gyur la/ sdig pa dang sgrib pa bsags pa rnams zad par 'gyur/ lus yongs su dag cing dremamadapar 'gyur/ sgrib pa dang sdig pa dang 'bral

bar 'gyur/ tshe 'phos nas 'jig rten gyi khams bde bcan du pad+ma dgu las rdzus te skyo bar 'gyur/ tshe rabs su tshe rabs dran par 'gyur/ nam yang ngan 'gror 'gro bar mi 'gyur/ bskal pa bye ba 'bum phrag

brgyad bcur 'khor los sgyur ba mchog tu 'gyur/ bskal pa bye ba 'bum phrag brgyad cur 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba can du bder bar yang 'gyur/ bskal pa 'bum phrag drug cu rtsa gnyis su 'jig rten gyi khams
mngon par dga' bar bde ba myong bar 'gyur/bskal pa 'bum phrag bdunanu rtsa gnyis su 'jig rten gyi khams 'jig rten rnam par gzigs par skyo bar 'gyur/tshe rabs su tshe rabs dran par 'gyur/ bskal pa

'bum phrag drug cu rtsa gnyis su nor bu dbang ba'i 'khor los sgyur bar 'gyur/ bskal pa khri brgyad stong 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi gnasa'i gru 'dzan du bde ba myong bar 'gyur/ bskal pa brgyu/

stong phrag dgu bcu rtsa dgur 'og min gyi lha rnams kyi nang du skyo bar 'gyur/ bskal pa 'bum phrag brgyad cur dga' ldan gyi lha rnams kyi nang du bde ba myong bar 'gyur/ bskal pa 'bum phrag sum cu rtsa gsum gyi

nang du brgya byin nyid byed par 'gyur/ bskal pa 'bum phrag lnga bcu rtsa gnyis su phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing rnams su 'jug par 'gyur/ bskal pa stong phrag nyi shura 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal srid la spyod/
bar 'gyur te/ nams kyang mi'i mngal du skye bar mi 'gyur zhing/ gang dang gang du skyo bar 'gyur ba thams cad du rdzus te skye bar 'gyur/ thams cad du tshe rabs dran par 'gyur te/lagan

rdo rje de ltar rig sngags lan cig dran pa tsam gyis dag pa'i rtsa ba bsod nams kyi phung bo chen po dang ldan par 'gyur ro// lag na rdo rdzogal te gang zhig zhag gcig gam/ lan cig sbyang pa la gnas te bzlas

nga rjod dang bcas pa byed na/ lagan rdo rje de ni tshe 'dinyid la mi bdag nyid kyi ngo bo nyid sgrib pa dang bral nas don yod pa'i zhags pa chen bo drim med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin 'thob bo/don yod pa bkod pa'i tang

pa@#nge 'dzin 'thob bo// pad+ma gsalab rnam par 'phrul ba'i ting nge 'dzin 'thob bo// don yod pa drim mad par snang ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin 'thob bo// don yod pa rnam par gzigs pa'i rgyal mtshan zhes bya

ba'i ting nge 'dzin 'thob bo// pad+magatsug tor mthar phyin pa'i rgyal mtshan zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin 'thob bo// don yod pa 'bar ba'i gtsug tor gyi snying po gsang ba grub pa 'thob lo// de bzhin gshegs pa

rgyu bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag dgu bcu rtsa gnyis dang/ de bzhinagshegs paga'i klung gi byes gad la dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyod par 'gyur/ bsod nams kyi phung po chen po dang ldan par 'gyur/ tshe brjes nas

'jig rten gyi khams bde ba can du pad+ma dag la rdzus te skyo bar 'gyur te/ 'din don yodapa'i zhags pa'i sIng bo tsho ga zhib mo dang/ don yodapa pad gtsug tor gyi dkyila 'khor rnam par thar pa'i dkyil 'khor
gyi cho ga mtha' dag rdzogs pa dang/ phyag rgya dbacas la tshog zhib mo mtha' dag rdzogs par kha ton du lobs par 'gyur zhing/ don yod pa'i rig sngags 'chang 'khor los sgyur bar 'gyur ro// don
yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po pad+magatsug tor gyi dkyil 'khor gyi snying po gsang sngags sgrub ba'i chog ste/ sgrub pa'i tsho ga gnyis pa'o/// de nas gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po lag na
rdo rjes byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa sAnaras gzigs dbang phyug la 'di skad ces smras so// bcom ldan 'das don yod pa bats+tshagatsug tor gyi dkyil 'khor don yodapa'i zhag
pa'osnying po bya ba'i cho ga dang sgrub pa'i tshog rabs par shar bar gsol/ bcom ldan 'dis rig sngags 'chadekun gyis 'grub pa/ bsam pa yongs su rdzogasapa dngos grub sgrub pa'i cho ga de kho na
bshad du gsol/ de nas bya chub sems dpa' sams dpa' chen po 'phags pa snyan s gzigs dbang phyug gis/ gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po lag rdo rje la 'di skad ces smras so// lag na

rdorje bya ba'i cho ga dang sgrub pa'i tshog bshad par bya yis nyonatsag/ lagan rdo rdzogasasags rtsa ba don yod pa'i zhags pa pad+ma gtsug tor gyi snying po gsang ba 'di'i rig sngags 'chang rigasakyi bu 'am/
rigs kyi bu ngo 'am rogs kyi bumo 'am/ dge slong ngam/ dge slong ma 'am/dge bsnyen nam/ dge bsan ma lan cig tsam dran pa yid la byed pa yongs su dag pa'i bdag nyid snying rje chen po dang byams
pa dang ldan pa'i lhag pa'i bsam pas sems can thams cad la dmigs pa risems can gung yang rung ba nasong gsum du skye bar mi 'gyur te/ sems can dmyal ba 'am/
dud 'gro'i skye gnas sam/yi dgas kyi yul rnams kyi gnas de dag mdad/ de ltar sems can thams cad sgrub pa dag pa'i rtsa ba chen po dang ldan par 'gyura'o// lan gnyis brjod pa tsam gyi nad thamasan
rab tu zhi bar 'gyur ro// lan gsum brjod pa tsam gyis nad thams cad rab tu zhi bar 'gyur te/ dug dang/ 'brum bu dang/ 'bras dang/ lhog pa dang/ nang rgyu dang/ mdzad ng/ g.yanapa lasogs pa thams cad
jig par 'gyur ro// lanab brjod pa tsam gyis dbyig dug dang/ byad thams cad sal bar 'gyur ro// lan lnga brjod pa tsam gyis 'thab pa dang/ 'thabamo dang/ rtsod pa dang/ 'gyed pa thams cad rab tu
zhi bar 'gyur// lan drug brjod patsam gyis 'jigs pa dang/ gdon dang/ rims thamasacad 'jigs par 'gyur ro// lan bdun brjod pa tsam gyis dus ma yin par 'chi bas 'jigs pa thams cad dang/

sems can thams cad kyi nad dang/ yams kyi nad thams cad rab tu zhi bar 'gyur ro/ lag na rdo rje de lta bas na sems can thams cad kyi don du nyi ma'i zhing gzhan mi sna bar lan bdun dran par bya'o// sems can

gangal la sems can dmyal bar gzhol bsha ba dang/ dge slong gang lal bslabapa'i sdom pa dang tshul khrims kyi sdom bsal ba dang/ mkhan po dang slob dpon la gus par ma byas pa shi ba de'i don du bye ma gtsang ma
0 zlathal lan bdun bzlas brjod byas nas/ dur khrod dam/ robasregs ba'am/mchad pa der byon gtor bar bya'o// gang dang gangan sems can gang dag gi rus pa yodasar byem gtor mthag tu de dang der
byemathub pa'isems can de dag sems can dmyalaba'am/yi dgas sam/ sha zar skyes pa 'am/ gnod spyin nam/srin po'i skye gnas su skyes na/ de de'i tshod la tshe brjes nas thams cad mtho ris su
gzhol bar 'gyur zhing/ namasakyang sems can dmyal bar gazhol bar 'gyur ro// yang grogal brisanasamachod rten gyi nang du bcug pa'i gnas der rkang pa gnyis pa 'am/ rkang ba bzhi ba gang dag nye bar

'ongs pa de dag thamasacad grib ma phog patsam gyis sdig pa dang sgrib pa thams cad rnam par dag cing thamasacad mtho ris su gzhol bar 'gyur ro// thanAr dgas dang/ bya dang/ than lnga nga so sku dang 'ane'u
le'u dang/ sdig pa dang/ sprul dang/ khyi dang/ rus sbal dang/lag 'gro dang/ dkyil 'khor dalagribam bab pa tsam gyis thams cad kyi las kyi sgrib pa rnams rnam par dag par 'gyur zhing/ de dag
thamasacad mtho ris kyi 'jig rten dugazhol bar 'gyur ro// dung la lan bdun bzlas brjod byas nas gnas mtho bor busan sems can gang dag dung de'i sgra thos pa skyes pa dang/ budamad dang/
khye'u dang/ bumo dang/ ri dgas dang/ bya dang/ dud 'gro'i skye gnas su gtogs ba de dag thams cad mthoras kyi'ajig rten du gzhol bar 'gyur ro// gang dag tshul khrims yongs su dag pa dang/
sems can ga ngangag sbyin pa la dga' ba dang/ gang dag bsnyen gnas la nye bar gnas pa dang/ gang dag skyabs gsum bzung ba dang/ gang dag byang chub sems dpa'i sdom rA
bsams pa de dag kyang dung gi sgra thos nas soms can de dag thams cad phyir mi ldog bar 'gyur zhing/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub 'thob par 'gyur la/ tshe brjes nas 'jig
rten gyi khams bde ba can du skye bar 'gyur te/tshorabs nas tshe rabs su tshe rabs dran par 'gyur ro// tsan dan la lan bdun bzlas brjod byas nas dge 'dun gyi kun dga' ra ba 'am/ mchod rten gyi
'khoras 'am/ dge 'dun gyin ng ma/ skye bo mang po'i nang ngam/ rgyal po'i pho brang du bdugs na/ gang dag der dri mnam sa pa'i samasacan de dag thams cad sa sa rgyas kyi sku yongs su rdzogs par
'gyur ro// chos gos la bdugasanas gang gis lus la gyon pa de 'i sdig pa dang sgrib pa thams cad rnam par 'jig par 'gyur ro// lus l bab pa tsam gyis dris dang/ ser sna dang/ skyon thams cad
sngangs par 'gyur ro// gos bcangs ba tsam gyis 'jig rten thams cad dbang du 'gyur ro// bdag nyid kyi gos deb dugs nas rgyal bo'i pho brang du zhugs na rgyal po dang btsun mo dang 'khor dang bcas pa
dbang du 'gyur ro// mchod gnas chen por 'gyur/ 'jig rten thams cad kyi bla mar yang 'gyur ro// 'phags pa'i dge 'dun gyi nang du zhugs na dge slong thams cad kyi mchod gnas chen por 'os par/

'gyur ro// skye bo mang po'i nang du zhugs n nor chen po 'phel bar 'gyur zhing mchod pa chen po'i 'os su 'gyur ro// ri'i rtse mo nyi ma 'char ba'i khar bdugasanas gsang sngags rtsa ba lan bdun bzlas brjod/

byas yod la nyi ma 'bab par 'gyur zhing 'dod pa mchog kun rjes su sbyin par byed do// gu gul dang bsrasanas lha chen po'i mdun du ba jug par bya zhing/ gsang sngags rtsa ba lan bdun byub pa byas namo/
nyidi la lha chen po 'bab par 'gyur zhing/ rig sngags 'chang gi mdun na 'dug nas bsam pa thams cad yongs su skong bar byed do// bo la dang/ tsan dan dang/ gu gul bsras nas sred med kyi bu'i
mdun du bdug bar bya nga/ gsang sngags rtsa ba lan nyi shu rtsa gcig lus kyi yan lag la byab pa byas na/ srad med kyi bu rang gi gzugs kyis mdun du 'dug cing 'dod pa mchog kun rjes su sbyin par byed
la/ dngos po snatshogs kyang sbyin bar byed do// yungs kar dang bsres nasatshas pa la bdug cing gsang sngags rtsa b.lan bcu bzhi byab pa byas na/ tshangs pa rang gzugs kyisamadunan 'dug la
mchog thams cad spyan par mdzad do// pad+ma'i phyi ma dang bsres nas niag po chen po dang ma mo'i tshogs la bdugasan/ nag po chen bo dang mamo'i tshogs 'khor dang bcas pa rang gi gzugs kyis
mdunan 'dug cing mchog dang bya ba sgrub pa thams cad sbyin par byed do// nag pu dang/ sbrul gyi shun pa dang bsres pa'i bdug pa klu'i mtshor bdug cing gsang sngags rtsa ba lan bdun yungs kar
thams cad gnas kun nasakhyunas rig sngags 'chang gi rkang pa gnyis las bdud cing gang bsko ba de dag thams cad byed la/ 'dod pa thams cad sbyin zhing dbang du 'gyur ro// lanagasum sbyaran

klu'i rgyal po rgya mtsho'ang 'ongengo// klu'i rgyal po dga' bo dang nye dga' bo'ang 'ong zhing thams cad bsgo ba bzhin byed la dbang du gyur nas 'dug go/ gnod sbyin dang srin po dgug par 'dod pas dur
khrod kyi nang dumi ro bsregs pa'i sol bas bdugs la/ gsang sngags rtsa ba gsang mthon pos lan bdun brjod cing dran n gnod sbyin dang srid po dag gtsange 'ong la/ rig sngags 'chang gi na nga pa
gnyis la btud nas/ rje btsun bka' stsol cig ces zer ba dang/ de'i tsha ga stags 'chang gis de bslob ji lta bzhin du byas na bsgo ba thams cad byed lo/ mngag pa'ilas byed par 'gyur zhing ji
srid 'tsho'i bar du 'dug go/ thod pa sbyaral lan bdun bzlas brjod byas nas thod pa bkang ba'i bdug pas bdugs na 'byung po thams cad kun nas 'ong zhing thams cad dbang du 'gyur la/ las
byed par 'gyur ro// gnod sbyin mo dbab par 'dod pas btsag gis gnod sbyin mo bris la/ ba lang gi lci bas dkyil 'khor byas par phyes pa'i ri mo bri zhing/ phyi'i gtor ma pad+ma lta bur byas ba
ro/
bzhag la 'dug pa 'dis bdug cing/ gsang lcags brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod bya/ yungs kar la lanabadunabazlas brjod byas nas gnod sbyin mo la brdeg pa byas na gnod sbyin mo rang gi gzugs
kyisamadun du 'dug tsang/ lha'i 'jig rten gyi bar du 'gro la/ slar yang 'ong ste don gsang ba thams cad bsgo ba tsam gyis byed par 'gyur ro// yang ma 'am/ chung ma 'am/srongamo yin no zhes sku
bar bya ste/ gal te mar byas n bu la sdug pa lo sa spyod dang/ gzhal med khang thams cad kyi nang du 'jug la/ rgyal po'i bu bzhin yongs su sbyong bar byed do// gal te sring mor byas na rnam thos lo
'gran par 'gyur ro// gal te chung ma'abyas nasu cu rtsa gsum gyi bdag po la dga' ba'i longs spyod dag la rtsar 'jug par byed do// lha mo dpal la bdugs lags ng sngags rtsa ba lan bdun bzlas
brjod bya bzhing lha mo dpal gyi mgo la byugs na/ lha mo chen mo dpal rang gi gzugs kyis mdunan 'dug cing nor gyi bung po chen po 'bul bar byed de/ nam 'tsho'i bar du khyim na 'dug cing nor chen

bo nyid 'phel bar 'gyur ro// rnam thos kyi bu la 'dug na gser srang stong sbyin par byed do// nor bu bzang po'i bu la bdugs na gsar gyi dong tshe stong sbyin par byed do// tshal ba sob tu bdugs na tshal/
na gnas pa'i lha rang gi gzugs kyisamadunan 'dug cing/ rdzas dang sman thamasacad rang gi gzugs phyis mdun na 'dug ko/ ri rnams la bdugs na rtswa dang/ shing gel ba dang/ sman dang/ rdzas
thams cad 'bar bar 'gyur ro// grong khyer bzhi'i sgo rnams su bdugasan grong khyer kun tu yams kyi nad dang/ gnod pa dang/ nad 'go ba dang/ nad thams cad dang/ 'thab
ba dang/ 'thab mo dang/ rtsod pa dang/ 'gyed pathams cad rab tu zhi bar 'gyur ro// 'brog tu bdugasan rkun mo dang/ g.yon can dang/ gnod byed dang/ sang ge dang/ stag dang/ sbrul dang/
dred dang/ dom gyi 'jigs pa thams cad 'byung bar ma 'gyur zhing/ ri dgas gtum po'i 'jig pa thamacad rab tu zhi bar 'gyur ro// rims thams cad la bdugs na rims thams cad las thar
bar 'gyur ro// sdig pa thams cad 'gags pa tsan dan gyi bdug pa sgrub pa'i tshog sta gsum pa'o// de nas thig le yang dag par bshad par bya ste/ rigasngags kyi rgyal po'i
gsang sngags sgrub pani nyi ma'i gzi brjid dang mtshungs shing skarama'i rnam pa ltar 'bar ba yin te/ gzi brjid kyi rgyal po dganyis kyis 'bar bar 'gyur ba ni bsod nams kyi phung po rnam par 'phel
la lha rnams kyi nang na lha'i dbang po dang/ tshangs pa dang/ khyab 'jug dang/ dbang phyug chen po dang bcas pas rtag tu mchod pa'i gnas su 'gyur gyis/ rig sngags 'chang gis the tshom mi bya'o//
dpral ba'i stong du thig le byed pa ni rtag tumadzes pa yin te/ nyi ma ltar 'od zer gyi dra ba stong gis gsala'ang shel ltar dag pa/ mdog dkar sham ltar dri zhim pa dang/ glang po che'i bya la dang/
xxx
gos ltar kun tu 'bar ba ni thig le yin no// smin mtshams kyi bar dbral ban shin tu phra ba rtag tu rtag par mdzes ba ni zla ba 'bamakha' la 'gro ba lta bu yin la/ skya bo'adebusan gsal ba ni
rgyu skar gyi rgyal po zla ba dbusan gnas pa bzhin ring gi 'khor gyi dbus na lha rnams kyi rgyal bo dbang po brgya byin lta bu yin la/ skya bo'i dbusanani 'jig rten gyi rgyal po gdugs cigapa ltar
'bar ba yin/ 'jig rten gyi nang na gdugs cig pa bde bar gshegs pa ltar shin tudul ba yin la/ shAkya'i rigs kyi brgyud ltar sems can thams cad la phan par 'dod pa de bzhin du
nor bu mchog rnam par dag pa ni sems can thams cad la phan par 'dod pa yin no// lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten na ji ltar 'jog rten dbang phyug gcig pu ltar mchog dang rab mchog sems
can thams cad kyi don du sbyin par byed de/ de ltar thig le nor bu'i mthu ni 'dod pa thams cad rab tu sbyin par byed do// lha dang/ klu dang/ gnod sbyin dang bcas pa dbang du 'gyur zhing/ sum cu rtsa
gsum gyi bdag po dbang po dbang du 'gyur bar rjes su 'gro ba dang/ dri za dang/ lham yin dang/ nam mkha' lding dang/ mi'am ci dang/ lto 'phye chen po 'dod par gyur pa thams cad kyang dbang du 'gyur
ba ni nam mkha' la skar ma ltar dpral bar rtag tu dbang du 'gyur ba yin te/ soms can thams cad kyi mgo bos rkang pa'i drung du rtag tu 'dud la mes mi 'tshig/ chus mi 'khyer
zhing / lus la dug dang/ sbyar ba'i dug dang/ phyi ma'i dug dang/ byad ma bzad pa dang/ ngasngags dang/ sdang ba'i rnam pas mi tshugs par 'gyur te/ nor bu lta bu'i mthus de dag thams cad kyisami
tshugs par 'gyur ro/ rims dang/ sdug bsngal ba dang/ nad dang/ rlung dang/ kladand chen po la thig le byas pas mod la de dag thams cad rab tu zhi bar 'gyur/ sems can btson du gzung ba 'am/ chad
pas gcad pa 'am/ bcing bar 'os pa la thig le lta bu byas pas de dag thams cad las thar par 'gyur ro// sminamatsham sam dpral bar thig le lta bu byas na de'i bod la gnod sbyin brgyad stong dang/
srin po drag po'i gzugs can gdon brgya stong rnams lus la 'jug par mi 'gyur zhing/ glang po che dang/ ri dgas kyi bdag po'i khyu dang/ chom rkun gyi lam dang/ shod kyi lam dang/ ri'i lam dang/

ri sul dang/ rim grog dang/ glog dang/ grang ba dang/ rlung sprul dang/ snganga'ajigs kyi 'jigs pa thams cad zhi bar 'gyur/ thig le lta bu'i mthus dgra'i sta brgyastong skad kyi nang na 'gyed pa las myur ba nyid du
rgyal bar 'gyur/ g.yul dang/ 'thab mo dang/ tha snyad mod nyid la zhi bar 'gyur ro// de'i tshe nor bu gtsug gi spyi bor btags pa gang yin pa dang/ thig le'ang byas nas 'khor lo la byugs la pha rol
gyi dmag tshogs g.yul gyi nang du zhugs na/ bdag nyid gcig pus dpung gi tshogs yan lag bzhi pa las rgyal bar 'gyur/ 'dis thams cad du zhugs pa tsam gyis pham pa byas par 'gyur zhing/
phyogs bcur 'gros la thams cad 'jigs par 'gyur ro// thig le'i byas nas rgyal bo'i pho brang du zhugs na rgyal po dang/ btsun mo dang/ 'khor dang bcas pa dbang dugyur nas le bar 'khod do// smra
srid 'tsho'i bar du mchod gnas su 'gyur ro// dpung pa g.yas par nor bu ba gas la yan lag dang yan lag dag tu thig le byas na thams cad du rgyal ba 'thob cing reg pa tsam gyis dbang du 'gyur la//
don gang dang gang bsgrubs pa de dang de thams cad 'thob bar 'gyur ro// ril bu dag ni khar bcu gnas // lhan cig 'dug la smras na ni//thams cad dbang du 'ong bar 'gyur// rgyal bo dang ni btsun mo 'am/

dge sbyong da pan bram zo dang// rgyal rigs dang ni dmangs rigs nyid// skyes pa dang ni bud med dang// khye'u dang bu mo rnams kyang rung// de dag thams cad dbang du 'gyur// kun du na bags pa'i las rnams
byad// ril bu thos pa tsam gyis ni// nad rnams thams cad rnams par 'jig/ gang gi nyin bzhi pa yi rims// gang dag khongaskam nad kyis nyams// gapazhig rtag pa'i riras kyis btab// gang du
'thab mo 'byung ba dang// de bzhin skya bo sdang sems can// bdag la grib gnon gzhan grib gnon// skam byed snyam pa brjod byed dang// gapazhig gdon gzhan mi bzad pa// sdig pa'i las ni kun
tu spyod sngon gyi las ni mi bzad pa// de kun skadacig tsam gyis 'jigs// ra'i bus khrus byas tsam gyisani// 'bras dang shu bar gyur rnams dang// lhag pa dang nika shu
dang mtshan bar rdol dang ma dbal dang// khyi rdzomadzod nga nang pa'i nad// mi bzad de rnams kun dang ni// gang dag nor rgyas snang bas zin// byugs pa tsam gyis mod la ni// thams cad dug mda'i

bar 'gyur// ril bu thams cad las byed pa// lha rdzas shi ba sos par byed// ril bu dag na'ang byed cing/ thig le dag ni byas pa yis/tham cad du ni mchod pa thob//tham cad du ni nor dag 'du/dpal 'dod pa naM
dpal 'thob cing/ 'bru 'dod 'bru yi phung po 'phel// lha rnams dag ni dga' 'gyur zhing// klu rnams kyang ni dga' dang bcas// gnod sbyin srin po dri za dang// lha minamakha' lding mi 'am ci// lto 'phye
chen po thams cad dang// 'byung po rnams kyang dga' dang bcas// rtag tu phyag bya'i gnas 'gyur zhing// thams cad dbang du gyur nas 'khod// 'khor kun bran bya ci bya zer// gang zhig ril bu de dag
bstan// ril bu thig le rtag byed la// de bzhin gshegs kun dgongs pa mdzad// 'phags po snyan ras gzigs kyi dbang// de nyid rig la rtag tu ni// mchog sbyin dus kun gzigs par mdzad//
bsod nams phung po stong dag ni// nyi ma re re bsogs par byed// 'jig rten pa yi bde spyad cing/ 'jig rten pha rol shin tu bde// tsho brje ba na'ephos nas su// bde ba can du yod la 'gro// gang dang
gang du skye bar// tshe bas rtag tu tshe rabs dran// lagan rdo rjeganod sbyin// gnod sbyin bye bas yongs bskor cing/ g.yol ba med par nyin mtshan du// dusa kun tu ni srung ba dang// skyob dang sprod/
dang srung bar byed// gang zhig bu ni yod pa dang// bud med bu ni 'dod pa la// ril bu gtsagacig sbrumanas su// mnyam par bzhag pas gsang sngagasan// mkhas pas zla ba yar gyi 'o// 'bum/
ni tshang bar bzlas nas su// zla ba nya ste bco lnga la// skyes pa bud med khrus bya zhing// yanalag yon lag thig le bya// dkon mchog gsum n legs mchod cing// bram ze dag kyang mchod ston byed//
srung ba'i tshog byas nas su// gtor ma dkar gsum mang po bsham// bdag nyid rgyan gyis brgyananasasu// gosagatsang rnams ni bgo bar bya// byams pa'i sams la yang dag gnas// snying rje
sems can sdug par byed// bsam pa dag cing des pa dang// bla mar rtag tu gus par bya// me tog sna tshogs rab dgang zhing// spos dang byug ba sna tshogs dang// du rus tsan dan sa la ki/ lha yi
bdug pas bdug bya zhing// bu ram 'o ma bdun dang ni// ril bu legs sbyar bza' bar bya// gsang ba 'di 'thusamod lani// btung dang kha zas bza' bar bya// mgon po spyan ras gzigs kyi
dbang// mchog sbyin mdzad par mchod par bya byams mdzad de yi zhabs drung du// mtshan mo nyal dang nang pa'i na// mthong ba mchog 'di thob par 'gyur// 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang//
mchod sbyin rang gzugs ston mdzad cing// mchogatid dam pa sbyin par mdzad// bud med de ni bu skyed cing// gzugs bzang mchog tu lta na sdug/ stobs ldan gzugs ni
phun sum tshogs// lha yi dpal gyi rjes su 'gro// chos ldan makhasashangagasal ba dang// tshe ring dbang phyug tshad yod 'gyur// dba' bo dgra las rgyal ba dang// snang ba thams cad 'joms par
klu 'gyur// yan dran pa'i blo spyod par 'dod pas thos pa la brten nas 'dug cing// rig sngags 'chang gtsang ma zhag bdun du nyin re zhing mar dang 'o ma bskol ba der ril bu bdun bcug ste/ zanam zos
pa'i sngon rol du lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas brjod byas nas 'a jam tsam pa 'thungs la phyis kha zas bza' bar bya/ zhag bdun gyis thos pa'i mtsho chen po bsags par 'gyur te/ bstan bcos
thams cad dang/ chos lugs dang/ 'dul ba dang/ snyan dngags dang/ brda sprod pa dang/ mdo'i sde dang/ dbyangs kyis bsad pa'i sde dang [0f10 ]tshigs su bcad pa'i sde dang/ glong gzhi'i sde dang/

ched du brjod pa'i sgo dang/ de lta bu byung ba'i sde dang/ skyes pa rabs kyi sde dang/ chos mngon pa dang/ rtsis dang/ cho gzhibamo dang/ gsang sngags dang/ phyag rgya thams cad dang/ theg pa chen po

thams cad kha ton du 'bas pa' 'gyur ro// zhag nyi shu rtsa gcig tu sbyar ba byas na stobs chen po'i brtson 'grus kyis pha rol gnon bar 'gyur te/ glang bo cha khri'i stobs su 'gyur ro// zla ba gcig tsam

[j]sgyur ba byas na lo lnga brgyar 'tsho zhing gter ma dang sgyu da kar spangs la/ sa lcangalo 'khril zhing 'khyil bar 'gyur ba dang/ lus kyi mdog bad kar sham lta bur 'gyuro// lo gcig tu sbyar na lha'i sman/
bcud kyis lena mchog la 'jugacing mamakha'i snying dulha rnams dang lhan cig mthun bar 'gyur la/brgya byin dang yang lhan cig 'gran bar 'gyur/ lha rnams kyi lha mo'i tshogs dang/ lha'i gzhal med

mad khang na rtse zhing dga' bar byed la/ rin po che snabadun gyi gzhal med khang gi gnas na 'dag par 'gyur/ nyi ma lta bur 'od gtong zhing rgyu la gnas pa bzang po rnams kyis 'gro bar byed/ gzi brjid
shin tu gsal ba mi bzod cing rnam par dgapar 'gyur ro zhes bya ba la thetsemami khya'o// las thams cad sgrub pa'i thig le dang/ ril bu sgrub pa'i chog bzhi pa'o///// de nas mi snang bar

bya ba dang/ nam mkha' la 'gro ba sman gyi mchog don bod pa'i mthus grub par bshad par bya ste/ rig sngagis 'chang ba rnams kyi grub pa'i mchog de khon yin no// sman dngul chu dang/ brah+ma kA ri dang

su baN kir dang/ dal bsngo bsangs dang/ kuk+ti dang/ su gan d+hi dang/ kaM kuny+tsa skyon med pa dang/ ut+pal bzang bo dang/ pad+ma kA dang/ gu gul dang/ pho lu pata tra dang/ gur kum dang/ nA gi pul+ladang/
bcas pa dang/ spang sngos dang/ shi ri 'am tog dang/ tsan dan dkar po dang bcas ba bsros nas zhib tu btags pa'i phyam la don yod pa pad+ma gtsug tor gyi gsang ba'i rigs kyi rgyal po'i sngagasakyis
shin tu brtson par lan brgyad brgya bzlas brjod bya zhing/ khro bo'i gsang sngags lan brgyad stong bzlas brjod byas pas lan nyi shu rtsa gcig tu dbang bskur la/ yi ge gcig pa
lan 'bum bzlas brjod bya/ de'i tshigasang sngags bcu bo so sor lan nyi shu rtsa re re bzlas brjod bya ste/ gsang sngags thams cad rdzogs par bzlas brjod byas nas sman don yod ba rgya che ba gsal
zhes bya basman gyi mchog/ bcom ldan 'das 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi zhabs drung du bzhag la grib ma la bskam par bya'o// yang don yod pa'i zhags pa'i gtsug tor gyis
lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod byas nas snod gtsang ma'i nang du bcug la/ nam dgos ba byung ba de'i tshe thams cad du sgrub pa'i dgos pa thams cad la sbyar bar bya'o// de nas rig sngags 'chang
gtsang mar gyur pas 'as legs par khrus byas la sos chus byugs te gos gtsangam bgo bar bya/ sman gyi mchog 'di yungs mar gyis spras la rang gi lus la byug par byaste/ lan cig bsas/
pa tsam gyis mi snang bar 'gyur la/ gnas gsang bar byakha'i sgo bcad pa thamasacad mthong bar 'gyur/ gnas thams cad du ji ltar 'dod pa bzhin du 'jug par 'gyur/ don thams cad byed par

'gyur/ 'byung po dang/ gnod sbyin dang/ srin po dang/ sha za lasogs pa'i gtso bo rgyal por 'gyur zhing/ de dag thams cad dbang du 'gyur te/ cibagyi zhes bya ba byed la ji srid 'tsho'i bar du skye bar gnas nas las

0 su bya ba'i dgos pa thams cad kyi rjes su 'jug par 'gyur ro// klu'i gnas kyi sgo bcad pa thamasacad na 'dug la/ glu 'khor dang bcas pa thams cad mdunadu 'khod nas bya ba thams cad la ci bgyi zhes bya ba

byed par 'gyur zhing/ las su bya ba dang dgos pa thams cad byed par 'gyur/ ji srid 'tsho'i bar du nye bar 'khod pa nyin mtshan du gnas la/denas kru thams cad ji srid batsho'i bar du bslob bzhin byed par 'gyur ro/

sman pa sing ha dzi hA dang ba'i 'om dang sbyar bas mgo kun byugasan ji lta ba yid la byas pa dang/ rang gi blos 'dod pa'i ngo bo sna tshogs ston par byed gnas su gtogs pa thams cad ji ltar 'dug pa bzhin ston

bar byed/ gnas su gtogasab thams cad 'a khor gyi nang na ji ltar rnam par sprul pa'i gzugasasna tshogs ston par byed/ rjesrid 'tsho'i bar du 'phel ba rnams ston par byed cing bya ba thams cad byed do// spos

kyi til mar dang sbyas nas byin pa dang rkang pa la bskusan nam mkha' la 'phags par 'gyur zhing/ nam mkha' la 'gro bar 'gyur la/ gang du 'dod pa der 'gro bar 'gyur/ chu'i steng du 'gro zhing nams kyang phyir
sal rkang pa 'jog par mi 'gyur/ lag pa g.yas pa la bskus na gang dang gang la lag pareg bde 'ong bka'agyuralasus kyang mthong bar mi 'gyur/ bud med gzhonanu'i 'os dang bsrasanas mig la bskus

nas rgyal po'i pho brang du zhugs da mthong thami 'gyur zhing don 'dod pa gang yin pa byed do// don gyi rdzas gang yin pa blangs kyang sus kyang mi mthong ngo// bu dmadabang dang phrad na sus kyaing mtho la/ ji srid
'tsho'i bar du 'dug kyang sus kyang mi shes so// khar byugasonas gang dang gangan bro gar byed pa dang/ bzhad gad byed banyid kyi nang du zhugs nabya ba thams cad byed la lus ni sus kyang

mi mthong ngo// bum pa la byugs nas chus bkangan chu'i rgyun snang la bum pa de ni mi mngon no// gzhong pa chus bkang ba de'i dbus byugs chu de gang bar snang la bum pa de ni mi snapango// bdag nyid la byugs

nas bum pa chus bkang ba 'gan thogasan bum pa lasachus 'byung bar snang la mi de'i lus ni mi snang ngo// mig la bsus nas skyo bomang po'i nang du zhugs nami mthong bar 'gyur la/ de'i sgran thos shing rang
gi lus ni mi mngon no// gnas su gtogs pa thams cad du zhugs n rang gi lus khrus ma byas kyi bar du mi mthong ngo// su'ang rung ba'i mig la bsas la lus la'ang bskus na de dag thams cad mi mthong

bar 'gyur zhing/ gang dang gang du 'gro ba de dang der mi snang bar 'gyur la/ khrus byas pa tsam gyis phyir snang bar 'gyur ro// lus kun la bskusanas mdzod chen po'i nang du zhugs na mi mthong bar 'gyur la//

tsa gser dang/ dngul dang/ 'phra min dang/nor bu dang/ mu tig dang/ byu ru dang/ dung dang/ man shel dang/ rdo rje dang/ yi ma rang/ margado dang/ mthon kha dang/ gos dang/ sprad pa dang/ rgyan dang/ lhag
lcab gang yang rung banyid 'dod na thams cad blangs nas so nasus kyang mi mthong la gar dga' bar 'gro bar 'gyu'o// jisrid du khrusam byas pa de srid du rang gis mi mthong la/ khrus byas n thams cad
du mthong ngo// rig sngagasa'achang bud med kyi nang du 'jug par 'dod pa gtsang mar khrus bya'o// de nas sos chus khrus bya'o// de'i 'og tu ba gcin gyis khrus bya'o// yang gur kum gyis khrus bya'o//
de'i 'og tuba'i rnam lngas khrus bya'o// de'i 'og tu til mar dang lhan cig bsres pa'i ril bu des lus bsku bar bya'o// de'i 'og tu bud med gzhon nu'i mun dang sgyur bsamig la'askusal/ de nas la bu
gsum dpung pa g.yas pa la gdags par bya'o// de nas gos gtsangam bgosanas gsang sngags brjod cing dran par byas l/ rgyal po'i pho brang du zhugs nami mthong bar 'gyur te/ lus sus kyang

mthong ngo// nyi ma gcig gam/ nyim gnyis sam/ nyi ma bdunanam/ nyi ma bcu bzhi 'am/ nyi ma nyi shu rtsa gcig tu khrus byas la bud med de dag gi nang na rtse zhing dga' bar byed la/ yongs su spyod par byed kyang
sus kyis mi shes la 'jug cing phyir 'gro ban sus kyang glags mi ridade/ ji srid du khrus ma byas pa'i bar du rang gi lus mi snang ba 'gyur ro// phug tu 'jugan lus kun spos kyi til mar gyis byug

la phug tu zhugs n phug gi sgo thams cad phye bar 'gyur gyis/ gnas de'i nang du zhugs la ji ltaji ltar bs su byas ba de lta de ltar gyis shig/ chu'i nang du zhugs n ji ltar khyim gyi na 'dug khazhin du
chusam rlan la/ chus gos par yang ma 'gyur go/ so'inang du zhugs nams lus la mi regacing tsan dan ltar ba sil bar 'gyur ro// klu'i gnas mtsho zhugs na gnas na'akhod pa rnams kyis de mi mthong
@#// gis ji ltar rang gi yid la las su bya bar 'a dod pa'i las kyi rnam pa gzhan dag kyang gyis shig/ mi snang bar bya ba ril bu'i sgrub pa'i cho ga'o/
ka'o pags pa don yod zhags pa'i cho ga zhib mo'i rgyal po bam po bcu drug pa// de nas sbyin bsreg gi cho ga bshad par bya ste/ las thams cad kyi don sgrub par byed pa/
dngos grub thams cad byed pa'i gnas/ sdig pa thamasacad 'khrog pa/ de bzhin du sgrib pa thams cad rnam par dag pa/ rig sngags thams cad kyi dngos grub blonamad pa/ gnod sbyin thams cad/
rab tu 'bar byed pa/ sdig pa thams cad 'joms par byed pa/ sas rgyas thams cad kyis legs par rgyal ba sbyin pa/ dgra thams cad zlog par byed pa/ 'thab pa dang/ rtsod pa nyidi dar/ 'khyer
pa dang/ mtshon cha'i dra ba thams cad las sgrol bar byed pa/ grub pa don yod pa mchog tu red par dka' ba/ rig sngags 'chang thams cad kyi dngos grub thams cad du gsang sngags dang dkyil 'khor gyi/

dngos grub/ phyag rgya 'pho ba dang/ de khon nyid kyi rim par phye ba'i sgrub pa las thams cad du mchog gi dngos grub kyang 'grub ste 'dil the tshom med do// bde ba thams cad rtag tu rab tu sbyin pa dang/
dbang phyug ma yin pa thams cad kyi sgrub pa dang/ 'gugs ba dang/ lha dang klu thams cad spyan 'dren pa dang/ gnod sbyin dang srin po thams cad rab tu'ajoms pa dang/ bdud dang/ 'byung po dang//
sha za dang/ gdon mi bzad pa dang/ brjod byed mi bzad pa dang/ tshangs pa'i srinapo rnams thams cad thams cad du sgrol bar byed par grub pa dang/ nyin mo dang mtshan mo'i dus rtag tu tshar gcod par
thetsom med do// rims thams cad rtag tu rab tu zhi bar byed pa/ nad thams cad zlog par byed pa/ dug thams cad gsod par byed pa/ 'phral du srog blugs byin pa tsam gyis thams cad du rtag tu gnang chen/
pa dang/ thams cad du mthong na dga' ba dang/ 'jig rten thams cad kyi bla mar mchod par bya ba dang/ thams cad du stobs dang/ brtson 'grus dang/ pha rol gnon pa dang/ de bzhin gshegs pa rtag tu

mthong ba'ang sbyin par 'gyur te/ 'di la the tshom med do// byang chub sems dang 'a rtag tu kun tu snang ba dang/ dus thams cad kyi tshe las thams cad la shin tu dga' ba dang/ skya banas skye bar tshog btsun

par 'gyur ro// thams cad du blam la sri zhu che ba dang/ thams cad yumachod par 'os pa'i bla ma'o// de nas dpal ldan rdo rje 'dzin pas rtag tu'ang srung ba dang/ yongs su skyong bar byed pa dang/ rgyal po chen

po bzhi dang/ gshin rje dang/ chu lha nyid kyis kyang dus rtag tu srung ba dang/ skyob pa dang/ sba bar byed par the tsoma med do// dbang phyug dang/ dbang phyug chen po dang/ lha'i bu stong phrag dgu bcu rtsa dgu dang/

lha'i bu rdzu 'phrul che ba rnams kyis srung ba dang/ skyab pa dang/ snga bar byed cing rtag tu legs par kha los sgyur bar gnas par 'gyur ro// tshangs pa dang/ khyab 'jug dang/ dbang phyug chen po dang de drag
po dang/ gzhon nu dang/ nor bu bzang po dang/ stobasakyi lha dang/ gang ba bzang po dang/ rdzas chen dang/ gar mkhan mchog ste/ 'di rnams kyis rtag tu srung ba dang/ skyab pa dang/

snga bar byed cing gnas te 'di la the tshom med do// mo'i lha gzi brjida chen po dang/ nyim dang/ zla ba dang/ rgyu skar gyi lha rnams kyis srung ba dang skyob pa dang/ sba bar byed cing mchog tu mchod pa byas pa sa
gnas par 'gyur ro// sbyin sregatsama'adi ni bya ba thams cad blanamed pa 'dis grub rnams la'o// 'gros thug po che dang yungasaka' dang/ gu gul dang/ mar dang/ sbrang rtsi bzos pas sbyin sreg
stong phrag brgyad byas nas/ 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis thams cad mchog sbyin par 'gyur te/ bya ba thams cad sgrub par byed par 'gyur ro// tsan dan dang/ pany+tsa'i chu ba dang/ 'bras
yos dang/ yungs kar dang/ a ka ru dang/ zho dang/ sbrang rtsi dang/ mor bsus pas samA'oshing gis zhi ba'i me sbyar te stong phrag brgyad du sbyin sreg bya'o// de nas 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang
phyug rang gi gzugs kyis mdun du nye bar gnas te/ mchog thams cad sbyin par 'gyur ro// byab thams cad kyi dngos grub tu'ang 'gyur ro// yid kyi shing rta thams cad yongs su rdzogs par yang
'gyur ro// chog zhib mo thams cad kyi dngos grub tu'ang 'gyur ro// thams cad du don yod pa thogs pa med pa'i dngos grub tu'ang 'gyur ro// bsod nams thams cad 'gugs pa'i dngos grub tu'ang
0 'gyur ro// dkyil 'khor dang/ phyag rgya rim par phye ba dang/ cho ga zhib mo dang/ sgrub pa'i cho ga thams cad kyi mchog gi dngos grub tu 'gyur ro// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rigs kyi dam

tshig gsang ba la rjes su zhugs par 'gyur ro// seng ldeng dang nim pa'i shing gi yam shing gis 'bras sa lu dang/ til dang/ yung kar dang/ zho dang/ mar dang/ lan tshwa dang bsres pas sbyin srog stong phrag

brgyad byas na/ bgags dang/ log par 'dren pa dang/ gnod sbyin dang/ srin po'i gdon thams cad dang/ gdug pa dang/ phyir rgol ba dang/ dgra thams cad rab tu zhi bar byed do// 'thab pa dang/ rtsod pa dang/
