'gyod pa thams cad las sgrol bar byed do// mtshon na thams cad las rgyal bar 'gyur ro// pha rol gyi dmag tshogs dang/ phyir rgol ba dang/ dgra thang su cad las rgyal ba smin par 'gyur ro// tsanadan

dang 'bras thos dang/ zho dang/ sbrang rtsa dang mar bsres pa'i pad+ma'i sbyin sreg stong phrag brgyar byas na/ yul 'khor dang/ ri brag dang/ grong dang/ grong khyer dang/ ljongs rnams su kun nas dpag
tshad stong phrag gcig kho ra khor yug tu zhi ba chen por 'gyur ro// soms can thams cad dang/ bud mad dang/ skyes pa dang/ khye'u dang/ bumo rnams la bsrung ba dang bskyab pa'i ched du yang dag par
sgrub par gyur ro// nad thams cad thams cad du rab tu zhi bar 'gyur ro// gcan gzan katam ngo thams rung/ sAl gdug pa dang ma rungs pa thams cad byams par 'gyur ro/ rgyal po/
dang yul 'khor dang/ btsun mo'i 'khor gyis yongs su bskor ba thams cad shes pa dang bde bar 'gyur ro// ma tam ga dang/ yungs kar dang/ mar dang/ klu shing gi ma
tog dang/ 'bras yos rnams bsras pas arga'i shing giyam shing gisamo sbar la stong phrag brgyad du sbyin sreg byas na char mi 'bab par byed pa la/ de nas kruchen po rnams kyis char gyi rgyun 'byin par
byed de jisrid charapa 'thab bar 'dod pa'i bar du'o// le tog dang/ shing dang/ rtswa dang/ shing gel ba dang/ sman gyi rdzas dang/ me tog dang/ 'bras bu rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed do// legs

bar yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// klu'i rgyal po chen po 'khor dang bcas pa thams cad kyi dga' ba chen por 'gyur zhing/ dus dusasu jilta ba bzhin du char gyi rgyun 'byin par byed do// ha cang char ches na

de nyid kyi thal bas stong phrag brgyad du sbyin srogabyas n sutsang mar ches pa rab tu zhi bar byed do// 'bras yos dang/ go la dang/ yungs kar dang/ gtum po 'i sa bon mar dang bsres pa'i sbyin sreg byas na

rlunganang sor ba thams cad bzlog par byed do// dpag tshad stong phrag khor yug tu mtshams chen po bcang bar byas par 'gyur ro// rlung bcu ngo ba la yungs kar dang 'bras thug po che'i sbyin sreg stong phrag brgyad

byas narlung gi dkyil 'khor thams cad bcang bar byas par 'gyur te/ ji srid du be ram b+ha'i rlung gi bar du bcings bar 'gyur ro// klakhacing bani yungs kar dpa til gyi sbyin sreg stong phrag brkyang byas na lo

[6/]bcu gnyis su klu bcang ba byas par 'gyur ro// nad thams cad rab tu zhi bar bya ba la yungs kar mar dang bsres pa'i sbyin srog stong phrag brgyad byas na nad thams cad rab tu zhi bar byed do// pha rol gyi dmag/

tshogs ldog pa lanika ra wA ra'i shing gis ma sbyar te/ nim pa'i 'dab ma dang/ lan tshwa dang/ thub ma'i sbyin sreg stong phrag brgyad byas na pha rol gyi dmag tshogs dang/ phyir rgol ba dang/ dgra thams cad
rnam nga ra nyams par byed do/ jisrid 'tsho'i bar du phyis 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro// phyogs bcing ba la dpagatshang stong phrag khor yug gis so// til dang/ yungs kar dang/ 'bras yos dang/ pad+ma'i
'dab ma ma ra dang bsres ngas sbyin srag stong phrag brgyad byas Mn/ dpagatshar stong phrag khor yug tu mtshams chen po bcang babyas par 'gyur ro// log 'dren thams cad bcing ba la ni pangs kar nag po
dang/ til nag dang/ sran ma dang/ til dang mar bsres pas sbyin sreg stong phrag brgyad byas na bgegs dang/ log 'dren dang/ bdud la sogs pa ma rungs pa dang/ gnod sbyin dang/ srin po rnamA

bcing ba byas par 'gyur ro// gnod sbyin 'byin pa ni g+ho ga'i sa bon dang/ lan tshwa dang/ dil mar bsres pas sbyin sreg stong phrag brgyad byas na gnod sbyin dang/ srin po dang/ 'byung po dang/ sha za
dang/ brjod byed la sogs pa thams cad 'jig rten thams cad kyi mngon sum du nges par 'byin par 'gyur ro// yams dang/ nye bar 'tsho ba dang/ nad 'go ba thams cad/ 'jig pa thams cad rab
tu zhi bar 'gyur ro// dge legs thams cad 'byung bar 'gyur ro// bram ze dbang du byed pa la 'bras yos dang arku'i yanashing mar gyis btags pas sbyin srog stong phrag
brgyad byas na bram tho thams cad dbang du'agyur ro// rgyal rigs dbang du byed pa la buram dang/ mar dang/ 'bras yos dang/ ana'i 'dab mas sbyin sreg stong phrag brgyad byas na rgyal rigs thams

cad dbang du byed par 'gyur ro// dmangs rigs dbang du byed pa lasmyos byed kyi 'bras bu dang dong kA'i sbyin sreg stong phrag brgyad byas n dmas rigs thams cad dbang du byed pa'i mchog 'grub bo// rje'u
rigs dbang du byed pa la mar rnam pa gsum gyis bsres pa'i sbyin sreg stong phrag brgyad byas n rje'urigs thams cad dbang du byed do// sna ma'i me tog mar gyis btags pa'i sbyin sreg stong phrag brgyad

byas na bud med thams cad dbang du byed bar 'gyur ro// gzhon nu ma dbang du byed pa la chu'im tog mar gyis btags pa'i sbyin srog stong phrag brgyad byas na gzhon nu ma thams cad dbang du byed par 'gyur ro//

'jigs pa thams cad ba tu zhi bar byed pa 'bru dang mar gyi sbyin srog stong phrag brgyang byas na 'jigs pa dang/ 'thab mo dang/ 'thab pa dang/ rtsod pa dang/ 'gyod pa thams cad rab tu zhibar byed do//

nor dang 'bru 'phal bar byed pa la 'bru bdun mar gyis btags pa'i sbyin srog stong phrag brgyad byas zhanoradapa'i thu 'phel bar 'gyur ro// dbang phyug thob pa la yungasakar dang/ mad+d+hA/ dang/ sbyin srog stong/

phrag brgyad byas na dbang phyug chen po 'phel bar 'gyur ro// yul thob pa latsha ba gsum mar dang/ mad+d+hA/ dang bsres pa'i sbyin sreg stong phrag brgyad byas na yul chen po thob par 'gyur ro// grong gi ngon
du kar ra'i me tog dang/ yungs kar dong/ 'bras yos mar gyis btags pa'i sbyin sreg stor ga brgyad byas mgrong redapar 'gyur ro// gter gdon pa la ni pad+ma'i chu ba mar rang bsregs pa'i spyi
srog stong phrag brgyad byas na gter chen po so sor red do// gnod sbyin sbyin drang bar 'dod pas gu gul dang/ gtum po'i sa bon dang sbrang rtsi mar gyis btags pa'i sbyin sregastong phrag brgyad byas
na gnod sbin rang gi gzugs kyis mdun du nye bar 'dug ste/ ci bsgo ba byed cing las thams cad byed par 'gyur ro// 'dod pa'i gzugs can m spyan drang bar 'dod pas 'bras yos dang/
yungs kar dang/ zho dang/ sbrang rtsi dang/ mar gyis btags pa'i dri dang phri yang ku yis ka ra wA ra'i shing gi yam shing gis me sbar nas sbyin sreg stong phrag brgyad byas na/ de'i 'og tu 'dod pa'i
gzugs can ma 'ongs/ jiltar 'dod pa bzhin du spyod par byed do/ rnam pa gsum brjod par bya ste/ ma dang/ chung ma dang/ sring modo gal te ma yin na ba la zhen pas nor dang/ 'bru dang
longs spyod chen po rnam par 'phel zhing phun sum tshogs par byar de/ ji srid 'tsho'i bar dumaM 'bral bar kun tu gnas par byed do// gal te chung ma yin n rnam pa sna tshogs pa'i dga' ba du mas rtsi
ma dang/ sbrang rtsi dang/ mar gyis btags pa'i sbyin sreg byas na zla ba dang/ rgyu skar dang/ skar ma'i tshogs 'bab par byed de/ 'dod pa dang/ yid kyi shing rta dang/ skal ba dang/ dbang phyug
thams cang cher 'de la ba rab tusbyin no// ji srid 'tsho'i bar du nye bar gnas te/ ji srid 'tsho'i bar du srung ba dang/ skyab pa dang/ sba bar byed par 'gyur ro// nyi ma re re zhing mtho bar 'dodon
'bab par byed do// lha dang/ klu dang/ gnod sbyin dang/ dri za dang/ lha ma yin dang/ nam mkha' lding dang/ mi 'am ci dang/ lto 'phye chen po dang/ ma dang/ mi ma yin dang//
bud med dang/ skyes pa dang/ khyi'u dang/ bumo dang/ dge sbyong dang/ bram ze dang/ rgyal rigs dang/ rdzo'u rigs dang/ dmangasarigs thams cad 'gugs pa la til dang/ yungs kar/
dang/ 'bras thug bo dang/ sman sna tshogs dang/ zho dang/ sbrang rtsi dang/ mar gyis btags pa'i sbyin srog stong phrag brgyad byas na 'gugs pa chen po'i dengos grub tu 'gyur te/
'jigarten thams cad dga' bar yang 'gyur ro// rgyal po dang btsunamo'i 'khor dang g.yog tu bcas pa 'khor du 'gyur te/ rtag tu de nyid kyi rjes su 'brang bar 'gyur la ngag gis su 'jug
par 'gyur ro// bdag nyid kyis sam nor gyis kyang rung ste/thams cad du bla ma gcig pur mchod pa chen po byed bar 'gyur ro// sbyin sreg gi tshog 'i sgrub thabs so//
zhing longs spyod pa yongs su spyod par byed de/ rnam pa sna tshogs pa'i gos dang/ rgyan dang/ lhab lhub dang/ dri dang/ 'phreng ba dang/ byug pa dang/ bza' ba dang/ 'atung
[】 ]ba rnam pa sna tshogs pa'i ro bro ba'i longs spyod la yongs su spyod cing/ rnam pa sna tshogs pa'i mal stan dang 'a nor dang/ 'bru dang/ mdzod dang/ bar ba dang bcas pa rnam par 'phar ba dang

zla1 yongs su spyod de/ ji srid 'tsho'i bar du grim 'chin du rjes su 'brang bar 'gyurar// srog kyang yongs su gtong bar byed do/ dga' de sring mo yin de'i tshe rnam pa sna tshogs pa'i dbang phyug dang/

lha'i gzhal med khang gi longs spyod la yongs su spyod tsange/ ji srid 'tsho'i bar du bstan bkur dang rim gro byed do// pha rol kyi dmag tshogs zlog pa la phubam nga ri lan tshwa'i sbyin srog gis dpag

tshad brgya stong phrag gi nang du dgra mi 'byung ste/ sbyin srog stong phrag brgyang byas na g.yul ngang/ 'khrug pa chen po las rgyal bar 'gyur ro// zhim 'bab par byed pa la ri'i rtse mor sbrang rtsi dang/ na le sham
dang/ 'bras thug po che dang/ mar gyis btags pa'i sbyin sreg stong phrag brgyud byas min la re 'di ni ma 'bab par byed de/ mchog thams cad rjes su stsol bar byed cing/ ji srid 'tsho'i bar du
'dod pa tsam gyis bstan bkur dang rim gro byed cing nye bar gnas so// zla ba dang/ rgyu skar dang/ skar ma'i tshogs 'bab par 'dod pas gnas mthon por tsha ba gsum dang/ rgyamatshwa dang/ 'o
nas mig 'phrul bshad par bya ste/ don yod pa pad+ma gtsug tor gyi rig stags kyis sems can thams cad la phan pa'i don gyi ched du las thams cad byed pa/ dge ba
la mkhas pa rnams kyi bde ba sbyin pa/ rtag tu dbul po rnams kyis bde ba thob par byed pa'o/ de nas rtogs pa'i mod la 'bru mchog tu 'phel bar 'gyurazhing/ 'jig rten thams cad kyi
bla ma nyid du mchod par bya ba dang/ mi 'jigs pa dang/ dbang phyug sbyin zhing longs spyod chen po 'phel ba dang/ rgyal po'abed ba dang ldan pa dang/ phyogs phyogs su rab mchog sbyin par byed
do gi'u wang dang/ cu gang dang/ ldong ros dang/ mu zi dang pad+ma ge sar dang/ ut+pal sngon po dang/ li kha ra dang/ gur kum dang/ rgya mtsho lta ba dang/ gnyis dang/ gsar gyi
'dab ma stong phrag sbyar te/ phyam shin du zhib mor byas la/ legs par bsgros la ga pur dang glur rtsa tsam gyi blangasal/ sngags kyi stong phrag brgya bzlas po mkhas pa rnam pa gsum du sbyar bar

bya ste/ @bos gang ba nyid la lta mnyam pa'o// de nas rig sngags 'chang gis mig sman gyi snying pos stong rtsa brgyad bzlos la mig la byug par bya ste mi snang bar 'gyur ro// skye bo'i mang po'i dbus su
nam mkha' la nyebar gnas par byed do// hU~M yig gis mthong bar bya'o// nam mkha' la 'gro bar byed do// gnas par byed do// nyal bar byed do// rgyug par byed do// bskusan lus la me

'bar bar mthong sta/ de ston par byed do// duba'i rgyal mtshan ston par byed do// rkang pa'i mthil la kun tu byugs nas chu bo dang chu klung chen po'i stong nas 'gro ste rkang pa la chus gos par mi 'gyur ro//
mechen po 'bar ba'i nang du 'jug ste srog par mi byed cing/ bsu'i khung bu gcig kyang 'byi bar mi 'gyur ro// phyi mas phyogs bzhir nam mkha' kun tu gtor na mo tog dang 'bras bu sna tshogs pa'i char

gyi rgyun ltung bar byed do// rin po che sna tshogs kyi gzhal mang khang mthong bar byed do// lus mtha' dag la byug par bya zhing/ skya bo'i mig sman bsku zhing phyi nas gtor nas ljongs chen po'i nang du 'jug

bar bya ste/ de cung zad kyang ma mthong ngo// ji ltar yid la byed pa bzhin du rmongs pachen po'i skyem ston par byed de/ rgyal po dang/ dmag sde chen po deng/ drang srong gi gzugs dang/ gser gyi bum pa
ma can dang/ mi'i sang ge dang/ phag dang/ dga' byed kyi mtshan nyid dang/ rolasnyad ma phrog pa dang/ zla 'od mgo bo yongs su gtong thaston par byed do// 'joms pa dang/ gsod pa dang/

srog 'dor ba ston par byad do// ma tog gi char ram/'bras bu'i ra ram/rlung dang/ srin dang gsar ba dang / 'bru'i char ston par byed do// rnam pa sna tshogs pa'i rnam 'gyur rnams ston par byed do// gzhal med
khang chen po'i rnam pa rnams bsams pa tsam gyis ston par byed do// dge 'dun gyi nang du 'jugan/ rnam par 'phrul pa rnam pa sna tshogs pa la sogs pa ya ma zung gzhal dumad pa ston par byed
dang@#// do bdaganyid kyi mgo bo la bskus nas mgrin patsam kyis dri za da til mar gyis bsgos pa'i phyams gtor bar bya zhing// mig snyan gyis byug par bya/ phyi mas lus
mtha' dgal 'dug par bya/ rkang pa la byug par bya ste/ dge 'dun gyi nang du zhugs n yang dag par shes bzhani dang/ zhi ba dang/ dul ba dang/ zung tsam du mthong ngo// de nas zhugs
btsam gyis ma'i khams su mthong bar byed do// mthong thar byed do// sems dpar mthong bar byed do// nam mkha' la gnas bar byed do// 'chag par byed do// 'dug par byed cu'i
mal stan la rtogs par byed do// 'or bar byed cing 'gro bar byed do// me tog 'bab par byed do// nam mkha' la rdza'i sgra ston par byed do// rig byed bzhi pa'i nang dushing ana'i/
ngo mas bsgos nas byugs pa tsam gyis 'jig rten gsum pa'i gzugs su mthong bar byed do// lha'i gar mkhan sna tshogs pa'i gzugs su mthong bar byed do// ji lta ji ltar yid la byed pa
bzhin pa'i b+ha ra ta dang dga' byed rnams mthong bar byed do// 'khor chen po'i dbus su rnam pa sna tshogs pa'i gar mkhan rnams su ston par byed do// rgyal po'i pho brang du rgyal po chen po'i
'khor dang bcas pa'i dbus su lha'i gar mkhan sna tshogs pa rnams su mthong bar byed do// gling gi dbang phyug 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po sna tshogs pa dang/ mAn d+ha tadang/ yid ldan
ca dang shing rta bcu ba dang/ rin chen 'od dang/ dragabos 'od sbyin dang/ mi bdag dang/ mnga' bdag dang/ tshong pa dang/ ded dpon dang/ zhi ba dang/ mche bzang dang/
snying rje can dang/ pad+madakarapo la sogs pa rnams dang lhan cig pa'i gar mkhan rnams su mthong ngo// rin po che'i char dang/ gos kyi char dang/ rgyan gyis dang/ sbad pa'i char dang/
lhab lhub kyimar mthong bar byed do// ma tog gi gzhalamang khang dang/ 'bras bu'i gzhal med khanga mthong bar byed do// gzhal med khang lasogs pa rnam pa sna tshogs pa me slong bar byed do//
doltaren mig sman dang phyi ma mthu chen po bsku ba dang sbyor bas gzhal med khang dang/ gar mkhan dang/ gzhan sad khang mthong bar byed de/ ji srid sgra sgrogs dang/ 'jigs byed dang/
bum pa dang/ gzhal med khang mthong ba dang/ hanu ma'i gzhal mad khang mthong bar byed pa dang/ gar mkhan rmos pa chen po'i gzhal med kha de mthong bar byed do// ji srid bdud
'dzoms ba la sogs pa dmag sde sna tshogs pa'i mtshog gigazugasakyi bar du mthong bar byed do// stobs dang brtson 'grus chen po mthong bar byed do// mig sman dang phye ma'i sbyor ba
gsum tsam gyi dngos grub ni bsku ba dang/ bklags pa dang/ yang dag par sbyar bas tsho'i dngos grub chen por 'gyur ro// sgyuma'i rnam 'phrul sna tshogs pa 'grub ste/ yid bzhin
gyi nor bu ji lta ba de bzhin du rab tu sbyor ba'i dngos grub tu 'gyur ro// rab tu sbyar tsam gyis dngos grub chen po rgya che ba 'jigarten thams cad kyis mngon sum du
'grub par 'gyur ro// sgrub pa'i dngos grub bla na med pa'i cho ga rmongs pa chon po'i tshog 'o////de nas dkyil 'khor bshad par bya ste/ de khon nyid dngos grub bla na
sgyu mar pa dang/ don yod zhagos pa'i pa gtsug tor gyi dngos grub dang/ rig pa'i dzin pa thams cad kyi dngos grub kyi de kho na nyid blanamed pa'o// dang por sdig pa zad par byed pa de
bzhin du sgrib pa thams cad rnam par nyams par byed pa/ 'dod pa thams cad kyi dngos grub dang/ don yod pa'i dngos grub bla na med pa dang/ sngags kyi dngos grub dang/ mchog gis
dngos grub dang/ gzungs thob pa'i dngos grub rnams dang/ sa bcu la rab tu 'jug par byed pa grub pa/ sangs rgyas nyid kyi sgrub thabs de kho na nyid mthong ba rmad du byung ba/ byang
chub kyi snying por nye bar 'gro bar byed pa/ rdo rje gdan gyi gnas su yang dag par lhag par gnas pa/ chos kyi 'khor lo skor bar byed pa/ bdud 'joms shing tshar gtsod pa/ bgegs
thams cad ltung bar byed pa/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi gnasa mthong bar byed pa/ de nyid las de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis byin gyis rlob pa'i gnas dang mnyam pa/ sems can
thams cad dang thun mong ba'o// de nas po Ta la ku'i gzhal med khang dang mnyam pa'i gnas/ don yodapa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi gnas/ skad cig la mnar med pa'i
gnas dang mtshams med pa lnga rnam par sbyong bar byed pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsang ba'i gnas dang mnyam pa/ de bzhin du sangs rgyas thams cad kyi rigs kyi mchog/
byang chub sems dpa'i gzhi'i gnas/ de bzhin du rdo rje snying po'i dge ba 'phel ba/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs kyi rig sngags kyi dngos grub dang/ de bzhin du pad+ma'i rigs
dang/ de bzhin du nor bu'i rigs dang/ de bzhin du rdo rje'i rigasakyi dngos grub dang/ dkyil 'khor gyi gtso bo gcig pur zhugs pa// dkyil 'khor gyi mchog ri rab chen po
dang mnyam pa'i gnas/ de bzhin du rgya mtsho chen po lta bu/ khyad par du 'phags pa'i gnas thams cad du son pa/ yid bzhin gyinor bu'i mchog rab tu sbyin pa/ dpag bsam
share dang mtshungs pa'i gnas/ yid kyi shing rta thams cad yongs su rdzogs par byed pa/ re ba phun sum tshogs par byed pa'i gnas/ thams cad du mchog sbyin pa po/ 'di ni
byang chub kyi sa bon gyi gnas te/ sems can thams cad rtag tu sgrol bar byed pa// don yod pa'i gnas gsang zhing rdo rje byin gyis rlob pa bla na med pa'o// bsod nams thams cad 'gugs
[7 ]@#// par byed pa'i gnas/ dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad rnam par 'phel bar byed ba/ 'di ni bsod nams kyi phung po gnas/ chos kyi mdzod dang rtag tu mnyam pa/ sangs rgyas
kyi mdzod/ mdzod chen po spyan ras gzigs kyi mdzod la mkhas// rtag tu bad+ma'i mdzod/ de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi mdzod/rdo rje'i mdzod/ de bzhin du nor bu chen bo nyid kyi mdzod//
rgya mtsho chen po ltar zab pa/mi g.yo ba/ mi 'gul ba/ zil gyis non pa'o// bdud dang/ log par 'dren pa dang/ bgegs dang/ gnod sbyin dang/ srin po dang// 'byung po dang/ srinapo thams
cad kyis sdang ba'i sems kyis 'jug par mi nus so// de la mi g.yo ba'i gnasared dka' zhing blan med pa'o// dkyil 'khor gru bzhi par bya ste/ ba byung dang yang dag par ldan ba/ khru sum cu rtsa

gnyis pa bya'o// yang na khru brgyad par bya ste/ de phyed dang gnyis kyi khru'i tshad kyi thig skud kyis tshad rnam par phyi snyagadab par bya'o// bzhi mnyam par phye ba/ logs bzhi legs par rnam par phye ba/ shin tu yangs
shin tu legs bar bcags pa/ mnyen la 'jam shang brgyan pa/ sa gzhi baDUr+ya'i kha dog la dkyil 'khor mdzes pa brig rgas char rnam pa dbye bar bya ste/ sgo bzhi rnam par phye ba/ skud pa latshon/

lnga byin te/ dbusakyi dkyil 'khor gyi snying por gru bzhi par rnam par dbye'o// khru gnyis kyi tshad kyi ra kha lnga rnam par dbye'o// dbus kyi dkyil 'khor gyi snying por pad+ma 'dabam sum cu rtsa gnyis pa

kun nas rgyas pa bri bar bya ste/ dbus kyi paN+Na'i ge sar la don yod pa pad+ma'i gtsug tor bya ste/ pad+mad kha bye ba'i paN+Na'i 'dab ma'i steng du pad+ma la zhal gsum par bri bar bya ste/ bde ba'i/
gzugs dang mtshan gyis brgyan pa/ gtsug tor gyi rnam pa 'bar ba'ising po la khor yug tu yos su bskor ba bri'o// gzhogs g.yas su 'phags pa spyanaras gzigs dbang phyug gi gzugA/
ral pa'i cod pan gyis brgyan pa/ dbu la 'od dpag med 'bar ba'i snying po la lus can no// gzhog g.yon du 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi gzugs ral ba dang rgyan bcings ba//
'bar ba'i snying po'i lus dang dbu la pad+ma gtsug tor gyi khor yug tu 'od zer sna tshogs 'bar ba'o// phyi rol du tsam pa ka dang/ bArIka dang/ ut+pa la sngon po'i mi tog gyi 'phrang ba/
bcing bar bya'o// de nas dkyil 'khor gyi snying po'i gru bzhi'i gnas rnams su rgyal po chen po bzhi bri bar bya ste/ gomadang ya lad bgos pa drag po'i gzugs can/ 'jigs par byed pa/ 'bar ba'i/

'phreng ba'i snying po'i lus so// dkyil 'khor gyi ri khasngonam la rdo rje dang mdung rtse gsum pa'i re kha 'barab dang bcas pa bri bar bya'o// kham par phye ba gnyis pa'i me tog gi re 'bri bar bya'o gsum pa la

nor bu rin po che chen po'i skud pa'i re kha bri bar bya'o// re kha bzhi pa la lag pa'i phyag rgya mtshon mas tshogs pa 'dzin pa bribar bya'o// reb lnga ba la kha khyer gyin m pa bri bar bya ste/tshon snatshogs pas rnam par phyob
rnam par bkra ba'o// dkyil 'khor gyi phyi'i khor lug tu mtshan ma'i phug rgya mtshon cha sna tshogs ba rnams bri bar bya'o// dkyil 'khor gyi sgo bzhi rnams su gnod sbyin chen po bzhi bya ste/

drag po drag tu rgod pa'i gzugs can/ mche ba gtsigs pa/ bzhin rnam par 'gyur ba/ bum pa gang ba thogs pa/ skra bsdus pa/ rgyun thams cad kyis rnam par brgyan pa/ bod pa'i cod pan can/ 'bar ba'i snying

po'i lus can/ ri bo'i gdan la gnas par bya'o// dkyil 'khor gyi re ba'i phyi rol tu 'phreng sum 'gyur du bri bar bya'o/ pad+ma dang/ ut+pal sngon po dang/ tsam pa ka dang/ sna ma'i me tog dang/ wi ka dang/

a d+hi muk+ta ka rnams rnam par dbye bar bya'o// de nas rigasngags 'chang gis dkyil 'khor lags par bri bar byas nas/ shin tu rnam par phye ba/ shin tu mkhas pa/ dkyil 'khor gyi khor yug tu rgyan dang rta babs

bzhis mdzes par byas pa/ khor yug tu mda' dang tshon sna tshogs kyis rnam par bkra ba'i ba dan dang/ gdugs dang/ rgyal mtshan dang/ ba dan dang/ bya las dang/ dar dpyas dang/ khor yug tu bum pa gang ba

bcu drug dang/ gtor ma'i bum pa bcu drug dang/ de bzhin du bdug pa'i snod bcu drug dang/ gzhong pa bcu drug tu rab tu brjod de// kham phor bcu drug tu bshad pa dang/ dri sna tshogs pa'i stong dang/ lhung bzed

bcu drug nyid dang/ mchod yon gyi snod bcu drug dang/ dngul gyi snod bzhi dang/ dri'i phye ma rnams gzhug cing/ gtor ma'i bum pa bcu drug bzhag nas phog por bzhi'i nang du tsan dan dang/ a ka ru dang/ dur/
[p// ]ka dang/ pog dang/ gu gul gyi bdug pa srag cing/ de bzhin du smik+ka dang/ sra rtsi pog dang/ gur kum dang/ gla rtsi dang 'bol dang/ ga pur tsam dang yang dag par ldan pa'o// dkyil

'khor gyi lha thams cad kyi byug pa 'di nye bar gzhag par bya'o// tsan dan dang/ gur kum dang/ de bzhin du dzi g+ha dang bal+li ka'i phyi ma rnams thams cad yang dag par sbyar ba 'dis phyi mar sbyar bas
bsgos pa'o// me tog snatshogs gcal du bkram zhing/ ji ltar 'dod pa/ ji ltar stong pa dang/ ji ltar thob pa'i ma tog mdzes pa mngon par gtor bar bya'o// dkyil 'khor gyi khor yug tu dri'i chus
gang pa'i bum pa ma reg pa dang/ gser dang dngul las byung ba'i snod gsar pa nyid dang zas dang sa las byung pa'i mchog dang/ dri sna tshogs sgyur bas dgang bar bya'o// bum pa dang bkra shis bcing

bar bya zhing/ pi wang dang/ gos bzang bo dang/ rgyan dang/ lhab lhub rnams kyis brgyan par bya// ring bsrel pad+ma'i steng du bzhag nas/ bum pa dang/ gtsug tor gyi mtshan nyid dang/ sna ma'i me tog dang/

gdu bu byas nas gzhag par bya'o// dbus kyi snying po 'i dkyil 'khor dusnying po dang/ nye ba'i snying po nyid kyi gsang sngags stong phrag brgyad bzlas so// de nas gtor ma'i las la mnyam par bzhag nas//
sna tshogs pa'i gzugs rnam pa sna tshogs dang/ dkar po dang/ de bzhin du sna tshogs pa'i gzugs nyid dang/ sna tshogs pa'i ro gzhag par bya'o// rnam pa sna tshogs su phyoba'i sna tshogs pa'i gzugs
dang / sna tshogs pa'i rnam pa dang/ sna tshogs pa'i kha dog dang/ de nyid dang/ sna tshogs pa'i yul du rgyu bste/ 'di na gtor mar brjod de/ 'byor pa'i gtor mar bshad de//

sa dkyil 'khor gyi khor yug tu rgyan gdags te/ sna tshogs pa'i 'bras bu rgya chen po dang/ sna tshogs pa'i lo ma sngon po'i 'phreng ba dang/ mar me'i 'phreng ba brgya rtsa brgyad dang/ ji ltar rnyed pa'i mar dang/ til

ma' gyis kun nas bkang ba brgya rtsa brgyad do// bdag dngos grub 'dod pa rnams phyi dang/ la phug dang/ dkar dang/ la du dang/ sran ma mud ga'i la du dang/ 'bras bu rnams de bzhin du log 'dren la gtor

mar byin pas las thams cad bde blag tu 'grub po// bya'i zan dang/ zho'i nying khu dang/ lo ma ston pa nyid gnod sbyin dang srin po kun nas phyogs bzhir gnas pa rnams la gtor ma'i sbyin par bya'o// zho'i
na dang 'o ma'ang ste/ 'di ni 'byung po'i gtor mar bshad do// lo ma sheng bu dang/ bya dang/ 'bras thugapa tshe'i zan dang/ de bzhin du 'khur ba zlum po ste/ 'di ni phyogs bzhir yi dgas dang sha

rnams la gtor mar sbyin par bya'o// 'bras thug po che dang 'o ma'i zan zla ba dang nyi ma'i tshogs kyi lhan cig pa'i lha dang rgyu skar rnams kyi gtor mar bya'o// rtag tu tsan dan gyi chu dang/ de bzhin du me tog dang 'oma'i
zan mtshan mo lha la gtor ma'i sbyin par bya ste/ las kyi dngos grub ban med pa go/ 'bru bdun mdzas pa chen po dang/ shing sna ha mchog tu mdzes pa dang/ 'bras A ma khu bskol ba mdzes pa dang/

[z/ ]zho dang 'om so sor mnyam pa dang/ me tog dang/ 'bras bu dang bcas pa rnam pa bdun bo sa'i dkyil 'khor gyi lha la gtor mar sbyin par bya'o// sa kurtsa dang/ rtsab mo dang/ 'bras thugape tshe btsos pa'i

khu ba dang ldan pa 'di rlung lha'i gtor mar brjod de/ rlung gi dkyil 'khor thams cad dgyes par byed do// zho dang/ 'o ma bskol ba dang/ 'bras thug po che dang/ hAgs dang bcas shing/ bu ram dang bcas par ldan

pa/ 'khur ba zlum po dang/ mar gyis gang ba'i 'khur ba 'di'i klu rgyal po rnams kyi gtor mar brjod de/ las thams cad sgrub pa'o// 'khur ba zlum po dang/ ba byung lnga dang pu shel ci dang/ ma la ya'i tsan dan

dang / 'bras thug po che dang/ zhabs bsil dang/ mchod yon rnams bdud kyi dkyil 'khor la gtor mar sbyin par bya'o// gur kum gyi chu dang 'bras thug po che la dri bzang pos bsgos te chu klung gi rgyal po la gtor

mar sbyin par bya'o// thams cad du las thams cad sgrub par byed do// rtswa dur ba'i chu dang/ 'o ma dang/ gtum pa'i sa bon btsos pa dang/ 'bras thug po che ni tshangs pa'i srin po nyid dang/ gsang ba pa rnams
la gtor ma'i dbul bar bya ste/ thams cad rigs pas so// 'di ni gtor mar brjod da/ bgegs rnams kyi dkyil 'khor sgrub par byed pa labagegs rnams ji srid 'tsho'i bar du dga' bar 'gyur te the tshom

mad do// de'i phyir rig sngags 'chang mkhas pas thams cad legs par bsgrub par bya'o// zho dang/ 'o ma dang/ 'o thug dang/ nu ma dang ma dang/ li khar dang ldan pa 'dis bdag skyug pa'i rgyu skar gyi lha la
nag kator ma sbyin par bya ste/ tshe'i dngos grub dang/ de bzhin du rgyas pa dang/ zhi ba dang/ sdig pa thams cad zlog par byed de// 'dan gtor mar brjod de/ rig sngags 'chang
rnams kyi bde ba thob pa'o// bya ba gang yin pa de rnams la bdag gis gtor ma thun gsum du byas na/ rig sngags 'chang rnams kyis rig sngags dang gsang sngags bde blag tu 'grub ste tha tsom mad
de[;]de'i bgegs thams cad dang/ sdig pa dang/ snang ba rnams nam yang bar du gcod par mi nus te/ nam yang phyis sdig pa mi 'byung ngo// rtag tu gtor ma rgyas pa thob par byed cing/ stobs dang

brtson 'grus dang ldan pa dang/ thams cad thogs pa med par 'gyur ro// de lta bu byed bzhin pa'i rig sngags smra ba'i mi mkhas pa de bgagaso rnams thams cad kyis de nam du'ang mthong bar mi 'gyula'o// gnod

sbyin dang/ srin po dang/ 'byung po dang/ sha sa snang bar byed pa med do// nad med cing rgyal po'i dpal min med la/ skam byed dang skam pa med la/ brjod byed dang/ klu dang gza' dang/ rims med cing thams cad kyi

cung zad kyang med do// dugamed cing sbyar ba'i dug nyid kyang med la/ byad stems thams cad kyang nam yang mi yong ste/ kun nas dpag tshad stong phrag tu ring du 'bros par byed do// kun nas stobs nyid kyang rgyas pa dang/

sku de bzhin du'ang dga' ba dang/ de bzhin du'ang stobs dang/ brtson 'grus dang/ gzi brjid 'phel bar 'gyur ro// thams cad du phyag rgya dang/ gsang sngags dang/ cho ga zhib mo thams cad kyi dngos grub thob par

nga0 byed do// tsho'ang du 'phel zhing/ lha dang mi rnams kyis mchod pa'i 'os su 'gyur ro// skyes pa'i rgyu skar gyi lha gang yin ba'ang dri yongs su 'dzin par 'gyur zhing/ de rnams thams cad kyi ji srid 'tsho'i bar du

stobs dang brtson 'grus 'phel bar byed par the tsom med do// de la dgra mi 'byung zhing nam du'ang phyir rgol ba dang dgra bo med de/ phyag rgya 'dzin pa nyin med kyang dkyil 'khor kyi mchog tu zhugs pa tsam gyis

mod la 'am/ yang na 'jug pa'i dkyil 'khor mthong ba tsam la/ de rnams kyi lus de bzhin gshegs pa gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag bcu'i byin gyisabarlabs pa'i lus su 'gyura'o//

de bzhin gshegs pa gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyad bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag brgyad cu rtsa bzhi'i drung du bsod nams kyi phung po rab tu skye bar 'gyur te/ ri rab chen po dang mnyam pa'i bsod nams kyi phung po chen po

yongs su 'dzin par 'gyur// de bzhin gshegs pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag gang+gA'i klung gi bya ma snyad dgu bcu rtsa dgu dang mnyam pa'i drung du dge ba'i rtsa ba chen po dang yang dag par ldan par 'gyur ro//

de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rigs kyi dam tshig gsang ba dang/ cho ga zhib mo dang/ gsang ba dang/ cho ga zhib mo dang/ gsang sngags rnams kyi dngos grub chen po se lor rnyed do// byang chub sems dpa'

thamasacad kyi ris thun mong pa'i tshogs bsdus pa'i sar bgrod de phyir mi ldog par 'gyur ro// sum cu rtsa gnyis kyi lha'i gnas ni gnas pa dang/ lha'i dbang po brgyabyin dang/ sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha'i tshogs dang
lhan cig thams cad du bsrung ba dang/ bskyab pa dang/ sba ba'i ched du yang sha bar sgrub par 'gyur ro// lag na rdo rjedang rig pa 'dzin pa'i dbang po du ma rig pa 'dzin pa bye ba'i tshogs kyis
yongs su bskor zhing rtag tu rjes su 'brang ba rnams bsrung ba dang/ bskyab pa dang/ sba ba'i ched du yang dag bar sgrub par 'gyur ro// stobs chen po dang/ brtson 'grus dang/ pha rol gnon ba dang/
mdangs kyi rnam ba so sor rnyed par 'gyur ro// dkyil 'khor mthong ba tsam gyis mod la bskal pa bye bar brgyud nas bsags pa'i sdig pa dang/ sgrib pa dang/ mtshams med pa lnga'i 'gro ba rnams dang//
mnar med pa la gzhol ba de thams cad yongs su zad cing yongs su gzhugs par 'gyur ro// thams cad rab tu zhi bar byed do// don yod pa'i bya ba'i dngos grub so so rnyed do// sgrib pa dang/ nyon mongs
ba'i rtog pa'i dri ma dang/ ser sna'i dri ma thams cad dang bral bar 'gyur ro// 'jig rten thams cad dga' ba dang/ bram chen po mchod par 'os par 'gyu'o// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mthong
ra 'dod par yang 'gyur ro// 'phags pa spyan rasagazigs dbang phyug gis rtag tu mchogastsol bar byed cing bla mar 'gyur ro// 'chi 'phos taskye ba brje ba bsamasapa nyid kyi mod la bad ba can gyi 'jig
rten gyi khams su pad+ma las rdzus te skye bar 'gyur ro// dkyil 'khor gyi slob dpon la de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dam tshig gi bla mar shes par bya/ mchod par bya/ 'od dpag med dang/ spyan ras

00/ gzigs dbang phyug dang/ mthu che thob kyi bkod pa dang 'dra bar blta bar bya'o// des na rig sngags 'chang dkyil 'khor gyi slob dpon des kyang dkyil 'khor du 'jug pa byas nas/ kun nas mtshams bcing ba byas/

shing bsrung ba'i cho ga byas la/ bdag bcing ba dang/ gtsug tor bcing ba dang/ mtshams bcang ba byas te/ de'i 'og tu kha shar du phyogs te/ dkyil 'khor la mngon du phyogs pas skyil mo krung gis 'dug la/

don yod pa pad+ma'i gtsug tor stong phrag brgyad bzlas par bya'o// gu gul la lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas pa'i bdug spos dbul bar bya'o// de nas 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug dbus kyi snying po'i dkyil

'khor du pad+ma'i gsar gyi dbus su tshangs pa'i cha byud 'chang ba/ pad+madang zhags pa thogs te bzhes nas phyogs bcur rnam par gzigs par mdzad de/ rig sngags 'chang la bka' stsal pa/ rig sngags 'chang
lags so legs so// khyod kyis rig pa 'dzin pa grub po// don yod pa'i zhags pa pad+ma gtsug tor kyi rig pa'i rgyal po 'di rjes su zung zhig/ rig sngags 'chang ji ltar yid la byed pa bzhin du

'dod pa'i mchog thams cad sbyin par 'gyur ro// 'di ni rig sngags 'chang de rnams kyi mal du gnas ba'i skye ba'i tha ma yin te/ skye ba brjes nas thams cad du bad+ma las rdzus te skye bar 'gyur 'o// thams cad du

tshe rabs dran par 'gyur zhing/ thams cad du skye ba dran par skye bar 'gyu so// skye ba nasaskye ba thams cad du don yod zhags pa'i dkyil 'khor mtha' dag dang/ cho ga zhib mo 'argyal po mtha' dag kha ton du byed
do don yod zhags pa'i gtsug tor dri ma med pa kha ton du kun tu gnas so// de nas rig sngags 'chang gis 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi zhabs drung du mchod yon dang zhags
bsil dbul bar bya/ a ka ru'i bdug pa dbul bar bya/ me tog ji ltar 'byor pa dbul bar bya/ gshegs su gsol bar bya ste/ de nas 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug mi snang bar 'gyur ro//

de lta bu byas nas rig sngags 'chang nam mkha' la 'gro'o// donayod pa'i gtsug tor pad+ma dri ma med pa'i 'od zer gyi bkod pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin so sor thob ste/ rig pa 'dzin pa bye gakhrag khrig brgya stong phrag
ga su rtsa bzhis yos su bskor bar 'gyur zhing/ bskya'i ris kyi 'khor los sgyur bar 'gyu'o// tshel bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig bar stong phrag dgu bcu rtsa dgur 'gyur 'o// dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga dang/
sgrub thabs kyi cho ga'o// de nas de'i sa ris bshad par bya ste/ don yod pa'i zhags pa pad+ma gtsug tor gyi rig pas sa khru bzhi pa byas nas sam/ yang na dar la bal tshon sna tshogs pas

rnam par phye ste/ lha'i gzugs mchog tumadzes pa/ phyag gnyis pa/ 'od zer gyis 'khor bar bya'o// nas ris sgrub pa ni dkar po'i phyogs kyi tshes bco lnga la tshon lhag ma min pa snod gsar par bzhag pas ri mo

mkhanagatsang ma legs par khrus byas pas 'dri gzhug par bya'o// dbus su 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug tshangs pa'i cha byad 'chang ba/ pad+ma rgyas pas yongs su bskor ba bya ste/ khor yug tu 'od

0 'dom gang ba/ kun nas 'bar ba'i 'phreng ba can/ phyag bzhi pa/ zhal gsum pa// ral pa'i cod pan gyis brgyan pa/ zla ba tshes pas smras pa/ 'od dpag med kyi cod pan 'chang ba/ mdung rtse gsum 'char ba/

bana'i 'dab ma rnam par bkra ba'i pad+ma'i zhags la 'chang ba/ phyag g.yon par mi rtog 'chang/ pad+ma'i steng du pad+magatsug tor bya'o// 'dab ma phyad kha bye ba'i dbus kyi pad+ma'i 'dab ma la 'phags pa spyan las

gzigs dbang phyug mgul yan chad tsam cod pan 'chang ba/ dbu 'bar ba'i snying por yod par khri bar bya'o// phyag gcig ni dbug 'byin pa 'tshang zhing rin po cha'i char 'bebs pa/ 'bar ba'i snying po can/

rgyan thams cad kyis rnam par brgyan pa/ sna tshogs pa'i gas chang ba bya'o// pad+ma'i gdan la klu'i rgyal po dga' bo dang nye dga' bo mgo bo dgu pa/ kus yongs su bskor ba dang bcas pa/ thal mo 'chapazhing/

lus phyed par bya'o// nya dang/ chu srin dang/ me tog sna tshogs dang/ nor bu shol dang/ ngang pa dang/ ngur pa dang/ shang shang te lus yang dag par brgyan pa'i kha khyer dang bcas pas smras pa'o// gzhogs
g.yas su sgrol ma rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa/ thal mo sbyar ba smad de 'dzin pa/ 'bar ba'i snying po'i lus na bya'o// g.yon du gos dkar mo gos dkar po 'chang ba/ rgyan thams cad kyis rnam par
brgyan pa= 'bar ba'i snying po'i lus can/ thal mo smad de 'chang ba'o// gzhogs g.yas su khro gnyer can skyil krung phyed pas bzhugs pa bya'o// de'i 'og tu dkar sham ma gos dkar po 'chang ba bya'o//
g.yon du srin mo chen moral ba gcig ma bya ste/ phyag brgyud pa drag mo drag tu rgod pa'i pho nya mo bya'o// bzhin khro gnyer can/ thams cad skyil krung phyed pas bzhugs pa/ rgyan thams
cad kyis rnam par brgyan pa/ thams cad pad+ma'i gdan la bzhugs pa bya'o// stong du tshangs pa dang/ khyab 'jug dang/ dbang phyug chen po dang/ lha'i dbang po rnams nam mkha' nas bcom ldan 'das
dang bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa byed bzhin pa bya'o// 'og tu pad+ma la gshin dang/ chu lha dang/ lus ngan dang/ gzhon nu rnams khrus bya ste/ skyil krung phyed pas bzhugs pa bya'o// rgyal po chen po
bzhi rnams bya ste/ drag po'i gzugs skyil krung phyed pas bzhugs pasta/ de rnams thams cad kyang pad+ma 'dzin pa'i gzugs su bya'o// rig sngags 'chang ni bcom ldan 'das dang/ 'phags pa spyan ras
gzigs dbang phyug gi zhabs drung du pad+ma'i gdan la rig sngags 'chang pus mo btsugs pa bya ste/ pog por dang/ 'ganam tog gi phor pa dang/ bgrang 'phreng 'dzin pa// com ldan 'das kyi zhal la
lta bar byed bzhin pa bya'o// de lta bu'i sa ris kyi bya ba pad+ma yangs pa'i dkyil 'khor mtha' dag dang/ ras ris kyi dkyil 'khor mtha' dag gi nang du gtogs par 'gyur 'o// mthong pa tsam gyis
mod la sdug bsngal dang/ sdig pa dang/ ngan 'gro thams cad rnam par nyams par byed do// thams cad rab tu zhi bar 'gyur ro// 'gro ba thams cad gcod par 'gyur ro// nyes par byas pa tham
0 car 'joms par yang 'gyur 'o// sdug ba dang/ sgrib pa thams cad dang/ mtshams med pa lta las rnam par thar ba'i byed do// mthong pa tsam gyis mod la don yod pa'i dngos grub so sor
thob po sems can thams cad kyis kun tu bskor bar bya ba dang/ mchod par bya ba'i 'os su 'gyur ro// dgos pa thams cad legs par sgrub par byed bar 'gyur ro// bde bar byed
par 'gyur// nor dang/ gzugs byed pa dang/ bkra shis dang/ longs spyod dang/ rigs dang/ dbang phyug dang/ stobs dang/ ljobs pa dang/ bsod nams dang/ skal ba
bzang kho'i byed pa dang/ bdag nyid chen po'i yon tan gyi bye brag 'phel ba dang/ bsod nams bsags pa dang/ dge ba'i rtsa ba mngon par 'tho la ba dang/ phun sum tshogs par byed do//
mthong ba tsam gyis mod la las su bya bar 'os pa'i bya ba thams cad byed do// de ltar nas ris mthong ba tsam gyis med la yon tan gyi bye brag lhag par rtogs par 'gyur ro zhes so// 2sa sa
sgrung pa'i cho ga dang// sgrub thabs kyi choga'o////de nas phyag rgya bshad par bya ste/ phyag rgya rnams kyi don yod pa'i 'khor los sgyur ba/ phyag rgya chon po bla na med pa//
'jig rten dbang phyug gis rgyas btab pa/ sems can thams cad la phan par byed pa/ don yod pa'i phyag rgya thams cad dang sgrub thabs thams cad kyi dngos grub bla na med pa/
sdig pa thams cad zad par byed pa nyid dang/ phyag rgya'i dam tshig gi dngos grub bla na med pa/ phyag rgya bzung ba tsam kyis mnar med pa'i ng skams par byed ba//
sadmyal ba rnams skams par byed pa ste/ gang gis bzung ba tsam lasogs pas dmyal ba pa'i sems can thams cad grol bar byed cing skams par byed do// dus gsum pa'i de bzhin
gshags pa thams cad dang/ rgyal ba de rnams thams cad kyis dgongs par 'gyur ro// phyogs bcu kun tu gzigs par 'gyur te the tshom med do// dus gsum pa'i rgyal ba dang/
byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs thams cad dang/ de bzhin du pad+ma'i phyag gis rtag tu mchog sbyin pa dang/ rtag tu mthong bar 'dod pa dang/ lha rnams kyis rtag tu srung bar byed cing dga'
ba dang/ 'og min gyi lha dang/ lha'i dbang po brgya byin dang/ sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha thams cad kyis srung bar byed cing kun nas yongs su skyong bar byed de/ thams cad la cho ga bzhin
du bdag nyid kyi snying las skyes pa'i bu bzhin du dge ba dang/ zhi ba dang/ stobs dang/ brtson 'grus nyid dang/ mdas kyang rab tu 'jug par byed cing/ de bzhin du'ang tshe 'phel lo//
lhaphyag rgya 'di rnams bzung bas bkra mi shis pa thams cad nyams par byed do// bgegs thams cad nyams par byed cing/ bdud dang/ log par 'dren pa dang/ gdug ba'i gnod sbyin rnam
[/ ]paranyams par byed do// gdug pa'i srin po dang/ yi dgas thams cad kyang phyag rgya 'dzin bzhin pa'i skad cig de la mgo bo tshal ba bdun du 'gas shing mig 'byin par byed do// brgya byin dang
tshogs dang bcas pa'i gdug pa thams cad rab tu nyams par byed do// de'i phyir yang dag par 'dzin par byed l la lag pa 'i thal mo pad+ma 'dra ba/ pad+ma 'byung ba'i gtsug tor don yod zhags pa'i
phyag rgyas sdigs mdzug yongs su dkris la/ mthe bong gi sor mo dang/ gung mo'isor mo rab tu brkyang la lcags kyu'i rnam par bkug ste/ ming med dang mthe'u chung lag pa'i nang du bcug
nas rtag tu snying kha'i gnas su gzhag par bya ste/ 'di ni don yod pa pad+ma gtsug tor girtsa ba'i gsang sngags kyi sngags dang phyag rgyar brjod do// de bzung ba tsam dang/ phyag rgya dang/ gsang
sngags brjod pa nyid kyis dus gsum du gshegs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad rnam par 'gyur ba drug tu g.yos te char 'bab par byed do// me tog gi char dang/ lha rdzas kyi gas dang/
rgyan dang/ lhab lhub rnams mchod pa'i don du kun nas char bab po// dus gsum du gshegs pa'i sas rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs dang bcas pa thams cad kyis bsod nams kyi phung

po chen po stong phrag bskyad do// phyag rgya de bzung ba tsam gyis skad cig de la phyag rgya gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma dang mnyam pa bya ba stong phrag bya ba'i grangs su bgrangs po'i phyag rgya bcings par 'gyur ro//
phyag rgya bzung ba tsam gyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang/ de bzhin du thub pa rnam par snang mdzad kyi phyag rgyas byin gyis rlob ba// ri rab kyi tshad dang mnyam pa'i
rin po che sna bdun gyis rin po che'i phung por byas te/ dus gsum du gshegs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa so so soso la khul ba dang/ rgyal ba thams cad kyi bsod nams kyi phung po chen po
thob pa'i grangs kyi tshogs nyid kyang phyag rgya bcings pa tsam gyis 'di'i 'bras bur 'gyur te/ de bzhin gshegs pas nyin mtshan rtag tu rnam par gzigs par the tshom med do zhes so//

phyag rgya 'di nyid las ga yas pa'i mdzub mo brkyang ste rtsa ba'i gsang sngags lan cig brjod do// phyag rgya 'di ni don yod pa'i zhagapa gtsug tor dri ma med pa'i chu skyes kyi stobs spyan ras gzigs kyi
nga bo zhes bya ste/ thams cad du las thams cad lags par thob par byed do// phyag rgya'adi bcings pa tsam gyis kyang bsod nams kyi tshogs thams cad dang/ spyan ras gzigs don yod
ba dri ma med pa'i dngos grub tu'ang 'gyur ro// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis gzigs pa dag pa'i snying po'i phyag rgyayang dag par 'dzin par 'gyur ro// sdig pa dang/ ngan 'gro
dang log par ltung ba'i 'jigs pa thams cad rab tu zhi bar 'gyur ro// phyag rgya 'di bzung ba tsam dang/ dang bo bcings pa tsam gyi ri rab chen po ltar 'gyur te/ bdud dang bgegs
la sogs pa thams cad rung/ 'byung po dang/ gnod sbyin dang/ srin po thams cad kyi yi 'gul zhing mi g.yol zil gyis menonapar yang 'gyur ro// phyir rgol ba dang dgra'i 'jigs pa thams

cad las yongs su grol lo// de bzhin gshegs pa gang+ga'i klung gi bye ma dang mnyam pa bya ba brlastong phrag dgu bcu rtsa dgu'i drung dudag ba'i rtsa ba'i bsod nams kyi tshogs chen po kun tu 'adzin par
'gyur ro// dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyod pa dang ldan par 'gyur ro// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku mngon sum du mthong ba dang ldan par 'gyuba'o// phyag rgya'i gsang ba'i lhag par 'dren pa 'di
'tshong bzhin pa de de bzhin gshegs pa'i phyag rgya gang cung zad yod pa de mig gis gas lapa' mthong ngo// thams cad du rab tu 'ching zhing 'dzin par 'gyur ro// gang yang 'phags pa spyan ras
gzigs dbang phyug gi sgyu ma lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin gyi phyag rgya gang yin pa dang/ phyag stong gi phyag rgya gang yin pa dang/ nor bu'i rigs kyi dkyil 'khor gyi phyag rgya gang yin pa dang/
glang po'i rigs kyi dkyilaM 'khor gyi phyag rgya gang yin pa dang/ don yod zhags pa'i ya ngasal rgya chen po'i dkyil 'khor gang yin pa dang/ rta mgrin gyi phyag rgya gang yin pa dang/ mgrin
sngon gyi phyag rgya gang yin pa dang/ gzhan phyag rgya'i dam tshig gsang ba rnam pa sna tshogs pa gang yin pa de rnams thams cad kyang/ phyag rgya 'di gcig du bcings pa tsam gyis de rnams
thams cad bcings par 'gyur zhing yang dag par bzung bar 'gyur la/ kun tu bcangs pa dang mchod par yang 'gyur ro// 'di ni phyag rgya thams cad kyi phyag
rgya'i gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor du gdugs gcig pur gyur pa ste/ ji ltar 'phagrul spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi sgyu ma lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin gyi rnam bar 'phrul pa bzhin du phyag
rgya 'di nasgyu ma lta bu'i phyag rgya'i rnam par 'phrul pa ste/ las thams cad la phyag rgya 'ad sbyar na/ gang dang gang lo rab tu sbyor ba de thogs pa med par 'grub bo// phyag rgya 'di nyid las
mdzub mo 'i sor mo gnyis brkyang la lcags kyu'i rnam pa tsam du bkug pa ni gnas pa'i phyag rgya 'di spyan drang ba dang/ bod pa dang/ yang dag par bskul ba dang/ mchod pa'i sprin nyid kyang
yin// dam tshig dang/ phyag byed pa dang/ 'jug pa dang/ skor ba byed pa nyid dang/ gdan dang/ phyogs bcing ba dang/ dkyil 'khor bcing ba dang/ mtshams bcing ba zhes pa dang/ gtsug
tor bcing pa dang/ bdag srung ba dang/ gzhan srung ba dang/ de bzhin nyid du grogs srung ba dang/ lus dang/ gos bgo ba dang/ bya rig byed pa nyid dang/ sbyin sreg dang/ de bzhin du sngags
bzlas pa dang/ bdug pa dang/ me tog dang/ dri dang/ 'breng ba dang/ byug pa dang/ gtor ma 'bul ba'i las dang/ de bzhin du gshegs su gsol ba nyid dang/ de bzhin du 'gug

pa ste/ thams cad la phyag rgya 'di bya'o// sa bcuganon pa'i phyag rgya dang gsang sngags banu la'ang phyagargyabade bya ste/ snying po dang nye ba'i snying po 'di nyid kyang thams cad du sbyar bar bya'o//
khro bo'i rgyal po nyid dang/ mngon par dbang bskur ba dang/ rigs kyi gsang sngags dang/ gzhan la'ang phyag rgya 'di dang/ phyag rgya 'di'i snying po dang/ nye ba'i snying po nyid kyang rab
tu sbyor bar bya'o// khro bo'i rgyal po'i mngon por dbang bskur ba dang/ rig sngags kyi gsang sngags gzhan la'ang gnas thams cad du sbyar bar bya'o zhes so// phyag rgya'i cho ga dang skyug
thabs kyi cho ga'o/// phyag rgya gsum ni rnam sprul pa// phyag rgya de dag yang dag bstan// bzang po gtso bo chen po ste// mchog dang rab mchog nyid yin no// phyag rgya rgya
rnam brun med// 'jig rten 'dren pas bstan pa yin// snying po de nyid gyur pa ste// phyag rgya dkyil chen legs par bsgrubs// sangs rgyas byang chub phug rgyu'adi// dus gsum gtogs
pa'i de bzhin gshogs// kun gyis 'di ni phyin gyis brlabs// phyag rgya dus gsum gshegs pa yis// de bzhin gshegs pas phyag rgyar btab// de bzhin sangs rgyas chen po pa/
thub pa snang mdzad kyis kyang btab// de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs dkyil gyi// gsang nyid kun tu bazhugs pa yin// de nas gsang sngags gsang ba nyid// dngos grub bla med
brgyu/ bshad par bya// oM a mo g+ha hrid la/ pad+ma uT+Thir a ka' ya/ sA d+ha ya b+ha ra saM b+ha ra/ mahA pad+ma sAhA/ bskul ba dang/ sbyan drang ba dang/ gshegs su
gsol ba'i sngags so// oM pad+mauT+Thi a mo g+ha maN+Dal hU~M/ dkyil 'khor srung ba dang/ phyogs bcing ba dang/ mtshams gcad pa dang/ dri chab dang/ chu dang/ yungs kar bsres
la lan bdun bzlas brjod byas pas bya'o// oM pad+mashi kha ra hU~M/ spyi gtsug bcing bu yin te/ lan bdun bzlas brjod byas pas so// oM pad+ma uT+Thib a mo g+ha dza le hU~M/ khrus
bya ba'i sngags so/ yus kar dang chu la lan bdun bzlas brjod byas pas so// o ba la shud+d+he[% ]/ nye reg bya ba'i sngags so// o lo tsad ya pad+me hU~M/ gog bgo ba'i
rgyu sngags so// o mi li mi li shuts+tsha hUM/ lus yong su sbyangs ba'i sngags te/ ba'i rnam lnga'i chu la lon bdun bzlas brjod byas pa gso// oM pad+ma u ra a cho ga a b+hi li'u A
shuT+Ta hU~M/ dbang bskur ba'i sngags te/ dri chab la lan bdun bzlas brjod byas pas so// oM pad+ma ka pa tse/ dri b+hU ban+d+ha hU~M dz+wa la sgra/ go cha'i sngags do/ lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas
brjod byas pas so// oM badzra a d+hi na pad+me hU~M/ byin gyis brlab pa'i sngags so// o dz+wa la pad+me d+ha ra ha ra hU~M/ sa'i sngags so// oM pad+ma ya/ ru ha tsa la tsa la kaM/ gdan gyi
sngags so// o de bya pad+me maM/ che tog gi sngags so// pad+maa me ga saM b+ha ra Ni pAhA/ bdug spos kyi sngags so// oM pad+maganad+ha I shwa ri hU~M/ byug spos kyi sngags so// oM pad+ma
pra kIr+ya d+ha ra Ni sa ma AhA/ 'bras yos dang me tog dkrum pa'i sngags so// oM pad+ma dza la su gan d+ha ba ti hU~M/ mchod yon dbul ba'i sngags so// oM shAklo bcir sa ya nabuny+tsehU~M/ lha bshos
kyi sngags so// oM su ru su ru kum+b+ha ba ti sAhA/ gtor ma'i sngags so// oM ma hApad+ma a bi ni sA d+ha ya hU~M/ gtor ma zar gzhug pa'i sngagasaso// oM pha la bi shud+d+he pra ba ra hUM 'bras bu'i
sngags so// o phra ba la pul+ledza ya tsitA/ 'phreng ba'i sngags so// oM dzA la dzI la ya ra sa ra A gyi Ni hU~M/ gtor ma bcos pa'i sngags so// o pad+madA pa ya dzA la hUM/ mar ma'i sngags so// os

mi pad+mab+ha ban lus ra hU~M/ 'jug pa'i sngags so// oM pad+ma u[]kha a mo g+ha munihUM/ phyag bya ba'i sngagos so// oM tsakra maN+Da las man pad+me hU~M/ bskor ba'i sngags so// oM sa man+ta pra tIts+tshapa/

sam+b+har hU~M/ me tog der ba'i sngags so// oM pad+mas ma ya uT+Thing/ mahA a mo g+ha sa ma ya hU~M/ dam tshig gi sngags so// oM sa mnasAltar capate hUMphaT/ skyil mo krung gi sngags so// oM a pa ri mi ta

dzA laM pany+tsehUM/ bgrang 'phreng gi sngags so// yon tas ha sra tshul ta par+ya b+ha' star hU~M/ bzlas brjod kyi sngags so// oM sa man+tad+ha ri sha pad+me hU~M/ rmi lam gyi sngags so// o seman+ta rak+Sha ra Ni pad+me hU~M/ srung ba'i sngags so//
mo sa man+ta me ru dri b+ha smra hU~M/ ra ba'i sngags so// oM sa man+ta/ dzA lAnA lA gany+nyo/ dzA la dzA la/ mahA pad+me dzA le hU~M ma'i sngags so// o d+hu ru d+hu ru/ pra sa ra/ d+has rim/

b+hahA/ srog blugs kyi sngags so// oM sa man+ta a ba lo ki ta gu bya/ bA yu dza bu pad+ma'i ge nasatA/ nam mkha' la 'gro ba'i sngags so/ oshu b+has d+hu ra Ni pad+mab+hu dza hU~M/ mtshon cha'i sngagosas//

mos man+ta A kar Ni pra sar gu phye hU~M/ drang ba'i sngags so// nam/ tib+hu gan/ i shwa rA ya/ lo ke shA rA ya/ ma he shwa rA ya/ b+har d+har/ sa man+ta/ a ba lo ki ta/ gu bye/ A gats+tsha lha ga ban d+hi'i

b+hi'i ma tA ba ri ma ni ka na ka 'adzra bi klu/ mar ka ta pad+marAg/ in+d+ra nI la/ ma sku muk+ti ka/ b+hi b+hu Shi ta sha rI ra/ mahUmats+tshab+hu dza/ a mo g+ha sha d+hu ra/ sa man+ta a ba lo ki ta/ bar du

ba ra dwa ya ka/ dzA la dzA la/ sa man+ta/ a ba lo ki ta/ Agats+tsha A gats+tsha/ b+ha ga ban gI g+ho sa ma ya/ ma nu sma ra/ bi ba d+ha be pa 'o/ ya ma ba ru Na/ ku bar na mas+saM taM kA I sha ra/ ma nye

ra pad+moshwa ra/ lo ki shwa ra/ e he b+ha ga bon/ g+haM A gats+tsha/ satshab tum lta la/ so ma ya ma nu sma ra/ da ri shan hUMr pa na/ bi bi d+ha te dza dz+ha ra/ sa man+ta rak+Shi/ tshwa la gan+ta1nIr/ ma

tsha kA ru Ni ka so ma mya mu kha/ pa'i pu ra Na/ tsan+d+ra maN+Da la mu khe/ na ba tsan+d+ra dza Ta rta'/ a mi ta b+hU/ ma ku Ta b+ha ra/ matubrah+ma ba Sha d+ha ra/ trilo tsa na a mo lha ba ra da/ b+hu ru b+hu ru/ mahA kA ru Ni ka/ pad+ma
pA sha a ba lo ki te/ shud+d+has t+tha/ ba ra dwa sa ka/ na mostu te swAhA/ 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gshegs su gsol ba'i sngags so// rig sngags 'dis gu gul nag po la lan btu
rtsa brgyud brgyus brjod byas nas 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la bdug par bya'o// bdugs pa tsam gyis mod nyid la 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyag gi gzugs kyis ston par/
mdzad cing mchogathams cad sbyin par mdzad do// gal te mtshams med pa lta byed ba mnar med par gzhol ba des kyang bdugs pa tsam gyis nges par ston par mdzad naM/ dge slong tshangs par spyod pa/
bsam pa dag pa/ dad pa can/ mos pa lta mos kyang mi dgos/ mod nyid la rang gi gzugs rang gi ngo bo yongs su dag pa mngon sum du ston par mdzad cing/ mchog thams cad sbyin par mdzad
la don yod pa chen po'i dngos grub sbyin par mdzad do// drag po la btugs na gzugs mngon sum du mdun na 'dug cing/ 'dod ba dang dgos pa'i dngos grub thams cad sbyin par byed do//
sred med kyi bu la bdugan gzugs brnyan 'gul zhing tshig 'byin la/ yid la bsams pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs par byed/ rtag tu rjes su 'brang bar 'gyur/ stobs dang/ shugs dang/
brtson 'grus dang/ pha rol gnon pa'i dngos grub sbyin par byed do// ma mo'i gnas su nag po chen po la bdugs na nag po chen po ma mo'i tshogs dang bcas pa dbang du gyur nas 'dug lawA
dur phyu ba thams cad grub par byed/ thams cad du dngos grub chen po sgrub par byed do// tshogs kyi dbang phyug la bdugasan bgegs dang logasadren thams cad bcings
sa ra 'gyur ro/ 'dod pa'i dbang phyug la bdugs na snang ba dang/ bdud dang/ bar chad byed pa gzhan gang yin pa de dag thams cad bcings par 'gyur zhing mi snang bar 'gyur ro// rgyal po'i
sgyu sgo'i bdugs na rgyal po btsun mo'i 'khor dang bcas pa bkug nas dbang du 'gyur te/ nyeba'i gnas la 'dod pa dang bya ba thams cad byed do// nyi ma shar ba'i tshe nyi ma la mngon du phyogs nas

bdugasan nyi ma 'bab cing 'a dod pa'i dngos grub thams cad sbyin par byed do// zla ba sku la za dugs na zla ba 'bab cing dbang phyug 'byor pa chen po sbyin par byed do// rnam thos kyi bu la bdugs gzhon
'dzil ba chen po sbyin par byed do// lha mo chen mo dpal la bdugasan dpal 'thob par 'gyur ro// gdon thams cad la btsugs na bdugs pa tsam gyis 'bab cing phyogs bcur 'phros so//
chu zin pa 'am ma zin pa la bdugs na mod la 'ong ngo// dur khrod kyi mi ro la brtags na ro langs lang bur 'gyu'o// thod pa la bdugs na bab cing gar byed glu len rgyug par byed cing sprod
gtong byed do// rdo rjel bdugs na 'bara'o// mdung rtse gsum pa la bdugs na 'bab par byed do// 'khor lo la btugs na nam mkha' la 'gro'o// thag pa la bdugs na sbrul bzhin
'khril bar byed do// rdza ma dang/ bum pa dang/ bum bu la bdugs na 'bab par byed cing rang nyid 'gyur bar byed la phan tshun 'gro bar byed do// lhung bzed la bdugs na rang nyid 'gro bar/
byed do// ral gri la btugs na 'bab par byed cing 'bar bar byed la rang nyid 'gro bar byed do// dung la bdugs nas bus na sgra gang du grag pa de dag thams cad du 'thab pa dang/ 'thab
mo dang/ rtsod pa dang/ 'gyed pa dang/ yums kyi nad dang/ gnod pa dang/ 'go ba'i nad dang/ 'khrug pa dang/ nad thams cad dang/ nyon mongs pa thams cad dang/ sdig pa dang/ gdug
pa thams cad dang/ dgra thams cad las thar par 'gyur zhing sgrib pa thams cad zad par 'gyur ro// rims thams cad la bdugan rims thams cad zhi bar 'gyur ro// rims nyin
bzhi pa la bdug cing gsang sngags kyang rjes su dran n rims nyin bzhi pa ku co 'don cing 'bros par 'gyur ro// klu'i mtshor bdugs na mod nyid la char gyi rgyun chen po 'babs par byed do//
char ches na gnas mthon por bdugs na char ches pa gcod par byed do// sprin la mngon du phyogs nas bdugs na grang lhags dang/ rlung dang/ sar ba thams cad gcod par byed la/ lo gcig
gi bar du mtshams chen po bcad par 'gyur ro// ri mthon po'i rtser bdugs na phyogs bzhi thams cad kyi pha rol gyi dmag tshogs dang/ phyir rgol ba dang/ phas kyi dgra thams cad dang/
dpa ga tshad stong gi bar du rmugs pa dang/ rengs pa dang/ bcings par 'gyur la/ dbag tshad stong gi bar du mtshams chen po bcad par 'gyur ro// bdag nyid la bdug
na sems can thams cad la mchod pa'i gnas chen por 'gyur la/ sems can thams cad dbang du 'gyur ro// bu mo la bdugs na bag ma blangs par 'gyu/ tshong zong la bdugs na
rin che bar lom par 'gyur ro// bang ba la bdugs na 'bru 'phel ba mang bar 'gyur ro// btung ba'i gnas su bdugs na btung ba 'phel ba mang por 'gyur// gos la bdugs 'gos thob
b+hA par 'gyur ro// me tog dang 'bras bu la bdugs na gang la byin pa de dag tha dal te dam nor gyi sgo nas dbang du 'gyur ro// 'phrang ba la btugs nas gsang sngags lan bdun bzlas brjod byas nas gang
gi mgo la bcings pa de la 'bab par byed cing/ ya mtshan byung ba dang 'byung ba smra'i// 'phags pa rdo rje 'chang la bdugasan rig sngags chen po'i dngos grub thob par 'gyur zhing/ 'phags
pa rdo rje 'chang ston par mdzad la dgos pa thams cad sgrub par mdzad do// gnod sbyin mo'i gzugs bris ba la bdugasal gsang sngags lan bdun dran par byas na/ gnod sbyin mo 'ongs nas 'dod
pa thams cad sbyin zhing las byed par 'gyur la/ ji srid 'tsho'i bar du nye bar 'dug go/ sbyor ba mo la bdugs na sbyor ba mo thams cad dang/ mkha' 'gro ma thams cad dbang du gyur nas
ca00 ji srid 'tsho'i bar du nye bar 'dug go/ 'dod dgur bsgyur ba'i gzugs can la bdugab na 'dod dgur bsgyur ba'i gzugs can ma 'ongs nas chung mar bya'o zhes smra na/ ji srid 'tsho'i bar du yo byad
dang longs sbyod du bya ba thams cad sgrub par byed la/ 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga la rtse bas dga' gral 'gyur ba dang/ rnam thos kyi bu la 'gran par 'gyur ro/ dril bu la btugs nas sgra dkrol na
'jigs pa thams cad las thar bar 'gyur la/ bsrung ba chen po byas par 'gyur/ khyim gyi nang du dkrol na 'byung po dang/ gnod sbyin dang/ srin po dang/ ya dgas dang/ brjed byed dang//

grib gnon thams cad byung nas phyogs bcur 'bros par 'gyur so// oM a mo g+ha pA sha pad+ma u Sha/ tar ta 'o/ a pa ta raM tu/ b+ha ga ban gats+tshan tu/ su rgyu ba zhan/ tu ru tu ru/ mahA bslu b+hu tshe swAhA/
slar gshegs su gsol ba'i sngags te/ bdug pos gu gul dang/ chu dang/ yus kar dang bsras nga la lan bdun bzlas brjod byas n thams cad dusur gshegs su gsol ba'i sngagasabyas par
'gyur ro// gsang sngags rim par phyi ba'i cho ga dang/ sgrub pa'i cho ga'o////danamAmo chagamo sgral na byang chub sems dang 'asems dar chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang
phyug ga la ba desong ste phyin nas/ byang chub sems dpa' soms dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas/ lha'i mchod pa 'i sprin chen pos mchod de
lan gsum bskor ba byas nas mgo btud de thal mo sbyar nas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la 'di skad ces smras so//
bcom ldan 'das rig sngagasachen po 'jig rten du cher bstan lags so// gsang ba chen po'i dkyil 'khor dang/ phyag rgya rim par phye ba dang/ cho ga zhib mo dang/ no yod pa'i zhags pa pad+magatsug tor
gyi rig sngags kyi rgyal re chen po'i snying po rig sngags 'chang thams cad kyi don dang/ sems can thams cad la phan pa dang/ bde bar bgyi ba'i slad du 'dzam bu'i gling du bzhi g lags so// bcom ldan

'as bdag gis kyang don yod pa pad+magatsug tor gyi rig sngags kyi rgyal po de'i snying po dang/ chog zhib mo don yod par sgrol ba dri ma med pa pad+magatsug tor gyi zhags pa zhes bgyi ba rigasags kyi rgyal po 'i/
snying po bshad par bgyi ste/ rigasngags 'chang gang gis dran pa tsam gyis bdag bkug cing g.yar drangs par 'gyur/ rig sngags 'chang gis rig sngags sgrub cing yongs su spyod pa la rim gro bgyi ba
[P”]dang/ rig sngags 'chang sgrub pa'i dngos grub mchog stsal bar bgyi ba dang/ bsam pa thams cad yid bzhin du yongs su bskang bar bgyi ba de dag gis bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan snga 'khor mang po 'dus
ba'i mngon sum du rigasngags kyi rgyal po bshad par bgyi'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pas/ lhamosgrol ma la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// lha mochen mo sgrol ma rang gi rig sngags kyi rgyal

ca0 bo de bzhin gshegs pa pa'i byin gyi rlabs kyi phyag rgyas byin gyis brlabs kyis shod cig/ de nas lha mo chen mo sgrol mas bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar don yod pa sgrol ba drim med pa brlagatsug tor gyi

zhags pa zhes bya ba rig sngags kyi snying bo smas pa/ na mats+tsha la ya d+hI kA naM/ ta thA ga tAnaM/ ka ra dzA ya a d+hiSh+Thanan mas+saM tAnaM/ na mo ra sna tra yA ya/ nam/ Ar+ya a ba lo ki tishA rA ya/ bo d+hi sa tA ya/

ma hAs twa ya/ ma hA kA ru Ni kA ya/ na ma tsArA yaM/ ma hA de ba/ o ra Ni kA la tsi tu'i/ pad+ma bi b+hu Shi ta ra/ ma tsaka na ka/ tsi tri ta ma la/ dza Te ma ku Tanan/ de ta pad+me/ d+hu ru d+hu ru pad+mapA sha b+hu dze//

a mo g+ha pen hasta/ tA ra ya b+ha ga ba ti/ ma hAsid+d+haM/ ba' dra/ tur tu ru/ mahA tA ra Ni/ ba red/ sA b+ha ya sA d+ha ya/ sid d+he/ a mo g+ha ba ra de swAhA/ oM a mo g+ha pany+tsi ni tAr sAhA/ snying po'o//

oM ma Ni tA'i hU~M/ naba'i snying po'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di ni bdag gi gsang sngags nor bu rin po che chen po'i snying po// don yod pa'i zhags pa pad+magatsug tor gyi'ig sngags kyi snying po zhags pa cho ga
zhib mo'i rig sngags 'chang ba rnams kyi bsam pa yongs su rdzogs par bgyi ba dang/ sems can thams cad la mchog stsal ba rab tu stsal bar bgyi ba'i slad du rjesagu stsal lags so// bcom
ldan 'das rig sngags kyi rgyal po 'di yo byad dang cho ga bshad par bgyi ste/ du ru ka dang/ gu gul dang/ sgrig ka gcig tu bgyis la/ gsang sngags kyi snying po 'di lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas
[n ]u@#// brjod bgyis nas/ bcos ldan 'das bdag la bdugs na ba dugs pa tsam gyis med pa bcom ldan 'das bdag dgug pa dang ga yar dras par 'gyur lags so// bcom
ldan 'dus rigs sngags 'di sgrub pa'i tshe rang gi gzugs kyis mdunan mchis shing/ bsam pa thams cad yid bzhin du dngos grub rjes su stsal bar bgyi/ bgegs dang log 'dren thamasacad
bzlog par bgyi/ gnod sbyin dang/ srin po dang/ 'byung po dang/ sha za thams cad bzlog par bgyi/ 'thab pa dang/ 'thab mo dang/ rtsod pa dang/ 'gyed pa thams cad rab tu zhi bar bgyi//
bsam pa thams cad yid bzhin du rdzogs par bgyi/ mchog sprul bar bgyi/ bde legs dang/ dge legs bsrung ba dang/ bskyab pa dang/ sbra par bgyi'o// bcom ldan 'das mchis nyal ban

rgyu bdug spos kyi rgyal mo 'dis bdag la bdugs shing/ bdag gi snying po nor bu rin po che chen po'i snying po gsum podi dag lan nyi shu rtsa gcig brjod na bdugs pa tsam gyis mod dang/ dran pa tsam gyis
bcom ldan 'das bdag nyid kyi ngo bo rang gi gzugs yongs su dag pa bstan cing mngon sum du mchis par bgyi/ mchog thams cad rjes su stsal bar bgyi/ byung ba dang 'byung ba'i bka' mchis bgyi'o//
dran pa tsam gyis mod la don yod pa pad+ma gtsug tor gyi zhags pa'i snying po 'di dran pa tsam gyis/ bam ldan 'das bdag rig sngags 'chang de'i mdun du mchis shing bsaMm pa thams cad yid bzhin
du yongs su rdzogs par bgyi/ sdang ba dang/ sdig pa thams cad dang/ bgegs dang/ log 'dren thams cad so sor bzlog par bgyi/ dngos grub chen po sgrub pa rjes su stsal bar bgyi/ bkra shis
kyi sgra thams cad 'byung bar bgyi/ rig sngags kyi dngos grub thams cad rjes sustsalabar bgyi/ mog zhib mo dang/ dkyil 'khor dang/ phyag rgya rim par phye ba'i dngos grub thams cad rjes su stsal ba
bgyi bsod nams drang ba'i dngos grub thams cad rjes su stsal bar bgyi/ dus ma yin par 'chi ba thams cad so sor bzlog par bgyi/ sdig pa dang sgrib pa thamasacad rnam par dag par bgyi/ rtag
tu rjes su 'brang bar bgyi/ rtag tu rgyanami 'chad parig sngags 'chang gi bgegs dang log 'dren thams cad so sor bzlog par bgyi/ nad thams cad bsal bar bgyi'o// bcom ldan 'ga'ig
sngags 'chang 'gum pa'i tsho rnam par shis pa tha ma la babaste/ btsem ldan 'das bdag gis rtag tu mngon sum du bstan cing mdun na nye bar mchis par bgyi/ sangs rgyas yid la bgyid pa pashin tut+tan
pasaa mam 25'a bar bgyis pa dang/ ji ltar sbrul pags pa brjes pa bzhin lus brjes nas 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba can gyi skal ba dang mnyam par pad+madag la rdzus te skye la/ rgyun thams cad kyis
brgyan pa dang/ tshe rabs su tshe rabs dran par 'gyur/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis yongs su bzung zhing byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur/ lus rdo rjer 'gyur/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing thamasacad
0 @# du chud par 'gyur/ sa bcu la gnas par yang 'gyur/ phyir mi ldog pa'i sa la gnas par yang 'gyur/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis lung bstan pa'i ya nga 'gyur/
dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad bskyed par yang 'gyur/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mngon sum du ston par 'gyur/ bsod nams kyi tshogs thams cad bsags par 'gyur/ sdig pa dang/ sgrib pa
dang / gdug pa thams cad yongs su dag par 'gyur/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba'i dam tshig rtogs pa dang/ gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor chen po'i dam tshig byang chub kyi snying
po'i mthar thug pa'i bar du 'tshal bar 'gyur ba lags so// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pas/ lha mo chen mo sgrol ma la legs so zhes bya ba byin te/ lha mo
chen mo legs so legs so// rig sngags kyi rgyal po 'di khyod kyis bshad pa mchog tu legs so// cho ga zhib mo 'di yongs su rdzogs par bya ba dang/ rigasngags 'chang de'ang yongs su bsrung ba'i

phyir dang/ lo sa su bskyang ba'i phyir dang/ dngos grub rab tu sbyin pa'i phyir khyod kyis yongs su bskyang bar bya'o// degs gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po lag na rdo rje dang/ rgyal po chen po bzhi dang/ tshas

ba dang/ khyab 'jug dang/ dbang phyug chen po dang/ lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin dang/ tshogs kyi bdag po nag po chen po dang/ rig sngags dang/ dkyil 'khor gyi lha du ma dang/ nor bu bzang po'i bu
0 dang / rjes chen dang/ gar mkhan mchog dang/ stobs can dang/ stobs po che dang/ lcang sngo dung/ dungacan dang/ de bzhin du 'jigs byed dang/ dbyangs ldan ma dang/ dpe med ma dang/ lha mo tshanamo

rang yid las sa khag mang dam catshams 1/ lam bar ma nas mthun lhan las las la ga4 6 paga ma dang/ me tog tsam// thams cad 'aanas mthur la langs/ bgos lhag la gcig tu gzar nas/ pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te/
bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar nas btud de/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag cag kyang phyi ma'i dus phyi ma'i tsherig sngags 'chang de dang/
rig sngags smra ba'i rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo 'am/ dge slong ngam/ dge slong ma 'am/ dge bsnyen nam/ dge bsnyen ma'am/ gzhan yang skyes pa 'am/ bud med dam/ khye'u 'am bu mo
gang zhig rten yod pa'i zhags pa gtsug tor 'di sgrub par bgyid dam/ klog par bgyid dam/ 'don tam/ tha na ming tsam yang 'dzin par bgyid na/ bcom ldan 'das de la bdag cag kun nas mthun
par rtag pa rjes su 'brang zhing bsrung bar bgyi/ yongs su bskyang bar bgyi/ gzi brjid gzhug par bgyi/ dngos grub chen po 'i bsam pa yongs su rdzogs par bgyi/ bsam ba thamasacad kyi mchog
yongasasu rdzogs par bgyi/ nyes par bgyis pa thams cad so sor bzlog par bgyi/ sdig pa dang sgrib pa thams cad yongs su sbyang par bgyi/ byang chub kyi snying po la mtha' thug gi bar du rtag tu rjes
su 'brang bar bgyi'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis 'di skad du/ grogs po dag legs so legs so// khyed kyis bya ba de ltar yin te/ rig sngags kyi rgyal po chen po 'di ngas
ka gtams shing yongs su gtad do zhes bka' stsal to// don yod pa'i zhags pa pad+ma gtsug tor gyi rdo rje chen po'i snying bo gsang ba rdzogs so// ka rnam par thar ba chen po'i dkyil
khor gyi snying po gsang ba bstan pa bklags pas grub pa chog zhib lo rgyas pa mchog tu gsang ba mtha' dag rdzogs pa yos su rdzogs so//'di nas byang chub sems dpa'
sems dpa' chen po 'phags spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la gtugs nas mig mi 'dzums par bcom ldan 'das kyi zhal du bltas nas/ bcom ldan 'das
la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das 'di nab dag la pad+ma yangs pa'i dkyil 'khor bad+ma'i rigs kyi snying por gyur/gsapa de kho na nyid bstan khar mas te/ rnam par thar pa'idakyil/

'khor gyi gsang ba'i don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po khro bo'i rgyal po rig sngags kyi rgyal bo'i snying po bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar ngo bo tha dad pa dang/ phyag rgya tha dad pa dang/ sngags tha dad pa dang/
dkyil 'khor dang/ gzugs bri ba yongs su bsgrags par bgyi/ sems can thams cad rjes su gzung ba'i slad du/ rig sngags 'chang ba rnams kyi de kho nar gyur pa grub pa ni 'di lags te/ rig

sngags 'chang ba thams cad kyi gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor pad+ma yangs pa'i dam tshig don yod pa'i zhags pa sgrub pa'i chog rjes su stsal bar bgyin/ bcom ldan 'das de bdag la gnang bar mdzad cing/ de bzhin
gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsakyi dmatshig byin gyi rlabs dang/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs dang/ pad+ma'i rigs dang/ nor bu 'i rigs dang/ rdo rje'i rigs dang/ spyi'i dam tshig 'grub par 'gyur/

spyi'i byin gyi rlabs dang/ rig sngags kyi rgyal po'i dkyil 'khor dang/ gzugs bri ba dang/ phyag rgya rim par phye ba larjes su 'jug par 'gyur/ cho ga zhib mo sgrub pa thams cad kyi dngos grub de khon nyid
du 'gyur/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing dang/ byang chub sems dpa'i dkyil 'khor du 'jug pa'i dam tshig gi byin gyi rlabs kyi de khon nyid du 'gyur lags so// de nas de bzhin
gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to//

snying rje chen po dang ldan pa don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po 'i dmatshig rnam par thar pa chen po'i dkyil 'khor rnam par 'phrul pa/ byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi dam tshig dkyil 'khor chen po dang/

na ma garaka ma ri'i dal ba bar pa shes na dacig/ sa byin gyis brlags shing rjes su yi 'ang la phyag rgya chen pos btab nas byin gyisphyag rgya'im par phye ba cho ga zhib mo de'i dus la da khab por shes nashod cig/ ngas byin gyis brlabs shang rdza
pa gang+ga'i klung gi bye ma bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag dgu bcu rtsa dgu'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi byin gyi klugs kyis byin gyis brlabs so/ ems can thams cad kyi don chu/
de khon nyid kyi dngos grub bla na med pa 'i phyag rgya dang/ dkyil 'khor rim par phye ba dang/ ma tshig chen por byin gyis brlabasaso// des byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras
gzigs dbang phyug bzhin 'dzum zhing/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsang ba rnam par thar pa'i dkyil 'khor rnam par 'phrul pa bkod pa don yod pa mthong ba'i ting nge 'dzin mngon sum du byas
nas cing de'idzin des stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams na sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad 'od zer gyis snang bar byas/ lha'i gnas thams cad snang bar byas/ klu'i gnas thams cad
snang bar byas/ gnod sbyin dang srin po'i gnas thams cad snang bar byas/ 'byung po'i gnas thams cad snang bar byas/ lha ma yin dang/ ma mkha' lding dang/ mi 'am ci dang/ lto 'phye chen
po'i gnas thams cad snang bar byas/ sa'i 'og tugatogs pa 'gan gnas pa thams cad snang bar byas/ bar snangagi gnas niam mkha' la rgyu ba'i lha rnams snangabar byas shing/ stong gsum gyi stong
chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kun nas g.yo ba chen por gyur pa dang/ g.yo ba'i mthu des de dag thams cad bskul bar gyur to// bskul ba tsam gyis mod nyid la de dag thamasar lhags ta/ ri rgyu
'dzin n 'khor mang po 'dus pa'i mthun par lhag nas 'khod do// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan sa gzigs dbang phyug 'khor mang bo 'dus par mkhyen nas/ don yod
pa'i zhags pa'i cha byad du zhugs shing bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'dug nas/ 'di ltar de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsang ba thams cad du rigs spyi'i dam tshig gi tshul du zhugs l/ ral pa'i thor tsugs
kyi rgyal ba 'od dpag med thor tsugs su gsal/ tshas pa'i gzugs can/ phyag bco brgyad rang gi ngo zhags pa thogs pa/ thal mo sbyar ba/ sku phyed na phyag g.yon pa brten pa/ mdung rtse gsum

ma bsams pa/ ril baspyi blugs dang bgrang 'phreng bsnams pa/ pad+ma bsnamasal/ sats+tsha'i phyag rgya bsnams la/ yid ng zhin gyi nor bu dang rgyal mtshan bastsamasal/ ma tog gi phur ma dang ba dza pu ra bsnams/

pa dbugs 'byin par mdzad pa/ rin po che'i char 'bebasalar mdzad pa/ thal mo sbyar ba'i phyag mdzad pa/ lci ba'i phyag rgya mdzad l/ mtshig gi phyag rgya mdzad pa/ pad+ma pad+ma pa 'i phyag rgya mdzad pa/
rje'i rigs kyi dam tshig gi phyag rgya mdzad pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa dang nor bu'i phyag rgya mdzad pa/ gzugs zhib/ spyan gsum pa/ mchod phyir thogs pa/ gdan pad+ma/ sku 'od zer sna tshogs 'bar
ba sgrol ma bdun rjes su 'brang ba/ pha rol tu phyin pa bcus bskor ba/ brgya byin dang tshas pa dang/ gshin rjod ng/ tshulhadang/ lus ngan pos bskor ba/ dbang phyug dang/ dbang phyug chen po/
dang/ tshangs ba dang/ lha'i bu dang/ sred med kyi bu dang/ dbang chen dang/ rgya mtsho dang/ dga' bo dang/ nye dga' bo 'khor dang bcas pa bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa'i spyan sngar//
lakhod nas mig mi 'dzums shing bzhin 'dzum pas/ me tog sna tshogs pa rnams bcom ldan 'das la'athor ti/ 'di lta ste/ me tog shA ladang/ ta ma la dang/ tsam pa ka dang/ a ti mut+taka
rang// kA brtadang/ kha bye 'khyil ba dang/ gnad+habArIka dang/ mthon kha dang/ mthon kha chen po dang/ ka dam pa dang/ mdog mdzes pa dang/ su ma ka dang/ spyasna' dang/ cher gsal
ba dang/ dri med gzi brjid dang/ dri dga' dang/ rab sam dang/ pha la sha dang/ za ba dang/ mAratsAka dang/ gzi brjed bsil dang/ drimed dang/ gzi ya sa ldan dang/ shin tu bstan dang/
lha dga' dang/ yid dga' dang/ yuwi ka dang/ bats+tshe dang/ ku mud dang/ bad+ma dkar po dang/ ut+pal dang/ ut+pa la dmar po dang/ ta ra Na gu bya dang/ gser dang dngul dang/ rin po
che rnam pa sna tshogs kyim tog rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa byed pa ni mngon sum du rnam pa thar pa'i dkyil 'khor gsang ba don yod pa'i rgyal mo 'di smag so// dus gsum du gsheg
shing bzhugs pa sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsang ba rigs kyi dam tshig la phyag 'tshal lo// rig sngags kyi

00 rgyal po don yod pa rnam par thar pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi rigs dang phyag rgya thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo// 'das pa dang/ ma 'ongs pa dang/ daltar byung ba'i rang sangs rgyas dang nyan thos kyi dge 'dun
thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo// yang dag par rtogs pa rnams la phyag 'tshal lo// yang dag par zhugs pa rnams la phyag 'tshal lo// blo gros chen po dang ldanupa shar pra ti'i bu la phyag 'tshal
lo/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po khyams ra la sogs pa 'gas pa tshigs kyi mchog rnams la phyag 'tshal lo// 'phags pa de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag/
par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od dpag med la phyag 'tshal lo// dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thugs rjechen po dang ldan pa spyan ras
gzigs rab ng phyug la phyag 'tshal lo// drang srong chen po de dag dang 'phags pa'i tshogs kyi mchog de dag la phyag 'tshal nas/ 'apags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi zhal nas byung bo//
donayod pa'i rgyu de rnam par thar ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi snying po de bzhin gshegs pa'i mngon sum du gsungs pa 'di 'khor mang po'i nang du bdag gis da bzlas kyis/ bdag gi dgos po thams cad
grub par gyur cig/ 'jigs pa thams cad du srung bar gyur cig/ tad+ya thA/ o tsa ra tsar/ ci'i phyir/ tsu ru tsu'u/ mahAka Tika/ ba ri ba'i/ pa ri pa'i/ sde ri/ pa ra ma ma hA kA ru
Ni ka/ se ra sa'i/ ci'i phyir/ mi 'i pa'i/ bde bar/ ma hA pad+mahasta/ ka la ka la/ ki li ki li/ ku lu ku lu/ ma h+phashud+d+hasat+tha/ e phyi hi/ bud d+ha bud rgyu/ glu ba lhub/
kaN ka Ta/ ki Ti ki Ti/ ku tu ku T+Ta/ pa ra ma shud+d+hasatu/ ka ra ka' ki'i ki'i/ ku ru ku ru/ mahA snum pa tsa ka tsa la/ sany+tsa la sany+tsal/ tsa la bi tsal/ a Ta Ta al Ta/ b+hur
b+har/ b+hi'i b+hir/ b+hu ru b+hu ru 2 e h+ya hi mahA kA ru Ni ka/ mahApa shu pa ti ba Sha d+har/ rtar d+ha ra/ sa res ra/ tsar tsar/ ha ra ha ra/ sA hAhA tA/ nInI nInI/ hu hunyAhA/ o kAr braglab na

lhar b+hagab+ha'agad+hi'i snyir du 'u d+hu ru/ ta ra ta ra/ sa ra sa ra/ pa ra bar/tsar tsar/ b+har b+ha ra/ ba gta/ sa ha su pra ti/ maN+Di ta sha ri ra/ dzA la dzAl/ ta pa ta pa/ b+ha ga ban/ so ma A di tu/

ya ma ba ru Na/ ku bor/ brah+main+d+ra/ ro Sha de ba ga Na/ a byAtsi ta tsa ra Na/ su ru su ru/ tsu ru tsu ru/ pu ru pu 'u/ mu ru mu ru/ sanata ku mAr/ ru dra da sa ba/ bit+ta dz+han da/ bA su de ga raM bi nA ya

ka bi nA yaka/ ba hu bi bi b+ha ba Sha d+ha ra/ d+har da ra/ d+hi'i rdor/ d+hu ru d+hu ru/ tha ra thar/ g+ha ra g+ha ra/ ya ra yar/ lar la 2 ha ra ha ra/ ma ra ma ra/ par pa 2/ tsar tsar ba lta ba 'a/ bar
dA ya ka/ sa man+ta a ba lo ki ti/ bi lo ki te/ lo ke Ar/ ma reshwar/ mu hu mu hu/ mu ru mu ru/ mu ya mu ya/ muny+tsamuny+tsa/ bcom ldan 'das 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug
bdag dang sems can thams cad 'jigs pa thams cad dang/ gnod pa thams cad dang/ yams kyi nad thams cad rung/ gdon thams cad dang/ nad thams cad las srung du gsolasrung
du gsol/ gnod pa dang/ 'ching ba dang/ rdeg pa dang/ bsdigs pa dang/ rgyal po dang/ chom rkun dang/ gnod byed dang/ ma dang/ chu dang/ dug dang/ mtshon las yongs su thar par
mdzad pa/ ka Na ka Na/ ki Ni ki Ni/ ku T+Ta ku T+Ta/ tsan+da can/ in+d+ri ya/ bu 'a bo rgyang+ga/ mA ra ka/ tsa tu rUr+ya sa/ sam pa kAsha ka/ ta ma tam/ dam dam shamangasham/ sems ma/
ma hAta mon rtu ka ra/ bi jum na/ ka Ta pA ra mi tA/ pa ri pu ra ka/ mi li mi li/ kha Ta Ta Ta/ kha ta kha ta/ kr-i Ti Ti'i/ 'u zu rngu cu/ Ni[RR]/[8] rta a Ni yatsakr-i ta/ pa ri ka ra/

e bye hi mahA kA ru Ni ka ma ho shrar/ mahA b+hU ta/ ga Na hUM dza ka/ ku ru ku ru/ pa ra pa ra/ ka Ta ka Ta/ ma Ta ma Ta/ bi shud+d+ha'i rngaya ni bAsi ni/ mahA kA ru Ni ka/ shwa ta yapho ba dI tAya/ 'a/
ma ku Ta/ mA la ltar/ sa dzAr si kr-i taM/ dza TA ma ku ba ma hAd b+hu ta/ ka ma la kr-i ta/ kar ta la/ rgyu nas mAn+ti/ bi mak+Sha/ a pra kasgyu/ ba hus tra/ sam+b+ha ti pa ra pa tsa ka/ mahA kA ru/

Nika/ sarba karma A ba ra Na bi sho d+ha ka/ sarba dI b+hi pa ri mo tsa ka/ saMchaA Sha pa ri pU ka/ sarbasatwasam shAs kar na mo sku ta swAhA/ oM bra glu ba lasnyar/ d+har b+har/ b+hi'i b+hi'i/ d+hu ru d+hu 'u/
nganubya/// sa man+ta/ dzAm a mo g+ha hU~M/ don yod pa'i snying bo/ a/ yig gcig pu ni kun nas gsang ba de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs kyi dam tshig dang/ pad+ma yangs pa'i dkyil
'khor du zhugs pa/ rigs thams cad kyi spyi'i yan te bklags pas grub pa'o// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan 'as gzigs dbang phyug gis snying po yi ge
gcig pa kun nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rigs kyi gsang ba phyi'i rnam par thar pa'i dkyil 'khor smras pa tsam gyis/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di
rnam pa drug tu g.yos shing/ lha'i me tog gi char rab tu bab la/ kun nas rin po che'i char rab tu bab po// de bzhin gshegs pa gang+ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag stong/
phyogs kun nas gshegs nas nam mkha'i dkyil la rdzu 'phrul gyis bzhugs so// don yod pa'i rim par phye ba'i sprin lha'i rin po tshes bdun phab la 'bab pas khebs pa dang/ lha'i rin po che
sna bdun gyi ma tog rnams dang/ lha'i rgyan dang/ gos sna tshogs pa'i char bcom ldan 'das dang/ 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs don yod pa'i rgyal po'i tshul du zhugs pa la mchod pa dang/
sku bkur ste bya ba'i phyir rab tu phab po// sa sargyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gis kyang legs so zhes bya ba'i sgra 'byin par mdzad de/ sems can dag pa chen po khyod kyis sangs rgyas 'byung ba
mchog bstan pa legs so legs so// 'di lta ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rigs kyi gsang bu'i phyag rgyu dang/ dkyil 'khor dang/ rig sngags kyi gnas rim par phye ba rnam
par thar pa'i dkyil lor dang/ yi ge gcig kha'i rjes su zhugs pa ni stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams su nyi ma gcig shar ba yin no// gang 'das pa dang/ ma'od/
pa dang/ de ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams rdul phra mo snyad kyi sangs rgyas 'byung ba rdzogs par sangs rgyas 'byung ba gcig gi
thams cad kyi rjes su zhugs pa yin zhing/ snying po yi ge gcig gis rjes su zhugs pa yin la/ phyag rgyu dang/ dkyil 'khor rim par phye ba dang/ mtshig gcig gis rjes su zhugs pa yin/
don yod pa pa ra 'phrul pa rnam par thar pa'i dkyil 'khor de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsang ba'azang bo 'di ni don yod pa 'gas nga sngags kyi zhags pas drasashing sku gcig gi dam tshig la bkod pa
yan te/ de nas chen yod pa'i zhags pa zhes bya bar phyin gyis brlags so// snying po yig gcig pa'i gzungs sngags ni rtag tu bklags pas grub pa// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis byan
kyis ngo rlags pa yin no/ de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan sa gzigs dbang phyug la legs so zhes bya ba
byin ste/ snying rjechen po dang ldan pa legs so legs so// de kho na nyid bsgrub pa grub ba/ de bzhin gshags pa'i rigs spyi'i dam tshig thams cad grub pa/ don yod pa'i zhags
ba'i snying po sgrubapa bklags pas 'grub pa 'di ni mchog tu bzang ba yin gyis/ yon tan gyi phung po shod cig/ snying po yi ge gcig pa 'di ni don yod pa'i zhugs pa bsgrub pa'i cho ga sgrub pa bde ba//
bklags pa 'ib pa/ phyag rgya dang/ dkyil 'khor dang/ sku gzugs ri mo dang bcas pa sgrub pa'i cho ga bla na med pa yin no// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras
gzigs dbang phyug gis/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// btsem ldan 'das don yod pa'i zhags pa pad+ma yangs pa'i dkyil 'khor dang/ pad+ma'i rigs kyi rnam par thar pa'i dkyil 'khor

dang/ de kho na nyid kyi dam tshig gi snying po gsang ba chen po dang/ rigs spyi'i sgrub pa bklags pas 'grub pa 'di'i yo byad dang cho ga bshad par bgyi yis/ bcom ldan 'das kyis byin gyis brlab du gsol/
bcom ldan 'das gang gis dran pa tsam gyis bdag mdun na nye bar mchis shing bsam pa thams cad yid bzhin du yongs su rdzogs par bgyi/ rig sngags kyi dngos grub thams cad rjes su stsal bar bgyi'o/
sku/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug legs so legasaso// de ltar khyod kyis sems can thams cad bsgral bar bya zhing/ rig sngags 'chang rnams kyi dngos
[n/ ]grub dam pa mchog de khyod kyis rab tu sbyin par gyis shig/ don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po 'i gsang ba'i dam tshig dang/ yi ge gcig pu rigs spyi'i rjes su zhugs pa de bzhin gshegs pas byin
gyis b.rungs kyis/ yo byad dang sgrub pa'i tshe gshed cig/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dang ba chen po 'phags spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug bcom ldan 'das kyis dbugs phyung ba dag thos

nas snying shin tu dga' ste/ yo byadi dang tshog smas pa// bcom ldan 'das kyis mngon sum nyid du sdug pa srog cing ma lus ba zad par bgyid pa/sems can dmyal ba rtsa ba nas 'byin pa'i rasbyil 'khor gyi tshogs
pa/ dkyil 'khor gru bzhir byas nas su/ dbus su pad+ma'i 'khor lo bya/ tshon rtsi sna tshogs rnam par dbye// pad+ma ze ba'i dbus su ni// spyan ras gzigs dbang bzhugs par bya// bum pa bkang
dang 'phan rnams kyis// dkyil 'khor kun nas brgyan par bya// me tog sna tshogs legs par dgram// dros dri bzang pos bskos pa[”]yi// mama'i 'phreng ba kun tu bud// mchod yon chu dag
gzhag par bya// gu gul dang ni sa la la ki/ ka ru dang du ru kas// bdug spos snod ba'i rig nas bdug/ rig sngags 'chang ba khrus byas nas// gos gtsang bgos te smyung ba la// nye bar
gnas nas tshes brgyad dam// bcu bzhi'am tshes ni bco lnga ste// zla ba yar gyi ngo la sgrub// shar du ba bltas 'dug nas su// don yod zhags pa dus gsum du// nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas brjod bya//
snying po'ang brgya rtsa brgyud du bzlas// yi ge gcig pu 'bum du ni// mtshan mo bcad med par bzlas// skya re ngas shar nas 'jig rten dbang// ze ba'i dbus na 'bar
ba 'gyur zhing// 'gul 'gyur 'gul ba de lasan// dmyal ba chen po bcu drug ga/ sgo rnams dag ni bye bar 'gyur// dmyal ba'i gnas nas shugs chen gyis// g.yol g.yos pa tsam des ni/
dmul pa'i tshor ku rnam par 'jig/ dmyal ba de yang rnam par 'joms// sems can dmyal ba de dag ni// thar nas phyogs bcur rgyug pa yi// dmyal ba'i skyug bsngal kun las grol//
mtho ris lam du zhugs par 'gyur// dud 'gro'i skye gnas kyi sdug bsngal thams cad dud 'gro rnams las yongs su grol bar 'gyur/ bodag nyid kyi sgrib pa dang/ sdig pa dang/ sdug bsngal mi
bzud pa thams cad mthar gtugs par yongs su zad par 'gyur/ 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal thams cad las yongs su grol bar 'gyur ro// gal te sdig pa thams cad zad par gyur na//
bde'i tshi'aphags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi sku mdog gser gyi mdog can du ston par mdzad la/ mchog thams cad sbyin par mdzad do// don yod pa'i dri med pa'i ye shes rgya
mtshob kod pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin thob pa'i 'gyur/ sgrib pa dang bral ba sems kyi rgyan rnam par dag pa'i bdag nyid kyi ngo bo thob par 'gyur/ de bzhin gshegs pa gang+ga'i klung gi bye ma
pa04 bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag dgu bcu rtsa dgu po rnams mod nyid la mngon sum du ston par mdzad la/ de bzhin gshegs pa de dag thams cad kyi phyag g.yas pa mgo'i spyi bor 'jog pa3 mdzad/
