bsod nams kyi phung po chen po dang ldan par 'gyur/ dge gra'i rtsa pa chen po yongs su gzung bar 'gyur/ 'jig rten pa kun gyis gcig tu mchod pa chen po byas par 'gyur/ gshin rje
dang/ tshulha dang/ lus ngan dang/ zla ba dang/ nyi ma dang/ tshang pa dang/ khyab 'jug dang/ dbang phyug chen po rang gi gzugs kyis mngon sum du ston cing/ nye 'khor la kun nas
srung ba dang/ skyob pa dang/ sbod pa khyud par 'gyur/ dngos grub dang dgos pa thams cad 'grub par 'gyur/ gal te sdig pa thams cad zad par ma gyur na/ de'i tsha 'phags pa spyan
gzigs dbang phyug giskumadog gser gyi kha dog can du mi mthong/ ris sgrib pa dang sdig pa lhag ma lus par shes par bya ste/ de nyid du bzlas brjod kyi cho ga smyung ba gnyis pa byas pa dang/
sdig pa dang sgrib pa thams cad rtsa ba dang bcas pa thams cad phyung bar 'gyur ro// gal te bzlas brjod kyi cho ga smyung ba gsum pa byadan bzlam tshod kyi chog gsum rdzogasal dang/ 'phags pa spyan
ras gzigs kyis phyag g.yas pa brkyang nas rig sngags 'chang bteg sta/ mod la 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba can du 'od dpag med kyi spyan sngar 'jog par mdzad la mngon sum du bzhugs so//
de bzhin gshegs pa tshe dang ga med kyis dbugs 'byin par mdzad cing phug spyi ba' 'jog par mdzad de/ tshe dpag tu med par 'gyur ro// gal te sems can gzhan
rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo 'am/ dag sbyong ma/ bram ze 'am/ skyes pa 'am/ bud mad dam/ khya'u 'am/ bu mo 'am/ tha na dud 'gro'i skye gnas su song ba gang zhig sdig pa/
dang sgrib pa zad par 'dod na rigs sngags 'chang khrus byas la gos gtsang ma la gas/ sbyang byas pa des dkyil 'khor la mngon du phyogs par gzhag la/ rig sngags 'chang cho ga byed pas gas pa/
sngags rjes su dran par byas nas rma bya'i sgros khyab par bya'o// de tsam gyis yon tan gyi khyado par thob par 'gyur te/ sdig pa dang sgrib pa thams cad zad par 'gyur/ nad thams cad dang/ gdug/
pa thams cad dang/ nab thams cad dang/ mtshams mad pa thams cad zad par 'gyur te the tshom med do// sgrib pa dang bral ba nyid thob par 'gyur zhing tshig gzung bar 'os par 'gyur/ lha
cad kyis gzung zhing kun nas srung bar 'gyur/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung thob par 'gyur/ 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyugagazigs bzhad par 'gyur/ tshe'ing dang/ sgrib pa dang//
nad dang bral bar 'gyur/ tshe 'phos nas 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba can du skye bar 'gyur/ tshe rabs su tshe rabs dran par 'gyur/ dag ba'i rtsa ba bsod nams kyi tshogs thams cad dang ldan par
ba 'gyur te/ snying rjedang byams pa chen po yid la bya ba rtse gcig tu bya zhing sbyang pa dang bzlas brjod bya'o/ sdig pa dang sgrib pa zad par bya ba'i dkyil 'khor chen po'i cho ga'i//
'phags pa don yod pa'i zhags pa'i cho ga zhib mo'i rgyal po bam po bcu bdun pa// de nas rtag tu bzlas pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga bshad par bya ste/ dkyil 'khor

gyi tshad ji lta ba bzhin du legs par phyi ba/ gru bzhi pa/ rgyab gzings kyi tshad kyis shin tu rnam par phye ba bya ste/ dri'i tshon rtsi rnam par bkra ba kun nas pad+ma'i 'phreng ba dang rdo rje'i ga par la brten pa'i

dbus su pad+ma bya'o// rdo rje'i thig skud kyis kun nas bskor ba'i dbus kyi pad+ma'i ge sar la 'phags pa spyan rasagazigs dbang phyug tshangs pa'i cha byad 'dzin pa dgod par bya'o// nyi ma re re zhing me tog/

dang bdug pa dbul bar bya zhing/ nyi ma re re zhing a ka ru'i bdug pa dang khrus byas gos gtsang ma bgos te/ don yod rgyal po'i bzlas brjod dang phyag rgya bcing bar bya'o// yi ge gcig pa'i snying po'i
bzlas brjod thun gsum du lan gsum mam/ lan bdun nam/ lan nyi shu rtsa gcig tu bzlas so// zas ngan pa bcu yongs su spang bar bya zhing/ sems can ngan pa'i ng srang bar bya'o// sgrub thabs
kyi de kho na nyid las thams cad du 'jig rten pa'i bya ba thams cad 'grub po// 'jigs pa chen po mi bzad pa brgyad po de rnams las grol lo// don yod pa'i rgyal po dran pas nad thams cad rnam ra 'a
[p ]bslu// nyams par byed do// dug dang/ sbyar dug dang/ byad stems dang/ gdon thams cad dang/ 'jigs pa dang/ sdang ba dang/ skrag pa dang/ rims dang/ nad thams cad dang
pholamig dang/ ltog pa dang/ mtshan mar rdol ba dang/ g.yan pa dang/ rkang shu dang/ mdzad ng/ mgo bo na ba dang mig na ba dang/ rna ban ba dang/ snan ba dang/ kha na ba dang/ rgan na pa dang/

mgu la na ba dang/ snying na nga dang lto na ba dang/ so dang mtshun ba dang/ lag ba na ba dang/ rtsib logs na ba dang/ chu son ba dang/ pho ba'i nad dang/ ma zhu ba dang/ rkang pa na ba dang/ rgyab na ba dang/
na lag dang nying lag thams cad na ba dang/ tshad pa dang/ gzhang nad dang/ gcin nad dang/ gsud pa dang/ 'khogs pa la lan cig brjod de byabs pa tsam gyis thams cad sel bar byed de myur
du'ang tu zhi bar byed cing nad cig de nyid la'ang yang dag pa ra gnas par byed do// la jig rten pa'i bya ba cha zhan thams cad 'grub par 'gyura'o// de bzhin za/ shags pa bye ba phrag khrig
brgya stong phrag dgu bcu rtsa dgu'i dag pa'i rtsa ba nyi ma re re zhing skyid par 'gyupa'o// bsod nams chen po dang ldan par 'gyur ro// tshig btsun bar yang 'gyur// 'jig rten thams cad kyi bla
mar yang 'gyur// mchod pa'i 'os chen por 'gyur ro// donam zhing che ba dag 'ong bar 'gyur ro// dbang phyug rta dpon po lhun gyis grub pa nyid du rnyed do// rgyal po dang/ btsun mo'i 'khor dang
[8 ]g.yog tu bcas pas gcig tumachod par 'os pa sa' gyur ro// nyi ma re re zhing 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug ma thong bar 'gyur ro// rtag tu'ang de bzhin gshags pa 'asku mthong ba
se ra thob bo// as rgyas kyi zhing nga dag ra ra brgyan pa mthong ngo// tshos brgyad dang bco lnga la po Ta la ka'i ri ngo'i gzhal med khang 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi gnas ni/
'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug bzhugs te/ 'khor chen po la chos ston pa 'a mdzad bzhin pa dang/ 'od dang ga med bde ba can gyi gnas na bzhugs pa mthong sta/ ji srid byang chub snying

po'i bar du mthong ngo// 'chi 'phos pa na bsams pa nyid kyi mad 'bad ba can gyi khams su skye bar 'gyur te/ rgyan thums cad kyis rnam par brgyan par pad+malas rdzus te skye bar 'gyur ro// sgrib pa dang

bral zhing rnam par 'phrul pa byin gyis rlob pa don yod pa'i 'od zar zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin de gar thob po// ting nge 'dzin gang zhig thob pas sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang+ga'i klung gi bye ma bya ba khrag khrig brgya
stong phrag snyad las 'das pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la mngon par phyag byas nas// se golag rtogs pa tsam nyid la slar yang 'ong ba de lta bu'i tingang 'dzin so so'athob bo// ting nga
'dzin gzhan khrag khrig brgya stong phrag so sor thob cing/ bzlas pa'i cho ga gcig dus las thams cad sgrub par 'gyur zhes so// bzlas pa'i dkyil 'khor chen po'i cho ga'o//
'a// de nas khrus kyi dkyil 'khor bshad par bya ste/ khrus byed pa la mkhas pa gang gis dri ma thams cad sel bar byed cing mdzes pa// sdig pa thams cad rnam par nyams par byed
pa dngos grub thums cad byed pa'i de kho na nyid bsod nams dang gzi brjid rab tu 'phel bar byed pa// nad thams cad sel bar grub pa// sdig pa dang sdig to nyams par byed pa// de bzhin du zad
pa dang nyams pa bcom pa// dug dang byad stems nyams pa// nad yun ring po ya sa su spangs pa/ de bzhin du gcong yumAring po dang mis yongs su sngangs pa// 'di dag khrus kyis 'grub ste/
rig sngags rta nga yin pa des 'grub bar don yod pa spyan ras gzigs dang nga phyug gis yongs su bsgrugs so// dugags kyis rig pa gang yin pa dang/ grib gnon gyi gdon mi bzad pas reg pa gang
an ba dang/ pha rol gyi dmag tshogs kyi 'jigs pa mi bzod pa dang/ 'thab pa dang/ rtsod pa la'ang dgra rnams kyis pham pa dang/ skya gro sdang ba dang/ gang gi 'khrug pa'i g.yul du 'ong ba dang/
myuka ra kyis bcom pa gang yin pa dang/ blo'i skye ba zad pa dang/ ma ning dang/ nyams pa'i mning dang/ dbapapo nyams pa'i bar gang yin pa rnams dang/ bu mi 'tsho ba gang yin pa na kyi bu mthun/
par skyo bar 'gyur ro// gsad cing gzhom pa thob pa gang yin pa dang/ 'ching ba dang gsod par song ba gang yin pa dang/ chom rkun nan/ rkun mo'anang ngam/ gnod sbyin nam/ srin po'i nang du song
ba gang yin pa dang/ gcan gzan gtum po'i nang du song ba'i nga yin pa dang/ mche pa gdug pa dang/ dug gi khrod du song bas dug 'jigs pa mi bzad pa zos pa gang yin pa dang/ khyim rdeb pa dang/
g.yangs dang/ phyi ba ba gdug pa'i 'jigs pa rnams dang/ mi mngon par sdig pa byed pa gang yin pa dang/ mtshams med pa byed pa gang yin pa dang/ 'phags pa la skur pa 'debs pa dang/
dam pa'i chos spong ba 'di rnams dkyil 'khol du khrus byas pas thams cad yang dag par zad par 'gro zhing/ myur du thams cad rnam par nyams par byed de/ rtswa rnams mes sreg pa bzhin du ston
bsags pa'i mi bzad pa'i las 'di dag thams cad rnam nyams par byed do// 'jig rten thams cad kyi bla ma dang rtag tu mchod par 'os par 'gyur ro// tshe yun ring por gnas te/ rtag tu bde
ba dang dga' bar byed do// ji srid 'a'i bar du nad me da ci nga rims med pa nyid du gnas so// bde blag tu bya ba byed cing/ de'i skye ba bdun dran par 'gyur ro// lha rnams kyis rtag tu srung bar byed
cing mthar thug rtag tu dpal 'bar bar byed do// sangs rgyus rnams rtag tu mthong ba dang/ rtag tu 'jig rten dbang phyug gis mchog sbyin par byad ba dang/ rtag tu mthong bar 'dod pa'i ng thun mtshams
! rtag tu mngon sum du mthong bas gnas par byed do// rtag tu rigasnga gas dang/ dkyil 'khor gyi lha dang/ rig sngags kyi dngos grub tu 'gyur te/ rtag tu dkyil 'khor kyi mchog gang yin pa'i ng sgrub
par byed do// rgyaragazes kyi tshad kyi dkyil 'khor gru bzhi ba bya ste/ mtshon sna tshogs pas rnam par phye ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi mchog bri bar bya'o// me tog dang 'bras bu sna tshog

bas bkra ba/ sgo bzhi kun nas rnam bar phye ba dang/ las rnams legs par zin nas dbus kyi dkyil 'khor gyi snying po la 'khor lo yang dag par bri'o// pad+ma'i lte ba dang snying po nyid kyang 'bar ba'abu'o/
zur dang zur rnams su zhags pa 'bar ba pad+ma la gnas par bya'o// rig sngags 'dod pas khrus dang gtor ma dkar po'anga'adir dgod par bya'o// akA ru'i bdug pa dbul zhing/ dkyil 'khor kyi
ny+nyA tshog ji lta ba bzhin du dkyil 'khor legs par brgyan par bya'o// las gzhan sgrub pan ro sna tshogs pa'i gtor mas mchod par bya zhing/ sna tshogs pa'i bdug spos dbul lo// bum pa rgyus bkang
'a nas rdzas kyi phyi ma rnams der gzhug cing/ rin chen sna bdun bcugaste/ de la rgya dar gyis bcings la/ don yod zhags pa lan brgyadang/ snying po nyid kyang lan brgyar bzlasalo/ yi ge gcig pa
brgya rtsa brgyad du bzlas so// tsan dan dang/ sami dang/ si Thadang/ hab shang tsi'u dang/ gur kum dang/ yungs kar dang/ pad+magasar rnams legs par brtags nas bum pa bkang
bar bya ste/ 'di rnams kyis khrus bya'o// nya'u shing dang/ shu ti dang/ bil ba ste/ 'di rnams kyis nyed pa dang/ rtag tu sngon du byang par byas la/ des mkhas pas sa bya'o// de nas srung
dang / dam dang/ gzig dang/ srid dang/ khyi dang/ phag dang/ rtse myung rnams las nor bu'i rgyal po gang du gnas pa'i mod la tham cad du sgrol bar byed do// dug dang/ sbrul thams cad dam/
mche ba gdug pa dang/ sbrul go na sa dang/ bta sa na b+ha dang/ dug nyad dang/ dug shing ba dang/ dug musta ka nyid dang/ da ra da'i dug dang/ lus la byas pa dang/ mi bzad pa'i dug dang/ dug ha
la skul dang/ sdig pa lasogs pa gang yin pa dang/ mthong ba'i drug gang yin pa dang/ dbugs kyi dug mi bzad pa gang yin pa dang/ reg pa'i dug 'jags pa dang/ 'jog pos kyang zin pa dang/
gzhan yang srog chags mi bzad pa rnam pa sna tshogs pa'i dug mi bzad pa rnams dkyil 'khor mthong ba tsam dang/ nor bu reg pa tsam gyisade rnams thams cad 'phral du dug med bar 'gyur ro/
gal te gang gar khrab pa'i dug 'thungs kyang 'phral du 'joms par byed do// nam mkha' lding gis sprul nyid dang klu bzhin no// zhes mi 'tshig go/ slar yang chus 'khyol par ma 'gyur 'o//
byi ba kha gdug pa'i 'jigs pa mi 'byung/ de la rgyal po khro bar mi byed do// nam yang phyi rgol ba dang/ dgra dang/ 'thab mo dang/ 'khrul 'khor byed pa dang/ snang ba gang yin
pade rnams med de/ cho ga 'di ni mchog go/ dug dang/ byad stems dang/ ma 'i sbyor 3[']sogs pa thams cad skad cig de la nyams par byed do// gnod sbyin dang/ srin pa dang/ 'byung
par byed pa// nyon mongs pa thams cad zad par byed pa/ nad thams cad las yongs su grol bar byed pa ste/ mdor na thams cad du da sa grub so sor snyan cing/ dpal chen/ ]
bor lhag par 'gro'o// ga sngags don du gnyer ba thob ste/ rig sngags don yod pa'i dngos grub kyi de kho na nyid las [” ]ka lu 'dod pas ni bu thob bo// nor 'dod pas nor thob po// dbang
phyug 'dod pas ni dbang phyug thob bo// myur du dpal 'dod pasazhi dpal thob bo// mngon par 'dod pa thams cad 'phral du yongs su rdzogs par byed de zhes so// khrus kyi dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga'o//
de nas zhi'i bu'i sgrub thabs kyi cho ga dang/ dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga bshad par bya ste/ yid bzhin gyi nor bu'i sgrub pa rmad du byung ba don yod pa'i nor bu'i dngos grub dang bya ba thams
cad sgrub par byed pa/ thams cad du lhung ba'i sdug bsngal las byung ba'i 'jigs pa thams cad las skyob par byed pa/ gsod thob pa mngon par thar par byed pa/ mtshon cha dang/ khong bsgril
gcog par byed par the tshom med do// sdig pa thams cad rnam par nyams par byed pa/ mtshams med la zad par byed pa/ rtag tu gsod pa med pa'i gnas thams cad du son par byed pa//
rtag tu 'khrugasal dang g.yul ngo las rgyal ba sbyin par 'gyur// chom rkun gyi nang nas grol bar 'gyur zhing/ rkun molas kyang sgrol bar byed do// gcan gzan gtum po seng ge dang/ glang po che

[4 ]ba'i tshig ni don yod rgyal los bya'o// de nas rtswa dur ba bting nas/ de la skyil mo krung gis 'dug ste/ bum pa'i chus khrus bya zhing/ pad+ma'i phyag rgya'ang byed du gzhug go/ de nas gtsang mas
gos gtsang ma bgos te/ gtsug tor bcing bar bya zhing/ sngon du bzlas pa 'bul ba dang bskor ba byas nasasgo dang sgo nas phyag bya'o// shar gyi sgor zhugs la dbus kyi dkyil 'khor gyi snying por
skyil krung gis 'dug la/ don yod pa'i rgyal pos lan bdun du byung par bya'o// lag tu rdo rje dang bgrang 'phreng gis mngon par dbang bskur zhing/ chu dang/ yusakar dang/ phyag rgyus dang ngang skul
'a cu'o// dam dkon mchog gsum la mchod pa bya'o// 'di ni khrus kyi gtso bo'i 'jig rten dbang phyug gis gsungasaso// sems can thams cad la9phan pa'i don gyi ched dang/ rig sngags
'chung rnams la khyad ba dusangs rgyas thams cad kyis byin gyis brlabs pa dang/ lha thams cad kyis mchod pa dang/ don yod pa'i phun sum tshogs pa gdon mi za bar byed do// gang dang gang du las
la nges par sbyar ba thams cad du don yod pa'i dngos grub thob par 'gyur te/ thams cad du 'dril tshom med do// sngags kyi dngos grub bla na med pa ma grub pa'i ng grub par 'gyur te/ don yod
pa'i dngos grub thob cing 'phral nyid du 'bras bu mthong ba yin no// lus yongs su dag cing shin tu dri ma med pa dang/ lags par khrus byas par de brjod par bya'o// sdig pa thams cad nyamA
bo dang/ yi dgas dang/ skam byed dang/ brjod byed dang/ gsang ba pa dang/ bgegs dang/ log 'dren rnams dkyil 'khor mthong ba tsam dang/ nor bu gzung ba nyid
kyis thams cad 'bros par byed de 'di la the tshom yod do// 'di thams cad kyis thun mong du nor bu'i dkyil 'khor mthong ba la bsam pa gang yin pa'i bsam pa de thams cad yid la don du gnyer
ba'i bya ba gang yin pa rnams kyang/ nor bu gzung ba nyid la thams cad myur du phun sum tshogs par byed do// tsha'aphel ba dang sngags kyi dngos grub bla na med pa grub po// bkrashas pa dang/ dam
pa dang/ bsod nams dang/ dag pa dang/ sdig ba nyams pa dang/ rmi lam ngan pa nyams pa dang/ 'phral du rmi lam bzang por byed pa nyid dang/ rtag tu sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa'
mthong ba dang/ rtag tu lha rnams 'gugs pa nyid dang/ rtag tu 'byor pa thams cad byed pa dang/ rtag tu zla ba nya ba ltar 'od zer 'bar bas rnam par mdzes pa dang/ tshig btsun pa dang/ rtag tu
dga' ba dang/ thams cad du mchod par bya'o// de nas rig sngags 'chang gi rdzas kyi sbyor ba bya ste/ cha mnyam par legs par phye la gtso bo'i rjes su 'brang bar bya'o// 'di lta ste/ rgyal ba
dang/ rnam par rgya' pa dang/ nA ku la dang/ dri'i na ku li dang/ a ru ra dang/ lag pa dang/ dbang po lag pa dang/ dri'i dri yang ku dang/ rgya spos dang/ 'khor lo dang/ 'khor lo chen
[s. ]pa dang/ khyab 'jug gnon pa dang/ so ma rA dza dang/ su nan da dang/ pad+ma ge sar dang/ ma la ya'i tsan dan dang/ nal du dang/ gur kum dang/ ba bla dang/ ut+pal sngon po dang/ klu shing gi ma
tog dang/ tsam pa ka'i me tog dang/ pa Ta dang/ brag skyes dang/ sngang smos dang/ sA ma ka rnams mnyam par byas te phye ma zhib mor lags par batags la/ pu shel tsi dang tsan dan gyi chus spus

te zangs kyi snod du gzhag la/ khrus kyi dkyil 'khor gyi steng du bkod de/ don yod zhags pa'i snying po brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas nas/ snying po brgya rtsa brgyad nyid dang/ yi ge gcig pa 'bum du bzlas pas
rdzas kyi snod 'bar ba'i byed do// de nas nor bu mgo bo la bcings pa 'am/ lag pa la bcings la gzung bar bya ste/ mchog tu skal ba bzang po thob cing/ dbang phyug gi mchog dang dpon po thob bo/
rje'u rigs bu med pas kyang mi dang nor 'phel bar 'gyur ro// rgyal po dang dgra rab tu 'joms shing/ srung ba'i mchog tured par bka' bas te/ nor bu gang du gnas pa der klog gi gnod pa med/
de der byi ba kha gdug pa'i 'jigs pa dang g.yo ba mi 'byung ngo// nor bu'i rgyal po gang du gnas pa'i gnas 'di mchod rten du bskur ro// sum cu rtsa gsum na gnas pa'i lha rnams kyis rtag
tusrung bar byed cing/ rtag tu'ang rgyal po chen po bzhi dang/ lag na rdo rje stobs po ches rtag tu'ang srung zhing/ dus rtag tu rjes su 'brang bar 'gyur te the tshom med do// dkyil 'khor bshad par/
'a@#// bya ste/ rgyar ga ze ngas kyi tshad kyi 'ogs bzhi pa/ zur bzhi pa// shin tu bcags pa// legs par sbyar ba/ mchog tu mdzes pa bya// khor yug tu me tog sna tshogs kyi
mgo lcogs kyis bkra ba gros/ shar gyi sgo rnam par bya ste/ dbus kyi dkyil 'khor gyi pad+ma rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor gyis yongs su bskor ba'i dbus kyi pad+ma'i ge saral yang/ 'jig rten
dbang phyug dgod par bya'o// 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi zhabs drung du rdzas kyi snod gzhag par bya zhing/ me tog gcal dubakram par byas la/ dkyil 'khor brgyan par bya ste/
dri dang yon chab 'bul bar bya zhing/ tsan dan gyi bdug pa sreg go nyin mtshan du gos gtsang ma bgo zhing bcang bar bya/ shin tu dri ma med pa'i sems su 'gyur bar bya/ byams pa dang snying rje mchog
tu 'gyur bar bya zhing/ de nas nor bu'i rdzas sgrub bo zhes so// nor bu'i dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga'o// dazhas ldang 'os kyi mig sman gyi cho ga'i dkyil 'khor bshad par bya ste/ rgya
gzings kyi cha'i mthar thug pas dkyil 'khor gru bzhi pa byas te/ dri sna tshogs dang rnam par bkra ba'i rig sngags 'chang ni grwa rnams su mkhas pas bri bar bya'o// dbus kyi dkyil 'khor gyi snying

por pad+ma 'dab ma phyed kha bye ba'o// lag pa gnyis kyi dbus su pad+ma ge sar rgyas pa 'chang ba'o// shar gyi sgo rnam par phye ba bya ste/ ldong ros dngul gyi snod du gzhag nas dkyil 'khor du pad+ma'i
steng du dgod par bya'o// snod kyi khor yug tu dar dmar po'i gos bzang pos g.yog par bya'o// yang na pad+ma'i 'dab ma 'am/ yang na byang chub shing gi 'dab ma 'am/ yang na shing 'dzam bu'i 'dang
mas g.yog par bya'o// a ka ru'i bdug pa dbul bar bya'o// 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug don yod zhags pa'i gzugs 'dzin pa pad+ma'i 'dab ma'i drung du dgod par bya'o// ma rtogo
dang dris mchod pa'i bya/ rig sngags 'chang gis dkar gsum zas la 'phags pa'i yan lag brgyad kyi bsnyen gnas su 'gyur bar bya'o// yang na nyin mtshan du smyung bar gnas par bya/ zla ba yar
ngo 'am/ tshes bco lnga'i skya 'am/ tshes bcu bzhi 'am/ tshes brgyud la gtsang mar khrus byas te/ gos gtsangam bgo bar bya/ don yod zhags pa'i snying po brgya rtsa brgyad bzlasashing/ snying po brgya
rtsa brgyad kyang/ zlas pa bya/ yi ga gcig pa stong phrag bcur bzlas la/ dkyil 'khor nya ba' sbas shing/ me tog dang/ bdug pa dang/ dri dang/ mar me dang/ gter ma dbul bar bya'o//
de nas yungs karal lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas pa'i bya ste/ dkyil 'khor gyi steng du 'phong bar bya'o// 'phangs pa tsam gyis mod la 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi lus 'ag
'od zer sna tshogs 'byin bar byed do// ldong ros kyi snod de'ang 'bar bar byed de/ 'bar ba tsam gyis mod la mig la bskus na nam mkha' la 'gro'o// don yod pa'i ye shes yangs pa yid
de bzhin gna' bu'i 'od zer gyi bkod pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin so so'i thob po/ 'don yod pa'i 'khor la kun nas rnam par gzigs pa zhes bya ba'i rig sngags
'chang gi 'khor los sgyur bar 'gyur to// rig sngags 'chang gi 'khor los sgyur ba gang+ga'i klung gi bye ma bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag dgu bcu rtsa dgus yongs su bskor ba' 'gyur ro//
thams cad du gnas kyi mnga' bdag rgyal por 'gyur ro// sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad du 'gro zhing/ tshabaskal pa dpag tu med par 'gyur ro// rgyal ba 'od dpag med kyi
cod pan 'chang bar 'gyur ro// ren yod pa dri ma med pa'i spyan zhes bya ba'i rdzu 'phrul so sor thob ste/ rdzu 'phrul gang gis se gol gtogs pa tsam gyis/ sangs rgyas kyi zhingagapa'i
klung bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag dgu bcu rtsa dgur 'gro bar 'gyur ro// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi don yod pa'i dngos grub yangs pa'i mchod pa byed par 'gyur zhing/ skad
cig gis slar yang 'ong bar byed do// rang gi lus la 'od zer brgya stong phrag du ma 'ba' bar byed do// gang 'dod pa de thams cad byed do// de nas du ba 'thul bzhin pa ni bskus na mi snang
bar 'gyur te/ mi snang ba'i rig pa 'dzin pa thams cad kyi 'khor los sgyur ba rig sngags 'chang gi rgyal por 'gyur ro// lha dang/ klu dang/ gnod sbyin dang/ srin po dang/ 'byung po
dang/ lha ma yin dang/ nam mkha' lding dang/ mi 'am ci dang/ lto 'phurma po'i gnas kyi sgo thams cad bya nas gas taM/ gang du 'dod pa der 'jug par byarado// gnas thams cad
' gnas pa rnams 'bangs su gyur nas gnas pa ci bsgo ba byed do// sems na thams cad kyang rjes su 'brang bka'agyur 'o// rgyal po dang btsun mo'i 'khor g.yog dang bcas pas mchod
pa dang/ bla mar bya ba'i gnas gcig pur 'gyur// bka' bsgo ba'ang bdag nyid dang nor gyis kyang byed cing gnas so// dbu ba 'byung bzhin pa bsus na cho ga zhib mo dang/ phyog rgyu dang/
dkyil 'khor thams cad dang/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad 'gas kyi gsang ba'i dam tshig mngon du gyur nas gnas te/ 'das pa dang/ ma 'ongs pa dang/ da ltar byung ba'i de bzhin
gshegs pa thams cad kyis gsungs pa rnams sngon du gyur nas gnas so// lha dang/ klu dang/ gnod sbyin dang/ srin po dang/ 'byung po thams cad yang dag par rjes su 'brang
zhing bsrung bya dang/ bskyab pa dang/ sba ba'i ched du rtag pa kho nar rdzasasu 'gro// sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad mngon sum du mthong ba sbyin par 'gyur 'o//
don yod pa'i 'od zer dang ldan pa zhes bya ba'i ting ngo 'dzin so sor thob ste/ sa'i stong nas sor bzhi'i tshad du 'phags pa'i nam mkha' la gnas so// ldong ros la bzlas nas mig la
bskus na mig gis gang mthong ba de dbang du gyur nas gnas te/ rgyal po dang/ btsun mo 'khor dang/ blon po dang/ bkrabs pa dang/ mdun na 'don dang/ dpung
gi tshogs yan lag bzhi dang/ bud med dang/ skyes pa dang/ khye'u dang/ bu mo dang/ dag sbyong dang/ bram ze dang/ rgyal rigasadang/ rje'u rigs dang/ dmangs rigs rnams
dbang du gyur nas gnas so// tha na ri dwags dang bya'ang lta bar byed bzhin du dbang du gyur nas nye bar gnas so// 'dis byugs pa'i mig gis nad dang/ gnod pa dang/ sdig pa dang/
sgrib pa thams cad rnam par nyams par byed do// lus kyi gdung ba dang/ soms kyi gdung ba thams cad dang/ rmi lam ngan pa dang/ mtshan ma ngan pa dang/ bkra mi shis par gyur pa
thams cad rnam par nyams par byed do// skye ba brjes nas kyang spyan lnga yongs su dag pa so sor thob bo// tshe rabs dran par yang skyo bar 'gyur ro// 'jigs pa dang sgrib pa dang
bral zhing/ don yod pa legs par rab tu gnas par kun tu gzigs pa zhes bya ba'i lus dag pa so sor thob po// kun nas don yod pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi gsang ba de bzhin gshag
pa thams cad kyi dam tshigaso sor thob po// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kun tu gzigs pa'i rgyal mtshan zhes bya ba/ byang chub sems dpa'i dbang bskur ba so sor thob po//
sprin 'khrigs pas kun nas g.yogs par 'dod pa dang/ dri sna tshogs pa'i char 'bebs pa' byed par 'dod pa des/ bdug pa'i rgyal bos bdug pa de rig sngags 'chang gis rtag tu rgyun mi
'chad pa'i mngon par brtson par bya'o// de nas rig sngags 'chang gis nyi ma re re zhing sangs rgyas bcom ldan brtas dang 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi spyan sngar dkyil 'khor
byas la/ me tog gcal du bkram par bya'o// mchod yon dang zhabs bsil yang gzhag par bya/ bdug pa'i rgyal po 'dis bdug pa'i bya zhing/ don yod pa'i rgyal po dus gcig tu
brjod par bya ste/ phyogs bcur bdug pa'i pog por dbul bar bya'o// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad padi la byed par 'gyur ba dang/ sems can 'byung po thams cad la byams
pa bsgom par bya/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing du gtogs pa thams cad dri ma med pa'i sems kyi yid la bsgom par bya/ dkyil 'khor la me tog dang/ bdug pa dang/ mchod yon dang/
zhabs bsil phul te yi ge gcig pa yid la brjod cing/ phyag rgya'ang lan cig bcings la phyag bya'o zhes so// phul ba tsam gyis mod la phyogs re re zhing gang+ga'i klung gi bye ma bye ba khrag
khrig brgya stong phrag dgu bcu rtsa dgu'i sangs rgyas bu ba la dris khyab par byed cing/ bdug pa chen po 'khrigs pas nam mkha'i mthil du khyab par 'gyur 'o/ 'dri sna tshogs kyi char 'bab
khye'u 'am/ bu mo'am/ dge sbyong ngam/ bram ze nyid rung/ dpazhin du dge bsnyen dang/ dge bsnyen ma dang/ dge slong dang/ dge slong ma dang/ rgyal po dang/
rgyal phran dang/ de bzhin du rgyal mo dang/ btsun mo'i 'khor yang rung sta/ lags par khrus byas gos gtsang ma bgos nasabadug spos 'dis bdugasan/ gang gis bdugs pa'i dri
mnams pa dang/ de lus la rig pa tsam gyis sdig pa thams cad las rnam par grol lo// sgrib pa thamasacad rnam par dag pa'i bdag nyid thob par 'gyur te/ 'dri la thatsama med do//
mtshams med pa lnga'i sdig pa rnams 'phral du thams cad rnam par dag par 'gyur ro zhes so// gdug pa 'di gdugs pa tsam gyis stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khamA
dris kun tu 'gangs te/ sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha'i gnas nas ji srid tshungs pa'i 'jig rten gyi bar dras kun tu 'gangs so// stobs dang shugs chen pos lha'i gnas thams cad
'gul bar byed cing skyod par byed do// chu rgyun gyi klu rnams 'gul bar byed cing/ ri rab las gzhan pa'i ri gang yin pa 'dar yod med byed do// gsang bar gnas pa rnams rnam par skrag
par byed do// dmyal ba bcu drug gi 'jigs pa rnams rnam par zhig par byed do// ra bzhin dusa'i mthil thams cad kyang dkar bsil du snang bar 'gyur ro// dmyal ba pa'i sems can
rnams shin tu sbyangs pa dang/ sdug bsngal mi bzad pa de rnams thams cad yongs su grol te/ bde ba can du'ang 'gro'o// mtho ris thams cad du ji lta ba bzhin du gnas so// dmyal ba tham
cad nyams tapad+macan du rab tu 'gyur ro// nyi tshe ba'i dmyal ba rnam pa sna tshogs pa gzhan rnams dang/ sa 'og gi nang du song ba gang yin pa dang/ dgon pa dang/ ri dang/ tshang tshing dang//
dgon dung dang/ g.yang sar gnas pa'i dmyal ba'i sdug bsngal myong ba gang yin pa rnams thams cad bdug pa'i dris longs su grol lo// mi gtsang ba za ba'i gnod sbyin dang/ srin po dang/
'byung pa dang/ sha za gang yin pa rnams dang/ bshang ba dang gci ba za ba gang yin pa rnams dang/ mchil ma dang snabs za ba gang yin pa rnams dang/ 'dres pa za ba gang yin pa de rnamu
thams cad bdug pa'i gros mnams pa tsam gyis yongs su grol nas 'phrul nyid du lha'i 'jig rten du 'o// rnam pa sna tshogs pa'i ro bro ba'i mchog dang/ dri zhim po'i kha zas rad par
'gyur ro// dud 'gro'i skye gnas su song ba'i srog chags ri dwags dang/ bya rnams thams cad dri la mnams pa tsam gyis nad thams cad las yongs su grol lo// bdug pa mnams
pa tsam 'dis nad thams cad las yongs su grol lo// rims thams cad las yongs su grol lo// na ba thams cad las yongs su grol lo// 'bras dang/ phol mig dang/ lcog
bla// pa dang/ me dbal dang/ shu ba dang/ mdzad ng/ g.yan pa dang/ mig na ba dang/ mgo bo na ba dang/ gzhogs phyed na ba dang/ rna ba na ba dang/ sna ba dang/ so na ba dang//
la na ba dang/ lnga ba dang/ 'jigs pa dang/ skrag pa dang/ nad 'ag ba dang/ 'khrugs pa'i sdug bsngal thams cad bdug pa'i dri bsnams pa tsam gyis thab tu zhi bar byed do// 'phags spyan
sa gzigs dbang phyug re dang/ don yod pa'i rgyal po'i snying po'i mthus sdug bsngal myong bar 'gyur ba'i las kyi sgrib pa thams cad rnam par nyams par byed cing/ rnam par grol te mi
'jigs pa'i grong du 'gro bar 'gyur ro// de nas rdzas rnams kyi rang gi ma shes rnam par phye ba dang ldan pa tha shad par bya ste/ tsan dan srung gsum dang/ a ka ru srang gsum dang/
tu'u kasrang lnga dang/ gur kum sung bcu dang/ spyi kasrang gnyis dang/ na lan da srang gnyis dang/ mi de'i mig srung sku shudang/ sra rtsi pog srang bcu dang/ bol lung gsum dang/ sa lu
kA srang brgyad dang/ rgya spos srang gnyis dang/ spang spos srang gcig dang/ shA ma ka srang gcig dang/ gan+tA pa tu srang gcig dang/ pad+ma ges srang gcig dang/ shi ri ma'i me tog srang
gcig dang/ mkha' dkar po srang bcu dang/ dri'i dri yang ku srang gcig dang/ pushel tsa srang lnga dang/ stag sen srang gcig dang/ sug smel srang gsum dang/ ba la ka srang lnga dang/
gur kum dang gla rtsi tshor ba sta/ thams cad legs par rnam par dbye bar byas nas/ phye mar byas la mthar tham cad gcig tu bsdoms te sbrang rtsis smra bar bya'o// tshes bco lnga la rgyu skar dang
tshes grangs kyi lha dag ga la/ rig sngags 'chang gtsang mar gyur pas gos gtsang ma bgos te/ legs par khrus byas pa la gyur pas brtul zhugs spyad pas bdug pa'i mchog sbyar bar bya'o//
de nas bdug pa'i rgyal po sgrub pa'i dkyil 'khor gru bzhi pa tshad shin tu rnam par phye ba bya ste/ gzis kyi tshad kyishan tu bcags pa/ 'jam zhing mnyen pa la tshon rnam pa sna tshogs pas
sgo bzhi han tu rnam par phye bra/ mdzes pa'i bri bar bya'o// dbus kyi dkyil 'khor gyi nga por pad+ma'i 'phreng ba bri'o// dbus kyi pad+ma phyed kha bye ba'i 'phrang ba bri ste/ lag pa gnyis
'thon nus sna tshogs pa'i sprin 'khrigs pa 'dzin par byed pa'o// de'i steng du bdug pa'i snod bkod nas/ me'i kha dog can gyi gos kyis g.yogs la/ dkyil 'khor gyi gru bzhi rnams
su rlung gi rgyal po bri'o// sgo bzhir zhugs pa bris nas khor yug tu lag pa'i phyag rgya'o// pad+ma'i 'phring ba las nges par 'thon pa'o// bdug spos 'khyil pa 'chang bar byed pa dkyil
'khor gyi steng du spras par bya'o// ji ltar 'byor pa'i gtor ma dang me tog dbul bar bya/ mchod yon gyi snod dang/ gang ba'i bum pa dang/ ba dan dang/ rgyan dang/ skud pa dmar pos/
mtshams bcing ba dang/ dkyil 'khor la dngul dang gser gzhag cing/ khor yug tu mar me'i 'phreng ba dang dri sna tshogs rgya chen po'o// 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs/
dbang phyug bkod nas kha shar du phyogs nas pad+ma'i 'phreng bral nye bar dgod par bya'o// de nas rig sngags 'chang gis budug pa'i rgyal po la yongs su bzlas par byas/ nyim bdun la thun
gsum du don yod pa'i rgyal po brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas shing snying po brgya rtsa brgyad bzlasas// don yod pa 'i snying po yig gcig pa'i bzlas brjod 'bumardzogs pa ste/ stong phrag brgya rdzogs pa
ni bzlas brjod kyi cho ga'o// de nas 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la mchod pa bya zhing/ slar yang don yod pa'i rgyal po'abazlas brjod nyi shu rtsa gcig dang/
khro bo'i rgyal po'i bzlas brjod nyi shu rtsa gcig bya'o// de nas thog mar sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la bdug pa dbul bar bya/ de nas 'phags pa spyan rnyas gzigs dbang phyug la 'dug
pa dbul lo// 'di ni bdug pa sgrub pa'i chogagrub par 'gyur ro// bdug pa'i rgyal po 'das bya ba de sgrub par 'gyur ro// gal te rig sngags 'chang gis yus ka' kyi 'bras bu gcig
gi tshad tsam gyi bdug pas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mchod par 'dod pa dang/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams dri gcig gis rgyas par 'dod pa dang/ bdug pa'i
byang chub sems dpa' thams cad dang rtag tu 'ang 'grogs shing gnas pa dang/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis lung bstan par 'gyur ro zhes so// mig sman gyi dkyil
'khor gyi cho ga'o/// de nas bdug pa rim par bya ba'i tshig bshad par bya ste/ rig sngags 'chang thamasacad kyi mchog tu rmad du byung ba/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub
sems dpa' thams cad mchod pa'i don dang/ de bzhin nyid du 'jig rtenagasum pa thams cad 'gugs pa grub pa dang/ lha thams cad spyan drang bo dang/ dbang po dang tshangs
pa dang/ khyab 'jug dang/ dbang phyug chen po rnams sdigs par byed pa/ gnod sbyin dang/ srin po dang/ sha za dang/ gdon ma rungs pa de rnams thams cad bdug pa'i dris 'gros
par byed par the tshom med do// bgegos dang/ log par 'dren pa nyid nang/ snang ba dang/ de bzhin du bdud kyang rung ste/ bdug pa'i drisa rnam par zhig par 'gyur zhing/ yan lag
dang nying lag rnam par 'thor bar byed do// rang gi dmagarang/ pha rol gyi dmag tshogs dang/ shin tu 'gras pa dang/ phyir rgyal ba dang/ ji bzhin du dgra bo nyid dang/ skye bo sdang ba dang/
gang du 'thab pa dang/ rtsod pa dang/ 'gyed pa dang/ g.yul nyid kyang bdug pa'i dris thams cad rab tu zhi bar 'gyur bar the tshom med do// gal te skyes pa 'am/ bud med dam//
par 'gyur te/ bcom ldan 'das mchod pa'i las sangs rgyas kyi zhing ba'i zhing gang+ga'i klung gi bya ma khrag khrig brgya stong phrag bye ba dgu bcu rtsa dgu'i sangs rgyas bcom/
ldan 'das la mchod par 'gyur ro// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mchod pas de bzhin gshags pa de rnams thams cad rig sngags 'chang la dus dus su don yod pa'i rgyal po dran par
spyod pa srung ba'i don dang/ phyag rgya 'ching bar byed pa de srung ba'i don du legs so zhes bya ba'i sgra rjod par byed do// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad byams pa rgyas par byed pa de bzhi/
du bya'o// don yod pa chen po'i dngos grub kyang sbyin par byed do// de bzhin gshegs pa de rnams kyi drung du bsod nams kyi tshogs chen po nye bar sogs par byed do// de bzhin gshegs
pa'i ra zhing bya ba brgya stong phrag gi drung du bsod nams kyi phung po dang/ dgo ba'i rtsa ba nye bar sogs par byed do// jaltar rig sngags 'chang de bzhin gshags pa mdzad pa'i cho ga byed
byed pa de bzhin du/ rnam pa du ma de bzhin gshegs pa rar zhing ga sbyan sngar rab tu 'byung bar 'gyur ro// rig sngags 'chang nyi ma bdun tu rab tu brtson pas/ de bzhin gshegs
pa dang bla ma mchod do// phyogs bcu'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mngon sum du mthong ba stsolaM bar byed do// de rnams thams cad kyis dbugs 'byin par byed la/ mchog
rab tu stsol bar 'gyur ro// don yod pa'i dngos grub rjes su stsol bar 'gyur ro// phyir mi ldog pa la rab tu gnas par 'gyur ro// sa bcu yang dag par gnon te mngon par shes
pa lngar 'gyur ro// 'jig rten pa'i bdug pa sgrub pa'i cho ga'o////de bzhin nyid du 'jig rten las 'das pa la 'chi 'pho ba na de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyan sngar zhabya
drung du pad+ma la rdzus te skye bar 'gyur ro// tshe rabs dran par yang 'gyur ro// de bzhin gshags pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang dang gang du 'gro bar byed pa de thams cad du'ang/ de bzhin
gshegs pas rig sngags 'chang la lung ston pa'i 'gyur ro// phyis kyang skye bu gzhan du skye bar mi 'gyur ro// lus 'di nyid kyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la bsnyan bkur nas/
bde ba can gyi 'jig rten gyi khams su song ste/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bar byed de// tshe dpag tu med par 'gyur ro// de bzhin gshegs pa tshe dpag tu
med pa ji lta ba de bzhin du/ 'di'i rdzu 'phrul dang rnam par 'phrul ba'i khyad par so sor thob bo// 'di ni 'jig rten las 'das pa'i bdug pa sgrub pa'i khyad par ro// de nas 'jig rten
pa'i bdug pa sgrub pa'i cho ga brgyastong phrag du ma 'grub par byed do// ji lta ji ltar bdug pa nyid yid la byed pa de lta de ltar thams cad yang dag par 'grub par 'gyur ro// klu'i gnas sa
bdugs na bdugs pa tsam gyis med la klu'i rgyal pos char rgyun chen po 'byin par byed do// rgyal po'i sgor bdug na rgyal po dang btsun mo'i 'khor g.yog dang bcas pa
ka/ dbang du gyur nas gnas so// skye bo mang po'i dbus su bdugs rigs bzhi'i 'jig rten dbang du gyur nas gnas so// bdag nyid la bdugasan thams cad du mchod pa'i 'os chen
bor 'gyur ro// nad thams cad la bdugasan nad thams cad yongs su grol bar byed do// dug la bdugs na dug med par 'gyur 'o// mtshams kyi nang du bdugs na me tog dang
'bras bu thams cad zhum pa dang/ lags par bsrungs bar 'gyur ro// lo tog la bdugs na 'bu'i phung po chen por 'gyur ro// khyim mam/ gtsug lag khang ngam/ grong ngam/
grong khyer la bdugs na dug dang/ sbyar dug dang/ dug dang bcas pa'i srog chags thams cad nam yang mi 'byung ngo// g.yul gyi dbus su bdugs na chor rgyal bar 'gyur ro//
bdag nyid dam/ gzhan rnams snyam/ don mthun pa rnams l bdugs nas lam du 'grolan chom rkun dang/ g.yon can dang/ rkun mo dang/ gcan gzan gtum po'i 'jigs ra/
thams cad mi snang ba' 'gyur zhing/ bde ba dang logs ngas rang gi khyim du 'ong ngo// dpag tshad stong du 'gro'ang ngal ba med cing/ slar yang 'ong ba'i byad do// dung lagadug/
/ nas mthon po'i bus na ji srid dung gi sgra thos pa de srid du gnod pa thams cad dang/ 'jigs pa thams cad dang/ nad thams cad dang/ mtshon chadang/ 'thab mo dang/ 'thab
budang/ rtsod pa dang/ 'gyod pa dang/ phyir rgol ba dang/ dgra ba dang/ sdang ba dang/ rab tu sdang bu'isems can thams cad rnam par nyams par byed do// yams thams cad dang/
nye bar 'tsho ba dang/ nad 'go ba thams cad dang/ 'khrugs pa thams cad rnam par nyams par byed do// bde ba dang/ lo lags pa dang dga' bar 'os par 'gyur// dag ba'i
rtsa ba thams cad 'dod par 'gyur ro// nad med pa dang/ gnod pa med pa dang/ rims med pa dang/ thang chad pa med par ji srid 'tsho'i bar du gnas so// khang pa'i nang mthon por
phyogs bzhir bdugs na rlung dang/ sad dang/ sprin gyisar ba thams cad dacing 'a 'gyur ta/ ji sridi yid la byed pa nar mar yod pa de srid du mtshams bcing ba byas par 'gyur ro//
khyim gyi nang du bdugs na bud med dang/ skyas pa dang/ khye'u dang/ bu mo dang/ bran pho dang/ bran mo thams cad dang/ ji srid du nang gnyis pa rlung chung bzhi pa thams cad byams pa'i
yid du 'gyur te dbang du gyur nas so// ji srid 'tsho'i bar du bsnyen bkur byed do// slar yang yid gzhan du mi 'gyur ro// 'chi ba' dus kyi tsho bdugasan dri mnams pa'i mthu
rtes sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa skyes te/ de bzhin gshags pa bye ba phrag dgu bcu rtsa dgu mngon sum du mthong ba so sor thob ste/ phyis kyang ngan 'gro log bab lung
bar 'gro bar mi 'gyur// dge ba'i rtsa bu'i tshogs thams cad yang dag par 'dzin par 'gyupharo// 'chi 'pho bra na bde ba can gyi 'jig rten gyi khams sam/ mngon par dga' ba'i skyon
taM 'di la dogs pa dang yid gnyis bskyed par mi bya zhing/ bu tshom bskyod par mi bya'o zhes so// ma mo'i dkyil 'khor gyi khyim la bdugs na nag po chen po la sogs pa ma mo'i tshog
kyis yongs su bskor ba dbang du gyur pa'i 'gyur te/ mdun du nye bar gnas par byed do// lha dang/ klu dang/ gnod sbyin dang/ srin po thams cad dang/ nag po chen po'i gzugs bstan
gyi spyi bo'i gtsug tu bdugs na bdugs pa tsam gyis mod la khanas khragasmyug go/ rig sngags 'chang gis de blangs te thig le byas nas nam mkha' la lding bar byed do// mig la byugs
na mi snang bar 'gyur te/ bde blag tu 'byung po'i bdag po chen por 'gyur 'i// lto bar yongs su phyugs na gnod sbyin dang srin po'i dpon po'o// lus mtha' dag la byugs na/ stobs dang
brtson 'grus dang/ rtsal chen po nag po chen po dang mtshungs pa'i shugs su 'gyur te/ denyid kyi gzugs su 'gyur ro// 'khor gyi tshogs chen por yang 'gyu'o//tshangs pa la bdu//
na bdugs pa tsam gyis mod la 'o ma 'dzag pa byang bar bya ste lus la byug par bya'o// tshangs pa dang 'dra ba'i stobs dang shugs su 'gyur te nam mkha' la 'gro bar byed do// khyab 'jug la
bdugasan bdugs pa tsam gyis mod la lus la pa lA sha'i kha dog gi dri'i chu 'dzag ste/ rig sngags 'chang gi lus la byug par bya'o// sred med kyi bu'i gzugs dang/ stobs dang/ shugs
'chang bar 'gyur te/ lag na 'khor lo thogs pas nam mkha' la 'gro'o// dbang phyug chen po la bdugs na dbang phyug chen po'i lus la rdzul 'byung ste/ rig sngags 'chang gi lus la byug par
bya'o// dbang phyug chen po'i gzugs su 'gyur te/ lag na mdung rtse gsum dang/ stobs dang/ brtson 'grus dang/ rtsal gyis 'byung po'i bodag po chen por 'gyur te/ nam mkha' la 'gro'o/
thams cad la don yod rgyal po'i bzlas brjod lan gsum gsum rna ba' sbyin par bya'o// snying po yi ge gcig pas spyi bo'i bzlas brjod lan bdun du bzlas brjod sbyin par bya'o// smra tshil las
byung ba'i klu mgo bo dgu pa sor bzhi pa'i tshad du byas/ gser gyis g.yog par bya zhing dri'i dkyil 'khor bya ste/ dkyil 'khor gyi steng du gzhag par bya'o// don yod pa'i rgyal pos lan brgya
rtsa brgyad du bzlas so// bdug pa 'dis bdugs pas klu ldang bar byed do// rig sngags 'chang gis 'jigs pa med par bya ste/ khro bo'i rgyal po yungs kar la bzlas ta spyi bo'i gtsug tu
'a// brdegasan lding bar byed do// gang du 'dod pa der gnas nas klu chen po'i mtsho dang/ gnas dang/ gzhal med khang rab tu 'byung ngo/ chu gang yin pa de rnams kyang 'thung
bar byed pa dang/ khrus byed ba'i bud med dang/ skyes pa dang/ khyoludang/ bu mo 'am/ than dud 'gro'i skye gnas su song ba'i 'thung ba dang khrus byed pa de rnams thams cad kyang nad rnams/
dang bral bar 'gyur ro// sdig pa dang sgrib pa dang bral ba dang/ 'jigabatham cad dang bral bar yang 'gyur ro// klu rnams kyang dus dus su char gyi rgyun chen po 'byin par byed cing/ cha 'bebu/
par byed do// dus dus su mi rtag dang/ 'bras bu dang/ lo tog rnams rdzogs par byed de/ ro zhim po'i ro myong bar 'gyur ro// phyir zhing log par ltung bar 'gro bar mi 'gyur ro//
phug dang khung bu'i sgor 'khrul 'khor gyi sgo glegs la bdugs na bya zhing gcog par 'gyur ro// 'khrug pa'i dus su bdugasan 'pham par 'gyur ro// log mthil la bdugs na gang dang gang
la rag pa thams cad du dbang du bud do// gdug pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga'o////de nas snyan gyi dkyil 'khor gyi chog bshad par bya ste/ don yod par thams cad du gzhan gyis mi
thub pa/ nad thams cad sel bar grub pa/ thams cad du dug 'joms par byed pa/ na ba thams cad sal bar grub pa/ snang ba thams cad log par byed pa/ 'byung po thams cad la mi 'jig
pa mtshon dang/ me dang/ chu dang/ dug rab tu 'joms pa/ rtag tu srung ba dang/ skyab pa dang/ sba ka'i byed pa/ dgra rnams dang gzhan rgyal ba ldog par byed pa/ rgyal po dang/ rgyal phranadang/
btsun mo'i 'khor du song ba dang/ gtso bo rtag tu dbang du byed cing thams cad du thogs pa med par 'gyur ro// pha rol gyi dmag tshogs dang/ 'khrug pa dang/ g.yul rnams rtag tu rab tu 'joms
par byed pa/ gang gi tshe chom rkun gyi nang du song ba nyid dang/ don 'thun gyi nang dang/ rkun mo dang/ seng ge dung/ stag gi nang du song ba de'i tshe thams cad du sman gyis rgyal ba snya' 'o//
tshe ring por 'gyur te/ rtag tu pad+ma'i phyag ga mchog sbyin par 'gyur ro// lha rnams kyis rtag tu srung bar byed do// gnod sbyin dang/ srin po dang/ klu dang/ lha ma yin dang/ nam
mkha' lding nyid dang/ mi 'am ci dang/ lto 'phya chen po nyid dang/ mi ma yin gdug pa gang yin pa de rnams thams cad nyin dang mtshan du srung ba'i don du yang dag par sgrub par 'gyur te
the tshom med do// rgyal po chen po rnam thos sras dang/ rgyal po chen po yul 'khor srung dang/ rgyal po chen po 'phags skyes po dang/ mig mi bzang dpung dang bzhon pa dang bcas pa
dang/ skabs gsum pa'i lha'i dbang po dang/ tshangs pa dang/ khyab 'jug dang/ dbang phyug chen po dang/ lha de rnams thams cad mthun pas rtag tu srung bar byed do// sangs rgyas
kyis rnam par gzigs shing rtagatu'ang mthong ba stsol ba' mdzad do// gang sman lag tu phyin par 'gyur ba 'di/ yang nas yang du rig sngags kyi dngos grub myur
du thob pa// byad sten sa 'tho ba med do// de la zug med cing sdig pa med la/ mi bzad pa'i sbyor ba dang/ phyi ma'i sbyor bas gnon par mi 'gyura'o// sngon gyi sgrib pa nyams par byed
do de bzhin du'ang sdig pa thams cad dang/ rmi lam ngan pa dang/ mtshan ma ngan pa gang yin pa dang/ gzhan rnam pa sna tshogs pa'i sdong ba nyid du/ de rnams thams cad myur du rnam par
mas pa' byed do// sman gang du gnas pa'i dpag tshad khor yug tu srung ba dang/ de bzhin nyid du mtshams bcing bar byed do// bgegs dang log par 'dren pa thams cad dang/ de
bzhin du bdud dam sdod rnams thams cad rab tu 'phros par byed do// smanagang du gnas par gdonab tu 'bros bar byed do// mkha' 'gro ma gang yin pa dang/ rnal 'byor ma gang
yin pa dang/ skem byed dang/ gza' dang/ brjod byed dang/ grib gnon gang yin pa dang/ mi bzad pa de rnams thams cad 'ab tu zhi bar 'gro bar 'gyur ro// lha rnams deb gsu
par byed cing/ 'khrul 'khor la sman a ga da do mchog go zhes so// rgyal bas dbugs 'byin par mdzad cing/ dngos grub thams cad kyi de kho na nyid stsol bar mdzad do// rtag
00 tu 'jig rten dbang phyug gis mchog stsol zhing/ rtag pa'i mthar mthong bstsal bar 'gyur 'o// don yod pa'i zhags pa myur du 'grub ste/ sman 'chang ba la snyan gang du gnas par
gang gis kyang glags mi rnyed do// don yod pa'i mchog sbyin pa zhes bya ba yid bzhin gyi na'i bu sman gyi mchog rab tu 'bad pes bcas pas legs par bsgrub par bya ba dngos grub
gyi mchog las thams cad byed pa de nyid de'i tsha shi ba yang rtag par 'tsho bar byed pa/ lo rdzogs par bsten te/ sngags dang phyag rgyas gso bar bya'o// lo stong phrag tu rtag tu bde ba dang
dga' bar byed do// dbang phyug dang/ nor thob pa dang/ 'bru 'phel ba dang/ bla na med pa dang/ rgyal po dga' bar 'gyur te rtag tu gnas so// 'bangs dang/ ci bgyi dang/ mchod pa/
chen po rnyed do// thams cad dud rtag tu tshig btsun pa'o// thos pas dngos grub mchog gyur pa'i// rdzas kyang 'dir ni bshad bya ste// tsan dan rgya spos ru rta dang/ lcik+kashing tsha ba la ka/
brag skyas spang spos sA ma kang// sug smel 'bras dgang na la da// pad+ma ut+pal sri yang ku// shing kun 'dab ma tsha ba gsum// shi rI sha yi ma tog dang// de bzhin pa'i pa
la ba// 'di rnams cha ni mnyam par ldan// thams cad legs gzhal legs par sbyar// gsang sngags brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas pa la khro bo'i rgyal pos dbang bskur te/ yi ge
thu// gcig pas stong phrag bcur bzlas so// 'di'i sman rnams bgrang 'thung gi tshad tsam du bsgos nas grib ma la yongs su bskal par bya'o// gla rtsi dang ga pur gyi
blang la legs par sbyor ba'i bya ba byas pa dang/ dkyil 'khor du 'jug pa ni ji lta ba bzhin du dkyil 'khor gyi bya ba dang/ phyag rgya dang/ gsang sngags dang/ dam tshig la 'go tu 'jug
pa la/ shar gyi sgo ru phyag byas nas dkyil 'khor mchog la bskor ba bya ste/ sgo dang sgo ru phyag bya zhing shar kyi sgo ru 'jug par bya'o// dbus kyi dkyil 'khor gyi snying por 'phags la
spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la mngon du phyogs pa'i pad+ma'i ge sar la 'dug nas/ don yod pa'i rgyal po 'i bzlas brjod brgya rtsa brgyad dang/ khro bo'i rgyal po'i bzlas brjod brgya rtsa brgyud
byas/ mngon par dbang bskur bar bya zhing/ phyag rgya dang gsang sngags legs par sgrub po// de nas mchod pas 'jig rten mgon po'i dngos grub mthong bar byed cing rtag tu g.yo bar byed
la 'jig rten mgon po'i 'od zer gyi sbyin sreg rab tu grol lo// dkyil 'khor bshad par bya ste/ gru bzhi po ko la'i tshad du ma legs par phye ba/ gru bzhi dang sgo bzhi yod pa//

them skas kyi rim pa can du tshon sna tshogs kyi skud pas thig gdab cing dkyil 'khor gyi snying po mdzes par bya/ dkyil 'khor gyi dbus kyi snying por pad+makaroge kha phye ba 'dab ma brgya rtsa brgyud

0 pa/ snying po dang the ba shin tu mdzes pa// snying po las pad+ma byung ba/ kha phyed bye ba dang/ lag pa gnyis byung bas pad+ma'i 'dab ma 'dzin pa bris pa'i dngul gyi snod kyi nang du sman bkang ste
dar gyis kha g.yogs nas pad+ma'i 'dab ma'i steng du bzhag par bya/ 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug rtag tu tshangs pa'i cha byad du bzhugs pa// dar gyi cod pan bcingasashing
brgyan pa pad+ma'i snying du bzhugs pa'i bu'o// dkyil 'khor gyi phyi rol kun tu phyag rgya'i rtags rnams gsal bar khri'o// sgo sgor don yod pa'i zhags pa pad+ma'i steng du gzhag pa kha dog
dang 'od zer 'bar ba bri'o// grwa grwa'i bum pa gang ba bri// dkyil 'khor kun tu 'phan dang/ bum pa gang ba dang/ 'bras bu dang/ ma tog bsres pa mdzes pas brgyan par bya'o//
gtor ma rnam pa sna tshogs gzhag par bya'o// mchod yon gyi chu dbul bar bya// tsan dan dang Aka ru'i bdug skyes dang/ spos sna tshogs dbul bar bya/ dkyil 'khor kun tu ma' ma'i 'phreng
pa dang/ me tog 'phreng ba dgod cing kun tu 'bras yos dang yungs kar dgram par bya'o// rig sngags 'chang gtsang mar gyur pas legs par khrus bya zhing ges gtsang ma bgos pa 'jig
pa med pas zla ba yar gyi ngo nya la bsgrub par bya ste/ sems can thams cad la brtsa bar gyur cing byams pa'i sems dang/ snying rje'i bdag nyid can gyis bsgrub par bya'o// gang gis lag
'gas gzung ba tsam dang/ rig pa tsam gyis med la da dka' ba thob cing smin pa thams cad 'jig par 'gyur/ sngon gyi sgrib pa rnams 'jig par 'gyur/ mtshams
med pa byed pa rnams las grol bar 'gyur/ mod la nA thams cad byang zhing ngan 'gro thams cad 'jigs par byed pa// bsod nams chen po'i stobs kyi dngos grub sman gyi de kho na nyid
mthong ba na sangs rgyas thams cad kyis lung bstan cing/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis byin gyis brlabs pa// byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis bsngags pa/ 'dren pa/
'jig rten dbang phyug gis sprul pa// dkyil 'khor gyi lha thams cad kyis bsngags pa// rig sngags 'chang gi dbang po thams cad kyis phyag byas pa/ lha thams cad kyis bsrungs pa/
klu'i dbang po thams cad rjes su 'brang ba/ sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha'i dbang po dang/ tshangs pa dang/ khyab 'jug dang/ dbang phyug chen po dang/ gshin rje dang/ chu lha dang/ ku bya
ra dang/ nyi ma dang/ zla bas mchod pa/ de bzhin du rgyu skar gyi tshogs dang/ gza' kun dang/ mjug ras dang/ de bzhin du goza'i khyim dang/ thams cad du bkra shis kyis mchod
nga cho ga zhib mo thams cad dang/ de bzhin du dkyil 'khor dang/ phyag rgya dang/ bzlas brjod thams cad dang/ gsang sngags thams cad kyi rjes su zhugs pa// rigs spyi'i di bzhin
pas gshegs pa gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag drug cu rtsa bzhi'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis sman gyi mchog dbang bskur ba/ dus gsum gyi de bzhin gshags
pa rnams kyis lung bstan pa/ yid bzhin gyi nor bu thams cad dang mthun pa'i sman ni sman gyi rdzas bkra shis pa bye ba phrag gam/ lhag par gyur pa gzhan gang yang med do// sman de lta bu ni/
rtag tu mchog/ gtso ba/ 'byin pa/ 'jig rten dbang phyug dang 'dra ba yin no// de'i phyir thams cad sman 'chang bar 'dod pas gnas ga nga ya nga rung bar sbyar bar bya ste/ gtsang ma lags pa'

khrus byas pa des sbyar bar bya'o/ ji lta ji ltar bkra shis kyi bsam pa yid la byed pa de lta de ltar sa pa yid la byed pa yongasku rdzogs par 'gyur te/ sbyar ba tsam gyis mod la thams cad 'grub par 'gyur/ 'dod pa thams
cad kyi bsam pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur/ rig sngags 'chang gtsang mar grub pas gos gtsang ma bgos pa// sbos chus legs par khrus byas la/ nyin 'i sman re la don yod pa'i rgyal pos
bzlas brjod byas te zos na/ zos pa tsam gyis mod la de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang/ byang chub sems dpa' thams cad dang/ byang chub sems dba' 'phags pa spyan ras gzig

dbang phyug gis dgongs shing snang ba rnam par dag pa thob par 'gyur/ nyin zhag gsum du sbyar na sngagA rnam par dag pa thob bo// nyin zhag lngar sbyar na dran pa rnam par dag pa thob bo// nyin zhag bdun/
'bya// dusbyaban rig sngags chen po'imag zhib mo rnam par dag pa thob po// nyin zhag bcu bzhir sbyar na don yod pa'i zhags pa de kho na nyid kyi dngos grub kyi dam tshig chen po
thob po// nyin zhag nyi shu rtsa gcig tu sbyar na de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rigs kyi dam tshig dang/ phyag rgya dang/ dkyil 'khor chen po'i dam tshig gi dngos grub thob bo// de bzhin
gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsang ba de kho na nyid kyi dam tshig gi dngos grub thob po// zla ba gcig gi bar du sbyar na 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi dngos grub sgyu ma lta bu s
brgyan pa thob cing tshe lo stong thub par 'gyur ro// zla ba gsum du sbyar na lus yongs su dag pa dang mdog yongs su dag pa thob pa// lo gcig tshang bar sbyar na don yod pa'i dngos grub 'ag sngag
'chang 'khor los sgyur bar 'gyur te 2 mig mthon mthing mdog bung ba lta bu sku 'al bu 'khyil bar 'gyur/ tsholo bdun pa lta bu'i gzugs dang mthun par 'gyur la/ tshe bskal pa 'bum
thub par 'gyur ro// brdar nas bdag nyid la byugs na gang dri mnams pa tsam gyis bgags dang/ log 'dren dang/ gnod sbyin dang/ srin po dang/ 'byung po dang/ sha za dang/ yi
dgas dang/ skem byed dang/ brjed byed dang/ grab gzhan thams cad dang/ gdon thams cad dang/ gdug pa thams cad dang/ dgra thams cad dpag tshad stong du 'bros so// gal te myur
00 dum 'gros nan spyi bo dum bu 'bum du 'gas shing yan lag dang/ nying lag rnams zhig par 'gyur la/ bu dang chung mar bcas pa 'jigs par 'gyur/ sngon gyi sdig pa dang sgrib pa rnams kyis
mi tshugs par 'gyur/ sems can dmyal ba myong bar 'gyur ba mtshams med pa lnga dag 'jig pa'i 'gyur/ rmi lam nganapa dang/ ltas ngan pa dang/ mi shis pa dang/ bkra mi shis pa'i
dngos po thams cad 'jigs pa'i 'gyur/ smos mnams pa tsam gyis rgyal po dang/ rgyal po'i blon po dang/ bram ze dang/ khyim bdag dang/ rgyal rigs dang/ rje'u rigs dang/
dmas rigs ci bgyi zhes bya ba byed la dpang du gyur nas 'khod do// byugs pa tsam gyis 'bras dang/ phol mig dang/ ltog pa dang/ mtshan bar rdol ba dang/ me dang la dang/
rkang shu dang/ g.yan pa dang/ mdze dang/ phyi dro dang/ shu ba dang/ 'brum bu phra mo dang/ rmadang/ khong gi rmayongs su sos par 'gyur/ dug thams cad dang/ zos pa dang/
jug myos dang/ sbyar dug drag po dang/ dug sbyar ma dang/ sbyar dug phye ma dang/ byed rnams la bskus pa tsam dang/ chu dron po 'thungs pa tsam gyis dug med par 'gyur ro/
dri tsam kyis klu'i rgyal po 'jog po'i dug kyang yod par 'gyur ro// rims nyin bzhi pas thabs pa la dpral bar bskus na ku co 'don cing 'bros so// rims thams cad dang/
rims nyin gcig pa dang/ nyin gnyis pa dang/ nyin gsum pa dang/ rlung las gyur pa dang/ mkhris pa las gyur pa dang/ bad kan las gyur pa dang/ 'dus/
pa las gyur pa dang/ lci ba dang/ pho ba'i nad dang/ mchin pa na ba dang/ lha na ba dang/ skan dang/ gcin sri ba dang/ snying na ba dang/ rtsib logs na ba dang/ mgul pa na ba dang//
khan ba dang/ 'khyil zhing na ba dang/ tshad pa dang/ mdoms na ba dang/ yon lag dang nying lag na ba chu dron pos 'thus pa tsam gyis yongs su sos par 'gyur ro// gzhogs phyed
na ba dang/ mgo na ba dang/ mig na ba dang/ rnab na nga la bskus pa tsam gyis sos par 'gyur ro// thog la byas na chom rkun dang/ gnod sbyin dang/ ma dang/ chudang/ byi ba za bas
'jigs pa dang/ gcan gzan khro bos 'jigs pa las yongos su thar par 'gyur zhing/ 'jigs pa thams cad las yongs su thar bar 'gyur ro// nyes par byas pa thams cad lha
yongs su thar par 'gyur ro// lag pa gdengs pa'i 'jigs pa 'byang bur mi 'gyur/ mi ma yin pa gang gis kyang mdangs 'phrog par mi nus shing bar chad bya bar mi nus so// mkha' 'gro
ma thams cad mthong ba tsam gyis dbang du gyur nas 'khod do// rgyal btsun mo dang 'khor dang bcas pa'i mchod gnas chen por 'gyur 'o// gzhan yang gang dang gang du sbyar bar ng gi blos/
bye ba phrag 'bum sbyar nas sgrub par byed de/ sman gyi mchog shin tu 'bad pas bsgrub par bya'o// sman gyi dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga'o/// de nas de'i phyir gser gyi ri lu'i
dkyil 'khor bshad par bya ste/ 'jig rten dbang phyug gi don yod pa'i snying po// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi don yod pa'i rnam par gzigs pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa pad+ma
gtsug tor gyi rgyal po zhes bya ba byin gyis brlangs po/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par snang mdzad dang/ de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen snying bos byin gyis brlabs pa/ de bzhin gsheg
pa 'jig rten dbang phyug 'od kyis bka' stsal pa// gzhan yang de bzhin gshegs pa gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed bya ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag dgu bcu rtsa dgus gsungs shing bsngags
pa/ byin gyis brlabs pa/ dbang bskur ba/ rjes su thugs 'dus par mdzad pa/ lung bstan pa/ mgon po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi gtsug gi nor bu'i cod pan

'chang ba/ rgyal ba 'od dpag med kyi gtsug tor gyi mtshan nyid kyi thigale yid bzhin gyi nor bu rgyal mtshan gyi nor bu ngan po'i rgyal po mchog du grub pa/rig stag dang/ dkyil 'khor dang/ phyag rgyu dang/
cho ga zhib mo thams cad kyi gsang ba/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rigs kyi dam tshig spyi/ sku'i snying po gang gis mthong ba tsam la sogs pa 'dir da bstan pa'i lta su zhig kes
bya@#/ ]nus mod kyi/ 'on kyang de bzhin gshegs pa gang+ga'i klung gi bye ma snyad bye ba dang/ dus gsum gyi de bzhin gshags pa rdzogs par mngon sum du mthong nga dang 'dra bar
'gyur zhing/ de bzhin gshog pa de dag nyid mngon sum du mchod par gzung ba dang/ lung ston pa thob par 'gyur/ de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gi mngon sum du dag pa'i rtsa ba bsod nams kyi
phung po dang ldan par 'gyur ro// nor bu gser gyi kha dog tu bstan pa'i ril bu 'di gang gis mthong zhing 'chang ba ni dge ba'i rtsa ba bsod nams kyi phung po chen po bskyed par 'gyur/ nor bu'i nyel
bu 'di mthong btsam gyis sgrib pa dang/ sdig pa dang/ gdug pa dang/ mtshams med pa lnga dang/ mnar med par gzhol ba dang/ dam pa'i chos spong ba dang/ 'phags pa la skur pa 'debA
pa dang/ sngon gyi tshe 'thusanas bsags pa'i sgrib pa thams cad rnam par 'jigs cing yus par 'gyur/ rims dang nad thams cad las yongs su thar bar 'gyur/ gang gi la gnas nyan
'di yod par gyur pa'i sems can de ni lung bstan par 'gyur ro// ril bu gang la yod pa ni/ phyir mi ldog par lung bstan cing// mgon pos bcu dag la gnas// rtag tu mchod rten kyu'i
pasnyo/ sku gdung snying bo' bdag nyid can// rtag tu sangs rgyas bdag nyid 'gyur// dus gsum dag la bzhugs pa yi// sangs rgyas de bzhin gshegs pa gang// sangs rgyas dpAbo de kun
wa gyi[“ ]sras gcig tu ni brjod pa yin// 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i sras// thugs las skyes dang zhal las skyes// chos kyi dbyings sprul chos las skyes// 'jig rten dbang phyug mchog
sbyin mgon// rtag tu rjes su 'brang par 'gyur// phyag g.yas rtag tu spyi bor ni/ 'jog mdzad 'di ni thatshom med// ril bu mthong ba tsam gyis ni// sdug bsngal kun las rab rtse'agrol//
sdig pa thams cad lhag par 'tshed// sgrib pa thams rnam par bdag/ dri ngan 'gror 'gro ma 'gyur// phyir zhing gnas mchog zhi ba 'thob// 'jig rten 'dren pa 'od dpag med// mgon
po rtag tu mngon sum mthong// bad ba can du 'jug par byed// gangan de yi mngon dga' ba// de bzhin gshegs pa mi 'khrugs pa// rtag tu mi 'khrugs par 'gyur zhing// de bzhin me g.yo mi
'gul te// sems dpa' ri 'ab che dang mnyam// gzung du med pas mtsho dang 'dra// de la bgags dang log 'dren dag/ nams kyang 'jug par ma 'gyur la// sems dpa' phyag bya'i gnas su 'gyur//
gang la nor rgyal 'di yod la// rgyal po chen po bzhi po dag/ dpung dang bcas pa bkol dang bas// rtag tu srung phyir gnas byed de// 'dir ni nyin mtshan de bzhin no// lha tshogs thams cad srung bar
ni the tsam med par byed par 'gyur// gzi brjid dpal yang rab tu 'phel// de la legs par 'jug par 'gyur// 'jigs med rtag tu rmi lam ni// dngos po chen po sna tshogs mthong//
/@#// gru 'dzin ril gzhal med khang// tshal dang bcas shing rin chen bcas// gnas dang bcas pa mthong bar 'gyur// lha dang klu dang gnod sbyin dang// dri bla lha min gsang ba//
sa ba nam mkha' lding dang mi 'amani// de bzhin lto 'phya 'khor dang bcas// byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor rnams ni// kun nas bskor ba mthong bar 'gyur// rin chen lha yi seng ge 'i gdan//

khang pa brtsegs pa rin chen dang// nor bu chen pos brgyan pa dang// 'jig rten dbang phyug thub pa'i gtso// pad+ma'i snying po la bzhugs nas// don yod zhags pa'i phyag rgya dang// dkyil 'khor bcas pa'i
chos bstan to// gsung kun thob par gyur nas ni// thub pa rang gi ngo bo mthong// de ltar rmi lam bzang rmib// nyin gcig bzhin du mthong bar 'gyur// nor bu rgyal po'i mthu ni de 'dra bas// de bas
mi yis 'bad pa chen pos gzung// dge sbyong bram ze nyid deng rgyal rigs dang// dmangs rigs nyid dam yang na rgyal bo 'am// btsun mo sras sam dpung gi gtso bo 'am// skyes pa 'am bud med khyo'u dang bu
mo dag/ nor bu'i rgyal po rtag tu 'chang byed pa// de na ston pa nyid dang 'drab r 'gyur// chos kun kyis ni mi su zhing// gnod byed kyis ni 'jigs mi 'gyur// 'jigs pa mi bzad brgyud las mtha'//
de la dug dang sbyar ba'i dug/ sbyar dug drags pos mi tshugs shing// de la byad kyis tshugs mi 'gyur// gang la nor bu'i rgyal po yod// de la nad kyis ma tshugs shing// na bas ma yin sdig pas min//
0 pad+machu yis mi chags ltar// rtag tu chags pa med par gnas// g.yul khyad pa yi nang na 'am// 'thab bam 'gyed dam rtsod pa na// lan thobs rtag tu rgyal bar ni// thob par 'gyur te thatsom med// ngag
rdzas ni bshad bya ste// sman ni bkras dang ldan pa// grub pa'i mtha' ste mchog tugatsang// 'jig rten mgon dang mnyam par gsungs// a ka ru dang/ tsan dan dang/ pad+ma dang/ ut+pal dang/ shi ri'i

sha'i me tog dang/ a pa man dang/ ma 'u dang/ na la da dung/ chu srin gyi san mo dang/ ka na ka'i 'bras bu dang/ tsan dan gyi 'bras bu dang/ pad+ma'i 'bras bu dang/ rdodrag dang/ ma da dang/ btsodadang/ sU ka

ri dang/ ma ka Ti dang/ dza ya dang/ bi dza ya dang/ pa ri pa la ba dang/ ra sa dang/ bIr dang/ rgyu ma ka dang/ rgya spos dang/ bu sA dang/ a brta ga dang/ ru tshudang/ bya spu na kha dang/ pata tra dang/ tratsa dang/

ka dam b+ha rA dang/ dri yang ku dang/ gi'u wang dang/ lci ka dang/ tshig rkang dang/ yungs kar dang/ nag pur dang/ a la dang/ ldong 'osadang/ gur kum dang/ ga bur dang/ gla rtsi dang/ sbyang spos dang/
nal sham dkalo dang/ su ma dang/ nye'u shing dang/ shu ti dang/ sbrang rtsi dang/ tsam pa ka// de bzhin rdzas ni dag kun// su bats+tshani dkar po sbyar// ril bu 'am cigatsam dun// skyes bu mkhas pas

bya ba yin// su banas nii bkab nas su// rdzas rnams bsres nas sbyar bar bya// cha rnams 'phel bar bya ba// gla rtsi yis ni dri da do// phyi ma zhib mor btags nas su// tsan dan dkar po'i nus sbyar nas/
khubla// grib ma la ni bskam par bya// tshes brgyud dag nas brtsams nas ni// tshes ni bco lnga nya yi bar// nyin gcig bzhin du don yod pa'i// rgyal pos brgya rtsa brgyad du bzlas// khro
bo'i rgyal pos nyin gcig bzhin// lan bdun bar du dbang bskur ro// phyag rgyas dbang bskur bar yang bya// de nas tshes ni bco lnga ste// 1 la chu dang yus kar dag/ dkyil 'khor du zhigazhag par bya//
de nas nor bu'i rgyal po ni// gzhag pa'i dkyil 'khor bshad par bya// ma rnams ma nor legs par dbye// rgyab ni ko la'i tshad du bya// shin tu 'jam la byi bdar lags// tshon rtsi sna tshogs mdzes

pa dang// dkyil 'khor mchog ni thig gdab bo// sgo bzhi ded cing grwabazhi dad// kun nas shin tu maphye zhing// dkyil 'khor snying po cha phye ba// tshad dang shin tu ldan par bya// pad+machen po bzhi dag dang/

de bzhin phyag dang spyan du bcas// don yod dngos grub bri bar bya// nor bu'i rgyal po 'chang ba yis// phyag rgyar bcas pa bri bar bya// chu yi rgya mtsho'i nang du ni// las kyi rdo rje legs par bri// dkyil 'khor

snying po dam pa la// kun nas kha khyer rnam pa dang// me tog sna tshogs pa dag bri// dkyil 'khor phyi rol kun tu n// nor bu pad+ma lags par bri// sgo bzhi yi ni gnas rnams su// pad+ma zhags pa mdung/
tshog sum// rdo rje'i tshul mchogalegs par bri// gru bzhi yi ni gnas rnams su// lag na nor bu yod pa bri// pad+ma'i stang narab tu gnas // dkyila'akhob zang po phan phran dang// bum pa bkang dang mo
tog dang// bdug pa 'bras bu rnams kyis brgyan// gtor ma rnam pa sna tshogs dag/ ci bdog bus cher gzhag pa'i bu// kun tu mar me'i 'phreng ba dang// mchod yon chu dang a ga ru// tsan dan bdug spos
dbul bar bya// nor bu'i rgyal po 'jigs med pa// snod bzang legs par bkang nas su// skya dar la yis kha g.yogs te// dkyil 'khor de nyid rig pas gzhag/ dkyil 'khorasnying por 'jig rten dbang/

gzhig ste de nas las rdo rje// snod kyi steng du gzhag pa ni// nor bu'i dkyil 'khor bya ba yin// de nas rigasngags 'chang gis don yod pa'i rgyal po lamanyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas brjod bya// khro ba'i rgyal
pos lan bdun dbang bskur bar bya// de nas gsang sngags yi ge gcig pu 'bum tshang ba'abazlas brjod bya ste/ 'bum bzlas brjod byas na nor bu'i rgyal po 'bar bar 'gyur/ de nas rig sngags 'chang
gi lag/ g.yas dang ldan pas bzung nas// chang pa dam du bsdam par bya// bstams pa tsam gyis med dag la// rdzu 'phrul gyis nimakha' la 'gro// nor bu drim med pa don yod pa'i rnam par/
'phrul ba bkod pa zhes bya ba/ rig sngags 'chang gi 'khor los sgyur ba 'thobal/ 'khar rig sngags 'chang 'khor los sgyur ba bye ba phrag 'bum yod par 'gyur/ lung gi sgo thams cad phu bar 'gyur//
sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad phyi bar 'gyur/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rigs kyi dam tshig dang/ dkyil 'khor dang/ phyag rgyu dag kha ton du lobs par 'gyur/ sas rgyas kyi zhing thams cad
u@#// du 'jug par 'gyur/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la phyag 'tshal ba dang 'dud pa dag gis gsong pa'i ny+tsa bar byed/ thams cad du'ang donayod pa'i dkyil 'khor rnam par thar

pa'i dkyil 'khor rnam par phye ba thob par 'gyur/ tsho bskal pa 'bum phrag bdun cu rtsa gnyis uring bar 'gyur/ don yodapa'i pad+ma 'khor lo mdun nas 'gro bar 'gyur ro// gal te 'bar bar ma gyur na sngar

bstan pa'i yon tan gyi khyad par rnams thob par 'gyur la/ mnyam pa nyid kyis de bzhin gshegs pa dang 'dra ba'i nor bu rgyal po'i ril bu ni 'jig rten dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i las rnamasgrub pa yin no// tshe bas

nas 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba can du skye bar 'gyur la/ gang dang gang du skye ba'i tshe rabs thams cad du tshe rabs dran par 'gyur/ nor bu'i ril bu 'di mthong ba tsam gyis dus gsum gyi de bzhin gshegs pa/

mngan gsum du mthong zhing lta bar 'gyur/ 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug mngon du mthong zhing rtag tu lta ba'i 'gyur/ ril bu rang gi lus la yodan de 'ang phyir mi ldog par 'ag par bya'o// de bzhin

gshogs pa'i ring sasrel gyi snying po mchon rten dang mnyam pa zhes bya ba ste/ 'di la som nyi dang yid gnyis bskyod par mi bya'o// mthong ba dang reg pa tsam gyi mod la sngon gyi las kyi sgrib pa grangs dang bgrang
ba'i tshul gyi bskal pa 'bum du bsags pa mnar med pa'i gnas su 'gro bar 'gyur ba/ mtshams med pa lnga byid pa/ 'phags pa la skur pa 'debs pa/ dam pa'i chos sbyong ba de dag thams cad dus gsum
gyi bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag gi mthu dang/ 'phags pa can bas gzigs dbang phyug gi nor bu'i rgyal po'i mthus thams cad zad par 'gyur/
sems can dmyal ba'i 'gro ba dag las yongs su thar bar 'gyur/ bde 'gro'i lam la gzhol bar 'gyur/ tsho brjes nas 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba can du skye bar 'gyura'o// de lta bsan legs par sgrub pa'i

mthar thug par bya zhing bsgrub par bya/ mthu stobs kyis sbyar bar bya/ shin tu gsal zhing rab tu gsal ba'ibasam pas 'bad pas sbyar bar bya/ rang gi sha dang khrag kyang yongs su btang nas btsal bar bya zhing/
chog zhib mo'i rgyal po yisasu btsal bar bya ba yin/ phyi rol gyi dngos po nor dang/ 'bru dang/ dbyig dang/ gser dang/ dngul dang/ gos dang/ rgyan rnams yongs su btang nas yongs su btsal bar bya ba

lta smos kyang cinagasate/ srogagatang bar bya'o/ de gtang bar mi bya'o// don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po rnam par thar pa'i dkyil 'khor rim par phye ba sgrub pa 'di btsal bar bya zhing bsgrub par bya'o//

'di dus phyi ma'i tshe na sems can thams cad la sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa byed par 'gyur/ sems can thams cad yang dag pa nyid kyi dad pas sangs rgyas nyid du mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur//
phyir mi ldog par 'gyur zhing/ rnams kyang ngan 'gro log par 'gro ba' mi 'gyur ro// nor bu'i ril bu sgrub pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga'o/// de nas de'i phyir don yod pa yas pa'i dkyil
rgyu@#// 'khor chen po rin yod pa chen po'i rnam par 'phrul ba'i dngos grub kyi sman nor bu dang gsang sngags rnams bshad par bya ste/ sman zho'i bu dang/ gsang sngags dang/ dkyil 'khor dang/

phyag rgya'i mthu des phyi ma'i dus phyi ma'i tshe na rig sngags 'chang rnams kyi de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rigs kyi dam tshig spyi'i gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor rnam pa sna tshogs sgyu ma lta bu'i ngo bo nyid bstan pa yang
dag par bstan pa yang dag par ston par mdzad/ bkags pas grub ba/ rigs kyi dam tshig spyi'i gsang ba thams cad du nye bar ston par mdzad do// rig sngags 'chang rnamos kyi ngal ba 'bras bu med pa
gzhan du 'gyur ba med do// ngal bdung/ dub pa dang/ 'bad pa bzus brjod kyi chog 'bras bu med par mi 'gyur bar bya ba'i phyir/ rang gi sems kyi rgyud dad pa dang/ gus pa dang/ gsang chen dang/ gsang

bar bya ba gzhan la bstan par mi bya ste/ dngos grub med par mi 'gyur ro// de lta bas na gsang sngags sgrub pa nishin tu gsang ba'i bya zhing legs par sbyang ba byas pa la 'bad par bya/ kha zas ngan pa spang

bya/ gos ngan pa dang sems can ngan pa'i ng yongs su spang bar bya/ mi bsrun pa dang/ mi bden pa dang/ phra ma dang/ sems can sun par byed pa dang/ gsang sngags nub dang/ cho ga zhib mo zhu ba'i byed pa
dang/ phyag rgya dang/ dkyil 'khor zhu ba'i byed pa de dag gis rtogs pa ni gang na'ang med de/ dus gsum gyi mgon pos smad cing byang chub sems dpas kyang smad la/ mgon po 'phags pa spyan ras gzig
dbang phyug gis kyang smad pa yin no// sems can sdong dum sregs pa 'di// gsang ba sun 'byin ma rungs pa// 'jig rten 'di dang pha rol tu// rtag tu smad par bya ba yin// lha rnams kyis
ni yongasaMsu btang// ma rungs pas ni bdud kyis zos// ma rungs pas ni bgegs kyis zos// bslab gzhi tshul khrims nyams pa dang// mgon po'i bstan pa sun 'byin pa// de la dngos grub ji ltar

'byung// de la skyob pa gang yang med// mgon med kun tu smad pa yin// de bas de la dngos grub ni// chung du'ang med la nyes pa yis// gsang sngags dang ni sman mi 'grub// nyes pa de dag rang gis byas//

gzhan yang ma rungs byed pa yin// de bas sems can makhas la sbyin// slob pa 'dod cing yon tan dga'// snying rje'i bdag nyid byams la gnas// sems can kun la brtse ba'i mchog/ de yi lag tu sbyin bya ste// de yi

dngos grub bla na med// gas nga ba 'din shin tu gsang ba yin te// 'jig rten dbang phyug gi snying po gsang ba de'ang rig sngags 'chang rnams kyi de kho na nyid kyi gsang ba dang/ gsang sngags dang/ phyag rgya sgrub su ste/ bkagA

pas 'grub pa de bzhin du sman nor bu 'di la rtag tu 'jugacing dngos grub kyi de kho na nyid rab tu ston par byed ba yin no// rig sngags 'chang gi bdag nyid kyis// mchog tu gsang ba bsgrub bya ba// rig sngags 'angan gtsang ma

yis// khrus byas ges gtsang gyon byed la// 'dir ni nyin zhag smyung ba dang// dad dang gus pas mchod pa dang// don yod 'khor lo sgrub byed pas// dngos grub dkyil 'khor dam pa sgrub// sman spyi ka dang/ tsan dan gyi
phyam dang/ a ka ru dang/ pad+ma ge sar dang/ pad+madang/ pad+ma'i lcam bu dang/ pad+ma'i 'dab ma dang/ de bzhin du gi'u wang dang/ ldong ros dang/ tsam pa ka dang/ su ma na skye/ de bzhin chan

mnyam gyur to// phye ma dag tu byas nas ni// de nas don yod rgyal po yis// tshes brgyan dang ni bco lnga'i bar// brgya rtsa brgyad du bzlas brjod bya// khro bo'i rgyal bos brgya rtsa brgyad// bzlos brjod byas nas dbang

bskur ro// de'i 'og tsam lngar bya ste// mig bsku ba dang/ ril bu dang/ phye ma dang/ til maratshos pa dang/ kha dong bkru zhing khrus bya'o// mig smananiso'u byi ro dang lhan cig spus la don yod pa'i rgyal

pos brgya stong bzlas brjod bya'o// ril bu'i sbrang rtsi dkar po dang lhan cig sgra'o// phyi ma ni 'jig rten dbang phyug la phul ba'i me tog dang lhan cig sbya'o// til mar btsos pa ni gra sgra ti laso/ shing ba la sha'i/

mar dang lhan cigasbya'o// kha gdong bkru ba ni tsan dan dkar po'i chu dang lhan cigasmra zhing// guganadang/ gur kum dang/ spos chus lhan cig skyes la so sor brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod bya/ khro bo'i rgyal

pos nyi shu rtsa gcig bsdus brjod byas nas dbang bskur bar bya'o// de nas rig sngags 'chang nyi zhag gcig sbyang ba byas pas gcig tu smras te/ dngul gyi snod kyin ng du bcug la/ so sor brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas

brjod byas nas shar phyogs kyi sgo nas dkyil 'khor du gzhag bar bya ste/ dkyil 'khor mchog la phyag dang bskor ba byas la/ de nas so sor dar gyis kha gcad de dkyil 'khor gyi snying por gzhag la/ don yod

pa'i rgyal po bskya rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod bya/ khro lo'i rgyal po brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod byas nas dbang bskur bar bya/ dbang bskur bar byas nas kyang rig sngags 'chang gis dbang bskur bar bya/ de nas dkyil
'khor snying po ni// 'jig rten dbang phyug mchod bya ste// bdugs lnga dag dbul bya bar// a ka ru dang tsan dan dang// sprikagu gul du ru ka/ mchod yon snod zhe lnga dbul zhing// gtor m ldani dgang

bya ste// ro ldan sna tshogs dag gis dgang// ro ldan 'bras bu sna tshogs pa'i// gtor ma cha lnga dbul bar bya// kun tu 'phreng ba nyi shu dang// mar ma nyi shu lta dag dang// spos kyi phye ma lnga dag dang// spos

kyi chalngar phye bas byug/ 'phan phran nyi shu rtsa lnga gdags// tshon rtsi lnga yis mdzes pa bya// gser dang dngul gyis g.yogs pa yi// bum pa gang pa nyi shu lnga// rin po che ni lnga gzhug go/ sgo pa'i grwa bzhi

bum pa brgyad// brgya dang nyi shu rtsa lnga nyid// dkyil 'khor me tog 'bras yos dang// yungs kar nyid kyis mngon par dgram// slob dpon bla ma mchod pa ni// gas dang snod dang yon gyis so// thub pa 'jig
rten dbang phyug ltar// ston pa'i 'du shes bskyod nas su// dkyil 'khor slob dpon mchod byas nas// de nas dkyil 'khor gshegs par gsol// de nas lasa rnams bya ba ni// ji ltar yod la sna tshog+hu
bya/ don yodachen po'i gzhal med khang// rig sngags 'chang gis rtag cu gsang// de nyid dngos grubasgrubasu ba// de bzhin nor busman sngags so// don 'di shin tu bkra shis so// mkhas pa mi yi
bya ba yin// phra ma'i tshig kyang mi bsten te// brdzun gnams kyang stsami bya// 'di ni sgrub pa'i de nyid de// de la 'grub pa de tsam med// 'dir ni dkyil 'khor bshad par bya//
kun nas gru bzhi lham pa ste// gru bzhi ni legasalar byed// ko la'i tshad de lags pa dang// sna tshogs mtshon gyi thogaskud kyis// dkyil 'khor dam pa thig gdab po// dkyil 'khor dbus kyi snying por

wA ni// 'khor lo bzang po bri bar bya// dbus kyi lte bar pad+mo yi// 'khor lo gsal ba bri bar bya// bats+tsha'i snying po'i gser dang ni// dngul lam tshan dan las byas la// 'bar bar 'jig rten dbang phyug gzhug/

'khor lo kun tu rtsibs dang ni// mu khyud dag gis ma dbye'o// dkyil 'khor snying po'i grwa rnams der// lha'i dbang po tshangs pa dang// khyab 'jug dbang phyug chen po bri// kun tu kha khyer rnam pa dang//

pad+ma 'phreng ba rnams bu'o// dkyil 'khor phyi rol kun tu ni// rtag tu phyag rgya rnams bri ste// rdo rje dgra sta mdung rtse gsum// ral gri zhags pa thob dang// gshin rdzob can pad+magadugs// dbyug tomada'

bo che rnams so// grwa rnams kun tu 'phreng ba dang// me tog rnam pa sna tshogs dgram// sgosgo de ni dkyil 'khor gyi// lta sta gshen rdzunu lha dang// lus can dang ni gzhon nu bri// dkyil 'khor gru bzhi rnams/
su ni// rgyal po chen po bzhi po dag/ go cha legs par bgos pa dang// khro ba'i lta ba 'jigs byed bri// 'di ni dkyil 'khor mchog yin te// dkyil 'khor gyi ni dgos ba rnams// legs pa yongs su rdzog/
00 pa ra ni// ga sngags ji bzhin bstan pa yin// de nas legs par khrus byas la// gos gtsang bags pa 'jigs med pas// sman mchog gzung ste las bya 'o// rmongs pa'i dra ba sna tshogs dang//
sgyu ma lta bu'i rnam sprul pa// gang gis ngan 'gro thar 'gyur ba// sems can kun la bstan bar bya// rtag tu dga' dang dad pa dang// gus pas de nyid thob par 'gyur// rigasngags 'chang gis sgrub pa'i

mchog/ dngos grub de nyid thob par 'gyur// rigasngags 'chang gis sngar khrus byas laN+Das kyi dri chab gtsang ma don yod pa'i rgyal pos brgya rtsa brgyud bzlas brjod bya/ tsan dan gyi tshul lan brgya rtsa brgyadagazlas

brjod byas nas sku yan chad tsam phyug la tshod zin par bskus nas kha gdong bkru bar bya'o// mig sman la brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod byas nas bskus na mig bzang bar 'gyur ro// brgya rtsa brgyad tshang bar bzlas/

brjod byas nas bdaganyid dang phyogs bcur gtor ro// de bzhin du til mar la brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod byas nas sku yan chad bsku ba dang/ tshod zin par bsku ba dang/ lus dang mthil yan chad bsku'o//
yi ga gcig pu yid la bya ba la sems byams pa nyid la gnas nas rgyal po dang/ btsun mo'i sgo 'am/ skye bo'i nang ngam/ 'dus pa chen po 'am/ dge 'dun gyi nang ngam/ tshogs dang phrad pa 'am/ de bzhin

du gzhan dag kyang rung ste/ de dag thams cad kyis 'jig rten mgonapo'i gzugs dang kha dog tu mthong zhing sa'i steng nas rkang pa khru gang tsam gyis sngags te 'dug la/ ji lta ji ltar 'dul ba rnams kyi dad
pa de lta de ltar gzugs rnams ston par byed de/ rgyal po 'am/ 'khor los skyar ba 'am/ mi'i seng ge 'am/ phag gam/ sred med kyi bur ston pa 'am/ tshangs pa 'am/ sum cu rtsa
gsum gyi dbang po 'am/ dbang phyug chen po meg pa/sum pa 'am/ gzhon nu 'am/ chu lha 'am/ gshin rta 'am/ rnam thos kyi bu 'am/ de bzhin du rgyal po chen po bzhi 'am/ nag po chen po 'am/ dga' byed/
dbang phyug gam/ ser skya 'a ma/ gsang ba pa 'am/ lag na rdo rje stobs po che 'am/ nor bu bzang po'i bu 'am/ gang ba bzang po lam/ stobs kyi lha 'am/ gar mkhan mchog gam/ rlung lha 'am/ drang

srong nyid de/ ji ltar gzugs rnam pa sna tshogs yid la byas pa thams cad ston par byed de// me tog dang 'bras bu sna tshogs pa nyid 'byung bar byed de// de bzhin du dge 'dun gyi nang du zhugs na de sangs rgyas
kyi gzugs dang/ gzugs sna tshogs u snang zhing gzhal med khang gi rnam pa dag kyang ston pa'i byad do// ji ltar 'dod par 'gyur ba yid la byas pa de ltar gzugs rnams ston par byed do// 'khor tshogs
pa 'am/ dgon pa 'am/ 'chags dag kyang snyan nor bu dang/ gsang sngags kyi mthus gzugs sna tshogs su ston par byed de// 'gron po 'brog gi nang du phyin pa nyam thag pa/ 'jigs pa mi bzad ngo//
mumed pa 2 mu ga'i dgon pa ra mgon med pa/ sdug bsngal drag po de lta bu'i nang du chud pa'i skya bo sdug par gyur pa/ skyabs med pa/ mgon med par gyur pa/ skyo pa med pa/ dpung gnyen med par
gyur pa na de la rig sngags 'chang gis phyi ma 'dis phyogs bzhir mtshams gcad par bya/ phyi mas dkyil 'khor gyi tshul du ri mo bris la ril bu lnga dkyil 'khor gyi dbus su gzhag go/ yungs kar la

til mar gyi rgyal pos bskus la don yod pa'i rgyal pos brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod bya/ khro ba'i rgyal pos brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod byas te dbang bskur nas/ khro bo'i rgyal pos hU~M zhes bya bas phyag

rgya bcings la/ sa la bsnun cing phyogs bzhir gtor bar bya ba phyag rgya dang ldan par byas pa tsam gyis chu bzang po rnam pa sna tshogs 'bab cing rdzing 'byung bar 'gyur/ tshal dang/ nye ba'i tshal dang/

ma tog dang/ 'bras bu sna tshogs dang ldan pa'i gzhal med khang 'byung bar 'gyur/ phye ma'i dkyil 'khor de las grong khyeradang khang bzang 'byung bar 'gyur/ khyim gyi gnas lnga stong 'byung bar 'gyur
zhing/ bde ba dang/ lo legs pa dang/ nyams dga' ba dang/ skye ba dang/ mi mang pos gang ba 'byung bar 'gyur/ nyo tshong dang/ ba lang dang/ ma he dang/ rta dang/ glang po'i gnas dag 'byung bar
'gyu'i/ dge sbyong dang/ bram ze dang/ tshong pa dang/ khyim dang/ khang pa bzang po dag 'byung bar 'gyur te/ ji srid du bsams pa de srid du 'dug go/ chu dang yungs ka la lan bdun bzlas brjod byas
sa phyogs bzhir gtan mi snang bar 'gyur 'o// yungs ka'adegayul 'gyed pa'i nang du gtor na dpung gi tshogs yan lag bzhi dang ldan par 'byung bar 'gyur te/ des pha rol gyi dmag tshogs dang/
dgra 'jigs shing 'joms par byed pa las rgyal bar 'gruba'o// grong khyer gyi phyogs bzhi kun tu gtor na gtor ba tsam gyi med la 'obs bcad cingar ba kha khyer gyis bskor la//

grong khyer kun tu skyes bu go cha bgos pa dag snang bas grong khyer mnan pa lam gtsaba'i sus kyang mi nus so// mtshan mo'i sri'i til mar ni 'di yungs kar la bskus te// brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod byas

nas chang pa gang mo'i nang du gtor/ chang pa gang grapakhyer gyi phyogs bzhi kun tu gtor na kun nas mar me'i 'phreng ba 'byung bar 'gyur la/ ji srid dgos pa de srid du 'o bar 'o// gtsug lag khang ngam/ dgon
pa 'am/ ri 'am/ phug gam/ 'chag sa'i gnas sam/ khyim du gtor na mar me'i 'phreng ba 'byung bar 'gyur 'o// mudang yungs kar gyis mi snang bar 'gyur/ grong khyer gyi sgor yungs kar gtor na

klu gtor ba tsam gyi mod la dgra thams cad dang/ pha rol gyi dmag tshogs kyis grong khyer mi snang bar 'gyur 'o// gang na phyir rgol ba dang/ pha rol gyi dmag tshogs gnas pa'i grong ngam/ grong khyer ram/

tshal gyi nang ngam/ dgon pa'i gnas su gter na 'brog dgon pa 'byung bar 'gyur la/ thamasacad phan tshun ngo ma shesanas 'jigs shing skrag pa chen pos rab tu 'bros par byed do// dgru'i tshogs kyi nang du

gtor na mtshon cha thams cad dang/ 'gyed pa'i go mthams cad mi snang zhing gcer bur 'gyur ro// zhal cho 'gyed pa'i nang du gtor na 'gyed zla gtso bo de gcer bur 'gyur ro// dgra'i steng du gtor na me 'bar
00 ba 'byung bar 'gyur te/ de dag la sogs pa yid la ji ltar byas pa'i las 'bum snyad byed de// de nas las rgya chen po byed par 'dod pa'i rig sngags 'chang gtsang ma legs par khrus byas pa smos/
kyis lus bskus pa des/ yus kar dang til mar gyi rgyal pos bskus pa la brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod byas nas/ 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyag la gtor bar bya/ khro bo'i rgyal pos lan
bdun dbang bskur nas phyag rgyu bcas pa'i lag pas ril bu spyi bor bzhag la phye mas gdab par bya/ til mar gyi rgyal rosarkang pa la byug par bya/ don yod pa'i rgyal po lan cig dran par bya ste//
yongs su sbyang ba'i las lhan cig bya ba legs par byas pas 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi gzugs g.yo ste gar dga' bor 'gro la/ gzugs brnyan gang du 'gro ba de nyid du rang 'gro/

lha'i steng du gtor na lha lha'i gnas nias 'pho zhing ga' dga' ba der 'gro'o// bya mas lha'i steng du gtor na khro bo'i rgyal bo hUM zhes bya ba mi snang bar 'gyur ro// til mar gyi rgyal po la lan brgya brgya
bzus brjod byas la bdag nyid kyi pus mo dang byin pa la bskus na nam mkha' la 'gro bar 'gyur ro// rkang mthil la bskus na sa'i steng na rkang pa sor bzhi tsam mi rig go/ rdo'i steng du
kang pa gzhag pa dang/ rkang rjes byung ba'i stang du lnga ma dang/ bum dang/ bum pa gzhag pa'i nub la bskus na sor bzhi tsam gyi tshad du nam mkha' la 'du'o// yungs kar la bzlas brjod
dbyas nas mes sbyin sreg byas pa'i thal ba de blangs nas lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod byas la/ til mar gyis sbrus pa la khro ba'i rgyal pos brgya rtsa brgyad dbang bskur nas
mig la bskus mig gsum ston cing dbang phyug chen po'i gzugs su ston par byed de// thal bas lus la byugs na tshangs pa'i gzugs su ston to// shing pa la sha dang pan kha bsres pas lus
