ny+tsa/ byugs na sred med kyi bu'i stobs dang/ shugs dang/ gzugs su ston to// til mar chen pos khal gsus la thal bas dpral ba' thig le byas na gzhon nu'i gzugs su ston to// yungs kar

gyi 'a bru kha dog sna tshogs can la til mar chen po byugs pas bskusal don yod pa'i rgyal pos brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod bya/ phyag rgyas brgya rtsa brgyad dbang bskur cing khro bo'i rgyal pos brgya rtsa brgyad
dbang bskur la/ de nas dngul gyi snod kyi nang du gzhag/ de nas las thams cad byed de nam mkha' la gtor na nor bu dang rin po che'i rnam 'bab par ston to// de bzhin gshegs pa mchodabatsanam
mkha' la gtor na me tog gi char sna tshogs 'bab par 'gyur/ 'dus pa'i nang du nam mkha' la gtor na 'bras bu dang mar gyi rgyunasna tshogs pa ston to// tshal kyi nang du gteran me tog dang 'bras bu sna

tshogs pa ston to// ri phug tu gtor na rdzas dang sman sna tshogs ston to// mchod rten dang ba 'am/ gtsug lag khang ngam/ lha'i gnas su gtor g.yo byad thams cad kyis yongs su gang zhing rdzogs pa khang
ba bzang po yangs pa gnas kyi mchog ston to// grong khyer stong par gtor na 'tsho ba'i yo byad thams cad phun sum tshogs shing yongs su rdzogs pa dang/ yul rgyal po dang/ sus dang/ bkrabs pa dang/
mdun na 'don ba dang/ blon po dang/ skyes pa dang/ bud med dang/ khye'u dang/ bu mo dgaston to// yang khro ba'i rgyal po'i sgyu zhes bya bas gtor na dpung gi tshogs yan lag bzhi ba ston to// dur
khrod kyi nang dugatongan shi ba'i rus pa gang dang gang la bab pa de dang de gang dusems can dmyal ba 'am/ dud 'gro'i skye gnas sam/ gshin rje'i 'jig rten nam/ lha ma yin nam/ nam mkha'
lding ngam/ dri za 'am/ mi 'am ci 'am/ lto 'phya chen po 'am/ bya 'am/ nya 'am/ zus gral gyi rigs su skyes pa 'am/ lha'i 'jig rtan nam/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing du skyes pa de'i rus pa 'am

thod pa las tshig 'byung bar 'gyural/ gang du skyes la de'i gtam yang stsalo// gang dang gang gi skye gnas su skyes pa de thams cad skya la/ thabs ji ltar bya ba de stsa'o// yungs kar des kyang rus gang
'brel bar ram/ shi ba'i ro 'am/ rus pa 'thor ba la baban bab pa tsam gyis mod la sems can dmyal ba las yongs su thar nas 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba can du skye bar 'gyur ro// 'ong bkram
pa'inang du gtor na thams cad mi mngon par 'gyur ro// nam mkha' la gtor na skar ma rnams mi mthong bar 'gyur ro// skye bo mang po'i nang du gtor na thams cad gcer bur 'gyur ro// 'dus
pa'i nang dugator n thams cad bro rdung bar byed do// dge 'dun gyi nang du gtong na dgeslong thams cad bsam gtan 'thob par 'gyur ro// tshogs kyi gtso bo la gtor na rnal 'byor/
spyod pa ra 'gyur// mkha' 'gro ma'i tshogs kyi nang du gtor na thams cad bong bu dang/ wa dang/ khyi'i gzugs can du 'gyura'o// sbyo'oma'i sgor gtor na sbyor ma thams cad 'bal ma ho gzu

can du snang ngo// shi ba'i steng du gtor na bro brdung bar byed de// thod pa'i steng du gtor na bro rdung bar byed cing rgyug la phan tshun rgyug par byed do// lam gyi bzhi mdoragatong na gnod sbyin dang/ srin po
dang/ 'byung po thams cad rang gi gzugs kyis mdun na nye bar 'khod la/ ji srid 'tsho'i dbang du gyur nas 'khod do// nyin gcig bzhin bdag nyid la gtor na mchod pa chen po'i gnas su 'gyur te//
gzhan yang rang gi bla rnams kyis las 'bum snyed do// don yod pa tshan po rnam par 'phrul pa'i dkyil 'khor sgyu ma lta bu'i cho ga'o//'phags pa don yod pa'i zhags
pa'i cho ga zhib mo'i rgyal po bam po bco brgyad pa////de nas de'i phyir 'gugs pa chen po dang/ lag na rdo lnga'i gzugs bstan pa'i cho ga bshad par bya ste/ gang gis lha rnams myur du 'ong pa dang//

phyag na rdo rje'i gzugs myur du ston to// rdo rje'i sku dang stobs po che// rtamagrinadang ni mgu'u0f8bsngon dang// de bzhin rta rgod ma'i la// bdud rtsi 'khyil ldan gzugs po che// log 'dren rnams ni rab

babs// 'joms dang// khro rgyal de bzhin 'jigs byed spyan// ke la'i ka li'i rgyal po che// khro gi tshil la stobs po che// de bzhin rdo rjes 'og gzugs// rdo rje rtse mo de nyid dang// klu chen rab 'joms sbyan
yangs dang// sog ma med ni 'dul ba dang// de bzhin thags khro khros chen dang// de bzhin mtshob gcigs ma dzad dang// rgyal po chen po rdo rje'i sgrog/ klu yi dbang po stobs kyis gnon// mgon po
gos sngon gyon pa dang// dbyug sngon dgra las rgyal ba dang// 'jig rten dbang phyug pad+ma'i ste// phyag na pad+ma pad+ma phyug/ de bzhin 'jigs pa brgyud sel dang// de bzhin mchod rten 'jig rtan bu/

sna tshogs gzugs te bzang po dang// sred med bu dang tshangs pa dang// drag po daN+Di dbang phyag dang// nag pa chen bo gzhono zhu dang// gshin rje dang ni chu lha nyid// nyi ma dang ni zla ba dang// rgyu
skar sgra gcan majug 'angs dang// de bzhin gza' dang lha ma yin// nam mkha' lding dang mi 'am ci// gnod sbyin srin po lto 'phye che// 'byung po dpal ldan rnam thos bu// de bzhin yul skyong mig mi
bzang// 'phags skyes de nyid mthong ba dang// mi'u thung dang drang srong gzugs// nor bu bzang sras gang pa bzang// sna tshogs gzugs na ston pa dang// rgyal po dang ni dan dpon dang// tshong

dpon de bzhin khyim bdag dang// bram ze dang ni rgyal rigs dang// dag sbyong stag dang seng ge dang// khyu mchog de bzhinanags kyi lha// shing lha de bzhin lo rtag lha// gang+gA sI ta ya mu na// zla ba
skal ldan rus sbal nya// lag 'gro dang ni thod pa can// skal yod de bzhin 'bras bu dang// ma tog rgya rlabs chen po dang// sna tshogs gzugs dang rnam sna tshogs// de ltar/
dgug pa bstan pa dang// de ltar slar gshegs gsol banyid// sbyin sreg dra ba 'di nyid kyis// sgyu 'phrul rmad khyung gsang sngags grub// rdzas grub nor bu til mar grub// don yod zhags pa bsgrub

nga 'i phyir// de nyid dngos grub 'ab ston ba// mchod rten dgon pa gtsug lag khang// lha yi gnas dang de bzhin grong// grong khyer nyid dang 'bab nu'i dngo// mtshe'u dang lteng ka chu bo dang// rdzing dang de bzhin/

char 'bab dang// 'brug sgrogs dang ni glog 'gyu dang// gzhan ya nga me ri 'bar ba dang// dud pa'i phung po bde 'byed dang// skyes bu ga ma gyon pa dang// de bzhin mtshon cha sna tshogs mthong// khyu mthong grub

pa mthong ba dang// de nyid rmad du byung ba ste// rdzas nyung sbyar ba nyung gyur kyang// de nyid dwangs grub ba na med// sems can rnamAl phyag 'tshal nas// bcom ldan de nyid bdag gis bshad// rig sngags
'chang rnams bklags pas 'grub// dbul po rnams ni nor 'thob cing// sdang ba rnams ni byams par bgyid// mu stags gzhan rnams dad par bgyid// mkhas pa rnams ni dga' bar bgyid//
gdul dka' rnams ni thar bar 'tshal// dge slong rnams ni bsam gtan thob// ting 'dzin bla na med pa thob// chos 'dod rnams ni sangs rgyas mthong// sdig pa byed rnams sdig pa 'jig/ ma 'a
byas rnams thar pa thob// mtshams med lnga rnams rnam dag don// dbugs ma phyin rnams dbugs 'byin mchog/ ma dul ba rnams de bzhin 'dul// ma brgal ba rnams sgro' ba'agru// thuba'i
lam du 'gro bur gnas// ma grol ngan 'gro kun las 'grol// sdig pa kun las rnam par grol// lung ma bstan pa lung ston byed// skyon dang dri ma sdig pa rnams// thams cad mod la song
bgyid du// de la sogs pa'i las rnams ni// bklags pas grub pa bgyid pa lags// 'jig rten pa dang 'jig rten 'dus// don gyi dngos grub bla na med// gang dang gang du sbyor ba bgyid//
dgos pa thams cad 'grub par 'gyur// yid la bsam pa 'grub par 'gyur// 'dir ni yid kyis rnam bsam pa// ji ltar yid la 'dod pa dang// ji ltar ngo bo kun bsams pa// de ltar rnam
'phrul ston pa ra bgyi// tshes grangs rgyu skar sbyar mi 'tshal// skyang ba bgyi ba mi 'tshal to// cho ga ji bzhin dus ji bzhin// cho ga rig sngags rgyal bo bzlas// rig sngags 'chang ba gtsang gyur
cing// lags par khrus bgyis ges gtsang dag/ bgos pa bden par smra ba dang// bla ma la ni gus byed pa// rtag tu byams pa'i sems la gnas// sems can la ni brtse ba'i mchog/ sdom
la gnas shing tshangs pa' spyod// chos ma yin pa sbyong byed pa// gal te de nyid grub 'dod na// chang dang shadang kun dong dang// 'dres dang za 'phro spags pa spangs// sems can ngan pa sun 'byin
'a@#/ sa/rig sngags chu dang cho ga sku/ chos sku gsang sngags rku ba dang// de bzhin rkun mo chom rkun dang// ser sna rtag tu spang bar gyis// de dag la ni dngos grub med// ma rung
pa ni dam tshig nyams// yid gcugs pas ni med par byed// sdig pa'i chos ni kun tu sbyor// de bzhin gshegs pa kun kyis smad// byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis smad// rtag tu chos kyi
sdong dun 'gyur// sha nas sems can dmyal bar gzhol// rtag tu smad pa'i gnas su 'gyur// dbul po lus ni bskams pa dang// mdze dang khyi rjes 'debs pa dang// sdug bsngal rkun ma chos
sun 'byin// chos zhu ba'i lus can ni// 'jig rten 'dir ni bder mi 'gyur// 'jig rten pha ral ga la bde// sems can dmyal bar gzhol ba yin// de lta bas na chen po 'dod pas ni rtag tu dam
thar pa'i chos kyi rjes su 'brang bar bya zhing/ rtag tu dkon mchog gsum dang/ pha dang/ ma dang/ bla ma dang/ ston pa ni skyob la dang/ skyabs dang/ dpung mnyen mdzad pa/ ston pa/ mchog sbyin pa/
dngos grub dang mi 'jigs pa sbyin pa na sha las thar bar byed pa/ dbang phyug sbyin pa/ na' sbyin pa/ longs spyod sbyin pa/ dang ba mchog bskyed pa de nyid 'jig rten bla ma/ mgon po'i 'jig rten dbang
phyug/ dbang phyug chen po/ dbang phyug mgan po/ mchog sbyin par mdzad pa/ gzugs sna tshogs ston par mdzad pa/ dngos grub sna tshogs sbyin par bgyid pa/ mgon po sdug bsngal sna tshogs yo pas

su thar bar bgyid pa/ nad sna tshogs sbyong bar grub pa/ rin po che sna tshogs rab tu sbyin par bgyid pa// 'jig rten kyi sneg pa sna tshogs sel bar bgyid pa/ bla ma la gus pa sna tshogs bgyis pa lags/
te/ de lta bas na rtag tu 'bad pas dgos pa thams cad rab tu sbyin par bgyid pa// rtag tu 'bad pas shin tu gus par bgyid pa lags so/// de nas rdzas kyi sman sgrub pa dang//

bzlas brjod kyi cho ga bshad pa ra bgyi sta/ seng ge 'i lce dang/ snying dang/ mig dang/ de bzhin du nya phyis kyi phye ma dang/ ldong 'os dang/ bra rgya'i 'o ma dang/ gu gul dang/ pad+madang/ pad+ma'i the ba
dang = ut+pal sngon po dang/ na ga dus pa dang/ li shi dang/ rgya spos dang/ de bzhin du gi'u wang dang/ gla rtsi dang/ ga ru ra dang/ gur kum dang/ tsan dan dkar po dang/ khri ka dang/ ta dza ga
ti tsA/ de ltar cha mnyam par byas pa de dag thams cad phyi ma zhib mo byas la dngul gyi snod bkang ste dar gyis g.yogs/ don yod pa'i rgyal po spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi mdun du dus gsum du khri

bzlas brjod bya'o// dus gsum du khro bo'i rgyal pos lan lbashu rtsa gcig bzlas brjod byas pas dbang bskur zhing/ phyag rgyas kyang nyi shu rtsa gcig tu dbang bskur ro// lwa tshang nas cha lnga byas te phye ma
dang/ til mar dang/ nor bu dang/ mig bsku ba dang/ tal mar tshos pa dang cha lnga'o// phyi ma'i pad+ma mu 'u ka'i phyam dang sbyar la bzus brjod bya'o// khro ba'i rgyal po gilnga stong nga// til mar

'thud/ nimahA ru ti ras 'grub ste brgyad stong bzlas brjod bya'o// khro bo'i rgyal pos bzhi stang ngo// nor bu stsal gyi khrag gis sbras te khri tshig stong bzlas brjod bya'o// khro bo'i rgyal pos lnga stong lnga brgya'o//

mig smanani rma bya'i mig chu dang/ 'ug pa'i mig dang/ klad pa dang sbyar la khri chig stong bzlas brjod bya'o// khro ba'i rgyal po stong rtsa brgyad do// khra h+phate la srang nyi shu/ gan ju rab te'i la srang brgyad/ yungs mar la srang

bcu drug/ 'o ma la spang brgya/ bser mo grub pa'i 'o ma dang/ ba'i lci ba dang/ ba ga ni srang bdun/ du ru ka'i mar khu srang ga nyis te/ rdzas 'di rnams chu dang bsres nasapad+ma'i sdong bus dkrug cing zas snod du
btso'o// mnyam par gzhag pas gsang sngags bzlas// cho ga dag gis bsrung bar bya// cho ga bzhin tu ga'o ma sbyar// me tog bdug spos dag gis bdug/ til mar mchog ni bsgrub par bya// chung yum bu

grub pa'i mchog/ myos kyi shing gis bud pa bzang// 'di ltar grub par shes pa dang// khro bo'i rgyal pos dbang bskur ba// nyi shu gcig tu dbang bskur ro// lamar de ni snod gtsang ma// zangs snod yang na dngul

snod bzang// smyug ma'i snod du gzhag par bya// de nas rig sngags brgyad stong dang// khro bo'i rgyal po brgyad stong nyid// so so dag tu bzlas brjod bya// dkyil 'khor yongs su rdzogs pa der gzhag par bya ba'i

ji ltar dkyil 'khor kyi cho gar bya ba de ltar byas nas gzhag cing/ slob dpon gyi las kyang bya ste/ ji lta' dkyil 'khor sgrub pa dang/ 'jug pa dang/ dam tshig dang/ phyag rgya dang/ dbang bskur ba dang/ mchod pa dang ]

[74/ ]dkyil 'khor bskor ba dang/ phyag bya ba dang/ spyi gtsug bcing ba dang/ phyag rgya bcing pa dang/ srung ba'i cho ga dang/ nye reg bya ba dang/ gos bgo ba dang/ mchod phyir thogs pa ste/ dkyil 'khor kyi slob

dpon kun kyis de dag thams can bastan par bya'o// de nas dkyil 'khor gyis dbus kyi snying por gzhug la rig sngags 'chang sbyang ba'i cho ga byas pas 'phags pa don yod pa'i zhag pa'i snying po stong rtsa brgyad bzlas

brjod bya/ khro bo'i rgyal pos kyang stong rtsa brgyad du dbang bskur/ phyag rgyas kyang stong rtsa brgyad du dbang bskur la/phyag rgya bcings nas rnam pa gsum 'dra bar dbang bskur ro// de nas las thams cad byas te yungs kar

dkar po grub pa la mig sngags 'chang gis brgyud stong bzlas brjod byas la pad+ma'i mchog gtso bo gtsang ba/ gtsang mar byas pa/ legs par bkrus pa/ sbyangs pa/ phyi ma zhig tu btags pa/thal ba lta bu la brgyad/

stong bzlas brjod byas nas snod dgang/ gu gul dang/ tsan dan dang/ a ka ru dang/ sprig ka la stong rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod byas nas snod kyi nang du bkang la/ dbus kyi dkyil 'khor dam pa'i stang du so sor gzhag go/ de nas khro

bo'i rgyal pos dbang bskur cing shug rgyas kyang dbang bskur ba byas na/gang gi don du bya ba byung ba'i mi bu ga thams cad byed do// gser ram/ yang na dngul lam/ zangs las pad+ma'i tshad du byas pa 'dab ma nyi shu rtsa gcig dang/ keng

po dang/ ze ba can dang/ de bzhin du sor bcu gnyis pa'i tshad la sdong bu sor bcu drug pa'i tshad rdo rje'i rnam pa can du bya/ skud pa dmar po'i zhags pa pad+ma'i tshon dmar pos bzhin pa/ gzhon zhus bkal pa grub
bla@#// pa dang/ de dag la brgyad stong bzlas brjod bya/ khro ba'i rgyal pos dbang bskur cing phyag rgyas kyang dbang bskur ba byas la/ mkhas pas gsang ba'i gnas su gzhag go/ gang gi

tshe don du bya ba byung pa de'i tshe las thams cad grub pa ston to// shin tu gtsang zhing gtsangabar bya ste/ su la'ang mi sbyin no// sangs rgyas rnams la sku brnyas par 'gyur pa/ dam tshig nyams pa yang
wA ba la bgags 'jug par 'gyur zhing/ 'phral du mtshams mdu pa lnga khyad pa/ rmongs pa'i dra ba de la dngos grub rnams kyang shes par mi 'gyur ro// gzhan ni bla ma la gus shing/ sangs rgyas chos la
ston byed pa// 'phags pa'i tshogs la dad pa dang// khyams sems snying rje'i bdag nyid can// de yi lag tu rab tu sbyin// bdag gi srog bzhin gtang bar bya// de dag dngos grub mchog sbyin te/
bklags dang mthong ba tsam gyisan// ji ltar yid la byas pa bzhin// rjes su mthun pa'i las byed do// 'jig rten 'dir ni rtag tu bar// 'jig rten pha rol bde ba yin// 'gro ba lam nibad
bar 'gro// gang na 'od dpagamed bzhugs pa// bad ba can du rtag tu 'gro// rdzus te skyes ba'i pad+ma las// rgyun rtags kun gyis rnam par brgyan// tsho'abs dag ni drag 'gyur te// sngon gyi tshor bas
dran par 'gyur// da nas rig sngags 'chang rmongs pa chen po'i dam tshig ston par 'dod pa gtsang mas legs par khrus byas/ gos gtsang ma bgos nas nyin zhag gcig sbyang pa byas pas lag na rdo rje dang/
'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug zhal mngon du gzhag ste/ me tog dang bdug spos dbul zhing 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi sku gzugs la/ phyag na rdo lnga'i sku gzugs
la mchod pa'i ng bya/ 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la a ka ru'i bdug spos kyis bdug lag na rdo rje l gu gul gyi bdug spos kyis bdug/ 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang
phyug la lha bshos dkar po dbul/ lag na rdo rje la sngo sna tshogs dang ldan pa'i lha bshos phul la/ nyin par don yod pa'i rgyal po bzlas brjod bya/ mtshan mo khro bo'i rgyal po ngal ba med par
bozlas brjod bya ste/ kha gdong khro gnyer med pa dang/ dri ma dang sar sna med pas nams langs kyi bar du bzus brjod byas pa dang/ 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug 'bar ba'i 'gyur la/
lag na rdo rje'ang dus mo 'dzugs par 'gyur te/ de gnyis kyi mig nas 'dzag la/ rig sngags 'chang gis blangs nas thig le byas na mi snang bar 'gyur ro// mig la bskus na nam mkha' la 'gro'o//
khar bcug na rig sngags dung/ cho ga zhib mo dang/ gsang sngags dang/ dkyil 'khor mngon du 'gyur ro// lag na rdo rje'i stobs dang/ shugs dang/ brtson 'grus kyis pha rol gnon par
'gyur ro// la gan rdo rje rang gi gzugs kyis mdun na zhu ba'i 'dug cing 'dod pa thams cad kyi mchog rjes su sbyin pa' byed la/ rang gi gzugs kyis spyi bur byed/ lag na rdo rje'i stobs dang//

lag na rdo rjer ba'i gzugs kyis mdun nyebar 'dug cing 'dod pa thams cad kyi mchog rjes su sbyin par byed ya da rangagi gshugs kyis skyor par byed/ 'gan rdo rje'i stobs dang/ shugs dang/ brtson 'grus kyis pha rol gnon par rjes su sbyin par byed//
shugs dang/ brtson 'grus kyis pha rol gnon par 'gyur ro/[= { ]de ltar lagan rtas 'gugs par 'gyu'i// nyi ma 'char ba'i chus su til mar chen po 'an pa'//
bdag nyid la bsku/ mig sman gyis mig zug/ phye mas gtor zhing bdag nyid la thig le bya/ nor bu mgo la bzhag nas gu gul gyis bdug/ bdag nyid gos ngur smrig gos nas sangs rgyas yid la bya ba

sgom zhing/ zhi ba dang dul ba'i yid kyis sde can gyi nang ngam dge 'dun gyi nang du 'jug par bya'o// de nas dag slong de dag gasna can gyi nang du zhugs sam/ dge 'dun gyi nang du zhugs pa'i rig sngags
'chang du bcom ldan 'das kyi sku dang/ mdog dang/ rtags dang/ spyod lam du mthong ste/ mtshan nyi shu rtsa brgyad yod pa/ 'od 'dom gang pa/ stan pad+ma/ brgya byin dang tshangs pa'i mdun gyi
bdar ba'i lha'i tshogs sna tshogs kyis gzugs mthong bar ston to// dag slong de dag gis kyang de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku dang mdog tu mthong nas thams cad zhabs gnyis la 'dud par byed do//
rig sngags 'chang des brtas par mi bya zhing/ bdag la bstod par yang mi bya/ brtas pa tsam kyis khyod kyibasod nams yongs su nyams par mi 'gyur bar bya'o// 'phags pa'i rag myong gi dge 'dun
de nas grong nang/ tshang tshing dang/ yul dang/ ri brags kyin ng du 'jug pa'i bya/ de nas btsun mo'i nang du 'jug par bya ste/ yul gyi skyes pa dang/ bud med dang/ khye'u dang/ bu mo de dag tham
can kyis kyang sangs rgyas kyi sku dang/ mdog dang/ rtags dang/ dbyibs chu mthong zhing mchod pa chen po dang rim gro snatshogs byed par 'gyur la/ de bzhin gshegs pa sangs rgyas yin no
zhes sku ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa mchod pa'i cho ga thob bo// yus kar dang til mar gyis rang gi 'khor gyi spyi bor gtor cing phyogs na/ thams cad lha dang/ klu dang/ gnod sbyin dang/
dri za dang/ lha ma yin dang/ nam mkha' lding dang/ mi 'am ci dang/ lto 'phye chen po'i gzugs su ston to// rkang pa til mar gyis bskus nasa'i stong nas sor brgyad tsam gyis sbags te
nam mkha' la 'gro ste/ jisrid du ma bkrus pa de srid du sangs rgyas kyi cha byad du ston to// mgon po spyan ras gzigs mthong bar 'dod pa'i rig sngags 'chang res nang par sngar langs nas gtsang
khrus byas te/ gos gtsang ma bgos nas khang steng du 'dug la yungs kar la til mar gyis byugs nas phyogs bzhir gtolan/ rgyal po dang/ blon po dang/ rgyal rigs dang/ bram ze dang/ btsun mo
dang/ rgyas pa dang/ bud med dang/ khye'u dang/ bu mo thams cad sgyu ma chen pos rmongs par 'gyur ro// de nas rig sngags 'chang des nor bu bzhis dbu rgyan dang 'phreng ba byas la mgo la gdags so//
til mar gyis yan lag tsam la bsku bar bya/ dpral ba'i thig le bya/ mig sman gyis mig thasku/ byems bdag nyid la gdab/ ras bzang po yug gcig bgo bar bya//

byang chub sems dpa'i cha byad du bya/ nor bu dang/ gdu bu dang/ dpung rgyan dang/ gser skud kyis bcings na de dag thams cad rgyan dang/ spyod pa dang/ nor bu dang/ dngul dang/ rdo rjadang/ brtuwa sna
tshogs la sogs bas lus brgyan par snang ngo// lag na pad+mathogs no/ 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyag gi gzugs su snang ngo// yid la ji ltar bsams pa don yod pa'i zhags
pa'i tshul dpa/ 'jigs pa brgyad dang/ tshangs pa'i tshul dang/ yid bzhin nor budang/ rgod ma'i kha dang/ [0f00]gul ston dang/ rnamagrin du ston to// ji ltar gzugs yid la byas pa de ltar
ston to/ ji srid du thig le yod cing dbu rgyan thogs pa de srid du tshul sna tshogs ston pa'i byed do// til mar dang yungs kar bsres nas/ kiM kuT+Tadang lhan cig smras nas lus la bsku/ lag pa
g.yas na rdo rje/ dpral bar dbang phyug chen po'i thig le byas nas pad+ma'i phye mas gtor la/ nor bu spyi gtsug tu bcing ngo// mig sman gyis mig bsku/ gu gul gyis bdugs la/ shes rab can

pa khro bo'i lta ba'i tshul byas na mngon gsum du rdo rje 'chang ga gzugs su snang ste/ de la the tsom mi bya'o// ji srid du bdag khrus ma byas pa de srid du rdo rje'i gzugs can du snang la/ las sna tshogrwa
ta byed cing mi dang 'jig rten thams cad kyis rdo rje 'chang nyid du sems te/ de la the tsom mi bya'o// seng ge 'i khrag gis til mar dang nor bu sprus nas lus la bsdus na mi'i seng ge chen po'i
gzugs su ston to// phag gi khrag gis smras nas lus la bskus na phag gi gzugs chen por ston to// til mar dang phye ma lhan cig tu sbrus nas yung ba dang shing pa la sha'i mdog tu
byas la/ lus la bsus na sred med kyi bu'i gzugs su ston to// rig sngags 'chang gis brgya dang til mar lhan cig smras la lus la bskus na dbang phyug chen po'i gzugs su ston to//
shing ana'i 'o ma dang/ til mar dang mnyam par sbyar la lus la bskus na mangs pa'i gzugs su ston to// glang po che'i khrag dang til mar sbyar nas lus la bskus na tshogs kyi dbang phyug na
po'i gzugs su ston te// ra'i khrag dang sbyas nas lus la byugs na ra'i gzugs su ston to// til mar dang/ thang shing dang/ pad+ma'i phye ma dang/ glang po che'i khrag dang lhan cig sbyar nas
lus la bskus na nag po chen po'i gzugasaM sku mngon sum du rang gi gzugs su ston la/ gang dang gang dag la thig le byas na ma mo'i tshogs kyi gzugs su ston te// sbrul gyi khrag dang//
pags pa dang/ de'i mar gyi rgyal po dang lhan cig smras a rgal tshigs su bsku zhing/ dpung pa g.yon pa ra yang bskus na klu'i rgyal po chen po'i gzugs su ston te/ ji lta ji ltar khrag dang
sbyar zhing/ ji lta ji ltar yid la bsams la de lta de ltar gzugs su ston to// de nas gzhal med khang lta bar 'dod na yungs kar la til mar gyis bskus nas dge 'dun gyi nang du

steng 'og tu gtor/ phyi mas nor bu rgyal mtshan gyi rtse mo kun tu bskus na dge 'dunargan mas su bkod pa'i dbus su gzhal med khang chen po rgyan gyis brgyan pa ston/ dge slong rnams kyi snying du gtor na
lta dge slong thams cad gzugs sna tshogs yid la ji ltar byas pa bzhin rgyal po'i gzugs su snang ba dang/ gzhan dag blon po dang/ gzhan dag bkrabs ba dang/ gzhan dag mdun na 'don pa dang/ gzhan
dag yongs su spyod pa'i gzugs su ston l/ yungs kar la bskus pas gto' na slar yang slong rnams su snang ngo// shing argya'i 'o ma yungs kar la bskus nas dge 'dun gyi dbus su dge slong
rnams kyi mal stan gyi steng du gtor na/ ji ltar dag slong thams cad 'khod pa ltar snang ngo// ral pa'i thor tshugs kyis brgyan pa la gtor na rkun po 'khar ba thogs pa sgur po ltag dgya skra dkar can
nyam chung bar snang ngo// mal stan gyi steng du yungs kar gtor ba gal te mtshan thog thag bzhagan gzugs gzhan du mi 'gyur ro// lug gi steng nasnod yod pa la gto'i nad thur ma'i gzeb dang/

sbrul nag per snang ngo// snod kyi stong du gtor na kham phor du snang bar 'gyur ro// btung ba'i snod sbrang rtses phyags pa'i steng dugatogan phyag dar gyi phung por snang ngo// grong khyer gyi sgo dang grong khyer kun

[° tu gtor na grong khyer kun nas mi snang ba' 'gyur ro// grong khyer kun la yungs kar nang pa d+ma'i phyi ma gtor na skyes ba dang/ bud med dang/ khye'u dang/ bu mo mi snang ba thams cad snang bar 'gyur ro// seng
ga'i khrag dang sbyar nas bdud 'gro'i skyes nas kyi steng du gtor na lam gyi bzhi mad thams cad duseng ge 'i gzugs su ston to// sde drag cing gtum la yan lag mchog gi gzugs dang ldan pa'i steng du
gtor na thams cad lnga'i gzugs su snang la phyogs bcur rgyug gi/ g.yul 'gyed sar gtor na thams car nyid log par byas par 'gyur la/ mtshon cha thams cad dang go cha thams cad mi snang bar
'gyur ro// me'i nang du gtor na mi snang ba rnams snang bar 'gyur ro// til mar dang sbyar nas me'i nang du gto na rtag tu 'bar bar 'gyur ro// chu'i nang du gtor na chu mi mngon par 'gyur ro//
bum bzhus bkang ba la gtor na srog chags chu'i nang na gnas pa thams cad chu'i nang nas 'byung zhing thang la gnas so// tshal gyi nang du yungs kar gyis gtor na me tog dang 'bras bu mi snang ba'
gyur pa thams cad snang zhing/ shing skam po dang tshal gyi mtha' ma tog dang 'bras bu thams cad ston to// nam mkha' la gtor na phyogs bzhi'i dge 'dun gyin ng ngam/ 'dus pa'i nang ngam/ skyes
mang po'i nang du me tog gi char rnam pa sna tshogs dag 'bab ste/ lha'i dri lags par smin pa yid dga' ba sim pa' byed pa 'bab bo// las dang ldan pa 'am/ bzo'i gnas kyi las te/ las kyi/
snod thams cad la til mar gyi rgyal pos phyugs la phye mas bsku/ partsa chen po'i phyi mas dkyil 'khor gyi gnas bsku/ yungs kar gyis phyogs bzhir gtor la/ de nas las

kyi bzo bzang po ji lta ba bzhin ston par 'dod na las kyi snod de dang de dag nyid g.yo la/ las kyi bzo'i tshul bzang pos mthar phyin pa rnam pa du ma dag ston par byed la nyo tshong byed pa 'byung ste/ gal te phyi

ny+nyA bzlog pa ma byas na rin ji lta ji lta ba de lta de ltar nyo tshong byed do// chu dang yungs kar gyis bzlog pa byas na mi snang bar 'gyural/ dpag tshad brgya stong tsam gyi bar du khrid na de dang de nyid du mi snang bar

'gyur ro// rdza mkhan kyi 'khor lo la phye mas byug cing yungs kar chags par byas la/ pad+ma chen po'i phyi mas gtor nas 'jim pa bzhag lasnod kyi ngo bo ji ltar 'dod pa bzhin bya ste/ snod kyi ngo bo dngul
las byas pa 'am/ gsar las lus pa 'am/ zas las byas pa 'am/ lcags las byas pa 'am/ lcags lnga las byas pa rin po che bzang po sna tshogs kyis smras pa ji lta ba de lta bu'i smon bkra ba rnam

pa sna tshogs dag 'byung bar 'gyur la/ nyo tshong byed pa'i ng 'byung ste/ rin chen pos tshong byed do// ungs gar gyi phye ma dang/ pad+ma'i phye ma lhan cig sbyar nas tshong dus kyi dbus su gtor na kun tu thongabakral

pa'isnod mi snang ba' byas pa thams cad snang bar byed do// thag pa'i steng du gton sprul chen po ston to// khyim dang/ ra ba'i ngeso dang/ sgo dang/ shing sbyar ba dang/ ka ba'i steng du gto'o na khang pa dang /

ba00 ra ba dang/ 'khor gyi khyams rnams sprul tu ston te// ji srid du chu dang yungs kar gyis bzlog pa ma byas pa de srid du sprul pa rnams 'dug go/ bzlog pa byas na mi snang bar 'gyur ro// gtsug lag khang
ngam/ lha'i gnas sam/ khang bzas kyi ngos la gtor na sprul chen por snang ngo// lha'i steng du gtor la mig snyan gyis mig can/ ril bus thig le byas na lha'i gzugs brnyan de ku co 'don cing 'gro
ste ga' 'dod pa de'i 'gro'i// bzlog pa byas na phyir 'dug go/ sangs rgyas kyi sku gzugs kyi zhabs la byugs la phye mas gto'i na sangs rgyas kyi sku gzugs g.yo bar mdzad do// bzhud par mdzad do/
'jug par mdzad de// 'chag par mdzad do// tsan dan la bzlas brjod byas nas btsugs na phyir bzhugs so// bum pa sbyang rtsis bskus pa rnams la gtor na g.yo ba' byed do// ji tsam
du phyir zlog pa ma byas pa de tsam du g.yo 'a/ chu dang yungs kar gyis bzlag na phyir 'jugago/ de nas rdo rdzobaskyod par 'dod na smyos kyi dkyil 'khor byas la me tog bkram ste/ gu gul gyi
bdug pas bdug/ de'ang yungs kar dang phyi ma dang bcas pa gtor la don yod pa'i sprul pa lan bdun bzlas brjod byas na rdo rjed dkyil 'khor las langs nas nam mkha' la 'gro bar byed//
'phar bar byed/ 'dug par byed/ 'khar bar byed cing/ phan tshun 'gro ba'abyed/ mthob 'gro bar byed/ dma' bar 'gro bar byed/ rnam par 'gro ba' byed/ 'bar ba chen pos 'ba' chabs
'bar byed de/ ji srid du bzlog pa ma byas pa de srid du nam mkha' la 'gro'o// chu dang mungs kar gyis bzlog pa byas n de nyid du snyapa ngo// de nas 'khor lo bskyed par 'dod
na dkyil 'khor gru bzhi pa byas la/ spos sna tshogs kyis bris nas me tog sna tshogs yang dgram par yang bya/ gu gul gyi bdug pas kyang bdugs nas 'khor lo la lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas
brjod byas la til mar gyi rgyal pos bsku/ phyi mas bsku/ lte ba'i dbus su thig le byas nas dkyil 'khor gyi dbus su gzhag par bya/ de la'ang us gar dang pad+ma chen po'i phyi ma gdug
par bya/ 'khor la kun nas gu gul gyi bdug pas bdugatsang sa gol gyi sgra'ang byas 'khor lo de dkyil 'khor las langs nas nam mkha' la 'phar zhing snang ba thams cad la 'bab par byed de/
lce gal te g.yul 'gyur par 'thab na de'i tshe dgra thams cad kyi mag gcod par byed de/ snang ba thams cad dang phyir rgol ba thams cad la bab na 'jig par byed do/ bgegs thams cad la 'bab pa dang/
gnod sbyin dang/ srin po dang/ 'byung bo dang/ sha za dang/ brjod byed dang/ gnon rnams la 'bab pa dang/ klu sdang ba thams cad la bab na 'jig bar byed de/ ji srid du bzlog pa ma byas pa re
srid du 'phaga'o// chu dang yus kor gyis bzlog pa byas na slar dkyil 'khor la 'dug go/ mdung rtsa gsum pa bskyod par 'dod na dkyil 'khor byas la thod pa gzhag par bya/ me tog dgram
par yang bya/ gu gul gyi bdug pas kyang bdug la/ mdung rtse gsum pa la til mar gyi rgyal pos bsku/ phyems gdab cing thig le bya/ rtse'i rgyun gsum la pad+ma chen po'i phye mas gtor nas thod
pa'i steng du gzhag par bya/ yungs kar gyis gtor zhing hU~M zhes se gol byas na mdung rtsa gsum pa 'bar bar byed/ ldang bar byed/ nam mkha' la 'gro bar byed/ kun tu 'phar bar byed/ 'gro
bar byed/ phyogs bcur 'bar ba'i byed re/ ji srid du bzlog pa ma byas pa de srid du 'phar bar byed do// chu dang yungs kar gyis bzlog pa byas na slar dkyil 'khor la 'dug go/ dung la til mar gyis

byugs la phyi masAgator la thig le bya/ yungs kar gyis kyang phyi nang gtor la bus na ji srid du sgra thos pa de srid kyi skyes pa dang/ bud med dang/ khye'u dang/ bu mo thams cad bro rdung bar byed/ rgyug par byed/
mchong bar byed cing phyogs bcur 'ab tu rgyug par byed do// gsum ngo'i bus na 'gyen pa'i mi thams cad dang/ mtshon cha thams cad dang/ go cha thams cad btang nas bro rdung bar byed/ gcer bur
'byung bar byed/ phyogs bcur rgyug par byed do// gal te rung lan bdun dus na phyir rgol ba dang pha rol gyi dmag tshogs des nyonamos pa bskyed par 'gyur te/ rje srid du bzlog pa ma byas pa de srid du
mchong zhing phyogs bcur rgyug go los nus bzlog cing khrus byas n phyir bde bar gnas par 'gyur la/ rtag tu rgyal ba dang/ dpal gyi mchog sbyin par 'gyur ro// de nas sgyu ma de kho na nyid sgrub pa'i
gsang sngags dang/ rnam par 'phrul pa'i dngos grub kyi dkyil 'khor bshad par bya ste/ skya 'phral gyi dra ba rnam par 'phrul ba'i dkyil 'khor gang du dkyil 'khor yongs su
rdzogs shing/ kun nas brgyan par yungs kar dang/ til mar gyi rgyal po dang/ phye mar bsres pas byug pa dang/ thig les kyang dbang bskur cing pad+ma chen po'i phya mas byugs la lag pa pad+ma'i
phyag rgya dang/ h+pha zhes bya ba'i sgra brjod na/ brjod pa tsam dang/ yungs kar gyis gtor ba'i mod la gtor ma'i snod dang/ snod rdza ma dang/ bum pa dang/ bum bu bkang ba thams cad dang/ mtshon
dang phyag cha thams cad dang/ dkyil 'khor gyi steng nas nam mkha' la so bzhi tsam gyis sprugs te 'dug la/ ji srid du dkyil 'khor gyi las su bya ba thams cad rdzogs rdzogs kyi bar du nam mkha' la

'dug go/ rig sngags 'chang ba sa'i steng gi sor bzhi tsam gyi tshad kyi steng gi nam mkha' la 'dug go/ las su bya ba thams cad zin nas dkyil 'khor gyi yo byad dri chab kyi tshogs dbang bskur na gtor ma dang//
snod rdza ma dang/ bum pa dang/ bum bu thams cad rang nyid 'phar bar byed lasur yang rang gi gnas su 'dug ko/ cho ga de lta bu ni dkyil 'khor thams cad la bya ste/ thams cad du yon tan ston par snang
la byas pa tsam gyis las thams cad bsgrub par 'gyur te/ the tsom mi bya'o zhes bshad do// de'i phyi nas pad+ma'i dngos grub bshad par bya ste/ gser ram/ dngul lam/ zangs las shin tu legs

[d ]shing mdzes pa snying po dang ze ba dang bcas shing sdong bu tshad dang ldan par byas la/ 'dab ma phyed la phye ba 'khor bar 'dab ma drug cu rtsa bzhi yod pa khru gang tsam gyi tshad sdong bu dang/ snying po dang/ the ba'i
tshad sor bzhi tsam du byas pa la til mar gyi rgyal pos bsku/ pad+ma'i phye ma dang/ mig sman dang/ mig bsku ba dang/ thig le byas pa dang bcas pas kun legs par bskus la/ pad+ma'i sdong bu'i

bar du nor bu rin po che gzha gnas lan stong rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod bya/ khro bo'i rgyal bos lan bdun gyi bar du dbang bskur nas/ rig sngags 'chang gtsang ma legs par khrus byas pa gos gtsang ma bgos
pas til mar gyis bdag nyid la bsku bar bya/ mig bsku ba dang/ thig le dang/ bdug pas bdag nyid kyi lus la brtag par bya'o// lag pa g.yas pa la nor bu gdags/ lag pa g.yon par pad+ma

bzung la bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'dug ste/ 'khor gyi nang du bcom ldan 'das la pad+ma'i mchod pa 'bum bya lta/ pad+ma 'bum 'byung bar 'gyur ro// mchod pa'i cho ga byas nas chudang yungs kar gyis

btab na'ang 'byung bar 'gyur// pad+ma lngal pa gang yin pa de dag thams cad chu'i nang du bor na pad+mamagal me bskor ba ltar 'khor bar 'gyur la/ pad+ma 'bum rnams char du 'bab par 'gyur ro// pad+ma chu'i

nang du gzhag pa'i bya ba ni mtsho brananam/ lteng ka 'am/ chu bo 'am/ chu bo chen po 'am/ 'obs sam/ rdzong ngam/ mtsho'i nang gang yang rung ba'i gnas su bzhag na gnas de dang de thams cad du pad+ma'i mtsho chen
ta @#// po 'byung ste/ ji srid du pad+ma ma phyung ba de srid du/ dus rtag tu pad+ma'i mtsho'i 'dug ste/ ston ka'am/ dgunanam/ dpyid dam/'os ka tsha ba'i dus su rtag tu pad+ma'i mtshor 'dug go/
tshal gyi 'gram du zhugs nas yungs karal til mar gyis bskus pa phyi ma dang sbyar nas me tog gang yang rung ba zhig lag gis gzung ste bskor la yungs kar gyis gtor na/ tshal gyi mtha'i shing tham
cad la me tog rgyas par snang ngo// dge 'dun gyi nang ngam/ tshogs pa'i nang ngam/ rgyal po'i pho brang 'khor ram/ skye ba'i nang du ma rtog ji snyad ba lag gis bskor la/ yungs kar gyis gtor
nam rtog mang po 'byung bar 'gyur ro// chudang yungs kar gyis thams cad du zlog par byed pa yin na// 'bras bu ji snyad pa lag gis bzung nas yungs kar gyis gtor na 'bras bu'i char 'bab
par 'gyur ro// gos lag pas bzung nas yungs ka'agyis gtor te bskor na gos dang bla sna tshogs ston pa'i byed do// rgyan lag pas bzung nas mungs kar gyis gtor n lha'i rgyan bzang po sna
tshogs pa lag tu 'byur bar 'gyur zhing/ skye bo 'dus pa thams cad kyi rgyan du byas la/ thams cad la rgyan btags par 'gyur ro// yungs kar dang chus bzlog par bya'o// yungs kar la mar gyis
bskus/ phyi mas bsgo/ gi'u wang dang/ gur kum dang/ shing kun dang/ rtswa hA'i 'o mas kyang bskos la/ de dag gcig tu byas nas grib ma labasam mo// de nas 'bras bu gcig khar bcug
la phyogs bzhir gtor n kha nas me 'bar bar snang zhing lus las 'ba' ba sna tshogs 'byung bar snang ste/ ji srid du yus kar kha na yod pa'i bar du lus las 'od zer 'bar ba kha dog rnam pa sna tshogs

'byung ngo// til mar dang lhan cig btags pa'i snying por bya/ skong bur til mar gyi rgyal pos bkang sna ma'i ma 'bum ston par byed do// me thab khung bu'i nang du bcug na ji srid du ma phyung ba de srid

ma 'ba' ston to// mar me'i sdong bu'i nang du bcug la ma byung na rtag tu 'ba'a'o/ mgal me 'bar ba'i nang du bcug na 'bar ba'i 'phreng ba 'bum snyad du snang ngo// gtor ma'i rdza ma dang bum pa'i nang du
gtor na gtor ma'i lnga ma dang bum pa thamA ca du bar bar sgong ngo/ lag chadang mtshon cha thams cad la byugs na gcig tu 'bar bar 'gyur ro// bdag nyid kyi lus la byugs la ril bu gtsang ma spyi
bor ba zhagan/ lus thams cad gcig tu 'bar bar snang ba nas lus ril bsngags pa ltar snang ngo// 'o ma dang/ yungs kar gyis gtor na lus sur snang bar 'gyur ro// lag pa/
dang rkang pa la bskus la ril bu gtsang ma 'bar ba lag pa g.yas pas bzung ba 'am/ nang pa'i mthe bos bzung na lag pa dang rkang pa gcig pu 'bar ba dang 'brel bar snang ngo// 'dus
nga'i nang ngam/ skya ba 'dus pa mang po 'am/ rgyal po'i 'khor ram/ sde can gyi nang ngam/ rig byed bzhi'i nang thams cad du yan lag nyam par snang/ dri chab dang yungs kar gyis gtor na
'a@#// lus myur rdzogs par 'gyur ro// mtshan ma'il bu bsregs pa lam gyi bzhi mdor bzhag nas yungs kar gyis phyogs bzhir gtor na mar me 'bum drag
phye ba snang ngo/ kun nas phyogs bzhir rlu dang yungs kar gyis bzlog par bya ba yin no// tshal chen po'i mtha' dang nang du gtor la sha gcig la rim du gtsangam zhagan shi nga dang/ rtsa dang/ gdi/
gol ba dang/ 'dab ma dang/ lo ma thams cad gcig tu 'bar bar snang ngo// ri'i rtse mor mar me bus nas ri kun tu gtor na sikun nas gcig tu 'bar zhing mnyan par snang la sems can
thams cad kun nas ngo mtshar du 'dzin par 'gyu'a'o// rkun ma dang/ g.yon can dang/ gnod byed dang/ pha rol gyi dmag tshogs dang/ snang ba dang/ phyir rgol dang/ phas kyi dgra thams
can dang/ sdong sems can nas// ri dgas gtum po dang bya lasogs bar ri la gnas pa rnams de'i mtshan mo nyin phyogs bcu kun tu bros shing ha ha zhes bya ba'i sgra 'byin to// myos chab kyis
bzlog par 'gyur ro// gzugs brnyan gyi steng du gtor la/ gtsang ma'i ril bu 'bar bar bzhag na gzugs brnyan thams cad gcig tu 'bar bar 'gyur te/ sbos chu dang sungs kar gyis bzlog
par 'gyur ro// mar me'i ril bu grong khyer kyi shar phyogs kyi sgor sbyar te gnas gtsang mar gzhag/ dkyil 'khor gcig byas nas gtor ma'i cho ga bum pa bkang ba gzhag/ grong khyer kun

03 tu yungs kar gyis gtor zhing don yod pa'i rgyal po'i phyag rgya bcing zhing don yod pa'i rgyal po'ang dran par byas na grong khyer kun nas mar me'i 'phreng ba 'bar ba gcig tu snang ngo// grong khyer gyi sgo

bzhi'i dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga byas la sha' phyogs kyi sgo nas zhugan gang grong khyer na gnas pa skyes pa dang/ bud med dang/ khye'u dang/ bu mo de dag thams cad dga' ba chen po rgya che bas tshim par 'gyur ro/
grong khyer de na gang snang ba'i sems can phyir rgol ba dang/ phas kyi dgra dang/ chom rkun dang/ g.yon can dang/ gnod byed dang/ glags tshol dang skabs tshol bar gyur pa// gnod sbyin nang//

srin po dang/ yi dgas dang/ sha za dang/ brjed byed dang/ mi ma yin pa gang yang rung ba grong khyer de na gnas pa de dag lang long du gyur cing gdung la ngu zhing ha ha zhes sgra 'byin cing grong khyer gyi skor
byung nas phyogs bcur 'ab tu 'bros so// grong khyer de'ang kun nas gnod pa med cing 'khrug pa med par 'gyur// 'jigs pa dang/ gnod pa dang/ nad 'go ba dang/ 'khrug pa thams cad dang/
nad thams cad 'ab tu zhi bar 'gyur/ mtshan mo 'das nas spos chu dang yungs kar gyis grong khyer gyi sger gtor zhing dbang bskur na bzlog par 'gyur 'o
'phags pa don yod pa'i zhags pa'i cho ga zhib mo'i rgyal po bam po bcu dgu pa/ ldong ros dang/ thing shun gyi phye ma dang/ yungs kar dang/ ma hAtil dang/ arga'i 'o ma
gdang/ pha gu'i 'o ma dang gcin du sbyar ro// nya'i mig mkhris pa dang bcas pa dang/ na ga ngus pa dang/ pad+ma'i glu ba rnams kyang lhan cig tu phye ma zhib mor bya'o// phyi ma snga ma
legs par sbyar la chus ril bur byas pa dang/ phyi mas gzhan yang bzang ngo// phyam 'de dang ba na po'i phye ma btang ba lhan cig tu bsres pa'i phye mas lus bskus la phyogs bzhir yungs kar gtor te/

bal bu khar bcug la rgyu zhes bya ba bsdams te brjod na de'i lus las chu 'dzag cing/ de kho na bzhin du rna ba gnyis nas kyang lha rdzas kyi rlu 'byung bar snang/ lus las smos kyi rigs yid du 'ong ba rab tu sim
par byed pa 'byung ba'i nang thams cad grub par snang ste/ rgyal ba'i phyag bzhin no// yungs kar gyi phye ma byungs te nam mkha' la gtor lo ril bu lag pas bskor na char chen po 'bab par 'gyur 'o// la

bu nam mkha' la 'phangs na mi 'grub bo// g.yul chen po 'gyan pa'i nang du phyi ma de yungs kar dang bsres te nam mkha' la gtor la ril bu de'ang khar bcug ste/ steng du bltas la hU~M zhes bya ba'i sgras bos

la/ gnam lcags chen ngo 'thab ste yid mi 'chad pa dang sdug bsngal skyed par 'agyur ro// nu'i nang du zhugs te phye ma de gtor la yungs kar dang 'al bu chu'i nang du gdab par bya/ phyogs bzhir yus karagatos

ta til mar gyis lus la bsus na klu chen po'i gzugs su snang ngo// ril bu dang yungs kar ma'i mdog lta bu chu dang bsres pa'i yungs kar nam mkha' la gtor na 'brug sgra chen po 'byung zhing glog chen po

tapa'i gsal kha snang bar 'gyur ro// chu'i nang nas 'byung na mi snang bar 'gyur ro// khron pa'i nang du btab na chu lud nas phyogs kun tu chu 'bab par 'gyur ro// rdza ma 'am/ bum pa 'am/ rdza'u 'am/ ril

ba b+hengagar 'am/ ril ba la phye mas phyugs te/ de'i steng du yungs kar gyi gtor nas chus bkang ste khrus byas na de ru 'bab pa' nga zhing/ de'i snod ni mi snang bar 'gyur ro// gzhan yang dgos pa mang

po byed de mchogatu grub pa yin no// donaa ni chen po'i chad du 'bru mar gyi rgyal bos spyas te 'bru mar gzhan dang/ de bzhin du til las 'bru mar gyi rgyal po de bzhin du sbyara'o// lag pa dang rkang pa bzhag/

la 'dir nyam drod kyang zhes par bya'o// bzhag pa thams cad du nyam drod shes par bya ba ni mar gsar bzhin du 'jam par 'gyur zhing/ skad cig de nyid la mtha ba dang dma' ba ji ltar yid la 'dod pa bzhin

du 'a'ang 'gyur ro// snying po thur ma 'dra ba dang/ zlum po 'am/ yang nasmyug ma lta bur byas pas ka ba 'ang 'dud pa dang/ ri'ang dma' ba 'am/ yang na mthan po'i 'gyur bar byed do// yungs kar dang pad+ma
chen po'i phyi ma lhan cig bsres pa bdu mar gyi rgyal pos bsgos te phyogs bzhir kun tu gtor na ni bzams cad mi snang zhing 'brog dgon par snang bar 'gyu'o// yang ri bor snang bar gyur ro// yang nams

bgrod par mi nus pa'i ri'i rtse mo na seng ge dang stag gis gang ba 'am/ lcag ma dang tsher ma can gyi shing ljon pa sna tshogs kyis gang ba'am/ sdug pa 'am/ dum bu 'am/ khong stong du snang bar 'gyur ro//
'a// ci ste rig sngags 'chang 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi pho brang gi mo Ta la'i gzhal med khang mthong bar 'dod na/ de nas rig sngags 'chang gis zhag bdun gyi bar du nas

kyi 'o thug gi zas zos te gtsang ma shin tu khrus byas pa gos gtsang ma bgos pasali'i gsab tu zhugs la/ sa phyogs gtsang ma'i gnas der shing dri zhim po'i me myur ba la yungs kar phyi ma dang bsres nga 'bru

mar gyi rgyal po dang sbyar la 'bras mo ba dang bsres pa stong rtsa brgyud zhag bdun du dus gsum du sbyin sug bya'o// lha bshos dang gtor ma dkar po 'bul lo// degs rig sngags 'chang gis tshes brgyad la nyin zhag
gcig sbyang ba byas la shin tu khrus byas pa gtsang mas lcos sna tshogs kyis lus bskus/ gos bzang po gtsang ma bgos te/ 'bru mar gyi rgyal pos rang gis lus bskus/ phye mas lus byugs/ mig sman gyis
mig la skyes/ thig le byas la nor bus mgo bcing zhing/ mgul pa dang/ lag pa dang/ dpung pa dang/ ched par yang bcings la/ yungs kar dang mtshal bsres pas ri'i phyogs bzhir gtor bar bya/ pad+ma chen

po'i phyi ma de'ang phyogs bzhir gtor/ rang gi lag pa g.yon pas zhags pa dang brla gzung zhing/ lag pa g.yas pas rnam par lta ba snang ba dang/ don yodapa chen po dri ma med pa'i phyag rgya gzungs// don yod pa'i

zhags pa'i mdo lan cig bskrus brjod byas na/ ji ltar don yod pa'i zhags pa'i mdo sde bshad pa las bstan pa de ltar ri po Tala'i gzhal med khang mthong bar 'gyur ro// rig sngah+pha 'ang de'ang 'apags pa spyanas

ba gzigs dbang phyug gi gzugs su snang bar 'gyur ro// ji ltar ri po Ta la'i gzhal med khang bzhin du ra de 28gzhal med khang snang ste/ ri de la rin po che'i shing ljon pa sna tshogs snang ngo// me tog sna tshogs kyi
gzhal med khang snang ngo// sA la dang/ tA la dang/ ta mA la dang/ tsam pa ka dang/ ashog dang/ a ka dang/ a shorti muk+ti ka dang/ ba ri sha ka dang/ ka dam pa dang/ nI la dang/ pa Ta la dang/ palA
sha dang/ u dum wa ra dang/ deng ka'i me tog sna tshogs dang/ snama'i me tog dang/ tog dang/ tA ra khadang/ na ba ma li ka dang/ kub pya sna tshogs snang bar 'gyur ro// bya'i tshogs sna tshogs kyis
legs par brgyan pa dang/ ri dgas kyi tshogs sna tshogs kyis gang ba snang bar 'gyur ro// gang gi tshe phyir bsdu ba phyin par 'dod pa de'i tshe gnas gzhan du 'gro bar bya'o// gzhan yang dgos
pa sna tshogs la rang gi blo gros la ji ltar snang ba bzhin bya'o// rags pa thams cad la rab tu sbyar ba ni bklags pa tsam gyis 'grub par 'gyur ro// don yod pa 'i zhags pa chen po'i dkyil
'khor gyi rig sngags 'chang gi cho ga gsang ba'o// don yod pa'i skyam rnam par 'phrul pa zhes bya ba'i sgrub pa'i cho ga ni/ de nas de'i 'og tu phyag rgya bri ba'i dkyil 'khor bshad par bya ste/

rtags mtshon phyag rgya'i de nyid ni// pad+ma rgyas dang sna tshogs mtshon// pad+makha ni phyin bye bo// phyag dag nan rab tu 'dzin// phyag gnyis phyung zhing brkyang nas kyang// bskum pa 'am 'dzin stangs de nyid kyis/
rgyu// kun nas 'phreng ba 'bar ba'i rtags// mtshon cha phyag rgya bsnams pa ni// 'di lta ste/ ral gri dang/ mdung thung dang/ mda' bo che dang/ mdung rtse gsum pa dang/ yid bzhin gyi
nor bu dang/ rgyal mtshan dang/ rdo rje dang/ rdo rje 'phreng zum dang/ las kyi rdo dang/ zur gsum ma zhes bya ba dang/ 'khor lo dang/ dung dang/ tho ba dang/ zhugs pa dang/ dgra sta dang/ dbyug

to dang/ ma tog gi thum po dang/ bum pa gang ba dang/ rin po che'i snod dang/ pad+ma'i 'phreng ba dang/ rdordzas 'phrong zlum dang/ ut+pa la'i 'phreng ba dang/ me tog gi 'phreng ba dang/ pad+ma dang/ ut+pal dang/
zla ba dang/ ri rab dang/ me long dang/ klu dang// mchod phyir thogs dang/ zla ba dang/ nyi ma dang/ rgyal mtshan dang/ gdugs dang/ de con dang/ gshin rje'i be con dang/ chu srin gyi kha dang//
sngags de'i 'phreng ba dang/ mdung rtse gsum pa'i 'phreng zum dang/ bsdigs pa dang/ bsgyings pa dang/ dbugs 'byin pa dang/ mi 'jigs pa dang/ mchog sbyin pa dang/ thal mo sbyar pa dang/
glegs bam bsnams pa dang/ 'khar gsal dang/ lhung bzed dang/ gdugs dang/ dbu rgyan dang/ nor bu brgyus pa dang/ gser skud dang/ mu tig gi 'phreng ba dang/ gdu bu dang/ dpung
rgyan dang/ rnam dang/ mi'i thab khung ngo// kun nas 'bar 'phrang phyag rgya de// sna tshogs rmad du byung bas spras// mtshon cha sna tshogs bsnams pa yi// pad+ma' dzin la rab tu gnas// 'as la
bris pa 'am dkyil 'khor rang// rtsig pa 'am gang yang rung ba la/ tshonatsi rnam pa sna tshogs kyis// gang du bris pa mthong ba de// ngan 'gro sems can dmyal ba'ani// phyir yang 'gro ba'
mi 'gyulo// 'jig rten dbang gis rtag mchog sbyin// sdig pa thams cad rnam par sbas// gang zhig nyes byas mi bzad pa// mtshams med lnga po byed pa nyid// mnar med pa'i gnas dang ni//
dmyal ba gzhan du gzhol ba gang// phyag rgya de dag mthong tsam gyis// 'gro ba thams cad zad par 'gyur// skye dang 'chi las rnam par grol// 'khor ba'i rgya mtsho brgal bar 'gyur// de dag skya ba phyi

mar ni// phyir yang mngal gyis mi gos to// yang dang yang du pad+mad+malas// rdzus te skye ba rtag tu 'gyur// rtag tu bde ba can du 'gro// gang na 'dren pa tshe dpag med// bzhugs pa'i spyan sngar rtag tu deb
sbyos 'gyur ba tsam mi za zhing// don rnams bde bar 'grub 'gyur shing// rig sngags sna tshogs bar bar 'grub// bde bar dkyil 'khor 'grub 'gyur zhing// rtag tu mi ltogs nas 'gyur/
phyag rgya 'di dag mthong tsam gyis// sangs rgyas byang chub dang mnyam 'gyur// dus gsum gshegs pa'i sangs rgyas la// bla med dge rtsa bskyed par 'gyur// 'jig rten 'di dang pha rol tu// bsod nams
phung po chen po 'thob// de nas dkyil 'khor rab bshad pa// de nyid 'grub pa'i phyag rgya rnams// 'jig rten 'di dang pha rol tu// 'dod pa thams cad rab tu sbyin// sdig pa thams cad mod la sel//
gang zhig mtshamasamed byed pa dag/ mi bzad mnar med gnas pa yis// sdig pa thams cad 'jig par 'gyur// dmyal ba'i sgo rnams bcad nas ni// mtho ris sgo phye the tshom
med// sgo phye gyur pa rnams la ni// sa rgyas zhing rnams snang bar 'gyur// de bzhin gshegs pa thamatshacad kyi dgongs pa/ mgon po 'jig rten dbang phyug gi phyag rgya'i dkyil 'khor mthong ba tsam
gyis sems can phyir ma ldog par 'gyur ro// phyugargya'i dkyil 'khor 'di mthong na shi 'gos pa'i mod la bde ba can du skye bar 'gyur 'o// dkyil 'khor 'dir zhugs pa tsam gyis gang na thub pa 'dren pa
'od dpag med bzhugs pa'i pho brang du myur du 'jug par 'gyur// dkyil 'khor gru bzhi lham pa la// kun nas ma ni mdzes par bya// gru bzhi go la'i tshadatsam la// sgo bzhi them skas bzhi yis
rgyu brgyan// shin tu legs par bskus dang ldan// 'jam zhing mnyen la mnyam pa yi// sa yi cha dang ldan pa la// dkyil 'khor shes rab can gyis dbye// dkyil ldakhor de nyin thig btab la// phyag rgya

bri ba rnam par dbye// phyogs bzhi'i mni mnyam pa yi// dbus na dkyil 'khor snying po yin// rgyu bzhi pa la kun nas kha khyer gyi rnam pa dang/ mdung rtse gsum pa'i 'phreng ba rnam par dbya'o// gru bzhi pa'i

dbus su phyag rgya don yod pa'i zhags pa'i phyag rgya kun nas 'bar ga blan med pa dang/ phyagacan gyis brgyan pa tshon rtsi snatshogs kyis bri'o// dbus kyi dkyil 'khor gyi phyi rol gyi gnas su phyag rgya bri ba'ang
shin tu 'byes pa bya'o// dkyil 'khor kun nas gos dang/ ba dan dang/ rgyal mtshan gyis brgyan la kun tu yungs kar pos gtor ro// phyag rgya'i dkyil 'khor gyi phyi rol gyi gnas su phyogs bzhi kun

bya ba nib lang gi lci ba sa dang bsres pas shin tu legs par byugs pa dang stan pa la tshon rtse'i phyi ma sa kha sbyar gyi rnam pa dang/ kun nas pad+ma'i 'phreng ba rgya chen po dang/ mtshon cha bris la 'di'i sgo

bzhi'ang nam khar 'byas par bri'o// ji ltar phyag rgya dang mthun pa'i ri sna tshogs kyi gtor ma gzhag par bya ste/ phyag rgya re re la'ang mchod yon phul la/ dbyib mo dang/ phru ba dang/ bum pa dang/
khams phor dang/ rdza'u gtor mas bkang la gzhag go/ kun tu bum pa gang ba dang// bdug spos kyi ni snod dag dang// me tog 'bras bu sna tshogs dang// gtor ma dkar po dag gis bkang//
ma tog rnam par bkram byas la// kun tu 'phreng bas gzhag par bya// 'phreng ba bzang po gzhag nas kyang// de bzhin kun tu bdug spos dbul// a ka ru dang/ tsan dan dang/ ru ru ka dang/ sa la ki dang/
sgrik+ka dang/ gu gul dang/ sra rtsi pog dang/ sgron shing dang/ gla rtsi dang/ gdu 'a gyi bdug pa 'di dag gis bdugs la/ gtor ma dang/ ma tog dang/ lha bshos dbul lo// phyag rgya'i dkyil 'khor du

'jug pas don yod pa'i rgyal po dran par byas te bskor la/ phyag rgya'i dkyil 'khor la phyag bya zhing phyag rgya thams cad la me tog bkram shing me tog gtor ro// gang phyag rgya'i de khen nyidagasang ba 'di dang/ phyag rgya'i dkyil
'a khor 'di sgrub pa gang dgos pa la bar dkyil 'khor phyag rgya dang bcas pa la mchog tu mdzes par byas la/ phyis las thams cad bya'o// rig sngags 'chang ba gtsang ma yis// gtsang ma
yi nags phags la// ji ltar dkyil 'khor cho ga bzhin// dkyil 'khor du ni gzhug par bya// ji ltar dkyil 'khor la dgos pa// ji bzhin du nis bya'o// phyag rgya'i dkyil 'khor la med pa/ dadakyil
'khor 'dir ni shugs tsam gyis// thub pa snang mdzad kyis gsungs pa'i// spyi yi rigs zhi thams cad du// phyag rgya dkrigs dang gtams rnams kyis// dam tshigasa kun tu shes par 'gyur// spyi rigs
kun gyi cho ga yis// dam tshig rjes zhugs de bzhin no// dkyil 'khor kun tu zhugs pa dang// rgyal bas lung ni bstan par 'gyur// kun gzigs de bzhin gshegs pa yis// phyagazhi lci ba'ajog par
mdzad// chos kyi ro na bdud rtsi yi// gzi brjid med la 'jug par 'gyur// rnam snang mdzad gsungs dkyil 'khor du// don yod dngos grub stsol ba mdzad// phyag rgya'i dkyil 'khor gang bzhugs ba//

kun tu spyi yi rigs rnams kyi// don yod dngos grub mchog myur thob// sangs rgyas bye ba gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma khrag khrig brgya stong phrag dgu bcu rtsa dgu'i de bzhin gshags pa'i drung du dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed

par 'gyur ro// bsod nams kyi phung po chen po dang ldan par 'gyur te/ yon tan gyi phan yon 'di dag ni 'di yin par khong du chud par bya'o// bde ba can gyi ka rdzig rten gyi khams su pad+ma las rdzus te skye ba

[z/ ]'gyur ro// tshorabs su tshe rabs dran zhing 'od zer bye ba 'bar ba'i lus dang ldan zhing/ tshabaskal pa brgya stong dpag tu med par 'gyur ro// yon tan thams cad dri ma med par snang ba don yod pa'i rnam par

'phrul pa bstan pa bkod pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin thob ste/ gar ting nge 'as thob pas sgyu ma chen po lta bu'i rnam par 'phrul pa'i rdzu 'phrul gyi cho 'phrul ston par byed do// dkyil 'khor thams cad kyi lha'i
spyi'i rigs pa bzhin gshags pa'i rigs kyi byin gyis brlabs kyis rjes su 'jug par 'gyur ro// lha dang/ klu dang/ gnod sbyin dang/ dri za dang/ lha ma yin dang/ nam mkha' lding dang/ mi 'am ci
dang/ lto 'phye chen po dang/ mi dang/ mi ma yin pa thams cad dbang du gyur nas rtag tu rjes su 'brang bar 'gyur ro// sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyis dkyil 'khor rnams
'byar par gzigs nas bsrung ba dang/ bskyab pa dang/ sbya ba mdzad par 'gyur ro// sems can thams cad phyi bzhin du 'brang zhing mchod pa chen po byed par 'gyur 'o// rgyal po btsun mo dang/ 'khor dang
bcas pa rnams kyis mchod pa'i 'os chen por 'gyur/ sem can thams cad gcig tu bla ma'i byed par 'gyur ro// nad thamathad mar par 'gyur ro// sgrib pa thams cad rnam par dag par 'gyur ro// mtshan ma bri
ba'i phyag rgya'i dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga'o// ka/de nas sbyin sreg gi cho ga'i dkyil 'khor bshad par bya ste/ rig sngags 'chang ba rnam dag gi/ de nyid sgrub pa bsgrub pa'i phyir// spyi yi rigs
mas thams cad kyi// cho ga zhib mo bla med yin// gang gi sbyin sreg byas tsam gyis// phyogs kun rnam par gzigs pa yi// de bzhin gshegs rnams byon 'gyur zhing// rnams thams
byang chub sems dpa' dag ngas par 'gyur// rig sngags tas grub rjes stsol cing// rtag tu srung ba mdzad par 'gyur// mgon po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs// the tshom med par myur du byon//
mgon po 'khor bcas gnas nyid na// rang gi gzugs su mthong bar 'gyur// 'dod pa thams cad rtag tu stsol// rtag tu mchogazhi stsol ba nyid// nyin dang mtshan du rtag par ni// mo bar gzigs
'gyur thatsam med// dkyil 'khor bshad pa'i bya ste// dkyil 'khor gru bzhi shin tu mdzes par bya bzhi rgya chen po kI la'i tshad tsam la// legs par byugs pa shin tu 'jam pa/ shin tu gsal ba/

gru bzhi sgo bzhi dang/ tham skas bzhi dang ldan pa/ rnam par 'byes pa// mchog tu mdzes pa/ dbus kyi dkyil 'khor gyi snying por yang bya'o// me yi gnas kyi dkyil 'khor ni// gru bzhi nyid kyi rnam pa la/
kun nas them skas bzhi dag dang// stong du grwa ni bzhi pa bya// rtag tu pad+ma'i snying po dang// snying po rgyas pa'i stang du yang// kun nas 'dab ma mdzes par bya// grwa bzhir pad+ma'i 'phreng
ba bya// de bzhin du gla gnyis kar rdo rje pad+ma dang bcas pa'o// gsum par mdung rtse gsum pa pad+ma dang bcas pa'o// bzhi par 'khor lo pad+ma dang bcas pa'o// lnga par bum pa gang ba bzhag go//

sna tshogs tshon gyis rnam mdzes pa'i// kun nas 'dab ma'i myu gu bya// rin chen snod ni pakang po dang// me tog 'phreng dang ngang pa dang// phye ma pad+mar bcas pa dang// de bzhin me tog rigs dag nyid//
de bzhin sna tshogs rgyan brgyan pa'o// chub kyi gnas dang glu dag tu// pad+ma'i 'dab ma ut+pal bcas// thum pa dur pas bkang ba bri// rtsa ba'i bum pa dbu ma la// 'dir ni kha khyar thag kyang gdab//
de nas dkyil 'khor mdzes bya ba// thig gis kun nas cha mnyam zhing// sgo bzhi mdzes par bya ba ni// tshonasna lnga yi skud pas gdab// me 'bar mdog can bri ba ni// kun nas 'bar ba'i 'phring ba
can// glu dang gar ni me lha bri// lus ni ma mdog 'bar ba dang// lag na ma 'ba' 'dzin pa dang// mtshan masnatshogs gzhan dag kyang// cho ga bzhin du bri bar bya// dkyil 'khor gyi ni cho ga
bzhin// ba danamada' drang sna lnga yi// skud pas bum ba gangadakris dang// de bzhin btsug spos snod dag gis// kun nas dkyil 'khor brgyan pa'i khyu// sna tshogs gzugs can rgya che yis// sna
ro yi gtor ma gzhag/ rdzo'u dang kham phor rnam gsum gyi// dkar pos bkang ba gzhag par bya'o// rje'u dang dbyib mo bum pa ni// gtor mas bkang ba kun tu gzhag/ 'bras bu rnam pa sna
tshogs gzhag/ kun nas me tog dgram bya zhing// 'phreng ba sna tshogs gzhag par bya// 'bras yos yungs kar gtor nas ni// kun tu mar me 'bar ba dang// sna tshogs dri dang de bzhin
du dri yi phyi ma lha bshos dang// dkyil 'khor kun la gzhig pa'i phyi// dkyil 'khor dag ni thams cad la// blugs gzar dur ba rtag tu gzhag/ shing n arga shi mi
dang/ yungs kar 'bras so ba dang// zhu ma dang ni mar dka' dang// kun du ru ka tsan dan dkar// sbyin lug cho ga 'dir bzhag ste// dus gsum rtag tu rig 'dzin gyi// sbyin sreg brgya rtsa brgyad
du bya// rig pa 'dzin pa gtsang ma yis// gtsang ma yi rigs bgos la// dkar gsum gyi na zas bza' zhing// gzhan ni bza' dang bca' mi bya// dkyil 'khor gyi ni nub sgo nas// dkyil
'khor shes pa 'jug bya zhing// d+ha b+ha'i snyan la skyil krung du// shar phyogs kha bltas 'dug par bya// byams pa'i sems la mnyam bzhag ste// don yod rgyal po dran bya zhing// snga dro'i dus
chu sbyin sreg bya// gung la slob ma gzhug bya zhing// spyi yi rigs kyi sreg blugs// phyi 'phred dus su bya ba'o// gang zhig dkyil 'khor du zhugs la// sbyin sreg dkyil 'khor de nyid dang// grub pakun
tuchog ya// bdag nyid dbang bskur med kun gyi// sbyin srag byed pa'i mchog tugasungs// kun tu gnas ni thamasacad na// rgyas pa gnas mchog dragacig dang// garag de bzhin phur bu dang// mdunan
don pa me lha ni// sbyin sngog byed pa 'jig rtenabar// mtshungs zhes ston pas lung bstan to// 'jig rten 'das pa'i las sgrub pa// rig 'dzin dbang po chen po dang// phyagan rdo rje tshangs pa dang/
khyab 'jug dbang phyug chen po dang// mnyam pa bas kyang lhagal nyid// mo yi sbyin sreg byed pa la// de bzhin gshegs kun byin gyis rlob// gal te zhag bdun dus gsum du// dri la sogs pa'i
las rnams ni// mi la sbyin sug byed pa la// mod la sngon shes lnga thob ces// de skad 'jig rten 'dren pa gsung// las ni byas nas de nas ni// sbyin sreg las ni btsum par bya// srog blug
sbyin sreg byas tsam kyis// las rnams thams cad 'grub par 'gyur// lha rnams rtags tu 'ong 'gyur zhing// de bzhin gshegs kun dgyes par 'gyur// byang chub sems dpa' khyon nas ni
mod la mthong ba'i sbyin par mdzad// sdig pa thams cad sreg par 'gyur// shin tu ma bzan sngon gyi las// sreg blugs tsam gyis mod la srog/ 'bar ba me yis phye leb bzhin// de la sogs
pa'i sdig pa ni// srog 'gyur 'dir ni ci tsam med// snang ba'i phyir zhi rgol nyid dang// mi bzad phas kyi dgra rnams dang// pha rol dpung gis 'jigs pa nyid// de bzhin du yang rgyal po'i dpung//
dekun sbyin sreg byas tsam gyis// mi gnang bar 'gyur the tsom madra// de bzhin mi dus gcong kun dang// nad kun rab tu zhi bar 'gyur// mu ge'i dgon pa'i 'jigs nyid kyang// sbyin sreg
byas pa tsam gyis 'jig/ gnod sbyin srin po 'byung bo dang// de bzhin bgags dang log 'dren dang// sha za brjod byed yin gs dang// de bzhin rnam pa sna tshogs gdon// 'di kun sbyin sreg
byas tsam gyis// 'jig par 'gyur ba the tsom med// rtag tu 'jigs med lo legs shing// spyir dang bde bar 'gyur pa yin// rtag tu sems can thams cad ni// kun
tu rgyal bar 'gyur ba yin// rgyal po dpung dang bcas pa nyid// btsun mor bcas pa nyid kyang ni// rtag par kun tu gsal bar ni// mi 'jigs sbyin par the tsam med// rtag tu nad med 'gyur
ba dang// dga' zhing yid ni bde ba dang// lus can dag ni thams cad la// rtag tu dga' bar byed cing gnas// rtag tu mi yi lha nyid na// rgyun du mthong bar 'dod pa yi// me la sbyin sreg byas
tsam gyis// me lha nyid na bzhugs 'gyur te// rtag tu las ni thams cad mdzad// rgyun du phyi bzhin 'brang bar 'gyur// lha ni rtag tu 'ong 'gyur zhing// thams cad du ni mthong ba ster// skar zla ba

nyi ma dang// gshin rjod ng ni chu lha dang// rgyal pa chen po bzhi po dang// dpung bcas bzhon pa bcas pa yang// nyin dang mtshan du rtag pa ni// rjes 'brang bsrung 'gyur the tshom med// rtsis rig sngags 'chang

don yod pa'i rgyal bo'i snying po sgrub par 'dod n/ rig sngags 'chang gtsang ma des shin tu khrus byas la gos gtsang ma bge ba' bya/ nyin zhag gcig smyung pa bya zhing/ shir arga'i yam sreg shing gis ma sbal la

pad+madang/ zhun mar dang/ 'bras so ba'i sbyin sreg brgyad brgya byas nas sreg blugs la cig byas pas/ mtshams med pa lnga khyad pas kyang 'grub par 'gyur te/ 'di la the tsom dang yadi gnyis bskyed par mi bya'o//

[s/ ]de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi spyi'i rigs kyi dngos grub 'dod na rig la sngags 'chang des byang chub kyi shing gis me sbar la rigs spyirapad+ma dang/ ut+pal sngon po dang/ yungs kar dkar po dang/ zhun mar

bsres pa 'i sbyin sreg brgyad brgya byas na de bzhin gshegs pa thamacad kyi spyi'i rigs kyi dngos grub 'thob ste/ thams cad cho ga chen de zhib mo dang/ sbyin sreg chen po'i cho gar 'gyur ro// de nas pha rol gyi

dmag tshogs gzhom par 'dod n 'gasngags 'chang gtsang ma des shin tu khrus byas la gos gtsang ma gos te/ seng ldeng gi mi sngar la/ zho dang/ zhun mar dang/ yungs karadang/ gu gul gyi srog blugs kyi sbyin

sreg brgyad stong byas na dpag tshad stong tshun chad kyi pha rol gyi dmag tshogs bcing ba byas par 'gyur ro// pha rol gyi dmag tshogs dang/ dgra gzhom par 'dod pa dang/ dpung gzhig par 'dod na/ de nas g

sngags 'chang gas shing ka ra wi ra'i me sngar la/ sbrul gyi pags pa 'dres ba dang/ sku tshe'i sa bon dang/ lan tshwa'abras sA lu dang bsres pa yungs mar dang sbyar ba'i sbyin sreg byas n dpag tshad stong tshun chad kyi
pha rol gyi dmag tshogs dang/ dgra la gnam lcags chen po dang/ rlung grang mo 'bab pas 'phongs pa dang/ yid mi bde ba skyed par 'gyur/ dgra thams cad rnam par 'jig par 'gyur ro// kyus ma

babs par 'dod na rig sngags 'chang des nyin zhag gcig sbyang ba byas la shin tu khrus byas pa gtsang mas dri sna tshogs dang/ me tog 'phreng ba dang/ yungs kar dang/ sha ta pus pa zhun mar dang sbyarab 'i
nyuny+tsa// sbyin sreg mtshan gcig la dus gsum du byas na klu'i rgyal pos char gyi rgyun chen po 'bebs te/ 'dzam bu'i gling mtha' dag tu zhag bdun gyi bar du char 'bab par 'gyur ro// ra de
nyid ha cang ches na thal ba nam mkha' la gtor na ha cang bar ches pa 'chad par 'gyur ro// yang ma la 'ong bar 'dod cing rang gi gzugs su mthong bar 'dod na rig sngags 'chang gtsang ma des gos/
gtsang ma bgos la/ nyin zhag gcig gnas par gyur pasashing sna ma'i me sbar la 'bras so ba dang/ zhun mar dang/ 'bru mar dang/ sha kha ra dang/ bu 'am dang bcas pa dang/ tsha ba gsum dang/ sna ma'i

me tog bsres pa brgyad stong sbyin sreg bya'o// brgyad stong tshang ba dang/ me lha mi'i nang nas lus phud phyung ste 'dug nas/ rig sngags 'chang la ci bgyi bka' stsol cig ces zer zhing/ ji ltar rig grags

'chang gi cho ga'i don du 'gyur ba de bzhin du smra'o// thams cad sbyin pa zhes bya ba/ mchog thams can sbyin pa zhes bya la/ bdud rtsi 'bar ba zhes byapha'i el kha'i mchog sbyin par byed do// gang bdud rtsi 'bar ba me'i kha thob pas gang du dbug

phyung ba dang brdubs pa de ma 'bar ba 'byung bar 'gyur ro// gang du ngu zhes byas pas ma 'byung bar 'gyur ro// mun gnag tu dbugs phyung na mi 'bar ti snang bar 'gyur ro// tsan dan dkar po'i sbyin srag

stong rtsa brgyad byas pas 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug nyid kyi gzugs ston par mdzad do// mthon bdun kyi sbyin sreg gis nad thams cad zhi bar byed do// 'bras so ba'i sbyin sreg gis ni rgyal po dpang

du byed do// phub ma dang lan tshu'i sbyin sreg gis ni zhes 'gras pa ra byed do// 'bras yos dang yungs kar gyi spyin sreg gis ni sems can thams cad dbang du byed do// yungs karadang/ gu gul dang/ zhun mar/
gyi sbyin sreg gis ni gnod sbyi na 'gugs so// ka ra wi' ma tog dang gu gul zhun mar dang sbyar ba'i sbyin sreg gis ni srin mo 'gugs so// de bzhin du 'di'i las thams cad byed do// sbyin sreg gis
dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga'o//[– ] ka 'i mo'i dkyil 'khor gyi sgrub pa'i cho ga bshad par bya ste/ kun tu thun mong sgrub pa'i mchog/ dge ba'i las kun byed pa ste// sangs rgyas thams cad
mthong 'gyur zhing// bla med bsod nams chen po sogs// don yod rgyal po de nyid ni// rnam pa sna tshogs gzugs dag tu// 'jig rten 'dren pa snang ba bya// mthu dang dngos grub sna tshogs pa'i
'jig rten 'dren pa'i gzugs bya ba// grub pa sna tshogs byed pa'i gnas// so so'i gzugs su bya ba ni// 2sa sam yang na da' dag la// 'jigs pa med pa'i gzugs bya'o// don yod pa'i rgyal po ni

khru gang tsam gyi tshad dam/ yang na tshad shin tu rnam par 'byes pa/ pad+ma'i mdog lta bu/ phyag brgyad pa/ dbu gsum pa// de bzhin du spyan gsum pa zhi ba'i zhal du bri bar bya ste/ de bzhin du zhags ba
'dzin pa dang pad+ma 'dzin pa dang/ mdung rtse gsum pa dang/ ril ba spyi blugs 'dzin pa dang/ yid bzhin gyi nor bu dang 2 btsan dang/ dbugs 'byin pa dang bgrang 'phreng dang/ ma tog thum po 'dzin
pa'i bya'o// g.yon du ni dkar mo'i// g.yas su 'phags ma sgrol ma thal mo sbyar la dbu yid tsam 'dud pa rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa'o// 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs
dbang phyug ni 'al pa'i thobatsugs can/ dbu rgyan 'od dpag med kyis brgyan pa/ g.yas phyogs kyi dbu zla ba tshes pas brgyan pa/ ri dgas kyi bags pa bsnams pa/ mchod phyir thogs pa/ rgyan thams cad

kyi brgyan pa/ 'od 'dom gang na nga ldan pa'o// nang rim du pad+ma'i 'phreng ba'o// rim pa gnyis par rdo rje 'phreng ba lcags kyu dang bcas par bya'o// rim pa gsum par nor bu rin po che'i 'phreng ba dang rin po che sna tshogs
mdzes pa'o// rim pa bzhi pa' mdung rtse gsum pa'i 'phreng ba'o// rim pa lnga par kun nas 'bar ba'i 'phreng ba'o// stong dang g.yas phyogs kyi gnas su dbang po dang/ tshas pa dang/ khyab 'jug dang/

dbang phyug chen po me tog sna tshogs thogs par bya'o// tha yon du gzhon nu dang/ gshin rje dang/ nulha dang/ lus ngan dang/ dbang phyug dang/ lha'i bu rnams bya ba ni me tog sna tshogs thogs par bya'o//
lha mo sgrol ma'i rgyab tu khro bo'i rgyal po don yod pa'i zhags pa bya ba ni khris pa/ gtum pa'i gzugs 'chang ba/ phyag bzhi pa/ 'baba'i nang du bzhugs pa/ sku rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa/ la
pa 'chang ba/ 'od dpag med kyis dbu brgyan pa/ spyan gsum pa/ g.yas pa zla bas brgyan cir 2la gri 'dzin pa dang/ zhags pa 'dzin pa dang/ mdung rtse gsum ba 'dzin pa dang/ dgra sta 'dzin par

[•]bya'o// dkar mo'i rgyab tu rigasngags kyi rgyal po dbu gsum pa bya ba ni zhi ba'i zhal 'aa can/ rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa/ dbu rgyan rgyal ba 'od dpag martacan thogs pa/ pad+ma 'dzin pa nor bu rin
po che chen po 'dzin pa'i bya'o// 'og tu pho nya mo dang/ dbyangs can dang/ dung can ma dang/ dpal mo dang/ gnas ma dang/ dpe mer ma dang/ ral pa gcig ma dang/ pho nya mo zhi ba dang/ lo tog gi lha

dang/ sa'i lha dang/ rgyal po chen po bzhi bya'o// stong dang g.yas g.yon du sangs rgyas kyi sku gzugs skyil mo krung bcas pa sor bzhi pa'i tshad tsam bya'o// nyi ma dang zla ba'i lha rgyu skar dang bcas

pa bya'o// ri mo'i gzugs kyi phyi rol gyi/ rnam pa kun tu phyag rgyu dang// phyag mtshan sna tshogs rdzogs par bri'o// klu brgyad bya zhing kun nas 'khor ba dang bcas bar bya'o// rig sngags dngas grub
bla med pa 'i// ri ma'i tsho ga'i gnas 'di ni// sdig pa thams cad mod la sel// mtshams med lnga po sbyong bar byed// phyag rgyu dang dkyil 'khor dang bcas pa'i ri mo'i gzugs grub pa 'di ni spyi'i
'gas thams cad du 'jug pa ston pa yin no// spyi'i rigs thams cad kyi de kho na nyid kyi 'i mo'i dkyil 'khor 'di ni dus gsum du gshegs pa'i sangs rgyas dang/ de bzhin du byang chub sems dpas

kyang byin gyis brlabs pa'o// don yod pa'i byin gyis brlabs kyi ri mo 'di ni thub pa rnam par snang mdzad kyis byin gyis brlabs pa ste/ don yod pa'i zhags pa'i de kho na nyid snying por gyur ba de kho na nyid/
gsar ba 'di mthong ba tsam gyis rnam par thar pa thob cing lung bstan par 'gyu'o// mthong ba tsam gyis cho ga zhib mo bla na med pa thamasacad 'grub po// rnam pa snang mdzad/

'khor gyi dkyil 'khor chen po dang ldan bar snang ba bye ba gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag dgu bcu rtsa dgu mngon sum du mthong bar 'gyu'o// dkyil 'khor chen po 'khor bcas kyi//
rig sngags chog bla med pa// spyi rigs yang dag byung ba ni// thub pa rnam snang mdzad kyis bstan// de bzhin gshegs rigs grub pa dang// gang yang pad+ma'i rigs de bzhin// nor rigs de nyid
'byung ba dang// rdo rje'i rigs gang ba med pa// rigs 'di nyid mthong ba ni// ma mthong ba'i khyad par yin// phyir yang ngan 'gror mi 'gro zhing// ramyal ba ngan 'gro'i sgo bcad de// mtho rigs kyi
niu0f00 ya nga phyi// bla na med pa ston pa yi// phyag rgya'i'i mo'i dkyil 'khor 'di// bsod nams bla na med pa yin// ci ste don yod pa 'jig rten dbang phyug gi gzugs mthong bar 'dod// rig snga
'ang res tsanadan dkar po las 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyag don yod pa'i zhags pa sor brgyad kyi tshad tsam la/ gnad kyi gnas kyi rma'i so'i tshad shin tu rnam par 'byes pa/ dbu dang//
mgur dang/ rgan pa dang/ pus mo dang/ yan lag dang/ zhabs kyi tshigs dang/ phyag sor dang/ phyag sor gyi tshigs dang/ sen mo thams cad mnyam zhing mdzes pa dang/ ral pa dang len mo tshad/
shin tu skyes shing cod pan gyi rgyal ba'i g.yas phyogasan zla gam shi ba'i gzugs can/ sbyan gsum pa/ phyag bzhi shin tu mdzes pa dang/ dbu skungashin mdzes pa/ rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa'i
gzugs dang ldan pa/ zhags pa 'dzin pa/ g.yon pa 'od dpag med can/ phyag na pad+ma bsnams pa/ phyag g.yas pa mdung rtse gsum pa dang/ dbugs 'byin cing rtag tu mchog sbyin par mdzad pa/
pad+ma'i gnanakabazhugs par bya'o// sgrol ma dang dka' mo 'ang 'od 'dom gang nang bcas par dgod do// mgon po shin tumadzes panor bu dang mu tig gi rgyan gyi mtshams su gser gyi rgyan gyis g.yog
pa'i tsad pan nam/ yang na spyi gtsug tu 'ong ba sre la bzhag par byas la/ tsan dan dkar po'i dkyil 'khor bya zhing/ gur kum dang/ gla rtsi dang/ ga pur gyis mchod la/ dkyil 'khor gyi snying po
'di'i dbus su brlags r dang cas pa 'dab ma sum cu rtsa gnyis pa bris la/ de'i dbus su 'jigs pa med pas 'jig rten dbang phyug dar gyi cod pan kyis bcings pa bzhag la/ a ka ru dang
tsan dan gyi bdug pa dbul zhing me tog dgram par bya/ mo rtog gi 'phreng bas mchod par bya'o// rig sngags 'chang gtsang mar gyur pa shin tu khrus byas pa gos gtsang ma bgos bas sbyang pa byas la/
mgon po 'jig rten dbang phyug la mngon du phyogs par skyil mo krung bcas te 'dug la/ mchod yon dang lha bshos phul la@ mas pa'i sems la mnyam par bzhag ste/ sangs rgyas rdzis su dran pa/
ba/ dbasgom mo// sems can thams cad la brtse bar gyur ba'i ting nge 'dzin yang bsgom zhing/ gnyam gzhan la mi smra bar shin tu yongs su sbyang ba legs par spyon cing/ gzhan

'jigs pa med pas bdag bsrung ba dang/ phyogs bcing ba dang/ dkyil 'khor bcing ba bsrung ba dang bcas pa'i ng byas la/ bzlas brjod na nyid stong rtsa brgyad dang/ phyag rgya'ang stong rtsa brgyad brtsam
na 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug 'bar zhing g.yo ba dang/ bdag kyang 'bar ba dang snying dga' bar 'gyur ro// 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi mchog sbyin par mdzad
pa'i phyag brkyang nas spyi bor bzhag ste logs so legs so// rigasngags 'chang khyod kyis mchod pa dam pa dang gsang sngags kyi cho ga chen po byas so// sgrub pa dam pa byas so// de bzhin gsheg
pa'i lce'i rigs 'di dang/ de bzhin gshags pa'i rigs thams cad kyi cho ga zhib mo gsang ba dang/ phyag rgya dang/ dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga dang/ thams cad du spyi'i dngos grub rig sngags 'chang
khyod la 'grub kyis/ khyod kyis don yod pa'i zhags pa 'i snying po rjes su zung zhig dang/ rig sngags 'chang ji ltar yid la byed pa de ltar 'dod pa dang// mchog thams cad ji ltar yid la bsams pa de

thams cad rjes su sbyin no// 'di ni khyod kyi skye ba'i 'khor ba tha ma yin te/ skyo ba dang/ rga ba dang/ 'chi ba dang/ mngal du gnas pa las yongs su grol ba 'gyur ro// rig sngags 'chang khyod shi 'phos nas

bde ba can gyi 'jig rtan gyi khams su pad+ma las rdzus te skye bar 'gyur ro// de bzhin gshegs pa tshe dpag med mngon sum du mthong bar 'gyur ro// mngon sum du chos nyan par 'gyur ro// byang chub kyi snying

pho la gnas kyi bar tshe'i tshad bskal pa brgya stong dpag tu med grangs med bgrang du med pa la 'gyur ro zhes tshig tu gsung ngo// de nas rig sngags 'chang gis khro bo'i rgyal po gang la khro bo'i rgyal pos me togagam/
cod pan la mngon par gto'an/ an 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyaga'ang gsur bzhugs te/ rig sngags 'chang nam mkha' la 'gro shing don yod pa'i ye shes bkod pa drim med pa zhes bya ba'i ting
nge 'dzin 'thob po// yangs pa chen posa rnam pa thar pa'i dkyil 'khor don yod pa'i zhags pa'i dngos grub thob par 'gyur ro// sku gzugs sgrub pa de khon nyid ces pa 'di gal te rig sngags 'chad skal
ba chung nga/ mna' med pa la gzhol ba/ mtshams med pa lnga byed pa des lan cig nges par bsgrubs pa tsam gyis mdun du rang gi gzugs kyis nges par mchis par bgyi'o// gal te de bzhin gshegs pa thams
can dang dus gsum du gshegs pa'i sangs rgyas la snang bas khrag dbyung ba' sems bskyed pa des kyang/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang dus gsum du gshegs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis dgongs pa'i dam
tshig chen po'i byin gyis brlabs te rig sngags 'chang sgrub na rmi lam du bdag gis gzugs mthong bstsal bar bgyi zhing/ yid la bsam pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs par bgyi'o// mchog thams cad
rjes su stsal bar bgyi zhing/ sdig pa dang sgrib pa thams cad rnam par dag par bgyi'o// dri ma med pa'i rnam par thar pa'i 'od zer dkyil 'khor la rnam par lta ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge/
'dzin 'thob po// sad nas 'jig rten pa thams cad kyi mchod pa'i 'os chen po gcig pur 'gyur 'o// skye bo thams cad kyis mchod par bya ba chen por 'gyur 'o// sgrib pa dang bral zhing rnam par dag pa sgo
kun tu dri ma med par snang ba zhes bya ba'i lus yongs su dag pa 'thob par 'gyura'o// sems can gang dag gis de mthong bar gyur pa de dag thams cad sgrib pa dang bral bar 'gyur ro// nad thams cad dang
bral zhing nyon mongs pa dang bral ba' 'gyur ro// gdol pas kyang dad pa dang gus pas sgrub pa rnam pa gsum dang/ chog gzhan gyis kyang nges par yid la bsam pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs par bgyi/ rang

gi gzugs kyin mthong ba stsal bar bgyin/ mar gyur pa dad pa'i rjes su 'brang ba sdom brtson can gyis lta smos kyang ci 'tshal te/ dran pa tsam gyis bdag rang gi gzugs kyis mdun du mchis par bgyi zhing
yid la bsams pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs pa'i bgyi ste/ 'di la the tsom dang yid gnyis skyed par mi bya'o// de lta mod kyi bcom ldan 'daa sems na tshe gcig du pa de la rig sngags sgrub pa'i dngos/
grub rjes su stsal bar bdag gis sngomi thogs lags so// gang yang phyi ma'i tshe phyi ma'i dus na dag slong dag dang/ rig sngags 'chang ba'i sems can ser sna can/ sems gyi gru ba/ yid gnyis su
byed pa/ ngo gnyis can/ sebasna can/ byas pa mi gzo ba/ pha rol gyi rdzas la brkam chags can/ gsang sngags zhu ba/ yi ge rku ba/ gdug pa/ phrag dog chob/ khengs pa/ gzhan gyi rdzas 'phrog pa//

mkhan po dang slob dpon phyag rgyadang dkyil 'khor bum la ma gus pa/ ga sngags kyi cho ga zhib mo 'di ston pa la ma gus pa nyid bkam chagasacan/ byas pa mi gzo ba nyid dag 'byung ste/ sems can de dag la
bskyang bar bstan pa 'am/ dngos grub bstan pa'i rngo mi thogs lags so// bdag la'ang brnyes par bgyid pa 'i sems can de lta bu mang du 'byung// bdag la'ang sun pa'i bgyid pa/ bdag la'ang ma
gus par bgyid pa/ kun nas mnar sems dang sdang bas khrag 'byin par bgyid pa dag 'byung bar 'gyur ro// bdag la'ang 'khu bar bgyid pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor drag
spyi'i rigs kyi dam tshig sun 'byin par bgyid pa'i sems can de ni smad par 'os pa zhes brjod par bgyi'o// rig sngags kyi cho ga zhib mo dang/ dam tshig kun nas 'joms par bgyid pa'i gdol pa zhes
rigs par bgyi'o// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsang ba kun nas 'joms pa zhes rig bar bgyi'o// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi snying po dang/ gsang ba dang/ 2kyil 'khor kun
nas 'joms pa zhes rig par bgyi'o// byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi dam tshig dang/ gsang ba dang/ rig sngags 'chang gi dkyil 'khor dang/ phyag rgya kun nas 'joms pa zhes rig par
'ublad bgyi'o// de dag gis bdag la smad pas sems can de dag sdig pa gdel pa zhes bgyi ste/ dge slong dag dang/ rig sngags 'chang de dag ni smad pa' 'os par rig par bgyi'o//
tshig ba ka ba tshig pa lta bu/ rig sngags nyams pa/ log 'dren gyis zin pa/ dkyil 'khor gyi lha thams cad kyis smad pa zhes bgyi'o// 'jig rten pa dang 'jig rten las 'das pa chud gzan pa/
rigasngags nyams la/ ul thab gzhol ba da dag na bdag gis mnos te/ bdag gis yongs su sbas pa ma lags so// de lta mod kyi dus gsum du gshegs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i yongs su
sbyangs pa// dus gsum du gshegs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' yongs su sangs pa/ rdo rje'i dam tshig dang/ dkyil 'khor dang/ phyag rgyu thams cad spangs pa// thub pa rnam par snang mdzad kyi dam

tshig chen po'i dkyil 'khor dang dam tshig yongs su spangs pas/ bgegs dang log 'dren thams cad dang sdong ba thams cad kyis zin cing nad kyis yongs su zin pa'i 'gyur pa de dag zhi bdag gis ma nongs te/
bdag gis yongasau ma sbas so// de lta mod kyi rig sngags bsregs pa/ dkyil 'khor dang dam tshig bsregs pa// phyag rgya byed pa dang bcas par bsregs pa/ gsang ba bsregs pa// de bzhin gag
rgyu pa' dam tshig dang rigs sun par byed pa/ sdig pa'i dge slong mang po de dag ni des na bskal pa mang po rdul phra mo bsags pa'i bskal par sdug bsngal nyams su myong ste/ 'jig rten 'di dang 'jig

rten pha rol gyi bde ba can med do// de lta bas na sems can zhig sngags kyi ched du rig sngags rjes su sems pas byams pa'i sems su bya'o// gang gi drung du phyag rgya dang/ gsang sngags rim par phye ]
ba dang/ rig sngags gsang ba rnyed par 'gyur ba de la rjes gus pa chen po dang/ bla ma'i bgyi ba chen po bskyed par bgyi/ pha dang ma dang 'dra ba'i sems bskyed par bgyi/ pha dang ma'i gus par bgyi/
ston pa'i gus pa bgyi/ 'ang gsha dang/ khrag dang/ rkang yang gtang bar bgyi/ gos dang/ rgyan dang/ bza' ba dang/ bcung ba dang/ stan dang/ bgo bas 'am gro dang mchod pa bgyi ste/ de la ni
bdag gis mchod par bgyi/ rjenabon dang bla mar bgyi'o// rtag tu rjes su 'brang bar bgyi/ dran pa tsam gyis kyang bdag gis gzugs mthong ba rjes su stsal bar bgyi/ rgyun du rjes su 'brang bar bgyi/

bdag rgyun du rjes su 'brang ba ni/ ji ltar chab kyi nang du til mar gyi thigs pa stsal pa ltar dngos grub kun tu mchi bar bgyi/ rgya mtsho'i dus rlabs bzhin du thams cad du mchi bar bgyi'o// bdag gis
zhags pa dang lcags kyus dmyal ba thams cad drang bar bgyi/ bde bar gshegs pa'i lam la so sor gzhag par bgyi/ stobs dang brtson 'grus dang/ gzi brjid chen po 'jug par bgyi/
thams cad du sgrub pa dang/ dngos grub dang/ mchog stsal ba' bgyi'o// de nas tsan dan gyi gzugru 'di mthong bas 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug nyid kyi gzugs mthong ste/ de mtshungs
/ dpar 'tshal bar bgyisU/ bdag rang gi gzugs kyis rgyun kho nar gnas par bgyi'o// gang na cho ga 'di gnas pa de mchod rten dang bcas pa der mtshungs par rig par bgyi'o//
sa phyogs de ni ston pa bla ma bzhugs pa'i gnas u rig par bgyi'o// gang na dus gsum dugshegs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyi'i dam tshig gnas pa sangs rgyas kyi gnas so zhes rig par

bgyi'o// de gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor rmad du byung ba zhes rig par gagyi'o// lha thamasacad kyi gnas dang dam tshig go zhes rig par bgyi'o// de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs thams cad kyi gnas byang rlub kyi snying
po dang/ chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba dang/ bdud 'dul ba dang/ yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa chen po yang dag par ston pa'i gnas so zhes rig par bgyi'o// sa phyogs 'di rin po che sna bdun gyi gzhal

med khang gi gnas bkod pas brgyan pa 'jig par bgyi ste/ de la the tsom dang yid gnyis bskyed par mi bya'o// de nas de'i 'og tu gnas thams cad du gtogs pa'i dngos grub chen po sgyu ma chen po'i rnam pa'
'phrul ba'i gnas byed par 'dod pa dang/ dgos pa thams cad byed par 'dod na rig sngags 'chang des dri sna tshogs las 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi gzugs sor bcu drug pa shin tu mdzes pa/

sku shin tu tshad dang ldan pa/ phyag drug pa/ de bzhin du zhal gsum pa bya ste/ dang po ni zhi ba'i zhal ras can/ tshangs pa'i cha byad 'chang ba/ spyan gsum pa/ ral pa'i thor tsugs kyis brgyan pa/ 'od dpag med
pa'i dbu rgyan 'chang ba/ zla gam can no// zhal g.yas la ni khro ba'i rgyal po'i gzugs can khros pa/ gzugs bskyar ba/ sbyan gsum pa/ ral pa'i thor tshugs can gyi steng gi ral pa la 'od dpag med pa'i

dbu rgyan 'chang ba/ zla gam g.yas phugs na gnas pa'o// g.yon pa ni zhal khro gnyer can/ khros pa'i lta stangs su lta ba/ sbyan gsum pa/ 'al pa'i thor tshugs cang ba/ 'od dpag med pa'i dbu rgyan 'chad
ba g.yas phyogs zla gam can/ rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa/ 'od 'dom gang gis legs par brgyan pa/ zhags pa thogs pa/ pad+mathogs pa/ mdung rtse gsum pa thogs pa/ dgra sta thogs la// dbug

'byin pa// rin po che'i dbyug pa thogs pa// pad+ma'i gdan la bzhugs pa'o// g.yas na lha mo sgrol ma thal mo sbyar cing 'dud pa'o// g.yon na dka' mo thal mo sbyar te yid tsam du 'dud pa/ rgyan thams cad
kyis brgyan pa// me tog sna tshogs kyis legs bar brgyan pa 'a bya'o// zhabs kyi drung du rig sngags 'chang gsar gyi rgyan gyis brgyan pa/ lagan ma tog thogs pa// 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang
phyug la kha bltas nas pus mo btsugs te 'dug par bya'o// lhag ma ma yin pa'i tshon rtsis tshan dang tshad ma 'dres par spyan dang/ smin ma dang/ mchu dang/ sen mo'i gnas kyi gnas su sbyang bar
'phags pa don yod zhags pa'i cho ga zhib mo'i rgyal po bam po nyi shu pa/// de nas las bshad par bya ste/ 'jigs pa med pas smos kyi
'agla// rigs tsan nang/ ta ga ra dang/ li dang/ li shi dang/ nag pul+la dang/ spri ka dang/ rgya skyegs dang/ kha brtsi ba dang/ sbang smog dang/ na la da dang/ gur kum dang/

gla rtsi dang/ ga bur dang/ sgron shing dang/ gnad spyi yang ku dang kun tu 'u dang/ sha kha ra dang/ pad+ma ge sar dang/ du ru ka dang/ til mar dang/ spra tshil dang lhan cig sbyar ba'i phye ma zhib mo shin tu
'jam pa/ shin tu gnyen pa/ mchog 'di gtsang ba gtsang sbra skyon pas thub ba/ 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug dges shing shin tu dul ba// rab tu zhi ba'i rnam par shin tu mdzes par bya'o//
gsang sngags brgyad stong bzlas brjod byas pas lan gcig bsgrubs pa ni mchog yin te/ 'di yongs su rdzogs nas khro bo'i rgyal po thams cad la mngon du gtor te/ de nas rig sngags 'chang gis las
brtsam mo// de nas rig sngags 'chang gtsang mar gyur pas gos gtsang ma bgos te/ shin tu khrus byas la dris byugs pas dkyil 'khor gru bzhi shin tu mdzes pa gsal ba/ ko la'i tshad tsam gyi dkyil
'khor bzang po legs par byugs pa shin tu gsal bar bya'o// drisna tshogs kyis byugs pa shin tu 'jam pa la tsan dan dkar po dang gur kum gyis dbus su las kyi dkyil 'khor rnam par phye ba bri bar

bya'o// 'dir pany+tsa'ang bya ste/ 'dab ma brgya rtsa brgyad pa gsar dang snying por bcas pa/ shin tumadzes ba/ shin tu bzang ba tsan dan dang gur kum gyis bri bar bya ste/ der tshon rtsi gzhan ni spyad par mi bya'o//
