bum pa spos chus bkang ba dang/ de bzhin du dri chu dang gtor ma thams cad dri sna tshogs kyis bsgos pa dang/ ci yod pa'i gtor ma bzhag ste/ de nas 'di'i dkyil 'khor bya ba ni gnas sam/ dgon pa 'am//
khyim mam/ gang du gnas par gyur pa der khru ga nga tshad dam/ khru do 'am/ khru gsum mam/ lhag par yang bya'o// de bzhin du bdug spos dang/ tsan dan dang/ a ka ru dang/ du ru ka dang/ kun tu ru'o//

ba dan kha dog sna tshogs pas dkyil 'khor kun nas brgyan par bya'o// me tog 'phreng ba dgram bya zhing// dri dang byug pa de nyid dang// kun tu mar me'i 'phreng bya'o// de nas dri las byas pa'i 'phags pa spyan
ras gzigs dbang phyug dkyil 'khor gyi dbus su ba'i gsar gyi steng du bzhag pa la/ rig sngags 'chang mngon du phyogs par skyil mo krung bcas te 'jugazhas gzhan mi smra bar bzlas brjod brgyud stong
brtsam par bya'o// brgyad stong rdzogs pa dang/ 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi sku las 'od zer sna tshogs 'byung zhing sa cher g.yo bar 'gyur// rang gi lag pa g.yas pa 'ba' bar 'gyur ro//
gzugs brnyan las rig sngags 'chang lags so legs so// khyod kyis 'dod pa'i las thams cad grub pa'o// don yod po chen po 'i 'khor lo rnam par 'phrul ba'i dngos grub dang/ thams cad du dgos pa grub

pa de kho na nyid grub po// khyod kyis don yod pa'i zhagos pa'i snying bo 'di mchog tu grub pa'o// khyod kyis sgrub pa'i cho ga rgya cher mchogatu grub po zhes sgra 'byung ngo// de nas rig sngags 'chang gis dgos pa yongs su
rdzogs pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi chog ji ltar dgos par bya ste/ slob ma gzhug pa dang dam tshig ni 'dir dgos pa zhes bya'o// res 'galcags 'chang gis gang gi tshe dgos pa byung ba de'i tshe dri
ba las byas pa'i mgon po la sngar mchod pa bya ste/ de nas dgos pa thams cad 'grub par 'gyur/ 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug mdun du bzhag la/ bzlas brjod brgyad brgya byas na dgos pa sna

tshogs rmi lam du ston cing/ ji ltar bsams pa thams cad ston par 'gyur/ de'i mdun du tsan dan dkar po las dkyil 'khor byas la/ tsan dan dkar bo'i sbyin sreg brgyatso brgyad bya'o// de nas thal ba la bzlas

brjod lan brgya rtsa brgyad bya ste/ rang gi lus mtha' dag khyab par bsku zhing/ thal ba de nyid dang yungs kar gyi byugs ba phyogs bzhi gtor na 'jig rten dbang phyug gi gzugs ji lta ba de ltar 'jig rten thams cad

kyis mngon sum du mthong ste/ ji srid du phyir bsdu ba ma byas pa de srid du 'jig rten dbang phyug gi gzugs snang bas 'a gyu'o// dri chudang yusakar gyis mngon du phyogs par gtong n phyir bsdu babyas bar 'gyur ro/

thal ba des rab tu bdugs nyi/ dur khrod kyi nang du zhugs na 'khyung po'i bdag po dpung dang 'khor dang bcas pa mdushan nye bar gnas par 'gyur ro// gnod sbyin dang/ srin po dang/ 'byung bo dang/ sha za
thamasacad mdunan nye bar gnas shing dbang du gyur nas gnas te/ bdag dang nor gyis bgyi ba ci mchis zhes bya ba byed do// rang la byugs te tshogs kyi nang ngam/ dge 'dun gyi nang du zhugs na ston pa

mthong ba ji lta ba de ltar de rig sngags 'chang snang zhing mthong ste/ mchod pa 'i 'os chen por 'gyur ro// phyag bya ba'i 'os su 'gyur ro// don dang mchod pa chen po 'thob par 'gyur ro// thal bas lus

bskus te klu'i mtshor zhugs na klu'i rgyal po stong phrag drug cu rtsa brgyad thams cad dbang du gyur nas gnas te bka' bzhin byed par 'gyur zhing/ ji srid 'tsho'i bar du nye bar gnas par 'gyur/ rang la byugs

te rgyal po'i pho brang du zhugs na/ rgyal po'i btsunamo dang 'khor du bcas pa rnams dbang du 'gyur te/ ci bgyi zhes bya ba byed cing mdunan nye bar gnas bar 'gyur ro// 'jig rten gyi bla ma ji ltag de bzhin du

mchod ba chen po 'byung bar 'gyur/ don chen po dang mchod pa chen po 'thob par 'gyur/ ji srid 'tsho'i bar du nye bar gnas par 'gyur te/ ston pa dang/ 'dren pa ji lta ba bzhin no// gang dang gang la thal
bas rtog pa tsam gyis de dang de'i nad thams cad dang bral bar 'gyur/ sdig pa dang sgrib pa thams cad rnam par dag par 'gyur/ ngan 'gro'i sgo thams cad bcad par 'gyur/ mchog tu ban ba dang ldan/
par 'gyur ro// shi 'phos nas bde ba can gyi 'jig rten gyi khams su skye bar 'gyur ro// byas pa mi gzo tha/ gsang sngags kyi gdol pa/ ma gus pa/ bla mar mi byed pa/ ma sems can/ nga rgyal
dang ldan pa/ bdud kyi phyogs ra/ skyes bu gti mug can bsogs pa la zhon pa/ khis pa/ nga rgyal can de dag gis gang du'ang dngos grub yang dag par rjes sum mthong ngo// de dag yun ring po' thar pa
mi rnyed par 'gyur ro// dus gsum gyi de bzhin gshegs pa dang/ byang chub sems dpa' dang/ gang yang rig sngags kyi dkyil 'khor gyi lha rnams kyis smad pa/ skye ba brgyud pa
rang gi rgyud la dngos grub bsregs pa/ 'jig rten 'di dang pha rol chud gson pa dag ni ma gtogs te/ de lta mod kyi 'dir bdag gis cung zad kyang ma nongs te/ sdug bsngal mang po dang chen po'i sems
can dgrol bar mi thogs lags so// sangs rgyas thugs rje chen pos bka' stsal pa'i yid la bgyi ba bskal pa grangs par yid la bgyis pas dgrol bar rje thegos lags so// de lta mod kyi
sdug bsngal mang po brgyudapar nyams su myong bar 'gyur ro// dngos grub ni byams pas 'thob ste// byams pa dang gsang sngags kyi go cha bgos pa/ byams pa'i ral gri thogs pa// sems can thams cad

laphan zhing mnyes gshin pa la de kho na nyid sgrub pa'i dngos grub 'di dag 'jig rten 'dren pas rjes su gnang ngo// mgon po 'di mthong ba tsam gyis spos kyis gzugs kyi 'jig rten mgon po mthong ba dang

'jig rten 'dren pa rang gi gzugs su mngoni sumadu mthong ba tshu a ba nyid du khong du chud par bgyi'o// sangs rgyas bye ba gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma dang mnyam pa mngon sum du mthong ba kho na dang/ 'jig rten gyi
mgon po mthong ba mtshungs pa nas khong du chud par bgyi ste/ 'di ltar shes par bya'o// de nas phyir mi ldog pa'i gnas rig sngags 'chang gi 'khor los sgyur ba chen po sgrub par 'dod pa'i rig sngags
'chang gi dge slong ngam/ rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo 'am/ rgyal po'am/ blon po tshon po 'am/ rig sngags 'chang rnam/ gzhan gang yang rung ba'i rig sngags 'chang gis phyir mi ldog pa'i gnas
'thob par 'dod pa dang/ dus gsum du gshegs pa'i sangs rgyas mthong bar 'dod pa dang/ 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyag gi gnas mthong bar 'dod pa dang/ rig sngags 'chang gi dkyil
'khor gyi lha thams cad mthong bar 'dod pa dang/ 'phags pa rdo rje'adzin mthong ba 'dod pa dang/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs thams cad kyi spyi'i dam tshig mthong bar 'dod pa mchog 'di bsgrub
par bya ste/ snying po dang bcas/ bya ba dang bcas pa des myur ba dang/ shin tu myur ba dang/ mgyogs par 'jig rten thams cad kyi mngon sum du cho 'phrul rmad du byung ba gsang ba bstan pa'i mthong
ste 'di la som nyi dang nem nur pa skyod par mi bya'o// the tshom dang yid gnyis bskyed par mi bya'o// de nas rig sngags 'chang gis 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gso' phyogs mdogacan/
so'i bzhi'i tshad tsam tshangs pa'i cha byad 'char ba/ bal pa'ithor tshugs kyis brgyan la bya ste/ shin[%]tshad dang ldan la/ chabyad mdzes pa/ cha shin tu rnam par 'byes pa/ phyog gnyis pa/ spyan
gsum pa/ 'od dpag med pa'i dbu rgyan can/ g.yas na zla ba tshes pa/ phyag g.yon na pad+ma dang ril ba spyi blugs bsnams pa/ phyag g.yas mi 'jigs pa sbyin pa/ sku'i nang ga pur dang/ gla rtsi/
blabya// dang/ ring bsrel gyis bkang pa/ g.yas na lha mo sgrol ma dngul las byas pa thal mo sbyar te yid tsam 'dud pa/ gseb gyi rgyan gyis brgyan pa dang/ g.yon dngul 'aa dka'
mo thal mo sbyar te/ yid tsam 'dud pa pad+ma'igadan la bzhugs par bya'o// steng gi g.yas phyogs na 'od dpag med skyil mo krung bcas te bzhugs pa dang/ g.yonan shAkya'i rgyal po skyil mo krung bcas te
bzhugs pa dgod par bya'o// 'od 'dom gang dang bcas pas legs par brgyan pa'i bya zhing/ gzhan dang gnad shin tu rnam par 'byes pa/ sgra dang/ dpral ba dang/ smin ma dang/ shangs dang/ snyan
dang/ zhal dang/ mgul pa dang/ dpung pa dang/ nu ma dang/ rked pa dang/ brgya dang/ dus mo dang/ byin pa dang/ zhabs dang/ phyag gi sor mo mnyam zhing thams cad mdzes ba/ sku chu zheng gab
cing mtho 2mnaran pa/ mchod phyir thogs dkar 'chang bar bya'o// las shin tu yongs su rdzogs shing shin tu mthar phyin pa dang/ 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi gzugs zin par rig

it+taM nas/ de nas rig sngags 'chang gis rgyu skar bzang po'i zla ba nya'am/ tshes brgyad dam/ bco lnga 'am/ bcu gsum mam/ bcu bzhi 'am/ rgyu skar bkra shis pa rgyal gyi sos dang mthun pa nyid nas dkyil

'khor bsgrub par bya ste/ dkyil 'khor shin tu mdzes par bya ba ni gru bzhi la cha legs pa'i phye ba/ go la'i tshad tsam la them skas bzhis brgyan pa// khru gsum par rnam par dbye bar bya ste/ chung ba'
dang lhag pa' ni ma bya'o// legs par byugs pa/ shin tu 'jam pa/ snyi ba/ mnyen pa// dbyibs legs pa la tshon rtsi sna tshogs kyis rnam par dbye zhing dkyil 'khor dam pa thag gdab pa ni shin tu

rnam par 'byes pa/ sgo bzhi pa la dkyil 'khor gyi dbus kyi snying por pad+ma'i rig kyi dkyil 'khor don yodapa 'i zhags pa'i dkyil 'khor bri'o// phyi rol gyi dkyil 'khor gyi gnas su ma rnam pa brgyad du phyes

lho'i grwa'i gnas su de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs tshon sna tshogs kyi bri'o// da nas byang gi grur bri ba ni rdo rje'i rigs kyi dkyil 'khoratshon tshe sna tshogs kyis rnam par bkra ba'i bri'o// de nas nub kyi glar bri ba

ni nor bu'i rigs kyi dkyil 'khor sna tshogs kyis rnam par bkra ba' bri'o// de nas shar gyi grur glang po che'i rigs kyi dkyil 'khor tshon rtsi sna tshogs kyis rtag tu shin tu mdzes pa dang/ shin tu gsal

bar bri'o// shar phyogs kyi dkyil 'khor kyi sgor ri bo po Ta la metog dang shing ljon pa sna tshog sakyis legs par brgyan pa 'a'i lha dang bcas pa bri'o// lho phyogs kyi sgor ri rab klu'i rgyal po dga' bo

dang nye dga' bos kun nas dkris pa dang/ sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i ris kyi lha bri'o// byang phyogs kyi skor ni spos kyi ngad ldang dri za'i tshogs kyis gang ba/ shing ljon pa sna tshogs kyisashin tu mdzes pa
bri'i// nub phyogs kyi sgor ri ti se lha rnams kyi gnas me tog sna tshogs dang/ 'khri shing dang/ shing ljon ba sna tshogs mchog gis rtag tu gang ba bri'o// legs par zin nas kun tu ni// mdung rtse
'a@#// gsum pa'i 'bar 'phreng ngo// de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs su de bzhin gshegs pa dang rdo rje'i rigs nyid bzhag go/ nor bu'i rigs su de bzhin gshegs pa bzhag cing//

de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs dang/ thams cad du rdo rje 'dzin pa bzhag na spyi'i 'gas 'grub bo// lha mo sgrol ma gi'i spo po Ta la la bzhag go/ ri rab la nagis dkar mo'o// dpe med ma ni ti se'i rtse mor 'o/

sgrol ma bdun ni sros kyi dad ldang la bzhag go/ shar phyogs kyi sgo'i pho nya mo zhi ba mo pho nya mo bdun gyis yongs su bskor ba'o// lho phyogs kyi sgor ni srin mo ral pa gcig ma srin mo bdun gyis yongs su bskor

ba'o/ nub phyogs kyi sgor rdo rje lu gu rgyu ra lu gu rgyud btsun gyis yang du bskor ba'o// byang phyogs kyi sgor khro gnyer can gyi rgyal bo khro gnyer can bdun gyi yongs su bskor ba'o// de nas 'jigs pa med bya

mgon po 'i jig rten gyi bla ma'i gzugs gsar gyi mdog can ring bsrel dang ldan pas don yod pa'i rgyal po rnam par 'phrul ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi snying po pad+ma rgya chen po'i dkyil 'khor du bzhag par bya'o//

grwar rgyal po chen po bzhi stobs po chago cha bgos pa// drag shul gyi gzugs can/ mtshon cha 'bar bathogs pa gzhag par bya'o// gang zhig thub pa rnam par snang ma dzad kyi sprul pa/ spyi'i rigs yang dag pa'i

'byung ba/ don yod pa'i rgyal po rnam par 'phrul pa/ 'jig rten dbang phyugs mchog sbyin pa dang bcas pa 'phags pa don yod pa'i zhags pa rnam par 'phrul pa sgrub pa'i ched du mog sna tshogs dran par bya'o/
sems can kun la phan bya'i phyir// rnam thar dkyil 'khor de nyid ni// legs par sgrub pa mthong tsam dang// bklags pas dngos grub bla med 'gyur// de bas rtag tu 'bad pa yis// sgrub par byed pa

ni mkhas so// de nas rigasags 'changagatsang mar gyur pa shin tu khrus byas pa gos gtsang ma bgos pas dal dang ba dan sna tshogs bzang pos dkyil 'khor brgyan par bya'o// ro bro ba'i mchog rgya chen pos stong sna

tshogs legs par bkang ba dang/ gser dang dngul gyi snod du mchod yon dbul zhing ro sna tshogs kyi gtor ma gzhag par bya'o// de bzhin 'bras bu sna tshogs gzhag par bya'o// gzugs rnam pa sna tshogs pa'i la
zas kyi gtor ma'ang bsgrub po// ma tog sna tshogs bkram 'ing gter ma sna tshogs kyis bkang ba dang/ bum pa dang/ rdzo'u dang/ phor zum dang/ kham phor dang/ dbyib mo dag kyang dgang ngo// kun tu dri
chus bsgos pa yis// rgya chen gtor ma kun tu 'o// sna tshogs la yi ngoge por nas// sna tshogs bdug spos dbul ba ni// a ka sku dang/ tsan dan dang/ sgrig ka dang/ du lus ka dang/ kun tu 'u dang/

gu gul dang/ sgron shing dang/ shi bremaka dang/ sa ra dang/ gar dza ras dang/ de bzhin du ga bur dang/ gla rtsi dang/ gur kum dang/ sha kha ra'i bdug spos 'di dag ni 'ag tu phul/ thams cad du sgrub pa

bla na med pa yin no// sna tshogs pa yi dri dag dang// phye ma byug pa sna tshogs nyid// shes rab can gyis kun tu ni// dkyil 'khor dag la gzhig par bya// lha rdzas kyi rin po che sna bdun kyi me tog dang//
dngul gyi me tog dang/ zangs kyi me tog dang/ byu ru dang ni mu tig dang// in+dani la dag dang ni// pad+ma rA ga dag kyang ngo// gser dang dngul gyi bum pa rin po che sna bdun na yang grwa
bzhir gzhag par bya'o// 'bras yos dang yungs kar bsres pas dkyil 'khor kun tu gtor ro// kun nas me tog 'phreng ba ni// rmad byung dkyil 'khor la gzhag cing// kun nas mar me'i 'phreng ba
yang// dkyil 'khod rmad du byung la gzhag/ rig sngags 'chang nyid zhag gcig gnas par gyur bas ya nga bzlas brjod rgya cher byas la tshogs bskyur ba dang/ phyogs bcings pa dang/ kun nas dkyil
'khor cing ba byas la dkyil 'khor gyi las bya'o// de nas slob ma gzhug par bya ste/ bla ma mkhan po 'am/ slob dpon nam/ pha 'am/ rgyal po 'am/ blon po chen po la dam tshig dang/ phyag rgya dang/

dkyil 'khor gsang ba bstan te/ mgon po 'jig rten gyi bla ma mthong zhing dkyil 'khor rmad du byung ba mthong nas phyag bya zhing mchod pa dang/ me tog dang/ bdug spos dbul bar byas la bskor ba bya'o//

de nas zhig sngags 'chang gis thams cad la byams pa'i sems mnyam par bzhag ste/ skyel mo krung bcas nas 'dug la mi skya ba' ya mtshan snang bar mthong gi bar du don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying bo bzlas

brjod byas la/ dkyil 'khor kun tu khro bo'i rgyal pos lan brgya rtsa brgyad dbang bskur zhing yungs kar dang/ chu dang/ me tog gis dkyil 'khe'o kun tu lan brgya rtsa brgyad gtor ba'i mod la rtag tu phyag rgya

lan brgya rtsa brgyad bcings la dkyil 'khor kun tu me tog dang/ bdug skyon dang/ dri phul nas mgon po 'jig rten dbang phyug don yod pa'i zhags pa mthong na don yod pa nyid mchod par bya'o// de nas mgon

bo phyag na rdo rje dang/ rig sngags kyi rgyal po ban med kha mtshon pa'i byed do// de nas lha mo sgrol ma dang kun tu lha mo thams cad la'o// de la dkyil 'khor gyi lha thams cad la'o// de nas ri'i rgyal bo rnams
la gnas pa'i ri'i lha thams cad la'o// thams cad dang sgo srungs la rtag tu mchod pa bya'o// de nas phyogs bzhi kun tu rig sngags 'chang gis rtag tu mchod nas skyil mo krung bcas te 'dug la 'jigs

pa med pas lag pa'i phyag rgya bcing bar bya'o// byams pa'i sems dang snying rje'i lhag pa'i kha 'basam pa nyid kyis don yod pa'i zhags pa rtag tu dran par bya zhing sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa bsgom mo//
gsang sngags brjod ma thag tu dkyil 'khor dang sa ga ki g.yo zhing/ gang nakyil 'khor du zhugs pa'i mod la snyis[“]dga' ba dang sems bde ba thob bo// 'od zer bye ba kha dog sna tshogs rnam par bkra
ba 'byung zhing dkyil 'khor gyi snying bo na don yod pa'i zhags pa 'gul bar 'gyur/ dkyil 'khor gyi snying bo 'ga' bar 'gyur/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang/ de bzhin du phyag na rdo rje 'bar ba
'gyur/ dkyil 'khor la gnas pa'i lha dang lha mo thams cad 'ba' bar 'gyur/ lha g.yo bar 'gyur zhing dkyil 'khor kun nas legs so zhes sgra grags par 'gyur ro// de nas ji ltar gser bkod/
dau@#// pa de lta 'dabus kyi dkyil 'khor gyi snying po dang/ mgon po de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa dang/ 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug dang/ phyagan rdo rje dang/ sgrol ma
da nga/ dkar mo gser gyi mdog gnyis bkod pa che ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi nang nas bzhengs par 'gyur/ sku gser mdog can gzugs bzang pos bdag nyid kyi rang gi ngo po ston pa snang bar 'gyur/ phyogs
bcu kun la rtag tu gzigs par 'gyur ro// thams cad du rtag tu sems brtan por bya ste/ ga sngags 'chang byams pa dang bcas pa'i sems brtan bo gyur pas/ mi tog dang rol mo'i

sgra dbul zhing don yod pa'i rgyal bo 'ang dran bar bya'o// de nas de bzhin gshegs pas phyag gser gyi mdog can brkyang ste// rig sngags 'chang gi spyi bor bzhag nas legs so zhes bya ba sbyin par mdzad cing

rig sngags 'chang khyod kyis don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying bo dang/ cho ga zhib mo mtha' dag dang/ dkyil 'khor dang/ phyag rgya'i rim par phye ba grub ste/ skyes bu dam pa khyod bde ba can gyi 'jig rten kyi

khams su lung bstan gyis/ rang gi ngo bo nyid kyis yongs su dag nas bla na med pa yang dag pa' rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par s sa rgyas kyi bar du skyes bu dam pa khyod rang gi ngo bo phyir mi
ltog pa dang/ don yodapa'i rig sngags 'chang gi 'khor los sgyur bar 'gyur bar byos shig/ dkyil 'khor 'di la brten pa'i skye bo dge ba dang lhag pa'i bsam pa la zhugs pa'i sems can
thams cad bla na med pa'i mya ngan las 'das par lung bstan gyi bar du phyi mi ldog par 'gyur// ci ste sems can ngan ba'ig sngags kyi gdol pa smad pa dag der zhugs na gzugs brnyan las khrag
'dzag cing sgra mi bzad pa 'byung ste/ mgon po 'di mi mthong/ sa 'di g.yo bar mi 'gyur/ dkyil 'khor 'di 'bar bar mi 'gyur te/ de'i tshe rig sngags 'chang la rmilam du ston te/ de nyid kyang
gzhan du mi 'gyur ro// ji ltar mngon sum pa de bzhin du rmi lam du ston cing yid la bsam pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs par 'gyura'o// de lta bas na rig sngags 'chang gis legs par brtag sir
so sor rtag tu sems can dkyil 'khor du gzhug par bya'o// sgrub pa po bden par sna ba dang/ dbang po yang dag par bsnams pa/ sems can thams cad 'khyams pa/ sems can thams cad la
brtse ba can/ gzhan la yang dag par ba/ tshig brtags pa dad pa can/ gus pa dang ldan pa nyid mar 'dzin pa/ thar 'an pa/ dkon mchog gsum la skyabs su song ba/ rtag tu bla ma la gus gnyid
kyi sems can 'di dag gzhug par bya'o// rab tu bag yod pa dang/ rtag tu gtsang zhing gtsang sbra dang ldan pa dang/ kha zas ngan pa dang/ lhag ma dang/ 'bags pa dang/ 'dres pa dang/ gcig tu bsres

ba dang/ cung zad bkrus ba dang/ chang dang/ sha dang/ kun dong dang/ sgog skya dang/ ke'u dang bsres pa'i kha zas dag spyad par bya zhing/ rang gi kha 'phro'angs nga par bya'o// lhag man rtag tu spang/
bar bya ste/ 'di dag sgrub pa'i chog la dran par bya'o// lag pa 'gags pas gdong la reg par mi bya/ lhung bzed bor bar mi bya'o// rtag tu kham phyed phyed du gcod pa nang//
mchog tu 'bags pa 'di dag nam yang bza' bar mi bya'o// gtsang mas zas gtsang mkhaza' zhing lag pa'i sor mo bsnams pas kha gdong la sogs pa/ la mi reg par 'di dag za ba nyid ni mchog tu
mdzes shing blo dang ldan pa yin no// de nas rig sngags 'chang gis las shin tu yongs su rdzogs par byas shing dkyil 'khor kyi bya ba legs par rdzogs na de la khrag 'dzag par mi 'gyur ro// de nas
'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis phyag brkyang nas rig sngags 'chang gi lag pa nas bzung nas dkyil 'khor gyi nang du 'jug par mdzad cing/ shin tu dri ma med pa'i snang ba zhes bya ba'i
nor bu nyid kyi mgul pa nas bkrol te rig sngags 'chang gi mgul du 'dogs par mdzad do// spyi bor phyag 'jog par mdzad cing 'di la sus kyi thubo zhes gsung ngo// mgul par nor du bcings
ba tsam gyis mod la de nam mkha' la 'gro bar 'gyur ro// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi spyi'i rigs kyi gsang ba'i dam tshig dang dkyil 'khor mthong pa 'a 'gyur/ byanub kyi snying po la thug
gi bar du rigs thams cad du don yod pa'i rig sngags 'chang gi rgyal po 'khor los skyab par 'gyur don yod pa'i rgyal po'i cho ga zhib mo dang/ dkyil 'khor chen po rtag tu mngon du
[za 'gyur zhing rgyal mtshan gyi rtse mo nyid smin mtshams na 'dug par 'gyur ro// chen po dri ma med par snang ba don yod pa'i ye shes rnam par 'phrul la [”]zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin 'thob ste//
gar ting nge 'dzin rjes su thob pas 'jig rten pa thams cad kyi nangos grub rnam par 'phrulakha'i cho 'phrul ston par 'gyur ro// phyag rgya dang/ dkyil 'khor dang/ tshog zhib mo dang/ sgrub ba dang/
dam tshig dang/ gsar ba thams cad kyi mthu chen po ston par 'gyur ro// don yod pa chen po'i 'a khor los sgyur ba lta bu'i rnam par 'phrul pa thams cad ston par 'gyur ro// don yod pa'i dam tshig
gi byin gyis brlabs dang/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsang ba'i dam tshig mtha' yas pa 'thob ste/ gang dam tshig thog pas dus gsum gyi de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dam tshig dang mtshungs
par shes par 'gyur ro// de bzhin gshags pa'i dam tshigamanyam pa nyid kyi rnam par 'phrul pa ston par 'gyur ro// de nas rig sngags 'chang dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga'i bya ba thams cad yongs su rdzogA
pa' byas nas/ spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug ring bsrel dang bcas pa de'ang sa phyogs dben pa'i gnas gtsang mar gos gtsang ma'i gnan bshams la de'i steng du gzhag par bya'o// gaka'u'i bdug
sbos 'bul zhing nyin gcig bzhin du nang pa'i sngar gzhan mi smra kha bzlas brjod brgya rtsa brgyad bya ste/ rig sngags kyi rgyal pos mchod pa dbul bar bya'o// de nas 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang
phyug gi gzugs brnyan 'bar bar 'gyur to/ nyin gcig bzhin tu 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi gzugs brnyan sgyu bar 'gyur/ tshig 'byin par 'gyur ro//
da ltar gyi bzhin du de dag thams cad smra bar 'gyur te/ dge ba dang/ mi dge ba dang/ 'das pa dang/ ma 'ongs pa dang/ da ltar byung ba re thams cad slu bar 'gyur ro// tshe ring pa 'am/ tshe yod+ma
su zad pa de thams cad ston cing smra bar 'gyur ro// rgyal po brje ba 'am/ dgra 'thab pa 'am/ pha rol gyi dmag tshogs 'thab pa 'am/ lo nyes pa dang/ ma sa dang dgon pa dang/ nad dang/ na ba
dang/ gdon dang/ gnod pa dang/ 'tsho ba dang/ grang pa dang rlungadang/ tsha ba dang/ ser ba dang/ chom po'i 'jigs pa dang/ rkun po'i 'jigs pa dang/ gcan gzan gtum po'i 'jigs pa
pa dang/ sbrul gdug pa'i 'a jigs pa dang/ bde ba dang/ lo lags pa dang/ 'bras bu 'phel ba dang/ 'bru 'phel ba de thams cad slu bar 'gyur zhing/ de'i thabs thams cad kyang 'ab tu ston par 'gyur ro//

rig sngagru par la nyin gcig bzhin du khyad pa 'a du gyur pa rnam ba mang po rab tu ston par 'gyur ro// kha cig la bstan par mi bgyi ste/ sdang sems can/ rig sngags kyi gdol pa rkun ma/ byas pa mi gzo ba/
[= ]khachung ba 'phags pa'i dge 'dun la 'khu ba// 'phags pa'i dge 'dun la 'phrog pa// bsub pa mi 'dod pa dang yang dag par ldan pa de dag gi lag tu bstan par mi bgyi/ rna bar bsgrags par mi bgyi//
0 skya'i rtse mo tsam du snang ba'ang bstan par mi bgyi// cho ga zhib mo 'di na yi ge'i 'bru gcig tsam yang bstan par mi bgyi// rjes su 'jug par mi bgyi'o// de nas rig sngags 'chang dngos grub
mchog thob par 'gyur te/ mchog tu yid brtan pa// rnam par thar pa mchog gi dkyil 'khor gsang ba thob par 'gyur ro// gang gi drung nas rig sngags kyi rgyal po 'i rig sngags kyi dkyil 'khor
chen po lag tu 'thob par 'gyur ba de la ston pa dang bla ma'i 'du shes skyed kha brgyad/ bdag dang 'dra ba'i mchod pa sna tshogs kyis gus par bgyid na bdag la gus pa dang bla mar bgyis pa lags/ mchod
pa dang rnyed pa bgyis pa lags so/ de lta bas na dad pa'i rjes su 'brang bas byams pa bsgoms pa dang/ snying rje bskyar pas dngos grub chen po 'thob par 'gyur ro// ci ste bgyis pa 'di las 'da'
bar mi bgyid pa'i sems can de la bdag gis rtag yargyun mi 'chad pa'i dran pa dang/ bdag brjod pa tsam gyis rang gi shin tu yongs su dag pa'i rang gi ngo gis bdag mdun na mchis par bgyi zhing/ yid
la re ba thams can dang mchog yongs su rdzogs bar bgyi'o/ ci ste bdag ji ltar dam bcas pa las gzhan du bgyid na bdag gis sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag la bsdus pa lags so// rig sngags

kyi gdol pa rkun mar gyur pa la ni mi bgyid de/ dam bcas pa bzhin du smra bar mi bgyid de/ rig sngags 'chang gis rtag tu gtsang bar bgyid/ rtag tu 'dzum pa dang/ rtag tu byams pa dang snying rje sgom pa yid la
'bru// bgyid na/ de la bdag gis rtag tu yon tan phun sum tshogs pa thams cad 'thob par 'gyur bar bgyi/ de dge ba'i spyod pa thams cad dang ldan bar bgyi/ don lod pa yangs pa chen po'i
ras grub rjes su stsal bar bgyi'o// sems can thams cad kyi bsam pa thams cad lo ngos su rdzogs bar bgyi ba la/ mumatsho'i rus rlabs ltar thams cad kun tu mchibar bgyi'o// ngan song dang/ ngan 'gro

dang/ log par ltung ba thams cad yongs su zad bar bgyi ba'i tshad du bdag dga' bas kun tu mchi bar bgyi'o// sems can gang la byams pa dang snying rdzamachis pa'i sems can pha rtsol de rnams kyi bsam pa
phun sum tshogs pas yongs su rdzogs par bgyi'o// de lta bas na rig sngags 'chang gis shin tu sdom pas bsdam zhing rig sngags brjod par bgyi'o// yongs su gtong ba'i lag par bgyi zhing sbyar 'chums

par mi bgyi ste/ lag pa brkyang bar bgyi'o// gtong ba mang bas de bzhin gshegs pa dam tshig la gnas par bgyi'o// sngar lags par spyad par bgyi ste/ don yod pa'i rgyal po'i spyad pa bgyi zhing rtag tu yid la
bgyi'o// de nas bdag dang chos kyi mchog la dga' ba zhes bgyi'o// rang gi gzugs brnyan bya ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi tshog 'o// de nas khro bo'i rgyal po bshad par bya ste/ don yod rgyal po rmad
byung che// kun tu dngos grub thogs med cing/ dkyil 'khor kun la dbang bskur ba// snang ba thams cad rab tu 'joms// bdud dang bgegs ni rnam par 'jig/ gnod sbyin srin po gsang ba pa// 'byung
ba/ bo thams cad rab tu 'bros// gdon gyi gso sprod byed cing// snang ba thams cad rab tu 'joms// sdang ba'i klu rnams rnam 'jig cing// 'jigs 'phongs rnams la mi 'jigs stsol// rig 'dzin rnamA
la grub stsol ba// don yod zhags pa'i dngos grub mchog/ dus gsum gshegs ba'i sangs rgyas ston// spyi yi rigs ni rab ston pa// don yod spyi yi gsang ba ni// rtag tu gzhan min snying po nyid//

khro bo'i rgyal po bla med pa// de ni bdag gis rab tu bshad// bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags baspyan ras gzigs dbang phyug den yodargyal po khro ba'i gzug

su gnas te/ snang ba thams cad 'jigs kha byed bar gyur cing lagazhi zhags pa thogs te khro bo 'dasmras so// nam/ sarba ta thA ga ta/ Ar+ya a ba lo ki te shwa ra badzra d+ha'i b+hu/ otsa btsa'/tsu ru tsu

ru/ mahA kA ru Ni ka/ ci'i phyi'i/ ba ri ba ri/ mahA pad+mahasta/ ka la ka la/ ku lu ku lu/ ma hAn+ta ma pu/ tsa ra tsa'/ tsatsa 'jishA tsa ri/ shA ra e byahi/ bud+d+ha bud+d+haM/ rlu ba rta pa// ki Niki Ni//

pa 'a ma shud+d+ha sat+tha/ ka ra ka ra/ ki ki'i/ mahA pa shu pa ti/ ba khang+ha ra/ tAdA ti I shAn+tu/ o ka ra bra ts+tsha ba nga d+ha ra/ sa ra sa'/ ba ra ba rab ra bshisha ta sa ha su/ pra maN+Dita/ sha ri' dza ya/ dzA la dzA/

kha su ru su ru/ mu ru mu ru/ sa nad du ma 'a ru tra bir grwa sa ba/ d+han da ri 'i NAyakaM/ ba hu ba bi t+ta be kha sta ra/ d+ha ra d+ha/ sa man+ta/ a ba lo ki ta/ gi lo ki ta/ lo ke shwa ra/ ma ta shA ra/ mu ya mu ya/ ]

muny+tsamuny+tsa/ ban b+haban d+ha na tA Da na tasngon/ rA dza tan 'a/ aI u da ka/ ba 'a shan+tA pa ri mo tsaka/ ka Na ka Na/ tsa la tsa la/ bo ts+tsaM ga/ tsa tu rAr+ya sa ta saM pra kA sha ka/ ta ma ta ma/

sa ma ya ma/ mas ma sa/ ma ta tamon d+ha kA ra/ pra sha ma na/ mi li mi li/ e Na ya/ tsa pa rig ra/ e phye hi/ ma Ta ma Ta/ bi shud+d+ha'i mayani ba yin/ ma hA kA ru Ni ka/ shwa ta yatsho pa tIta/ rat+tA mu ku Ta

mA lAlha ra/ sam+badzA shi ra i kr-i ta/ ka ra lu Ta/ sa mA d+hipra kaM pya/ 2 Ta pA ra mi tA/ pa ri pU ra ka/ ma hA sarba satA san+ta/ ti pa ri bA tsaka/ sarbamA rA da duwapra marda ka/ sarba sid+d+ha AshA pa ri pu ra ka

a b+hi Shiny+tsa tu maM/ sarba ta thA ga tA yi la ka 'a/ b+ha ga bAn/ a mo g+ha rA dza hU~M phaT/ na mo sku te grwahA/ khro bo'i rgyal bo don yod pa'i zhags pa'o// o bkri ta dzA/ a mo g+ha sa ma ya a b+hi Shiny+tsan+taM/ sarba
ba a mo g+ha a b+hi kir hwa mi li mi liAhA/ de khro bo'i rgyal bo'i snying po'o// de nas 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis don yod pa chen po'i snying po gsungs ma thag tu/ de nas ri
chen po pa lnga la rnam pa drug tu rab tu g.yo bar brtsam te klu'i tshogs ni 'khrugs so// lta'i tshags thams cad ni dga' bar gyur to// sdang ba'i gnod sbyin dang/ srin po dang/ bgegs dang/ log/
'dren ni 'bar bar gyur to// bdud la sogs pa snang ba ni yang dag par rab tu zhi bar gyur to// ngan song gi sdug bsngal thams cad ni rab tu zhi// dkyil 'khor gyi lha thams cad ni mchog tu dga'
bar gyur to// snang ba dang/ rab tu sna nga ba thams cad dang/ gdon thams cad ni mi snang bar gyur to// nan thams can ni rab tu zhi'o// rims thams cad las ni rnam par grol lo// nyon mong
pa'i sgrib pa thams cad las yongs su grol lo// me tog gi char chen po rab tu thab ste/ de bzhin gshegs la mchod par gyur to// sems can thams cad ngan song gi sdug bsngal thams cad las
yongs su grol bar gyur to// de nas dus gsum du gshegs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa dang/ dkyil 'khor la brten pa 'i lha rnams kyis/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lagrwa
pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la tshig gcig tu lags so zhes bya ba byin te lags so legs so// snying rje chen po can mchog tu don yod pa'i rig sngags 'di snus zin gyis// de bzhin gshegrwa

pa'i rig sa tham cad ng/ rigs spyi'i dam tshig dang/ snying po dang/ khro bo'i de kho na nyin gas nga ba dang/ dkyil 'khor dang/ sgrub pa'i cho ga don yod pa'i rgyal po'i dkyil 'khor rab tu smyos shig/
de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po khro ba'i rgyal po 'i dkyil 'khor de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyan sngar bsha
de dkyil 'khor gru bzhi kha shin tumadzesapa/ ko la'i tshad tsam shin tu 'phyos pa'i grwa bzhi dang/ sgo bzhi dang/ them skas bzhi dang/ rta bar s dang/ mda'i kha khyer dang/ kun nas rdo rje'i rnam
'byad/ pa dag kyang bya ste/ tshon tshesna tshogs rnam par 'byes pa'i thig skud kyis dkyil 'khor thig gdab par bya'o// ri mo mkhan gtsang mas snod gsar pa dang pir gtsang mas dkyil/
'khor dam pa legs par bri'o// dkyil 'khor snying po rnams dbye ba// dbus su legs par rnam phye la// kun nas pad+ma'i 'phreng ba dang// rdo rje mdung rtse gsum pa dgod// dbus su bakhor
lo rtag bri ba// shin tu ba lta lcag 'khor lo dgod// dbus de la rgyal ba gzhag pa'i bya// shAkya'i rgyal po de bzhin gshegs// g.yas su khro bo'i rgyal po yi// 'jig rten dbang phyug 'dren pa po/
g.yon du rdo rje 'dzin gzhag pa// Na yab rdo rje lag thogs gzhag/ de'i 'og tu 'od zer dang ldan par bya ba ni lcags kyu dang/ dgra stadang/ go cha dang/ dbyug pa dang/ zhags pa dang/ dgra sta lu
gu rgyan can dang/ mdung rtse gsum pa dang/ glegs bam mo// 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi 'og tu dka' sham chen mo dang/ gos dka' mo dang/ dkar mo chen mo ral ba can dang/
dbyag pa dang/ ril ba spyi bags phyag na thogs pa bya'o// de'i 'og tu srin mo ral pa gcig ma zhes bya ba ni mcha ba gtsigs pa/ 'jigs su rung zhing mi sdug pa/ sbrul se ral khar thogs pa//

thag bzhi pa/ g.yas pa na rdo rje dang dgra sta/ g.yon pa'i sor mo gcig lha ma yin dang log 'dren la bsdigs shing khrag 'dzag pa'i mgo'i tso to nas 'dzin pa dang/ khrag gi snod yongs su 'dzin pa/ glang

bo che'i pags pa rlon pa'i stod g.yogs 'phyang pa dang smad g.yogs can bya'o// mtha'i grur pad+ma dang rdo rje gzhag pa ni 'ba' ba'i 'phreng ba can shin tu bzang po gzhag par bya'o// shar phyogs kyi sgor rdo

rje'ajigs byed mig de'i sku 'bar ba'i 'phreng ba can gzhag par bya'o// lho phyogs kyi sgor ki li ki la zhes bya ba'i rdo rje'i leg 'dren de nyid rdo rje dang/ dgra sta dang/ zhags pa phyagan thogs par bya'o//

chub phyogs kyi skor pad+ma chen po'i rigs mdzes ma zhes bya ba'i sen mo rtsa bzhi phyug pad+ma thogs par bya'o// byang phyogs kyi sgor rdo rje chen po'i rtsa mo zhes bya ba'i cho gas rdo rje dang zhags pa phyagan thogs pa'o//

de nas 'jug pa'i sgor tsan dan gyi chu gur kum dang/ gla rtsi dang/ ga pur gyis bskos pa'i nus bum pa bkang la ras dkar bos dkris shing rgyan gyis brgyan pa rin po che sna bdun can rtag tu gzhag par bya'o//
ji snyed pa 'gatol ma sna tshogs yongs su bshams pas kyang mchod par bya/ rnam ba sna tshogs pa'i dkyil 'khor legs par brgyan khar bya'o// bdug sbos kyis bkang ba dang/ mar me'i 'phreng ba dang//

me tog dang/ dri dang/ byug pas mchod pa'i byago/ ji srid 'jug gi bar du slob ma rnams tshogs bsrungs la/ de nas don yod pa'i snying po bzlas brjod bya zhing don yod pa'i khro bo'i dbang bskur bar bya'o//
dbang bskur ba tsam kyis kyang dus gsum gyi de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis yongs su bzung ba' 'gyur ro// 'jig rten kyi mgon po'i byin gyis brlabs kyis/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs thams cad
kyi dam tshig gi rjes su zhugs pa 'a 'gyur ro// don yod pa'i zhags pa'i rigs kyi dam tshig dang dngos grub thams cad mngon du 'gyur ro// gang bsam pa dgang bcol ba de thams
thar 'byor par 'gyur ro// de bzhin du dam tshig thams cad kyi rjes su zhugs par 'gyur ro// dam tshig dang/ dkyil 'khor dang/ gsang sngags dang/ phyag rgya dang/ cho ga zhib mo thams cad mngon du
brgyu'o// sdig pa dang/ gdug pa dang/ las kyi sgrib pa thams cad las rnam par grol bar 'gyur ro// de bzhin gshegs pa'i yon tan thams cad dang ldan par 'gyur ro// lta dang/ lha ma yin dang

klu dang gnon sbyin dang/ dri ba dang/ gsang ba ba dang/ rig sngags 'chang gi gnas phug drim med pa dang/ nam mkha'i rjes su rgyu ba dang/ mun rgyu ba dang/ nags dang skyed mos tshal dang 'a skyed pa'i
rig sngags 'chang gi 'khor los sgyur ba'i drug cha la thams cad du dbang ba'i 'gyur ro// gsang ba pa thams cad kyang 'di'i mngag gzhug par 'gyur ro// gang zhig de la mi phan par 'dod pa'i lha dang/
klu nang/ gnod sbyin dang/ dri za dang/ lha ma yin dang/ nam mkha' lding/ mi 'am ci dang/ lto 'phye chen po dang/ mi dang 2 mi ma yin pa gang rig sngags 'chang la mi phan par sems pa de thams cad

kyi de dag gi gnas dang lus nyid rnam par gzhig pa'i phyir sdig pa rnams 'bab par 'gyur// de nas dngul las khro bo'i rgyal po sor bcu gnyis kyi tshad tsam byas te/ shin tu mdzes pa/ shin tu tshad dang
ldan pa/ zhal gsum pa/ ral pa'i thor tshugs bcings ba/ rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa/ rgyal ba 'od 'bag tumed pa'i dbu brgyan can/ zla ba dbu la thogs pa/ zhal dang po khro bo'i gzugs/ g.yon pa dang
g.yas pa zhi ba'i gzugs/ zhal cung zad 'dzum pa/ lca gsum pa/ phyag bzhi pa/ pad+ma'adzin pa/ zhags pa 'dzin pa/ ral gri dang mdung rtse gsum pa 'dzin pa'o// g.yas su lha mo sgrol ma me tog
'bul ba rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa'o// g.yon du lha mo rig sngags kyi rgyal mo nor bu rin po che chen po 'bul ba rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa'o// 'jig rten dbang phyug gi zhabs kyi drung du rig
sngags 'chang pus mo btsugs la// log na pog por dang bgrang 'phreng thogs te bcom ldan 'das la lta ba'o// gzugs brnyan de nyid kyi mdun na tsan dan dkar po'i dkyil 'khor bya zhing gur kum gyi
mchod par bya'o// dkyil 'khor de'i steng dukhro bo'i rgyal po bzhag ste/ de'i spyan sAr bzlas brjod stong phrag brgya bya'o// de nas gzugs brnyan de 'gul zhing g.yo ba'i 'gyur// 'chag par 'gyur/
'od zer 'byung bar 'gyur/ tshig 'byin par 'gyur/ legs so zhes bya ba sbyin par 'gyur/ phyag g.yas pa spyi bor 'jog par 'gyur/ yid la bsams pa dang mchog thams cad yongs su rdzogs par
'gyur ro// rig sngags 'chang de'ang bdag nyid 'bar bar 'gyur/ nam mkha' la 'phags par 'gyur zhing don yod par yangs par snang ba/ dngos grub dri ma med par grags pa zhes bya ba'i rig sngagA
spyad/ mang gi 'khor los sgyur bar 'gyur ro// rig sngags 'chang gi 'khor los sgyur ba brgya stong phrag drug cu rtsa brgyad po rnams kyi gtso bo dang rgyal bor 'gyur ro/ tshelha'i bskal

ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag bdun cu sa gnyis su 'gyur ro/ bskal pa'i mjug rdzogs te de nyid kyi mtshan mo 'das pa dang byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o// ji ltar bde ba can bzhin du
jig rten gyi khams ni gzhal med khang gi rnam 'a 'phrul par 'gyur zhing/ tshe'i tshad bskal pa dpag tu med par 'gyur ro// don yod pa'i rnam par thar pa'i dkyil 'khor dang/ phyag rgya dang/ cho ga
zhib mo thams cad kyi sa ston par 'gyura'o// de'i 'og tu 'jig rten pa'i sgrub pa ni de nyid kyi spyan sngar bzlas brjod brgyad stong bya'o// bzlas brjod rdzogs pa'i mod la 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs
dbang phyug khro bo'i rgyal po rang gi gzugs kyi mdun na bzhugs par 'gyur te/ 'jig rten pa'i tshog zhib mo dang/ gsang sngags dang/ phyag rgya dang/ dkyil 'khor thams cad dang/ mig 'phrul dang//
bzhad gad dang/ thur bas gdab pa dang/ bsreg pa dang/ 'phang ba dang/ gsad pa dang/ dbang du bya ba dang/ sgyu ma bstan pa dang/ bdag bsrung ba dang/ gzhan bsrung ba dang/ mi snang ba'i cho ga
skya ba dang/ nor bskyar za sma ba dang/ sa ga'isna ba dang/ sgrub dang/ nam mkha' la 'gro ba dang/ chu brgal ba rang/ modang/ chu dang/ dug rang/ mtshon cha las brgal ba dang/ rmongs byed dang/
mugs byed dang/ rings byed dang/ bcing ba dang/ rgya mtsho chen bo bskyod pa dar/ ro langs bsang ba dang/ shi ba gso ba dang/ zla ba dang nyi ma dbab pa dang/ dbug pa dang/ bden pa bstan pa
dang/ nan la sogs pa thams cad rab tu zhi ba dang/ dgos pa thams cad 'grub par 'gyur ro// gnod sbyin dgug pa dang/ srin po dgug pa dang/ 'byung po dgug pa dang/ chu dang lha dgug/
pa dang/ bud med dang/ skyes pa dang/ khye'u dang/ bu mo dgugapa dang/ gtar ba dang/ dgos pa lasogs pa thams cad 'grub par 'gyur ro// dran pa tsam gyis mod la dngos grub thamA
cad thob par 'gyur/ las thams cad byed par 'gyura'o// bkag pa tsam gyis las dang/ dngos grub dang/ sgrub pa thams cad ston par 'gyur/ phyir rgol ba dang/ dgra dang 1 pa 'ol
gyi dmag tshogs dang/ 'thab pa dang/ rtsod pa dang/ 'gyur ba dang/ snang ba'i sems can thams cad phyir zlog par 'gyur ro// dran pa tsam gyis mchog tu 'grub par 'gyur to/
skal ba ngan pa dang/ nor chud za ba dang/ mi 'grub pa dang/ sdig pa'i lam ngan pa dang/ ltas ngan pa dang/ sgrib pa dang/ sdig pa gzhig par bya bal mchog tshu grub pa yin na// khri
bo'i rgyal bo'i zhabs nas bzung ste/ bzlas brjod stong rtsa brgyad byas na/ ston basags pa'i bsod nams dang skal ba mngon du 'gyur to/ tsha'i mthar thug gi bar du rasal chen po dang chob nyams
su myong bar 'gyur ro// zhal du bltas te bzlas brjod stong rtsa brgyad byas nas dbang phyug chen po'i dngos grub thob par 'gyur ro// kod pa'i gnas nas bzung ste bzlas brjod

brgya rtsa brgyad bus na ston gyi tshe rabs rjes su dran par 'gyur/ rgyal po btsun mo dang 'khor dang bcas pa rnams dbang du gyur nas gnas te/ bdag nyid dang nor gyis ji srid 'tsho'i bar du nye bar gnas par
'gyur 'o// cod pan la lan brgya rtsa brgyad yongs su bzlas te/ khro ba'i rgyal po'i dbu la bcing na nges par dbang bskur ba 'thob par 'gyur te/ 'di la the tshom dang yid gnyis bskyed par mi bya'o//
'phags pa don yod pa'i zhags pa'i cho ga zhib mo'i rgyal kho bam po nyi shu rtsa gcig pa// de nas phyag na rdo rje don yod pa'i rdzu 'phrul rnam par 'phrul pa'i/
cho 'phrul gyi 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor der nam mkha' las babs nas/ 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor chen po'i mdun du bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa chen po dang bkur sti mngon du byas te/ bcom ldan 'das la
mkhan sor ru bskor ba byas nas/ bcom ldan 'dasakyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa byas nas phyag 'tshal te song nas/ byang chub sems dpa' semu
dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gang na ba der logs su song ste phyin nas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la lha rdzas kyi
mchod pa chen pos mchod pa byas so// me tog dang/ bdug spos dang/ dri dang/ 'phreng ba dang/ byug pa dang/ gos dang/ rgyan dang/ lhab lhub dang/ sil snyan dang/ pheg rdob pa rnam pa sna tshathA
kyis mchod nas lan bdun bskor ba byas so// 'i pa Ta la'i gzhal med khang na gas pa'i lha dang/ klu dang/ gnod sbyin dang/ dri za dang/ lha ma yin dang/ nam mkha' lding dang/ mi 'am ci dang/
lto 'phye chen po de dag gis kyang mchod pa byas so// dkyil 'khor gyi lha de dag la'ang mchod pa bzapa' ba byas so// 'khor chen po de dag la'ang mchod pa byas so// lhan cig lhags pa'i 'khor de dag

thams cad la'ang mchod pa dang/ mngon du bstod pa dang/ phyag byas nas gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po lag na rdo rje yud tsam zhig ci yang ma smra bar 'jug par gyur to// de nas gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon
chen po lag na rdo rje 'gying bag dang brjid bag gi 'gros kyi langs nas/ bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der logs su so pa su phyin nas rdo rje gamor zhing/ bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas
nas zhabs gnyis mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ bcom ldan 'das gang na ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das 'phags pa/
spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyis phyag bgyis pa/ rnam par thar pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga zhib mo 'di shin tu zab pa/
shin tu rtogs par dka' ba/ rgya mtsho chen po lta bu shin tu zab pa/ 'a bab chen po lta bur shin tu mi g.yo zhing mi bskul ba/ mchog tu rnyed par dka' ba/ shin tu gzung bar

dka' ba'i phyag rgya mang po dang/ gsang sngags mang po dang/ dkyil 'khor sgrub pa mang bo dang ri mo'i sku gzugs bri ba mang podang/ sgrub pa gsang ba rnam pa mang po dang/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i rnam par
'phrul ba mang po dang/ 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi rnam par 'phrul pa don yod pa bklags pas 'grub par 'gyur ba mang po la bcom ldan 'das bdag mchog tu ya mtshan du 'gyur na//

ji ltar 'gyur bar rngo thogs/ ji ltar nges par gzung bar rngo thogs lags/ gsang sngags tha dad pa dang/ phyag rgya tha dad pa dang/ dkyil 'khor sgrub pa tha dad pa dang/ ras kyi ri mo'i sku gzugs tha dad
pa dang/ gtor ma tha dad pa dang/ ma tog dang/ bdug spos dang/ dri dang/ 'breng ba dang/ byug pa dang/ mchod yon dang/ 'bras bsil dang/ spyan drang pa dang/ gshegs su gsol ba dang//
dgug pa dang/ dam tshig dang/ khrus dang/ smyung ba dang/ phyag rgya bcing pa dang/ rab tu 'jug pa dang/ bzlas larjod dang/ sbyin sreg dang/ slar gshegs su gsol ba 'am/ nges par gzung pa las/
dran par bgyi bar rngo thogs/ com ldan 'das rmas pa chen po sems kyi sbyod pa rlugs par gyur ba'i'igs kyi bu rnams am/ rigs kyi bu mo rnams sam/ dge slong ngam/ dge slong ma 'am/ dge
[4] ]bsnyen nam/ dge bsnyen ma 'am/ dge sbyong ngam/ bram ze 'am/ rgyal rigs sam/ rje'u legs am/ dmas rigs sam/ rig sngags 'chang de rnams kyis don yod pa'i cho ga zhib mo'i rgyal po 'di sa
bar gzung bar ji ltar rngo thogs/ rig sngags 'ang de rnams kyis ji ltar sgrub par rdzogigs/ bcom ldan 'das bdag gi snying la mchog tuya mtshan skyes l de dag bcom ldan 'das kyis the tsom gcad pa'i

slar du bka' stsal du gsol/ bcom ldan 'das the tshom gcod pa'i slad du zhus pa lung bstan du gsol/ de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs paNashAkya thub pas/ gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po lag na rdo rje

la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// lag na rdo rje dngos grub kyi spyod pa dang gsang ba rnam pa sna tshogs gsang sngags sgrub pa po sgrub la bsgrub pa la/ gang gi tshe dngos grub las dbugs phyung ba de'i tshe blo gros chen
bo'i chen por 'bogs par 'gyur// dngos grub chen po'i chen pa 'grub par 'gyur/ bsod nams kyi bung lowin po'i chen po rab tu skye bar 'gyur/ dge ba'i rtsa ba chen po'i chen po dang ldan pa'i 'agrul/
pha rol tu phyin pa drug gi dngos grub chen po'i chen po 'thob par 'gyur/ lag na rdo rjes gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das dngos grub gang gis sgrub ba'i cho ga 'i dngos grub 'thob par 'gyur ba'i dngos grub

dam pa de gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ lag na rdo rjegang la yungs dkar gyi 'bru tsam gyi byang chub kyi sa bon gyi 'bras bu thob pa yod pa de la lag na rdo rje dngos grub dam pa mchog
tu 'gyura'o// lagan rdo rje rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo 'am/ dge slong ngam/ dge slong ma 'am/ dge bsnyen nam/ dge bsnyen ma 'am/ dge sbyong ngag/ bram ze lam/
rgyal rigs am/ rje'u rigs sam/ dmas rigs sam/ gzhan ga nga su'ang rung ba bud med dang/ skyes pa dang/ khye'u dang/ bu mo gang gi lag tu de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku'i 'ang bsrel yungs kar

gyi 'bru tsam zhig thob par 'gyur la/ des ring bsrel de za ma tog gi nang du bcug ste nyin gcig bzhin du mchod pa dang/ dkyil 'khor dang/ khrus la sogs pa byed cing brtug pa dang/ dri dang/ 'phreng ba dang/
byug pa dang/ phye ma dang/ gos dang/ gdugs dang/ rgyal mtshan dang/ ba dan dag gis mchod pa byed na/ lag na rdo rje'ig sngags 'chang de dngos grub dam pa dang/ mchog dang/ bla na med pa 'thob ba'

'gyura'o// gang dang gang du dgos par sbyar ba de dang der dngos grub chen po mchog tu 'gyu ra'o// ring bsrel yungs kar gyi 'bru tsam gcig la mchod pa byas pa de rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo 'am/ dge sbyong
ngam bram ze 'am/ rgyal rigs sam/ rje'u rigs lam/ dmangs rigs sam/ gzhan bud med dang/ skyes pa 'am/ khye'u 'am/ bu mo de dag gis de bzhin gshegs pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag gang+gA'i

klung gi bye ma dang mnyam pa la skad cig gcig gis mchod pa byas pa'i 'gyur/ rnyed pa dang/ gus pa dang/ bstod pa dang/ phyag byas par 'gyur ro// de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gi drung du dge ba'i rtsa ba bsgyur/

0/ par 'gyur/ de dag gi drung du bsod nams kyi phung po chen po dang ldan par 'gyu'o// de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gi drung du 'gas kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo 'am/ dge slong ngam/ dge slong ma 'am/ dge bsnyen ma
dge bsnyen ma 'am/ gzhag gang su'ang rung ba dge sbyong ngam/ bram ze 'am/ rgyal rigs sam/ rje'u rigs sam/ dmangs rigs sam/ skyes pa 'am/ bud med dam/ khye'u 'am/ bu mo de dag de bzhin gsheg
pa'i byin gyi rlabs kyis byin gyis brlabs par 'gyura'o// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis lung bstan par 'gyur 'o// shes rab dang thabs la mkhas pa'i dag ba'i rtsab dpag tu med par 'gyur ro//

rig sngags 'chang chen po'i dngos grub dpag tu med par 'gyur 'o// don yod pa'i cho ga zhib mo'i dkyil 'khor dang/ phyag rgya dang/ gsang sngags kyi dngos grub dpag tu med pa 'thob par 'gyur ro// don yod

pa'i zhags pa'i snyibapo byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyis phyag byas pa/ rnam par thar pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga zhib mo'i rgyal po chen po'i rigasngags rim par phye ba'i dngos grub dpag tu med pa 'thob pa

'gyur ro// lag na rdo rje de ltar 'ing bsrel yungs kar gyi 'bru tsam gcig la mchod pa byed pa de yon tan chen po'i chen por brjod pa'i rnam par 'phrul pa'i byin gyis babs kyi rdzu 'phrul gyi ting nge 'dzin 'thob par

yang dag par 'gyur ro// de ltar dngos grub chen po'i chen po 'thob par 'gyura'o// de lta mod kyi lag na rdo rje khyod song la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la yod+ma
chublad/ su dris shig dang/ dris pa de'i lan ldon par 'gyur ro// de nas gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po lag na rdo rje dga' ba dang/ mgu ba dang/ yid 'angs pa dang/ rab tu dga' ba dang/ dga' ba/
dang/ yid bde ba skyes nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te so nas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gang na ba de logs su
song ste phyin nas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi rkang pa gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas te/ lan gsum bskor ba byas nas bzhin 'dzum pa dang//

gdong khro gnyer med pas 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la mig mi 'dzum par blta zhing/ 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi mdun du 'dug nas rdo rje gsor zhing gdong chub ltas te rtog cing
wa/ 'dug go/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyag gis/ gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po phyag na rdo rje la 'di skad ces smras so// lag na rdo rje khyod
mi gakho bar mdun du 'jug ste rdo rje gsor zhing nga la ci zhig blta/ ci zhig yongs su dri bar 'dod/ ci zhig gsol ba 'debs pa'i 'dod/ lag na rdo rje nga la sbos shig/ lagan rdo rje khyod la skabs lu
yongs su dris shig dang/ dris pa de thams cad lung bstan pas khyod kyi sams ras par bya'o// de nas gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po phyag na rdo rjes/ byang chub sems dpa' sems chen po 'phags pa
spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la 'di skad ces smras so// bcom ldan 'das don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po'i cho ga zhib mo shin tu rtogs pa' dka' ba/ shin tu zab pa/ byang chub sems dpa' thamU
cad kyis phyag bgyis pa/ rnam par thar pa'i dkyil 'khor gsang sngags mang po dang/ phyag rgya mang po dang/ dkyil 'khor sgrub pa mang po dang/ ras kyi sku gzugs bri ba mang po yongs su bsgrags
pa 'di bcom ldan 'das ji ltar nges par gzung bar zhus/ dngos grub ji ltar shes par bgyi/ rgya mtsho chen po ltar zags chib/ ri rab dang mtshungs par mi g.yo ba nam mkha' ltar mthar thug pa
ma mchis pa/ shin tu rtogs par dka' ba 'di ji ltar shis par bgyi/ gnas ni gang/ 'gro ba ni gang/ 'byung ba ni gang/ sgrub pa'i gnas ni gang/ dngos grub dam pa'i gnas ni gang/ sta man
gang phyi ma ni gang/ dbus ni gang/ tha mni gang lags/ mang du yongs su zhu'o// dkyil 'khor dang/ phyag rgya rim par phye ba dang/ gsang sngags dang/ sgrub pa'i cho ga dang/ dam tshig so so
tha dad ba byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyag gis don yod pa'i rgyal po chen po'i cho ga zhib mo// byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyis phyag bgyis pa//

rnam par thar pa'i dkyil 'khor chen po 'am par phye ste rjes su gzung ba de nges par gzung pa'i ji ltar nus/ bcom ldan 'das bdag gi pha tsam chen po dang/ mchog tu ngo mtshar du gyur pa de thugs rje chen
pa nublad/ cos bdag la bka' stsal du gsol/ ji ltar grub na phyag rgya dang gsang sngags dang bcas pa'i dkyil 'khor rim par phye ba dang/ sa kyi ri mo'i tshog mtha' dag nges par gzung/
bar 'gyur ba the tshom gsar pa'i slad du'o// sems dpa' chen pos bka' stsal du gsol/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis/ gnod

sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po phyag na rdo rjel 'di skad ces smras so// lag na rdo rje yun ring po zhig nas skyobs pa gang zhig skyes te nga la yongs su 'dri/ lag na rdo rje nyon gcig dang bshad par bya/
gang yang phyogs bcu'i sas rgyas kyi zhing thams cad kyi sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das ni kha dog gcig la/ rtags gcig la/ chos gcig la zhugs ba/ dbyangs dang/ khams dang/ snying po/
gcig la/ las rgyas 'byung ba dang/ chos kyi 'khor lo rab tubaskor ba gcig pa'o// de lta mod kyi lagan rdo rje gang 'das ba dang/ mabyon pa dang/ da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas khacom ldan/
'das de bzhin gshegs pa de dag ni sas rgyas kyi zhing sna tshogs pa nyid dang/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rnam par 'phrug pa dang/ sku tshe'i 'du byed snatshogs pa nyid dang/ sems can yongs su smin pa'i
mdzad pa sna tshogs pa nyid dang/ lung bstan pa sna tshogs pa nyid dang/ nyan thos dang 'ang sangs rgyas kyi dge 'dun sna tshogs pa nyid dang/ byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs sna tshogs pa nyid dang//

gzhan yang sangs rgyas kyi sku tha dad pa nyid du yang dag par shes so// de lta mod kyi lag na rdo rje de bzhin du 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi snying po don yod pa'i zhags pa byang chub semA
dpa' thams cad kyis phyag byas pa/ rnam par thar pa'i dkyil 'khor 'di 'ang gcig nyid las de thams cad rjes su 'gro'o// sgyu ma lta bu'i ting ngo 'dzin gyi rnam par 'phrul pa sna tshogs kyis rnam
par 'phrul pa'i rdzu 'phrul gyi dngos grub kyi gnas dang/ sems can longs su smin pa'i byed pa'i gnas/ bsam pa yongs su rdzogs par byed pa la ji lta ji ltar 'dul bar byed pa de lta de ltar dngos

grub rjes su 'thob cing/ de lta de ltar bsam pa dag pa 'thob par 'gyur ro// de lta de ltar dge ba'i rtsa ba chen po skyed par 'gyur ro// de lta de ltar bsod nams kyi phung po chen po dang ldan par 'gyur
ro de lta de ltar de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis dgos par 'gyur 'o// de lta de ltar byang chub sems dpa'i yul la rnam par 'phrul pa sgyu ma lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin gyi rdzu 'phrul gyi cho 'phrul

dang ldan par 'gyur ro// de lta de ltar gzungs dang ting nge 'dzin yonurag pa 'thob pa'i 'gyur ro// de lta de ltar dpa' bar 'gro ba'i ting nge 'dzin 'thob por 'gyur 'o// rdo rje lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin dang/

rgyal mtshan gyi rtse mo'i dpung rgyan gyi ting nge 'dzin dang/ nyon mongs pa spong pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang/ sbyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis ting nge 'dzin dang/ rnam par 'thor ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang/ 'od

zer rab tu 'gyed pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang/ dga' ba spong pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang/ stobs bkod pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang/ chos la rnam par lta ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang/ lag na rin chen phyag rgya'i ting nge

'dzin dang/ drim med pa'i 'byung gnas kyi ting nge 'dzin dang/ rnam par snang mdzad kyi snyingapo'i ting nge 'dzin dang/ nyim rab tu grol ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang/ na po che'i snying bo'i ting nge 'dzin dang/ zla ba'i snying po'i

ting nge 'dzin dang/ kun tu lta ba'i 'od zer gyi ting nge 'dzin dang/ chos kyi sgron ma'i ting nge 'dzin dang/ de bzhin gshegs l thams cad kyi spyi gtsug la rnam par lta ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang/ yul la rnam par

'a phrul pa kun bkod pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang/ sgron ma 'bar ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang/ chags pa med pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang/ phyir mi ldog pa'i 'byung gnas kyi ting nge 'dzin dang/ zla ba rdzogs pa'i ting pa'i dzin

dang/ shin tu rab tu gnas pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang/ shin tu rab tu sangs rgyas pa'i ting nge 'dzin nang/ 'gro ba yongs su dag pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang/ nyim kun tu lta ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang/ yid gnyis yang dag

bar 'joms pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang/ kun tu phyag rgya'i rnam pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang/ kun nas dkyil 'khor yongs su dag pa'i ting nge 'jin dang/ phyag rgya'i mtshan nyid la kun tu lta ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang/ dkyil/

'khor yongs su dag pa yang dag bar 'dzin pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang/ kun tu lta ba 'od zer gyi ting nge 'dzin dang/ pad+ma bkod pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang/ don yod la kun tu lta ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang/ de yod pa dri ma med

pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang/ kun tu don yod pa rnam par 'phrul ra 'i ting nge 'dzin dang/ rgya chen po dbugs 'byin pa don yod pa rin po che'i teng nge 'dzin dang/ dpung brgyan gyi ting nge 'dzin dang/ dadu nga rgyan gyi rgyal

mtshan kyi teng nge 'dzin dang/ rgyal mtshan gyi rtse mo'i dpung brgyan gyi ting nge 'dzin dang/ sgrib pa thams cad rnam par dag pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang/ don yodapa 'a lcags kyu'i ting nge 'dzin dang/ pad+ma'i

lcags kyu'i ting nge 'dzin dang/ dri ma med pa'i lcags kyu'i ting nge 'dzin dang/ kun nas 'dren pa'i lcags kyu'i ting nge 'dzin dang/ don yod pa'i 'od zer gyi lcags kyu'i ting nga 'dzin dang/ kun tu lha

ba'i gzi brjid kyi ting nga'adzin dang/ rtogs pa dri ma med pa thob pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang/ kun tu lta ba'i 'ab tu gsal ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang/ rnam pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang/

ting nge 'dzin gyi gtso bo lnga bcu rtsa gnyis pa 'di dag 'thob par 'gyur te/ ting nge 'dzin ni re la'ang 'khor bye ba brgya stong phrag gang+gA'i klung gi bya ma dang mnyam pa de thams cad rjes su 'thob par 'gyur ro//

lag na rdo rje don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po rnam par 'phrul pa 'di'i byin gyis brlabs kyis kyang don yod pa'i zhags pa snying po ba klog pa dang/ 'chang ba dang/ brjod pa dang/ bsgrub pa dang/ phyag rgya
'ching bas yon tan de dag 'thob par 'gyur ro// lag na rdo rje don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po 'chang ba dang/ rjod pa dang/ klog pa dang/ kha ton byed pa dang/ nyin lan gsum mtshan lan gsum dran/
ka @#// par byed na/ lag nardo rje sems can de dngos grub don yod pa 'thob par 'gyur te/ rnam bar 'phrul pa don yod pa dang/ de bzhin gshegs pa lta ba don yod pa 'thob pa dang/ gzus
don yod pa 'thob pa dang/ ting nge 'dzin don yod pa 'thob pa dang/ bsod nams sogs pa don yod pa 'thob pa dang/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i yul la rnam par 'phrul pa don yod pa dang byang chug ems dpa'

yul la rnam par 'phrul pa don yod pa dang/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i byin gyis brlabs kyi rnam par 'phrul ba don yod pa dang/ pha rol tu phyin pa drug yongs su rdzogs pa don yod pa dang/ byang chub kyi snying
por 'gro ba don yod pa dang/ chos kyi 'khor lo rab tu bskor ba don yod pa dang/ phyir mi ldog pa'i gnas su 'gro ba don yod pa dang/ blo rgyas pa don yod pa dang/ shes rab zab mo rnam par 'phel ba
don yod pa dang/ pha rol tu phyin pa bcu yongs su rdzogs pa don yod pa dang/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la mchod pa dang/ rim gro dang/ bla ma la gus par bya ba don yod pa de'i phyir/ lag na rdo
rje don yod pa'i zhags pazhes ming du gdags pa byas na/ lag na rdo rje rig sngags 'chang rnams la ji ltar rmos pa skye bar 'gyur/ sems 'khrug par 'gyur/ dran pa dang blo gros rma ngas bar 'gyur te/
de'i gnas na mi snang na su zhig smra bar nus/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ya shes na don yod pa ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes gang yin pa de don yod pa zhags pa'i ming du dmigs so// byang

0 chub sems dpa' rnams kyi ye shes ni don yod pa ste/ ye shes don yod pa gang yin pa de don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po'i ming ru dmigs so// sgyu ma lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin byang chub sems dpa' sems

dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi rnam par 'phrul pa 'di na yod pa ste/ sgyu ma lta bu gang yin pa de don yod pa'i zhags pa'o// ye shis gang yin pa de zhags pa'o// de'i snying po'o//

snying po gang yin pa de don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po ste/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' tshon po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyag gi snying bo zhes donayod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po'i ming du
dmags so// gang yid la sems ba dang/ gang don du gnyer ba de thams cad 'dren par 'gyur/ 'gugs par 'gyur/ len par 'gyur te/ shin tu'ang bo'anas kyang ye shes kyi zhags pas 'gugs pa'

'gyur ro// lag na rdo rje de bas na de don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po'i ming du dmigs so// lag na rdo rje gang gis ting nge 'dzin 'di 'thob pa de la ji lta'armongs pa skye bar 'gyur/ blo dman par 'gyur te//

gnas 'di ni mi snang ngo// lag na rdo rje gzhan yang gzungs kyi sgo du ma 'thob ste/ gang g.yagazungs 'ashog pa des don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po'i cho ga zhib mo 'di gsang sngags mtha' dag rdzogs pa dang/

gsang sngags dang/ phyag rgya dang/ gsang sngags rim par phye ba dang/ dkyil 'khor kha ton nyid tu gnas te/ tham can so sor yang dag par shes so// 'di lta ste/ don yod pa'i rgya mtsho zhes bya ba'i gzung
dang/ don yod pa lcags kyu zhes bya ba'i gzungs dang/ don yod pa pad+ma'i lcags kyu zhes bya ba'i gzungs dang/ don de da par rab tu gnas pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs dang/ don yod/

pa rnam par snang mdzad kyi za ma tog ces bya ba'i gzungs dang/ don yod pa lhun po'i snying po yangs pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs dang/ don yod pa dri ma med pa'i pad+ma zhes bya ba'i gzungs dang/ don yod pa'i
'od zer rab tu snang ba zhes bya ba'i gzungs dang/ don yod pa'i yid bzhin gyi nor bu'i rgyal mtshan zhes bya ba'i gzungs dang/ don yod pa rnam par 'phrul pa'i 'od zer zhes bya ba'i gzungs dang/ don

yod pa'i phyag rgya zhes bya ba'i gzungs dang/ don yod pa'i rdo rje zhes bya ba'i gzungs dang/ don yod pa rab tu gnas pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs dang/ don yod pa yarApa snang ba zhes bya ba'i gzungs dang/

don yod pa'i dngos grub ces bya ba'i gzungs dang/ don yod pa dri ma med pa'i 'byung gnas zhes bya ba'i gzungs dang/ don yod pa'i blo rgyas pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs dang/ don yod pa'i 'bar ba'i phyag rgya
zhes bya ba'i gzus dang/ don yod pa nyi ma'i snying po zhes bya ba'i gzungs dang/ de bzhin gshegs pa dang/ byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi dkyil 'khor gsar ba don yod pa zhes bya ba'i gzung
'thob ste/ gang gis gzungs de rnams thob pa tsam gyis don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyis phyag byas pa/ rnam par thar pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi phyag rgya dang/
gsang sngags rim par phye ba'i dkyil 'khor mtha' dag rdzogs pa dang/ gsang sngags dang/ cho ga dang/ cho ga zhib mo rgya chen po kha ton du gnas shing thams cad so sor yang dag par shes te//
gang gis mthu 'di rab tu thob pa la rmongs pa skye bar mi 'gyur/ dran pa nyams par mi 'gyur/ dran pa gzhan par mi 'gyur/ dran pa rlugs par mi 'gyur/ dran pa 'khums par mi 'gyur/ dran/
pa ma bskrun pa'i mi 'gyur/ dran pa gzhan du rgyu bar mi 'gyur/ 'dod chags dang/ zhe snang dang/ gti mug dang/ nga rgyal dang/ ser sna dang/ phrag dog gi rjes su 'gro ba' mi 'gyur/
dran pa sdig pa can du mi 'gyur/ dran pa 'jig rten pa'i mi dge ba byed par mi 'gyur te/ rtag tu blo yangs shing rab tu gsal bar 'gyur ro// rtag tu mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i dran pa
dang/ blo rgya mtsho lta bur 'gyur ro// rtag tu dran pa zab cing rgya mtsho chen po bsags pa lta bur 'gyur ro// lag na rdo rje don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po'i gzungs cho ga zhib mo'i
rgyal po de ltar go skabs yangs pa la/ gang gis gzungs 'di thob pa de/ lag na rdo rje ji ltar dran pa smyos par 'gyur/ gzhan yang tshad med grangs med dpag tu med pa'i lus yos su dag
pa dang/ yid yongs su dag pa dang/ sems yongs su dag pa dang/ mdangs yongs su dag pa dang/ mig longs su dag pa dang/ rnab yongs su dag pa dang/ sna yongs su dag pa dang/
[s7 ]bsla// lce yongs su dag pa dang/ dbang po yongs su dag pa 'thob par 'gyur ro// don yod zhags pa'i snying po bklags pa tsam dang/ mnyan pa tsam dang/ mthong ba tsam dang/ ltag ba'ibs/

pa tsam gyis de rnams yon tan gyi phan yon chen po'i chen po 'di 'thob ste/ gang gis mthu 'di 'ab tu thob pa de la/ lag na rdo rje ji ltar chos pa skye bar 'gyur/ de lta mod kyi lag na rdo rje yud tsam
zhig sdod cig dang/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'khor mang po 'di'i dbus su ji ltar mngon sum ru 'gyur ba bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar bab par bstan par bya'o// don yod pa'i zhags pa'isteng

@# po byang chub snyams dpa' thams cad kyis phyag byas pa/ rnam par thar pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga rnam par 'phrul pa'i cho 'phrul gyi rdzu 'phrul dam pa'i yul gyi mthu chen po'i chen po bstan pa'o//
de nas gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po phyag na rdo rjes/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi drung nas don yod pa'i yon tan bkod pa'i
rnam par 'phrul pa'i ting nge 'dzin 'di dag dang/ gzungs kyi sgo 'di dag mngon sum du thos nas dga' ba dang/ mgu ba dang/ yi rangs pa dang/ rab tu dga' ba dang/ dga' ba dang//
yid bde bskyes te/ snying dga' bas dga' ba chen po nyid thob par gyur nas smras pa/ bdag lus dang sems shin tu sbyangs pas/ yongs su dga' ba yid la bgyid pas nges par gnas bar bgyi'o
yid la bgyid pa mchog tu dag pa dang/ mtshar du gyur pa dang/ som nyid du gyur pa dang bral ba dang/ 'gyod pa ma mchis pas gnas par bgyi'o// rnam par thar pa'i dkyil 'khor byang chub
sems dpa' thams cad kyis phyag bgyis pa/ 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyag gi rten yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po'i mthu'i rnam par 'phrul pa 'di ni mchog tu rnyed par dka' ba'o//
de nas gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chon po phyag na rdo rjes/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la dri ma med par kun tu snang ba'i nor bu rin po
che chen po chos kyi dgab par phul nas rkang pa gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas te/ lan gsum bskor ba byas nas seng lta ched du brjod pa 'di ched du brjod cing/ 'gying bag dang brjod bag gi 'gros
kyisasong nas rang gi stan la 'dug sko bzhin 'dzum pas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhal du bltas nas snying yongs su dga' bas bcom ldan 'das la rtog cing 'dug go/ de nas byang chub
sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa sbyan ras gzigs dbang phyug ngo mtshar mchog tu rmad du byung ba/ snying rje rnam pa rgya chen po'i lhag pa'i bsam pa'i dmags pas sems can
thams cad bsgral ba'i phyir/ 'od zer dri ma med par snang ba'i nor bu rin po che chen po de phyogs bcu'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la phul te nam mkha' la 'phags so// byang chub
byab// sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis nor bu rin po che de nam mkha'i dkyil du 'phags ma thag tu/ stong gsum gyi stong chen
po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di cher g.yos par gyur to// 'od zer gyi snang ba chen po nyi ma bya ba brgya stong bas lhag pa'i 'od zer byung bar gyur to// snang ba gang gis 'dzam bu'i gling gi mas
can thams cad kyi lug la reg pa tsam gyis sdig pa thams cad dang/ ramyal ba dang/ yi dwags dang/ dud 'gro'i skye gnas dang/ gshin rje'i 'jig rten tu ngan song gi 'gro ba las yongs
su grol bar gyur to// gang yang gling bzhi pa'i yi dgas dang dmyal ba de dag la'apasnang ba de snang bar gyur bas nyi tshe ba'i dmyal ba rnams kyi gtub pa med par gyur to/ sems can de dag kyang
yongs su thar nas bde ba can gyi 'jig rten gyi khams su skal ba nyam pa'i skyes te/ lus yongs su dag par gyur to// gang yang mnar med pa'i dmyal ba chen po bcu drug po de dag kyang 'od zer
gyis nga ba des reg pas dmyal ba de dag thams cad du pad+ma'i mtsho byung bar gyur te/ sems can de dag kyang yongs su thar nas rgyun thams kyis brgyan te/ bde ba can gyi 'jig rten gyi khams su skal
ba mnyam nga ba padu lam rdzas te skyes so// grang ba'i dmyal ba gang yin pa de dgakyang dro zhing bde ba dang/ reg na bde bar gyur to// tsha ba'i dmyal ba gang yin pa de dag kyang bsil bar gyur cing
reg na bde ba dang/ rab tu dga' bar gyur to// gang yang dud 'gro'i skye gnas su song ba ri dwags dang/ bya dang/ tha na sbrang bu dang/ sha sbrang dag kyang 'od zer des reg pas dud 'gro'i skye gnas
su song ba de dag thams cad dga' ldan du lha rnams kyi nang du skyes so// sems can gang dgabacings par gyur pa de dag kyang 'od zer des reg pas sems can bcings pa las yongs su grol bar gyur
to da su mi 'dod ba dang/ lcags sgrog dang/ lcags kyu lu gu rgyud kyis bcings pa de dag kyang dum bur gyur to// gang snod ma yin pa de'ang 'od zer de phog pas mthong ba yongos su dag pa 'thob po//

gang sha bkra dang mdze'i nad kyis lag pa dang/ rkang ba dang/ rnab dang/ sna ma tshangs kha 'ang 'od zer de phog pas lus yongs su rdzogs pa dang/ lus yongs su dag pa'i gyur to// gang 'bras bu'i shing ljon pa dang/

me tog gi shing ljon pa'i shing ljon pa yongs su bskams par gyur pa'i ng 'od zer de 'og pas me tog dang/ 'dab ma dang/ bras bu byung bar gyur to// sangs rgyas kyi zhing du gtogs pa gang du 'od zer bab pa'i sangs

rgyas kyi zhing du gtogs pa de na yang/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing so so'i de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sa sa rgyas bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag gang+gA'i klung gi bya ma dgu bcu rtsa dgu stod

bzhugs te/ de bzhin gshegs pa so so'i rin po che sna bdun gyi khang pa brtsegs pa'i gzhal med khang dang/ seng ge 'i khri dang bcas pa'i zhal med khang byung bar gyur to// nam mkha'i dkyil gang du 'od
ubla// zer gyi snang bas reg pa'i nam mkha'i dkyil der yang phyogs bcu kun tu rin po che'i rang bzhin gyi sprin brtsegs pas lebs bar gyur te/ lha rdzas kyi nor bu rin po che chen po sna tshog/
kyi skar rab tu 'bab po// lha rdzas kyi rgyan dang/ cod pan dang/ dbung rgyan dang/ gdu bu dang/ do shal dar/ se mo do dang/ rna rgyan dang/ gser gyi skur ba sna tshogs kyi char rab tu 'bab bo//

tshon kha dog rnam pa sna tshogs pa'i lha rdzas kyi gos rmad du byung ba sna tshogs kyi char rab tu 'bab pa// lha rdzas kyi dri sna tshogs kyi char 'ab tu 'bab bo// lha rdzas kyi byug pa sna tshogs kyi char rab tu

'bab po// lha rdzas kyi brtag pa sna tshogs dang tsan dan sprul gyi snying po'i char 'ab tu 'bab po// tshon kha dog sna tshogs pa'i lha rdzas kyi gos dang ba dan sna tshogs kyi tshe'i rab tu 'bab bo// lha rdzas
kyi me tog sna tshogs pad+ma dang/ ku mu dadang/ pad+madakarapo dang/ uts+tshalasngon po dang/ ba sha ka dang/ tsam pa ka dang/ a b+hiyulta ka dang/ aoka dang/ skyesnar dang/ ka rnam pa dang//
man da ra ba dang/ man da ra ba chen po'i me tog ga mar rab tu babs te/ phyogs bcu'idabazhin gshegs pa thamakhacan la mchod pa'i las byed do// bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa'i yang rin po che sna
bdun gyi khang pa rtsegs pa yang dag par gnas par gyur te/ gru bzhi pa ka ba bzhi dang sgo bzhi dang ldan pa/ shin tu 'ba' ba/ lha rdzas kyi me tog sna tshogs lan kan gyis yongs su bskor cing mu/

[z/ ]gi dra ba sna tshogs kyis brgyan pa/ gsangagyi dril u tshog khyadab gos sna tshog kyi 'phrang bas mdzes par byas la/ chu shing gi rgyal mtshan sna tshogs bsgreng ba/ nor bu rin po che sna tshogs bkram pa/ grwar lha rdzas kyi sngayab
sna tshogs kyis mdzes par byas pa/ go skabs rgya chapa'i 'khor gyidakyil 'khor chen po 'byung zhing snang ngo// nam mkha'i dkyil na'ang lha rnams lha rdzas kyi me tog dang/ bdug spos dang/ dri dang/
'phreng ba dang/ byug pa dang/ phyi ma dang/ thos gos dang/ gdugs dang/ rgyal mtshan dang/ ba dan dang/ rol mo'i sgra sna tshogs dang/ sil snyan dang/ pheg rdog pas bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa

byed cing 'khod do// de ltar don yod pa'i cho 'phrul gyi rnam par 'phrul pa'i byin gyis brlabs rmad du byung ba chen po'i chen po rab tu bstan cing ya mtshan rmad du byung ba'i rdzu 'phrul gyi rnam par 'phrul pa chen
po'i chen po sngar bstan to// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyag gis rdzu 'phrul gyi rnam par 'phrul ba'i cho 'phrul 'di bstan nas rnam par 'phrul
pa'i bkod pa chen pos rang gi stan las langs te/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su song su phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das la lan brgya stong dum bskor ba byas nas/ bcom ldan 'das la mngon sum
du bltas nas bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar ti/ pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs nas/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad
'khru// ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag la don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po rnam par thar pa'i dkyil 'khor byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyis phyag bgyis pa/
phyag rgya dang dkyil 'khor rim par phye ba/ gsang sngags kyi snying po gsang ba/ rig sngags kyi rgyal po chen po bdag gi snying po gsang ba/ rig sngags kyi rgyal po don yod ba'i lcags kyu dang//
don yod pa'i khro ci'i lcags kyu dang/ rig sngags kyi rgyal po don yod par 'dren pa/ nor bu rin po che chen po gsum mchis te/ bcom ldan 'das bdag gis de bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'khor

mang po'i nang du yongs su bsgrags par bgyi'o// gang gis dran pa tsam gyis don yod la snying po'i cho ga zhib mo phyag rgya dang/ dkyil 'khor dang/ gsang sngags dang/ cho ga rim par phye ba mtha' dag/
@ rdzogs par mngon du gnas par 'gyur te/ thams cad som nyi'i gnas so// gsang sngags 'dis gzer bas thamA na tu mngon tu gnas so// de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pas byang chub sems dang 'a

dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la legs so zhes bya ba byin te/ sems can dag pa chen po khyod kyis spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi snying po rig sngags kyi rgyal bo don yod pa'i lcags kyu

smras pa legs so legs so// rig sngags 'chang thams cad kyi don dang sems can thams cad kyi don chen po'i phyir sems can dag pa chen po khyed kyis de'i dus la bab par sha na da smos shig/ ri rnam byang thub
sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan 2sa gzigs dbang phyug gis/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bskul ba zhig nas bzhin 'dzum zhing mig mi 'dzums par bcom ldan 'das ga la ba logs su mngon
du phyogs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'khor mang po'i nang du 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyag gis snying po'i lcags kyu don yod pa'i zhags pa 'di smras so// dus gsum du gshegs shing so
son bzhugs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa dang/ byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo// 'phags pa rdo rje'adzin rig sngags kyi dbang po chen po 'khor gyi tshogs dang bcas pa la phyag 'tshal lo//

dkyil 'khor gyi rig sngags kyi lha thams cad dang/ phyag rgya dang/ gsang sngags rim par phye ba dang/ cho ga zhib mo thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo// rang sangs rgyas dang 'phags pa nyan thos kyi dgo 'dun
'das pa dang/ ma byon pa dang/ da ltar byung ba thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo// 'phags pa byams pa la sogs pa dga' ldan gyi byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'khor gyi tshogs la phyag 'tshal
lo/ 'phags pa de bzhin gshegs pa 'od dpag med bde ba can n gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' chen po'i dkyil 'khor gyi tshogs la phyag 'tshal lo// phyogs bcu mtha' yas mu med pa'i 'jig rten gyi khamu
kyi de bzhin gshegs pa dang/ dkyil 'khor gsang ba dang/ gsang sngags dang/ phyag rgya rim par phye ba cho ga zhib mo dang bcas pa thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo// dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo//
byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po snying rje chen po dang ldan pa 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug rig sngags dang/ dkyil 'khor thams cad kyi sku sems can thams cad l
byams ba kun nas don yod pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi rig sngags kyi rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo// bgegs dang/ log 'dren dang/ snang ba dang/ bdud la sogs pa thams cad 'ab tu zhi ba'i mdzad pa'i sems dpa'i

[。/ ]chen po mchog sbyin lcags kyu la phyag 'tshal lo// tad+ya thA/ oM Akar ya/ pad+mahan/ ma ta a mo g+ha aM kusha/ tsa ra tsa ra/ tsatsa'/ suny+tsa'/ sa man+tan/ ma hA pA sha/ aM ku sha b+hu dza ba ra

'tshe da b+hu dza aM ku sha pA sha rta ra b+ha ra d+har/ sa man mu dra/ man+tA maN+Da la/ pa Ta la d+har aM ku sha/ mAsha na/ d+ha ra ya[%% ]/ mahA brah+pha/ be Sha d+ha ra a mo g+ha rU pa/ aM ku sha d+ha 'a/ ta ra ta ra/
ta te ra/ sa lamArA ya/ ma hA mu dA/ maN+Da la/ a mo g+ha aM ku sha ba ra d+ha/ mahA kA ru Ni ka/ tre lo can/ pashu pa ti/ ba rAb+ha ra/ A shwa ra/ ma he shwa ra/ pa ra ma kA ru Ni ka/ ma hA b+hU ti/
shwa ra ya ma ba ru Na/ na mas+sI ta/ ku mA ra/ dra lokya ba ra da ma hA kasha ma ka/ nAs ka/ 2kA ka/ mahA bicu/ a mo g+ha/ maN+Dal/ pU dzi ta/ rat+tamu ku Ta/ mA wat+ta ra/ d+hu ru d+hu ru/ matA

aM ku sha ak+Sha d+har hU~MhU~M/ b+ha ra b+ha ra/ saM b+ha ra saM b+ha ra/ sa man+ta mu rA/ man tA la maN+Da laM pur ya/ hUM hU~M/ hUM da ya aM ku shi/ a ba lo ka ya/ mAn sA d+ha ya sid rtir/ a karA ya/ mu dra

many+tsa/ maNA la/ pa Ta lam/ sa ma ya/ bag+hAn pra sku d+ha ya mA raM/ ha ra ha ra/ sarbapa pa kilci 'a ma la/ mAd sa// tu ru tu ru/ ma h+pha aM ku shi/ hU~M hU~M but+taM bud+d+haM/ bo d+ha ya bo d+ha ya/ tu ru tu ru

ma hA bo d+hi sa tra aM ku sha rat+napa sha d+ha 'a/ nAnA tsi tsi tra/ A b+ha ra Nab grwa'i ta/ a mi tA b+hU/ dzin mu ku Ta b+har/ d+ha ra d+ha ra/ pad+ma pA sha aM ku sha b+ha'/ sarbabatsu mu wA maN+Dal/ pra ba ra sA d+ha

ya sA d+ha ya/ bi shwa rU pa b+ha ra/ sa ha sra b+hu dza/ su ha sra ni tra/ so mya mu pA ra ma kA ru Nika sarba btus la/ sarba man mu drupra sa ha ka ma hAb ra da sat+pa na mosU te/ a mo g+ha aM ku sha/ pad+mab+hu dza/
mAhA/ byang chub semo dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis 'di smos ma thag tu ri bo po Ta la chen po brag dang/ nags tshal dang/ skyed mos tshal du bcas pa'i

gnas kyi gzhal med khang rnam pa drug tu wal tu g.yos te/ lha rdzas kyi me tog gi char chen po 'bab po/ don yod pa'i zhag pa'i snying po byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyis phyag byas pa/ rnam par thal/
pa'i dkyil 'khor phyagargya dang gsang sngags dang bcas pa'i dkyil 'khor rim par phye ba'i cho ga zhib mo 'di'ang so sor le'ur phyo ba mtha' dag rdzogs par nam mkha' la gnas so// gang gsang sngag+ha
kyi yi ka 'bru'ang gser la bi cha sa yi ger bris pa sbyin gyi rim pa na snang ste// yi ge'i phreng ba mnyam zhing gsal la zur phyin par bris ba/ thig gi 'phreng ba gshabs pas brgyan pa snang ngo//
gang lag pa'i phyag rgya'ang pad+ma'i nang nas byung/ phyag rgya bcing ba sna tshogs 'od zer 'bar ba nam mkha' la gnas so// gang mtshan ma'i phyag rgya rang rin po che sna bdun/
gyi pad+ma la rab tu gnas pa nam mkha' la gnas par gyur to// gar ras kyi ri mo'i sku gzugs rnam pa sna tshogs 'dzin pa/ rnam par bkra ba/ rma ga dang yo byad dang bcas ba rim par phye ba/
bris pa'i ng nam mkha' la gnas so// gang dkyil 'khor rim par phye ba de dkyil 'khor rnam pa sna tshogs gru bzhi ba/ grwa bzhi cha mnyam pa/ rnam par phye ba/ dkyil 'khor shin tu smras
shung pa rgyan ba/ gzugs rnam pa sna tshogs kyis mdzes pa'i gzhal med khang yang nam mkha' la gnas pa'o// dkyil 'khor chen po na gnas pa'i ltas/sngags kyi lha pho nya dang/ khro ba dang
bcas pa gzhal med khang na rjes su rgyu ba dag kyang nam mkha'i dkyil na gnas te/ bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa byed do// phyogs so so'i de bzhin gshegs pa mang po bye ba khrag khrig brgya
stong ga 'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyang phyogs bcu kun gyi nam mkha'i dkyil na de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku bzhugs par gyur to// de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku de dag thams cad kyis kyang/ byang chub
sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la legs so zhes bya ba byin te/ spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug legs so legs so// rig sngags kyi mchog
[rs/ ]dam pa/ don yod pa'i lcags kyu'i rigalcags kyi rgyal po mtha' dag rdzogs par smras pa/ gang ges don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po rnam par thar pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga zhib mor gsang
sngags dang/ phyag rgya dang/ gsang lcags rim par phye ba de dag thams can don yod pa'i lcags kyu'i gsang sngags kyi zhags pas kun nas drangs so// 'khor 'di'i nang na nam mkha'i dkyil na
rab tu gnas pa de phyi ma'i tshe phyi ma'i dus rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo 'am/ dge slong ngam/ dge slong ma 'am/ dge bsnyen nam/ dge bsnyen ma 'am/ dge sbyong ngam/ bram ze 'am/
rgyala'ags sam/ rje'u rigs sam/ dmangs rigs sam/ gzhan su'ang rung ba bud med num/ skyes la 'am/ khye'u 'am/ bu mo rig sngags 'dzin pa thams cad kyis don yod pa'i zhags
pa'i lcags kyu'aphags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi snying bo 'i gzungs 'di dran par byed na/ lan cig dran pa tsam gyis kyang mod la don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po byang chub sems dab 'a
thums cad kyis phyag byas pa/ 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi snying po rnam pa la thar pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi phyag rgya dang/ gsang sngags dang/ dkyil 'khor rim par phye ba dang/ tshog
zhib mo de thams cad so sor de la kha ton nyid du gnas te/ de dag thams cad rim gyis dran pa dang/ blo rgya mtsho bsags pa dang/ shes rab 'phel bar 'gyur ro// gsang sngags dang/ phyag
dang/ gsang sngags rim par phye ba so so la blo 'jug par 'gyu'o// nam yang blo dman par mi 'gyur zhing/ nam yang brjed sa par mi 'gyur ro// de nas bcom ldan 'das
ri bzhin gshegs pa shAkya nyug pas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la legs so zhes bya ba byin te/ mchog chen po sbyin pa/ lag na pad+ma mchog tu

snying rje can khyod kyis cho ga rgya chen po smras pa legs so legs so// de nas gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po phyag na rdo rjes rdzu 'phrul gyi rnam bar 'phrul pa'i cho 'phrul gyi yon tan mtha' yas pa 'di mthong nas
dbugs cher 'byin par gyur cing mchog tu dga' ba thob po// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis/ bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'khor

'di'i nang du 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi snying po don yod pa'i lcags kyu'i zhags pa zhes bya ba'i yo byad dang cho ga bshad do// bcom ldan 'das de nas rig sngags 'chang gang 'phags pa spyan

ras gzigs dbang phyug gi snyang po don yod pa'i zhagos pa'i byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyis phyag bgyis pa/ rnam par thar pa'i dkyil 'khor 'di sgrub par 'tshal ba dang/ gang yang rigs kyi bu 'am/ 'a/
a kyi bu mo 'am/ dge slong pha 'am/ dge slong ma 'am/ dge bsnyen nam/ dge bsnyen ma 'am/ dge sbyong ngam/ bram ze 'am/ rgyal rigs sam/ rje'u rigs sam/ dmangs rigs sam/ gzhan su'ang
rung ba bud med dam/ skyes ba 'am/ khye'u'am/ bu mo don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po 'di bklag nga' 'tshal pha dang/ bstan par 'tshal ba dang/ bzlas brjod kyi cho ga bgyi bar 'tshal dang/ mtha'adag/

rdzogs par bsgrub par 'tshal ba des sngon rol tu phyogs bcur thal mo sbyar te phyag 'tshal nas shar phyogs su kha bltas te mchis la/ gzhan mi smra bar don yod pa'i lcags kyu'i snying po 'di lan gsum dran
par bgyi zhing/ yang thal mo sbyar te phyag bgyi'o// des na dran pa tsam kyis mod la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug bkug par 'gyur te/ ri po Ta la'i
gzhal med khang dang bcas ba dang/ 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor dang/ lha dang/ klu dang/ gnod sbyin dang/ dri za dang/ lha ma yin dang/ nam mkha' lding dang/ mi 'am ci dang/ lto 'phye chen po dang bcas
pa bkug par 'gyur ro///'phags pa don yod pa'i zhags pa'i cho ga zhib mo'i rgyal po bam po nyi shu gnyis pa// don yod pa'i zhags pa'i

snying po byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyis phyag bgyis pa// rnam par thar pa'i dkyil 'khor phyag rgya dang bcas pa gsang sngags rim par phye ba'i cho ga zhib mo dang/ sgrub pa'i rmaga'i rnam pa rgya chen
po mtha' dag rdzogs pa 'di'ang bkug par 'gyur ro// dkyil 'khor na gnas pa'i rigs kyi lha 'khor dang bcas bkug par 'gyur te/ thams cad yid rab tu dga' gyur pas dngos grub dam pa rjes
su stsol bar 'gyur ro// de nas don yod pa'i rgyal po'i snying bo dran par bgyi ste/ ji ltar shin tu rgya cher yid la bgyis pa de ltar bsgrub par 'gyur ro// 'phags pa spyan ras

gzigs dbang phyug nyid kyi kha nas dran pa mnyan zhing rgya che ba dang/ blo dang mdangs dri mamachis par 'jug par bgyid de/ zhugs pa tsam gyis mod la rtswa pad+ma'i dab ma lta bur 'dzam pa' gyur cang/
kha nas ut+pala'i dri 'byung bar 'gyur ro// dbyas snyan cing gnyen pa dang/ 'jam pa dang/ zag pa dang/ tshig rnam par dag par 'gyur ro// mi 'am ru'i dbyangs dang/ sgra snyan pa dang/
dbyangs mnyen pa dang/ dga' bar byed pa'i dbyangs su 'gyur zhing/ ka la ping ka'i dbyangs su 'gyur ro// cis dus gsum du lan gsum du dran par bgyid na/ gsang sngags dang/ cho ga zhib

mo dang/ dkyil 'khor dang/ phyag rgya rim par phye ba dang/ cho ga thams cad dang/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rigs spyi'i dngos grub de rdzogs par 'gyur zhing spyod pa de 'gyur ro// bgegs dang/ 'og khyen/
dang/ bdud lasogs pa snang ba'i 'jigs pa thams cad dang bral bar 'gyur ro// sngon gyi sgrub pa dang dmyal bang 'chi ba'i sdig pa thams cad dang bral bar 'gyur 'o// 'phags pa spyan ras
gzigs dbang phyag gi snying po rig sngags kyi rgyal po chen po don yod pa'i lcags kyu 'di lan gsum dran par bgyis pa tsam gyis skad cig de nyid kyi med la bdag 'ang dang/ rang gi gnas kyi khang
pa dang/ slob ma dang/ bsnyen bkur dang/ 'khor dang bcas pa mi gtsang ba'ang gtsang bar 'gyur/ yongs su ma dag pa'i ng shin tu yongs su dag par 'gyur ro// dri ma dang bcas pa'i ng
shin tu dri ma mchis par 'gyur ro// zhi snang dang bcas pa'i ng zhe sdang dang bral bar 'gyur ro// gti mug dang bcas pa'i ng gti mug dang bral bar 'gyur ro// 'dod chags dang bcas pa'i ng
