'dod chags dang bral bar 'gyur ro// sgrib pa dang bcas pa'i sgrib pa dang bral bar 'gyur ro// bgags dang bcas pa dang/ bdud dang log 'dren gyis yongs su zin nga 'ang bgegs dang/
log 'dren dang/ bdud la sogs pa dang bral bar 'gyur ro// sems kyi sdig pa 'ang sdig pa dang bral bar 'gyur// thun mong ma yin pa'i ng thun mong du gyur cing bsrungs par 'gyur ro//
mi smra ba'i brtul zhugatsam mchis pa'i ng mi smra ba'i brtul zhugs chen po dang ldan par 'gyura'o// sgyur ba ma bgyis pa'i ng skyang du bgyis par 'gyur 'o// rig sngags kyi gnas dang/ yul dang/
dkyil 'khor thams cad du tshangs par mi spyod pa'i ng tshangs par spyod pa chen po'i 'gyur// tshangs pa'i gnas chen po la gonas par 'gyur ro// dge ba mi spyod pa'i ng dge ba chen po dang ldan pa'/
'gyur ro// chos mi spyod pa'i ng chos spyod pa chen po dang ldan par 'gyura'o// bsod nams mi bgyid pa'i ng bsod nams kyi phung po chen po 'phel bar 'gyura'o// dul ba'i spyod pa ma mchis
bya@#// pa'i ng rtul ba'i spyod pa chen po dang ldan par 'gyur ro// dkyil 'khor dang/ phyag rgya dang/ gsang sngags ma mthong ba dang/ dam tshigs ma mchis pa'i ng dkyil
ba 'khor dang/ phyag rgya dang/ gsang sngags mthong ba dang/ dam tshig 'tshal par 'gyur 'o// rig sngags kyi gzhas dang/ 'khor thams cad du sangs rgyas dang chos mthong bar mi
'tshal ba'ang byang chub dang/ chos dang/ dam tshig dang ldan par 'gyur ro// byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyis ma bsams pa'i ng byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyis bsams

par 'gyur ro// sangs rgyas kyi sa bon gyi yul du ma gyur pa'i ng byang chub kyi sa bon dang ldan par 'gyur 'o// pha rol tu phyin pa drug gi spyod pa dang mi 'bral zhing pha rol tu phyin pa drug yod+ma
su rdzogs par bgyi ba la mkhas par 'gyur ro// tshul khrims dang mi 'bral zhing ting nge 'dzin rab tu 'thob par 'gyur ro// sbyin pa dang yongs su gtong ba dang ma 'bral zhing sbyin pa dang/
yongs su gtong ba dang/ sbyin pa'i tshogs chen po dang ldan par 'gyur ro// bzod pa dang mi bral zhing bzod pa chen po'i bzod pa'i rjes su spyod par 'gyula'o// brtson 'grus dang mi 'bral zhing brtson
'grus kyi stobs chen po 'ig mabartan pa bgos par 'gyur ro// bsam gtan dang mi 'bral zhing bsam gtan chen po 'thob pa dang ting nge 'dzin dang ldan par 'gyur ro// shes rab dang thabs
la mkhas pa chen por 'gyur ro// rig sngags dang gsang sngags nyams pa'i ng gsang sngags dang/ phyag rgya yongs su tshang ba dang/ cho ga la mkhas pa' 'gyur// dge ba'i gshes gnyen dang
bral ba'ang dge ba'i bshes gnyen chen po'i lam la'ab tu gnas par 'grub par 'gyur// 'jig rten thams cad du snying du skug pa dang bla ma' bgyis pa'i 'gyur ro// sems can thams
cad kyis mchod pa dang mngon du phyag bgyi bar 'gyur ro// tshig btsun par yang 'gyur 'o// bsam kha yongs su dag pa la yang 'gyur ro// de ltar don yod pa chen po'i cho ga rgya chen po 'di dag
na thams cad du dngos grub don yod pa/ mchog tu nyin par dka' ba/ dge ba don yod pa 'di don yod pa'i lcags kyus 'dren par bgyid do// dngos grub thams cad 'gugs par bgyid do//
sgrub pa thams cad 'dren par bgyid do// sangs rgyas kyi chos rje snyed pa de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bsu dang/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad dang/ mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang/
'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad dang de bzhin nyid dang/ yang dag pa'i mtha' dang/ don dam pa dang/ stong pa nyid 'dren par bgyid de/ don yod pa'i lcags kyu 'dis 'dren par bgyid/
yang saya par bgyid/ dngos grub mchog 'dren par bgyid do// de ltar mthu che ba dang/ phan yon che ba dang/ yon tan chen por brjod pas/ bsod nams kyi 'bras bu chen po snyol bar bgyid do//
'a@#// de ltar dge ba'i rtsa ba chen po dang ldan zhing kun tu sogs par 'gyur pas rig sngags kyi rgyal po don yod pa'i lcags kyu/ 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi
snying po ni mchog tu grub pa bla na med pa lags so// de nas rig sngags 'chang rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo 'am/ dge slong ngam/ dge slong ma 'am/ dge bsnyen nam/ dge
wA bsnyen ma 'am/ dag sbyong ngamA/ bram ze 'am/ rgyal rigs sam/ rje'u rigs sam/ dmangs rigs sam/ gzhan su'ang rung ba/ bud med dam/ skyes pa 'am/ khye'u 'am/
bu mo 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug rang gi gzugs kyis gug par 'tshal ba dang/ 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug bdag nyid kyi rang gi gzugs su mthong bar 'tshal
na des chog 'di bgyi'o// gtsang ma shin tu khrus bgyis pa/ gos gtsang ma bgos pa/ ba rnam lnga'i chus bsang pa'i mchod phyir thogs btags pas sa dmar po'i skud pa'i mchod
phyir thogs kha dog bzang po gnas bdun du yongs su bzung ste/ 'tshogs ma dang spyi gtsug bcing pa dang/ gnas gsum po dpung pa gnyis su bcing ba dang/ lag ngar gnyis su
bcing ba dang/ de nas skyed par bcings bas sa phyogs gtsang mar 'jug nas sa ma/ gnas gzhan gang yang rung ba dben zhing 'khrugs pa ma mchis pa dang/ dkyil 'khor gyi stags gru

0 bzhi ba shin tu rnam par 'byes pa/ 2 khru bzhi'i tshad tsam pa la 'phang sor brgyad kyi tshad tsam kun nas zlum po legs par byugs pa shin tu 'jam par bgyi'o// de nas tshon sna tshogs kyi skud pa rnam pa'/
'byas par thig gdab cing tshan tsi sna tshogs kyis bris par bgyi'o// snying po'i dkyil 'khor ni khru gang tsam gyi tshad la gru bzhi pa/ rnam par phye ba/ shin tu mdzes pa/ gru bzhi kun nas kha khyer

gyi rnam pa can bgyi'o// dbus su pad+ma bgyi ste/ 'dab ma brgya rtsa brgyad pa/ 'dabu ma thams cad la lcags kyu bri zhing/ dbus kyi snying po ge sar dang bcas pa rin po che sna tshogs kyis brgyan par gyis/

'od kyi 'phreng ba zlum po tshon rtsi sna tshogs kyi rnam par 'byes par bgyi'o// snying po'i dkyil 'khor kyi grwa bzhir lcags kyu dang zhags pa kun nas zlum po'ang bgyi'o// phyi rol gyidakyil 'khor kun tu tshan

ma'i phyag rgya sna tshogs kyang gri par bgyi'o// dkyil 'khor gyi grwa bzhi rnam par phye bar rgyal po chen po bzhi 'bar ba'i nang na go cha bgos pa/ drag shul gyi gzugs can 'jigs par bgyid pa bri'o//

sgo bzhi rnam par phye bar yang dkyil 'khor gyi lha bri bar bgyi ste/ shar phyogs kyi sgor rdo rje 'acung zhi ba'i gzugs can/ bzhin 'dzum pa/ rdo rje 'gying bag can du 'dzin pa/ ri'ab kyi steng na 'bar
ba'i nang na mchis pa bri'o// lho phyogs kyi sgor khro ba'i rgyal po drag shul gyi gzugs can/ 'jigs par bgyid pa/ pad+madang zhags pa thogs pa/ me tog kha phye ba'i stengan 'bar ba'i nang na mchis
u/ pa'o nub phyogs kyi sgor dbang po rje rje thogs pa/ mig gsum pa/ ri'i steng na 'bar ba'i nang na mchis pa bri'o// byang phyogs kyi skor don yod pa'i zhags pa gdeng
khro gnyer can/ pad+madang zhags pa thogs pa/ pad+ma'i 'dab ma'i steng na 'bar ba'i nang na lcags kyu dang lhan cig mchis pa bri'o// dkyil 'khor lo ra khor yug cu gos dang/ ba dan dang/ mda'
dang rgyal mtshan kun kyis brgyan pa bgyi'o// tshon sna lnga'i skud pas kho ra khor yug tu dkris par bgyi'o// gtor ma thams can dkar po gzhag go/ dkyil 'khor gyi phyi rol kun tu dngul
dang gser gyi snod rnam pa sna tshogs pa gzhag go/ snying pa'i dkyil 'khorakhor khor yug tudangul gyi snod bkang ba bzhi dang/ 'o mas bkang pa bzhi dang/ mchod lon dang/ zhabs bsil gyis
bkang ba'i snod bzhi dang/ dri'i snod bzhi dang/ dris bkang ba'i snod bzhi dang/ dngul gyi pog por a ka ru nang/ tsan dan dang/ du 'u ka'i bdug lcos bsregs pa bzhi gzhag go/ phyi rol
gyi dkyil 'khor lo rakhor yug tu sa la byas pa'i snod bkang ba dang/ gtor ma'isnod bum pa yongs su bkang ba drug cu rtsa bzhi dang/ bdug pa sna tshogs bsregs pa'i pog por brgyad 'jigs pa med
par gzhag par bgyi'o// de nas rig sngags 'chang gis tshes bcu bzhi nas zla ba nya ba'i tshes bco lnga'i bar gyi nyin zhag gcig smyung ba bgyis pas/ 'bras yos dang yungs karal don yod pa'i

rgyal po'i snying pos lan brgya rtsa brgyud yongs su bzlas pas dkyil 'khor du gtor bar bgyi'o// yus kaT dang dri chab la khro ba'i rgyal bos lan brgya rtsa brgyad yongs su bzlas pas dkyil 'khor kun tu

gtol zhing dkyil 'khor dbang bskur bar bgyi'o// dkyil 'khor gyi phyi rol tu mar me drug su rtsa bzhi pa'i bar bgyi'o// me tog ji snyed pa mang po dgram zhing kho ra khor yug 'phreng ba gzhag khagabagyi'o/
rig sngags 'chang gis don yod pa'i lcags kyus yus kar la lan nyi shu rtsa gcig yongs su bzlas pas dkyil 'khor kun dang/ phyogs bzhi dang/ stong dang/ 'og tugatogan dkyil 'khor
ba bgyis par 'gyur ro// phyogs bcing ba dang/ sbyigatsugabacing ba dang/ bdag bsrung ba bgyis par 'gyur ro// bgags dang/ log 'dren dang/ 'byung po dang/ gnod sbyin dang/ srin
po dang/ bdud la sogs pa thams cad bcings pa 'gyur ro// lta dang ku dang/ gnod sbyin dang/ dri za dang/ lha ma yin dang/ nam mkha' lding dang/ mi 'am cirang/ lto 'phya chen po gang
dag mthong ba/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i bslab pa'i gzhi'adzin pa de dag thams cad bkug bar 'gyur 'o// dkyil 'khor kun nas bsrung ba'i slad du gshin rje dang/ chu lha dang/ gzhon nu dang/
kyi bar dang/ rgyal bon po ba'i dbung dang 'khor dang bcasal/ lcags kyu dang zhags pas bkug par 'gyur te/ dkyil 'khor kun nas srung ba dang/ skyab pa dang/ sba ba bgyid bar 'gyur ro/
'og gi sa'i lha mo sa'i 'ogan gnas pa rnams dang lhan cig dkyil 'khor bsrung ba dang/ bskyab pa dang/ smra ba'i smad du mchis par 'gyur ro// steng nas nam mkha' la
sba tshangs pa dang/ khyab 'jug dang/ dbang phyug chen po dang/ brgya byin dang/ mtshan mo'i lha dang/ nyi ma dang/ zla ba rgyu skar dang bcas par bsrung ba dang/ bskyab pa dang/ sba ba bgyis pa'
'gyuba'o// de nas rig sngags 'chang gis phyis bgyi ba'i las bgyi// gasngags 'chang gis rtswa ku sha'i bam po'i steng du shar phyogs kyi skor dkyil 'khor la mngon du phyogs par skyil mo
krung bcas te mchis la/ gzhan mi sna bar don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po lan brgya rtsa brgyud yongs su bzlas pa bgyis la/ dkyil 'khor gyi snying por 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang
phyug gzhag par bgyi zhing/ me tog re ra la bzlas brjod bgyis pas 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi mdun du do' shar bgyi'o// de nas khro bo'i rgyal pos yungasakar gyi 'bru re re la
lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod bgyis pas gtor bar bgyi'o// de nas 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi snying po don yod pa'i zhags pa'i lcags kyus bzlas brjod stong rtsa brgyad bgyis
pas dbul bar bgyi'o// la bu'i stel bzlas brjod bgyis pa'i bdug spos dbul bar bgyi'o/ yungs kong re re la bzlas brjod bgyis la/ snying po'i dkyil 'khor gyi stang du dor bar
bgyi'o// stong rtsa brgyad rdzogs pa dang/ thun tha ma'i nam nas kar gya nom pa/ yid du 'ong zhing dga' ba dang/ rab tu dga' bar bgyid par sa g.yo bar 'gyur zhing/ sgra mnyan pa dang/
snyan cing 'jebs pa dang/ yid du 'ong ba zab mo zab mo dang/ ka la bing ka dang/ mi 'am ci'i sgra dbyangs lta bu 'byung bar 'gyur te/ rig sngags 'chang gis sems brtan por bgyi zhing
mchog tu dga' ba yid la bgyid pas bzlas brjod bgyi'o// de nas dkyil 'khor gyi snying po nas 'od zer rnam pa sna tshogs mang po 'byung zhing phyogs dang phyogs mtshams kun tu m zhing snang
bur 'gyur te/ nam mkha'i dkyil na sprin brtsegs pa'i phung po bzhin du 'od zer gyi gdugs su gyur nas gnas par 'gyur ro// de nas sngon ma byung ba'i dri zhim po rmad du byung ba 'byung bar 'gyur

zhing lha'i tsan dan dang/ gor shi sha'i tsan dan dang/ tsan dan sbrul gyi snying po dang/ ga pur dang/ gla rtsi'i dri 'byung ste/ dpag tshad brgya khe ra khor yug tu dri gnas par 'gyur ro// lha rdzas kyi 'dug

sngos kyi dri zhim po sngonam byung ba rmad du byung ba bit+ta sngon po'i sprin brtsegs pa lta bu'i bdug spos kyi sprin nam mkha'i dkyil na gnas par yang 'gyur te/ phyogs bcu kun tu bdug spos kyi dri rgyas
par 'gyur ro// de nas snying po'i dkyil 'khor gyi dbus nas 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug bdag nyid kyi rang gi gzugs kyis 'byung bar 'gyur te/ tshas pa bzang po'i malugs
ka @#// can/ ral pa'i thor tshugs kyis brgyan pa// don yod pa'i zhags pa'i gzugs lag pa bzhi ba/ pad+madang zhags pa thogs pa// rgyal ba 'od dpag tu med pa'i dbu rgyan can/
dbu rgyan zla ba tshes pas brgyan pa/ mdung rtse gsum pa thogs shing dbugs 'byin pa/ rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa/ mtshan dang dpe byad bzang pos lus brgyan pa/ rang gi 'od dang gzi brjid
kyis shin tu 'bur ba/ bzhin 'dzum zhing nyi ma stong bas lhag pa'i 'od zer gyi snang ba dang ldan pa/ khru brgyad tsam gyi bzang pos dkyil 'khor gyi snying po'i pad+ma'i stan las langs te/ nam mkha'
la mchis nas zhi ba'i gzugs can/ byams pa'i sems dang snying rdzachen po yid la bgyis pas dkyil 'khor kun tu lta zhing phyogs bcur rtog par bgyid do// de nas rig sngags 'chang la legawa
so zhes bya ba'i sgra 'byung ste/ rig sngags 'chang chen po legs so legs so// lag pa g.yas pa brkyang ba'i lag mthil shin tu bzang po 'od zer bya ba brgya stong phrag stong gis legs par
brgyan pa'i lag pa rig sngags 'chang gi spyi bor 'jog par 'gyur 'o// 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi lag pa spyi bor bzhag ma thag tu/ de nas rig sngags 'chang de nam mkha'
la mchis te/ don yod pa'i zhags pa dang lcags kyu rgya chen po'i 'od zer snang ba bkod pa rnam par 'phrul pa zhes bya ba sgyu ma lta bu'i shugs kyi dkyil 'khor zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin thob ste//

[5 ]ting nge 'dzin gzhan yang bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong gi bye ma snyed 'thob po// kun tu don yod par lta ba nor bu'i snying po rgya chen por grags pa don yod pa'i lcags kyu'i gzungs 'phags pa spyan ras
gzigs dbang phyug gi snying po'i gzus 'thob par 'gyur te/ gang gis gzungs thob pa'i mod la don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po'i phyag rgya dang/ gsang sngags rim par phye ba'i cho ga zhib mo

byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyis phyag bgyis pa/ rnam par thar pa'i dkyil 'khor mtha' dag rdzogrwapa kha ton nyid du gnas so// gzhan yang pad+ma rgya chen po'i dkyil 'khor mtha' dag dang/ rdo rje'i/
rigs dang/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs dang/ nor bu'i rigs dang/ glang po che'i rig pa dang/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rigs kyi dam tshig dang/ gsang ba chen po'i snying po dang//

phyag rgya dang bcas pa'i gsang sngags rim par phye ba gsang ba dang/ cho ga zhib mo'i rnam pa thams cad ba rten nyid du gnas so// rig sngags 'chang gi 'khor los sgyur ba bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag
gang+ga'i klung gi bye ma dgu bcu rtsa gnyis pa rnams kyi gtso bo dang/ mchog dang/ rigasngags 'chang gi 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal por 'gyur ro// de nas 'phagos spyan ras gzigs dbang
phyug gis/ rig sngags 'chang de la smras pa/ ga sngags 'chang ji ltar yid la byed pa dang bsam pa smos shig dang/ marnyog de thams cad rjes su sbyin par bya'o// de nas rig sngags 'chang
gis ji ltar yid la bsams pa dang/ mchog mngon par 'dod pa de thams cad smra zhing/ mchog yid la re ba thams cad byin par 'gyur ro// gzhan yang 'jig rten pa
dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i dgos pa sna tshogs da ltar 'byung ba rnams smra zhing/ 'das pa dang/ ma 'ongs pa dang/ da ltar byung bskya'o// lo legs pa dang/ lo nyes pa dang/ bde ba dang
nad dang 2 'jigs pa dang/ lhag par 'jigs pa dang/ pho rol gyi dmag tshogs daN/ rang gi dmag tshogs dang/ phyir rgol ba dang/ dgra bo dang/ yams kyi nad dang/ mi sa dang/
gnod pa dang/ nad 'go ba dang/ 'tsho ba dang/ gza' 'thab pa dang/ 'thab mo dang/ rtsod pa dang/ mtshang 'bru ba dang/ 'gyed pa dang/ g.yul 'gyen pa dang/ char ches pa dang/ char
dkon pa dang/ dus ma yin pa'i char dang/ tshe ring ba dang/ tshe thung ba dang/ tshe yongs su zad pa dang/ dus ma yin par 'chib dang/ 'byor pa dang/ rgud pa dang/ dge ba dang/ mi dge
ba dang/ skye ba dang/ 'gag pa dang/ 'grub pa dang/ mi 'grub pa dang/ bgegs dang/ bgags med pa dang/ bdud kyi bar chad dang/ 'bru 'phel ba dang/ nor 'phel ba dang/
nad mang ba dang/ nad dang bral bar 'gyur ba gang yin pa de thams cad byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug rig sngags 'chang la sku bar
'gyura'o// sems can dmyal ba dang/ yi dwags dang/ lha ma yin gyi 'jig rten dang/ gnod sbyin dang/ srin po dang/ 'byung po dang/ sha za dang/ grul bum dang/ mi 'am/
ci dang/ lto 'phye chen po dang/ mi dang/ mi ma yin pa dang/ dud 'gro'i skye gnas pa dri dgas dang bya'i skye ba dang 'chi ba de dag thams cad phyin ci ma log par smra zhing/ de dag gi thabs
thams cad kyang ston par 'gyur ro// lhar skye ba dang/ klur skya ba dang/ sas rgyas kyi zhing du 'gro zhing skya ba dang/ rgyal po nyid dang/ bud med dang/ skyes pa nyid dang/ bu rnyed pa de
dag thams cad skya bar 'gyur 'o// bram ze'i rigs su skye ba dang/ rgyal rigs su skye ba dang/ khyim bdag gi rigs shing sA la chen po lta bu'i skye ba de thams cad smra bar 'gyur ro//
grazhan yang rigs mthon po dang/ dma' ba dang/ smad pa'i rigs su skye ba sna tshogs de dag thams cad ston cing smra la/thabs kyang ston par 'gyur ro// de nas rigasngags 'chang gis
ji ltar bsams pa'i donod thams cad 'phags pa spyana'as gzigs dbang phyug dang mngon sum du smra zhing thams cad gtam zer 'o// gzhan yang 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug
gis 'jig rten pa'i mchog sna tshogs dang/ sgrub pa dang/ grub pa de thams cad de la stsol bar bgyid de/ 'di lta ste/ nor bsgyur ba smra ba dang/ zhing smra ba dang/ mig sman gyi dngos
grub dang/ mi snang ba dang/ mig 'phrul dang/ gter skya ba dang/ phug tu 'jug pa dang/ nags su 'jug pa dang/ spo ba dang/ dbang du bya ba dang/ dbab pa dang/
ro las bslang pa dang/ nad zhi bar bya ba dang/ gos 'thob pa dang/ grong 'thob pa dang/ yul gyi bdag po nyid dang/ chu klung chen po brgal ba dang/ dug bzul dang/ gsang sngags sna
tshogs bsgrub pa'i dngos grub dang/ 'jigs pa chen po brgyad zhi bar bya ba dang/ dgug pa dang/ rung ba de thams cad stsol bar bgyid do// gzhan yang ji ltar yid la bgyid pa de thams cad
stsol bar bgyid do/ 'di dag thams cad kyi dgos pa thams cad don yod pa'i zhags pa'i lcags kyu'i snying pos 'dren cing don yod pa'i zhags pas cings bar 'gyura'o// bsam pa dang/
don du gnyer ba dang/ yid la re ba'i dgos de thams cad shin tu ring po nas kyang don yod pa'i zhags pas bcing nas thams cad drangs te lag tu thob par 'gyur ro// sgrub pa mchog gi
dngos grub de kho na nyid thams cad 'grub par 'gyur to// mi snang ba'i rgyur/ rig sngags 'chang nam mkha'al mchi bar 'gyur ni// 'jig rten gyi khams gang rusas rgyas kyi zhing khams
gang dang gang du mchi'atshal ba de dang de thams cad du mchi bar 'gyur te/ thams cad dugatso bar 'gyura'o// thams cad du mchod par 'gyur ro/ ci sta rmi lam mthong par 'tshal zha gu gul la lan
brgyartsa brgyad yongs su bzlas nas/ nyal ka' 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la bas smyos su phul te nyal na/ 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug rgyal po'i cha byad du mthong ba/
stsol cing/ gang bsams pa dang/ gang don du gnyer ba dang/ gang dris pa de thamos can smra bar 'gyur ro// ji ltar bsams pa'i mchog stsol cing sgrib pa dang sdig pa thams cad ma mchis pa
'gyur ro// stobs dang/ brtson 'grus dang/ mdangs 'jug par 'gyur ro// tshangs pa dgug par 'atshal zhing mthong bar 'atsal na/ de'i/ shing aka'i 'o ma dang// gu gul dang/ rgya skyeg
ril bur bgyis ba la bzlas brjod brgya rtsa brgyad bgyis la/ tshangs pa la bdug spos su phul na/ tshangs pa rang gi gzugs kyis mdun na mchis shing mchog 'tshal ba thams cad rjes su stsal to//
tshangs pa'i 'jig rten la thug pa'i bar gyi tshas pa'i gnas dang gzhal med khang mtho bar 'gyur zhing/ tshangs pa'i gzugs kyi cha byad 'chang ba'i mchog stsol bar 'gyur ro// lta'i gnas
thamatshacad du mes po yin no zhes tshig mngon par brjod par 'gyur ro// 'jig rten thams cad dang/ 'dzam bu'i gling pa'i mi bud med dang/ rgyas pa dang/ khye'u dang/ bu mo dang/ dge sbyong
dang/ bram ze dang/ rgyal rigs dang/ rje'u rigs dang/ dmangs rigs de thams cad thams cad du tshangs pa'o zhes sems par 'gyur ro// rgyal po btsun mo dang 'khor du bcas pas
'ubla/ mchod pa'i sprin chen po bgyid par 'gyura'o// de nas sred med kyi bu dgug par 'tshalan/ des lha'i gnas su sred med kyi bu'i gzugs brnyan gyi mdun du nye ba'i sbyin sreg gi/
cho ga bkyi ste/ rig sngags 'chang gtsang mar gyur pa// shin tu khrus bgyis pa/ gas gtsang ma bgos pa/ sna ma dang shang argali yam srog shing gis me sbar ba la gu gul dang/ yus ka'
dang / sbrang rtsi dang/ zhun mar bsus pa'i sbyin sreg brgyar stong bgyi'o// brgyad stong rdzogs pa dang sred med kyi bu rang gi gzugs kyis mdun na mchis shing rig sngags 'chang la/ rig sngag lta'ang
legs so legs so zhes pa'o// sgrub pa dam pa 'di don yod pa'i lcags kyus 'gugs shing/ rig sngags kyi rgyal po'i chos lugs chen pos bkug na rig pa gas 'chang ci zhig bya/ dgos pa ni ci/
zhig yod// mchog ni ci zhig don du gnyer bde smyos shig dang/ thams cad rjes su sbyin pa ra'o// de nas rig sngags 'chang gis don gang yin yid la bsams te smras pa de thams cad stsol bar 'gyur/
gzugs sna tshogs pa'i mchog kyang rjes su stsol bar 'gyur ro// gzhan yang gzugs sna tshogs pa'i mchoka ga bo dang/ dgos pa'i las sgrub pa'i chog rjes su rtsol bar 'gyur ro// de nas lha
chen po dgug par 'tshalan rig sngags 'changagatsang ma shin tu khrus bgyis pa gos gtsang ma bgos pa de lta'i gnas su mchis pa la/ lha chen po'i mdun du gu gul dang/ pad+ma'i phu ma dang/ zhun
[8]mar bsres pa yin srog stong brgyad bgyi'o// stong rtsabacad rdzogs pa dang/ lha chen po rang gi gzugs kyis mdun mas par 'gyulo/ 'das rnag po chen po dgug par 'tshal na'ig sngags/

'char shin tu khrus bgyis pa gos gtsang ma bgasalam du khrod du mchis la/ zla ba mar gyi po'i tsho bcu bzhi la nyin zhag gcig snang ba brgyan pa paN+Dagasar pa'i phye ma dang/ gu gul dang/ ra'i khrag dang

yungs 'dang/ zhun mar dang sbyar ba brgyad stong don yod pa'i lcags kyu'i bzlas brjod kyis dur khrod kyi shing gi me la bzlas brjodo bgyi'o// ra khrag gi gtor ma dang/ 'bras thug po che'i chan gyi lha
bshos dang/ me tog dmar po dbul bar bgyi'o// las 'di yongs su rdzogs par bgyis na nag po chen po ma mo'i tshogs kyi 'khor dang bcas pa mdunan mchis shing/ rig sngags 'chang legs so leg
so zhes bya pa gsolate/ rig sngags 'chang legs so legs so// sgrub pa'i cho ga bzang po 'dis bdug yongs su mgus/ rig sngags 'chang skyes shig dang/ mchog rjes su sbyin par bgyi'o//

mchog 'dod pa thams cad rjes su long zhig dang/ ji ltar yid la byed pa'i re ba de thams cad rjes su sbyin par bgyi'o// khyod bsrung ba dang yongs su bskyang ba'i don du bdag rtag tuN+Dis su 'brang bar bgyi'o//
de nas ga lngags 'chang gis mchod yon dang zhabs bsil dbul bar bgyi'o// ji ltar bsams pa de mngon sum du smras na/ gang don du gnyer ba de thams cad thob cing thams cad rjes su 'brang
thubya// bar 'gyupa'o// thams cad du thams cad bgyid par 'gyu'o// dran pa tsam la sogs pas las thams cad bgyid cing nye bar gnas par 'gyur ro// rtag tu lta zhing sbyor
thams cad bgyid par 'gyur 'o// gzhan yang dgos pa sna tshogs dang/ las su bgyi ba bgyid par 'gyur ro// ma mo'i tshogs kyi 'khor thams cad dbang du gyur nas gnas te/ las thams cad
bsgo ba bzhin du bgyid bar 'gyur te/ nam yang nyams par mi bgyid do// thams cad rjes su 'brang zhing las thams cad bgyid par 'gyur ro// ci ste 'dod pa'i gzugs can ma dgug par
'tshal na/ de nas rigasngags 'ang gtsang ma shin tu khrus bgyis pa gos gtsang ma bgos pas shin tu dri zhim po'i dris lus lhag par bskos la/ gang na me tog gi shing ljon ma mchis pa der mas
la zla ba mar gyi ngo'i tsho bcu bzhi nyin zhag gcig sbyang ba bgyis pas shin tu dri zhim po'i dri'i shing gi me sbar ba la/ pushel dang/ ta ka ba dang/ spang spos dang/ yus ga' dang/
zho dang/ sbrang rtsi dang/ zhun mar dang sbyar ba'i sbyin srego lan stong rtsa brgyud bgyi'o// gla rtsi dang/ ga pur dang/ tsan dan gyi chus bskos pa'i 'bras yos dang/ me tog gis bkang
ba'i mchod yon gyi snod bum ba gsar pa brgyad stsal lo// dkar gsum gyi gtor mas bkang ba ga pur gyis bsgos pa'i gtor ma'i bum pa gsum stsal lo// mi rtogashin tu dri zhim po
stsal bar bgyi zhing/ gla rtsi dang/ tsan danadang/ ga pur dang/ kun tu ru'i 'jug smyos stsal bar bgyi'o// de nas las yongs su rdzogs pa dang/ 'dod pa'i gzugs can ma bzang mo de lha'i gzhal
med khang du mchis shing mdun namachis te/ de mthong nas ma ma/ sring mo 'am/ chung ma 'am/ las byed pa 'am/ mngag gzhug ma 'am/ pho nyamo rnam pa ji lta bu ji ltar tshig tu brjod pa
de la smos shig dang/ ci ste mar gyur na de'i tshe bu bzhin du snying nas yos su skyong bar byed do// nor dang/ 'bu dang/ dbyig dang/ gsi 'dang/ gos dang/ rgyan dang/ lhag lhub dang/
mal chos yongs su skyong bar bgyid do// tsis sring mo'agyur na de'i tshe los spyod thams cad kyis lus u skyong bar bgyid do// ji ltar yid la bsams pa'i bud med dpag tshad brgya'i pha rol
nas kyang bkug ste/ yongs su longs spyad pa'i phyir yongs su sbyor bar bgyidatsang/ phyir yang de nyid du gtong bar bgyid do// ci skyo chung mar gyur na de dang lha rdzas kyi gzhal med khar dam pa
yongs su longs spyod pa'i gzhal med khang mthong sta/ lha rdzas kyi bza' ba dang/ btung ba dang/ los spyod stsol bar bgyid do// ro bro ba'i mchog ro brgya dang ldan pa chos khyad par du 'phags pa'i
los sbyor stsol bar bgyid do// mchog tu dga' ba'i rtsed mos 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga'i longs spyod la yodzes su skyod par bgyid do// lha rdzas kyi dri dang/ me tog dang/ 'phreng ba dang/ byug
bya// pa dang/ lha rdzas kyi gos dang rgyan dang/ lhab lhub kyis brgyan pa'i gzhal med khang du 'gyur ro// nor dang/ 'brudang/ mdzod dang/ bad ba yongs su gang zhing mchis/
par 'gyur ro// nor bu dang/ gser dang/ rdo rje dang/ pa dang/ gser phye dang/ shang ka sha la dang/ byu ru dang/ dngul dang/ sa le sbram dang/ dngul skyogs dpag tu med pa thob
pa'i gter stsolatar bgyid do// rta dang/ ba lang dang/ mo de dang/ phyugs dang/ bran pho dang/ na mo rab tu sa mang por 'phel zhing mchis pa'i 'gyur ro// mal cha'i longs
'tshospyod sna tshogs stsol bar bgyid do// lha rdzas kyi chung ma'i longs spyod bud med gzugs sna tshogs pa'i 'khor brgyad dang ldan pa nyin gcig bzhin du gnas par 'gyur ro// yo byad thams
cad phun sum tshogs pas ji srid 'tsho'i bar du gnas par 'gyur 'o/ 'tshe lha'i le stong thub par 'gyur ro// rigasngags 'chang gas bag yod par bakyi ste/ dkona mchog gsum la mchog tu
gus pa dang/ 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug dang/ rdo rje 'dzin la mchog tu gus par bgyi'o// rtag tu sbyin pa la mngon pa' dga' bar bgyi zhing/ sems can thams cad/
la mchog tu snying brtse bar bgyi'o// gzhan du ma smra bar bgyi'o// gal te las byed par gyur na de'i tshe rgyal po la bgyi ba bzhin du las thams cad bgyid de// shin tu yongs su rdzogs kyi
bar du las la mngon pa 'bartson par 'gyur ro// ci ste mngag gzhug mar gyur nA gnas gang du mngags pa de'i gnas thams cad du mchi// dang ga tshad stong gi pha rol tumachi zhing/
skad cig gis slar yang mchi'o// thams cad du gnyer chen po 'byin par bgyid/ 'dren par bgyid do// dpag tshad stong ga pha rol nas bud med 'gugs par bgyid cing/ nor dang//
'bru dang/ glang po che dang/ ma he dang/ rtadag 'gug par bgyid do// slar yang gtong bar bgyid do// bag yod pas bgo bar bgyi ste// bdag nyid shin tu ring po'i yul dang gnas
su 'phen par bgyid/ gnod sbyin dang/ srin po dang/ 'byung po dang/ lha ma yin gyi gnas su 'deg par bgyid de/ dor srog gi bar chad du mi 'gyur bar bgyid do// ci ste pho nya mor
gyur na phyogs bcu thams cad du mchi ste/ lha'i 'jig rten tu mchi'o// klu'i 'jig rten du mchi'o// lha ma yin gyi gnas su mchi'o// nam mkha' lding gi gnas su mchi'o//
mi'am ci'i gnas su mchi// lto 'phye chen po'i gnas su mchi'o// gnod sbyin dang srin po'i gnas su mchi'o// 'byung bo'i gnas su mchi zhing thams cad du pho nya'i bya ba bgyis
nas ar mchi'o// sad cig gis rab ga tshad stong du ma'i zhing sar mchi'o// skad cig gis dpag tshad stong du thams cad kyi gnas thams cad du phyin nas pho nya'i bya ba bgyid do// ji
zla// srid sa'i 'og gi bar du 'jug cing phur yang mchi'o// bya ba shin tu yongasasu rdzogs par bgyis nas bag yod pas kyang las thas cad bgyi/ nyin
gcig bzhin du mchod yon dang/ nang pa bkru bas stsal bar bgyi'o// thams cad kyi gnas thams cad du phyin cing bya ba 'grub pa bla na ma mchis par 'gyur ro// de ltag gnod sbyin mo
dkug pa' 'tshalan rig sngags 'chang sa gzhan gyis ma reg pa'i shing leb gsar pa laganod sbyin dang gnod sbyin mo rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa bri bar bgyi zhing/ gnas dben zhing
'khyag pa ma mchis pa gtsang ma'i gnas su gzhag par bgyi'o// rig sngags 'chang gtsang ma shin tu khrus bgyis pas gos gtsang ma bgos pas 'o ma dang 'bras thug po che'i sman gyi gtor ma
stsal bar bgyi'o// shing ka ra wi ra'i me sbar ba la/ yungs kar dang/ gu gul dang/ ra'i khrag dang/ zhun mar dang bsres pa'i sbyin sreg stong rtsa brgyad bgyi'o// stong rtsa brgyud rdzog
pa dang/ ma tog dmar po sul na gnod sbyin mo de'ang rang gi gzugs kyis mdun na mchis te/ gan ga 'chang slong shig ces smra bar 'gyur ro// bkasngags 'chang gi khyod pa'i ci bgyi zhes bya
ba byed pa yin no// pa'i las thams cad byed pa yin no// nga la dbyig mang po byin cig ces brjod par bgyi'o// de'i tshaganod sbyin dang gnod sbyin mo de ltar legs so zhes smras nas misnang
00 bar 'gyur ro// gang gi tshe dgos pa byung ba de'i tshe yungs kar dang gu gul la yongs su bzlas nas mar gtor na de mchi zhing ci bgyi zhes bya ba thams cad bgyid par 'gyur// dbyig stong stsol bar
'gyur/ ji srid mtsho'i bar du mchis lor 'gyur/ rtag tu cibagyi ba'i bya ba bgyid par 'gyur/ de nas lha ma yin gyi bumo dgug par 'tshal na rigasngags 'chang sa spu tshil las lha ma yin gyi
bu mo rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan par bgyi'o// de nas rig sngags 'chang gis gnas 'khrug pa ma mchis pa dang/ dben pa dang/ sa phyogs gtsang ma'i gnas su gzhag par bgyi'o// rig sngagru
'chang gtsang ma shin tu khrus bgyi ba gos gtsang ma dgos pas zhag gsum zan bcad par bgyis la/ de'i mdun du skul mo krung bcas te mchis la gu gul gyi bdug spos stsal cing dkar gsum gyi
gtor ba snyakhar bgyi// don yod pa'i lcags kyu bzlas brjod yungs dkar la bzlas pas bu mo de la lan stong rtsa brgyud brtag par bgyi'o// las yongs su rdzogs pa dang/ de nas lha ma yin gyi bu
mo de rang gi gzugs kyis mdunan mchis te/ gang dang gang du dgos pa de dang der dgos pa'i rjes su 'brang bar 'gyur ro// de'i las thams cad bgyid par 'gyur/ thams cad du mchis par 'gyur/

ji srid 'tsho'i bar du mchis par 'gyura'o// ci ste srin po dang srin mo dgug par 'tshal na gu gul dang ba glang gi sha skam po dang lhan cig bsres pa la don yod pa'i lcags kyus lan stong rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod
dpagyis pas/ dur khrod du mtshan thog thag bdugs na srin po'i gnas thams cad kyi sgo phye bar 'gyur te/ srin po dang sri mo rnams dbang du gyur nas gnas te/ ci bgyi ba'i
bya ba bgyid par 'gyur/ ci bsko bde bgyid par 'gyur ro// rtag tu phyi bzhin 'brang zhing ji srid 'tsho'i bar du mchis par 'gyur 'o// gdugs gcig bzhin du dngul srang khri stsol bar bgyid do//
denas rig sngags 'chang gis cha gsum du dbye bar bgyi ste/ gcig ni dkon mchog la mchod par bgyi'o// cha gnyis pa ni nyin gcig bzhin du sbyin par gtang nga// srin po rnams la zan dang
tshod sngon rlon pa'i gtor ma stsal bar bgyi'o// de nas srin po 'khor dang bcas pa de rnams tshim par 'gyura'o// de nas srin po 'khor dang baa pa shin tu mgyogs par 'gyur te/ shugs chen pos
dgos pa thams cad sgrub cing nam yang gzhan du ba spyod pa rami 'gyur ro// gtor ma gtsang ma stsal bar bgyi'o// ci ste sha za dang sha za mo dgug par 'tshal na ba glang gi mkhris pa dang/ de'i so
dang/ gu gul dang/ shing a'i 'o mas myur te lam gyi bzhimador bajug par bgyi zhing/ lhag ma dang 'bags pa'i gtor ma stsal na/ sha khru mo de mchi zhing rig sngags 'chang gi mdun du mchis
ci bgyi ba'i bya ba bgyid pa'i bran du 'gyur/ las thams cad bgyid par 'gyur ro// dpag tshad stong gi pha rol tu mchi zhing/ skad cig gis slar yang mchi'o// dgos pa thams cad sgrub/
[s/ ]par bgyid do// dus gsum du gtor ma'i lhag ma'i gtor ma sgo drung du stsal bar bgyi'o// nyin gcig bzhin du gser gyi dong tshabargya sdus su 'jog pa 'gyur te/ des thams cad zad par
bgyisan phyir zhing 'phel bar 'gyur 'o// cas rgyal po'i btsun mo dgug par 'tshal na rig sngags 'chang gtsang ma shin tu khrus bgyis pa gos gtsang ma bgos pa des yungs kar dkar po
dang / sku tshe'i sa bon dang/ gi'u wang dang/ pad+ma'i 'dab ma dang/ rgyam tshwadang/ lan tshu bsres ba la lan brgya rtsa brgyad yongs su bzlas nas phye ma'i rdzas su bgyis la/ yungs kar dang/
sku tshe'i sa bon dang/ sbrang rtsi'i sa bon lan cig mnyis la/ yang lan stong rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod bgyis te/ rgyal po'i sgo 'am/ lam kyi bzhi mdo 'am/ lam po che 'am/ grong khyer gyi sgor
gtor na gung der gom pa bor ba tsam gyis dbang sugyur nas gnas ci bgyi ba'i bya ba bgyid do// rgyal po btsumo'i 'khor dang bcas pa bkug cing dbang du 'gyu'o// thams cad du ci bgyi ba'i bya
ba bgyid cing bsgo ba bzhin bgyid par 'gyur ro// gapa bslangs pa de star te dngul dang/ gsar dang/ gos dang/ rgyan dang/ lhab lhub dang/ sdud pa dang/ bzhon pa dang/ mal cha dang/ 'bru
la sogs pa stsol bar bgyid do// gang smras pa de bgyid cing gang bsgo ba bgyid par 'gyura'o// de la yul gcig tu'ang 'jig rten gsum po thams cad kyis mchod pa chen po bgyid par 'gyur zhing
'a// thams cad dbang du 'gyur ro// de nas bram ze dbang du bgyi bar 'tshalan/ rig sngags 'chang des sa dang/ til dang/ 'bras sA lu dang/ zho dang/ sbrang rtsi
rang/ zhun mar dang bsres pa'i sbyin srog stong rtsa brgyad bgyisan/ rig byed bzhi dang ldan pa'i bram ze thams cad kyis spyi bor bkur ba gcig pur 'gyura'o// thams cad du mchod
pa bgyid par 'gyur zhing/ bram ze thams cad la dbang bgyin pa thogs pa med par 'gyur ro// rgyal rig dbang du bgyi bar 'tshal na til dang/ 'bras thug chen po dang/ sran mud
ga dang/ zho dang/ sbrang rtsi dang/ zhun mar bsus pa'i sbyin sreg bgyi ste/ sbyin sreg stong rtsa brgyad gyi bar du bgyis ni thams cad la dbang sgyur zhing mchod pa'i 'os chen por 'gyur ro//
thams cad dbang du 'gyur bar bgyid do// ji srid 'tsho'i bar du bgyid de/ ci bgyi ba bgyid cing bsko ba bzhin bgyid par 'gyur ro// de nas doms rigs dbang du bgyi bar 'atsal na lan
tshwa dang/ 'bras sA lu'i phub mdang/ su mu kha'i sa bon dang/ sho dang/ sbrang rtsi dang/ zhun mar sbyar pa'i sbyin sreg brgyud stong bgyis na dmas rigs thams cad bran du gyur nas gnas te//
ji srid 'tsho'i bar du mchis par 'gyur ro// dgra dang/ phyir rgol ba dang/ phas kyi dgra thamasacad bzlog par 'tshalan rigasngags 'chang des shing mngar gyi shing gisame spar la sa bon 'dun dang/
zho dang/ sbrang rtsi dang/ zhun mar dang sbyar ba'i sbyin sreg brgyad stong bgyi'o// brgyad skor rdzogs pa dang/ dgra dang/ phyir rgol ba dang/ phas kyi dgra thams cad bzlog par 'gyur ro//
parol gyi dmag tshogs thams cad bzlog par 'tshalan shing tsher ma can gyi me sbar ba la 'bras yos dang/ yus kar dang/ zho dang/ sbapartsi dang/ zhun mar dang sbyar ba'i sbyin sreg brgyad stong
bgyi'o// brgyad stong rdzogs 'pha rol gyi dmag tshogs thams cad bzlog par 'gyur 'o// g.yul 'gyed pa bzlog pa 'tshal nasku tshe'i sa bon dang/ ku gul dang/ b+hang ga'is
bon dang/ zho ga mudang/ zhun mar dang sbyar ba'i sbyin sreg brgyad stong bgyis na g.yul 'gyed pa'i nang du son pa'i sems can thams cad slar bzlog bar 'gyur zhing thams cad du rgyal ba
thob bar 'gyur ro// de nas gdon thams cad las thar bar bgyi bar 'tshalan/ rig sngags 'chang des btug pa 'di sbyar bar bgyid par 'tshal te/ kye ma ka dang shing mngar dang/ tsha rong
dang ni gu gul dang// mu ra yak+Sha mu ra dang// b+hU ta ke shA mnyam par gzhal/ lubam dang ni pa la ka/ khyim bya'i sgo nga'i shun lpags dang/ sprul lcags dang ni yungs rnam gnyis//
tsA ga'i sa bon ba lang mkhris// nya dang legs par sbyar bgyis te// ra yi gcin gyis bsgos pa la// lcags kyu'i gsang sngags bzlas pa yis// bdug pa dam pa'i gtso bo 'di//
rlabla// thams cad du ni rigs pa ste// stong phrag brgyad cu rtsa bzhi'i gdon// gang dgas steng gnas pa rnams// bdug pa'i dri 'dis 'jig 'gyur zhing// mi bzad
gdon rnams 'gros par 'gyur// phyogs bcu dag ni g.yo 'gyur zhing// sumacu'i lta dang ra rab g.yo// gnod sbyin srin po'i gnas dag dang// sdang ba'i srog chags chen po 'tshig/
gzhan yang sna tshogs rug bcas pa'i// srog chags thams cad 'jig 'gyur ba// dritsam gyis ni dog pa med// gdug pa 'dis ni bdug byas na// der ni rims nad mi gnas te//
tshe nyin gcig pa yi rims dang ni// nyin gnyis pa dang bzhi pa'i rims// gang yang mi bzad khyab 'jug rims// de dag thams cad 'jig 'gyur zhing// skad cig gis ni gtan nas ngoms//
'phags pa don yod pa'i zhags pa'i cho ga zhib mo'i rgyal po bam po nyi shu gsum pa////de nas mig bsku ba'i sman brjod par bya ste/ gdon thamyu/
cad 'joms pa gang gis mig la bskus pa tsam gyis gdon ma rungs pa 'bros par 'gyur 'o// ro stod kyi nad thams cad 'joms par 'gyur te/ mig la bskus pa tsam gyis de thams cad med/
kha gyur te dogs pa mi bya'o// mig gi nad ni ling tog dang/ skya bor gyur pa dang/ ba rib dang/ chu bu2na dang/ chu zag pa dang/ tshag pa dang/ b+haM sar dza dang/ byis pa'i mchim
dang/ mig tu ba byung bdang/ khrag da/ srung dang/ ban kan dang/ mkhris pa dang/ rdul 'byung ba dang/ 'brum bu dang/ g.ya' ba dang/ mig bskamA ba dang/ mdongs pa rang
klad pa na ba dang/ klad pa'i gzhogs phyed na ba dang/ kha nad dang/ kha na ba dang/ dpral ban ba de dag thamos cad 'joms bar 'gyur ro// mig sman gyis mig bskus pa tsam gyis rims
thams cad rab tu zhi bar 'gyur ba dang nad thams cad sel ba dang/ mod la nyon mongs pa thams cad skyong ba dang/ sdig pa thams cad rnam par 'jig par 'gyur// de ltar na mig sman
mchog tu grub pa/ bgegs thams cad sel ba dang ma rungs pa thams cad rab tu zhi bar byed pa/ sems can thams cad la dbang byed pa/ thams cad du rgyal bar byad pa/ mig sman rtag tu
mchog tu dkon ba/ gsad bal thug pa thar par byed pa// btson ra nas gang thar dra ra byed pa/ rgyal po dag gang la khros pa las dgod cing smra bar 'gyur te/ nam 'tsho'i bar du rtag tu bu bzhin
yongs su skyong zhing gnas pa/ dug thams cad yod la med par byed pa na mig sman mchog yin no// bsam pa ngan cing snang ba'i sems can dang/ dgra dang/ phyir rgol ba dang/ dgra dang/ 'gyed
pa dag mig sman gyis bskus pas mthong na dbang du 'gyur te gnas so// ma he gtum po dang/ glang po che dang/ rlung dang/ ser ba dang/ kha mthon po nas g.yang du ltung pa dang/ me'i phung po chen
po dang/ khyim rtsib pa dang/ g.yang sar ltung ba rnams mig sman gyis mig bskus pas mthong na zhi bar 'gyur zhing/ gzhan yang bya ba rnam pa snatshogs byed de/ 'di la
dogs pa rami bya'o// lung ba dang/ skyar pa dang/ na le sham dang/ pi pi ling dang/ shi'ang ka be ra dang/ 'bras bu gsum dang/ ut+pal sngon po dang/ ljongs dang/ gur kum la sogrwa

pa'i mig sman dang/ rgyam tshwa dang/ lcang skyes dang/ rgya mtsho'i lta ba dang/ dung phye dang/ 'di rnams lhan cig tu phye ma zhib mo'i byas pa la gsang sngags lan bdun bzlas te ga pur dang/ grwa phyir
bsnan pa'i mig bsku ba'i sman lcags kyu'i rig sngags kyi rgyal po'i gsang sngags stong rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod byas te/ mig la bskus na dri ma thams cad sel cing sdig ba dang gzhan sdug bsngal
thams cad las grol bar 'gyur ro// mun pa thams cad kyi nang du rim bzhin du skye bo thams cad kyi nang du mdzes par 'gyur ro// de nas ril bu bshad par bya ste/ sdig pa thams cad rnam par
'jig pa/ nad thams cad sel bar 'grub pa 2 bgegs thams cad med par byed pa/ 2 gdon thams cad rnam par 'joms pa/ sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sbyong ba/ chodal dug thams cad
med par byed pa/ nyon mongs pa'i dri ma thams cad sel ba/ bcings pa thams cad gcod par byed pa/ g.yul thams cad las rgyal ba sbyin zhing dge ba/ dgra thams cad rab tu 'joms pa/ rtag
tu dug thams cad 'joms pa/ rgyal po'i sgor mdzes par 'gyur ba/ nor dang 'bru 'phel 'gyur ba/ rgyal po dang/ rkun po dang/ chu dang/ mi dang/ dugadang/ glang po che mad par byed pa/ sprul
ma'us pa dang/ byi ba'i dug gis 'jigs pa dang/ khyim 'jig pa dang/ ri nyil ba dang/ seng ge dang/ stag dang/ dom la sogs pa rab tu rgyu ba dang/ gnod pa dang bcings pa'i tshe 'gro ba'
dkab 'byung pa dang/ nad dang rims 'joms pa dang/ dus ma yin par 'chi ba med par byed pa// tshe dang nad med par byed pa 'phel ba/ skyes pa dang/ bud med dang/ gzhon nu ma rnams mchog
tu bde bar 'gyur ba ste/ gang gis ril bu bcangasan thams cad du rgyal ba 'thob cing gdon 'byung bar mi 'gyur/ rnam par log 'dren gyis ma yin no// gnod sbyin dang/ srin po dang//
'byung po dang/ sha za dang/ brjod byed ma rungs pa rnams ril bu mthong ba tsam kyis phyogs bcur 'bros par 'gyur ro// 'dir byis pa gsod par mi bya'o// sman 'di la rig pa tsam gyis khyim der dug
ma yin par 'chib dang/ na ba thams cad dang/ nad las yongs su grol bar 'gyur ro// 'bras dang/ phol mig dang/ lhog pa dang/ 'brum phran mchod ba dang/ shu ba dang/ g.yan ba dang/
mdzad ng/ 'brum bu mchod pa dang/ sha bkra la bskus pa tsam gyis byang bar 'gyur ro// lus thams cad du zhugs pa'i nad la dron po dang 'thungs pa tsam la sogs pas yongs su byang bar
'gyu'a'o// 'jigasayag pa thams cad las rtag tu rgyal bar 'gyur ro// 'jigs pa chen po las thams cad rjes su 'brang bar 'gyur ro// gnas thams cad du song
pa la sbyar ba byas na thams na ru mkho ba' 'gyur ro// de nas rdzas su bya ba ni pu shel tse dang/ tsanadan dang/ myu sa dang/ ru rta dang/ rdo dreg dang/ pad dra dang/ tsha ma kadang/ sha mi dang/
pad+mapa da dang/ ut+pa la dang/ na la dang/ 'bras bu gsum dang 2 tshab gsum dang/ tsug skyel dang/ btsod dang/ su ga 'i dang/ ra dza cu rnam gnyis dang/ spri ka dang/ sra rtsi pog dang//
gur kum la sogs pa dang rab tu ldan pa dang/ de dag kun bsres te zhib mor btags la kha ra dang ru dang sbyar bas ril bu byas la/ gsang sngags brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod byas te grib ma 'a
bskams pa de ni snyan grub pa yin te/ thams cad rgyal bar byed cing dge ba yin no// rnga dang/ rnga bo che dang/ dung la rilu mchog bsnyus te gnas mthon por song ste/ dung gi sgra dang/ rnga ba
(tshe dang/ rdzasgra ji srid du thos pa de srid tsam du 'jig pa med par 'gyur ro// dug dang bcas pa ni thams cad dug med par 'gyur te dogs pa mi bya'o// nad thams cad dang/ mi ngas thams cad
dang/ yams kyi nad dang/ lo nyes thams cad rab tu zhi bar 'gyur ro// bde zhing lo legs pa nyid du 'gyur ro// gang dag mtshams med pa byed pa'i sems can sdig pa can dmyal ba la gzhol/

[4 ]ba dag gis sgra thos pa tsam gyis sdig pa thams cad byung ste/ bde bar 'chi ba'i dus byas nas bde ba can du skye bar 'gyur 'o// gos la btug sa na bdag nyid mchod pa chen po 'thob cing thams cad la dbang

byed par gnas pa dang/ don grub pa bla na med pa yin no// nor dang 'bru rab tu 'phel zhing dgos pa sgrub pa bla na med pa yin no// thams cad mchod pa dang rtag tu tshig gzung bar 'os pa rtsar rgyur ro// rgyal
po gang la khros pa las nod cingaskya par 'gyur ro// bud med rnams kyi gnang chen du 'gyur zhing rtag tu nad med par gyur ro// rtag tu brtson 'grus dang ldan pa dang/ stobs dang ldan pa dang/
rtag tu dpal dang ldan pa dang/ gzi brjid dang ldan pa dang/ rtag tu glang po che bcu'i stobs dang ldan pa dang/ shi nas mtho ris su skye bar 'gyur 'o// bya nga chub sems
dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis yang/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag la mchis pa ni don yod pa'i zhags
pa'i lcags zhes bya ba don yod pa'i lcags kyu'i gzus chen po 'o chog zhib mo'i dkyil 'khor nang/ don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po dang/ dkyil 'khor chen po lta ba dang/ sgrub pa dang//
bklags pas 'grub pa/ donayod ba chen po rnam par 'phrul pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi byin gyis brlabs kyi dam tshig grub pa lags so// gang gis pad+ma rgyas pa'i dkyil 'khor
dbya@#// chen po mtha' dag dang/ phyag rgya dang/ ran par phye ba dang/ gsang sngags dang/ cho ga dang/ bde bar sgrub pa mtha' dag ni 'gas kyi myi thams cad kyi dam tshig chen po'i
rjes su 'jug pa 'grub par 'gyur ba lags so// 'di lta sta/ de bzhin gshags pa'i rigs dang/ pad+ma'i rigs dang/ rdo rje'i rigs dang/ nor bu'i rigs kyi dkyil 'khor chen po 'od

dpag tu med pa 'i snying po mchog dang po rdo rje rin po che rtse mo'i mchog dang po'i dkyil 'khor gyi dam tshig la thams cad du rjes su zhugs shing dam tshig shes par 'gyur ba dang/ thams cad du byan gyis
brlabs par 'gyur ba de rig sngags 'chang ba de thams cad mchog tu grub par bgyi ba'i phyir dang/ sems can thams cad la rjes su brtse ba'i slad du bdag gis bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar
'khor mang po'i dbus su bsgrags par bkyi'o// rigs bzhi'i 'jig rten kyi bud med dang/ skyes pa dang/ khye'u dang 2 bu mo rnams kyi sdig pa dang sgrib pa thams cad rnam par gzhig pa'i phyir
bshad par bgyi'o// grub pa yang dag pa rjes su stsal bar bgyi'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags/
pa spyan ras gzigs dang nga phyug la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// sems can dgo pa chen po khyod kyi dag pa'i rtsa ba rnams dag cing shin tu yongs su dag pa yan/ legs so legs so//
rig sngags 'chang ba thams cad dang/ sems can thams cad dang/ dge sbyong dang/ bram ze dang/ rgyal rigs dang/ rje'u rigs dang/ dmas rigs dang/ bud med dang/ skyes pa dang//
lce ru dang/ bu mo rnams la bstan pa'i bya ba shod cig/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis spyan ras gzigs bang phyug la rigs thams cad kyi spyi'i grub pa dam tshig gi rdzas su 'jug par byin
gyis brlabs o// ngas kyang de bzhin ru de dag byin gyis brlabs so// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan

sngar don yod pa 'a rgyas pa'i pad+ma'i snying po'i dkyil 'khor chen po bshad pa/ don yod pa'i lcags kyu'i yang dag pa mchog grub pa/ sgrub pa dam pa ni sa dang ba'i lci ba bsres pas dkyil 'khor gru bzhi

bya ba ni shin tu mdzes pa shin tu 'jam por bya'o// masna lngas rnam par dbye ba na grwa dang bcas par rnam par dbye bar bya'o// tshon sna tshogs kyis dri ba dang dkyil 'khor gru bzhir thig gdab pa ni

mnyam par thig gis dbye ba bya ste/ sgo bzhir cha dbye bar bya'o// chu zheng du khru bzhi'i tshad tsam du dbye bar bya'o// dbus kyi dkyil 'khor gyi snying bo ni tshad khru do par byas la tshon sna lnga'i sga labu dang
tshon sa las dbye bar bya'o// dbus kyi dkyil 'khor gyi snying po la pad+madakar po kha bye ba zlum por bya'o// pad+ma kha bye ba'i dbus su zhags pa dang/ lcags kyu dang/ pad+ma gnas par bya ba ni klu
mgo'i gdengs kA 'dra ba lcags kyu dang bcas pa dang/ lag pa dang bcas pas pad+ma'i lcags kyu 'dzin pa dang/ 'bar ba'i nang na 'dug par bya'o// tshon sna tshogs

kyis bri'o// pad+makha phye ba'i phyi rol gyi skal bu ni lcags kyu dang bcas pa'i sgal thub bya'o// nang dang phyi'i bar du rin po che sna tshogs kyis brgyan par bya'o// lcags kyu'i phyi rol gyi sprul
bun zla ba yid du 'ong ba dri ma med pa'i me tog gis bya'o// zla ba yid du 'ong ba dri ma med pa'i phyi rol gyi sgal bu ni mdung rtse gsum pa bri bar bya'o// mdung rtse gsum pa'i 'phreng pa'i
phyi rol gyi skal bu na phyag rgya phyag na thogs par bri bar bya sta/ mtshon cha sna tshogs dang me tog rnams// kun l 'bar ba'i 'phreng ba dang 'od zer kha dog sna tshogs bri bar bya'o// phyag gi/
phyag rgya'i phyi rol gyi skal bu ni stags bu dang 'dra bar bya'o// stegs bu'i phyi rol gyi skal bu ni 'khor bar lcags kyu bri bar bya'o// sAng po'i dkyil 'khor gyi grwa ni rgyal po chen po bzhi
ga bgos pa/ lcags kyu dang mdung rtse gcig pa thogs pa/ 'bar ba'i nang na 'dug pa/ rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa/ stsol mo krung phyed du bcas te pad+mo'i gdan la 'dug par bya'o//
dkyil 'khor gyi phyi rol thog thag tu 'jigs pa med pas phyag mtshan rnams thams cad pad+mad+mal 'dug pa bri ba' bya'o// sgo bzhi'i gnas su pad+ma'i dkyil 'khor gyi lha rnams bri ba ni shar gyi

tsha ba/ sgor lag na rdo rje/ lhor ral pa gcig ma/ nub du rje rje lcags sgrog ma/ byang du pho nya mo dang nagasngags kyi lha mo rnams bri bar bya'o// dkyil 'khor gyi phyi rol kyi skal bu na me tog gi
stags bu 'dra bar bya// phyi rol gyi dkyil 'khor ni kun ba'i lci bas bya'o// phyi rol gyi dkyil 'khor de la nas phyis pad+ma bri bar bya'o// dkyil 'khor kun bum pa gang ba dang/ da'
btags pa'i mda' dang/ dri'i snod bkang bas brgyan cing byug pa'i chudagang ba dang/ bdug skyos kyi snod kyis brgyan pa dang/ me tog sna tshogs kyis brgyan pa dang/ dri chab dang/ mchod
yon gyis chab dang/ 'bras bu dang/ yon chab dang/ dngul gyi me tog dang/ gsar gyi me tog dang/ zangs kyi me tog gis 'jigs pa med pa' brgyan par bya'o// mu tig dang/
bya rudang/ rin mo hi ShAny+tsa ston po dang/ mar gad dung/ pad+ma rA ga rnams kyis de bzhin du brgyan to// dkyil 'khor kun tu dung drang/ gril ba dang/ rtsa dar b+ha dang/ gser dang/
dngul gyis brgyan par bya'o// dkyil 'khor gyi don du mchod pa'i phyir dkyil 'khor gyi lha bkra shis pa rnams dang/ sgo bzhi'i gnas su dri chab kyi bum pa dar gyis brgyan te gzhag par bya'o//
kyil 'khor gyi phyi la thog thag tu'o sna tshogs kyi gtor ma gzhag pa dang/ bum bu dang/ bya ma bum dang/ bum pa dang/ rdo gu dang/ kham phor dang/ bum pa gang ba rnams byas te/
[19 ]bya@#// gzhag go/ bog por dang/ gtor ma bzang po sna tshogs dang/ me tog sna tshogs bkram pa'i bya/ 'phreng ba zang pos brgyan par bya/ tshon sna lnga pa'i ba dan gdags//
tshon sna lnga pa'i srad bu seng ldeng gi phur pa la btags pa gzugs par bya'o// kun tu mar me'i 'phreng ba dang mar me'i sdong po bzhi'ang de bzhin no// mkhas pas dkyil 'khor gyi nang du bdug pa dbul
bani a ka ru dang/ tsan dang/ du rus ka dang/ spyi ka rnams kyi brtag pa ga pur dang gla rtsis bsgos pa bya'o// dkyil 'khor gyi phyi rol gyi bdug pa ni gu gul dang/ sa la li ka dang/ kun tu ru'i
'a bdug pa dbul bar bya'o// de nas rig sngags 'chang bas gos gsar pa bgos te gtsang mar byas nas maN+Dal gyi las su bya ba'i cho ga dang/ lcags kyu'i rig sngags bzlas brjod bya ba dang/ slob ma

gzhug cing dkyil 'khor gyi dam tshig dang/ phyag rgya dang/ pa'i rnam lnga la reg par bya ste/ mkhas pas phyag rgya dang gsang sngags brjod cing don yod pa'i lcags kyu'i rig sngags chen mo ni thams cad la sbyar
bar bya'o// mtshams bcing ba dang/ phyogs bcing ba dang/ spyi gtsug 'ching ba dang/ 'jug pa dang/ dam tshig dang/ khrus bya ba dang/ gos bgo ba dang/ phyag 'tshal ba dang/ bskor ba dang/ de dag

thams cad la sbyar ba bya'o// sbyin sreg dang bzlas brjod kyi cho ga zhi ba dang/ rgyas pa dang/ mngon spyod dang/ dgug pa dang/ sbyan drang ba dang/ gshegs su gsol ba dang/ de bzhin zhu yang dag par sprul/
[o]bdang/ las thams cad la rig sngags 'chang bas thams cad du sbyar na myur zhing rdzogs par 'achang zhing/ des na grub pa bla na med par 'gyur ro// bgrang 'phreng dang/ khrig ma'i gdu bu dang

srad bu se'al ba gtsang ma dang/ rtsa dar b+ha dang/ yungs kar dang/ chu dang bsre ba dang/ rtswa dar b+ha'i stan la mchod phyir thogs te skyel mo krung bcas nas las bya zhing/ pad+ma dang mchod yon gyis
dkyil 'khor la dbul ba dang/ de dag rtag tu rgyun mi 'chad par dus thaMs can du nges par bya'o// don yod pa lcags kyu'i rigatsags dran par bya ste/ grub pa mchog dang/ las thams cad sgrub pa
dang/ gang dang gang dgos pa la dran par bya'o// gsang sngags de nyid kyisasar gshegs su gsol lo// gsang sngags gzhan dang bsu bar mi bya ste/ phyag rgya dang gsang sngags 'di'i dpa' ba
gcig bklags pas grub pa'i mchog/ sangs rgyas thams cad dang byang chub sams dpa' thams cad kyis byin gyis brlabs pa/ 'phags pa spyan sa gzigs dbang phyug gis kyang byin gyis brlab+hA
ba ste/ yang dag par 'grub cing mchog sbyin par byed pa yin no// don yod pa'i lcags kyu'i dkyil 'khor dam pa'i dkyil 'khor 'di mthong ba ni sdig pa thams cad rnam par 'dug cing/ sgrib pa dang sdig
pa thams cad dang/ sngon gyi sgrib pa mi bzad pa sngar bsags pa rnams rnam par zhig pa 'grula'o// 'jig rten pa'i grub pa bde ba dang/ 'jig rten pha rol tu 'bras bu chen po bde ba dang/ shi ba'i
[A ]@#// dus byas nas bde ba can du song ste/ pad+ma'i nang nas rgyal ba'i spyan sngar rdzus te skye ba dang/ kha ton byed na tshe rabs dran par 'gyur ba dang/ gang zhig 'chad pa ni de bzhin/
gshegs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing stong phrag bye ba khrag khrig snyed thams cad kyi sgo phye sta 'dug cing gang 'dod pa der 'jug par 'gyur ro// rgyal ba thams cad kyis rnam par gzigs shing spyi bor
phyag bzhag ste/ dbugs 'byin par mdzad cing dus kun tu bla na med pa'i byang chub tu lung ston par 'gyur ro// 'di ni skye ba'i tha ma yin te/ chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba'i bar dang/ byang zug
gyi snying po la 'jug gi bar du yin gyi/ gzhan du skye bar mi 'grub 'o// 'jig rten 'di na dga' bar 'gyur zhing/ bla ma dang/ chos can dang/ nor rgyas mchod pa dang/ sems can kun gyis
mchod par 'os pa ni ston pa de bzhin gshegs pa bzhin du 'gyur ro// nor dang 'bru 'phel ba dang/ gos dang rgyan gyis brgyan pa dang/ rgyal po dang btsun mor bcas pa thams cad bya ba ci yod
ces bran bzhin du gnas par 'gyur ro// lcags kyu'i dkyil 'khor du zhugs pa ni phyir mi ldog pa thob par 'gyura'o// 'di ngan 'gror yang 'gro bar mi 'gyur zhing/ rtag tu bde zhing dga' ba dang/
sems can thams cad dga' ba dang/ byams par 'gyur ro// lha thams cad kyis lus can shin tu bsrungs par 'gyur ro// tshangs pa dang/ khyab 'jug dang/ dbang phyug chen po rnams kyi
mchod bar 'gyur ro// bsod nams kyi phung bo 'phel bar 'gyur zhing zhim pazhin du gzi brjid 'bar bar 'gyur ro// sdug cing bzang ba mchog tu blta bar 'os par 'gyura'o// dpal gyis dug
rtag tu 'barazhing shin rgyas par 'agyur ro// de bzhin gshegs pa 'bum phrag bye ba khrag khrig dgu bcu rtsa gnyis ga'i klung gi bye ma dang mnyam pa snyad kyi de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi drung
nas dag ba'i rtsal chen po yongs su bzung par 'gyur ro// bsod nams chen po dang ldan pa' 'gyur ro// lcags kyu'i dkyil 'khor du gang zhig zhugs pa tsam dang/ dkyil 'khor de lta bu
lame tog gcig dbul ba dang/ ril bu gcig tsam gyi bdug pa 'bul ba'i sems can de dag ni ga'i klung bye ma dgu bcu rtsa dgu pa 'bum phrag bya ba khrag khrig med kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi ma tog

sna tshogs kyi lags par brgyan pa 'gyur ro// sas rgyas kyi zhing 'a rer yang gang+ga'i klung gi bya ma dgu bcu rtsa dgu pa 'bum phrag bye ba khrag khrig snyad kyi de bzhin gshegs pa rnams la sna tshogs
kyis mchod pa bya bar 'gyura'o// bdug pa mang po rnam par phye ba'i sprin las tsan dan sprul kyi snying po dang gsher sha'i bdug pa 'byung bar 'gyur ro// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la mchod
pa'i sbyin rim par phye ba 'ab tu 'khrigs par 'gyur ro// de la sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das thams cad kyis legs so zhes bya kho bab tu sbyin par mdzad de/ rigs kyi bu lags so legs so//
de bzhin gshegs pa rnams la mchod pa 'di ni mchog tu grub pa bla na med pa yin no// de dag gis me tog dang bdug pas dkyil 'khor mchod pa ni bsod nams
kyi phung po chen po'i dge ba'i rtsa ba yongs su rdzogs pa dang/ pha rol tu phyin pa drug yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur 'o// sgrub pa chen po 'grub pa 'a 'gyur ro// 'phags pa spyan 'ag gzegro/
dbang phyug rtag tu mchog sbyin pa mdzad par 'gyur ro// rtag tu mthong bar bzhed par 'gyur 'o// rtag tu rjes su 'breng bar 'gyur ro// rtag tu don yod pa'i lcags kyu grub pa 'grub par//
'gyur ro// tshig gzung bar bya bar 'gyur ro// rtag tu bzhin 'dzum par 'gyur ro// rgyal po chen po bzhi dang/ gshin rjedang/ chu lha dang/ lus ngan po dang/ gzhon nu dang/
dbang phyug dang/ dbang phyug chen po dang/ lha'i bu rnams srung ba dang/ skyed pa dang/ skyob pa'i phyir rjes su 'brang ba chen por 'gyur ro// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis phyag
rgyas btab cing byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur ro// de'i sa phyogs kyang mchod rten snyam du sems shing mchod rten ring bsrel can du 'gyur ro// sems can gang dag de la lta ba'i phyir song
tshaTha ba'i sems can de dag sdig pa dang/ sgrib pa dang/ dug thams cad las yongs su thar bar 'gyur ro// 'jigs pa dang/ rnams dang/ mya ngan thams cad las bral bar 'gyur ro//
[4./ ]nad dang bral bar 'gyur ro// rtag tu sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyis dgongs par 'gyur ro// rtag tu 'jig rten thams cad kyi bla mar 'gyur ro// dgra thams cad
las phyir rgol ba thams cad dang/ mi mdza' ba'i 'jigs pa las thar bar 'gyur ro// dus ma yin pa'i 'chi ba'i 'jigs pa las yongs su thar par 'gyur ro// 'di nas shi nas
bde ba can kyi 'jig rten gyi khams su skye bar 'gyur 'o// tha na ri dgas dang bya dag gnas te phyogs su nye bar song ba de dag sgrib pa thams cad dang/ de'i sngon gyi tshe la yongs su bsags
pa de dag lhag ma ma lus par yongs su byang bar 'gyur ro// de dag thams cad bde 'gro la gzhol bar 'gyur ro// ngan song dang ngan 'gro'i 'jigs pa med par mtha' byang chub la thug
gi bar du'o// de nas don yod pa'i lcags kyu las la sku gzugs bri ba'i cho ga brjod par bya ste/ gnas thams na du bla na med pa 'grub pa ni sdig pa thams car mod la sreg par byed pa dang//
nyon mongs pa thams cad 'phrog pa/ de bzhin du nad thams cad sal ba/ sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sbyong ba/ 'jigs pa thams cad las rnam par thar pa/ sems can thams cad la phan/
bar bya ba'i phyir gaparakyil 'khor chen por kun tu lung bstan pa mi 'jigs pa sbyin pa/ mchog tu dkon pa/ yid la re ba thams cad 'phral ru yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ba/ bkra
shis thams cad sgrub pa/ bsod nams thams cad sogs pa/ myur du nor dang 'bru sbyin par mdzad pa/ sgrub pa yang dag par grub par bya ba'i phyir gsang sngags
'grub pa/ bzlas brjod 'grub pa/ yid la re ba thams cad yongs su rdzogs par 'grub pa/ pha rol tu phyin pakhasu yos su rdzogasapa de khon nyid rnam pa mthong ba zhes bya ba'i bsod
namasachen po skye bar 'gyur ro// nam byang chub yang dag par 'thob kyi bar du dge ba'i rtsa ba chen po ba tu skye bar 'gyur ro// don yod pa'i lcags kyu cho 'phrul chen po'i zas kyi sku gzugA
chen po mthong ba la sogs pa ni phyis ngan 'gro'i gnas su mi 'gro zhing/ sdig pa'i las kyis mi gos pa dang/ sngon gyi sgrib pa dang/ sngag pa thams cad rnam par 'jig pa dang/ sdig pa thamA
car rnam par sel ba dang/ ngan song las thar pa'i 'gyur ba dang/ ramyal ba mi bzad pa rnams las thar par 'gyur// tshorabs kun rtabade ba dang/ da ltar gyi 'di la mchog myudagon pa'i
bde ba lhun gyis grub thob par 'gyur ro// bkren pa'i ng longs sbyod dang phyug po mtshungs pa med pa mchog mod la thob par 'gyur ro// lha'i dpal thob par 'gyuba'o// 'kho'i bzang po
bdog par 'gyur ro// rgyal po rnams kyis bla mar bya zhing/ rtag tu dus thams cad du mchod par 'os par 'gyur ro// dge sbyong dang/ bram ze dang/ rgyal rigs dang/ rje'u rigs dang//
dmangs rigs dang/ bud med dang/ skyes pa rnams rtag tu dbang du bya ste/ 'dug cing thams cad bsnyen bkur byed pa'i 'jug pa ni ras kyi sku gzugs la mchod pa byan med pa yin no// sa gru bzhi
khyon kun khru gang ngam/ khru do pa la legs par brtags pa/ las 'jam pa thag 'an bzang po gnyen po shin tu dag par bkrus pa gtsang mar byas pa 'am/ yang na dar yug gam/ yang na mon dar
ram shun phrags la zla ba yar gyi tshes bco lnga tshang ba'i bar du sakyi sku gzugs bla na med pa khri bar bya'o// snod gtsang ma gsar pa'i nang du tshon lhag ma yin pa khyugs te/ ras kyi sku gzugs
gsal bar ba ba na tshon sna tshogs kyis rnam par dbye bar bya'o// dbus su 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug mgon po bro ba ni skyel mo krung bcas te bzhugs pa/ spyan gsum pa/ zhal gsum
ba mchog tu bzang ba/ zhal dang po ni mdzes shing stug pa/ dbu lcang lo dang tho'atsugs kyis brgyan pa/ rtsod pan la 'od dpag med kyis brgyan pa/ dbu skra 'khyil bar bya'o// me tog gi 'phreng
ba bcas par bya'o// 'phreng ba'i gong du 'od dpag med bya'o// da pan la zla ba phyed pa dang 'od 'dom gang ba bya'o// kun tu lcags kyu bya'o// kun tu 'bar ba'i 'phreng ba bya'o// phyag bzhi la
phyag g.yonan pa'i lcags kyu// g.yas na mdung rtse gsum patshilcags kyu/ g.yon gcig na don yodapa zhags pali kA g.yas gcig n rdo rje lcags kyu dbugs 'byin par bya'o// gdan seng ge 'i
[z]@#// patsho bya'o// g.yon du lha mo sgrol ma'o// g.yas su dka' mo ste/ me tog sna tshogs thogs pa/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhalalta ba/ rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa/

[】/ ]pad+mal bzhugs pa/ 'bar ba'i nang na bzhugs par bya'o// 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi rgyab tu rin po che'i shing lcug phran dang/ yal ga dang chas pa rin po che sna tshogs kyis smras par/

bya'o ne tso dang/ ri skegs dang/ shang shang te'u dang/ rma bya dang/ byaka la bang karin po tsho'i gseb na rgyu bar bya'o// shing gro gong spyi bo la 'ang bu brtseg ma dang bcas pa'i gzhal med khang
gi nang du de bzhin gshegs pa gsum rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa bzhugs par bya'o// spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi g.yon du srin mo ral pa gcig ma bya'o// g.yas su lag na rdo rje khros pa'i
gad ma 'byin pa'igazugs mche ba gtsigs pa/ skra gyen du brdzes pa/ lcang lo dang cod pan gyis brgyan pa/ rdo rje thogs shing rdo rje gsor ba nam mkha' la blta ba'i bya'o// smad du gshin rje dang/
chu lha dang/ lus ngan po dang/ gzhon nu dang/ rgyal po chen po bzhi bya'o// gong du dbang po dang/ dbang phyug dang/ dbang phyug chen po lha'i bu bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa byed pa bya//g.yas phyog
su tshangs pa dang/ khyab 'jug dang/ rab ng phyug chen po rnams btud de/ bcom ldan 'das la mchod po byed pa bya'o// g.yon du dga' bo dang/ bsnyen dga' bo dang/ klu'i rgyal po rgya mtsho rnamu
bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa byed pa bya'o// g.yas kyi gnas gcig tu rig sngags 'chang 'phags pa spyana'as gzigs dbang phyug gi zhabs drung du pus mo btsugs te/ bcom ldan 'as kyi
zhol du lta zhing ma tog sna tshogs kyi sdong bu dang/ pog por dang/ bgrang 'phrengalag na thogs pa bya'o// phyogs bzhi nges kun tu ris bskor ba la ri dgas kyi tshogs sna tshogs kyis gang ga shing
sna tshogs me tog dang lhag ma can bya'o// rdzing bu chu zag pa bya'o// 'bras bu sna tshogs can gyi shing dang lcag ma bya'o// gnas so sor drang srong rnams dang/ grul bum gyi shing bya'o// tshul de
ltar don yod pa'ilcags kyu las la bris tu gnas gtsang ma dben par bzhag la/ rig sngags 'chang bas 'bod pa chen pos mchod par bya'o// a ka ru dang/ dus ka dang/ tsan dan gyi bdug
ba dbul bar bya// ci nus par don yod pa'i lcags kyu'i rig pa'i rgyal po bzlas brjod bya'o// nyi ma re rer ras la sku gzugs bris pa mthong ba tsam gyi mod la mtshams med pa lnga la sogs pa'i
sdig pa dang/ sgrib pa dang/ mnar med par gzhol ba dang/ dam pa'i chos sbyong ba rnams yongs su dag cing zad par 'gyur ro// 'jig rten dang/ 'jig rten las 'das pa'i stug bsngal gyi 'jig
pa mi bzad pa dang/ nad thams cad yongs su zad pa dang/ rnam par dag par 'gyur ro// rnam 'jig par 'gyur/ dra ma dang bral bar 'gyur ro// ser sna dang phrag dog dang bral bar 'gyur/
gzungs grub pa chen po so so'i thob par 'gyur 'o/ mthong ba tsam gyi mod la de ma thag tu 'bras bu chen po rten pa rgya chen por 'gyur ro// lan 'ga' yang log par ltung bar 'gro
bar mi 'gyur ro// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mthong ba thob par 'gyur ro// byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyis dgos par 'gyur ro// lha thams cad kyis rgyun du bsus shing rjes
su bzung bar 'gyur ro// ras kyi sku gzugs 'di'i 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug mthong ba tsam gyis 'phagrwapa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug zhal mngon du mthong ba dang 'dra bar rig

pa' bya'o// gang zhig las kyi sku gzugs 'di la legs par 'gyur ba'i tshul gyis bya ba byed pa dang/ mchod pa dang bsnyen bkur byed pa de ni phyogs bcu kun gyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma

dgu bcu rtsa dgu dang mnyam pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa 'bum phrag bye ba khrag khrig ster kyisangs rgyas kyi zhing la mchod par 'gyur ro// de nas rang rang gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing na rab tu bzhugs pa'i de bzhin gshegA
pa de dag gi bsod nams kyi phung po chen po yongs su bzung bar 'gyur ro// dge ba'i rtsa ba rgya chen po dang ldan par 'gyur ro// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi phyir mi ldog pa'i gnas thob pa'i
'gyur ro// dge ba bsam pa yongs su dag pa chen po dang ldan par 'gyur ro/// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug
0 gis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag gis rig sngags 'chang thams cad grub par bgyi ba'i phyir nga sems can gyi don dang/ phan pa dang/ bde
bar bgyi ba'i phyir dang/ sdig pa dang sgrib pa thams cad las yongs su grol bar bgyi ba'i phyir/ don yod pa lcags kyu zhig sngags kyi rgyal po rim par phye ba rnams bstan pa lags so// bcom
ldan 'das yang bdag la mchis pa ni don yod pa'i lcags kyu'i khro bo'i rgyal po'i dkyil 'khor te/ rig sngags 'chang thams cad kyi khro ba chen po'i las grub pa mchog tu 'gyur ba dang/ bsam pa
dang yid la re ba thams cad yongs surdzogs par 'gyur ba dang/ ma rungs pa/ brtson pa med pa dang/ brtse ba'i bsam pa med pa ni gnod sbyin dang/ srin po thams cad dang/ 'byung po dang/
lha ma yin dang/ nam mkha' lding dang/ mi 'am ci dang/ lto 'phye chen po dang/ mi dang/ mi ma yin pa thams cad thug 'jug pa/ ma rungs pa'i bgags dang log 'dren thams cad rab
du dul bar mdzad pa// bdud la sogs pa ma nyungs pa thams cad rab tu zhi ba dang phung bar byed pa/ sems can ma rungs pa thams cad skrag par byed pa// phyir rgol ba dang dgra thams cad 'ching ba dang/
gcod pa dang/ rab tu 'bigs pa dang/ rdung ba dang/ gtor ba dang/ lus rnam par zhig par byed pa de ni/ bcom ldan 'das 'dir bdag gis pad+mo rgyas pa'i dkyil 'khor don yod pa'i zhag
pa'i snying po cho ga zhib mo'i dkyil 'khor gyi skabs su/ bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'khor mang po 'i nang du don yod pa'i khro ba'i lcags kyu brjod par bgyi ste/ dkyil
'khor dang cho ga zhib mo thams cad du srung bar byed pa/ 'chos par byed pa// dam tshig 'dzin pa/ gnas thams cad la rjes su sbyong ba ste/ de ni sgrub par byed pa/ sgrub pa 'grub par byed pa'i
mchog de bcom ldan 'das kyis thugs brtse ba chen po'i slad du/ bcom ldan 'das khro bo'i rgyal po chen pos byin gyis brlabs shing rjes su gnang ba mdzod cig dang/ rig sngags 'chang thams
cad mchog tu 'grub pa'i snying po dgasems can thams cad kyi bsam pa yongs su rdzogs par bgyi ba'i slad du/ bcom ldan 'das rjes su stsal bar bgyi'o// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa
bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// spyan ras gzig kyi bang phyug phyag rgya
chen pos phyag rgyas btab ste ngas kyang byin gyis brlabs so// sngon gyi de bzhinagshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis kyang phyag rgyas btab cing byin gyis babs kyis/
smyos shig/ gsang ba ba lag na rdo rjadang/ rdo rje 'chang ba dang/ rdo rje'i snying po thams cad dam tshig la gnas pa'i lha dang/ klu dpaganod sbyin dang/ dri za dang/ lha ma yin dang/ nam
mkha' lding dang/ mi 'am ci dang/ lto 'phye chen po thams cad kyis lo a su bzung ba smos shig/ spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug 'ag sngags 'chang thams cad kyi ngasam pa yongs su rdzogs pa'i
go skabs dang mchog grub par byos shig/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'a phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' bsgo zhing dbugs byung
ba thos nas snying dga'/ smin ma bskums/ dpral ba phyed khros par byas/ gdong khro gnyer tu byas/ mchog ni gtsigs// spyan ras gzigs kyi lus 'khor mang po'i nang bcom ldan 'das kyi
spyan sngar 'ju gnas / don yod pa'i zhags pa khro bo'i rgyal po 'di lcas la/ dus gsum na bzhugs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo// byang chub sems dpa' thams
cad dang/ 'phags ba rdo rje 'chang ba dang/ dkyil 'khor chen po'i lha rnams la phyag 'tshal lo// 'das pa dang/ ma 'ongs pa dang/ da ltar byung ba'irang sangs rgyas dang/ 'phags pa
nyan thos kyi dge 'dun rnams la phyag 'tshal lo// yang dag par song ba rnams la phyag 'tshal lo// yang dag par zhugs ba rnams la phyag 'tshal lo// shA ba da ti'i bu blo gros can la thug
'tshal lo// drang srong chen po'i tshogs la phyag tshal lo// rgyal tshab tu dbang bskur ba byams pa la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo// khams
gsum pa'i bdag po nag po chen po ma mo'i tshogs kyis bskor ba la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa 'od dpag med la phyag 'tshal lo// khro bo'i rgyal rig sngagA
kyi rgyal po chen po'i tshogs la phyag 'tshal lo// dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug thugs
rje chen po la phyag 'tshal lo// tad+ya thA/ o bi kr-i ta/ ba da na ma hA kro d+ha rA dzA/ ba yaM ka ra/ ma hA b+haM/ aT Ta hA sa na/ dzA la dzA la/ ma tAdzA la/ ma la ma tA ro dra/ rU pa b+ha yaM ka
'awaM ran/ ha na han/ sawaduny+tsa/ yakArAkAsan/ daha dra ha/ sarbajuny+tsa/ nA gAnAn/ pa tsa pa tsa/ sarba duny+tsa/ bi gyu/ ba nAyakon/ pA ti ya pA ta ya/ sarba dusatAnaM/ b+ho b+ho mahA kro d+ha
rA dza/ ma Ni ka na ka badzra/ ba zur/ a lang kr-i tisha rI ran/ badzra par shu pA sha has ya/ mahA pad+ma/ oM kusha b+hu dzA ya/ mahA pad+ma A sa nA ya/ mahA ba u0fa9bi ka tsagats+tshA ya//
a mo g+ha a pra ti ha to/ ba la par kra ma ya/ sa ha sra/ ba rgyu ya/ sarba b+hu ta/ b+ha yaM ka rA ya/ sarba de ba b+ha ba na/ kam ba ud b+ha bA ya/ mahA bi kr-ita/ ba ra nA ya/ narasi ha mu cha
ya/ d+ha ra d+hur/ badzra dzA la/ d+hu ru d+hu ru/ ma hA tsaN+Da/ beg b+har/ tsar tsa ra/ tsatsar/ tsa tshar/ nishA tsar/ Ipah+pha ra/ hUM ku T+Thi mu kha/ hUM hUM phaT/ sa ra sa'/ pra sa ra
pra sa ra/ sarbapA pa/ kil+li 'aha ra/ mahA ma Ni/ te dzat+tar/ pad+ma ha// oM pad+ma aM ku sha/ b+hu dze/ ta rA ya/ man ma ya/ bish+tsa/ shA sa ya/ duny+tsan/ nA sha ya/ sarlu pA pa ba ra Na/
hUMphaT+TasatA/ pAsha has ma satA/ pad+mad+ha ra ya satA sa mAshas kA ya pAhA/ a mo g+ha b+har b+ha rA ya satwA/ kro d+ha ra dze g+ha yaM ka rA ya wanA/ ba ba ra d+ha rA ya AtA/ rwa lokya pU dzati
ya satA/ a ma ba ru Na/ ku bar/ na ma/ kr-i ta ya mAhA/ badzra d+ha ra mA dzi ta ya AtA mahA kA la ma tri ga Na/ ban di ta/ pU dzi ta ya satA/ de ba ga Na/ ban di tA ya sa/ nAka

a kanA ya satA o b+ha ra b+ha ra/ b+hi ri d+hi ri/ d+hu ru b+hu ru/ sarba maN+Da la a b+hi'i ta sa ma ya satA brgya mu dru a rnyiT+Thi ta mu pA ya swAhA/ oM a mo g+ha ba ra de/ ma hA da/ oM kusha badzra
mo pad+ma/ Ashas rnya ra/ na mo stu te/ a mo g+ha aM ku sha hU~M phaT+ThamAtA/ khro bo'i rgyal po chen po'i gzungs 'di smras pa dang/ lha'i gnas dang bcas pa dang/ ri rab dang bcas
pa'i rgya mtsho gnas dang bcas pa rang/ gzhal med khang rnams kun tu 'gul lo// stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams rnam pa drug tu g.yos so// ma rungs pa'i klu dang/
lha ma yin dang/ gnod sbyin dang/ srin po dang/ 'byung po dang/ sha zathams cad dang 'dud lasogs pa dang/ log 'dren ma rungs pa dang/ gdon ma rungs pa rnams kha sbyab tu
[5/ ]nubya/ 'gyel lo// ma rungs pa thams cad kyi khyim kun tu tshig ste 'bar ba/ kun tu 'bar/ rab tu 'bar/ 'bar ba gcig tu gyur cing bsregs pa dang/ ngu zhing 'dre ldog
ste tshor ba dragalo mi bzad pa chen po myong ngo/ lha thamasacad shin tu'akhrugs shing lag go/ bdud kyi rigs rnams bred nas khas btags so// 'jig rten gsum gyi bdag po thams cad
kun tu 'khrugs so// rgya mtsho na gnas pa'i klu dang/ rgya mtsho'i klu chen po dga' bo dang/ bsnyen dga' bo dag kyang kun tu 'khrugs shin tu skrag ste snying 'dar 'o// gzhan yang sa'i steng na
tshe chu stong phrag brgya gnas pa dang/ rgya mtsho'i chu'inang gi klu gang dag dang/ ri la gnas pa gang yin pa de dag thams cad kun tu 'khrugs shing skrag ste gcig tu 'bar bar gyur cing gdung
tshe so/ rgyal po chen po bzhi rnams gnam na 'dug na'ang skag ge/ nag lo chen po dang/ tshogs chen po'i gtso bo dang/ ma mo'i tshogs kyis bskor ba de dag thams cad skrag cing snying
ba 'da' 'o// gnas ma brten pa'i bdud kyi gnas rnams 'daro// 'bar kun tu 'bar te gnas dang bcas par sreg go/ de nas 'khor de'i nang gi lha dang klu rnams bcom ldan 'dus
kyi steng rol nas bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa bya ba'i phyir me tog sna tshogs 'thor ro// lha rdzas kyi rgyun sbyad pa sna tshogs dang chos gos kyi char pa 'babs so// mchod pa'i las byed
xxx
de nas gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po phyag na rdo rje lus 'bar zhing rdo rje gasor te/ shin tu 'gying bag tu seng ga'i 'gros kyi byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras
gzigs dbang phyug ga la ba de logs su song ste nye bar phyin nas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bcom ldan 'das spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas/

zla ba yid du 'ong ba dri ma med pa'i me tog gi rin po che sna tshogs kyis smras pa'i 'phreng ba bcom ldan 'das phyag na pad+ma la phul to/ zla ba yid du 'ong ba dri ma med pa 'i me tog gi 'phreng ba rin po che sna
tshogs kyis spras pa 'di dgul lo dras spyod pa'i phyir dang/ bdag la thugs rtse ba'i slad du thugs rje chen pos bzhes su gsol/ gang gis bdag yun ring por phan pa dang bde bar 'gyur pa lags so//

khro bo chen po'i yang chen po bshad cing gang dran pa tsam gyis stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten kyi khams rnam pa drug tu g.yos so// gang dag bdud ma rungs pa dang/ gang dag klu ma rungs pa dang/
gnod sbyin dang/ srin po dang/ 'byung po dang/ sha za ma rungs pa dang/ log 'dren ma rus pa rnams khyim dang bcas te lus kun tu tshig cing 'ab tu 'baranas kha sbub tu 'gyel cing sreg go/ shi la
'thug pa dang srog bskams par 'gyur ba'i don yod pa lcags kyu khro bo'i rgyal po chen po ni dus thams cad du mgo'i spyi bor blang bar bgyi'o// bcang ngo// bsgom mo// mchod do//
rgyas par bgyi'o// rig sngags 'chang gang gi lag na khro bo'i rgyal po 'chang bar 'gyur pa dang/ rigs kyi bu dang/ rigs kyi bu mo dang/ dag slong dang/ dge slong ma dang/ dge bsnyen dang/ dge bsnyen
ma dang/ dge sbyong dang/ bram ze dang/ rgyal rigs dang/ rje'u rigs dang/ mos rigs kyi lags na thogs pa'i m/ lus la thogs pa 'am/ lta ba 'am/ dri ba 'am/ tha na khro bo'i rgyal po nyan pa
tsam de'ang bcom ldan 'das bdag gis khur du bskur bar bgyi'o// spyi bor blang bar bgyi'o// bsrung bar bgyi'o// yongs su bskyang bar bgyi'o// bsam pa dang yid la re ba thams cad yongs su
rdzogs par bgyi'o// grub pa chen po'i chen po rdzas su stsal bar bgyi'o// gnod sbyin dang/ srin po dang/ bgegs dang/ log 'dren dang/ ma rungs pa thams cad so sor bsal bar bgyi'o//
rtag tu rjes su 'brang zhing bsung ba dang/ bskyab pa dang/ sba bar bgyi'o// rtag tu dus thams cad du mthong brjes su stsal bar bgyi'o// rtag tu rgyun mi 'chad par yo byad thams cad kyis mi
brel cing phun sum tshogs par yongs su bskyang bar bgyi'o// lus la stobs dang// brtson 'grus dang/ gzi brjid bskyed cing bsod nams dang ye shes kyi grogs bgyi'o// dgra thams cad
so sor bsal bar bgyi'o// nor dang/ 'bru dang/ bza' ba dang/ btung ba dang/ gos dang/ spyod pa dang/ rgyun rjes su stsal bar bgyi'o// bu gcig pa 'dra bar rjes su bskyang bar bgyi'o//
dad pa dang gus pas dus kun tu mchog tu mos par bgyi'o// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis/ gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen
po lag na rdo rje la 'di skad ces 'gan rdo rje khyod kyis khas blangs pa mchog tu bzang po byas pa 'di legs so legs so zhes smras te/ lag pa g.yas pa brkyang nas zla ba yid du 'ong ba dri ma
med pa'i me tog gi 'phreng ba rin po che sna tshogs kyis spras pa blangs te/ lag na rdo rje l rjes su brtse ba'i phyir dang/ de bzhin gshags pa thams cad kyis yongs su longs spyod pa'i phyir
dang dkyil 'khor na gnas pa'i lha thams cad kyis yongs su longs spyod pa'i phyir dang/ lha dang/ klu dang/ gnod sbyin dang/ dri za dang/ lha ma yin thang/ nam mkha' lding dang/
mi 'am ci dang/ lto 'phye chen po dang/ mi dang/ mi ma yin pa thams cad dkyil 'khor gang yin pa 'di'i 'jug cing dam tshig la gnas pa rnams yongs su longs spyod pa'i phyir rjelta ba bzhin
du 'dug ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i dbu'i gong du gtor ro// de nas 'phreng ba de nam mkha' de la gtor ma thag tu phyogs bcu'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dbu'i stang du zla ba yid tu
rung shukla// 'ong ba dri ma med pa'i ma tog de khang bu brtsa gas pa// rin po che sna tshogs kyis smras pa// 'od 'tsher ba/ ka ba bzhi dang sgo bzhi legs par rnam par 'byes pa/ gru bzhi
[】 ]lham pa/ chu zheng shin tu rgya che ba/ shin tu nang ya sa pa/ mi tog kan mya dag gis mdzes pa/ gzhal med khang sna tshogs yongs su gyur te gnas so// de dag byang chub sems dpa'idabu'i

skyong thad kar yang de bzhin du zla ba yid du 'ong ba dri ma med pa'i me tog rin po che sna tshogs smras pa'i khang bu brtsegs pa'i gzhal med khang du shin tu gnas so// de lag na rdo rje'i dbu'i steng
@# gi thad kar yang zla ba yid du 'ong ba drim med pa'i me tog khang bu brtsegs par shin tu gnas so// de 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi steng thog thag tu'ang zla ba yid du 'ong ba dri ma
med pa'i ma tog khang bu brtsegs pa nor bu rin po che chen po sna tshogs kyis smras pa me tog ka ta khyis mdzes par byas te gnas so// khang bu brtsegs pa'i nye 'khor kun gshin rje dang/ chu lha dang/
lus ngan po dang/ dga' bo dang/ nye dga' bo dang/ dbang phyugadang/ dbang phyug chen po'i lha'i bu dang/ tshangs pa dang/ khyab 'jug dang/ dbang phyug chen po rnams lag na snga yab thogs nas
g.yob cing 'dug go/ de dag kyang 'khor 'dus pa chen po mang pos yongs su bskor cing mdun du byas so// daT+Takyil 'khor gyi rig ba'i rgyal po'i lha de dag thams cad kyang nam mkha' la zla ba

yid du 'ong ba dri ma med pa'i me tog khang bu brtsegs pa'i 'phreng ba'in po che sna tshogs kyis smras pa'i khang bu brtsegs pa'i nang na 'khod pa ni/ nyi ma dang zla ba sgra ba bzhin dang/ nam mkha' la zla

ba nya ba na rgyu skar dang skar ma'i tshogs kyis longs su bskor ba smra ba bzhinatus pa'i gnas so// me tog de dag gi nang na lha rdzas kyi zla ba yid du 'ong pa dri ma med pa'i me tog sna tshogs dang//
lha rdzas kyi pad+ma dang/ ku mu da dang/ puN+Da ri ka dang/ man du 'dang/ mahAman da ra dang/ ma tog ro tsa dang ma hA ro tsa dang/ ma tog sa la dang/ tA la ka dang/ me tog ta ma la dang
tsam pa ka dang/ ma rtog a b+himug tu ka dang/ me tog a sho ka dang/ me tog pa ta la dang/me tog ni la dang/ ma hA nI la dang/ me tog gan b+hacha ka dang/ me tog su ma na dang/
ta ra Na dang/ ku ya ka'i me tog gi char gyi rgyun phab bo// bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa dang/ dkyil 'khor chen po de la mchod pa'i phyir dang/ lha rdzas kyi chos gos skud pa dang rgyan sna tshogs
kyi char ji srid ducha' 'bab cing/ phyogs bcu'i de bzhin gshegs pa thamathad la mchod do// de ltar na cho 'phrul che ba'i che ba dag snang ngo// rol mo'i sgra yan lag lnga pa dag kyang ma bzung
pa nam mkha' la sgra byung ngo///'phags pa don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po'i cho ga zhib mo'i rgyal po bam po nyi shu bzhir/// de nas de bzhin
tha @#// gshegs pa bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la legs so zhes bya ba byin te//
sems can dag pa chen po mchog tu dkon pa'i khro ba'i rgyal po 'di stsas te/ rig sngags 'chang thams cad mchog tu grub par bya ba'i phyir ma rungs pa thams cad 'dzoms pa/ sdig pa
thamasacad sreg pa bshad pa legs se legasaso// 'di ni phyi ma'i tshe phyi ma'i dus na rig sngags 'chang ba rnams kyis lan cig dran pa tsam gyis dgos pa thams cad byed par 'gyura'o//
tsha yid la re ba thams cad yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur/ 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug mthong ba'i sbyin pa' 'gyur/ gnas thams cad du gtogs pa'i grub pa chen po 'ab
lho ston par 'gyur/ rig sngags 'chang ba rnams kyis yangs shing rgya chopa' chen po thams cad byed par 'gyur/ phyi ma'i tshe phyi ma'i dus na 'di ni 'jig rten las 'das pa gcig pu mchog
'grub par 'gyur te/ las sgrub pa yang dag par 'grub pa'i phyir ro// de nas khros pa'i gad rgyangs spyi gtsug 'bar ba zhes bya ba'i gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po gnod sbyin chen po stong
phrag brgya'i bdag po stobs che ba/ dpung che ba/ brtan zhing pha rol gnon pa chen po gang gi lag mthil gcig gis ri'i rgyal po lhun po chen po sgul bar byed pa/ lha'i gnas gzhal med/
khang dang bcas te rgya mtsho chen po na gnas te 'khor bye ba phal po che dang ldan pa/ drag po gzi brjid drag po stobs che ba/ pha rol gyi dpus 'joms par byed pa de stan las langs nas/
bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su song ste nye bar phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas te 1 bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas/ bcom ldan 'ad
kyi zhabs la btud de 'di skad ces gsol to/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan 'as gzigs dbang phyug gis/ khro bo'i rgyal po chen po'i gzung
mig lcags kyi rgyal po shin tu mi bzad pa'i gsang sngags bshad pas ni bcom ldan 'aa gzhal med khang dang bcas pa bsregs so// gnod sbyin du mi stong phrag bye ba khrag khrag 'khor dang bcas
pa 'bar ba gcig tu gyur te bsregs so// bcom ldan 'das bdag ni zhig skye tshigacing zhu bar gyur to// bcom ldan 'das de bdag gis ji ltar bsgrub par bgyi/ bdag la skyob pa su lags/
dpung gnyen du 'gyur pa su lags/ bcom ldan 'das bdagani srog rnam par zhig go/ dus kyi zhags pas bcingasaso// bcom ldan 'das bdag la phan gdags su gsol/ bde ba'i gshegs
pa bdag la bskyab tu gsol/ de nas de bzhin gshags pa bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pas/ khros pa'i gad rgyas spyi gtsug 'bar ba gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to//
gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po byed ma 'jigs pa khro bo'i rgyal po lcags kyu'i dkyil 'khor gyi rjes su song zhig/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dba'achen po 'phags pa spyan sa
gzigs dbang phyug la skyabs su nye bar song zhig/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan sa gzigs dbang phyug 'di ni khyod kyi sgrub sa dang/ dpung gnyen dang/ skyobs pa dang/
rten du 'gyur te/ gang gis 'khor gyi tshogs dngadzad s pa'i gnod sbyin stong phrag brgya'i srog dang bral bar mi 'gyur ba yin no// kyi gnod sbyin chen po myur bar myur bar song ste skyabs su 'gro ba
'tsho byos shig/ de nas khros pa'i gad rgyangs can gtsug phud 'bar ba'i gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po bcom ldan 'das kyis dbugs phyung ba rtogs nas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen/
bo 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyugag la ba de logs su song ste/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la ngu zhing brgyal nas lag pa
brkyang ste/ zhabs la btud nas 'di skad ces gsal to// bcom ldan 'das bdag bskyab tu gsol/ thugs rje chen po bdag bskyab tu gsol/ bdag la srogo stsal bar mdzad du gsol/
bcom ldan 'das bdag ni bsrasgashigacig tu 'bar bar gyur to// bcom ldan 'das gnod sbyin du ma stong phrag brgya bye ba 'khor dang bcas pa srog dang 'bralakha' 'gyur ro// shes pa ni stor//
stobs dang/ brtson 'grus dang/ sbyo bar byed pa ni nyams na/ bcom ldan 'das bdag gi lus su zhig gis gso bar bgyid/ byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis/
