khros pa'i gad rgyas spyi gtsug 'bar ba'i gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// kye gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po nyon cig/ ngaji srid ston gyi bar du yud tsam zhig sdod
cig/ gnod sbyin gyi bdag po khyod kyis 'dzam bu'i gling gi gnas can mang po la rnam par gtse bar byas/ khyod kyis bud med dang/ skyes pa dang/ khye'u dang/ bu mo mang po ni zas na/
khyod kyis 'phags pa'i smyan mang po ni nyams par byas/ khyod kyis rig sngags dang/ dkyil 'khor dang/ cho ga zhib mo mang po'i bar chad na byas/ grub pa rnams ni med par byas/ ma grub pa
rnams kyang med par byas/ skal ba can mang po ni med par byas/ skal ba'od pa ni yod par byas/ mi 'a ba dang/ srog dang/ longs spyod kyi bde ba ni med par byas/ 'tshob dang srog rnam par
'jig pa ni 'phel bar byas/ khyod kyis legs par bshad pa ni yongs u bor/ khyod kyis nyes pa bshad pa dang ser sna mang du byas// rig sngags 'chang thams cad dang sems can thams cad
la khyod nag po dang rnam par 'jig pa rab tu gnas/ khyod kyis nga sems thams cad ni rtsel/ khyod kyis dag ba'i rtsa ba rnams ni nub par byas/ lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten na khyod shin tumi bzad
pa sdig pa can yin/ gshin rje'i 'jig rten gyi gnas dang bcas/ bdud dang bcas/ tshangs pa dang bcas pa'i nang na khyod gcig bu ngan sems can bar chad byed par skyes pa yin
te/ rgyu des na gnas skabs 'di 'dra ba thob pa yin pas/ kyi gnod sbyin gyi bdag po dam tshig dang/ bslab pa dang/ sdom pa khas blang pa dang/ dge ba'i chos byos shig/ 'on tang kho ba/
khyod kyi skyabs dang dpung gnyen du 'gyur bar bya'o// khyod sdug bsngal bas nyam thag pa dang/ bcing ba mi bzad pa dang/ me 'bar ba mi bzad pa'i 'jigs pa 'as pas yongs su thar bar bya'o//
mtho ris kyi lam du 'jug par bya'o// de nas khro sa pa'i gad rgyangs spyi gtsug 'bar bganod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po 'khor gnod sbyin bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong dums/ byang chub sems dpa' sems
dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi zhabs gnyis la btud nas/ byang chub sems dbasams dpa' chen saphags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la 'di skad ces gsol to//
bcom ldan 'das deng slan chad byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug khyod kyi bka' lung bzhin bgyis te dam tshig la gnas par bgyi'o// chos
kyi rjes su sems dpa' dang/ dkon mchog gsum la skyabs su mchis pa la gnas par bgyi'o// khro bo'i rgyal po 'di dang/ rig sngags kyi rgyal po lcags kyu'i gzungs dang/ chog zhib
mo dang/ gang yang rigs kyi bu dang/ rigs kyi bu mo dang/ dge slong dang/ dge slong ma dang/ dge bsnyen dang/ dge bsnyen ma rnams yongs su bskyang bar bgyi'o// don yod pa'i
lcags kyu'i gzuarig sngags kyi rgyal po 'di 'chang ba dang/ klog pa dang/ 'don pa dang/ bzlas brjod kyi cho ga kun spyod pa de la ni/ bdag gnod sbyin brgya stong du ma rnams kyis 'og
dang bla dang/ phyogs bzhi kun tu bsod nams su dmigAte/ bsrung ba dang/ sba ba dang/ bskyab par bgyi'o// yongs su bskyang bar bgyi'o// lus la stobs dang/ spro ba dang
gzi byin mang du bskyod par bgyi'o// de'i yul phyogs su 'thab pa dang/ rtsod pa dang/ 'gyed pa dang/ mtshang 'dru ba dang/ ma lags pa dang/ lo nyis pa dang/ mi ngas dang/ rims
dang gnod pa dang/ 'khrug pa dang/ nyam thag pa'i byed pa'i gdon dang bcas pa dang/ nad dang/ gcong dang/ nyon mongs pa dang/ sgrib pa thams cad rab tu zhi bar bgyi'o//
rab tshubasal bar bgyi'o// rkun po dang/ zol po dang/ mi rgod dang/ gcan gzan khro bo'i 'jigs pa rnams pasal bar bgyi'o// dus ma yin par 'chi ba'i 'jigs pa las
so sor bzlog par bgyi'o// rmi lam ngan pa dang/ ltas ngan pa dang/ bkra mi shis pa byung ba thams cad so sor bzlog par bgyi'o// char ches pa dang/ mar mi 'bab pa dang/
dus ma yin pa'i char dang/ sad dang/ than pa dang/ phyi ba'i 'jigs pa rnams so sor rnga bal bar bgyi'o// dben pa dang/ nyams dga' ba dang/ lo legs
dang/ 'byor pa sbyar bar bgyi'o// sems can mi dge ba spyod pa las bzlog par bgyi'o// dge ba la sbyor bar bgyi'o// sems can dag ba sbyod pa rnams kyi grogs bdag 'khor
dang bcas pas bgyi'o// yang dag par dad pas rjes su 'brang bar bsgrub par bgyi'o// bud med dang/ skyes pa dang/ khye'unang/ bu mo dang/ dag sbyong dang/ bram ze dang/ sems
mthams cad bu gcig pa bzhin du yongs su bskyang bar bgyi'o// chos la zhugs pa'i yid dang/ ngo tsha shes pa dang/ khrel yod pas gnas par bgyi'o// thams cad du bdag mchi bar bgyi'o/
ji ltar rang gi srog 'di yongs su bskyang ba bzhin du/ gzungs dazhig sngags grub pa 'di'ang yongs su bskyang bar bgyi'o// skye bos blang bar bgyi'o// khur du bskur bar bgyi'o// sgrub par
'grub pa chen po stsal bar bgyi'o// bgegs dang/ log 'dren thams cad dang/ sems can ma rungs pa dang/ gnod sbyin gyi chad pas so sor gnod pa so sor bzlogo par bgyi'o// de nas byang
chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags smyan sa gzigs dbang phyug gis/ khros pa'i gad rgyangs spyi gtsug 'bar ba gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// gnod
sbyin gyi rtse dgon chen po legs so legs so// khyod kyis de bzhin du bya bar rigs so// sems can thams cad rjes su gzung ba chen pos gzung bar bya'o// rig sngags 'chang ba la bdag
nyid kyis bsrung ba dang bsabar bya'o// dis gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po de skyabs gsum pa la gnas shing/ dkyil 'khor chen po'i dam tshig dang/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i bslab pa'i
ma tshig 'dzin pa la gnas par gyur to// rigs thamasacad kyi dam tshig dang ldan par gyur to// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems
dba' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la 'di skad ces bgabastsal to// yon tan gyi phung po mchog tu bzang ba la gnod sbyin gyi bdag po khas len du bcug cing bzhag pa legs so
legs so// khro ba'i rgyal po'i blog nyob spyad pa ni smos shig/ rig sngags 'chang de rnams ji ltar mchog 'grub par 'gyur ba dang/ lan cig dran pa tsam gyis ji lta ji ltar myur ba myur bar las
sgrub pa 'grub par 'gyur ba dang/ ji lta ji ltar dran pa tsam gyis ji ltar bsams pa dang mi la rab 'byor par 'gyur ba dang/ don yod pa'i lcags kyu khro bo'i rgyal po 'di myur du 'grub par 'gyur
ba de ltar byin gyi rlabs kyis byin gyisarlobs shig/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa sbyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' lung stsal pa
0 @#// rtogs nas nye bar bshad pa'i cho ga smras pa/ bcom ldan 'das rig sngags 'chang ba rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo 'am/ dge bsnyen nam/ dge bsnyen ma gang yin/
pa 'am/ gzhan dge sbyong dang/ bram ze dang/ rgyal rigs dang/ rje'u rigs dang/ dmangs rigs dang/ bud med dang/ skyes pa dang/ khye'u dang/ bu mo rnams khro po'i rgyal po 'di sgrub par

'dod n/ des zla ba yar gyi ngo'i tshes bco lnga la 'bras chan dang 'o ma za zhing/ nang ba'asngar langs la 'phagasapa sbyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi sku gzugs kyi spyan sngar skyil mo krung bcas te 'dug

tshu nas mi smra bar gaN+Di brdung ba'i dus la bab kyi bar du 'bras chanakhyor ba bkang ste/ gtor ma brgya rtsa brgyad dbul ba byas na/ des khro bo'i rgyal po sgrub pa'i cho ga de dag 'grub par 'gyur zhing mchog tu
'grub par 'gyur ro// de ltar bsgrubs nas/ de nas bzlas brjod gcig dang dran ba gcig gis thams cad 'grub par byas na/ thams cad du bya ba thams cad mchog tu 'grub par 'gyur ro//
de nas rig sngags 'chang ba las byed par 'dod cing/ rom yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying bo sgrub par 'don/ khro bo'i rgyal bo lan cig dran par bya'o// dran pa tsam gyi mod la bgegs dang log 'dren
thams cad skrag par 'gyur zhing/ dpag tshad tshun chad du rig sngags 'chang ba'i drung du 'ong bar mi nus te/ rgyang 'ang po na 'dug go/ 'di lan cig dran pa tsam gyis bzlas brjod dang/ cho ga dang/
sgrub pa bde bar 'grub cing dgos pa sgrub pa thams cad grub pa khrun med pa thob par 'gyur ro// 'phags pa snyan las gzigs dbang phyug mchog sbyin par mdzad par 'gyur ro// dpag tshad tshun chad du
'khor ba'i lcags kyu chen po 'phang duraMchan po tsam 'byung bar 'gyur te/ dpag tshad gsum gyi tshad tsam dang/ 'og tugayang sar gyur// su 'ang 'ong bar mi nus so// lha dang/ klu dang/ gnod
na dang/ srin po dang/ dri za dang/ lha ma yin dang/ nam mkha' lding dang/ mi 'am ci dang/ lta' phyi chen po dang/ mi dang/ mi ma yin pa dang bcas pas gnas der 'ong bar mi nus na/
ma ma yin pa phal pa dang/ bgegs dang/ log 'dren rnams kyis lta smos kyang ci dgos te gnas med do// rig sngags 'chang ba 'jigs pa med par yang dgos pa thams cad grub pa sgrub par
byed do/ bgegs med par thams cad du sgrub pa 'grub pa 'thob par 'gyur 'o// de nas rig sngags 'chang las thams cad bya bar 'dod cing/ gdon thasal bar 'dod na gu gul dang yungs kar
la lan cig bzlas brjod byas te/ gdon la bdug pa sbyin par bya'o// yungs kar gyis brdeg par bya'o// lan cig dran par bya'o// lag pa g.yas pa'i mdzub mos khros pas bsdigs par bya'o/
bdug pa dang/ brdeg pa dang/ dran pa lhan cig tu byas na mod la gdon thams cad 'jig par 'gyur ro// ci ste nag po chen po rang nyid dam/ lha ma yin gyi dbang po 'am/ sgra gcan nam/ 'jigs
@#// byed kyang 'jig par byed na/ gdonagazhan 'ong bar lta ga la 'gyur te/ mod la gcig tu 'jigs par 'gyur ro// 'byung po dang gdon gyis yongs su zin pa thams cad la dur
[】 ]khrod kyi thal ba la lan cig bzlas brjod byas te/ spyi bo'i gtor zhing lan cig dran par byas na/ mod la 'byung po dang gdon 'bros par 'gyur ro// na la da dang/ an dani dra ka ba tsa dang/ gu gul
dang ha sa dang/ la ka dang/ ma tu la dang/ bad+ma dang/ kun rnam gnyis dang/ ra dza ni dang/ yungs kar dang/ shing kun dang/ na ra pad+ma dang/ bsha ra dang/ tsan TIka rnams ra'i
gcin gyis sbrus te/ ril bu nas kyi 'dzalam tsam byas te grub la bsams la/ lcags kyu lan bdun bzlas pa byas nas las thams cad la bdug pa'i rgyal po mchog gi ril bu gcig bdug pa/
byas na stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams ri dang/ nags tshal dang/ gcong rong dang bcas pa rnams 'gul lo// rgya mtsho chen po ni 'khrugs so// ri rab chen po ni g.yos
so/ sum cu rtsa gsum gyi gnas gzhal med khang dang bcas pa ni cher g.yos te 'gul lo// lha thams cad skrag go/ lha ma yin thams cad ngu zhing phyogs phyogs su 'bros so// sa ni
g.yos so// klu gang dag rgya mtshona gnas pa dang/ gad sbyin dang srin po dang/ 'byung po dang/ yi dgas dang/ brjod byed dang/ gsang ba pa dang/ tshangs pa'i srin po dang/ bgegs dang//
gdon mi bzad pa gzhan ma rungs pa de dag thams cad dri tshor ba tsam gyis rnam par zhig par 'gyurati/ dogs par mi bya'o// lus rnam par zhig par 'gyur/ bcom ste sdus pa lhags bar 'gyur/
'chi bdag gi zhags pa'i kha 'gro bar 'gyur/ sa rnam pa zhig bar 'gyur ba de la dogs par mi bya'o// dug dang bcas pa ni mod la dug med par 'gyur ro// klu 'jog po dang nor rgyas kyis
gal te zin pa 'am/ sbrul gyis zin pa la bdugs pa dang byugs pa tsam gyis thams cad du dug med par 'gyur ro// gang dag 'jig rten na dug sna tshogs mi bzad pa yod pa la brtag pa'i dri
tsam dang/ bskus pa dang/ ril bu tsam gyis yod la dug tham na med par gyur te the tshom mi bya'o// 'bras dang/ phol mig dang/ lu ta dang/ shu ba dang/ sha bkra dang/ rkang shu dang/
mdze dang/ 'brum bu dang/ lhog pa rnam pa mang bo dang/ nad mchad pa dang/ lnga pa 'phreng ba dang/ khong 'bras dang/ rkub na ba dang/ skrun dang/ 'khru ba dang/ rtsib logs na ba dang/
snying kha na ba dang/ grub 'gags pa dang/ rna ba na ba dang/ so na ba dang/ mig na ca dang/ mgo bo na ba dang/ gzhogs phyed na pa la ril bu bsus pa tsam dang/ chudron 'thungs pa tsam dang/
bdugs pa tsam dang/ bsams pa tsam gyis thams cad de ma thag tu rab tu zhi bar 'gyur te/ thams cad la ril bu dam pa lan cig bzlas brjod byas te byin na thams cad du dgos pa thams cad byed
pa bram d pa yin no// shin tu rmar rma ba dang/ char mi 'bab pa dang/ dus ma yin pa'i char dang/ rlung dang/ ser ba dang/ 'byung po dang/ ma mo' tshogs dang/ mtsho'i klu
de dag thams cad dbang du 'gyur 'o// char jus su 'bebs so// lo tog dang/ 'bras bu dang/ me tog yod par 'gyur ro// phyis ser ba mi 'bab bo// sad dang/ rlung dang/ than pa
mi 'byung ngo// phun sum tshogs pa thams cad grub bar byed cing bkra shis pa thams cad grub par byed do// mas drag po ma rungs pa kun tu 'jugs pa'i rims mi bzad pa dang/ 'dus pa
'a mi bzod pa drag po'i rims dang// rims drag po'i 'jigs pa chen po dang/ me 'bar ba shin tu che ba dang/ zhag bzhi pa'i las mi bzad pa dang/ grang pa'i rims sdug bsngal che ba dang/ rims
gang dag 'chi ba'i zhags pa 'bar ba 'khrug pa drag po mi bzad pa dang/ zlos ba'i mas gso dka' ba dang/ nyin gcig pa'i rims dang/ nyin gnyis pa'i rims dang/ nyin gsum pa'i rim
dang de bzhin du rlung las gyur pa dang/ bdakan las gyur pa dang/ mkhris pa las gyur pa dang/ mchil ma las gyur pa'i rims dang rims rnying pa dang/ zug gzer dang/ gzhang 'brum dang/
gcin sA ba mi bzad pa dang/ rims thams cad la bdugs pa tsam gyis the tsom med par rnam par 'jig par 'gyurano// nam mkha' lding gi gdon dang/ gang dag me 'am ci'i gdon
0// dang lto 'phye chen po'i gdon nang/ mi ma yin pa'i gdon dang/ gang dag gzhan me'i gdon thams cad brtag pas bzhugs pa des mod la thams cad rnam par bral bar 'gyur ro//
lcags kyu'i gsang sngags dam pa lan cig dran par byas na skem byed dang/ bskams pa dang/ brjed byed dang/ gdon ra za yag glu dang/ bdag nyid ngan par byung ba dang/ grib gnon
dang 'thab pa dang/ rtsod pa gang du skya bo zhe sdang ba rnams 'byung ba dang/ gang du gnod pa dang/ 'khrugs pa dang/ nyon mongs pa mang po rnams la yid du 'ong ba bdugs pa tsam
gyis thams cad las de thar bar 'gyur ro// rgyal po khros pa dang/ gang zhig rkun po dang/ mi rgod kyi nang du song ngam/ gcong rong bgrod dka' ba'i nang du song ngam/ dog pa mi
bzad pa'i nang du chud pa la lcags kyu lan cig dran pa dang/ bdug pa mchog gis brtags na thams cad du rtag tu bde bar 'gro ba dang/ gang dang gang du 'gro ba na bde bar 'gyur ro//
de'i lus la mes mi tshugs/ chu chen pos 'khyer bar mi 'gyur ro// lcags kyu'i rig sngags dran pa dang/ bdug pa mchog gis bdugs nA thamA cad du pha rol phyin pa dang/ bde zhing
legs pa shin tu rgyas par 'gyur ro// de'i lus la mtshon gyis mi tshugs/ dug gis ma yin/ gsang sngags mchog tu drag pos ma yin/ de la byad kyis mi tshugs/ nad kyis
bya/ dam yin/ nyon mongs pa drag pos ma yin/ gsang sngags dran pa tsam dang/ bdug pas bdag bcug pa ni thams cad du 'jig pa thamadu las thar bar 'gyur te/'di la dogs ]
pa mi bya'o// dgra dang phyir rgol ba'i mi sems can ma lus pa mi bzad pa rnams dang/ 'thab mo 'gyed cing g.yul 'gyed pa nazad g ri bdug pas gcun cing rigasngags lan cig dran par
byas na thams cad du rgyal bar 'gyur to// mthong ba tsam la dog par mi bya'o// gang zhig rig sngags 'grub par mi 'gyur ba dang/ gang zhig bgegs kyis zin te nyams pa/
smyo/ dang/ blo zhan cing la lo can la bdug pa 'di sbya'aba' bya zhing/ gsang sngagasalan cig bzlas brjod byas na des mchog tu dkon pa 'grub par 'gyur ro// skal ba med pa
bdag nyid bdug pa dang/ ril bu mchogags bkru ba dang/ mig bsku ba dang/ mchog thig la byas na thams cad du skal ba can dang/ dga' ba dang/ dbang phyug mtshungs pa
med par 'gyur ro// nor dang 'bru 'phel zhing rgyal bo dang 'dra bar 'gyur ra// thams cad du stobs thogs pa med par 'gyur ro// thams cad du mchog 'grub pa dang/ rtag tu
rgyun mi 'chad par dus thams cad du gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po bzhis bsrung ba dang/ bsgrub pa dang/ sba bar bya ba'i phyir nyin mtshan du rjesasu 'brang zhing gnas par 'gyur ro// bsrung
kha'i phyir rgyal po chen po bzhi dpung 'khor dang bcas ba rig sngags kyi rjes su 'brang bar 'gyur ro// bde ba thams cad kyis tshim pa thob par 'gyur ro// gnas gcig nas ril bu brten byas
la khro bo'i lcags kyu lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas brjod bya'o// de nas rigasngags 'chang ba 'am/ gzhan gang yang rung ba sa/ dge sbyong dang bram ze bkren pa stug 'phongs pa'i bud med dam/
skyes pa 'am/ khye'u 'am/ bu mo'i don du ril bu gcig gis khrus byas/ gcig gis bdag bdug/ gcig gas gos bdug/ gcig ni'i rnam lnga dang sbyar te btung bar bya/ gcig ni mgo'i spyi bor
gzhag/ gcig ni dpung pa g.yas ba gdags/ ril bu gcig ni skud par btags na thams cad du 'byor pa thob par 'gyur zhing/ thams cad du mchog bla na med pa 'grub par 'gyur ro// bsam
pa 'grub par 'gyur/ rgud pa thams cad rnam par zhig la 'gyur ro// tshe dang/ nyamachung ba dang/ de bzhin du chag grugs dang/ bgegs kyis zin pa dang/ gdon ra za yagashAs zin pa de dag
thams cad rab tu sbyar ba tsam gyis rnam par zhig par 'gyur te dogs par bya'o// sgrib pa thams cad rnam par zhig par 'gyur te/ sngon bsags pa'i sgrib pa thams cad yod la rnam par zhig
bar 'gyur te/ gsang sngags bsten kha dang/ gsang sngags dran cing dran pa dang/ bdug pa mchog gis bdug bar byas pas dogs par mi bya'o// mnar med pa dang/ mi bzad pa'i
sdig pa dang/ dug dang/ sems can ma rungs pa dang/ las ngan pa dang/ phung ba rnams thams cad mod la med par 'gyur ro// mes phye ma leb bzhin rtag tu myur du
sreg par 'gyur ro// gsang sngags lan cig dran par bya zhing bajug pa 'dis bdugs na dus ma yin par 'chib thams cad zhig par 'gyur ro// thams cad du sbyar ba la dog par mi bya'o//
'khor los sgyur ba thams cad kyis khro bo'i lcags kyi spyi gtsug 'bar ba zhes bya ba'i bdug pa'i rgyal pos khyim dang sgo chen po'i nam langs ka dang mun pa sros khar bdug cing gsang sngags
lan cig dran par byas na/ khyim gyi nang der gang dag mi snang par 'jug par 'gyur ro// gnod sbyin dang/ srin po dang/ 'byung bo dang/ sha za dang/ brjod byed dang/ grib gnon
ma rungs pa dang/ mi ma yin pa thams cad snang bzhin du phyir 'byung zhing ngus te/ kyi hud zer ba'i sa 'byin par 'gyur ro// khyim gang yin pa 'gul ba dang/ khyim dang rta babs rnams
'bar bar 'gyur zhing dmyal ba'i srung ma mi bzad pa thams cad phyogs bslad par 'gyur ro// gnod sbyin dang/ srin po dang/ 'byung bo dang/ lha ma yin dang/ nam mkha' lding dang/
dri za dang/ mi 'am cidang/ lto 'phya chen po dang/ klu mthu bo che thams cad bdug pa'i dri bla na med pas skrag par 'gyur ro// bsam pa ngan pa gang dag gnas pa'i khyim thams cad 'bab/
ba dang/ lus bsregs dang/ phyogs dang phyogs mtshams 'khrul ba dang/ bdug pa'i rgyal po'i mthus 'jigs pa mi bzad l thams cad rab tu zhi bar 'gyur ro// g.yul 'gyed pa
dang 'thab mo dang/ rtsod pa dang/ 'thab cing 'gyod pa thams cad 'ab tu zhi bar 'gyur zhing rtag tu rgyal bar 'gyur ro// bde zhing legs par rgyal ba 'grub pa dang/ thams cad du dpal
thob par 'gyur ro// lha dang/ lha ma yin dang/ dri za dang/ gnod sbyin dang/ srin po dang/ klu rnams kyis bsrung ba'i phyir nyin mtshan du rjes su 'brang bar 'gyur ro// de bzhin du rjes su sbyong
ba dang dus thams cad bla na med pagazi byin spyad par byed do// khro ba'i rgyal po'i lcags lu bla na med pa 'grub pa'i thig le brjod par bya'o// thig le skar ma lta bu ni/ lha yi nyi ma bzhin
du dpa'// nyi ma bye ba'i 'od dang mtshus// bsod nams gzi brjid dag gis 'bar/ mun khrod sgron chen 'od bzhin du// mun pa'i nang na snang bar 'gyur// tshogs kyi dkyilan mdzes pa
ni skar ma'i tshogs ldan zla ba bzhin// bsod nams bye ba stong phrag dang// dpag med gzhal dumed pa yis// lus 'di dag ni brgyan par 'gyur// mkha' la rin chen mchod sdong/
ltar mtshan dang dpe byad bzang pos brgyan// ril bu bstan pa byas nAni// lus ni bsod nams tshogs kyis bskyed// gang zhig lus 'bar ba dang// shin tu bzang po kho nar 'gyur//
@#/ 'jig rten mgon po dus rtag tu// phyag na spyi bor 'jog par mdzad// rtag tu mchog na sbyin pa dang// kun tu bla med grub par 'gyur// cho ga zhib mo 'grub pa dang/
gsang sngags 'grub cing phyag rgyu dang// dkyil 'khor 'grub cing dkyil 'khor gyi// rim par phyi ba 'grub 'gyur te// kun tu 'grub pa bla na med// gi'u wang dang/ gur kum dang/
ru rta ma bskams te sgyur la khro bo'i lcags kyu'i gsang sngags brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod byas la/ tshangs par sbyod pa mnyam par bzhag pa khrus legs par byas pa/ gos gtsang ma bgos

shing gtsang mas zla ba yar gyi ngo tshes bcugasum skar ma rgyal 'a bab pa'i tshonugatsang ma dang zhib tu btags la rgya shug gi 'bru tsam byas te sgrib ma la bskams pa la/ gang gi tshe dgos pa rtsom pa
de'i tshe khro bo'i rgyal po'i lcags kyu la lan nyi shu rtsa gnyis bzus brjod byas te smin mtshams su thig le bya'o// smin mtshams su thig le bzang po de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi byin gyi rlabs
kyis byin gyis brlabs pa mtshan nyid bzhin du thig le byas te byin gyis brlags pa byas pa'i mod la/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gtsug tor gyi mtshan nyid rnam par mdzes pa'i thig le
dang ma nyam par mtshungs par brgyan par 'gyur 'o// thams cad du mchod par bya ba dang/ rtag tu bla ma la gus pas dam tshig ma nyamapa dang/ rgyal po dang mtshungs pa'i blon po dang btsun mo'
0[j]nang du song na thams cad dga' bar 'gyur zhing/ thams cad du mchod par 'os par 'gyur ro// sems can kun gus pa dang dga' ba ji ltar 'jig rten 'dren pa la bya ba bzhin byed de/
nor dang/ 'bru dang/ lha'i dpal thob par 'gyur ro// lha thams cad kyis mchod par 'gyur// dbang po dang/ tshangs pa dang/ khyab 'jug dang/ dbang phyug chen po dang/ 'jig
rten skyong ba grags chen dang/ klu rnams kyis rtag tu mchod par 'os pa chen por 'gyur ro// gnod sbyin dang/ dri za dang/ gsang ba pa dang/ lha ma yin dang/ nam mkha' lding dang/
ma 'am cidang/ lto 'phye chen po rnam kyis rtag tu mchod pa chen por 'gyur ro// dbang phyug dang/ stobs dang/ brtson 'grus dang/ tshe 'phal bar 'gyur ro// nad med pa dang//
rims nad med pa dang/ sdig pa thams cad spangs pa dang/ sgrib pa thams cad las rnam par grol ba dang/ nyon mongs pa'i dri ma dang/ sdig pa dang/ dgra thams cad rab tu 'joms
pa dang/ dmag gi g.yul 'gyed pa'i nang du rtag tu thams cad du rgyal ba sbyin par 'gyuyo// dgra dang phyir rgol ba rnams las gnas thams cad du rtag tu kun tu rgyal bo chen po sbyin bar 'gyur ro
thig le de lta bu byas te khro bo'i lcags kyu lan cig dran par byas la/ yungs kar la lan cig bzlas brjod byas te phug gi sgo 'gator na ga thams cad sgo gdang par 'gyur ro// ji ltar
'dug ' bas 'jug par 'gyur ro// lan gsum zhugs kyi bar du sgo gtan 'jug pa'i gnas su khro bo'i lcags kyu 'ba' zhig bzlas brjod byas na/ de'i tshe lha'i bu mo rgyan
thams cad kyis brgyan pa/ bzang zhing mdzes pa/ blta bar 'os pa/ mchog tu mdog sdug cing 'khrig pa dang ldan pa/ dpal kyis shin tu dpa' zhing 'bar ba/ bzhin 'dzum pa/
lus ngo tsha tsha ltar byed pa/ 'gros 'gying bag tu 'ong bar 'gyur te/ spyi bo yid tsam btud nas gser gyi snod rin po ches bkang ba thogs te rig sngags 'chang la 'bul ba byed do// rig
lngags 'chang bas cang mi smra bar bya'o// na po che'i snod kyang blangs par mi bya'o// gsang sngags 'ba' zhig dran pa'i bya zhing yungs kar gyis gzhon nu ma la brdeg par bya'o// ci
mi sdug pa 'byin cing bzhin bsgyur ba/ khro ba'i gzugs mchu 'phyang ba/ mchab gcigs pa/ skra ral pa ser la gyen du brdzas la/ rol pa rtsod pan gyis brgyan pa 'a ston n/ bag skyugs
'chang bas skrag par mi bya'o// khro ba'i lcags kyu 'ba' zhig dran par bya'o// yang yungs kar gyis mgo'i spyi bor brdegatsang khros pa'i gzugs kyis dran par byas na/ de'i tshe de sa la 'gyil te
'dre ldog cing/ kyi rig sngags 'chang thugs rje can khyod rig sngags 'chang khyab 'jug gi gzugs can gum mo gum mo zhes sgra 'byin to// de nas rig sngags 'chang bas rjes su brtag
[s/ ]te gal te kha chu dbu bar 'byung na rig sngags 'chang pas de blangs la rkyang pa dang byin pa bsnyusan rlung gi phung po bdun pa'i rlung la zhon te nam mkha' la 'gro bar 'gyur ro// bag sngags
'chang ba 'khor lo sgyur bar 'gyur zhing/ rig sngags 'chang ba'i 'khor brgya phrag bye ba dgu bcu rtsa dgus bskor bar 'gyur ro// skad cig la stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten
gyi khams kyi mthar song zhing slar yang 'ong bar 'gyur ro// gal te reg na ni skyes nas lo bcu drug lon pa dang 'dra zhing sgra yid tsam 'khril zhing 'khyil ba rna cha gdu bu dri ma med cing spen
rtog 'phyang ba dang/ mkhrig ma gdu bus brgyan pa/ lus pad+ma'adra zhing dka' sham ru 'gyur// tsha bskal pa stong phrag bdun bcu rtsa gnyis thub par 'gyur ro// rig sngags 'chang
ba'i 'khor los sgyur ba stong phrag brgya dgu bcu rtsa gnyis kyi 'a khor gyis bskor bar 'gyur ro// gnas thams cad du dpon por 'gyur ro// gal te thig le byas te mi snang bar gyur na/
gnod sbyin dang/ srin po dang/ 'byung po thams cad kyis khyim gyi sgo phye ste 'jug par 'gyur ro// gnod sbyin dang/ srin po dang/ 'byung po 'khor dang bcas pa thams cad bgyi ba ci mchis
zhes dbang du 'gyur zhing bka' bzhin du 'dug go/ mngags pa'i dgos pa thams cad byed pa'i 'gyur ro// khyim thams cad du re rer yang dpon po dang bka' bzhin byed pa'i rgyal po'i
[xh]'ad+ma// 'gyur ro// gal te 'tshogs mar thig le byas na brgya byin dang/ lha rnams kyi dbang po sum cu rtsa gsum gyi rnam kyi bdag po'i lha dang/ sum cu rtsa gsum gyi ris
kyi lha'i bu dang bcas pa thams cad kyis mchod par 'gyur te/ rigasngags 'chang ba la bya ba thams cad kyis bsnyen bkur byed par 'gyur ro// shin tu mthong ba'i lha'i rigs kyi lha rnams dang lhan

cig tu rtsa dgad la kun tu spyod par 'gyur ro// tshe lha'i lo stong legs par thub par 'gyur ro// lte ba'i gnas su thig le byas te klu mtshor zhugs pa tsam gyis mod la klu'i rgyal po dpung dang g.yog tu
bcas/ chung ma dang bu mo gzhon nu ma 'am/ thams cad mdun na 'dug cing 'di skad smra ste// rig sngags 'chang ba bka' stsol cig dang/ las bgyi ba dang// dges pa thams cad bgyi zhing nam
'atsA'i bar du nye bar gnas par bgyi'o// yo byad thams cad kyis mi bral bar bsgrub par bgyi'o// ku'i lha'i longs spyod mchog tu longs spyad pas rtse bar bgyi'o// lha'i lo stong gi bar du rjes su
gnas par bgyi'o// nor thams cad rjes su stsal bar bgyi'o// rin po che rnam pa sna tshogs gser dang/ dngul dang/ bi spu dang/ shang ka shi la dang/ byu ru dang/ sa le sbram dang/ gser

etha dang/ mu tig dang/ in+d+ra nI la dang/ ma ra ka ta dang/ pad+ma rA ga dang/ barmadang/ shin tu bzang po rnams su stsal bar bgyi'o// lha rdzas kyi bza' ba mchog dang/ lha rdzas kyi nor gyi phung pos lang
mtsha dmadzod rnams 'ang tu dgang bar bgyi'o// shin tu char tshes pa gcad par bgyi'o// mar dkon pa na chur dbab par bgyi'o// dus ma yin pa'i char gcad par bgyi'o// dus su char dbab pa/
dang/ dus su char pa'i rgyun 'byung bar bgyi'o// lha rdzasakyi me tog sna tshogs dang/ lha rdzas kyi 'bras bu sna tshogs nye bar bsgrub par bgyi'o// nam 'tsho'i bar du gnas te bsnyen bkur
bgyi'o// rig sngags 'chang ba'i rkang pa spyi bos blang bar bgyi'o// rig sngags 'chang ba de'i tshig dang bsam pa rjes su bskyang bar bgyi'o// dpung pa gnyis kyi bar du thig le byas na glang
po che stong gi stangs yod par 'gyur te/ phyir rgol ba dang dgra thams cad kyi stobs kyis mi thub par 'gyur 'o// 'thab cing dmag gi g.yul 'gyed pa thams cad kyi nang du pha rol gnon pa'i stabru
thogs pa med pa rgyal ba sbyin par 'gyur// lha ma yin kun las kyang rgyal bar 'gyur ro// lha thams cad 'di la bsrung ba dang/ sba ba dang/ bskyang ba'i phyir rtag tu zhabs 'bring du 'brang ba'
'gyur ro// thabs pa dang/ rtsod pa dang/ 'gyod pa dang/ dngags 'byin pa dang/ tshang 'dru ba dang/ g.yul 'gyed pa thams cad du rgyal ba sbyin par 'gyur ro// lto ba'i thig le byas te khro bo'i
lcags kyu'i rig sngags lan cig dran par byas la/ yid la ji ltar bsams pa ji bzhin byas na ci 'dod pa'i kha zas thob par 'gyur te/ 'khor nyi shu dang bcas pas ji ltar 'dod pa thob par 'gyur ro//
sker thig le byas te khro bo'i lcags kyu skar lan cig bzlas brjod byed cing rgyal po'i pho brang du song na ji tsam 'dod pa'i gos dang/ skyud pa dang/ rgyan thob par 'gyur ro// rtag tu rgyal
[】 ]bo dang btsun mo'i 'khor dang bcas pas mchod par bya bar 'os pa'i mchog tu 'gyur ro// dbang phyug chen po 'i chen po thob pa 'grub par 'gyur 'o// lag mthil du thig le byas te lan cig bzlasabarjod
byas na gang la reg pa de dbang du 'gyur ro// gang 'dod pa de thams cad sbyin zhing bsko ba de thams cad byed par 'gyur ro// mag pa g.yas pa la bskus la lan cig bzlas brjod byas te/ grong khyer gyi

sgo la brdabs na grong khyer na gnas pa'i gnod sbyin dang srin po thams cad dbang du 'gyur te mdun na gnas shing/ de thams cad bsgo ba bzhin byed par 'gyur ro// grong de naskye bo gang dag gnas ba bud med
dang skyes pa dang/ khye'u dang/ bu mo de dag thams cad dbang du 'gyur te mdunan gnas shing/ ji srid grong khyer der 'dug par 'dod pas de srid du thams cad ci bya ba thams cad byed cing gnas pa
dang mdun na 'dug par 'gyur ro// lag pa g.yon pa la bskus te rgyal po'i sgo la brnabs na ji srid 'dug par 'dod na de srid du thams cad dbang du gyur pa sbyin par 'gyur ro// lag pa ga yas pa
la bsku zhing lan cig bzlas brjod bya ste/ phug gi gsang ba'i sgo la brdab pa byas na gsang ba'i khyim thams cad sgo phye ste 'dug cing/ khyim na gnas pa de dag thams cad dbang du gyur te 'dug go/
rkang pa gnyis la bsku zhing gsang sngags lan cig dran par byas te dur khrod du song na/ dur khrod na gnas pa'i gnod sbyin dang/ srin po dang/ 'byung po dang/ sha za thams cad mdun na gnas shing
dbang du 'gyur ba dang/ khyim gyi sgo thams cad phye ba dang/ thams cad bya ba ci yod pa byed par 'gyur ro// brla gnyis la bskus te nags tshal gyi nang du zhugs na zhugs pa tsam gyis khyim na
gnas pa thams cad mdun na gnas shing khyim gyi sgo thams cad phye ste 'jug par 'gyur 'o// sman gyi rdzas thams cad dang/ rtswa dang/ shing gel ba'i sman dang/ rtswa dang/ mag lcogs kyi
nags tshal gyi rang gi ngo bo thams cad ji ltar 'dod pa blangs pa bzhin du mdunanA'adug par 'gyur 'o// dpal lha mo chen mo'i nu ma'i bar du bsku zhing khros pas gsang sngags lan cig bzlas brjod
byas shing/ gu gul la bzlas brjod byas te bdug pa dbul zhing mig mi 'dzums par bltas na/ dpal lha mo chen mo bka' stsol cing mchog thams cad sbyin par byed do// nor shin tu mang po
red pa sbyin par mdzad do// dpal lha mo chen mo rtag tu khyim na gnas par 'gyur ro// yo byad rnam pa thams cad kyis yongs su skyong bar 'gyur 'o// ma 'tsho'i bar du bsnyen bkur byed par
'gyur// mi'i 'o ma dang lhan cig tu brdar la lan cig bzlas brjod byas te mig la bskus na gta' thams cad mthong bar 'gyur ro// mtshan mo'ang nyin par ngazhin du mthong bar 'gyur ro//
tha thublad/ mchu'i thor to la thig le bya shing lan cig bzlas brjod byas na gang la sba ba de dbang du 'gyur ni nga 2 gang 'dod pa de thams cad thob par 'gyur ro// tshig gzung bar bya bar 'gyur
ro/ kha nas ut+pa la'i dri mnam par 'gyur ro// gdon la thig le byas na zin pa dang ma zin pa 'bab par 'gyur ro// gdon thams cad la thig la bya zhing lan cig gsarasngags dran par byas na mod
la tshangs pa'i srin po lasogs pa'i bar du thams cad ngu zhing 'bros par 'gyur ro// thig le tsam dang dran pa tsam kyis thams cad las yongs su thar par 'gyur ro// 'jigs pa thams cad
la thig le byas na yongs su thar par 'gyur// phrag pa gnyis la thig la bya zhing khro bo lanAcig dran par byas na phrag pa gnyis 'ba' bar 'gyur ro// mtshal dang sbyar te dri chab dang bsres
nas lag pa dang rkang pa la bsku zhing gsang sngags lan bdun dran par byas nas phu zhes byas na me 'ba' bar 'gyur te/ ji tsam 'dod kyi bar du 'bar ba 'byung bar 'gyur ro// mchu la bsku zhing
bzlas brjod byas na dbugs rgyu ba rnams me 'bar bar 'byung bar 'gyur ro// lus mtha' dag bsku zhing gsang sngags mang du bzlum brjod byas na lus mtha'adag 'ba' bar 'gyur ro// chu dang
nyus kar gyis bskrad nas bum pa dang bum pa la zhi ba'i thig le byas te/ dri chus steng phyagator ba dang bcas pa byas na phyir yang gnas par 'gyur ro// ral gri dang/ gcan shing dang/[！]
dgra sta dang/ 'khor lo dang/ mdung rtse gsum pa dang/ rdo rje dang/ tho ba dang/ mda' bo che dang/ mdung la bsu zhing rjes su dran par byas na skad cig tu thams cad 'bar bar 'gyur ro//
lhung bzed la bskus na 'bar bar 'gyur ro// mgo la bskus na sku 'bar bar 'gyur ro// dung la bskus te de gnas mthon por busan sgra gang thos pa tsam gyis sems can thams
cad kyi khro bo thams cad dang sdig pa thams cad rab tu zhi bar 'gyur ro// ngan pa dang ma rungs pa thams cad zhi bar 'gyur ro// sprin logs su bus na rlung sprin dang ser ba thams cad
zhi bar 'gyur ro// grong khyer gyi sgo bzhir dus na byur dang/ gnod pa thams cad dang/ lo nyes dang/ nad ma rung pa dang/ 'thab pa dang/ rtsod pa dang/ 'gyed pa dang/ mtshang 'dru ba
dang/ mi bde ba dang/ 'khrug pa thams cad zhi bar 'gyur ro// 'byung po dang/ gnod sbyin dang/ srin po dang/ sha za dang/ yi dgas dang/ skam byed dang/ grib gnon gyi 'jig
pa thams cad 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro// rims thams cad zhi bar 'gyur ro// nad thams cad zhi bar 'gyur ro// gsang sngags dang/ byad dang/ sbod gtong dang/ dug gi 'jig/
pa thams cad las yongs su thar par 'gyur ro// rgyal po'i son bus na pha rol gyi dmag tshogs kyi 'jigs pa thams cad dang/ dgra dang phyir rgol ba'i 'jigs pa thams cad rab tu zhi
ba'i 'gyur zhing lan 'ga' yang 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro// ba lang 'acig dang/ phyags 'chi ba dang/ mi 'chi ba dang/ rtswa 'chi ba dang/ glang po che 'chi ba dang/
rwa mo 'chi ba dang/ byur dang/ lo nyis pa dang/ chu dang/ migand dong nad thams cad kyi 'jigs pa chen po 'byung bo la khang pa'i steng du skad drag po lan cig dung sgra 'bud cing bzlas brjod byas
na/ bus pa tsam gyis med la thams cad rab tu zhi bar 'gyur ro// char mi 'bab pa'i tshe klu'i gnos 'tsho 'gram du shusan mod la klu'i rgyal ba rnams char ba'i rgyun gtong bar 'gyur ro//
char ches pa'i tsho sbyin logs su bus na shin tu char chab zhi bar 'gyur ro// lan 'ga' yang mtshan ma ngan pa dang bkra mi shis pa 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro// mtshams chen po rgacar na
ri mthon po'i khar bus te/ rdzitsam dung sgra thos pa de tsam tshun chad mtshams chen po bcad par byas par 'gyur ro// dkyil 'khor gyi mtshams gcad nu bskor zhing bus na dkyil 'khor gyi
mtshams bcad par byas par 'gyur ro// de nas khro bo'i rgyal po'i sbyin sreg gi cho ga sgrub pa bran med pa thams cad bya ba la/ sems can thams cad zhi bar bya ba ni nas dang nyungs kar mar
dang bsres la shing arga'i ma bus te/ lan nyi shu rtsa gcig sbyin sreg byas pa tsam gyis dpag tshad kyi nang kun tu zhi ba chen bor 'gyur ro// yams kyi nad kyi gnod pa thams cad dang/ 'thab
ba dang/ rtsod pa dang/ 'gyur pa thams cad rab tu zhi bar 'gyur ro// lan brgya rtsa brgyad sbyin sreg byas na dpag tshad brgya tshun chad kun tu zhi ba chen po'i las byas par 'gyur ro// rgyas pa byas

na lungs kar dang/ 'bras sA lu dang/ kha ra dang sbrang rtsi dang/ mar dang bsres te sbyin sreg bya ba ni lan bdun sbyin sreg byas na dpag tshad brgya kun tu rgyas pa chen por 'gyur ro// lan nyi shu rtsa

gcig sbyin sreg byas na dpag tshad brgya tshun chad rgyas pa chen bor 'gyur ro// lan brgya rtsa brgyad sbyin sreg byas na dpag tshad brgya stong kun tu rgyas pa chen por 'gyur ro// shing dri mi zhig pa'i
me bus pa/ 'bras kyi thub ma dang/ lan tshwa dang/ yungs kar mar dang bsres te shing tsher ma can gyi yam shing gis me sbar te sbyin sreg lan bdun nam/ 7 shu rtsa gcig gas/ brgya
rtsa brgyad byas na yid la ji ltar sems shing 'dod pa thams cad du mngon spyod kyi las rnams byed par 'gyur ro// gsang sngags sgrub par 'dod na 'bras yo dang/ nyungs gar dang/ zhe dang/
sbrang rtsi rnams mar dang sbyar ta/ shing aka'i yam sreg shing gis me sbar te sbyin sreg lan bdun byas na rang gi khro ba'i gsang sngags sgrub pa 'grub par 'gyur ro// lan bcu bzhi byas na
don yod pa'i lcags kyu grub par 'gyur ro// nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas brjod dang sbyin sreg byas na don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po 'grub par 'gyur ro// lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod
[” ]@#// sbyin sreg byas n de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rigs kyi spyi grub par 'gyur ba 'di lta ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs dang/ nor bu'i rigs dang//
pad+ma'i rigs dang/ rdo tsA'i rigs rnams so// gzhan yang khro bo chen po stong phrag brgya mchog tu grub pa chen por 'gyur ro// til dang/ 'bras so ba dang/ zho dang/ sbrang rtsi dang
mar rnams sbyar tenang ba bdun sbyin sreg byas na bram ze thams cad dbang du 'gyur ro// lan brgya rtsa brgyad sbyin khrag byas na brgya byin la sogru pa lha thams cad lha'i tshogs dang bcas pa'i ng
'ong zhing rig sngags 'chang ga la bsnyen bkur byed cing dbang du 'gyur ro// nyi ma dang zla ba dag kyang 'ong bar 'gyur zhing rig sngags 'chang ba'i nang pa la 'dud par 'gyur ro// gnod sbyin dang/
ny+tsasrin po dbang du byas na 'bras A lu dang/ til dang/ yungs kar dang/ gu gul dang/ zho dang/ sbrang rtsi rnams ma' dang bsres te sbyin sreg lan nyi shu rtsa gcig byas na gnod sbyin dang srin
po'i tshogs rnams dbang du 'gyur ro// klu char 'bebs par bya na 'bras yos dang/ yungs kar dang/ nAka pul+ladang/ zho dang/ sbrang rtsi rnams ba mar dang sbyar te/ lan nyi shu rtsa gcig
kha sbyin sreg byas na/ des na klu rnams char pa'i rgyun chen po 'babs par 'gyur te/ ji tsam 'dod pa'i char pa'i rgyun gtong zhing 'bebs so// shin tu cha' che ba gcod na de nyid kyi thal ba nam
mkha' la gtor na shin tu nas che ba gcod par 'gyur ro// pha rol kyi g.yul bzlog par 'dod nasde tshe'i 'bru dang/ zho dang/ sbrang rtsi rnams mar dang sbyar te lan nyi shu rtsa gcig sbyin sreg bya'o//

'thab pa dang/ rtsod pa dang/ 'chad cing mtshang 'dru ba thams cad la dri yang ku'i me tog dang/ zho dang/ sbrang rtsi rnams mar dang sbyar te lan nyi shu rtsa gcig sbyin sreg byas na thams cad du rgyal
bar 'gyur ro// 'thab rtsod dang 'gyed pa rnams kyi smra ba'i lan thebs par 'gyur ro// nad thams cad zhi bar bya ba la sran ma ku lan tha dang/ zho dang/ sbrang rtsi rnams mar dang sbyar te sbyin
srog lan nyi shu rtsa gcig byas na nad thams cad rab tu zhi bar 'gyura'o// bud med dbang du byas nasu ma na'i ma tog gis lan nyi shu rtsa gcig sbyin sreg byas na bud med thams cad mchog tu dbang
du byed pa'i dam pa yin zhing thams cad du mchog grub par 'gyura'o// de nas sdig pa thams cad rnam par sbyang bar 'dod na rig sngags 'chang ba des 'bras sa lu dang/ til dang/ yus
kar dung/ pad+ma'i 'dab ma dang/ zho dang/ sbrang rtsi rnams mar dang sbyar te/ lan nyi shu rtsa gcig sbyin sreg byas na sdig pa dang sgrib pa thams cad rnam par dag par 'gyur ro// 'on te khro
bo'i rgyal po sgrub par 'dod na seng ldeng gi phye ma dang/ yungs kar dang/ gu gul rnams mar dang sbyar te sbyin sreg byas n thams cad du khro bo'i gsang sngags grub pa chen po 'grub par
tsaka/ 'gyur zhing/ khro ba'i gsang sngags thams cad spyan drangs par 'gyur ro// ka'aphags pa don yod pa'i zhags pa'i cho ga zhib mo'i
rgyal po bam po nyi shu rtsa lnga pa rdzogs so////de nas hU~M zhes bya ba dran pas khro bo'i rgyul po gshegs par 'gyur ro// las 'grub pa ston pa dang/ mthong ba
sbyin pa dang/ 'dod pa'i mchog thams cad rab tu sbyin par 'gyur ro// 'on te 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug dang khro bo'i rgyal po spyan drang bar 'dod na/ shing mu ra bas
tshe ma sbyar la/ 'bras yos dang/ pad+madang/ ut+pal dang/ yungs kar dang/ tsan dan dang/ zho dang/ sbrang rtsi rnams mar dang sbyar te brgya rtsa brgyad sbyin sreg bya'o// rig sngag
sbyara'achang bas khrus legs par bya zhing gog gtsang ma bgos te gtsang bar bya'o// de nas 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyag dang khro bo'i rgyal po'i sku mdun na bzhugs shing/
rig sngags 'chang bu la dbugs 'byin par mdzad do// mchog gang ci 'dod cing gsol ba'i mchogate thams cad spyin par mdzad do// phyag g.yas pa smag ba'i spyi bo'i 'jog par
mdzad do// gal te skal ba chung ba zhig ste mngon du zhal mi mthong na de'i tshe rmi lam du bstan te// thams cad bka' stsol cing ji ltar 'dod pa'i mchog sbyin te/ gsang sngags grub/
pa chen po dang/ cho ga zhib mo grub pa dang/ dkyil 'khor dang/ phyag rgya dang/ rim par phye ba grub par sbyin no// dam tshig grub pa chen po rab tu ston to// dbang phyug thob par bya na

'bras so ba sbu ra sa dang/ zho dang/ sbrang rtsi rnamAmar dang sbyar te sbyin sreg brgya rtsa brgyad byas na dbang phyug so sor thob par 'gyur ro// grong thob par byan tan tu li ya kha dung zho dang/
sbrang rtsi rnams mar dang sbyar te lan brgya rtsa brgyad sbyin sreg byas na grong thub par 'gyur ro// yul gyi bdag por bya na 'bras sA lu dang ras bal gyi sa bon rnams mar dang bsres te brgya rtsa
brgyad sbyin sreg byas na yul thag par 'gyur ro// ma snang bar bya na skye tshe dang lan tshwa'i sbyin sreg bya'o// nam mkha' la 'gro ba [”]ca na sha ta pad dri ka'i ma tog gi sbyin sreg bya'o//

sas rgyas kyi sku mthong bar bya na shing li dang/ tsan dan gyi phye ma dang/ du ru ka rnams til dang sbyar tu lan brgya rtsa brgyad sbyin sreg byas na de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku mang po mthong bar 'gyur ro
de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gis rigasngags 'chang ba legs so legs so zhes gsung zhing dbugs 'byin to// de bzhin gshegs pa de dgathams cad kyis mgo'i spyi bor phyag 'jogatsang mchog
grub pa chen po stsol bar mdzad do// thams cad du mchod par 'os pa chen por 'gyur ro// shi nas bde ba can gyi 'jig rten gyi khams su skal ba mnyam par skye bar 'gyur ro// tshe rabs
dran par 'gyur ro// 'jig rten kun gyi bu mar 'gyur ro// dgra thams cad gzhom par 'dod na 'bras ma grugs pas sbyin sreg bya'o// gter bsgul na da nas don
yod pa chen po'i sbyan brjod par bya te/ khro bo'i rgyal po'i dngos grub chen po sgyu ma'i dngos grub bla na med pa/ bklags pas grub pa/ so sor bstan pa'i dngos grub bla na med nga/ grub pa rig
sngags 'chang gi rnam par 'phrul pa ston pa lhur len pa/ bde ba skyed pa la mkhas pa rnams kyi rig sngags 'chang gi dngos grub kyi de kho na nyid/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi de kho na
nyid mchog tu gsang ba/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi rdzu 'phrul gyi rnam par 'phrul pa/ ngogs su zhugs pa rnams kyi rab tu sgrub pa/ dad pa'i rjes su 'brang ba rnams kyi rnam pa'
sel ba/ don gyi stegs mchog tu grub pa// mal cha dang stan med pa rnams kyi gos/ sems can thams cad kyi mchod par bya ba chen po/ thams cad du las thams cad legs par
grub pa/ sdig pa dang sgrib pa thams cad 'phrog pa/ gdug pa thams cad 'joms pa// rgyal po mnyas pa byed pa/ rnam par thar pa dang dul ba'i grong khyer nyid de dge bsnyen rnams kyi mchog
a7 tu skyid pa/ dag bsnyan ma rnams kyi dga' ba 'phel bar byed pa// rig pa'i rgyal po'i yon tapa rmad du byung ba'i de kho na nyid sgrub pa grub pa rnams gtsang ma gtsang sbrar spyad pa/ gos gtsang
ma bgos te bza' ba mchog shin tu gsang ba dang bag yod cing bden par smra ba/ dkon mchog gsum la mchog tu dad pa/ bla ma la gus pa// rtag par rgyun du byams pa 'i sems la
mnyam par bzhag pa/ sems can thams cad la brtse bar gyur pa/ sbyin pa la mngon par dga' ba'i yid can/ 'byung po thams cad la brtse ba'i bams dang byams pas bla na med pa'i
sgrub pa 'di bya'o// bslab pa dang sdom pa blangs pa/ don yod pa chen po'i skya ma bla na med pa na 'di'o// ga'u wang dngo/ sbik+ka dang/ pu shel tse dang/ tsan dan dang/ ldong ros dang/
shing kun dang/ spang skyes dang/ na la da dang/ ru rta dang bcas pa dang/ de bzhin du 'bras dgang ste/ 'di rnams thams cad ra mnyam ste phyi mar byas nas thams cad zhib mor btags la/
ga puradang gla rtsis bskos te snyigs ma 'di dag tsha ba'i til mar gyis btsosapa/ nyi'u shing dang/ bil ba dang/ me tog brgya pa dang/ puN+ha ra dang/ gan+d+ha pri yang ku dang/ rgya spos dang/
sa mu sta dang/ pra puN+Da rI ka dang/ shing mnga' rnams chu bre bdun gang bor sbyin par bya ste/ drug ma lhag mar lus pa dang/ snyig ma bra gang dang/ 'o ma'i snyigs ma bo' te til mar srang
gnyis la rtag tu btso bar bya'o// legs par grub pa'i gsang sngags bzlas brjod byas la gtor ma dang/ dkyil 'khor du me tog dang/ dri bzang po 'i bdug pa dang/ til mar btsa ba'i
cho ga bzhin du rab tu sbyar la/ gang las grub pa khyad par du bskyed cing babs pa'i til mar byas pa bsrung ba'i cho ga bya ste/ snod gtsang ma bkang nas slar yang
gsang sngags lan nyi shu rtsa gcig tu bzlas brjod byas nas gsang ba'i gnas su gzhag par bya'o// de nas las thams cad byad du gzhug ste/ rig sngags 'chang khrus legs par
byas pa// dris bsgos pa'i til mar rtag tu lus la byugs pa 'dis lus de mi snang zhing dngos po mad par ston par byed do// ngag thos la legs par mi byed do// gang gis lus khrus ma
byas kyi bar de srid du bdag nyi'i mi snang ste lus mi mthong ngo// dbral bar thig le byas nas yan lag dang nying lag rnams la thog ste/ gsang sngags lan cig bzlas brjod byas na nam mkha' la
'gro bar 'gyur te/ skad cig la dga' bar byed pa dang/ lha dang bcas ba'i rig sngags 'chang gi dbang pa mkha' la spyod pa rnams kyis lhan cig tu til mar mgo la byugs pas mdog
sdo ba dang/ sku cung zad li zhing 'khyil bar 'gyur ro// til mar grub pa'i rig sngags 'chang thams cad kyi 'khor los sgyur ba'i mnga' bdag tu 'gyur 'o// reg pa tsam gyis tshe
bskal pa khri thub par 'gyur ro// lus pad+ma dkar sham lta bur 'gyur ro// lus rdo rje ltar brtan pa dang/ gnas kyi sgo thams cad bye ste 'dug go/ gang du 'dod par 'jug par
byed do// dkyil 'khor sgrub ba'i dus su rig sngags 'chang la thig le byas nas lag tu rdo rje dang nor bu byas nAnam mkha' la 'phur bar 'gyur te/ mod la dkyil 'khor grub
pa ston par byed do// til mar gyis nang pa la byugs na nam mkha' la 'ong bar byed do// lus la byugs na mi snang par ston par byed do// mtshal dang til mar lhan cig sbyar
yan lag dang nying lag la thig la byas na lus 'ba' ba'i snying po mthong bar byed do// 'di dag rig sngags 'chang gi rnam 'phrul so sor bstan pa'o// yungs kar la
bzlas te lan cig bskyasasam/ dkyil 'khor gyi steng du gtor na dkyil 'khor g.yo bar 'gyur te/ 'khor lo bzhin du sor bar byed do// gtor ma'i snod gang ba rnams dang/
bum pa gang ba rnams sor mo brgyad kyi tshad du nam mkha' la 'phags te 'dug go/ rang nyid sa gol gyi sgras yongs su 'don par byed na slar yang snod nam mkha' la 'phags te 'dug
pa rab ng gi gnas su gnas par 'gyur ro// 'di rnams dkyil 'khor gyi dgos pa bla na med pa'i dngos grub po// de nas seng ge 'i khrag dang til mar lhan cig sbyar te/ bdag nyid kyi
lus la byugs na mi'i seng ge chen pa'i gzugs su mthong bar 'gyur te/ ji srid lus khrus ma byas pa de srid du mi'i seng ge r kun tu gnas so// gzhan yang ji ltar bsams pa bzhin
ru nam mkha' la 'phags te 'jug pa dang/ mi snang bar 'gyur ba dang/ me 'bar ba ston par byed do// phag gi khrag dang sbyar na phag gi gzugs su ston
bar byed de/ shugs dang stobs chen por ston par byed do// glang po che'i khrag dang sbyar bas tshogs kyi dbang phyug chen po'i gzugs su ston par byed do// rta'i khrag dang sngon po lhan
cig sbyar ba lus la byugs pa tsam gyis rta mgrin gyi gzugs su ston par byed do// ji srid khrus ma byas pa de srid du mthong bar byed do// ba lang ga mkhris pa dang lhan cig sbyar na/
khyu mchog chen po la zhon par mthong bar 'gyur ro// nya'i mkhris pa dang lhan cig sbyar na klu'i rgyal po chu bdag chen po'i gzugs su mthong bar 'gyur ro// sbrul dmar po'i khrag dang
bsras nas spyir na sprul chen po'i gzugs su mthong bar 'gyur 'o// 'a'i khrag dang btses pasaza rman po'i gzugs su mthong bar 'gyur 'o// pad+ma'i lo ma dang/ phye ma dang/ rtsa ba
dang bcas pa dang/ 'dab ma dang/ ma tog dang/ sdong bu dang bcas pa til mar gyis lhan cig sbyar bas yungs karal bskus te lus la byugs la til mar gyi thig la bya'o//
mkhas pas yan lag dang nying lag la byugs pa byas na rgyal po chen po'i cha lugs su mthong bar 'gyur te/ ma mo'i tshogs dang bcas pas yongs su bskor bas dgos pa sna tshogs pa/
0 dang rgyal po'i dgos pa rnams byed par 'gyura'o// 5dil bsams pa'i dgos pa thams cad sgrub par byed par 'gyura'o// ldong 'os kyi mig sman dang lhan cig bsras sa mig la byug
na 'khor chen po'i dbus su sbyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi gzugs su mthong bar 'gyur ro// rig pa'i rgyal po bzlas te yus kar de nam mkha' la gtor na 'bras bu sna tshogs kyi
char 'bab par mthong bar 'gyur ro// pad+ma snyi'i ngos sbyor napad+man+tan po'i char 'byung bar 'gyur ro// ut+pal sngon po'i khu bas sbyar naut+pa la sngon po chen po'i char 'byung ba mthong bar
'gyur ro// ji ltar me tog gi khu bas sbyar ba de lta da ltar ma tig gi char chen po 'byung bar 'gyur ro// ji ltar yid la 'dod pa'ogazugs dang/ kha dog dang/ rtags dang/ dbyibs
su mthong bar 'dod pa de lta de ltar lha'i tilama'i snying dang lhan cig sbyar na de lta de ltar de dang de nyid kyi gzugs su mthong bar 'gyur ro// gzhal yas khang ya nga mthong bar 'gyur ro//
lag pas nor bu gcig blangs te yid la rjes su dran par byas na rnam pa sna tshogs pa du ma'i bdag nyid du mthong bar 'gyur ro// gos dang sna tshogs pa rnams ston par byed do// lag pa
( snod la bzung na snod sna tshogs pa ston par byed do// lag pas bum pa la bzung na bum pa brgya stong phrag ston par byed do// rkang pa'i mthil la bskus na gang du rdo ba la nang pa
bzhag pa de dang de nyid du rkang pa'i rjes 'jog par byed de/ mar gsar la nye bar 'jog pa ji lta ba bzhin du/ mar gsar mnyen pa bzhin du rdo ba'ang 'dra bar 'gyur
ro gtun shing la byugs na rtags 'byung bar 'gyur ro// ma mo'i dkyil 'khor gyi gnas su zhugs na ma mo'i lha rnams kyi so so tha dad pa'i rdul bzung ste/ til mar dang lhan cig
sbyar nas so so'i gdong la byugs na lha de dang de lta bu'i gzugasasu ston par byed do// gzhan yang dgos pa rnam pa sna tshogs pa rnams rang gi 'dod pa'i zlos las bya'o// de nas blo
'phel bar byed pa ni til maraM dang 'o ma lhan cig zos na blo dang dran pa chen po 'phel bar 'gyur ro// nub gsum gyi sbyor bas tshigs su bcad pa stong klog par byed cing 'dzin pa'i byed de//
zhag bdun gyi sbyor bas blo gros rgya mtsho chen po lta bu 'phel bar byed cing sogs par byed do// zhag bcu bzhi'i sbyor bas tsha lha'i lo stong du 'gyur ro// zhag nyi shu rtsa gcig gi sbyor bas
bcud len sgrub pa'i dngos grub 'byung bar 'gyur te/ gnyer ma dang sku dkar sbas pa dang/ sku cung zad 'khyil bar 'gyur ro// lus 'jam zhing mnyen pa dang pad+ma'i kha dog
dang 'dra ba'i 'gyur ro// skyes nas lo bcu lon pa dang 'dra bar gzugs dang lang tsho dang ldan par 'gyur ro// glang po che stong phrag bcu'i stobs su 'gyur ro// zhag nyi shu/
rtsabargyad kyi sbyor bas glang po che sa srungs kyi stobs su 'gyur ro// zhag sumacu so lnga'i sbyor bas nam mkha' lding chen po'i stobs su 'gyur ro// zhag bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis sbyor bas
lha ma yin gyi dbang po sgra gcan dang 'dra bar brtson 'grus dang stobs chen po'agyur ro// zhag bzhi bcu rtsa dgu'i sbyor bas ni rab lhun po chen po'i dkyil 'khor dang 'dra bar 'gyur
ti klu'i rgyal po dga' bo dang nye dga' bos yongs su bskor ba/ mi g.yo zhing mi bskul ba/ rig par bya ba ma yin zhing mi mthong ba/ mi ma yin pa rnams kun tu
spyod pa/ lha rnams thams cad kyi phyag byas shing phyag bya ba'i 'os su gyur pa/ drang srong rnams kyis bstod pa'i 'os su gyur pa/ gnod sbyin dang srin po rnams kyis phyag
bya ba'i 'os su gyur pa// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis byin gyi rangs kyi byin gyis babs pa/ byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyis rab tu bsngags pa'i 'os
su gyur pa/ rig sngags 'chang ba'i dbang po thams cad kyis gsang ba'i dam tshig sgrub pa/ lha'i dbang po rnams kyis lhan cig 'gran pa'i 'os su gyur pa/ tshangs pa dang/
khyab 'jug dang/ dbang phyug chen po rnams kyis mngon du smra ba'i 'os su gyur pa/ klu'i dbang po thams cad kyis nye bar bgyid par bya ba ste/ de ltar don yod pa'i lcags kyu'i khro bo'i
rnam par 'phrul ba zhes bya ba til mar gyi rgyal po'i rnam par 'phrul pa yon tan chen po rmad du byung ba brgya stong phrag gis gang ba'o// til mar gyi rgyal po'i rig sngags mang
zhes til mar gyi rgyal po ral gri la byugs na byugs pa tsam gyis ral gri 'bar bar 'gyur ro// rig sngags 'chang gi 'khor los sgyur ba' 'gyur te/ la gri'i rig sngags 'chang gi 'khor
los sgyur ba thams cad kyi mchog tu 'gyura'o// rdo rjel byugs na rdo rje 'bar bar 'gyur te// rig sngags 'chang gi 'khor los sgyub nam mkha' la 'gro zhing/ rdo rje'i rig sngags 'chang gi
'khor los sgyur bar 'gyur ro// 'khor lo la byugs na 'khor lo 'bar ba' 'gyur te/ rig sngags 'chang nam mkha' la 'gro bar 'gyur ro// blta na sdug pa'i mod lo'ig sgrog
'chang gi 'khor los sgyur bar mon la 'gyur ro// dgra thams cad rab tu'ajomasaso// mdung rtse gsum la byugs na 'bar bar 'gyur te/ rig sngags 'chang gi 'khor los sgyur
bar 'gyur ta nam mkha'i la gnas par byed do// stobs dang/ brtson 'grus dang/ pha rol gnon pa dbang phyug chen po dang 'dra bar 'gyur ro// 'bras dang/ phol mig dang/
! lhog pa dang/ me dbal dang/ shu ba dang/ mdzad ng/ rkang shu dang/ rtsa'i rma dang/ mgul pa 'gags pa dang/ rna ba rtsa nad dang/ mtshan bar rdol pa dang/ dmu chudang/ skran dang
05/ rlung dang/ mkhris pa dang/ bad kan dang/ 'dus ba nyid la'ang mkhas pas chu dron mo 'thungs pa tsam dang/ byug pa tsam gyis nad thams cad sel lo// til mar gyis nad thams cad
sol ba de bzhin du rtsib logs na ba dang/ tshad pa dang/ snying na ba dang/ mchin pa na ba dang/ bshang ba 'khyim pa dang/ pho ba'i nad kyi nyes pa de rnams thams cad 'thungs pa tsam gyis rnam
pa 'jig par the tshom med do// nyams ba dang/ zad pa dang/ de bzhin du rgyal po'i dpal bcom pa dang/ gsos spyod ngan pa rnams bskus pa tsam mam zos pa tsam gyis stobs dang
ldan par 'gyur ro// lus rnams rgyas pa dang/ mgu ba dang/ spro ba chen por 'gyur ro// gdon rnam pa sna tshogs par gsungs pa dang/ brjod byed [”] mi bzod pa la'ang reg pa
tsam gyis de dag thams cad rnam par 'jig par tha tsam med do// byad mi bzad pa dang/ sdug bsngal dang/ dug dang/ sbyar dug nyid kyang reg pa tsam gyis rnam par 'jig par 'gyur ro//
brtan pa dang g.yo ba'i chug gang yin pa dang mche ba 'am/ sbrul go Nas dang sdig pa'i ng rung/ srin bu dang phye ma leb gajug pa 'am/ nor rgyas kyi bu dang 'jog bo 'am/ sbrul gyis mthong
ba'i dug gam/ dbugs kyi dug mi bzad pa gang yin pa dang/ rig pa'i dug gang yin pa dang/ sAlA ha lA'i gdug pa gang yin pa dang/ gzhan da ra da'i dug gang yin pa dang/ rtsa ba'i dug
gang yin pa dang/ sdong po'i dug dang/ 'dab ma'i dug dang/ me tog gi dug dang/ mdangs kyi dug gang yin pa dang/ gzhan dug rnam pa sna tshogs pa de rnams thams
cad rnam par 'jig par 'gyur// til mar reg pa tsam gyis lam mchog dang lam gol bar song ba rnams dang/ rgyal po'i sgo drung du song ba'ang rung/ gsad par 'os pa'i rgyur ba
gang yin pa dang/ bcings par gyur pa gang yin pa dang/ 'thab pa dang/ rtsod pa dang/ 'gyed pa gang yin pa dang/ gzhan yang dgra'i gzeb dang/ pha rol gyi dmag tshogs kyi
'jigs pa nyid dang/ mi mdza' ba dang/ phyir rgyal ba gang yin pa'i ng til mar 'di mngon par sbyar bas skad cig de la thams cad 'joms so// rgyal po khros pa gang yin pa/
'dzum bzhin du bka' stsal to// g.yul 'gyed pa'i nang du 'am phan tshun 'thab bzhin pa thams cad la til mar rgyal po bla na med pas rtag tu rgyal ba ster ro// mkhas pas mig
la byugs na/ mi thub cing thams cad du 'gro bar 'gyur ro// gzhan gyis kyang dgos pa thams cad la rab tu sbyar bar bya ste/ dngos grub kyi gnas thams cad kyi mchog yin pa'i
phyir ro// de nas khro lcags kyu bla na med pa// sdig pa thams cad sel ba/ mod la gdug pa thams cad 'jig par byed pa/ nad thams cad rab tu zhi ba' byed pa/ mod la thams cad
[e ]du grub pa bla na med pa/ nad thams cad zhi ba/ de kho na nyid khro bo lcags kyu bla na med pa'i zas ris kyi sku gzugs brjod par bya ste/ ras ris kyi sku gzugs bla na med pa 'di mthong ba tsam
gyis chod la bsod nams kyi phung po chen po thob pa dang/ dag pa'i rtsa ba chen po bskyed par 'gyur ba dang/ rig pa'i gnas thams cad rtogs par khong du chud par 'gyur ba dang/ de bzhin
gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gang+gA'i klung gi bya ma snyad bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag dgu bcu rtsa gnyis mthong ba dang/ mchod pa dang/ 'am 'gro bya
ba dang/ zhes r bya ba dang/ bla mar bya ba dang/ de bzhin gshegs pa de rnams kyi spyan sngar bsod nams kyi phung po chen po'i dge ba'i rtsa ba dang ldan par 'gyur ba dang/ zas ris kyi sku
gzugs gang yin pa 'di mthong ba tsam gyis med la mthas klas pa tsam dang 'di mtshungs par 'gyur tu/ 'di dang mtshungs pa'i bsod nams kyi phung po'i dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed par 'gyur
ro de bzhin gshegs pa dang/ byang chub sems dpa' thams cad dang/ lha thams cad kyis dgongs par 'gyur ro// sa gru bzhi pa gru bzhir ma mnyam pa/ shin tu thags
bzang ba/ shin tu gsar ba/ shin tu 'jam pa/ mchog tu mdzes pa/ khru gnyis pa'i tshad kha tshar ma thacad pa sku dang bral ba 'am/ yang na der gtsang ma grub na shin tu rnam par
'byes pa la ri mo mkhan gtsang masgrung bar gnas pas lhag ma ma yin pa'i tshon snod gsar par bzhag la/ tshon sna tshogs rnam par 'byes pa 'phags pa don yod zhag
[】 ]pa'i khro bo lcags kyu bri bar bya'o// 'phags pa spyan so gzigs dbang phyug zhal bzhi pa/ zhal dang po na zhib/ spyan gsum pa/ ral pa'i cod pan gyis brgyan pa/ 'od dpag
med cod pan du 'chang ba/ zla bas nye bar mdzes pa/ phyag bzhi pa/ rgyan thams cad kyis rnam par brgyan pa/ g.yas pa'i zhal drag po'i gzugs can/ 'jigs par byed pa/
tshams kyis kha mchu mnan pa// dbu skra gyen du brdzes pa'i ral pa'i thor tshugs kyis brgyan pa// g.yon pa drag po chen po mche ba gtsigs pa/ zhal rnam par 'gyur ba/ dbu sku 'khyil
zhing gyen du brdzus pa'i ral pa kun tu bcings pa/ 'od dpag med kyi cod pan can/ drag tu bzhad pa'o// zhi ba'i zhal ral pa'icod pan gyis brgyan pa'i stang du sku spyod pa'i khro bo'i
rgyal po 'ba' ba'i snying po' chud par bya ste/ sku ut+pa lasngon po'i kha dog can/ dbu skra dmar po cung zad 'khyil ga/ 'od dpag med kyi cod pan na/ rgyan thams cad kyis rnam par
brgyan pa/ phyag gnyis kyi gcig gis ral gri dang/ gnyis pas tho ba 'bar ba can bya'o// phyag gnyis gcig gis pad+ma 'chang ba ste/ pad+ma'i gsar 'bar ba'i snying po can no//
gnyis pas lcags kyu dang mdung rtse gsum ste/ g.yas pa na'o// g.yon pas khro bo chen po drag po drag tu rgod pa'i gzugs can/ don yod pa'i zhags pa 'dzin pa'o// g.yas pa dbugs
'byin pa'i rin po chachen po'i char 'babs pa/ phyag thams cad 'bar ba'i snying po 'od zer kha dog sna tshogs pa bya sta/ pad+ma'i gdan la skyil mo krung gis bzhugs pa bya'o// rgya mtsho'i
snying por ba la gnas pa/ klu'i rgyal po dga' bo dang nye dga' bos dkris pa bya'o// nya dang/ chu srin dang/ nor bu rin po che sna tshogs kyis dkris pa/ pad+ma dang/ ut+pal dang/
ku mu da dang/ pad+ma dkar pos gcal du bkram pa/ ngang pa dang/ bzhad dang/ ngur pa dang/ shang shang te 'us khyab par bya'o// g.yas logs su lha mo sgrol ma dbu cung zad 'dud
pathal mo sbyar ba 'amang ba/ rgyan thams cad kyis rnam par brgyan pa/ 'dzam bag dang bcas pa'o// dkar sham chen mo thal mo sbyar te cung zad 'dud pa/ rgyan thams cad kyis rnam
bar brgyan pa/ 'dzem bag dang bcas pa bya'o// srin mo chen mo ral pa gcig ma khrag 'dzag pa'i thad pa dang/ drag mo drag tu rgod pa bya ste/ 'ba' ba'i snying por khro bor lcags kyu
la lta bzhin pa/ lagakha bzhi ba/ lag na ral gri dang/ dgra sta dang/ zhags pa dang/ rdo rje thogs pa rgyun thams cad kyis rnam par brgyan par bya'o// g.yon phyogs su
thubya// gnod sbyin gyi dbang po bya ste/ zhal khro gnyer can drag po'o// dbu skra gyen du brdzus pa/ 'jigs par byed pa/ 'bur ba'i snying po'i pus mo g.yas pa
[】/ ]btsugs pa/ ral gri dang dgra sta thogs pa/ phyag gnyis thal mo sbyar ba 'chang ba/ rgyan thams cad kyis rnam par brgyan pa/ khro bo'i rgyal po lcags kyu la nges par blta
bzhin pa/ kho ra khor yug tu 'od 'dom gang pa/ 'od zer sna tshogs 'bar bar bya'o// lcags kyu dang bcas pa'i kho ra khor yug gi steng du tshangs pa dang/ khyab 'jug dang/
dbang phyug chen po dang/ gshin rje dang/ chu lha dang/ lus ngan po bya ste/ me tog sna tshogs kyi phur ma thogs te mchod pa byed bzhin pa bya'o// khro ba'i rgyal po don yod lcags kyu'i
rgyab tu rin po che sna bdun las byung ba'i shing ljon pa bya ste/ yal ga dang/ 'dab ma dang/ lo ma rnam par bkra ba bya'o// khro bo'i rgyal po'i zhabs kyi drung du rig sngags 'chang bya ste/
pus mo btsugs pa/ me togs sna tshogs thogs shing/ lag na bgrang 'phreng 'dzin pa/ khro bo'i rgyal po la steng du blta bzhin pa bya'o// zhabs gnyis pa'i drung gi gnas su phonya mo
bya ste/ zur mig can/ drag mo lag na ral gri thogs pa/ rnam par 'gyur ba/ phyag thal mo sbyar ba rgyan thams cad kyis rnam par brgyan pa bya'o// sa ras kyi sku gzugs kyi bya ba yos
su mthar phyin nas byin gyis brlabs te/ de'i 'og tu gsang ba'i gnas su gzhag par bya'o// de'i drung du gtsang mas zas mi bza' bar de'i spyan mngar khro bo lcags kyu brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod
bya ste/ me tog dang/ bdug pa dang/ mchod yon dang/ zhabs bsil ji ltar rnyed pa dbul bar bya'o// gas ris kyi sku gzugs sgrub pa'i tshog 'dis sgrub pa'i cho ga rgyas pa gzhan yang bya'o//
de'i 'og tu rig sngags 'chang gis nyi ma re rer ras ris kyi mdun du gtsang mas zas mi za bar de'i spyan sngar me tog dang bdug spos phul nas/ khro po'i rgyal po lan cig bzlas par bya'o//
de nas las thams cad dang dgos pa thams cad bya'o// 'di na de kho na nyid kyi dngos grub bklags pas 'grub pa ste/ rig sngags 'chang gis gsang ba mchog gi las bsgrub pa
bya'o// de nas sku gzugs mthong ba tsam la sogs pas mtshams med pa lnga dang/ mnar med pa la gzhol ba dang/ dam pa'i chos spangs pa rnams 'di mthong ba tsam gyis thamA
cad yongs su dag par 'gyur ro// sdig pa thams cad dang/ sgrib pa thams cad dang/ sngon gyi sgrib pa bsags pa dang bcas pa/ bskal pa brgyar bsags pa'i sdig pa de
dag thams cad rnam par 'jig par 'gyur ro// nad dang 'jig pa thams cad las yongs su grol bar 'gyur ro// sdig pa thams cad dang/ dgra thams cad dang/ phyi
rgol ba thams cad dang/ mi mdza' ba rnam par 'jig par 'gyur ro// rdzas ris kyi sku gzugs shin tu chung ba byed pa gang yin pa de'ang phan pa byed pa'i/rgya[c]dra zha[A]
'gyur te/ me tog gam/ bdug pa 'am/ dri 'am byug pa 'am/ dkyil 'khor dang bcas pa byed pa 'am/ khrus kyi bum pa gang ba bkod pa 'am/ rdul el bar byed pa tsam yang rung
ste/ rig sngags 'chang de'i thog kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo'am/ dge slong ngam/ dge slong ma 'am/ dge bsnyen nam/ dge bsnyen mas de bzhin gshegs pa gang+ga'i klung gi

phyi ma snyed bye tha lug khri brgya stong phragadagu bcu rtsa dgu'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i drung du dge ba'i rtsa ba chen po skyed par 'gyur ro// bsod nams kyi phung bo chen po yong gsu'i yin par 'gyur so//
pha rol tu phyin pa drug yongs su rdzogs par yang 'gyur ro// mtshams med pa lta rnam par sbyang shing bskal pa'i mthar thug par 'gyur ro// sangs rgyas dang byang chub sem
dpa' thams cad kyis gzigs 'dod par 'gyur ro// skye ba brjes nas kyang 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba can du 'gro bar 'gyur te/ pad+ma las rdzus te skye bar 'gyur ro//
skyo ba'i skye ba dran par yang 'gyur ro// rnam par grol ba'i dkyil 'khor gsang ba pad+ma yang pa'i dkyil 'khor/ don yod zhags pa'i snying po/ 'don yodapa'i khro bo'i lcagA
ma kyu'i gzungs 'di'ang mtha' dag yongs su rdzogs par kha ton du gnas ba'agyur ro// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsang ba'i rigs kyi dam tshig gsang ba rnams dang/
gsang sngags rimapar phye ba dang/ phyag rgya dang/ gsang sngags dang/ dkyil 'khor 'amakhar phye ba dang/ rtog zhib mo thams cad mngon sum du 'gyur ro// sangs rgyas kyi zhing
nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing du 'gro bar 'gyur ro// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mngon sum du mthong bar 'gyura'o// yon tan thams cad kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su
rdzogs par yang 'gyur ro// dag bra'i rtsa ba thams cad yang dag par sdud pa yang 'gyur ro// bsod nams kyi tshog sachen po dang ldan par 'gyur ro// 'jig rten thamA
cad kyi bla mar yaba'agyur ro// tshig btsan pa'i yang 'gyur 'o// 'jig rten thams cad dga' bar yang 'gyur ro// thams cad du mchod par 'os par yang 'gyur 'o//
rig sngags thams cad grub par 'gyur ro// yid la bsam pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur zhing/ dgos pa thams cad grub par yang 'gyur// thams cad
du thogs pa med bamakhas pa'i blo ru 'gyur// donas khro bo'i lcags kyu'i dkyil 'khor rtog zhib mo thams cad kyi dkyil 'khor dang gsang ba'i phyag rgya bla na med pa bshad
par bgyi'o// khor yug tu them skas bzhi dang ldan pa/ sa dang bu byung bsres pa'i dkyil 'khor gru bzhi pa bya ste/ gzings kyi rgya dang tshad mnyam la//
shin tu tshad la bab cing legs par rnam par phyes pa legs par byugs shing shan tu 'jam pa/ 'jam zhing mnyen pa dung ldan pa'o// tshon sna tshogs pa rnam par phye ba dang/
dkyil 'khor mchog gi thig btab la/ sna tshogs tshon rtsis rnam par dbya/ sgo bzhingashan tu rnam 'byes pa// khor yug them skas bzhi dang ldan// rta bab bzhi yis brgyan
pa ste// dbus kyi dkyil 'khor snying por yang// shin tu rnam 'byas tshad la bab// khru pa tshad du bya ba'o// dkyil 'khor gru bzhi mnyam pa yi// snying po'i dkyil 'khor
dbus su yang// mkhas pas shin tu ma 'byis pa'i// pad+ma 'dab ma bcu gnyis bya// lcags kyu phyogs dang rtse gsum dang// gsar pa'i khor yug tu// snying
por gyur pa'i dbu mchog la// khro bo zhags pa yang bya'o// drag po'i gzugasarnyan 'jigs par byed// 'al rgya dang ragralta'i phyag/ ral pa'i cod pan gyis brgyan cing//
rgyan rnams kun gyis rnam par brgyan// lus byed pa dang/ zhags pas kun nas dkris pa// mdung rtse gsum pa/ nam mkha' la phyir phyogs pa/ pad+ma dang bcas pa byas pa/
la/ glu grur 'bar ba'i gdong bya'o// mdung rtse gsum dang brgya la rab tu gnas pa/ drag po'i zhala'ajigs par byed pa chen po mche ba rnam par gtsigs pa/ zhal 'jigs su
rung ba 'bar ba'i snying por chud pa'o// nang gi ri mo la lcags sgrogs dang mdung rtsa gsum pa'i gdong bri bar bya sti/ 'bar ba'i snying po dang bcas pa/ kha dog sna tshogs pa'i tshon
rtsi bya'o// ri mo gnyis pa'i nang du pad+ma kha phyed bye ba ge sar 'bar ba dang bcas pa'i pad+ma bya'o// ri mo gsum pa'i nang du 'khor lo'i rnam ba bya'o// mu khyud kyi phyi rol tu lag
pa'i phyag rgya'ang bri bar bya ste/ mtshon cha sna tshogs pa 'dzin pa'o// ral gri dang/ zhags pa dang/ mdung rtse gsum dang/ rtsa ba la dang/ mdung rtse gnyis dang/ dung dang/
ti dang/ 'khor lo dang/ rtse gsum kha gdengs dang/ tho ba dang/ martung dang/ ral gri dang/ nor bu dang/ mdung rtse gsum dang/ mda' ba ma dang/ las kyi rdo rje dang/ rtse lnga dang/
parA sU la dang/ rdo rje zur gsum dang/ pad+ma dang/ rtsa gsum dag kha dog sna tshogs 'bar ba khor yug tu yongs su bskor ba bri bar bya'o// kha khyer gyi rnam pas brgyan pa la khu khyer gyi phyi
la gyi dkyil 'khor gyi gnas su mtshan ma sna tshogs bri bar bya ste/ rigs chen po bzhi thun mong ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi phyag rgya bri bar bya'o// shar gyi gnas su de bzhin gshegs pa'i
rigs kyi mtshan ma'i phyag rgya'ang bri bar bya'o// lhor pad+ma yangs pa'i mtshan ma dkyil 'khor gyi phyag rgya'o// nub kyi gnas kyi dkyil 'khor du nor bu'i rigs kyi

mtshan ma'i phyag rgya rnams kyang bri bar bya'o// byang du rdo rje rigs kyi mtshan ma'i phyag rgya'ang yang dag par bri'o// shab kyi skor de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs kyi khro bo'i rgyal bo skor bri bar
bya'o lhor pad+mayas pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi khro bo rnams so// nub tu skyob bu'i rigs kyi khro bo'o// byang du rdo rje'i 'gas kyi khro bo bri bar bya'o// khro bo thams cad kyi gzugs 'khur ba'i

'tsho snying po rgyan thams cad kyis rnam par brgyan pa/ lag pa bzhil/ mtshon cha sna tshogs pa 'dzin pa bya'o// ri rab la gnas ba/ skyil mo krung phyed pa/ lus cung zad bskum ba bya'o// phyi'i'i mo'i
dkyil 'khor du nor bu dang/ rdo rje dang/ ma tog dang/ mdung rtsa gsum ba dag go/ khor yug tu kha khyer 'bar bas dkyil 'khor gyi khor yug tu brgyan pa'o// lhab lhub dang/ ba dan dang/ rgyal
mtshan dang/ tshon sna lnga ba'i skud pas kun nas dkyil 'khor la yang dag par brgyan pa'o// ro bro ba'i mchog dang ldan pa'i gtor mas gang ba'i snod ci'abyor pa dang/ gtor ma'i las kyi cho gas/
'byor pa dang/ rjes su mthun par gzhag par bya'o// bum pa gang ba dang/ pog por dang/ bum bu dang/ bum pa dang/ gtor ma dkar pas bkang ba dang/ 'bras bu rnam pa sna tshogs pa/
nyid dang/ dri dang/ 'phreng ba dang/ byug ba dang/ me tog kun nas gcal du dgram mo// 'bras mos dang yus kar gyis gtor bar bya'o// snying po'i dkyil 'khor gyi grwar mchod
yon dang/ zhabs bsil gyi snod dang/ rin po che sna bdun rab tu dgram mo// dri'i chus bkang ba'i bum pa dang/ legs par brgyan pa'i bum pa byas nas/ mkhas pas dal bzang bos
bcings te dbus kyi dkyil 'khor du gzhag par bya'o// sgo bzhi dri chab kyis gang ba'i bum pa dar gyis bcings pa gzhag par bya'o// mkhas pas sgo dang sgo ru ni/ bu ram dang/ sha kha
'dang/ sbrang rtsi'i ro dang/ g.yom gzhag par bya'o// mdung rtse gsum la zho dang/ 'o ma dang/ zan dang/ mchog gi bza' ba ma nyams pas shin tu mdzes pa'i gtor ma gzhag
bar bya'o// de bzhin du 'khur ba dang/ 'khur ba zlum po nyid dang/ snum 'khumadang/ be Ti ma ka dang sa rA'i la du dang/ mud ge'i la du dang/ hAgs dang/ kha yu ni bzang po
rnams gzhag par bya'o// gtor ma'i las la khor yug tu me tog bzang po dgram zhing 'phreng bas brgyan par bya'o// 'bru'i rnam rnam pa sna tshogs pa gzhag par bya'o// 'bras bu'i
ngo bo rnam pa sna tshogs pa dang ni'u gsing sngo bsangs dang/ lo ma mdzes pa bkram ste gzhag par bya'o// khor yug tumar ma'i 'phreng ba dang/ de bzhin du a ka ru dang tsan dan dang
sprik+Sha dang/ tu ruSha dang/ dpal gyis dkris pa dang/ gu gul dang/ kun tu ru dang/ sbrang rtsi dang/ h+phags sbyar ba'i bdug ba dang ste/ bdug pa 'di dag dbul
bar bya'o// dkyil 'khor gyi khor yug tu 'dug pa 'thul ba'i pog por gzhag par bya ste/ dkyil 'khor gyi lha la bdug pa dbul bar bya'o// phyogs bcing ba dang dkyil 'khor bcing ba
bya ste/ gtsug tor bcing zhing bdag bsrung ba dang gzhan bsrung ba bya'o// de'i 'og tu 'jug par bya'o// rig sngags kyi dkyil 'khor mchog mthong ba dang/ phyag bya zhing bskor ba nyid dang/
dam tshig kyang sbyin par bya'o// rtag tu gsang ba'i las byas te/ de kho na bzhin du gsang sngags bzlas pa'i ng bya'o// dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga tshad ma las dgos pa 'di dgathams cad byas
nas de'i 'og tu rig sngags 'chang gis las thams cad kyi dngos grub bla na med pa'o// rgyal ba rigs bzhi'i yongs su bskor ba'i dkyil 'khor du zhugs pa de dag thams cad ni 'gro ba bzang
por skye bar 'gyura'o// de bzhin du bde ba can du 'od dpag med kyi spyan snga' pad+ma las rdzus te skye bar thatsam mad do// lha'i gzugs shin tumadzes pa/ rgyan thams cad kyi rnam par brgyan pa/
'jig rten las 'das pa'i dngos grub chen po thob par 'gyur te/ 'di la the tsom mi bya'o// 'jig rten pa'i dkyil 'khor gyidangos grub bla na med pa dang/ cho ga zhib mo'i dngos grub dang/
phyag rgya'i das grub dang/ khro bo'i rgyal bo'i dngos grub bla na med pa dang/ sdig pa dang sgrib pa thams cad sel ba dang/ mod la gdug pa thams cad 'jig pa dang/ dgra thams cad zlog ba dang/
mod la nad thams cad rab tu zhi ba dang/ dgos pa thams cad dang/ thams cad du dngos grub bla na med pa gang yin pa grub par 'gyur ro// 'jigarten thams cad kyi mnga' bdag dang rtag tu dga'
ra 'gyur ro// rtag tu rjes su 'brang bar 'gyur ro// rtag tu rgyal po dang blon por bcas ba rnams kyis dus rgyun du bla na med pa'i mchod pa'i gnas su 'gyur ro// gzhan yang ljongs
thams cad blta zhing mchod pas rjes su 'brang bar 'gyur ro// de bzhin nyid du'ang dag sbyongs rnams dang/ bram za rnams dang/ rgyal rigs dang/ rje'u rigs dang/ dmangs rigs dang/
skyes ba dang/ bud med dang/ khye'u dang/ bu mo thams cad kyang dga' bar 'gyur ro// rtag tu tshog batsan pa dang/ rtag tu lha rnams kyis mngon pa bsrungs pa dang/ skabs gsum gyi
dbang po dang/ rdo rje 'chang bu nyid dang/ rdo rjesnying po bag nyid chen po dang/ tshas pa dang/ khyab 'jug dang/ dbang phyug chen po dang// gzhon nu dang/ dga' byed dbang phyug dang/ gshin

rje dang/ chu lha nyid dang/ de bzhin du rgyal po chen po bzhi rnams rtag tu rjes su 'brang bar 'gyur ro// khro bo'i dkyil 'khor du zhugs shing mthong ba la'ang dus rtag tu srung ba dang rjes su 'brang/
'bar gyur te the tsom mi bya'o// yun ring du 'tsho bar 'gyur/ rtag tu smra ba nyung zhing mkhas pa dang/ thams cad du dngos grub thob par 'gyur ro// dkyil 'khor mthong ba dang
'jug ba la dga' bar 'gyur/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyis kyang dgyes pa dang bcas pas byin gyis rlob par 'gyura'o// sangs rgyas rnams dang/ 'jig rten las 'das pa
rgyu dang de bzhin gshegs pas dbugs 'byin par 'gyur/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyi thugs las skyes pa'i sras ji lta ba bzhin no// 'di ni de rnams kyi mngal gyi gnas su skye ba'i tha ma yin no// rtag

tu skye ba'i skye ba dran par 'gyur te/ 'di la the tsom mi bya'o// sangs rgyas kyi byang chub tu 'gro ba dang/ rtag tu rgyal ba rnams kyi de kho na nyid mthong ba dang/ rtag tu sangs rgyas thams cad la mngon sum

du chos nyan par the tsam med do// 'di ni skye ba'i tha ma yin te/ ji srid du sangs rgyas kyi byang chub tu rdzogs par sangs rgyas par 'gyur ro// dgos pa gzhan rnam pa sna tshogs pa dang/ khro bo lcags
kyu'i las brgya phragastong rnams rang gi 'dod pa'i bros bya'o// thams cad du lan cig bzlas brjod byas la/ thams cad du las thams cad bya'o// bklags pas 'grub pa'i cho ga'o//
de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyugagis bcom ldan 'das kyi zhal du bltas te/ bzhin 'dzum pas khro bo chen po lcags

[o/ ]kyu'i gzungs kyi kun tu snang bzhin pa'i 'od zer sna tshogs 'bar ba'i snying bo lus las phyung ngo// gang gis stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jigarten gyi khams kun tu snang bar byas so// 'od zer gyi

snang ba gang gis stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams su rin po che sna bdun gyi char 'bab pa'i snying po rab tu 'bebs par 'dod pa'i don dang/ lha'i me tog sna tshogs kyi char 'bebs pa'i
don dang/ lha'i dri dang mthun pa' gsal ba'i dri dang/ rjes su mthun pa'i dri rnam pa bkra ba'i mar rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das dang 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la phab po// rab tu

dgyes pa'i thugs kyis lha'i chu gsal zhing rgya che ba/ dri'aphro bas rnam par mdzes pa'i dpral ba'i chu mu tig dang mnyam zhing mtshungs pa/ dzA ti'i 'bras bu dang 'dra bo'i rnam par mdzes pa'i dpral
ba'i lha'i chus yongs su dbang bskur te/ thigs pa nam mkha' dang mnyam pa bzhuba'i mig 'bras las lhung ba'i chu skar ma las rab tu lhung ba'i gos/ de lta bu'i dpral bar thig la 'bar ba nyi
dang smig rgyu rnam par mdzes pa'i 'od zer sa la lhung ste/ bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar zhabs kyi drung du lhung ngo// pad+ma'i 'dab ma brgya stong phrag kha bye ba ltar rab tu 'dzum pas rnam pa'o
mdzes pa/ pad+ma'i ze'u 'bru ltar mnyen pa byung bar gyur to// ba zlum+ma'i sdong bu nyi ma brgya stong phrag bas lhag pa'i mthu stobs dang ldan pa'i 'od zer snang bas 'bar bzhin pa/ bcom
@#// ldan 'das la mi gang gi tshad lta bur gnas par 'gyur to// de nas rig pa 'dzin pa'i dbang po chen po rdo rje 'chang gis chu'i thigs pa 'dab ma ma nyam pa/ pi zlum+ma mchog//
tu mdzes shing 'bar ba pad+makha bya ba de mthong nas thugs ngo mtshar dang ya mtshan skyas te/ bcom ldan 'das dang byang chub sems dpa' sams dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang
phyug gi zhabs gnyis la phyag 'tshal te 'di skad ces gsol to// sems dpa' chen po shin tu ngo mtshar ba mthong lags so// rmad du byung ba'achi 'phrul chen po mthong lags so// sems
dpa' chen po bdag gis ltad mo'i mchog mthong lags so// sems dpa' rtag pa chen po khyod kyis bdag gi ltad mo'i the tshom med par mdzod cig cesaso// de nas byang chub sems dpa'
sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis/ gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po lag na rdo rje la 'di skad ces smras so// lag na rdo rje bdag la don yod pa pad+ma dri
ma med pa chu skyes kyi zhabs kyi lcags kyu zhes bya ba don yod zhags pa'i snying po// rig sngags kyi rgyal po'i dkyil 'khor chen po dang/ phyag rgya dang/ lha rnams yod de/ rdo padag gis
bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'khor chen po'i dbus su de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyan sngar yongs su bsgrags par bgyi'o// de'i mthu dang rigasngags kyi rgyal po'i mthu stobs kyi rdzu
'phrul gyi tsho 'phrul gyi rnam par 'phrul ba 'di mthong ngo// de'i mthus pad+ma 'di byung ngo// yig sngags kyi rgyal po 'di bdag gi dpral ba nas phyung bas cho 'phrul gyi rnam par 'phrul pa rgya/
che zheng che pa dang yang dag par ldan par gyur to// de nas gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon tshon po lagan rdo rjes/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug
gi zhabs gnyis la mgo des phyag byas nas/ lan gsum bskor ba byas te mchod pa byas nas song ngo// bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su song nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi sbyin
sngar 'dug lta byis pa'i cha byad bzung nas/ bcom ldan 'das la bsil yab g.yob par byed bzhin tu 'dug go/ donas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pas/ byanub
sems dpa' soms dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan res gzigs dbang phyug la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// sems dpa' chen po don yod pa pad+ma dri ma med pa chu skyes kyi zhags pa'i
snying po zhes bya ba don yod pa zhags pa'i snying po// 'ag sngags kyi rgyal po'i dkyil 'khor chen po dang/ phyag rgya dang/ lha rnams smyos shig/ gang gis skyas pa tsam gyis de bzhin lagasheg
pa thams cad kyi rigs kyi dam tshig gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor rim par phye ba dang/ phyag rgya dang/ gsang sngags 'di rnam par dbye ba byas par 'gyur ro// bsgribs pa med pa'i dkyil
thunu// 'khor mthong ba kun tu gnas par byed do// cho ga zhib mo thams cad dang/ gsang sngags dang/ dam tshig nang/ phyag rgya rnams rjes su mthun par phyogs te
gnas par byed do// dkyil 'khor gyi dam tshig gi de kho na nyid dang/ rig sngags kyi rgyal po'i lha thams cad mdun na nye bar gnas par byed de// sgrub pa'i de kho na nyid kyi dngos grub
mthong bar 'gyur ro// rig sngags 'chang phyis kyang rnam pa gzhan du ma 'gyur ro// las thams cad sgrub pa'i tshe ga rnams la legs par sgrub pa'i cho gar yang 'gyur ro// rtag
tu rig sngags 'chang gis rjes su 'brang zhing/ phyi bzhin phyi bzhin lhan cig rjes su 'brang bar 'gyur rdo zhes so// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras
gzigs dbang phyug gis bcom ldan 'das kyis gnang bar rig nas/ sems can thams cad la rjes su brtse ba'i don du rig sngags 'chang thamasacad kyi mchog gi sgrub pa bklags
pas grub pa/ btsam ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'khor chen po'i dbus su bzhin 'dzum zhing mig mi 'dzum pas rig sngags kyi rgyal po 'di smras so// dus gsum du gshegs shing
bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas dang/ byang chub sems dpa' rab 'khyam thams cad dang/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor dang/ phyag rgyu dang/ gsang sngags rab 'bul
0 rgya mtsho rnams la phyag 'tshal lo// 'phags pa rdo rje 'dzin pa rigs thams cad kyi gsang ba dang/ ga sngags 'chang gi dbang po bzhugs pa rnams la phyag 'tshal lo// 'das pa dang/
ma byon pa dang/ da ltar byung ba'i 'phags pa nyan thos kyi dge 'dun rnams dang/ rang sangs rgyas thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo// dkyil 'khor gyis gang ba thams cad dang/ rig sngags
kyi rgyal po chen po 'i sgrub bo grub pa rnams la phyag 'tshal lo// dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang
phyug thugs rje chen can/ rig sngags thams cad kyi dkyil 'khor gyi rgyal po'i bdag nyid chen po'i rnam par 'phrul pa grub pa rnams dang phyag rgya thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo// tad+ya thA/

o ba ma le/ bi ma la gany+tsa/ bi ma la am+b+ha dza pad+mo sUr+ya partsa le/ sa ha sra rasmi ki' NimahA ra dzA la a ba b+hu Shi te/ tsar tsa ra/ tsar tsa ra/ sany+tsar pad+mo da ri pad+magany+hipad+ma b+hu dze/ chu 'i

ma la alhu dza bi ma le ma Ni kan ka badzra pa lcam in+d+ra ni la ma raka ta/ pad+ma nA ga ge ba rtsa ma hA ma Ni ratA laM kr-i ta sha ra/ d+ha ra d+ha ra/ ma hA pad+ma d+ha ra/ par par ba ra shu pA sha b+ha 'a/ sa ras

man+ta b.rotsan sarba ta thA ga ta gu r+ya a b+hi ti/ ku la sa ma ya pa ri pU ra Ni/ ba ra ba ra/ badzra dzA la mA lA gany+nyo/ badzra badzra badzra a d+hi ta pad+me hU~MhU~M/ ma Ni ma Ni ma hAm Nitsin+d+ham Ni ba sha b+har/

hu lu hu ru pad+mapad+ma go ra pad+ma pA Ni ba ra de/ a mo g+ha pad+me/ o pany+tsi na pad+ma Ni badzra d+ha nA/ sarba ta thA ga ta ku la snyan myas ma ya a d+hibataM/ mahA bi bu la b+hu dze/ b+ha ra b+ha ra/

sam+b+ha ra/ b+hu ru b+hu ru b+hu ri Ni/ b+hi'i b+hi ri sa man+ta a ba lo ki ta b+hir rA dze pra sa ra pra sa ra sna bi ma le/ sarba bi maN+Dal de ba tA na maspyi te/ ta ra tar/ tA ra ya tur ya/ sa man+tA pa ri pU ra Ni sarba

bod+hisataa b+hi lo tsa ni sarba ta thA ga ta a mo g+ha a b+hi Shakyi a b+hi Shiny+tsa ya maM sarba bcu man+dal ku la sa ma ya b+hi Sha ke/ sarba ta thA ga ta pA Ni ba 'a de/ pad+ma go ni pad+ma bra b+he/ pad+ma bi ka tsamU dza gdo/

hUM[%/ ]badzra badzra/ bapad+mo ta thA ga ta ku la a d+hi te/ a mo g+ha ba ra de/ sarbasA pa ri pU ra Nisarba pA pa du la pra sham ni/ a mo g+ha TaM da ya sid+d+hisA d+ha ya bi ma la hU~M phaT/ oM ba ra de/

pod+ma b+hu dzan chosku te pad+magu te satA/ byang chub sems dpa' sems pa' chen po 'phag pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis/ don yod pa dri ma med pa pad+mo'i chu skyes kyi pad+ma'i lcags kyu don yodazhag
pa'i snying po'i rigs kyi rgyal po gzungs chen po kun nas rnam par par byed r// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thun mong gzigs kyi dam tshig gi phyag rgya'i snying po 'di skyas pa'i de ma thag gi
'og tu pad+ma ze'u 'bru dang bcas pa'i gsaragasal bar rnam par bya ste// dper na grong khyer gyi phyogs gcig gi sgo byas rgyal mo byung ba bzhin du/ lha'i gzugs blta na sdug pa/ 'od maThaka
sal/ phyag bzhi pa/ rgyan gyis rnam par brgyan pa/ phyag na pany+tsa/ don yod zhags pa'i ngo gzhags pa'i phug dang/ yid bzhin gyi nor bu rin po'i rgyal mtshan chen po'i phug dang/
mchung rtse gsum pa'i phyag/ sbyan gsum pa/ zhal gsum ba/ zla ba'i cod pan 'chang ba/ zhi ba/ zhi zhing 'dzums pa'i zhal/ sku la 'od zer sna tshogs 'bar ba'i snying po/ pad+madang seng
de'i gdan la bzhugs ba/ barma kha bya ba'i snying bor com ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'khod nas/ tsom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ bcom ldan 'das la lan
gsum bskor ba byas nas/ mgo bos phyag 'tshal zhing thal mo sbyar ba btud de/ bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'dug sa mig mi 'dzum par blta zhing 'khod do// thanas bcom ldan 'dra
de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pas/ don yod pa pad+ma dri ma med pa chu skyes kyi zhags pa'i lcags kyu rig sngags kyi rgyal mo bud med kyi gzugs 'dzin pa la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to//
seman dag pa chen po khyod ci'i phyir mig mi 'dzum par blta/ mchog ci don du gnyer bzhin du 'khod ces so// rigasngags kyi rgyal mos gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das padag de bzhin gsheg
bathamasacad kyi gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor rnams kyi spyi'i phyag rgya dang/ sngags dang/ dam tshig gsang ba'i rjes su 'jug par bgyi'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis 'di skad ces bka' stsal to//
rig sngags rgyal mo nyin cig/ khyod de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis thams cad du dam tshig gi dkyil 'khor dang phyag rgya'i gsang bar lung bstan cing/ khyod de bzhin
