gshegs pa rnam par snang mdzad kyis dkyil 'khor thams cad kyi mchog tu lung bstan no// ngas kyang de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsang ba dang/ dkyil 'khor dang/ phyag rgyu'i dam
tshig thams cad kyi mchog tu 'gyur bar lung bstan no// tuN+Da dang/ dka' sham dang/ sgrol ma dung/ khro gnyer than dang/ pad+ma rigs mdzes ma dang/ lha mo chen mo ki li ki li dang//

tshu rdo rje pho nya mo dang/ dri med byed ma dang/ pad+ma'i spyan ma dang/ rdo rje lu gu rgyud ma dang/ rdo rje khro gnyer a ma dang/ lha mo pad+marab snang ma dang/ pad+ma spyod byed ma dang/ rig sngags kyi rgyal
mo chen mo don yod pa'i phyag dang/ longs spyod ldan ma dang/ dpal mo dang/ 'jigs ma dang/ dpe med ma dang/ dbyangs can ma dang/ ral gcig ma spyan stong pa/ phyag stong pa//
dbu stong pa/ don yod pa'i bats+tshe dang/ rin chen lha mo dang/ rin chen 'byung gnas dang// 'jig rten dbang phyug nyid dang/ rig pa'i dbang phyug nyid dang/ lha mo chen mo phyag rgya'i dbang phyug
la sbyin sreg dang/ zhi ba'i las dang/ lha mo rigasaMms ma dang 2 rig lcags ngahitapo rtse pa tshab pa'iga sngags 'chang chen po rdo rje mdzes ma nyid dang/ phyag na 'khor/
la grub pa dang/ de bzhin du rnal gre bzang po'i 'ag pa 'dzin pa dang/ khro bo nyid dang/ khro bo'i rgyal po dang/ dus kyi mtshan mo dang/ zhal rnam par 'gyur sa dang/ mchab gcigs ma dang/ ser skya
ma nyid dang/ rang gsal ma dang/ phyag na rin chen ma nyid dang/ sa'i dkyil 'khor gyi lha mo dang/ de bzhin du rdzas yongs su 'dzin pa'i lha mo dang/ mchod yon dang/ zhabs bsil dang/
gtor ma nyid kyi lha dang/ a kr-i Ni dang/ me tog dang/ bdug pa dang/ phreng ba dang/ byag pa'i lhadang/ thams cad du rjes su song ba'i lha mo khyod dang/ gsang sngags thams cad la dbang
skyaram dang/ bud med kyi gzug 'dzin pa'i rig sngags kyi rgyal po'i mchog sgrol bar byed pa dang/ bdag gi gsang sngags thams cad 'dzin pa 'i rig sngags kyi rgyal mo'i mchog ma dang/ mig
lngags 'chang gi dbang mo dang/ rigs kyi gsang ba dang/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis rig sngags kyi rgyal mo chen po nges par sbyin pa// 'jig rten dbang phyug skyes pa nyid du dpral
ba'i smin ma'i bar du lha'i chu'i dngul las nges par skyes shing byung ba skar ma'i rnam pa dang mtshungs pa/ sna tshogs pa'i gzugs can du gyur ba'o// zhes las sna tshogs dang/ dbyangs can gang
yin pa 'di chung bar byed do/ de bzhin gshegs pas lung bstan pa dang du blangs nas gsungs so// rig sngags thams cad kyi dngos grub mnyam par skyob pa thob pa dang/ de bzhin du cho ga
[d]chu// zhib mo'i sgrub pa dang/ phyag rgya dang/ gsang sngags thams cad kyi dngos grub rnam pa sna tshogs pa dang/ don yod pa'i dngos grub kyang thob par byed de// don yod pa'i
'bras bu mthong ba dang/ bklags pas grub pa'i rgyu mtshan gzhan dang/ thams cad du rigs spyi'i dkyil 'khor dang/ phyag rgya'i dngos grub kyi phyir dang/ spyi'i dkyil 'khor dang/ phyag rgya'i
dam tshig nyid kyang 'di dran pa tsam gyis thams cad thob par byed do// dkyil 'khor dang/ phyag rgya dang/ gsang sngags dang/ lha de dag thams cad kyang dran pa tsam gyis rjes su 'brang/
bar 'gyur bar the tshom med do// rig sngags kyi rgyal po'i dkyil 'khor dang lha rnams dam tshig la kun tu gnas par byed do// de lta bas na 'bad pa thams cad kyis zung zhig/ de bzhin
du thub pa rnam par snang mdzad dang/ shAkya'i rgyal pos rig sngags kyi rgyal po'i lung bstan pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis mang kun tu gzigs shing thams cad rdzas su 'gro ba
sta de'i phyir spyan ras gzigs pad+ma zhes bya ba rig sngags kyi rgyal po bla na med pa// rdo rje'i dngos grub dngos grub chen po/ pad+ma'i rigs kyi dngos grub bla na med pa// de bzhin gshegs pa'i
rigs kyi dngos grub sgrub pa grub pa/ dkyil 'khor chen po'i rigs dang nor bu chen po'i rigs kyi dam tshig gi dngos grub sgrub pa grub pa// don yod pa'i snying po 'di dkyil 'khor thams cad rgyu
xxx
mchu'i mchog gi dngos grub rnams la spyan ras gzigs par dang/ pad+ma mdzes pa dang/ de bzhin tu'ang ming smos pa tsam gyis mod la rjes su 'brang zhing 'ong bar byed do// de bzhin du rje rdza khang

po dang/ rdo rje 'dzin pa dang/ lag na rdo rje dang/ dbang phyug chen po rnams rtag tu rjes su 'brang bar 'gyur ro// de lta bas na rtag shes pas rig sngags smra ba dang/ ming gang gi mchog 'dzin pa la de bzhin
gshigs pas rtag tu rnam par gzigs par 'gyur ro// de bzhin nyid du byang chub sems dpa' thams cad dang/ thub pa rnam par snang mdzad kyis rtag tu lung ston par 'gyur bar the tshom med do//
bcom ldan 'das kyis rig sngags kyi rgyal po 'di lung bstan ma thag tu sa rnam par 'gyur ba drug tu g.yos so// g.yos/ rab tu g.yos/ 'gul/ rad tu 'gul/ ldeg/ rab tu ldeg/ lu
'ur/ rab tu 'ur 'ur/ chem chem/ rab tu chem chem mo//lha'i me tog gi char bab ste/ 'di lta ste/ zla ba mdog mdzes dang/ dri med mdog mdzes dang/ mag mdzes chen po dang/ man bA ba
dang/ man pAr ba chen po dang/ pad+ma dang/ ku mu da dang/ pad+ma dkar po dang/ ut+pa la sngon po dang/ ut+pal dmar po dang/ mya ngan tshang dang/ skya nar dang/ pu nag dang/ gan+d+hag bA rI ka
dang kon+ta dang/ a d+hi muk+ta ka dang/ pA lA sha dang/ mthon ka dang mthon ka chen po dang/ tsam pa ka dang/ so gany+tsi ka dang/ sanA bA ri Na dang/ nA ga pul+la dang/
sna ma dang/ yA thi ka dang/ na ba mA li ka dang/ ta ra Na dang/ ma ru ba ka dang/ ku mya ka'i mi tog gi char 'bab pa'i don dang/ tshon rtsi sna tshogs pas btsos pa'i lha'i gos kyi 'char 'bab
pa 'i don dang/ rin po che sna bdun gyi lha'i brgyan dang/ lhab lhab dang/ rgyan cha'i char 'bab pa'i don dang/ lha'i gsar gyi me tog gi char 'bab pa'i don dang/ lha'i dri tsan dan dang/
ta mA la dang/ go pur dang/ gla rtsi dang/ gur kum dang/ lto'i gras dang/ dri bzang pos bsgos pa'i phye ma'i char 'bab pa'i don dang/ lha'i dri chab kyi char 'bab pa'i don dang/ ma dkral
bar nam mkha'i mthil du rol mo'i sgra 'byung ba dang/ sum cu rtsa gnyis pa'i rtsis kyi lha'i bu me tog sna tshogs 'thor bar byed pa dang/ gos dang/ rin po che sna tshogs 'thor bar byed pa dang/
sum cu rtsa gsum pa' ris kyi lha rnams lha'i mu tig gi do shal dang/ gdu bu dang/ dpung rgyan dang/ rgyun zla gam can dang/ mu tig dmar po dang/ ka shi ka'i gos sna tshogs pa 'thor
ba'i byed par gyur to// lha'i dbang po brgya byin dang/ tshangs pa dang/ khyab 'jug dang/ dbang phyug chen po dang/ gshin rje dang/ chu lha dang/ gzhon nu dang/ rgyal po chen po bzhi dang//
[rz/ ]dbang phyug la sogs pa lha'i bu 'bum phrag dgu bcu rtsa dgus lha'i gzhal yas khang rnam pa sna tshogs pa dang/ lha'i gos dang/ me tog dang/ dri dang/ 'phreng ba dang/ byug pa rnams
dang / 'an po che sna bdun las byung ba'i gdugs sna tshogs pa rnams nam mkha'i mthil du kun tu gtor nas/ bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa dang/ 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang
phyug dang/ phyag na rdo rje dang/ rig sngags kyi rgyal po'i 'khor la mchod pa'i sprin chen por gyur te mchod pa chen po byed par gyur to// rdzu 'phrul chen po'i cho 'phrul chen pa mthong ba'
gyur to// dngos grub chen po'i mtshan ma byung bar rgyur pa rnams yang dag par mthong ngo// phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing thamasacad na de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor
thams cad yang dag par mthong bar gyur to// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsang ba dkyil 'khor rnams kun tu yang dag par bya'o// lha'i gzhal yas khang sna tshog
pa byung bar gyur ba mthong ngo// de nas yang gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po lag na rdo rjes 2 bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su song nas lhags te/ bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum
bskor ba byas te/ zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te rdo rjegasor bzhin du bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'khor nas bzhin 'dzum pas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to
nyu@#// bcom ldan 'das rdzu 'phrul gyi rnam par 'phrul pa che zhing che ba yang dag par snang ba dang/ mchod pa'i sbyin gyi char che zhing che ba rab tu 'bab pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das/
dngos grub kyi mtshan mche zhing che ba snang ba dang/ lha dang/ klu dang/ gnod sbyin dang/ dri za dang/ lha ma yin dang/ nam mkha' lding dang/ mi 'am ci dang/ lto 'phye chen po dang/ ma dang/

mi ma yin pa'i 'khob chen po 'dus par gyur pa'i rig sngags kyi rgyal po skyes par mthong ba'i snang ba dang/ cho 'phrul che zhing chab snang ba dang/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rnam par 'phrul pa mthang ba dang/ byang
chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi rig sngags chen po 'byung bar snang bani/ bcom ldan 'das rgyu ci lags/ rkyen ci lags/ de ci'i mthus ston
gyi mtshan ma yang dag par snang ba lags/ 'di rdzu 'phrul gyi rnam par 'phrul pagar zhig yang dag par snang ba lags/ bcom ldan 'dis bdag gi sems la the tsom de skyes par gyur pas/ de ngas/
par bstan du gsol/ zhu ba lung ston par 'gyur ga gang gis bdag gi dog pa rnam par sel ba dang/ som nyi rnam par sel bar byed pas bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag la skabs dbye 'u gsol/ de nas
bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pas/ gnod sbyin sde dpon chen po lag na rdo rjel 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// lag na rdo rjengs par bstan par bya ba nyon cig/ lag na rdo rje 'di

ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi sgyu ma lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin gyi rnam par 'phrul pa'o// sgyu ma lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin dang/ rdo rje lta bu'i ting

nge 'dzin dang/ dpa' bar 'gro ba'i ting nga 'dzin la sogs pa ting nge 'dzin gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyad bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag dgu bcu rtsa dgus rnam par 'phrul pa'o// lag na rdo rje spyan ras
gzigs dbang phyug gi mthus rdzu 'phrul gyi cho 'phrul snang bar byed do// don yod pa rnam par 'phrul pa kun tu snang ba'i dkyil 'khor chen po dang/ phyag rgya dang/ cho ga zhib mo dang/ gsang sngag
dang gzungs dang/ rigs sngags kyi rgyal po'i rnam par 'phrul pa dang/ rig sngags kun tu snang ba dang/ rig sngags kyi rgyal bo rnam par snang bar byed do// de'i mthus snang ba 'di dang/

rdzu 'phrul gyi rnam par 'phrul pa dang/ cho 'phrul 'di snang ngo// lagan rdo rjerig sngags kyi rgyal po 'di mthong ba dang/ ming bzung ba tsam gyis kyang de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzog

pa'i sas rgyas gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag dgu bcu rtsa gnyis kyi rdul phra 'bu dang mnyam pa mngon sum du mthong ba dang/ mtshan bzung ba'i dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa'i bsod nams

kyi phung po chen po dang ldan pa yongs su 'dzin par 'gyura'o// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rigs kyi dam tshig dang/ rig sngags dang/ phyag rgya dang/ gsang sngags rim par phye ba dang/ snying po'i
mthu sa tu'ajug par 'gyur ro// dam tshig gi dkyil 'khor gsang bar rab tu zhugs par 'gyur ro// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi cho ga zhib mo'i rjes su 'jug pa'
ba 'gyur ro// rig sngags kyi rgyal po 'di lan cig bzlas pa de rnams kyang/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi drung du 'das pa dang/ ma 'ongs pa dang/ de ltar byung ba'i dus gsum dugshegs

rgyu pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi snying po dang/ phyag rgya dang/ gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi dam tshig dang/ gsang sngags chen po rim par phye ba'i sgrub pa la rjes su 'jug par 'gyur ro//

de ci'i phyir zhe na/ lag na rdo rje rig sngags kyi rgyal po 'di ni rdzu 'phrul che zhing mthu che ba'i phyir ste/ 'di lta ste/ 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis 'das pa dang/ ma 'ongs pa dang/

da ltar 'byung ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi drung du snying po dang/ phyag rgya rin pa phye ba dang/ dkyil 'khor gsang ba ta rab tu zhugs shing dbang sgyur ba'i rjes su zhugs pa ni rig sngags kyi
rgyal bo'i snying por gyur pa gcig pu'o// 'di ltaste/ 'o ma dang chu yang dag par 'byung ba bzhin no// snying po gcig pu 'di rigs thams cad kyi dkyil 'khor dang/ phyag rgya'i rim par phye ba dang/
cho ga zhib mo'i rjes su zhugs pa'o// des na lag na rdo rje khyod kyis rig sngags kyi rgyal po 'di kun nas rjes su 'jug pa zhes bya'o// lag na rdo rje rgyud na rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu cho 'am//
bya dge slong ngam/ dge slong ma 'am/ge bsnyen nam/ dge bsnyen ma rig sngags kyi rgyal bo 'di'i ming lacig bzung btsan gyis dus gsum du gshegs pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das thams cad/
kyi drung du gsab thams cad kyi snying po dang/ gzungs dang/ gsang sngags dang/ phyag rgya rin par phu ba dang/ cho ga zhib mo rab tu ston pa dang/ mtshan bzung bar byas par 'gyur ro// dus gsum
ru gshegs pa'idi bzhin gshegs bde nams kyi drung du bkodazhugs kyi bung po chen po yos su bzung bar 'gyur// dag ba'i rtsa bam po dang ldan par 'gyur// dus gsum du gshags pa'i
sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de rnams dang/ byang chub sems dpas legs so zhes bya ba stsol bar 'gyur// don yod pa yangs pa chen po'i dngos gruba'ag tu stsol bar 'gyur ro// mchog tu grub
pa chogabo'i 'gyur ro// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad spyi'i rigs kyi dam tshig gi dngos grub so sor rnyed par 'gyur ro// byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi rnam par 'phrul ba dang/ bag

sngags kyi snying po dang/ ting nge 'dzin dang/ rdzu 'phrul gyi yul dang/ byang chub sems dba'i sems kyi rgyan dang/ pha rol tu phyin pa drug gi rjes su song bar 'gyur// rig sngags kyi rgyal po'i dkyil
'khor gyi lha thams cad kyi rjes zhu sbyor zhing dam tshig girjes su 'jug par 'gyur// lag na rdorjedabazhin du rig lcags kyirgyal po'i mthu chen po'i rnam par 'phrul pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa thamu
cad kyis byin gyis brlabs pa/ byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi rnam par 'phrul pa'o// lag na rdo rjade bas na de rnams rig sngags kyi rgyal po'i mthu chen po'o// lag na
rdo rje rig sngags kyi rgyal po 'di me tog gam/ brtug pa 'am/ dri dang/ byug pa dang/ rol mo gcig gis mchod pa dang/ lan cig tsam gyis kyang dus gsum du gshegs pa'i de bzhin gsheg
pa de rnams kyi snying po gsang ba dang/ mchod pa nams byas pa dang/ mnyes par byas pa dang/ klog par byas par 'gyur ro// de bzhin gshegs pa thamAn mi rig kyigasang ba'i dam tshig dang/ dkyil
'khor dang/ phyag rgya dang/ gsang sngagu dang/ gzungs dang/ rim par phye ba dang/ cho ga zhib mo'i rgyal po mchod pa byas par 'gyur ro// rig sngags kyi rgyal po 'di dran pa tsam gyis gnod
sbyin dang/ srin po dang/ bgegs dang/ log 'dren pa dang/ bdud kyi rigs kyi lha de rnams thams cad phyogs dang phyogs mtsham rnam u'abro bar byed do// yams thams cad dang/ nye bar
ba thams cad dang/ da 'gro ba thams cad dang/ gdon thams cad dang/ nad thams cad dang/ 'thab pa dang/ 'thab mo dang/ rtsod pa dang/ 'gyod pa rnams thams cad dang/ gtam ngan gyi
'jigs pa rnams rab tu zhi bar byed pa'o// gcug pa thams cad dang/ phyir rgol ba thams cad dang/ mi mdza' ba rnamarab tu zhi bar byed do// sdig pa dang sgrib pa thams cad rnam par grol/
bar byed do// mtshams med pa la sogasab sdig pa dang/ sgrib pa dang/ nyon mongs pa rnams rnam pa 'grol bar byed do// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis dbugs 'byin par 'gyur ro//
byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyis dgongs par 'gyur ro// lha rnams thams cad kyis kyang kun tu srung bur 'gyur ro// lag na rdo rje rig sngags 'chang gi dbang po rjes su 'brang bar 'gyur
zhing/ srung ba dang/ skyab pa dang/ spyod par byed do// gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po lag na rdo rje ba cu rtag tu rjes su 'brang bar 'gyur ro// rgyal po chen po bzhi'ang dpung dang bas/ 'khor
dang bcas pa kun nas phyogs bzhir srung bar byed do// thams cad du rtog zhib mo dang/ gsang sngags dang/ phyag rgya'i dngos grub mchog sbyin par 'gyur ro// de bzhin gshegs pa thams
cad kyi rigs kyi dmatshig gi dngos grub chen po sbyin par 'gyur// bats+tshayangs pa'i dkyil 'khor 'di dang/ don yod zhags pa'i snying po rnam par grol ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi gsang ba don yod pa'i
de kho na nyid kyi dngos grub tu 'gyur ro// lha dang/ klu dang/ gnod sbyin dang/ dri za dang/ lha ma yin dang/ nam mkha' lding dang/ mi 'am ci dang/ lto 'phye chen po dang/ srin po thams
cad kyang rtag tu rjes su 'brang bar 'gyur ro// mems can thams cad kyi drung du mchod pa chen po byed par 'gyur ro// bkra shis dang yid la bsams kha thams cad yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro//
gshed byed dang/ byad stems dang/ gsang sngags dang/ rolangs dang/ sems bsgyur ba dang/ sbod gtong gi sbyor ba dang/ mkha' 'gro ma rnams thams cad 'byor bar byed do//
drug dang/ sbyar dug dang/ phye ma'i sbyor ba rnams thams cad 'byor bar byed do// rims rnams thams cad 'byor bar 'gyur ro// nyin gcig pa dang/ nyin gnyis pa dang/ nyin gsum pa dang
nyin bzhi pa dang/ mtshan gcig panang/ nyin gcig pa dang/ grang ba'i rims dang/ rlung las gyur pa dang/ mkhris pa las grub pa dang/ bad kan las gyur pa dang/ 'dus pa las gyur
pa dang/ mgo zer dang/ phol miganang/ g.yan pa dang/ mig nad dang/ gzhag phyed na ba dang/ ma 'o tsa ka dang/ mtshan mar rdol pa dang/ pho ba'i nad dang/ bshang ba 'khyil ba dang//
rna ba na zad ng/ so na ba dang/ rtsib logs na ba dang/ mchin pa na ba dang/ tshad pa dang/ gcinand dang/ gsud pa dang/ lto ba na ba dang/ lag pa na ba dang/ rkang pa na ba dang/ yan lag
na ba dang/ nying lag na ba de dag thams cad dran pa tsam gyis rnam par 'jig par byed do// sha bkra dang/ mdzad ng/ 'bras dang/ phol mig dang/ lhog pa dang/ rkang shu dang/ me dbal dang/
shu ba dang/ 'brum bu phra ma dang/ rma dang/ mgrin pa 'gags pa de dag thams cad byabs pa tsam gyis rnam par 'jig par byed de// phyis kyang nam yang tshugs par mi 'gyur ro// 'didi ltar/
go skabs yangs la rgya che ba yin no// lag na rdo rje rig sngags kyi rgyal po don yod pa pad+ma drim med pa'i chu skyes kyi zhags pa rig sngags kyi rgyal po don yod zhags pa'i snying po zhes bya ba/
dus gsum du gshegs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis byin gyis brlags pas rdo rje gsang ba'i snying po dam tshig byin gyis rlob pa'i rnam par 'phrul ba zhes bya'o// de nas yang gnod

sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po phyagan rdo rjes/ bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar zhus pa'i dge mtshan dang/ bkra shis pa gsang ba byin gyis rlob pa rigasngags kyi rgyal po chen po'i rnam par 'phrul ba thos nas
tsam pa dang/ mgu ba dang/ mi rangs pa dang/ rab tu dga' ba dang/ dga' ba dang/ yid bde bskyes nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das rig sngags kyi
rgyal po yon tan phun sum tshogs pa thams cad kyi mchog sbyin par byed pa 'di ni shin tudakonano// bcom ldan 'das rig sngags kyi rgyal pa dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad dang/ bsod nams kyi tshig/
thams cad dang/ gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi dam tshig gi dngos grub bla na med pa thams cad yang dag pa rdzogs par byed ba'i rig sngags kyi rgyal po mchog tu dkon te/ de bzhin gshegs pa dang
mnyam bar blta bar bgyi'o// de bzhin gshegs pa byang chub kyi snying po dang/ dam pa'i chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba dang mnyam pa'o// bcom ldan 'das rig sngags kyi rgyal po 'phags pa spyas
dbu// gzigs dbang phyug gi dpral ba'i bar nas nges bar byung ba ni/ rig pa 'dzin pa de dag thams cad la phan pa'i don dang/ dngos grub mthong ba'i de kho na nyid kyi sgrub pa grub pa'i ched
du 'gyur go/ dge ba'i rtsa ba mchog tu nye bar bsags par 'gyur pa las gzhan ma yin no// rig sngags kyi rgyal po 'di dran pa tsam gyis bsod nams kyi phung po 'a sa dge ba'i rtsa ba'i tshogs
gzhal du med pa dang/ tshad med pa dang/ grangs med pa nye bar bsags par 'gyur gyi/ gzhan du ma yin no// bcom ldan 'das nyin mtshan du'ang 'gasngags kyi rgyal po 'di dran par bgyi ba skad cig
kyang mi brjed par bgyi'o// bcom ldan 'das ci su slar yang snga dro 'am/ nyin mo 'am/ mtshan mo 'am zla ba 'am/ lor yang rung ste/ rig sngags kyi rgyal po 'di brjedan/ sangs skyas dang byang
lca chub sems dpa 'thams cad brjod par 'gyur// yongs su dor bar 'gyur/ bsod nams kyi tshogs thams cad yongs su dor bar 'gyur ro// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pas

bka' mal pa/ lag na rdo rjen de bzhin no// ji ltar khyod kyis smras pa de de bzhin te/ rig sngags kyi rgyal po 'di lag tu son par 'gyur ba'i sems can de ni dge ba'i rtsa ba chung ngu skyed pa ma yin no//

lag na rdo rje gda'i klung gi bye ma bya ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag bcu rtsa dgu'i dus gsum mnyam pa nyid kyi de bzhin gshegs pa rnams ma mthong ba dang/ bsnyen bkur ma byas pa dang/ phyag rgya dang/

dkyil 'khor dang 2 dam tshig dang/ gsang sngags rim par phye ba dang/ rig sngags kyi cho ga zhib mo 'i rgyal po ma thos shing ma zhugs pa gang yin pa des ni/ lag na rdo rjerig sngags kyi rgyal po 'di de'i
lag tu phyin par mi 'gyur ro// mi thos shing mi mthong la/ ming gi sgra grags pa tsam du'ang mi 'gyur ro// lag na rdo rje rigasngags kyi rgyal bo 'di gang gi lag tu son par 'gyur ba des/ lag

na rdo rje gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag dgu bcu rtsa dgu'i dus gsum mnyam pa nyid kyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams de 'i lag tu son par
'gyur ro// de bzhin gshegs pa de rnams kyi drung du rigs kyi dam tshig gi dkyil 'khor dang/ phyag rgya dang/ gsang sngags rim par phye ba dang/ snying bo dang/ gsang ba'i ga zhib mo thams cad lag
tu son par 'gyur ro// gnas thams cad du song zhing rjes su zhugs par 'gyur ro// thams cad rjes su song zhing dam tsheg shes par 'gyur ro// rig sngags thams cad dang/ gsang sngags rim
par phye ba dang/ phyag rgya yang dag par spyod par 'gyu'o// rig sngags 'chang thams cad kyi kachog dang/ gtso bo dang/ thu bor 'gyur ro// de bzhin gshegs ba de rnams thams cad kyi rungan/
sras kyi gtso ba'i dus gsum du gshegs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis lung ston pa'i 'gyu'o// dge ba'i rtsa ba nye bab ston ba dang bsod nams kyi tshogs yongs su 'dzin par 'gyur ro//
lag na rdo rje rig sngags kyi rgyal po 'di gang gi lag tu son cing thob par 'gyur ba'i sems can gang yin pa de ni de'i yon tan dang phan yon gzhal du med pa thob par 'gyur ro//
rig sngags kyi rgyal bo 'di gang gis lag tu son par 'gyur ba de/ sangs rgyas kyi phun sum tshogs pa thams cad so sor rnyed par 'gyur ro// rjes byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gisazhig sngags kyi rgyal po 'di skyas su/ rang gi gzugs kyi bdag nyid kyi dngos po pad+ma'i ze'u 'bru'i dbus su rig sngags kyi rgyal po 'phags par

bltas nas/ don yod pa yid bzhin nor bu'i 'od ces bya ba nor bu rin po che chen po rig sngags kyi rgyal po bcom ldan 'das la phul bar gyur to// oM a mo g+ha tsan+ta ma Nig ba da pad+me dz+wa la dz+wa la na b+hu dze
hU~M 'din don yod pa pad+ma dri ma med pa'i nuskyes kyi zhags pa'i rtsa ba'i snying bo'o// 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis bcom ldan 'das phul ba'i de ma thag 'di nas rig sngags kyi rgyal
po thams cad bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan snga na bcom ldan 'das la spyan mi 'dzum par blta zhing 'khod do// bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pas don yod pa yid bzhin nor bu'i 'od rig sngags kyi rgyal

lta ponor bu rin po che chen po de la'ang rig sngags kyi rgyal pos spyi bo nas dbang bskur ro// bcom ldan 'das kyis rig sngags kyi rgyal po 'dis dbang bskur ma thag tu stong gsum gyi stong chin po'i 'jig/
rten gyi khams ri dang/ nag dang/ 'brog dgon pa'i bcas pa rnams rnam par 'gyur ba sdug tug mos so// phyogs bcu kun nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mthong bar 'gyur to// des na dus
gsum du bzhugs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas thams cad nam mkha'i dbyings su rdzu 'phrul gyi bzhugs te/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa
shAkya thub pa la legs so zhes bya ba byin to/ shAkya thub pa mchog tu rnyed par dka' ba'i man par dbang bskur ba'i rgyal po 'dis mngon par dbang bskur ba ni legs so legs so// dus gsum du gsheg
pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa snga ma rnams kyis kyang de bzhin du rig pa'i rgyal po 'di dbang bskuro// jid thams cad kyis kyang tshig gcig mthun bas don yod ba yid bzhin nor bu'i 'od la rig sngags kyi
rgyal po chen pos mngon par dbang bskur ro// dus gsum du gshegs pa'i de bzhin ge shigs pa de rnams kyang phyag gser gyi la ga can bskyang nas/ de rnams thams cad la rig pa'i rgyal po'i spyi bo'i

gtsug nas mngon par dbang bskur ro// 'di ni mngon par dbang bskur ba'i phyag rgya mngon panadabang bskur pa dang ldan pa'o// oM a mo g+ha ro tsa namahA mu dA ma Ni pad+me dzA la pra yatsA ya hU~M/ phyag rgya man ngos

mngon par dbang bskur ma thag tu bcom ldan 'das la legs go zhes bya ba byin te/ 'ang 'ang gisangs rgyas kyi zhing du gshegs nas mi snang bar 'gyur to// de nas rig pa'i rgyal po de de bzhin gshig pa tham cad kyi phyag rgya
dbang bskur bar rig nas/ bcom ldan 'das la g.yas su bskor ba gsum byas nas thal mo sbyar ba btud de phyag byas nas spyan sngar 'dug ste sems par gyur to// de nas
bcom ldan 'das rig sngags 'chang de'i rig pa'i rgyal po sems r ra gzigs nas/ ji ltar da ltar yid la byed pa yang dag par bab rtagasal bar mdzad do// oM a mo g+ha maN+Da la pad+ma a b+hi Sha
kaM ma Ni badzrasarba ta thA ga ta a b+hi Sha kahU~M/ rig pa'i rgyal po des dkyil 'khor du mngon par dbang bskur bas mngon par dbang bskur ma thag tu de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsang ba'i dkyil
'khor cigs thun mong ba'i dam tshig rdo rje chen po'i tshul gyis sa gzhi byin gyis brlabs so// de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs dang/ pad+ma'i rigs dang/ rdo rje'i rigs dang/ nor bu'i rigs
rtswa rnam par thar pa chen po'i dkyil 'khor bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar cher 'khrigs pa'i dkyil 'khor du brtags pa mthong ngo// 'ang 'ang gi dge ba'i rtsa thas rig pa'i rgyal pa'i dkyil
'khor ba'i lha thams cad mthong ngo// rmad du byung ba'i cho 'phrul che zhing che ba dag byung ngo// don yod pa'i rnam par 'phrul pa chen po shin tu ngo mtshar ba dag mthong ngo// de nas byang chub
sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa smyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis dkyil 'khor chen po'i rnam par 'phrul pa 'di lta bu mthong nas/ don yod pa'i mchod pa'i nor bu'i rdo rje
byin gyis rlob pa de bzhin gshegs pa'i mngon par dbang bskur ba bcom ldan 'das kyis rjes su gnang ba dang ldan pa'o// oM a mo g+ha pA dzas Ni pad+ma badzrata thA ga ta gi lo ka te sa man+ta pra sa ra

hUM 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis don yod pa mchod pa'i nor bu'i snying po byin ma thag tu mchod pa rgya chen po rnam pa sna tshogos pa du ma rab tu byung ste/ ji ltar rang rang gi cho ga ji
lta ba bzhin du mchod pa chen po rnams rab tu byung ngo// lha rdzas rnam pa sna tshogs pa rnam par bkra ba yas pa rgya chen po go skabs kun tu gnas par gyur to// de bzhin gshegs pa'i
rnam par 'phrul pa che zhing che ba'i byin gyi rlabs kyi bkod pa rig sngags kyi dkyil 'khor chen po yang dag pa ra mthapang// de nas rig pa'i rgyal po don yod pa pad+ma dri ma med pas bcom ldan
'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas nas zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ bcom ldan 'das las 'ang por 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la mngon du phyogs nas
stan la 'dug go/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po phyag na rdo rje la bka' stsal pa/ phyag na rdo rje 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi rnam par 'phrul
pa ting nge 'dzin gyi stobs byin gyis rlob pa'i khyad par phyag rgya chen po dang/ gsang sngags dang/ gzungs dang/ cho ga zhib mo'o mthu stobs pad+mayangs pa chen po'i gsang ba don yod zhags
[7 ]// pa'i rnam par 'phrul pa// rig pa'i rgyal po'i de kho na nyid kyi snying po grub pa/ dam tshig dang rjes su 'thun pa// mthu stobs dang yon tan 'byung ba la phan pa/ de bzhin gshegru
pa thams cad kyi snying po'i rnam par 'phrul pa yid kyi shing rtare ba thams cad kyi mchog rab tu sbyin pa la ltos/ 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis re ba thams cad yos su
rdzogs par rjes su sbyin te/ rig pa'i rgyal po 'di phyi ma'i dus phyi ma'i tshe sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa byed par 'gyur ro// rig pa'i rgyal po 'di sems can thams cad kyi snang ba byed par
tsho 'gyur ro// skyabs dang/ dpung gnyen dang/ 'bras dang/ yid kyi shing rta ra ba thams cad yongs su rdzogs par byed do// sdig pa thams cad rab tu zhi bar byed do// dgra thams cad
rab tu 'dul bar byed do// bgegs dang log par 'dren pa thams cad rnam par 'jig par byed do// char chas pa 'ab tu zhi bar byed do// cher med na char 'babs lo/ rlung dang/ sad dang/
ser ba zlog par byed do// chu ga'i dgon pa rab tu zhi bar byed do// nad thams cad zlog par byed do// gdug pa thams rab tu zhi bar byed do// tshe dang nad med pa 'phel bar byed de//
bsod nams sbyin pa dang/ dbang phyug sbyin pa dang/ nor sbyin pa dang/ 'bru 'phel bar byed do// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis
na yod pa dri ma med pa'i chu skyes kyi gzungs kyi snying po'i yo byad dang/ cho ga bklags pas 'grub pa'i dngos grub gsungs so// de nas snying bo 'di bklags pas 'grub par 'gyur te/ rig pa'i
rgyal po bklags pas dkyil 'khor gyi lha thams cad 'gugs par 'gyur// stong phrag brgya bzlas pas pad+mo yangs pa'i dkyil 'khor dang/ gzhal med khang gi rgyun mtha' dag dang/ rig pa'i
rgyal po dang bcas pa'i lha rnams dang/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang/ 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi gzhal med khang dang/ dkyil 'khor dang/ gzhal med khang mtha'
dka mthong ngo// de la lha rnams rab tu 'jug par byed do// dam tshig shes par yang 'gyur ro// rig sngags kyi dkyil 'khor du mngon par dbang bskur bar yang 'gyur ro// phyag rgya rim par
phye ba dang rjes su mthun par yang 'gyur ro// dang po rmilam mthong gtsam gyis 'gro'o// gnyis par rmi lam mthong la de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs kyi dkyil 'khor mthong ngo// de bzhin gsheg
pa dang/ byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs thams cad dang/ rig sngags kyi dkyil 'khor gyi lha rnams kyis rang gi rgyan dang dkyil 'khor du brtags pa mthong ngo// gzhal yas khang rgya chen po dang bcas pa
mthong// der yang rab tu 'jug par byed de dam tshig kyang 'dzin par byed do// phyag rgyadang/ dkyil 'khor dang/ gsang sngags dang mngon bar dbang bskur ba'ang so so'i thob pa// rig sngags
[po/ ]rgya@#// dang bcas pa'i dngos grub 'ag tu thob bo// gsum pa' rmi lam mthong na rdo rje rigs kyi dkyil 'khor mthong ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa dang/ byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs/

thams cad dang/ rig sngags kyi dkyil 'khor gyi lha rnams dang bcas pa rang gi rgyan dang dkyil 'khor du brtags pa dang/ gzhal med khang rgya chen po dang bcas pa mthong ngo// de la 'ang rdo rje 'chang
rab tu 'jug par byed do// dam tshig gi phyag rgya sbyin bar byed do// mngon par dbang bskur bas mngon par dbang bskur bar byed do// rig sngags thams cad dang/ don yod pa'i rim par phye ba'i

dngos grub chen po dang/ mngon pa'i dab nga bskur bas mngon par dbang bskur bar byed do// rdo rje'i rigs kyi dngos grub chen po dang dam tshig thams cad so sor thob po// bzhi par rmi las mthong ba na nor bu'i
rigs chen po'i dkyil 'khor dang/ phyag rgya'i rim par phye ba dang/ cho ga zhib mo dang rang gi rgyan dang/ dkyil 'khor mthong ngo// de bzhin gshegs pa dang/ byang chub sems dpa'i lcags thams cad
dang lha'i tshogs dang/ dkyil 'khor du gnas pa'i lha dang/ rig pa'i rgyal po'ang mthong ste/ de la'ang rab tu 'jug par byed do// phyag rgya dang/ dam tshig dang/ cho ga dang bcas pa rjes su thob ste/

mngon par dbang bskur ba'ang rab tu thob bo// dngos grub chen po dang mchog sbyin pa'i ng so sor thob cing thams cad du mngon bar dbang bskur bar yang 'gyura'o// lnga par rmi lam mthong ba na rnam pa ga na
[p]ba'i dkyil 'khor dubartags pa dang/ don yod zhags pa'i dkyil 'khor du brtags pa dang/ po Ta la ka'i nyi'i gzhal med khang dang bcas pa mthong ngo// de bzhin gshegs pa dang/ byang chub se/
dba'i tshogs thams cad dang/ lha dang bcas pa dang/ rig pa'i rgyal po'i dkyil 'khor gyi lha rnams mthong ste/ de la'ang 'phags baspyan ras gzigs dbang phyug rang nyid sems can de la
rab tu 'jug par byed do// dam tshig dang/ phyag rgya dang/ dkyil 'khor dang/ gsang sngags dang/ gzungs kyi dag sgrub so sor grobago/ rang nyid kyang don yod pa'i rig sngags kyi bang
gis mngon par dbang bskur te mngon par dbang bskur bar byed do// cho ga zhib mo thams cad dang dngos grub kyang rjes su stsol bar byed do// mchog thams cad rab tu sbyin pa so sor thob po//
drug par rmi lam mthong ba nadakyil 'khor chen po mthong ste/ 'bags pa sbyana'as gzigs dbang phyug phug stong pa mthong ngo// gzhal med khang dang bcas pa'i byang chub sams dpa'i tshogs dang/
lhadang/ klu dang/ gnod sbyin dang/ dri za dang/ lha ma yin dang/ nam mkha'aldang dang/ mi 'am ci dang/ lto 'phye chen po mthong ste/ de la'ang 'ag tu 'jug par byed do// phyag rgya dang/
gsang sngags dang/ dam tshig dang/ mngon par dbang bskur ba so sor thob ste/ rig sngags thams cad kyi dngos grub kyi mchogasbyin pa lo sor thob po// bdun par rmi lam chen po mthong bas
de bzhin gshags pa byang chub kyi snying por gshegs nas rdo rje'i gdan la bzhugs pa mthong// chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba dang bdud 'dul ba mthong ngo// de la'ang de bzhin
gshegs pa rnam par snang mdzad phyag gser gyi kha dog can brkyang ste/ rang nyid kyi phyag gis bzung nas rab tu 'jug par byed do// rang nyid mngon par dbang bskur zhing mngon par dbang bskur
bar byed do// de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs thams cad kyi dam tshag dang/ phyag rgya dang/ gsang sngags kyi dngas grub kyi mchog sbyin pa rjes sustsol bar byed do// de bzhin gshegs pa tham
cad kyisas rgyas kyi zhing ston par byed do// nad sna tshogs pa dang ldan pa'i 'jig rten pa thams cad rig sngags 'chang gi rgyal bo gcig pur 'gyur ro// skye ba brje ba 'chi 'pho ba'i dus su dran pa

nyi bar gnas shing dus byed par 'gyura'o// bde btsan gyi 'jig rten gyi khams su pad+ma las rdzus te skye ba'i skal pa dang bcas par 'gyur ro// don yo ro nga 'i rigasngags 'chang gi 'khor los skyakhar skya bar
'gyur ro// de bzhin gshegs pa bye ba khrag khrigabargya stong phrag dgu bcu rtsa dgus mchod par byed do// yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mngon sum du mthong nas nye bar ston par byed do// thams

cad du'ang de rnams rang rang gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing nye bar ston par byed do// thams cad du'ang rang gi gsang ba de bzhin gshegs pa rnam pa snang mdzad kyi dam tshig nye bar ston par byed do// bskal

pa brgya stong phrag gi bar du'ang sngon gyi skye ba rjes su dran par byed do// de bzhin gshegs pa'i khyu mchog thams cad kyi rdzu 'phrul dang/ rnam par 'phrul pa dang/ ting nge 'dzin dang/ gsang ba'i ram
tshig dang/ dkyil 'khor gyi rim par phye ba dang/ gsang sngags dang/ gzungs sngags rnams la mngon du phyogs par 'gyur ro// skye ba skye bar yang rang gi bsod nams kyi las kyi tshogs dge ba'i
rtsa ba rjes sudran par 'gyur ro// thams cad du gnas thams cad du yos su dag pa'i las kyi sgrub thabs kyi cho ga'i dngos grub tu 'gyur ro// zhes pa rtsa ba'i snying po'i dngos grub bla na med
pa bklags pas 'grub pa'o// de nas 'di'i yo byad dang cho ga sems can thams cad kyi re ba los su rdzogs par byed pa'i dngos grub tu 'gyur ro// sdig pa thams cad nges par sreg pa la brgya rtsa
brgyad bzlas pas sdig pa dang sgrib pa thams cad rnam par nyams par byed do// gang dang gang gi las kyi sgrib pa rnams rjes su bcings par 'gyura'o// de'ang nyi ma bdun gyis rang gi lus de'ang rang
gi gzugs kyis nges par 'gro ste mdun du nye bar 'dug ste sbyin par byed pa dang/ sngon gyi sgrib pa nye bar bsags pa 'di dang/ sdig ba thams cad lo ngas su zad pa nyid dang/ dge ba'i rtsa ba thams
cad yongs su rdzogs ba dang/ bdag zhum ba dang/ 'khrug pa mtha' dag bzlas pa tsam gyis yang dag par smra bar byed cing mi snang bar byed do// rims thams cad la skud pa dkar po la mdud/
pa nyi shu rtsa gcig byas te/ brgyatsa brgyad bzlas pas rims thams cad yongs su grol bar byed de// nad thams cad la khyabs pas yongs su grol bar byed do// mtshon
[】 ]]sam/ rmabya'i sgros sam/ mdas kyang rung ste nad thams cad las yo sa su grol bar byed do// gdon thams cad la tshon skud sna lnga'i skud pa la 'dud pa lan nyi shu rtsa gcig byas te/ bzlas brjod
lan brgya rtsa brgyad byas te gdon gyis zin pa de'i mgul par bcing lan bdun du byab par bya'o// gugul gyi bdug pa sbyin par bya/ bzlas brjod lan bdun bya bzhin pa dang bcas bam gang dang gang gi gdon
lce gyis zin par gyur ba de'ang rang gi lus kyis nges par 'gro ba ste/ rig sngags 'chang gi mdun du nye bar 'dug nas thams can sgyu bar byed do// rang gis dris pa de thams cad smra bar byed ni/ bka'
bsgo ba thams cad byed par 'gyur ro// 'thab pa dang/ 'thab rtsod dang/ rtsod pa dang/ 'gyod pa rnams thams cad la skya ba'i mchog tu 'gyur ro// gzhan yang bsam gtan dang sbyin sreg gis
yongs su grol lo// khar chur te rgyal po'i khab tu zhugs na rgyal po 'khor dang bcas pa dbang du rgyu'anas gnas so// dug 'thungs pas tshul yongs su bzlas te sbyin par bya ste dug mad par 'gyur ro//
dug gi zos pa la byab par bya ste dug med par 'gyur ro// dug dang/ byad stems dang/ gsang sngags dang/ phyi ma'i sbyor ba thamasacad la dri dang bsres pa'i bum pa la stong phrag brgyad
pa0 yongs su bzlas pa byas la bkru bar bya ste/ bkrus pa tsam gyis chod la thams cad nyams par byed do// gang yang lus zad pa dang/ nyams pa dang/ bskams pa dang/ rgyal po'i dpal med pa/
dang/ lus yongs su gdungs pa la yig sngags 'chang des ma rig pas dri'i chus yongs su gang ba'i bum pa dgu yungs kar gyis gtor te stong phrag brgyad yongs su bzlas brjod bya'o// de nas
An+tar saSha dang/ bI ka dang/ A Tadang/ bil ba dang/ shu ti dang/ nyi'u shing dang/ ekas thu nadang/ mo la kya dang/ lus kyi mar gyis bsku mnye byas nas lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas
brjod byas te AT phyug par bya'o// gzugs brnyan bya sta gong bu de mtshon chas dum bu brgyud du bya sku/ snod yongs su gang pa bzhi mtshams bzhir 'phang bar bya zhing/ snod gang pa bzhi mtsham
bzhir 'phangabar bya'o// de nas snying pos lan brgya rtsa brgyad du khyab par bya'o// de nas ne'u gseng sngon po gang du nu rgyun 'bab par dri'i chu'i bum pas khrus byas zhing gos dkarapo dgus/
g.yogs par bya'o// 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la mchod pa bya zhing/ dkon mchog gsum la mchod pa bya'o// ji ltar 'byor pa'i bram ze'i ston kho yon dang bcas pa bya'o/
des rang nyid byams pa dang ldan par bya'o// ji ltar 'byor pa gya nom pa gya nom pas dkar pa'i zas kyi bza' ba dang tung bas tshim par bya'o// de nas dbal med pa thams cad dang/ nad thamA
gla// cad dang/ bgegs dang log par 'dren ba thams cad kyis mi reg pa dang/ 'byung po dang/ gnod sbyin dang/ srin po dang/ grib gdon dang/ brjed byed dang/ gza'
dang / log 'dren gyis zin pa las yos su grol lo// bza'anyes dang/ 'gomanyes dang/ 'jigs pa thams cad las yongs su grol bar byed do// 'aa kyi phung po yongs su rdzogs pa 'a 'gyur
thams cad du 'jigs pa 'jigs par byed pa'i 'jigs pa med par 'gyur ro// sdig pa dang/ sgribs pa dang/ kun nas nyon mongs pa thams cad las yongs su grol bar 'gyur ro//
ring du 'tsho bar 'gyur ro// nad thams cad dang bral bar 'gyur ro// skye ba brjes nas bde ba can gyi 'jig rten gyi khams su skye bar 'gyur ro// skye ba'i skye ba dran par 'gyur ro// de
bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis rtag tu'ang dgos par 'gyur 'o// byang chub sems dpa' dang lha thams cad kyis ji srid byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par s sa rgyas kyi bar du de 'dzin par
'gyur ro// migan bkasaAsha'i chu dang/ shing mngal gyi chu dang/ drim med pa'i tshul lan brgya rtsa brgyad yongs su bzlas te sgyur bar bya ste mig nad 'phral du zhi bar byed do// mgo bo'i zug rngu
dang gzhogs phyed na ba la mar dang til mar la lan brgya rtsa brgyad yongs su brgyus nas 'jam par bsngos pas sman shu ti la bsgos nas mgo la bsku mnye byas na/ mgo bo'i nad thams cad dang gzhogs
phyed na ba'i nad thams cad las yongs su grol lo// so'i zug rngu la me tog sna ma dang so shing la lan brgya rtsa brgyad du yongs su bzlas nas bza' bar byas naso'i zug rnguyongs su grol lo// na ba'i/

zug rngu la shu ti dang til mar la brgya rtsa brgyud yongs su bzlas bas bkang bar bya ste/ rna ba'i zug rngu thams cad yongs su grol lo// kha na ba la sman ma shur 'o chu dang mar la brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas
nas 'jam par bsros pa btung ba' bya ste/ 'a'i nad thamasacad las yongs su grol lo// lto ba'i zug rngu la lan tshwa dang nu la lan brgya rtsa brgyad yongs su bzlas nas btung bar bya ste/ lto ba'i zug
rdzuyongs su grol lo// snying gi zug rngu la so so rtsa lam dang/ go snyod dang/ pu skalnga'i rtsa ba rnams bzhi 'o gyur gyi chus sum cha lhag mar lus kyi bar du bskol bar byas nas btung bar bya'o//
lan brgyad bzlas pas snying gi zug rdzudang gzhogs nab dang/ mchin pa na ba dang/ mtshan bar rdol ba dang/ gsud pa dang/ skyug bro ba dang/ gcin nad rnams te/ de bzhin du nad
thams cad 'phral du sel bar 'jig rten gyi mgon pos 'di gsungs so// rgyal po'i 'jigs pas 'jigs pa rnams kyis yungs kar la yongs su bzlas nas rgyal po rnamAkyi sgor gtor bar bya
ste rgyal po'i 'jigs pa'i 'jigs pa thams cad yongs su grol bar 'gyur te/ thams cad du'ang rgyal ba ster bar 'gyur ro// na le sham la stong rtsa brgyad yongs su bzlas te//
na le sham gyi 'bras bu 'a'i rtse mor bcug ste bcangs nagang skyas pa de dbang du 'gyur ro// gang blangs pa de so so' rnyed do// gnas thams cad du 'gro ba rnams la

rgyal ba'i mchog chen po sbyin par 'gyur ro// klu'i chalaphebs pa la bal po se'u'i lag ma bya stagang du 'dod pa der ku'i char 'bebasaso// klu'i mtshor song nas mtshan mo bdun du zhi dang/ sbrang rtsi dang
mar dang/ yungs kar gyi sbyin sreg lanatso nga rtsa brgyad du byas n gter chen po nyid par 'gyur ro// khang phyag thob pa la 'bras mos dang/ yungs karadang/ mar dang bsres pas sbyin mag lan stong

brgyad du byas na dbang phyug chen poso sor thob bar 'gyura'o// dgra 'joms pa la sna khu'i phub ma dang/ lan tsha dang/ cha thatil mar dang bsres pas lan stong rtsa brgyad du sbyin yigabyas na dgra rnamal/
thams cad med par 'gyur ro// dgra rnams thams cad rab tu 'dul bar 'gyur ro// skyod par 'dod ras de nyid kyi thal ba la lan nyi shu rtsa gcig tu bzlas te dgra'i skor gtor bar bya ste/ mtshan me
gcig tu mi gnas te phyogs dang phyogs mtshams rnams su 'bros par byed do// 'khrug pa'i g.yul 'jug par 'dod pas yus gar la lan stong phrag brgyad du yongs su bzlas te 'khrug
pa'i g.yul po'i dbus su gtor bar bya ste// thams cad du chugs pa dang/ rengs pa dang/ rmongs par 'gyur te/ thams cad du rgyal ba ster bar 'gyur zhing/ thams cad phyogs dang phyogs
mtshams rnams su 'bros par byed do// gnas na gnas pa thams cad kyi'ang rgyal ba ster bar 'gyur// thams cad du thogs pa med pa'i stobs dang/ brtson 'grus dang/ pha rol gnon
par 'gyur ro// ldong 'osal lan stong phrag brgyad yongs su bzlas te/ mig gi mig sman du byas na mi snang bar 'gyur te/ 'byung po dang/ gnod sbyin dang/ srin po thams cad kyis mi mthong bar
'gyur ro// gi haM la lan stong phrag brgyad yos su bzlas te thig le byas na bug thams cad du'ab tu 'jug par byed cing/ bu ga'i sgo thams cad bya sta skor gnas par byed do// gang du 'ded pa
der 'jug par byed de// ga dogi snying khar thig le byas na gang du 'jug pang byed pa re dang de nyid du mchod pa chen por 'gyur te/ nor che ba dang 'bru 'phel ba 'thob po// lag pa gnyis la byugs pas
gang la rig pa de dbang du 'gyur te/ gang blangs pa de thams cad so sor nyid do// rgyal po dbang du byed par 'dod pas lag ba g.yas pa la gi haM gis byugs nas lan stong rtsa brgyad yongs su bzlas te/
rgyal po'i sgo la thal lcag sbyin par bya ste/ rgyal po dang/ btsun mo sras dang/ 'khor dang bcas pa bdag nyid dang nor gyis kyang dbang du 'gyur ro// bud med dbang du byed pa la me tog dang 'bras bu

la lan stong phrag brgya rtsa brgyad du yongs su bzlas nas sbyin par bya/ yang na mngag par bya ste 'phral nyid du dbang du byed par 'khyuga'o// gang du'adod pa de dang de nyid du 'gro'o// slar yang 'ong ngo// yang
bu@#// na ming smos pa nam mkha' la 'phang bar bya ste/ gang gi ming smos pa de 'gugs par 'gyur zhing mtshan mo 'ong bar byed do// mthu stobs kyis slar yang phyir ldog ste 'gro'o//
skye pa dbang du byed pa la ra ti dang sna ma'i ma tog lan bdun yos su bzlas te sbyin par bya'o// yang 'gag par bya ste gal tsam gyis brtaganyid dang nor gyis kyang dbang du byed bar 'gyur ro// gang
smras pa dang gdang byas pa de thams cad byed de// las dang ci bsgom bye da par 'gyur ro// gzhon num dbang du byed pa la 'bras bu la lan brgya rtsa brgyad lo sa su bzlas te sbyin par bya lam
mag par bya ste bzung ba tsam gyi dbang du 'gyuro// grib ma bzhin du rjes su 'brang bar 'gyur zhing ji srid 'tsho bar nye bar gnas pa'i gyu// rje'u rigs dbang du byed pa la ba sha ka'i mi rtog la ka3

brgya rtsa brgyad yongs su brdzus tasbyin par bya ste dbang du gyur nas nye bar gnas so// bram ze dbang du byed pas zho dang 'o ma bzu' ba la lag brgya rtsa brgyad yongs su bzlus na spyin par bya ste// bram ze dbang
du byed pa grub pa// rgyal rigs dbang du byed pa la bu ram dang 'o ma la lan brgya rtsa brgyad yongs su bzlas nas sbyin par bya ste dbang du 'gyu// dmas rigs dbang du byed pa la gang dang gang gi
bza' ba la lan brgya rtsa brgyud yongs su bzlas te sbyin par bya sazos pa tsam gyis mod la dbang du 'gyuro// rang gi 'do ba'i bya ba gzhan rnam pa sna tshogs pa bya ba rnams zhibaklags pas grub par
ca 0 'gyur ro// don yod pa pad+ma'i luskyes kyi rtsa ba'i snying po'i yo byad dang cho ga'i sgrub thabs so// des zhin yod pa'i phyag rgya dbang bskur ba'i gzus kyi yo byad dang cho gar 'gyur te/
gzus 'di rig sngags 'chang gis dran pa tsam dang/ bklags pa tsam dang/ phyag rgya bzung ba tsam kyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi yid bzhin gyi nor bu'i gsang ba'i phyag rgyu dang dbang bskur
ba'i phyag rgya dran par 'gyur ro// rig pa'i rgyal po'i gzungs stong phrag bzlas pa 'dis dus gsum du gshegs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis gsang ba'i phyag rgyas mngon par dbang bskur
bar 'gyur ro// rig sngags 'chang ris kyang dang por rmi lam gyi nang du mthong ngo// dus gsum du gshegs pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das thams cad kyis rnam par snang mdzad yid bzhin nor bu'i

phyag rgya'i dbang bskur thu mngon par dbang bskur bar byed do// de'ang de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs kyi mngon par dbang bskur ba dang/ dkyil 'khor dang/ phyag rgya la rab tu 'jug par byed do// de bzhin/

gshegs pa 'ang rang rnams kyang de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsang ba'i bang bskur ba rjes su sbyin par 'gyur ro// legs so zhes bya ba'i sgra brjod par mdzad do// sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad kyi sgo rnams

bya bar gyur pa'i skor mthong ngo/ gang 'dod pa der 'jug go/ des kyang de bzhin gshegs pa gang+gA'i klung gi phye ma bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong 'jug 'bcu rtsa dgu dang mnyam pa'isangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams/
'bru// rig sngags 'chang de ji srid 'tsho'i bar du rtag turjes su 'brang bar 'gyur// rtag tu mthong ba dang ldan par gnas so// stong phrag gnyis khab zlas pas gnyis par rmi lam
mthong bar blta'o// pad+ma'i rigs kyi dgyil 'khor gang la'ang yid bzhin gyi nor bu'i phyag rgyu dang/ gzungs dang/ gzhal med khangamatha' dag yongs rdzogs par mthong ngo// der yang dus
gsum du gshegs pa'i gzhal med khang thams cad mthong ngo// de bzhin gshegs pa'i gzhal med khanga mthong ngo// de la'ang de bzhin gshegs pa pad+ma'i rigs thams cadi yid bzhin gyi
nor bu'i phyag rgyu'i dbang bskur bas mngon par dbang bskur bar 'gyur// rang rang ge de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsang ba'i phyag rgyas mngon par dbang bskur ba dang dkyil 'khor rnams ston baba medza
do/ rig sngags 'chang rang nyid la'ang mngon par dbang bskur bar byed do// legs so legasasozhes bya ba'i sbyarjod par byed no// bdams ba'i dkyil 'khor thams cad du'ang phyag rgyas
mngon par dbang bskur bar 'gyur ro// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis byin gyis rlob pa yid bzhin mi'i bu chen po'i phyag rgyas mngon par dbang bskur bsaman bar dbang bskur bar 'gyur/
zhing yongs su 'dzin par yang 'gyur ro// stong phrag gsum bzlas pas rmi lam chen po gsum pa bstan pa mthong ste/ gzhal med khar mtha' dag 'gatu gnas pa'i rdo rje'i rigs kyi phyag rgya dang/
mngon par dbang bskur ba rjesaustsol bar mdzad do// de bzhin gshegs pa thams car dus gsum du gshegs shing zab tu bzhugs pa'i de bzhin gshags pa'i yid bzhin gyi nor bu rdo rje byin gyis

slob pa'i mngon bar dbang bskur ba dang phyag rgyu'ang mthong ngo// de'ang dus gsum du gshegs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams thams cad rig sngags 'chang la rdo rje'i phyag rgyas mngon bar dbang bskur ba

dang yid bzhin gyi nor bu'i phyag rgyas mngon par dbang bskur bas yid bzhin gyi nor bu'i phyag rgyas mngon par dbang bskur bar mdzad do// rang rang rnams kyang rdo rje'i phyagargyas mngon par dbang bskur
garjes su stsol bar mdzad do// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad rdo rje'i dam tshig la bag tu 'jug par mdzad do// rdo rje byin gyis brlabs pa'i mngon par dbang bskur ba lags so legs so zhe bya
ba'i sgra rmed par mdzad do// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad rdo rje'i rigs yang dag pa 'byin gyisazlob pa'i das grub nye bar ston par mdzad do// thams cad du rdo rje'i rigs kyi phyag rgyas mngon
par dbang bskur bar 'gyur// stong phrag bzhi pabazlas pas nor bu'i rigs kyi dkyil 'khor chen po'i phyag rgya'i dbang bskur ba thob po// de la'ang nor bu'i rigs chen po'i dkyil 'khor gyi
phyag rgya'i dbang bskur ba thob po// rmi lam ston pa de'ang dus gsum pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa nor bu'i phyag rgya'i dbang bskur ba'i dkyil 'khor rnams mthong ngo// sa gsum pa'i de bzhin gsheg
pa de rnams thams cad kyang rig sngags 'chang del nor bu'i rigs kyi dam tshig gsang ba dang/ phyag rgya dang/ dkyil 'khor dang mngon par dbang bskur ngos yang mngon par

dbang bskur bar byed de// rang rang rnams kyang de bzhin gshegs pa de rnams kyi nor du gsang ba'i phyag rgyas ngang bskur ba gtsug gi nor bu byin gyis rlob pa dang/ yid bzhin gyi nor bu'i phyag rgyas mngon
par dbang bskur bar byed do// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi nor bu'i dkyil 'khor rnams nye bar ston par mdzad do// yid bzhin gyi nor bu'i dngos grub kyi dam tshig gis
dbang bskur ba dang/ yid bzhin gyi nor bu'i phyag rgyas mngon par dbang bskur bar bya'o// legs so lags so zhes bya ba'i sgra rjod par byed cing rtag tu rjes su 'brang bar 'gyur ro// de bzhin gsheg
ba de rnams kyang ji srid sangs rgyas kyi bar dud bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rnam par 'phrul pa byin gyis rlob par yang dag par dgos par 'gyur ro// yid bzhin gyi nor bu'i rigs chen po'i phyag
rgyas mngon par dbang bskur bar 'gyur ro// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi nor bu'i rigs kyi gsang ba'i snying po'i mchog tu 'gyur ro// bzlas pa lnga pas rmi lam chen po'i phyag rgyu ston par byed
ba ni/ dkyil 'khor chen po mtha' dag rdzogs par phyir mi ldog la rigs kyi mngon par dbang bskur bar mthong ngo// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis kyang phyir mi ldog pa chen po'i dkyil 'khor chen
por mngon pa 'dabang bskur bar mdzad do// dkyil 'khor chen bo tham cad tshu phyag rgya chen pos mngon par dbang bskur bar 'gyurano// bzlas pa drug pas rmi lam yang dag par ston pa ni/ de bzhin gshegA
pa thams cad byang chub kyi snying por gshegs te/ rdo rje'i gdan byin gyis rlob pas byin gyis babs te mngon par dbang bskur bar 'gyur ro// dus gsum pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad bzhug
pa mthong ste seng ge 'i gdan la bzhugs pa'o// de bzhin gshegs pa de rnams kyang rang rang gi rig sngags 'chang phyir mi ldog par mngon par dbang bskur bar mdzad do// legs so legs so zhes bya
ba'i gsung brjod par mdzad do// dgongs pa cher brtan pas dgongs par 'gyur ro// ji srid sangs rgyas kyi byang chub la mtha' thug gi bar du de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad rjes su 'brang bar 'gyur ro//
bzlas pa bdun pas rmi lamachan po ston pas de bzhin gshegs pa mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas te chos kyi 'khor lo skor ba dang/ bdud 'dul ba dang/ dam pa'i chos kyi char 'bebs pa dang/ chos

kyi sgron me sbyor ba dang/ chos kyi rgyal mtshan sgreng ba dang/ dam pa'i chos kyi dung 'bud pa dang/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad phyag rgya chen pos mngon par dbang bskur bar mthong ngo// de bzhin/
gshegs pa de rnams kyis kyang phyag rgyas mngon par dbang bskur ba dang/ chos kyi 'khor lo skor ba dang/ bdud 'dul ba dang/ phyag rgyas dbang bskur bas mngon par dbang bskur bar mdzad do// legs
da lags zhes bya ba'i sgrarjod ba'a mdzad do// phyagany+tsa chen pa dang/ dkyil 'khor dang/ kun nas gsang ba dang/ rnam par thar ba'i dkyil 'khor de kho na nyid kyi dngos grub dang/

mngon par dbang bskur bar mdzad do// de bzhin dubaklags pa dang bzlas pa tsam gyis chog dang las kyi 'bras bu ston par mdzad de// na yod pa'i shog bu rnam par snang mdzad kyi phyag rgya chen po 'ogazug
kyi rnam bar 'khrul pa'i chog 'di'i rnam par spyod par 'gyur ro// 'di bklags pa dang dran pa tsam gyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rnam par snang mdzad kyi dkyil 'khor chen po'i rjes su 'jug par
'gyur ro// thams cad du gnas ' gnas pa'i dam tshig shes par 'gyur ro/ bzlas pa tsam gyis mod la dus gsum du gshegs pa'i bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi mtshan nas smos nus mngon sum
du ston bar mdzad do// de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par snang mdzad ston par mdzad par 'gyur ro// mtshan smos nas 'dzin par 'gyur ro// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad rnam bar snang mdzad kyi phyag rgyu
'dzin par 'gyur// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsang ba'i mchog tu 'gyur ro// cigapa dang/ sgrib pa dang/ gdug pa thams cad dang/ mtshams med pa lnga la sogs pa sngon gyi sdig pa
dang/ sgrib pa rnam par 'joms par byed do// bklags pa tsam dang/ lan cig bzlas pa tsam gyis de thams cad yongs su zad pa dang/ yongs su gtugs par 'gyur ro// sems can gyi sdig pa'i
chos gang cung zad kun tu sbyang ba dang/ mtshams med pa lnga byed ba mnar med pa la mchog tugazhol ba'i sems can de'i mdun du lan gsum du dbyangs gsangs bstod pas brjod cing dran par bya ste/ de'i
sgra thosapa tsam kyis mod la sdig pa dang/ sgrib pa thams cad dang/ mtshams med bar song ba thams cad dang/ mnar med pa la mchog tugazhol ba rnams yongs su dag par 'gyur ro// sams na
de'ang sdig pa thams cad las yongs su grol bar 'gyum// yang na sdig pa can gyi sems can shi bar gyur pas bsod nams kyi don du bsod nams 'dod pas/ sems can de'i don du yus kar la lan
nyi shu rtsa gcig yongs u bzlas ste/ sems can de'i don du 'o bsrags pa 'am/ mchad pa 'am/ lhas pa 'am/ rus pa'i keng rus snyam/ dur khrod kyi dbus su de'i steng du gdab cing dar gtong bar
bya'o gtor btsam gyis chod la sems can de gang dang gang du skyes pa de dang de nyid dusems can de'i lus la byang chub chen po'i yan lag gi chu'i dri'i mchog bsgos par 'gyur ro// 'phral nyid du dmyal
bar ng dud 'gro dang/ yi dgas dang/ gshin rje'i 'jig rten dang/ lha ma yin gyi lus las yo chu grol bar 'gyur ro// sdig pa dang sgrib pa thams cad yongs su zad par 'gyur ro// der yang
na 'gro rnams las 'phos par 'gyur zhing/ bde ba can gyi 'jig rten gyi khams su skye bar 'gyur ro// 'di la som nyidang yid gnyis bskyed pab mi bya'o// gang gi tshand drag pos thebs par gyur pa de'i
tshe rig sngags 'chang gis rnapa' bzlos brjod brgya rtsa brgyad sbyin par bya ste/ de'ang nad yun ring bo las grol te rang gi gnas su 'gyur ro// nad kyi phyug bsngal thams cad las

yongs su grol bar 'gyur ro// spyi bo'i gtsug tu phyag rgyas btab ste lamanyi shu rtsa gcig brjod bar bya ste 'dra'anyid du yongs su grol lo// gal te nag po chen pos rang gi phyag rgyas btab na de ltar de nyid
la bltas bas phyag rgya thams cad byed par 'gyur ro// gal te yun ring du ma grol gang gis phyag rgyas btab par gyur pa de'i mig gnyis po dag 'byin bar 'gyur// gdon gyis zin pa thams cad
la tshon skud sna lnga'i skud pa la bas brjod nyi shu rtsa gcig byas nas mdud pa nyi shu rtsa gcig byas la bcing bar bya ste/ gdon dang brjod byed thams cad las yongs su grol bar 'gyur ro// nad thams
cad la skud pa dkar pos bcing bar bya stand thams cad las yongs su grol lo// 'thab pa dang/ 'thab mo dang/ rtsod pa dang/ 'gyed pa rnams thams cad du 'gro ba la lan brgya rtsa brgyad yongs su
bzlus tu kha ton du bzung na thams cad du sgruba'i mchog tu 'gyur// na la sham dang/ rgya lcog dang ru rta dang/ lung pa gnyis dang/ ro'i mig sman la lcags stong rtsa brgyad du bzlas la phyi ma
zhib mo byas te/ mig sman dang mnyam par gyur nas gdon gyis zin pa rnams kyi mig la bskus na bzhus pa tsam gyis mod la gdon thams cad yongs su grol lo// gal te yun ring por ma grolan gdon gyi mig
gnyis 'byin baba'agyur ro// zhes nyin bzhi pa la mig gnyis la bsku bar bya'o// gal te yun ring du ma grol na mgo ba tshal pa bdun du'ags par 'gyur ro// lus la me 'bar bar 'gyur ro// rims/
thams cad la bskus pa tsam gyis yongs su grol lo// gal te yun ring du ma grol namago bo dum bu ban bu'ags par 'gyur ro// dug gis zos pa'i mig la bsku bar bya zhing mngag gzhug par bya'o//
jug 'thus pa la bskus na dug med par 'gyur ro// shi ba'i mig la banusan 3nga bar 'gyur te/ de sgyur byed do// chudang yus kar brtags na slar yang 'gyel bar byed do// mgo bo'i zug rngu dngagazhog

phyidan ba rnams kyi mig la bsus te phyag rgya thams cad 'jig par byed do// rgyal po khros pa gang gis skye bo gnas nas 'byin pa dang/ de bzhin du mtshan ma mang po 'bab pa dang/ phyir rgol ba dang/ dgra bo nyid

la'ang 'dis n gnas pa'i mig gis bltas na thams cad dga' bar 'gyur ro// de rnams thams cad rtag tu dbang du gyur nas gas te 'dil tha tshom mi bya'o// don yod pa'i phyag rgya'i dbang bskur ba'i snying po dang
gzus kyi cho ga'i sgrub thabs so// de nas don yod pa'i dkyil 'khor chen po pad+ma'i dbang bskur ba'i nor bu'i gzus kyi snying po'i yo byad du 'gyur te/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dkyil

'khor gyi rigs thun mong ba'i rjes su 'jug par 'gyur ro// stong rtsa brgyad bzlas pas mi 'thamapa'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dkyil 'khor brgya chen po'i dbang bskur ba yid bzhin gyi nor bu'i pad+ma bci=
bya'0 @#/ pas spyi bor mngon par dbang bskur bar 'gyugano// de nas dus gsum la 'di bzhin gshegs pa de rnams kyis bzlas pa tsam cig yod la de'i rmi lam mthong ba nye bar ston pa byed do//
dkyil 'khor chen po yas pa'i rnam par 'phrul yang dag par mthong ba dang cho 'phrul skor byed do// gzhal yas khang dang bas/ rnam par 'phrulal dang bcas/ lha'i tshogs dang baa pa'i rig pa'i
rgyalapo 'dakyil 'khor ba'i lha rnams nye bar ston par byed de// 'di lta ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs kyidakyil 'khor nang/ pal+lA'i rigs kyi dkyil 'khor dang/ rdo rje'i rigs kyi dkyil 'khor dang
nor bu'i rigs kyi dkyil 'khor dang na yod zhags pa'i snying po rnam par thar pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor chen po dang/ rnam par snang mdzad kyi snying po'i dkyil 'khor chen po de rnams thams cad

kyang so so so so'i dkyil 'khor du dbang bskur bas mngon par dbang bskur// rig pa'i rgyal po'i dkyil 'khor gyi lha rnams mtha' dag nye bar ston bar byed de/ ji srid du byang chub kyi snying po gshags pa

dang chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba dang/ bdud 'dul ba'i bar gyi dkyil 'khoranye bar ston par byed do// dus gsum pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa de rnams kyis kyang da kyil 'khor chen bo de rnams kyi so so so so'i
dkyil 'khor du mngon par dbang bskur bas mngon par dbang bskur bar mdzad do// dkyil 'khor gyi mchog thams cad du ma la dbang bskur bas mngon par dbang bskur mdzad do// de nas thig sngags 'chang de de

0 lta bu'i rmi lam chen po mthong nas/ dga' ba chen po rgyas par 'gyur ro// dga' ba dang rab tu mgu ba'i snying des kyang don yod pa pad+ma drim mdama'imo bar dbang bskur ba'i ting nge 'dzin so sor thob bo// de/

bzhin gshegs pa de rnams kyi kyang rig sngags 'chang de la legs so legs so zhes rjod pa mdzad de/ rig sngags 'chang chen po de bzhinagshegs pa thams cad kyi dkyil 'khor chen po'i rigs thun mong ba'i dam tshig

gis mngon par dbang bskur bas khyod mngon bar dbang bskul 'o// grub pa thob pa de rnams rig sngags 'chang chen po dang dkyil 'khor gyi gsang ba'i rjes su 'jug cing/ de bzhin gshags pa thams cad kyi sras kyi

thubo'i 'gyur ro zhes so sor sad do// de nas rigasngags 'chang gis bzlas pa dang bklags pa tsam gyis de ma thag par rgya chen po'i yon tan gsal ba de lta du skye bar 'gyur ro// slar yang 'di'i gong nas gong du rnam par

ngagang yang cigs kyi kha 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gzhan gang yang rung bar gyur kyang rung/ dag skyong dang/ dgeslongam dang/ dge bsnyen dang/ dgeganyen mar gyur kyang rung// rtsopa dar dpag nam/ dab rgyan la lan stong rtsa brgyad ]

ste dus gsum par bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la mchod ba dang dbang bskur ba'akhyod bar 'dod pa des/ gzungs kyi snying po 'di'i baspang 'phreng ma/ cod panam/ dar dpyangs sam/ dbu rgyan la lan stong rtsa brgyad
du yongs su bzlas te de bzhin gshegs pa'i dbu la bcings nas/ spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis mngon par dbang bskur te/ ga sngags 'chang de 'am/ rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo'am/ ga slong ngam/ ]
@#// dge slong ma 'am/ dge bsnyen nam/ dge bsnyen mas gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor chen po bar 'i sa gsum pa yid bzhin gshegs pa rnams dang/ byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs 'khor dang bas

ba rnams kyis rin po che sna bdun las byung ba'i rnam par snang mdzad kyi snying po'i nor bu chen po yid bzhin gyi nor bu rin po che'i dbu rgyan 'od zer sna tshogs brgya stong phrag 'bar bas yang dag par brgyan pa'i dbu rgyan
chen po dang/ dar dpyangs kyis dbang bskugs de bzhinagshegs pa thams cad mngon par dbang skur bar 'gyur zhing/ byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs 'khor dang bcas pa mngon par dbang bskur bar 'gyur ro//

de ltar rgya che zhing yangs pa ba'i gzhalamad khang 'di mchod pa dang bsnyen bkur ba nye bar gnas par 'gyura'i// gang gis dus gsum pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor dang bcas pa thams cad dang/

dkyil 'khor gyi lha rnams la dbang bskur ba dang/ mchod pa dang/ bsnyen bkub chen mo byas par 'gyur ro// snying po 'di bzlas pa tsam gyis rig sngags chang gi sdig pa dang/ sgrib ba dang/ gdug pa thams cad
rab tu zhi bar 'gyur/ rnam par nyams par byed/ mkhar zhig par byed/ lus dang/ ngag dang/ yid yongs su dag par 'gyur// nyon mongs pa dang sgrib ba dang brag zhing nges par grol bar 'gyura'o// bsod
nams kyi phung bo chen po sogs par 'gyur// ga ba'i rtsa ba chen po dang ldan par 'gyur ro// dngos grub chen po'i mag tu 'gyur ro// thams cad du thogs pa med bar 'gyur// mchod pa dang/ bsnyon

bkur ba dang/ tshig btsun par 'gyur ro// sdig pa thun tshags dang bral bar 'gyur ro// luA la dri bzang po 'byung bar 'gyura'o// rtag tu de dran pas kha nas ut+pa la'i dri 'byin no// lua tsan dan gyi dris
bskos par 'gyur ro// sems can thams cad mchog tu byams pa dang mchod pa'i 'os su 'gyur ro// thams can du dngos grub chen po'i mchog tu 'gyur ro// bgegs dang log par 'dren pa thams can
rab tu 'dul bar 'gyur ro// 'byung bo dang/ gnod sbyin dang/ srin po dang/ yi rags dang/ sha za thams cad mthong ba tsam gyis ring du 'bros par 'gyur// ji srid 'tsho ba'i bar du bar gnas par gyur
go 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis mchog sbyin par 'gyur ro// rtag tu'ang mthong bar 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ rig pa'irgyal po'ang rtag pa rgyun du rjes su 'bra bar 'gyur ro// dus rgyun du rtag

rtsa mthong rjes su 'brang bar 'gyur ro// rtag tu rjes su 'brang bdang dngos grub tu 'gyur/ thams cad dudakyil 'khor gyi slob dpon gyi mngon par bang bskur bar 'gyur// thams cad du don yod pa'i dngos grub kyi
mchog tu 'gyur// don yod pa yats+tsha'i dkyil 'khor gyi dbang bskur ba'i gzus so// de nas don yod pa'i nor bu'i mchod pa'i srin gyi nyibar spyod pa'i cho gar 'gyurato/ dran pa dang/ bklags

ba dang/ bzlas pa tsam kyis gzhal med khang chen po rgya che ba yangs pa'i mthu stobs yangs pa 'byung par 'gyur ro// mthu stobs chen po'i yon tan 'byung zhing mchod pa'i sprin gyi cha chen po 'bab par 'gyur ro//
u// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la mchod pa'i sprin gyi char chen po 'bab par 'gyura'o// bsod nams kyi phung po'i tshogs kyi rnamapar 'phrul ba chen po 'byur bar 'gyur// rig pa'i rgyal

bo 'di dran pa tsam dang bzlas pa tsam gyi mod la phyogs bcu'isas rgyas kyi zhing kun tu de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi 'a khor gyi dkyil 'khor chen por mchod pa'i sprin gyi char chen po 'bab par 'gyur ro//

'di lta ste/ pad+madang/ ut+pal dang/ ku mu da dang/ pad+ma dkar po dang/ man tA ra ba dang/ man dwar ba chen po dang/ mdog mdzes dang/ mdog mdzes chen po dang/ many+dzakha ga dang/ zla ba mdzes pa dang/
drim med pa ste/ lha rdzas kyi me tog sna tshogs kyi ya'abyung bar 'gyur ro// 'di lta ste/ sam las skyes pa'i me tog sA la dang/ ta mA la dang/ ma pa ka dang/ mya ngan 'ang dang/ a ti muk+ka
dang skya nar dang/ mthon ka dang/ mthon ka chen po dang/ ka dam pa dang/ dong ka dang/ sin tu bA ri kA'i tog dang/ sna ma'i me tog dang/ u thi ka dang/ mA li kA sar pa dang/ te ra Na dang/ ku[S]
kadang/ ma ru ba ka'i me tog gi char 'bab par 'gruba'o// lha rdzas sna tshogs pa rnams dang/ ku mu da'i rigs rnams dang/ gzugs dang/ kha dog sna tshogs pa dang/ ri dang/ chu dang/ dgon dung dang/
thibs po dang/ chu rlabs dang/ khag dang/ nags 'dab rang/ skyed mos tshal dang/ chu klung dang/ steka dang/ rdzing bu dang/ a mA hi ta dang/ phug dang/ dgon par 'bab kha'i sa las skyes pa'i ma
tog dang/ dri ma med pa'i lha rdzas dang/ lha sa kyi dri bzang dang/ yid du 'ong ba'i gzugs dang/ kha dog dang/ shin tu gzhon sha chags pa dang/ rab tu sim par byed pa'i rig pa las skyes pa'i ma/

'bab par byed do// me tog chen po dang me tog skyes pa rnams kyi phung po chen po gcal du bkram pa rnams bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar mchod pa'i sprin du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// de bzhin du dran pa dang bsams pa tsam

gyis me togagi mchod pa chen po byed do// 'di ltaste/ dran ba rang bsams pa tsam gyis gos dang rgyan rnam pa sna tshogs rnam par bkra ba'i mchod pa'i sprin chen po phyogs bcu kun du de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi

mchod bar 'byung bar 'gyu'o// 'di lta ste/ ngoshal dang/ gdu bu rgyan can dang/ dpung rgyan dang/ rnargyan dang/ gser skud dang/ mu tig gi dra ba dang/ rked chings dang/ nyis skor dang/ sum skor dang/

skar ma'i 'phrong pa dang/ gtsug tor 'ching ba dang/ zla ba phyed pa can dang/ gsar phyed can dang/ gdu bu rgyan can zla ba phyed pa dang/ shang shang te'ucan dang/ dbu rgyan dang/ rtsod pan gyi dra ba dang//

gsar gyi dra ba dang/ oM ba ka dang/ kaNapha li ka dang/ bri tsa ka dang/ cha ma'i skad ba dang/ mchod phyir thegs dang/ kama'i 'phrang ba dang/ gser gyi 'phreng ba dang/ rin po ches sprug pa'i 'phreng ba dang/
na po che sna bdun gyi spyil bu dang/ rna ba gang ba dang/ gtsug tor 'ching ba dang/ yos su bkri ba dang/ gtsug gi nor bu'i char 'ab tu 'bab par 'gyura'o// de bzhin gshags pa thams cad kyi mchod/
pa 'isprin du 'gyura'o// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dkyil 'khor gsang ba rnams kyi mchod pa'i sprin chen por 'gyuro// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dkyil 'khor

gsang ba rnams kyi mchod pa'i sprin chen por gyur nas/ bang rang gi gzhal med khang gi 'byor par 'ab tu 'gyur// cha dang tshon sna tshogs su btsos pa'i phyogs bral kyi gos sna tshogs pa'i mchod pa'i sprin
du gyur/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas thamasacad kyi zhing rnams kyi de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor rnams dang rjes su 'thun pa'i ri mos gos

'tsho dang/ ra mo'i gzhal med khang gi mchod pa'i sprin gyi char 'babs so// 'di lta ste/ yul ka shi ka'i gos tshon sna tshogs su btsos pa dang/ gos kyi gzhal med khang dang/ dar gos rnams kyi char 'bebs

rgyu so/ 'di lta ste/ nyi ma'i 'od dang/ zla ba dang/ seng ge skyes dang/ dar thor dang/ ka shi kadang/ ko A la pa mi'i dbang po dang/ nyi ma dang/ zla ba'i snang ba dang/ pad+mo dang/ ut+pa la can gyi kha
dog dang/ ko dra kA dang/ gser gyi gdu bu dang/ mu tig gi 'bras bu dang klu'i ga chadang/ rnam par bdang/ lha'i rgyan dang me tog sna ma dang/ ka sha dang/ tsam pa ka dang/ kha dog can dang

dar thod can dang/ kan+tara'i tshogs dang/ zla ba'i rgyan can dang/ dong ka'i me tog can dang/ pad+madakar po can zhes bya ba dang/ ba ma laM ka dang/ ko shAta ki dang/ rdzogs bar 'phel bar byed pa can
dang sngon gyi yul dang gling dang ldan pa kun nas 'od gsal ba dang/ gdu bu ring bo dang/ dga' ba 'khyil ba dang/ rgyan skor ba dang/ sna ma'i me tog gi kha dog can dang/ kan da'i 'dab ma ca2

dang/ dkri ts+tsha kaM dang/ kany+tsinAsa'i kha dog can nam bskor ba dang/ gser mdog dang/ rin po che'i mdog dang/ zla ba'i kha dog gi lag pa dang/ me'i kha dog can dang/ bo 'ama'i kha dog can dang/ nam

mkha'i kha dog can dang/ kanagI shu kaM dang/ kun nas 'khyil zhing yid baba'i ba spu rnam par snapazhing rnam bar gsal ba can dang/ kun nas 'od gsal zhing dri ma med pa'i rig sngags 'chang gi gcod pan
can yang ngo zhes so// gos rnam pa sna tshogs pa gzhal du med pa'i char 'bebs te/ bcom ldan 'dasa rnams gzhal du med pa'i mchod pa'i sprin dang bcas pa'i char 'babs so// de bzhin gshegs pa tham
cad kyi gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor du gnas pa'i rig sngags kyi lha thams cad dang/ byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs rnams dang/ rdo rje 'chang dang/ rig sngags 'chang gi dbang po rig sngags 'chang gi tshogs
kyis yongs su bskor ba'i mchod pa'i sprin du 'gyur ro// doltarig sngags dran pa tsam gyis de bzhin du rnam pa sna tshogs pa'i mchod par 'gyur// dusna tshogs pa'i na gzhal du med pa dang/ dri'i
ma gzhal du med pa dang/ bdug pa gzhalatu med pa'i mchod par 'gyur// 'di lta ste/ nadanagoshiradang/ ta ma la'i 'dab ma dang/ tsan dan dang/ tsan dan dmar bo dang/ pad+macan dang/ ]
dri zhim pa dang/ sa lo dang/ gur kum dang/ gas dang/ ldan pa dang/ dri dang ldan pa dang/ khu shel cing/ rgya spos dang/ tu ru ka dang/ sprik+ka dang/ bo la dang/ sra rtsi ngog
dang name 'u dang/ 'bany+tsaka dang 1 pog dang/ sam+buki dang/ gu gul gyi bdug pa dang/ shwags dang/ sbrang rtsi dang/ lnga bskor ba dang/ ka dzo ka dang/ buli ka'i shang dang/ b.li ka dang/

ga bur dang/ gla rtsi dang/ rnam pa sna tshogs rnam par bkra ba'i bdug ba gzhan sgyur ba rnams dang/ dri'i chu'i rnam pa rnams dang/ rnam pa sna tshogs pas bsgos pa'i phye ma dang ldan pa 'byung bar 'gyur ro//
de bzhin gshags pa mchod pa'i sprin gyi char 'babs so// sgron ma'i shing sna tshogs pa sbyar ba gzhal du med bas snang bar byed bazhin pa 'bar bar byed do// phyogs bcu rnams su kun s sgron ma'i

shang gang+ga'i klung gi bye ma bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag dang mnyam pa'i sgron ma'i shing kha tu byung ngo// 'di lta tsa/ tu ru ka'i til mar dang 2 tsam pa ka'i til mar dang/ ut+pa la'i til mar dang/ sna ma'i
til mar dang/ ban+ti ka'i til mar dang/ kona'i til mar dang/ a ti muk+ka ka'i til mar dang/ pa la sha'i til mar dang/ tsan dan gyi til mar dang/ dzA ti'i 'bras bu'i til mar dang/ bal+la'i til mar/
dang a go gan+d+hu la sogs pa'i tia' la sgron me rab tu byed de/ de bzhin gshegs ba mchod pa'i sprin du 'gyur ro// 'di lta ste/ ro brgya pa'i kha zas rnam phyogs bcu'i de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom

pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas yul dang dus su nye bar bzhugs pa rnams kyi spyan sngar rtag tu 'byung bar 'gyur ro// 'di lta ste/ ro bro ba'i mchog rnam pa sna tshogs pa'i gzugs dang/ rnam pa dang/
zhim zhing mnga' ba/ myang bar 'os pa dga' bar bya ba/ pad dga' ba/ sol dang/ rim par 'os pa dang/ dri'i rigs lta rdzas rnam pa sna tshogs pas dus gsum dugshegs pa'i bcom ldan 'das de

bzhin gshegs pa 'khor kyi tshogs dang bcas pa dang/ byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs 'khor dang bcas pa dang/ nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa dang/ rig sngags kyi dkyil 'khor gyi lha dang bcas pa rnam+ma/

kun tu tshim par byed pa'i 'bras bu rnam pa sna tshogs bodang/ ro bro ba'i mchog rnam pa sna tshogs pa dang/ sgrung rtsinangang ba'i ro myong ba dang ldan pa bcom ldan 'das 'khor gyi tshogs dngabacas pa'i spyan sngar
rang du 'byung bar 'gyur te/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad tshim par byed pa'i mchod pa'i sprin chen por 'gyur ro// 'di lta ste/ lha rdzas kyi rol mo'i sgyu rnam pa sna tshogs pa dga' bar 'os pa'i 'ol

mo pheg rdob pa rnams dang/ 'di lta ste/ dbyangs kyi yan lag lnga dang ldan pa'i mi'am ci dang dri za'i glu dbyangs rnam pa sna tshogs pa dang bcas pa dang/ klu'i bu modang/ lha ma yin gyi bu mo dang/ lha'i bu mo

dang/ chu las byung ba'i bu mo rnams kyis rnam pa tha dad rnam pa sna tshogs pa'i gsang sngags kyi glu dbyangs kyi rol mo rtsis rab tu 'khrol bzhin pa rnams kyis phyogs bcu'i de bzhin gshegs pa de rnams thams cad kyi
u@#// dus gsum pa'i rol mo chen po'i mchod pa 'isprin du 'gyur 'o// rnam pa sna tshogs par mdzes pa'i bstod pa'i rnam pas 'ol mo'i cho ga zhib mo ji lta ba bzhin du gnang ba'i phyag rgya dang/

dkyil 'khor gyi rim par phye ba dang rjes su 'thun bas yang dag par bstod par 'gyur// byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs dang bcas pa'i rig sngags kyi lha dang/ dkyil 'khor gyi lhas rjes su 'dzin par 'gyur ro//

zla yang dag par bstod pa rnams kyang mtshan smos pas yang dag par bstod pa byas par 'gyur ro// de bzhin du yangs pa dang ldan pa'i gzus 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis gsus pa/ mchog thams cad

sbyin pa po/ thams cad du mchod pa'i sprin du gyur pa/ bla na med pa dpag bsam gyi shing lta bu 'o// sna tshogs pa'i rdzu 'phrul dang rnam par 'phrul pa sgyu ma lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin byin gyis rlob pa'i rnam par 'phrul pas

rig sngags 'chang thams cad kyi rmad du byung ba'i mchog gi dngos grub ster bar byed pa'o// thams can thams cad kyi ma dang par gyur pa'i// sems can thams cad kyi bsam pa yang dag par gyur pa'o// gsang sngag

kha 'dzin pa thams cad kyi mchog gi dngos grub dang bsam pa yongs su rdzogs par byed pa'o// sems can thams cad kyi sdig pa dang/ nyon mongs pa dang/ sgrib pa thams cad yongs su sbyong bar byed ba'o// nad thams

cad sel bar byed pa'o// sdug bsngal mi bzad pa gtug ba thams cad 'joms par byed pa'o// bkra shis pa dang yid kyi shing rta thams cad yongs su rdzogs par byed pa'o// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis yang

0/ dag par skul bar byed pa'o// byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyis dbugs 'byin par byed pa'o// rig sngags kyi dkyil 'khor gyi lha thams cad spyan 'dren par byed pa'o// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsang
ba'i dkyil 'khor rnams ston par byed pa'o// klu thams cad 'gugs par byed pa'o// gnod sbyin dang/ srin po dang/ 'byung po dang/ yi dgas dang/ sha za dang/ bgegs dang/ log par 'dren pa thams cad
zlog par byed do// sems can thams cad kyi mchog gi dngos grub sbyin par byed pa'o// dbugs ma phyin pa rnams kyi dbugs 'byin par byed pa'o// ma grol ba rnams grol bar byed pa'o// skyabs med pa rnamu

kyi skyabs so// dpung gnyen med ba rnams kyi dpung gnyen no// mgon med pa rnams kyi mgon du gyur pa'o// 'khra snyamed pa rnams kyi 'khru sa'o// bsnyen gnas ma byas pa rnams la bsnyen gnas sbyin pa'o//

gtsang sku ma byas pa rnam la gtsang sprar spyod pa'o// mi tshangs par spyod pa'i gnas la zhen pa rnams la tshangs par spyod pa'i gnas sbyin pa'o// thub pa'i brtul zhugs ma byas pa rnams la thub pa'i brtul zhug
sbyin pa'o// chos ma yin pa la spyod pa rnams chos la sbyor ba'o// mi dge ba'i las kyi lam la spyod pa rnams dug ba'i chos la sbyor ba'o// 'jigs pas nyam thag pa rnams la mi 'jigs pa sbyin pa'o//

dbul po rnams la nor sbyin pa'o// 'bru dang bza' ba dang bral ba rnams la 'bru 'phel ba chen po sbyin pa'o// mu ges nyam thag pa rnams la skya rgyal gyi tshogs pa la nges par sbyor bar byed pa'o// lam nyams pa
bya@#/ rnams kyi lam ston par byed pa'o// dus ma yin par 'chi bar 'gyur ba rnams kyi dus ma yin pa'i 'chi ba so sor 'gog pa'o// long ba rnams kyi mig sbyin pa byed pa'o// 'on ba

rnams kyi rnab sbyin par byed pa'o// sna nyams pa rnams kyi sna rnam par sbyong bar byed pa'o// rig pa med pa rnams kyi bde ba'i rig pa la nges par sbyor bar byed pa'o// los spyod kyi nyam thag pa rnams kyi los

spyod sbyin par byed pa'o// dran pa nyams pa rnams kyi dran pa yongs su sbyong bar byed pa'o// gsum pa nyams pa rnams kyi bsam pa yongs su dag par byed pa'o// tshul khrims nyams pa rnams kyi tshul khrims sbyin

pa'i sbyin pa las rgyab kyis phyogs pa rnams la pha rol tu phyin pa drug yongs su rdzogs pa'i byed pa'o// brtson 'grus nyams pa rnams la stobs dang brtson 'grus kyi mchog sbyin pa'o// bzod pa dang bral ba

rnams la bzod pa dang zhi ba sbyin pa'o// bsam gtan nyams pa rnams la bsam gtan dang ting nge 'dzin yongs su rdzogs par byed pa'o// shes rab nyams pa rnams la shes rab kun tu snang ba dang/ blo gsal ba dang

shis rab chen po'i snang ba yongs su rdzogs bar byed do// dam tshig mi shes pa rnams la dam tshig sbyin pa'o// phyag rgya dang bral ba rnams kyi phyag rgya yongs su sbyong bar byed pa'o// rig sngags dang gsang sngags la
mi mkhas pa rnams la rig sngags dang gsang sngags rab tu sbyin pa'o// mu stegs rnams la mu stag smra ba dang/ 'jug ngogs bzang bo dang/ lam rab tu sgrub par byed pa'o// sangs rgyas kyi byang chug la

rgyab kyis phyogs pa rnams la sangs rgyas kyi byang chub chen po'i mchog sbyin pa'o// 'khor ba las ma bsgral banams sgrol bar byed pa'o// mun pas long par byed cing bsgribs pa rnams la myos pa'i mun pa

sel ba sbyin par byed pa'o// sgrib par bya ba rnams kyi sgrib pa dang bral bar byed pa'o// mtshams med pa lnga'i 'gro ba rnams kyi mtshams med pa lnga sbyong bar byed pa'o// ngag nyams pa rnams kyi ngag rnam par

dag par byed pa'o// ma grub pa rnams la mchog gi dngos grub sbyin pa'o// thun tshags dang bcas pa rnams kyi thun tshags dang bral zhing yongs su dag par byed pa'o// ngan pa rnams la mchog sbyin pa'o//
mya ngan las ma 'das pa rnams kyi mya ngan las 'das pa'i mchog go/ brda ma phrad pa rnams la brda sprod par byed pa'o// kun nas 'khrugs pa rnams kyi sems gnas pa'i mchog go/ mchag med pa
rnams la mchog sbyin pa'o// rmi lam ngan pa mthong ba rnams la rmi lam chen po'i mchog ston pa'o// bkres pa rnams la kha zas kyi mchog sbyin pa'o// sgom lha rnams btung ba chen po'i ri la yongs u
los spyod par byed pa'o// gcer bu rnams kyis gos dang bgo ba so sor thob cing grub pa'i// mdzacan rnams kyi mdzodang bral bar byed pa'o// sha bkra can rnams kyi sha bkra yongs su sbyong bar byed
pa'o rims kyis btab pa rnams kyi rims dang bral bar byed pa'o// gdon gyis zin pa rnams kyi gdon dang/ gshed byed dang/ gdul dka' ba rnams 'dul bar byed pa'o// dgra bo phyin ci log
ba rnams kyi dgra rnams dang bral bar byed pa'o// dbul bo rnams la nor sbyin par 'gyur ro// bu bza'aphan rnams kyi bu bza' cher 'phel bar 'gyur// mun pas lo nga bar/

byas pa thams cad kyi sgron ma'ishing dang nyi ma'i 'od zer stong gis kun tu snang ba'o// rgyal bos bcom pa rnams la lo ngas spyod rgya chen pa char byin pa'o// 'on pa rnams gcig tu byed pa'o/ ser sna can/
rnams kyi ser sna shin tu 'joms pa'o// 'dod chags la chags pa rnams kyi 'dod chags rab tu 'joms pa'o// rmos pa chung ba ma yin pa rnams kyi rmos pa dang bral bar 'gyur ro// mi dge ba'i lam

gyis rab tu nyams pa rnams kyis dge ba'i lam gyi yid chos kyi nang du chud par 'gyur ro// gzhan gyi dbang du gyur ba'i sems can rnams kyi 'jigs pa med par 'gyur zhing yid chos kyi nang du chud par 'gyur ro//

khog par ltung pa rnams kyis shes rab dang/ blo dang/ shes bzhin dang/ brkam pa rnams kyi blo bsnyen par mi 'gyur ro// sangs rgyas ma mthong ba rnams de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mthong bar lon par 'gyu'o

tshos thos pa dang bral ba rnams kyis chos chen po'i 'o rgya chen po thos par 'gyur ro// dge bdun la bsnyen bkur byed pa dang bral ba rnams kyis lha dang nyan thos kyi dge 'dun la bsnyen bkur byed par 'gyura'o//
dbang po nyams pa rnams kyi dbang po yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// yan lag rnam par nyams pa'i sems can rnams kyi so lo'i yan lag yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// byang chub sems dpa' mthong
[d/ ]ba dang bral ba rnams kyis byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs chen po mthong bar 'gyur ro// lhas yongs su myangs pa rnams kyi lta'i tshogs thams cad kyis yang dag pa' 'dzin par 'gyur ro// nyon mongu
pa dang sgrib pas dkris pa'i sems can rnams kyi nyon mongs pa dang sgrib pa thams cad las yongs su grol bar 'gyur ro// phyag na rdo rje don yod pa'i mchod pa'i nor bu'i snying po'i gzus spyan bas
gzigs dbang phyug gis gsungs pa ni de ltar rdzu 'phrul che ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi mchod pa'i sbyin/ byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi mchod pa'i sprin/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing
thams cad du rin po che sna bdun gyi mad pa'i sprin gyi char 'bebs pa/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang mtshungs par dus gsum du gshegs shing bzhugs pa rnams kyi dbag

bsam gyi shing chen po'i mchod ba'i sprin gyi char 'bebs khar byed pa'i mchod pa'i spyi 'byung bar 'gyur ro// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rigs kyi dam tshig rig sngags kyi dkyil 'khor gyi de kho na

nyid sgrub bar byed ba/ rmad du byung ba'i dngos grub yang dag pa'i ston par byed pa'o// rig sngags kyi dkyil 'khor gyi lha thams cad dang/ rig pa'i rgyal po'i lha rnams dang/ gsang sngags kyi lha thams

cad spyan 'dren zhing 'gugs par byed pa'o// 'di ni pha rol tu phyin pa drug yongs su rdzogs par byed pa'o// 'di na thams cad du gsang ba'i sgo ston par byed pa'o// mgan rdo rje don yod ba'i mchod pa'i snying
dpo'i gzungs 'di ni dus ma yin pa 'i tshe dang/ mu ge dang/ dus kyi chu rnam par nyams pa la so sor skyed pa'o// de nas rig sngags 'chang gtsang mas khrus byas gos gtsang ma bgos te/
yid rtse gcig tu byas nas sems can thams cad la mchog tu brtse ba dang byams pa'i sems bsgom par bya'o// mchod rten gyi yan lag dang nye ba 'am/ khang stong ngam/ ri bo 'am/ nags thibs po 'am/
dgon pa 'am/ skyed mos tshal lam/ dge 'dun gyi kun dga' ra ba 'am/ chu klung ngam/ mtsho'u 'am/ rdzing bu 'am/ klu gnas pa'i mtsho 'am/ lha'i gnas sam/ rgyal po'i pho brang yang rung ste/ deng ga

sngags 'chang gtsang mar gnas pas sa gzhi yongs su brtags pa cha mnyam pa mdzes par khyu gnyis kyi tshad kyi dkyil 'khor byas la sa nang ba byung du sman bas gru bzhi bar cha gzhal te legs par byi dor

byas la shin tu 'jam pa'i bya'o// der de'i steng du tsan dan dang dri'i chus byug par bya'o// gur kum gyis rnam pa sna tshogs pa'i mtshan ma dang phyag rgya rnams 'khor bro'o// de la dkyil 'khor gyi dbus kyi

snying po klu mgo ba dgu pa skyil mo krung gis 'dug pa bri'o// gru bzhi'i nang du chud par don yod zhags pa bri'o// dkyil 'khor gyi phyi rol gyi khor yug tu ji ltar thob pa'i phyag rgyu dang gsang sngags rnams bri

bar bya'o/ sgo ba'i rnamapar dbye bar bya ste/ ji ltar 'byor ba'i gtor ma sna tshogs pa tsho'i gtor ma dkar po dang me tog dang/ bajug ba dang/ dri dang/ mar me dang/ gang ba'i bum ba dang/ gtor ma dang

ca bdug kha'i 'og khor gyis nye bar mdzes par bya'o// rig sngags 'chang gis ches mngon du don yod zhags pa lan bdun bzlas bar bya'o// khro bo'i rgyal bo la lan cig bzlas pas mngon par dbang bskur ba'o/
don yod pa'i lcags rgyudang khro bo lcags kyu dus gcig tu brjod do// rig sngags kyi rgyal po lan gsum du brjod par bya'o// de nas rig sngags 'chang gis dkyil 'khor la mngon du phyogs te bzlas pa'i
