byed de the tshom med do// byang chub sems dpas thams cad du mchog sbyin par 'gyur ro// lha rnams kyis rtag par rgyun du srung ba'abyed do// phyag rgya 'di'i phan yon sngar brjod pas gzhal du med cing grangs med pa tshad med/

par rab tu bsgrags shing the tshom med do// phyag rgya 'di mthong ba dang bcings pa tsam gyis bsod nams kyi phung po rab tu skyed do// lag pa g.yas pa'i mthil du gcig brkyang la dpung pa bskums te/ ming med dang mthe bong gi/

sor mo 'dun la mthe'u chung bskum par bya'o// ming med kyi mthar 'og la/ gung mo bskum la sdigs mdzub rab tu brgyang lta/ snying la gnas su 'di g.yo ba tsam mo// me tog gam/ dradang/ bdug pa dang/ 'phreng

pa dang/ byug pa dang/ gos dang/ rgyan dang/ skud pa rnams kyang lag pa g.yon du bzung nas dbul bar bya ste// de bzhin gshags pa dang/ byang chub sems dpa' thams cad dang/ lha rnams dang/ de bzhin du 'gaba'i

rgyal bo rnams dang/ rebazhin du dkyil 'khor ba'i lha rnams kyis de rnams thams cad mchod par 'gyur ro// lha rdzas kyi mchod pa bla na mad pa dang/ mchog dang/ rab mchog dang/ gya nom pa'i mchod pa 'di rnams byed de/

rdo sna tshogs pa'i bza' ba rnams dang/ ro brgya pa'i 'bras bu rnam pa sna tshogs pa dang/ btung ba rnam pa sna tshog pa bdud rtsi bcud kyis len gyi mchod pa 'di rnams byed do// phyogs bcu rnams su kun nas na po che

sna bdun gyi char 'byung ngo// gser dang dngul gyi me tog bla na med pa dang/ rin po che rnam pa sna tshogs rnam par bkrang nyi ma dang gzi brjid mtshungs pas 'bar bar byed do// phyag rgya 'dzin pa tsam gyis don yod pa mchod

pa'i nor bu zhes bya ba 'di yid bzhin gyi nor bu ste/ rtag tu phyag rgya'i gsang ba dang gsang sngags rnams yid kyis bsams pas de rnams thams cad 'byung bar 'gyur ro// dpag bsam gyi shing dang mnyam zhing mtshungs

bar ji ltar yid la bsam pa bzhin du mchod pa thams cad byed de/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang+ga'i klung gi byem byeb bskya stong phrag stong rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing re re'i dus gsum pa'i de bzhin

gshegs ba rnams phyag rgya 'di'i mthus bla na med pa'i mchod pa thams cad kyis mchod pa' byadado/ de'i phyir phyag rgya 'di rtag tu byed pa ni pha rol tu phyin pa drug yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// phyag rgya bzung bzhin pa ni

mchod pa bla na med pa dang tshegs chung dus mchod pa chung du'ang tshad med par 'ab tu 'gyur ro// sbyin pa'i bsod nams kyi phung po bsam gyis mi khyab cing mtshungs pa med pa byed do// ri rab lhun po bye ba brgya stong phrag rnams

dang rin po che sna bdun gyi phung pos stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams bkang ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa re re la phul ba de bzhin du/ phyag rgya 'dzin bzhin ras de bzhin gshegs pa de nyid la de lta bu'i

mchod pa'i cho ga byed do// de lta bu'i phyagargya'i cho ga'i rnam par 'phrul pa ni 'dren pa 'jig rten dbang phyug gis byin gyis brlabs pa'o// phyag rgya 'di nyid las sdigs mdzub gung mo la sdig pa ni dgyila 'khor du dbang bskur

ba dang/ mtshams bcing ba dang/ spyan drangs pa dang/ dam tshig la 'jug pa dang/ skor ba byed pa dang/mi tog dang/ bdug pa dang/ de bzhin du sridang/ mar me dang/ 'phreng ba dang/ byug pa dang/ gtor ma 'bul bar byed

pa dang/ de bzhin du khrus dang/ de cig nyid dang 2 gos bgo ba dang/ gtsug to'abacing ba dang/ srung ba dang/ gzhan srung ba dang/ de bzhin nyid du grogs srung ba dang/ bzlas bzhin pa dang/ mnyam pa nyid dang/ skyil mo

krung bcing ba dang/ spyin sreg gi las dang/ gzhan spyan drangawanyid dang/ gsang sngags spyan drang ba nyid dang/ ngob grubaslu ba nyid dang thams cad nas thams cad du bya ba thams cad phyag rgya 'deg byed de// gnas thams cad du songab dang/ gnas

grub pa dang/ bya ba thams cad legs par bsngags pa dang/ thams cad du mchog gi phyag rgya don yod pa'i las rab tu grub pa dang/ yon tan thams cad skyed pa dang/ thams cad du rigs thun mong pa'i dkyil 'khor chu

don yod pa sgrub pa po'i phyag rgyadon yod pa'i cho ga zhib mo sgrub par byed pa'o// don yod pa'i las zhes bya ba'i phyag rgya 'di don yod pa'i mchog sbyin pa zhes brjod par bya'o// phyag rgya chen po lnga po 'di rnams rmad du byung ba'i de kho na nyid

mthong ba dang/ don yod pa thos pa nyid dang/ don yod pa'i 'bras bu mthong ba dang/ don yod pa'i bsod nams bsags pa'i de kho na nyid dang/ don yod par sdig pa nyams pa dang/ sgrib pa thams cad zad pa dang/ nyon mongs pa

thams cad rnam par 'joms pa'i phyag rgya dang/ don yodapa lasangs rgyas rnams mthong ba dang/ don yod par sangs rgyas kyi zhing mthong ba dang/ don yod par tsho 'phel bar byed pa'i phyag rgya dang/ don yod par dngos grub kyi mchog

sbyin par byed pa mchog tu gyur pa'o// zhing po dang phyag rgya 'di 'jig rten dbang phyug gis sems can thams cad la phan pa'i don du bsgrags pa'o// rig sngags 'chang rnams kyis khyad par du nyin mtshan ru dang/ thun mtshams su'ang

phyag rgya 'di 'ching na bkra shis pa'i mchog dang/ bsod nams dang/ dag pa dang/ sdig pa nyams pa dang/ don yod pa'i dngos grub dam pa 'gyur mchog sbyin par byed do// 'di ni thar pa mchog gi gnas mya ngan las 'das pa mchogatu/

dge ba'o// phyag rgya'i gsang sngags rnams su 'gyur te/ oM a mo g+haM ku sha dzA lI hU~M/ oM a mo g+ha kro tu daMhU~M/ oM bcu rA dza pad+me tshwa latuM/ oM a mo g+ha ba ba rta a mo g+ha tsin+ta ma Ni pa ban+d+ha

ya hU~M/ oM a mo g+ha sarba dra sA d+ha ya shi ba hU~M/ phyag rgya 'dzin pa'i sngags so// de nas dge ba'i las thams cad byed pa'i gsang sngags thams cad dusgrub ba'i thabs kyis de kho na nyid kyi gnas thams cad la

'jug par byed pa bshad par bya ste/ oM a mo g+ha maN+Dal hU~M/ dkyil 'khor bcing pa'o// os ma mamu'u b+hi pri thi gis hAhU~M/ a yongs su sbyong ba'i sngags so// oM a mo g+ha pa ri sho d+ha nit+taM/ dkyil 'khor yong

su sbyong ba'i sngags so// mo a mo g+ha pra bi dA sar sgra li hU~M/ sa dang ba byung gi sngags so// oM a mo g+ha dza la/ shA ba NAhU~M/ chu'i sngags so// oM a mo g+ha a mr-i tab re sAhA/ dbang sgyur ba'i sngags so//

o a mo g+ha b+hak+Sha b+ha ba nab re hU~M/ thig rnam par dbye ba'i sngags so// oganArab ra dza la tuM/ tshon rtse'i ri mo'i sngags so// oM dzA la bi ma la a mo g+ha shAn+tehU~M/ khrus kyi sngags so/ oM sid+d+hi ji le a mo g+ha bud+d+hihUM/

na rig gi sngags so// oM a mo g+habaskye ts+tshad[% ]/gos bgo ba'i sngags so// oM a mo g+ha ma Nit+taM/ gtsug tor bcing ba'i sngags so// oM a mo g+ha rakachab rad hU~M/ bdag srung ba'i sngags so// oM a tra kyi

Ni a mo g+ha dikr-ituM/ thams cad du gzhan srung zhing bde ba'i ched du srung ba'i sngags so// oM a mo g+ha pra bisha grub ni hU~M/ gnas su 'jug pa'i sngags so// oM na mo a mo grub ti hUM/ phyag byed pa'i sngags so// oM
[s] ]amo lha tsakrahU~M/ bskor ba'i sngags so// oM sa ma ya sid+d+hi a mo g+ha ba tihU~M/ dam tshig gi sngags so// tshom mo ga khubra btsagal tA/ me tog dang/ dri dang/ 'phreng ba dang/ byug pa dang/

btsug pa'i sngags so// oM a mo g+ha sa bsaM pU ra Nibs ra sa gra ba ti[% ]/ thams cad du gtor ma'i sngags so// oM a mo g+ha tu tshig/ ma mo'i sngags so// oM a mo g+ha ba ti tsar bi tsa ra sany+tsa ra satA/
thams can du gnas pa dang/ gnas thams cad du song bzhag pa'i rgyal pos bya'o// thams cad du las thams cad byed par rig pa rigasang sngags sbyar bar bya'o// gshegs su gsol ba rnyed kyang
sngags 'dis bya'o// la shin tu skyas ba gzhan thams cad ni rig pa'i rgyal bos bya'o// legs par byas pa'i las dang/ bya ba rnams dang/ bya gathams cad sgrub par byed pa gzhan rnams ni don yod pa'i
lcags kyudang/ khro ba lcags kyu dang/ rig pa'i rgyal po'i gsang sngags chen po dang/ dpa' bo gcig pa gsang sngags 'di rnams dang/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rang rang gas las rnamA
bya'o rtsa ba'i rig pa 'di nyid kyis las thams cad bya'o// de las phyi rol tugyur pa'i rig pa gzhan ni med do// rig pa 'dini bklags pas grub pa'o// des de la yangs shing rgya che ba'i

brtson pa bya ste/ 'byor pa ji lta ba dang/ ra ji lta ba dang/ ji ltar gsal ba rnams 'byor pa dang bcas shing yongs su rdzogs pa dang/ shin tu gsal bar bya ba rnams bya'o// gtsang ma gtsang mas khrus byas te
nu// gos gtsang ma bgo bar bya/ dad pa dang/ gus pa dang/ mchog tu dang pa bskyed par bya/ bden par smra bar bya/ bden pa phyi rol du 'byung bar bya/ bden par spro ba dang brtson
pas 'byung bar bya/ lkog tu smra ba dang/ phra ma dang/ ser sna med par 'gyur ba bya/ lag yangs bar bya/ ses rgyas kyi byang chub kyi lam dang/ bklags pas grub pa'i rig pa 'di
sgrub pa byed par 'gyur bar bya/ sems can thams cad la brtse ba mchog tu bya/ bri bar bya/ 'dri'i gzhug par bya/ bklag par bya/ kha ton du bya/ mchod par bya/ mo'abya/ kun

chug pa bya/ rmog zhib mo'i rgyal po chen po 'digatshungs pa dang/ don yod zhags pa'i rnam par thar pa'i dkyil 'khor yang dag par rmad du byung ba 'di byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyis phyag byas pa
bzhi gshegs pa thams cad kyi rigs kyi dmatshig thun mong gi gsang ba/ dkyil 'khor rim par phye ba thams cad kyi gsang ba/ phyag rgyu dang gsang sngags thamasacad kyi gsang ba'i cho ga zhib mo
cha 'di'aphags pa sman bas gzigs dbang phyug gis gsungs so// de nas yang lha dang/ klu dang/ gnod sbyin dang/ dri za dang/ lha ma yin dang nam mkha' lding dang/ mi 'am cidang/ lto phye
! rna bo dang/ mi gang yin pa rnams kyang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor chen po dang bcas pa ga la ba dang/ de bzhin gshegs pa
mngon sum du gyur pa ga la ba der song ste lhags nas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyag gi spyan sngar song sta/ zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te
thal mo sbyar bar gyur pas 'di skad ces gsol taM// bcom ldan 'das 'di bdag gis gzung bar bgyi'o// don yod pa'i lcags kyu cho ga zhib mo'i rgyal po'i yang lhag pa'i rgyal bo/ chog
zhib mo 'di yongs su srung ba'i don dang/ mi nub cing rgyas par 'gyura'o// cho ga zhib mo'i rgyal po ji ltar rnyed pa de bzhin bris pa 'di yos su rdzogs//ka'adi ni sngon gyi

lo tsab mkhas pa bzhi tsam gyis bgos nas bsgyur ba la/ babaskabs bar skabs su chad cing mjug ma tshang ba las/ bla ma dus kyi 'khor lo pa chen po chos grags dpal bzang po'i phyag nas rgya dang byung zhing
chad pa gsob pa dang mjug sgyur cig ces bkas bskul ba la brten nas/ bam po bcu pa'i nang du/ las kyi don kun sgrub par byed// ces pa nas/ gsang sngags bzlas pa mchog gyis shig/ ces
pa'i bar dang/ bam po bcu gnyis pa'i nang du/ bcom ldan 'das 'on kyang don khyad par can gyi ched du/ zhes pa nas/ rig sngags 'chang gi lus 'ba' bar 'gyur te/ zhes pa'i bar dang/
bam po bcu gsum pa'i nang du/ dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga 'di thos pa tsam dang/ zhes pa nas/ mi gang tshad du bsko bar bya// zhes pa'i bar dang/ bam po bcu bzhi pa'i nang du/ pad+ma dang/
'a@#// chu dang/ yus ka la yongs su bzlas te/ zhes ba nas/ ras dkar pos bkru bar bya zhing mnabadun du/ zhes pa'i bar dang/
ma kho bcu bzhi pa dang bcoljala'i mtshams su/ dngul gyi pog po'abargyad dang/ zhes pa nas/ gnas rnam pa gzhan thams cad tu ji ltar yid la byed ba'i bya ba thams
cad du byed do// zhes pa'i bar nang/ bamakho bcu drug pa dang bcu bdun pa'i mtshams su/ de nas sbyin sreg gi cho ga bshad pabya ste/ zhes pas/ phyagargya'i cho
gdung/ sgrub thas kyi choga'o/ zhes pa'i bar dang/ bam po bcu bdun pa/ zhes pa dang/ de ma thag par bam po bco brgyad pa'i mtshams su/ denas rtag tu bzlas pa'i dkyil
'khor gyi tshogi bshad bar bya// zhes pa nas/ 'jig rten mgon po'i 'od zer gyi sbyin sreg rab tu grol lo/ zhes pa'i bar rnams kyi hor kong bsabs shing/ mjug
yongs su rdzogs pa shAkya'i dag song zin chen grub kyis bsgyur cing zhus pa'i yi ga pa ni yog pa grub pa dpal bzang po'o// kun tu lhamo thams cad la'o// zhes kha nas/
gter bsgulan/ zhes pa'i brgyade la mi 'dug go//
